1b1(rgyud): na du/ ga sa /mngon
1b2(rgyud): sa sa
1b3(rgyud): sa gas mdzus
1b4(rgyud): gshed la phyag 'tsha'o//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig no//
2a1(rgyud): /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smad nga gsung dang thugs rje
2a2(rgyud): btsun mo rnams cad kyi b+hag rnams la bzhugaste te/gtimug rjeg shin d+h+r-i ga shid da/ma
2a3(rgyud): gshin rje gshed dang /'dod chags rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang /phreg dog rdo rje gshin rje gshing dang /zhe
2a4(rgyud): sdang rdo rje gi shin rje gshed dang /tho ba gshin rjeg shed dang /dbyug pa ga shin rje gshed dang /pad+ma
2a5(rgyud): shin rjeg shing nga/la grig shin ga shing dang /mtshams rnams rje kyi ka dang /rdo rje jig
2b1(rgyud): myo dang /rdo rje dbyangs can myu dang /rdo rje gau rI ste rnams mtsham su'o//de dag lnga sogs te gshin rje gshed kyi tshogs chen
2b2(rgyud): po dang thabs cig tu bzhugaso//de nus phyeg ni rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la
2b3(rgyud): gsol ba btab pa dang /de nas bcomo ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bdud thams cad rnam par
2b4(rgyud): 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las nges par bton to//zla ba rdo rje sbyor ba yis//
2b5(rgyud): gshin rje mthar byed bsgom par bya//bdud rnams zhi bar bya phyir dang //zhe sdang thams cad bsal ba'i phyir//'od zer
2b6(rgyud): lnga yis 'khrigs pa yis//rdo rje srung ba'i don du sgom//phyir mtshams rdo rje sa gzhi dang //rA ba dra ba de bzhin no//de
3a1(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das du na gshegs pa spyod pa d+mo dung 'dul bu zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
3a2(rgyud): par zhugs nas gti mug rdo rje ga shin+da rje ga shed la sogs pa thams cad kyi sa bon 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams las
3a3(rgyud): nges par phyung ba/dbus su ya dang k+She mi med yan+na ni rA dza sa ngo ru Na yo ni ra'o//ya sogs yi gri dang po las//ga shin rje
3a4(rgyud): gra shed du 'gyur ba yin//yi gre k+She ni gti mug brjod//yi ge ma ni phra mar gsungs//yi ge me ni 'dod chags nyid//yi
3a5(rgyud): ge da ni phrag dag 'gyur//ga shin rje ga shing sogs lnga ru grags//yi ge yA las tho bar 'gyur//yi ge ts+tsha las dbyug pa'i
3a6(rgyud): gtso/lag na pad+ma ni yig las//lag na ral gri rdza las yon//dza las tsartsi ka zhes brjod//yi ge sa las phag gdong ma/
3b1(rgyud): yi ge do las dbyangs can bsgrags//yi ge ru las gau r-I drA nA//na yo ni ra mtshams kyi bzhi//thod pa bzhi ru 'dod pa yin//sna tshogs rdo rje
3b2(rgyud): 'jigs rung ba//na mkha' rdo rje dkyil du bsam//de dkyil bzhugs pa'i gshin rje gla shed//gnag tsang 'bar ba bsgom par bya//shar
3b3(rgyud): du gti mug rdo rje ste//lho ru de bzhin phra ma yin//nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje ste//de bzhin byang du phrag dog go//mtshams kyi rdo rje rtse bzhi la//
3b4(rgyud): tsartsi ka sngags rnam par sgom//sgo yi rdo rje rtse bzhi la//tho bra la sogs rnam par sgom//sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshams bzhi ru//mi yi mgo bo bzhi dag go/de
3b5(rgyud): nus bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos ga shin rje gshed po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhe sdang chen
3b6(rgyud): po'i rigs kyi sngags gsungs pa//oM hrIHSh+T+rI wi kr-i tA na nA hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
3b7(rgyud): bdag pos gti mug rdo rje chen po'i sngags gi su rengs pa//oM dzi na dzi ka/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos phra
4a1(rgyud): //ma rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa//oM rat+na d+h+r-ika/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos 'dod
4a2(rgyud): chags rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa//oM A ro li ka/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos phrag dog rdo rje'i sngags
4a3(rgyud): gsungs pa//oM pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje tho ba'i sngags gsungs pa/oM muSh+ka ra
4a4(rgyud): d+h+r-ika/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshigs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje dbyug pa'i sngags gsungs pa/oM daN+Da d+hA kaM/de nas bcom
4a5(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje pad+ma'i sngags gsungs pa//oM pad+ma d+hika/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
4a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje ral gri'i sngags gsungs pa/oM khiD+ga d+hoka/de nas bcom ldan 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos
4a7(rgyud): rdo rje tsartsi ka'i sngags gsungs pa/oM mo he ra ti/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje phag mo'i sngags
4b1(rgyud): gsungs pa/oM dwe Sha ra ti/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegasas pa thA masA tsad kyi bdag por rdo rje dbyings can ma'i sngags gsungs pa/oM r+yA ga ra ta
4b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rje DA go nA ma'i sngags gsungs pa.oM badz+rA ra ti/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma
4b3(rgyud): cad kyi bdag po sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags gsungs pa//oM sarba ta thA ge tAk+ShA ya badz+ra swa b+hA paM At+ma ka&haM//oM sarba tA thA ga tA bA kaM brda swa b+hA ba
4b4(rgyud): At+maka.oM sarba te thA gau tAts+tshit+tA badz+rI saM b+hA ba s+yet+ma ko&haM/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gi shugs pa thams chud kyi dag ba zhi sna chen pa'i srungs par
4b5(rgyud): bstan pa/zhal gsum phyag drug khros pa la//in+d+ra nr-i la 'dra ba'i mdog/phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa nyid//gshin rje gshed ni bsgom par bya//zhal gsuM
4b6(rgyud): ga~M drug ba la//gsol ba'i gzugs dang 'dra ba'i 'od//phyag ni 'khar lo bsnams pa nyid//gti mug rdo rje rnam bsgom bya//zhal gas m+b+ha phyag drug
4b7(rgyud): rgyas gyur baM//gser gyi rnam pa'i 'di dang ldan//phyag na rin tshon bsnams pa nyid//phra ma rdo rje rnam bsgom bya//zhal gsum phyag drug dbang byed pa/
5a1(rgyud): pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od//phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa nyid//'dod chags rdo rje rnam bsgom bya//zhal gsum phyag drug thams cad la//rin
5a2(rgyud): chen margad 'od dang ldan//phyag na shubs can bsgoms pa nyid//phra ma rdo rje rnams bsgom bya//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cod kyi sku gsung thugs ga shin+ti
5a3(rgyud): gshed nag po'i rgyud las mngon par rtogs pa'i rim par phye ba ste/le'u dang po'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
5a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen po la bstod pa/ga shin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa//gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod//ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang
5a5(rgyud): bzhin//rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod//gshin rjeg shed po rab 'jigs pa'i//phra ma rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod//rdo rje thugs dang rab mtshus pa//rdo rje rin phyug
5a6(rgyud): 'tshal bsto//'dod chags rdo rje'i de bru khyud//g+he shin NAM gshed pa /'jigs pa//rde r+d+he gaslong dang rab mar+g+hangs //rdo rje g+ha smaing l+yA phyag 'tshal bstod//
5a7(rgyud): phrag dog ji bo'i ring bzhin khyod//gshin rje gshed po las kun pa//rdo rje chags dang rab tu mtshungaso//phyag ni ril gri phyag 'tsha la bid/sangs rgyas
5b1(rgyud): na gyi dngos po khyod//sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pas//sangs rgyas kun mchog gtso bo'i glotso//dkyil 'khor gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod//rdo rje mig dang /
5b2(rgyud): rdo rje sna ba dang /rdo rje lce dang /rdo rje lus dang /rdo rje thugs zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlob pa'i cho ga'o//de nas yang dag
5b3(rgyud): bI shing bya ba//'dod pa'i don grub grub byed pa'i//gshin rdzo gshed pa nyid mtshungs pa//gshin rje 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor lo//skud pa gsar pa lags
5b4(rgyud): bsgrims pa//legs pa'i tshad la mdzes pa yis//skud pa shes pas thig gdab po//gshin rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor lo//mchin rnams thams cad rab
5b5(rgyud): rdzogs shing //bar chad thams cad rab nyams pa//zhi ba lnga sngogs rab 'jug pa'i//dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i tshe byad la//rtse mo lnga dang ldan mnyam pa'i//las
5b6(rgyud): kyi rdo rje da lta bris//rdo rje 'bar ba 'khrigs pa yis//rdo rje de yi dbus su bri//ral gri byang gi phyogasu bri//'khor lo'i 'od kyi bskor ba yi//'khor lo shar gyi
5b7(rgyud): phyogasu bri//'od kyi phreng ba mnyam 'phro ba'i//rin po che ni lho ru bri//pad+ma rA ga'i mdongs 'dro'i 'od//pad+ma nub kyi phyogasu bri//'od zer lnga dang mnyam ldan pa'i
6a1(rgyud): shar gyi mtshams su 'khor lo bri//lho ru rdo rje bri bar bya//nub du pad+ma'i me tog ni//yu ba dang bcas kha bye gsal//'od kyi phyung ba mnyam 'phro
6a2(rgyud): ba'i//ud pa la ni byang du bri//shar gyi sgor ni tho ba ste//dbyig pa de bzhin lha yi sgor//'dam las skyes pa nub kyi sgoro//byang du rdo rje ral gri'o//shes pas
6a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa la//mchod pa khyad par 'phags pa ni//'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag gis//'jigs pa med par mngon par mchid//de bzhin gshe
6a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rdzog shed nag po'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor chen po'i rim par phye ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o///de nas bcom
6a5(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod nas gsol ba btab pa/sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa yi//'jigs pa'i gshin
6a6(rgyud): rje 'joms dkyil 'khor//dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gtso bo//mgron po dkyil 'khor bri bar mdzod//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen pos nyid kyi
6a7(rgyud): sku gsung thugs rnams las bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho ga nges par phyung ba/oM AHhU~M/rdo rje me lce sbyor ba yis//rdo rje can kun mnyes pa dang //rdzogs pa'i sidra
6b1(rgyud): rgyurgyas thams cad bzhugs//ye shes 'byung gnas ngo bo nyid//dgug pa dang ni gzhug pa dang //bcing dang de bzhin dbang bya nyid//tho ba la sogs sngags bzhi yis///
6b2(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag pas rnam par sgom//ma he rdo rje rnam bsgoms li//dkyil 'khor gtso bo rnam bsgom bya//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//gti mug
6b3(rgyud): rdo rje rnam bsgom bya//rje bdun ldan pa'i dbus gnas pa//phra ma zhes bya rnam bsam bya//dkyil 'khyod dam pa'o dbus gnas pa//'dod chags rdo rje rnam
6b4(rgyud): bsgom bya//las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa//rdo rje las ni bsgom par bya//zhi ba'i gti mug rdo rje ste//rgyus pa de bzhin phra ma yin//'dod chags rnga
6b5(rgyud): rje dbang du byas//rdo rje lus kyis thams cad ngu'o//rdo rje lus kyi sbyor ba yis//mi tshil mi yi tha~Md par bzhig/de bzhin mi smras sdong bu bya//dur khrod dag tu
6b6(rgyud): beb skyeg/mige sman dag ni de bzhin du//migo spyan las kyi sgom pa dang //lus kyi bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis//mig sman 'di ni 'grub par 'gyur//khrig dang gu
6b7(rgyud): gum bzung byas nas//sgrub pa byug pa bsgrub par bya//las kyi rdo rje sbyor ba yi//rkang pa byug po 'grub par 'gyur//bdud rtsi lnga ni mnyam pa la//shi k+ShiM/
7a1(rgyud): dang ni ldan pa yis//lcags gsum du ni bcug byas na//las kyi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur//klan ti'i lcags kyi ral grin+ti//lus kyi sbyor ba bsgyung //
7a2(rgyud): par bya//las kyi rdo rje sbyor ba yis//las kyi rol gri rab 'grub 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyu
7a3(rgyud): lasau las kyi rim par phye ba ste le'u gsum pa'o///de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal
7a4(rgyud): po 'dis bstod nas gsol ba btab pa/lus kyi dbye ba'i dbye ba las//sems can 'jug pa ji ltar 'gyur//rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol//yon+da tan rgya
7a5(rgyud): mtsho rnams nyan lags//de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos//las ni thams cad rab sgrub pa//nyes kun gsol ba'i bdag nyid kyis//'di skad kyi ni tshig
7a6(rgyud): gsungaso//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/thugs rdo rje nyid kyi mthus phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byas nas//bcom ldan 'das la lan
7a7(rgyud): gsum bskor ba byas te/yang dang yang du phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung nyan to//de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos//dbang du bye ba'i 'khrul
7b1(rgyud): 'khor bstan//gshin rdug shod kyi 'khor lo mchog/ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//bud med dbang du bya ba dang //srung ba'i don dang de bzhin du//zhi ba'i ro tsanas
7b2(rgyud): bzung ste//gro ga 'am de bzhin skyug shun la//'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris nas//na ma na mas rnam ston la//gnag dang yu can ma yin pa'o//khams phor
7b3(rgyud): gnyis ni kha sbyar te//mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang bar gzhug/skud pa dkar pos kham phor bcing //shar du mngon par phyogs pa yis//me tog dkar pos dus
7b4(rgyud): gsum gtor//gshin rje mthar byed chu shel 'drar//bdag nyid bsgoms nas mdun bkod la//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas//bsgrub bya bltas nas
7b5(rgyud): dbang bskur bya//bdud rtsi lnga yis gong ba yi//bum pa dkar po zla ba 'dras//rdzogs sangs du mas khrus byas te//bltas nas sngags kyi bzlas pa bairtsam/
7b6(rgyud): oM na maHhrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-i tA nA na hUM hUM phaT phaT de ba dat+ta ya shAn+tiM ku ru n+ta mAHswAhA//zhi ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o//skyes pa zhi ba'i gur gum gyis//bri byed
7b7(rgyud): bzhin rgyas pa ya kheng //'khor lo gnyis ni kha che yi//s+t+waM hAs meng ni rgyan pa yi//bsgrub bya'i ming ni bris byas lo//mar dang spre'i rtsis po kang nas ni//
8a1(rgyud): 'am por kha sbyar nang du zhug/spyod pa ser pos bcings nas /me tog sar po dus gsum gtor//byung du kha bltas mdog sor bahU~M//gshI
8a2(rgyud): rjeglu shed du bdag nyid byas mo//pa ba~M byA zla ba ser nag la//bum pa ser po sa bsrur bya zhing //dbang bsgyur ba ni bsgo mo bya la//smyos l-I rgyus pa'i bzlas pa b+hi/
8a3(rgyud): oM hrIHd+d+hi wikl-i tA nA na hU~M hUM phaT phaH/de bdat+ta puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/oMr+g+haMHwi kr-i tA na nA hUM hU~M phaT phaT/bau Sha Ta de ba daMt+ta s+yo po puSh+TiM ku ru boShA
8a4(rgyud): swA hA/'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o//gro ga 'am ras la rgyu skyegs kyi//khro ba 'am tsan dan de mar po 'am//srin lag gi
8a5(rgyud): ni khrag kyang rung //yi ge haM yis brten pa yi//'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam par bri//'khor lo nag po sogs bral ba'i//kham phor gnyis ni kha sbyor du/
8a6(rgyud): ma dang sbyang rtsi bkang ba bzhag/skud pa dmar pos bcings byas la//nub phyogs su nI kha bltas nas//me tog dmar pos mchod par byas//bdag nying
8a7(rgyud): gshin rje mthar byed pa//kha dog dmar po che 'bar ba//zla ba dmar po li gnas pa'o//bsgrub bya yang ni rnam pas mi bya//rang gi lus las byung ba yi/
8b1(rgyud): 'a dam po sngags sus// byung rdzog pa byung ma//rdzun na rman khrobanas smra/ nas p+pa na sa//rlu ga/sa spyugs
8b2(rgyud): sa//gos rbabasmin shig //rnam po dngas ma b+hA pa/gas d-i ma sbyin/mau las gas bral bya //
8b3(rgyud): po'i srid khri mas//'khor lo na sgrub pos smra//oMd+hIwI br-i tA nA ni d+hI sa ts+tsha/hU~M ba d+hA shrIs ru// tAn ni hUM
8b4(rgyud): b+h+yaT+TaswAH/gauShAn+dar+yA ra paHsnus pa sha mA nA ya b+h+r-iSh+Ta na/'di ni bcom ldan sa kyis drubyung du bye ba'i tshig gsung so//rlung khyod gas snyam yang na ni//rang nga
8b5(rgyud): gis bsgral rAs lda ni//khrog dang rgya skyegs bsres pa yis//'khor lo gnyis ni mnya ma bris la//yi ge dzAM dang yi gi hrI sa//ming ni rnamA pa r+d+han byas la/
8b6(rgyud): btsun mo yai ni pad+mi snod//kha sbyor nang du btsud byas te//skud padamar pos bcings byas la//me tog dmar pos mchod par bya//bdag nyid ga/shon d+ha maN+Da
8b7(rgyud): byed pa//nub ka'i nyi ma dang 'dra mar//lcogs kyu ma bas bkug pa yis//bsgrub bya dag ni rnam bsgoms bya//stong la lcags kyus brgyab nis ni//
9a1(rgyud): nas zhugs pas bcings byas te//gan+d+har bu smra ni ma bcings phyur//rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis//seng go dmar pa'i ltung 'dug la/
9a2(rgyud): rdzas lnga yi sIn bak+ku byA zhing //'ongs pa ru ni bA snum par bya//gal te bsgrub bya mi 'ong na//steng ldeng gI ni m-i 'dag lnga//der ni bzlas pa brtsam par bye//brtum
9a3(rgyud): thigs can g+hi 'khor lo sa//k+kiSh+ThAn nahU~M phaT+Ta pha/oM muk+saM A kaR+Sha ya hU~MHoM hrIHd+hIH wi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M Tatra~MHdwe bad+yAt+tam+b+ha
9a4(rgyud): sprin bcom ldan das kyis dmi ge pa'i tshug gsung sa pa'i//dung da gal me bsri pas ni//smr-ing baM swIm+b+hi ba'is//lukhong la gnyis ni m+b+ha
9a5(rgyud): bri/yi ge lam gyi sde brten pa yi//bsgrub pa'i ming yang bri bar bya//khyam par kha sbyor nang du ste//kham pir ser po'i snying du bzhag/de la mkhas pas ri khA hU~M/
9a6(rgyud): bdun nam gdun hrI//maSh+Tam+bu par gi go pas bribar bya// tsug brgyad nas grags pa//de yi skyed du mnyam par th+liM//yI g+ne hUM dang yi ga pa//
9a7(rgyud): brten por bya//de yi steng du lam yig las//dbang chen dkyil 'khor dgod por bya//sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan pa la//spyad pa ser pos bcings nas ni//gshin
9b1(rgyud): gshed po mdog ser po//dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa//bsgrub bya ser po rnams bsams la//ri rab kyis ni mnan byas pa//phyag na rdo rjes mnan byas pa//
9b2(rgyud): dpung chen dkyil 'khor gyi 'og tu//man dar sogs ri bo dang //sna tshogs ri bo rnams kyis kyang //bsgrub bya mnan par bsgom par bya//de la gnas nas bzlas pa bya//
9b3(rgyud): oM hrIHSh+NIHwi kr-i tA nA na hUM hUM phaT phaT/laM de ba dat+ta s+thA naM stam+b+ha ye ku ru laM/'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rings par byed pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o//ngag ni rengs par
9b4(rgyud): 'dod pa yis//de bzhin 'khor lo gnyis bris la/bsgrub bya'i ming yang bri bar bya//dir ni sngags kyang spros la bzlas//oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi krAtA nAn hUM hUM phaT phaT/
9b5(rgyud): lI da ba dat+ta s+yA ya thA sra ra thA//ka ra krit+taM nan+ti ba ra ya thA A bi ruM br-i kaMde ba to madz+r-i d+ha ya s+ya bA kr-i stam+b+ha na ku ru le/bcom ldan 'das kyis rengs par byed pa'i cho ga de skad gsung so//
9b6(rgyud): shin tu legs par sbas pa yis//'di las gsungs bzhin dgongs pa dge/gshin rjegashid nag sbyor ba yis//nyi ma gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur//sngar bzhin
9b7(rgyud): dur khrid kyi ngas la//'khor lo gnyis bris brtul zhugs can//ske tshe dang ni tshwa dang yang //dug dang gzhan yang nim pa dang //che ba gsum dang che ba'i mar/
10a1(rgyud): dur khrod kyi ni sol ba dang //dA du ra'i lo ma'i khu ba dang //tsan da lI 'bras mdzub mo khrag/cho sgo can gyi sa blangs te//gdol pa'i rdza ma'i dreg pa dang //
10a2(rgyud): rab tu ltogs pa'i smyu gu yis//bcu bzhi la bris brtul zhugs can//khros pa'i sems kyis nyin phyed na//gdug pa can rnams bsad pa'i phyir//sems can
10a3(rgyud): gnod pa byed pa'i mi nga //yi ge hUM gi se brtan byas la//bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa'i//sbyor ba sna lho phyogs kha bltas te//khri chen rab tu drag po'i gzugs
10a4(rgyud): rus pas mgo bo rnam rgyan la//mi he la zhugs lce phyung 'dril//gsus pa che lnga rabo 'jigs dang //sgegro byed skra 'brur gyen du 'greng //s+pho rI smin ma de bzhin
10a5(rgyud): spyir/g.yas ni rdo rje chen po dang //gnyis pa ni ni ral gri dang //gsum pa'i phyag na gri gug go/dri ni g.yon pa'i bri bar bya//'khor lI da nI pad+ma che//
10a6(rgyud): thod pa nyid ni g.yon ne'o//rtsu ba'i zhal ni shin tu gnag/g.yas pa'i zla 'od bzang po 'dra//g.yon pa'i dmar po yin par brtog/rdo rje rgyun gyis rab tu brgyan//
10a7(rgyud): ba spu khung nas 'jigs chen po//rang rigs bdag po rab 'phro ba//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng na ni//zhabs ni g.yon pa brkyang bas gnas//mche ba gtsigs
10b1(rgyud): shing rgyags pa yis//bskal pa'i 'bar ba me dang mtshungs//'di lta bu yi bdag nyid kyis//bsgrub par bya ba mdun du dgod//gdug pa'i mtshon gyis rgyas pa yis///
10b2(rgyud): dri ma can la nad kyis gzir//gos med 'drar zhing nyams chung bas//don 'dod pa yi tshig smra zhing //mtshon gyis gzir ba byas pa yis//gnag gi thum pos
10b3(rgyud): lus gang ba//glang ba'i rlung gis gcis 'gyur zhing //me yi nang du zhugs pa la//ma he dang ni stag dag dang //khyi dang mau chu rings can dag gis//sangs rgyas
10b4(rgyud): sde ni mngon 'jig pa'i//sdig po che dag za bar byed//mthar byed pa yi lhor gnas po//tsher mas lus ni bkang ba dang //rkang pa shing lcags sgrogs gis bsdams//
10b5(rgyud): de bzhin dum bu dum bur byas//lpags pa dag ni bshus byas nas//dri la tshwa dang ske tshe bskus//hU~M zhes zer ba bsgom par bya//de yi lus srung la sogs la//bcad//
10b6(rgyud): pa dag ni mdun du dgod//de'i go cha'ang med byas nas//stong pa'i lus ni mdun du bsam//rang gi lus byung khro bo ni//gau shin rje gshed sogs bdag nyid 'dras//
10b7(rgyud): de yi lus la brgyab nas ni//tshil bu rkang dag 'thung bar byed//de yi mdun du ga shi ni rje bsgoms//lag na dbyig pa stobs po che//gdug pa can des brdegs par
11a1(rgyud): byud //de yi na'i phreng ba sogs//b+hUnd sa b+h+yor mkha' la gro//sa yi 'ogan klung don//sgyu ma yin la sogs pas 'jog/'d-i lta /
11a2(rgyud): byanyams byu ba//snying rje la gan sa sems kyis ni//byed pos 'khor po'i gnas bton nas//sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar byed//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
11a3(rgyud): pa thams cad khyad par can gyi 'di lta bu'i gsung phyung por mdzad//e mo'i bsad pa'i yang dag bsad//bsad pa ma yon sdig las dkrol//ji srid bsad kyang ma bsad
11a4(rgyud): ste/sdig po stong phrag byas pa yis//mnar med la sogs mi skye bas//e mra'o sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag/bsad pes byang chu'i thob par byed//snyoms can
11a5(rgyud): gsod pe bsnyad pa nyid//snying rje chen po nyid kyis byas//e mo'o snying rje stobs kyi mchog/snying rje dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur//oM hrIHwikl-i tA na na
11a6(rgyud): phaT+Ta phaT/hUM ba dat+t+wa m+bA rA yA hUM pheT/A~MhrIwikrA tA na na hUM hU~M phaT phaT/de bdat+tAm+bA ra ya phriT/de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par rtoga~M pa'i rdo rje'i 'al
11a7(rgyud): la bar dang sngags dang sprin gyi babad pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'i//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung drugase gshin rje gi shed nag po'i rgyud las rim
11b1(rgyud): mamananas samamams ma tham/a nanaHtha sa nanaH/Tha sa na thaHtha thathamaSham ya mkham tshan/ ma tham a.aH tham pa paH tham shamaman
11b2(rgyud): par phyo ba ban pa'o////de nas 'khor lo gnyis bris la//yi ge phaT kyis brton pa yi//bsgrub bya'i ming ni bri byas la//thod pa kha sbyar nang du gzhug/skud pa
11b3(rgyud): /sngon pos bcings byas te//nyi ma phyed kyis dus su ni//dur khrod sa yi nang du spras//gshin rje gshod kyi sbyor ba yis//rta dang ma he zhon pa yi//lag ni mtshon thogs
11b4(rgyud): bsgrub bya gnyis//mdun du bsgrub bya dgod par bya//khros pa'i lus la sprul pa'i tshogs//gnyis ka'i phyogasu bsam par bya//gnyis kas 'thab mo mang po byed/
11b5(rgyud): khrosau shing gdug pa'i sems ldan po'o//stobs ldan khros pa bsgoms pe ri bya//bsgoms pas bzlas pa brtsam par bya//oM hIHSh+ThAHwi kri tA na na hUM hUM phiT phaT/
11b6(rgyud): de ba dat+ta yat+ta dan+taM bi dwe ShA ya hUM phaT/'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dbye ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o//cho ga dag ni snga mo bzhin//'khor lo gnyis ni bris byas
11b7(rgyud): la//yi ge hUM phaT gyis brten pa//thod pa kha sbyar nang du gzhug/bskud pa nag pos bcings byas la//sha ze'i tshul du sbu bar bya//gshin rje'i sbyor ba la gaun+tha
11b8(rgyud): pas//mdun tu bsgrub bya bsgom par bya//yo byung gzhu'i dbyibs 'dra ba'i//rlung gi dkyil 'khor nag po la//di steng mdog sngon rnga mo sgom//de la gdug
12a1(rgyud): pa can daston la// yi phyogs su kha bstan///zla ba'i tshogs kyis de log pa//sangs rgyas smin yang bzlog pad+ma/nun+na d+hA hA
12a2(rgyud): tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/hU~M phaT de pa dat+ta uts+tshi Ta yA ni hU~M phaT/'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bskrad pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o//khros pas rnal 'byor lhor mi lta sa lA//
12a3(rgyud): ri khrag/mi bsregs thul bA dang //dug gi tshwa dang ske tshe dang //myur khu smyon pa'i khu bye yis//dur khrod ras la 'khor lo gnyis//rim pa 'di bzhin bri
12a4(rgyud): bar bya//bsad pa gshin rje'i lus la gnas//dbye brta dang ma he yi//bskrad pa rnga mo'i lus la gnas//zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis//rgyas pa zla
12a5(rgyud): bsor po la//btsun mo snying kar dbang du bya//ra l-i skyon pas 'gugs par byed//ri bo dkyil du rengs bya bzhug/sha ra bA 'am seng ges dgug/de
12a6(rgyud): gzhan yang mtshon par bya//ro tsa na dang rgya sgyogs dang //kha che yi ni khyad par gyi//dbang du bya ba gro bar bri//dge ba'i sems kyis bzung byas na//'grub pa
12a7(rgyud): 'gyur te the tshom med//kham por kha sbyar nang du gzhug/khA yi sgro yau smyu gu yis//nyi ma phyed nas bri bar bya//pad+ma'i kha sbyor ro bsregs sor//gshin rje'i
12b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis//oM hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs gsang sngags bzlas//lho phyogs gnas te tshar bcad bya//mtha' yi ya bor zhi ba la//yi ge ni de gnyis ka nga //
12b2(rgyud): phyi nas dkyil gyi yA spangs ste//yig lcug mA ci bde bar//mngon du bskyen pa khri tsam bya//'dis ni las rnams rab sgrub pa//ye shes rdo rjes bya ba ste//gshin rje
12b3(rgyud): go shed kyi rnal 'byor pas//rab tu grags pa'i 'khor lo 'dri//yi ger bris nas gnas pa dang //'khrir lo bris nas gnas pa yA//khyom der 'thab mo rtag tu 'byu
12b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las 'khrul 'khor gyi go rim bri ba zhes bya ste rims por phye ba lnga pa'o///
12b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa/gang gis rdo rje can mnyes pa//zhe sbyong phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor gyis//rdo rje'i
12b6(rgyud): phyag rgyas rgyas btab pas//dngos grub rgya rkyen thob byor byed//de nas rdo rje 'tshang rgyal blos//'di lta bu yi gsung bsgrags//dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha kun gyi/
12b7(rgyud): dbu log shin rje gshed de sgom//rtag tu dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//rtag tu sbyin bsrog gis kyang dgang //rtag tu dam tshig dag kyang bzung //sdom pa dag kyang
13a1(rgyud): yang dag gzung //dang po lanats+tshed pa na dang //b+h+yoHs+yA sa smon pa /ga m+b+ha ba sa byu nga //nA dbyun dru ban ste/ni ga
13a2(rgyud): 'di ni dbang chen po//nag pa'i zhal nas byung ba yi//dbyeng 'di dag glus bye brag gis//rgyal ba'i sras kyis byed chu ba blo'i//'byung po kun gyi gtor me'i lus/
13a3(rgyud): sngags 'di de nas rlab bshad bya//sngags chen bzlas pa tsam gyis ni//'byung po thams cod 'dar 'gyur ba//oM in+d+ra yats+tshiHya m+b+ha y+YaSh+NIHba ru NA ya Sh+Ta
13a4(rgyud): kuM de d+hA ya kl-i/I shwA na ya ti/eg+na ye A/nai ri ti ye na/bA ya ba na/tsan+d+rA ya hUM/a kAR+ShA ya hUM/brAh+ma NaM Ta/ba su d+hI ri N+yai phaT/dem
13a5(rgyud): b+h+rUM swASh+TaM/sar+b+ba d+hA/hA//pheM//pAT+Ta ban+d+ha s+thAt+ma/hrIH mut+pa chu skyes pasadakyil 'khor b+hU gsum b+has+thA nAs nI//sgyu rnam
13a6(rgyud): kyang ni tshim par byas//ha ha zhes kyang dran par bya//dkyil 'khor rim gesum bya ba ni//brgyud dang bcu gnyis bcu drug pa'o//dkyil 'khor mkhas
13a7(rgyud): dris pa la//sngogs ni kun tu dgod par bya//brtul zhugs can gyis bcu gnyis par//grub pa'i sngags rnams dgod par bya//rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig
13b1(rgyud): ts+tshinA gsum//ma lus lus pa rnyed par 'grub//AM ya mAn+ta dzA/s+yA do mo yA/ya ma do ru/Na ya ya/ya yaun r+Ya yASh+TayA/yak+Sha yan+ta/ni rA mA yA/hUts+tsha
13b2(rgyud): lI du ya byAs shA ra duN+Do//b+hi ru 'jam pa'i rdorje ste//yi gI me ni nu b+heSh+TI shre/byung du n+ti 'anga' ba ni//basmA b+h+yAM mid ni sbyin byAg+h+ra/mtshams kyi stong pa dag tu
13b3(rgyud): hU~M gnyis kyis ni brten byas la//dgos pa thams cad srub par byed//ya tsa ni ra dza sa de ru//na yo ni ra l-I sogs pa/phyi rol rim par g.yon brtsams bri/
13b4(rgyud): don kun rab tu sgrub pa'i phyir//rim pa gsum pa de la ni//kun tu ne re bor ba la//shwar nas brtsams nas bri bar bya//oM hrIHSh+T+rIn+d+ral sogs pa'i sngags//de mi
13b5(rgyud): bIr dag thams cad kyi//cha brgyud bor ba dag la bri//a mu kr-i ku ru/uts+tsha Ta yA ba shi ku ru/bi dwe Sha ya/shAn+ti ku ru/puSh+TiM ku ru/'di ltar g.yon nas
13b6(rgyud): ni//las dang rje su 'thun par ni//phyag 'tshal na ma tha me'i b.raro//tha mr-iR+ShA bau Sha Ta dang //hUM phaT dang ldan sru bon gyis//zhi dang rgyas dang mthar dbang byed//
13b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud les 'khor lo rnam par bri ba zhes bya ba ste rim par phye ba drug pa'o//
14a1(rgyud): khrag dgug pa yi sbyor ba ni//zhal gsum phyag drug skem pa yi//phyug na 'khor lo zla 'od 'dra'o//mkhas pas car ci ka bsgom bya//chang dag
14a2(rgyud): dgug pa'i sbyor ba ni//zhal gsum phyag drug pag gdong mo//rab sngo phyag na rdo rje bsnams//mkhas pas phag mo bsgom par bya//shes rab bskyed par bya
14a3(rgyud): ba'i phyir//zhal gsum phyag drug dmar ba la//zhi ba phyag nu pad+ma bsnams//dbyangs can brtul zhugs can gyis sgom//khu ba dgug pa'i sbyor ba ni//
14a4(rgyud): zhal gsum phyag drug ral gr-i bsnam sde//nor bu margad 'dra ba ni//gau ri mkhas pos bsgom par bya//de nAs bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gA shin rje gshed phra
14a5(rgyud): bsad pa dang dgug po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje tsartsi ka'i sngags 'di gsung so//oM tsartsi kle sid d+hen+de nI la hi ri Ne rat+na tra ye A pa kA
14a6(rgyud): No ru d+hi ra A kAR+Sha ya dzaHsngags 'di dag ni dran byas na//kha gdangs pa dag byas pa yin//'jig rten gsum gyi khrag chen po//'gugs par 'di la the
14a7(rgyud): tshim med//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje go shin rje gshed chen po cheng 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te//rdo rje phag mo'i chang 'gug
14b1(rgyud): 'i thugs gsungs pa//A~M da rgyun b+h+yo na sa pa rnam makI b+hu b+hur/sa d+ha ra so d+har//kaut+yA/u kaR+Sha yAdz+nyAHrdza mkhan lag pa byos pa'o sas//zlum pa/
14b2(rgyud): mdzes ny-i byas yi//rgyun ma'i sgra na nag ste// seMn rje sa dran pa //sngags ngag nyi 'dra//banyamadzad rte na ga tu bskrun//dul
14b3(rgyud): dmigs ni sa 'brung phyur gyi//tshong ni 'gugs par rab hU~M grag ni/de nis bcom ldan 'das m+b+ha tshi ga chen pa'i ga shin rdzog shed rdo rje shrIs rab pha rol tu phyin
14b4(rgyud): zlas bya ba'i ting 'dzin lta snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje dngas can mA'i sngags gsung sle /oM bi nu bi nu preng+ga bAr+d+ha nA/mdz+wa le/mai d+hA bAd+ha ne/
14b5(rgyud): bud+d+hi badz+nyA na~M swAt+ma/chos kyi dang po nas bzung ste//kun tu zla ba nya yi ba re//spyir ba'i skad ni smra bar bya//ji srid zla ba'i rje sa 'jug pas//rtag tu tshis
14b6(rgyud): btsod po rgyu na ng+ge//dag gi dbang phyug 'asgrub par 'gyur//khams gsum ma lus pa na ni//ma lus lus pa med par 'bru'o//de nas bcom
14b7(rgyud): ldan 'das gshin rje gshed rdo rjes khro ba 'grogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin lo snyoms par zhugs nas/khu ba 'gugs par byed pa'i ga ro'i sngags 'di
15a1(rgyud): gsas//A~Mm+mAk+Shar+N+Na N+Dik+Shak+Shar+m+ma gau rISh+T+rI d+ha/yAd+yASh+Tas+yA/rgyunam/AkAn+d+ra y+YA d+had+hadzAr+m+mAts+tshaSh+T+r-iH/pad+ma 'dung rdorje dang //dril
15a2(rgyud): klu'i rlung sbyor gyis//bzlas dang sgom pa'i sbyor ba ni//khu ba'i tshogs ni 'gugs par byed//nags kyi ning ngam dben po ru//lasi 'di dag ni bskul byas nas/
15a3(rgyud): rjeni mang spyo mas//'grub 'gyur 'di la chem med//drinas bcom ldan das ji rjeg shin rjeg shing nA ga/rdo rje nag pa 'jigs pago byub
15a4(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dbang bskur ba mchog gi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung bar mdzad//u drim bar mnad de//bai ri dza tA ka pre
15a5(rgyud): dang //dkar ni ka yi phreng ba ni//bu khyod zung la byin gyis rlobs//ral gri chen pos khams gsum pa'i//sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa//'byung po thaMd
15a6(rgyud): 'gugs par byed//las kyi ral gri dam pa 'di//gzung na bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur//shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo nyid//rdo rje dril bu sgrub pa 'di//long la
15a7(rgyud): slob ma yang dag gzung //btung ba rin po che 'das ni//rdo rje lus ni rab tu sgrub//kun tu ye shes bu khyod kyis//'thung shig ye shes las byung ba//slob
15b1(rgyud): ma khar yang thugs bya ba//gu shin rje gshed kyis bsgrubs pa yin//rdo rje skyong ma bdag nyid ches//shin tu dga' ba'i sems su bya//de bzhin gshegs pa tham//
15b2(rgyud): cad kyi sgyu gsung thugs gshin rjeg shid nag po'i rgyud lis 'gugs pa la so bI sbyor ba rim par phye bi ste bdun pa'o///de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po//sku
15b3(rgyud): ba'i 'khor lo sbyor bar byed//bgegs dang log par 'dren pa dang //gdug pa tsan dag bsal phyir gsungs//dpal ldan ral gri 'chang de'i bdagra/srung ba'i 'khor
15b4(rgyud): lo sbyor bar byed//rol gri 'bar ba'i bdag nyid kyis//rig pa gsum lngas mchod par byed//sems can thams cad skyob pA yi//spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par
15b5(rgyud): gyis//sl-i dang pha rol phyin pa lnga//lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur//gshin rjegashed kyi dkyil 'khor ni//slob dpon dag gis dkyil 'khor dri//gas kyi
15b6(rgyud): gdong ni bcings byas la//dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun sgor bzhag/khyod su zhes kyang 'di skad dri//skal bzang bdag ces tshig tu brjod//gsil btab pa yi zla
15b7(rgyud): bzang la//yol ba'i nang du sbyin par bya//dbang bskur don du gus tshon pos//de nas lan gsum ched du brjod//ji ltar sangs rgyas chos chen pos//
16b1(rgyud): na rgyu na ya du chu smra na tu klog smon ga rgyu ga/ /
16b2(rgyud): / na na ni sa ma / kyis rjes sa 'i tshwang tshum du/gsu/ 'i ng+ge rna
17a1(rgyud): kyi bzlas pa 'bum b+h+yas nus//mgro la bsdus pa tsam+ba g+hi nI//myig yis nad na nyam sa blar byed//sngags ni lan byangan mngon bzlas pa'o//lag/
17a2(rgyud): pas mgo bo mnyes nas ni//mgo ni zug zer 'byung mi 'gyur//de ni 'di ltar the tsom med//bram ze yi ni sha dwag le//dur khrod so dang thal po las//
17a3(rgyud): gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs byas te//phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa la//rdo rje chen po grayas pa na//de bzhin mi mgo g.yon pa na'o//mdog ni dkar
17a4(rgyud): po cher 'dzegs pa//de yis gdug pa 'joms par byed//bdud rtsi lnga ni sha lA yis//nyi ni re bzhin du gtor mi sbyin//bdag gi dgra bo choms shig ces//
17a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor pas bdag gsol ba gdag/nub mo de skrod brjod pa sa nyal//dgra ni tho rangs 'chi bar 'gyur//chu 'ogags la sogs pas gzir zhing /
17a6(rgyud): yang na nod kyis thabs par 'gyur//dgra yi bai ro tsa na blang //mI yi rkang srubs yongs bkang ste//rab tu bkang nas 'bum bzlas na//shing rtser rgyu ba'i yi/
17a7(rgyud): dwags mtshungs//lha rdzas dngos grub kun byed cing //dgos pa sna tshogs rab sgrub po//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje
17b1(rgyud): gshod nag po'i rgyud las 'jigs byed gshin rje ga shed ces bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste dgu pa'o////ro langs chen po'i sgrub thabs ni//de nas yang dag bshad
17b2(rgyud): par bya//sgrub po bzang po kun byed cing //dgos pa sna tshogs rab sgrub pa'i//bzeng po ma god rma med la//shing la sbyangs pas bsdus byas la//phung
17b3(rgyud): la logs par bkra b+he ste//drir 'dug sngags bzlas brtul zhugs cu ni//e ma'o ngo mtshar sngags kyi mthu//bsam pa chen po'i 'o dod 'bod//gshin rje
17b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor ldan pa yi//yid kyis cung zad 'jigs mi bya//rnal 'byor lam ni gang 'dod pa//de kun thams cad ster bar byed//ma he dang ni ku be ra//stag dang
17b5(rgyud): de las gzhan pa dang //dom dang spre'u dag la ni//khyo dag gi ni khyad par dang //dug dang skye tshe tshwa dang ni//de bzhini tshe gsum so ban dza//'di dag legs par sbyar/
17b6(rgyud): gzugs bya//gra shin rje gshed po 'jigs pa'i gzugs//de la rnal 'byor pas gsol gdab//hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs sngags kyis ni//che ga mo de bdag la
17b7(rgyud): stsol//de yi pa yis ster bar byed//gal te rnal 'byor pa ma phyin//rmi la mo gshin rje gshed brdeg cing //lho yi phyogs khyer ba byed//sad nas de yis pa
18a1(rgyud): yos sgyur//zholo gsum gyuts+tsha drug 'gro/s+yA pA la//on+d+ran pA 'dra ba'i mdog/tho ba 'dzin pa'i brtul thugs can//phyug tu tho bA dgod pa byA//
18a2(rgyud): zhal gsum phyag drug khros pa la//mdog dmar po ste khros pas 'jigs//'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzod//mkhas pas phyug tu dbyig pa dgod//
18a3(rgyud): zhal gsum phyag drug dmar ba la//'jigs pa chen po bsdigs pa yis//phyag na pad+ma dmar po bsnams//pad+ma zhes bya mkhas pas sgomo//zhol gsum
18a4(rgyud): phyag drug ljang /s+ho//phyug nA ral gri bsnams pa yi//las kun byed par sbyor pa'o//ral grI zhes bya rnam bsgom b+h+yo//b+hU gang ling gA rnam sgom nyid//
18a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bdag po rnam par sgom//zhe sdang rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis//gti mug rjes dran bsgom por bya//gti mug rjes dran lnga dmigs nas//phra ma
18a6(rgyud): rjes dran bsgom par bya//phra ma rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis//'dod chags rjes dran bsgom par bya//'dod chags rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis//phra dog dran bye
18a7(rgyud): bertul zhugs can//so so'i rigs kyi sprin rnams ni//ba spu'i khung nas spro ba bya//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//gtum po'i khro bo bsgom par bya
18b1(rgyud): sa.oM//lha mo ston pa n+dan d+ha/donanA ga shogs pa bam sa rlu sa blags gshin drug shod na/ sa na pa
18b2(rgyud): par phye ba ste bcu pa'o///zhe sdang gis mnan 'gro mthong nas//zhe sdang gshin rje gshed gzugs su//bcom ldan grwa shin rje'i dbang du mdzodzad//na/
18b3(rgyud): sdang thams cad zad par byed//gti mug gis mnan 'gro mthong nas//gti mugI gshin rje gshed gzugs su//bcom ldan ge shrin rje gshed dbang mdzad//gti/
18b4(rgyud): mug thams cad zad par mdzad//'gro ba pha mas mnan mthong nas//pha mas gre shun rje ga shing gzugs su//bcom ldan snying rje can gyis mdzad//pha ma thams cad
18b5(rgyud): zad par mdzad//'dod chags kyis mnan 'gro mthong nas//'dod chags gshin rje gshed gzugs//bcom ldan snying rje can mdzad nas//'dod chags thams cad
18b6(rgyud): zad par mjed//phrag dog gis mnan 'gro mthong nas//phrag dog gishin rje gshed gzugs//bcom ldan snying rje can mdzad nas//phrag dog thams cad zad par mdzad//
18b7(rgyud): byams pa tsiH kar gsungs te//snying rjed bzhin phog ma'o//dbyangs can ma ni dga' bo ste//btang snyoms go ri'i gzugs so//bdag nyid dngos po tha~Md kyi/
19a1(rgyud): rmugs par byas nus la lo bar ma//rnal 'byor skyong ka'o sa pan sa//'grub par 'dil mtshom+bu med//do nas n+dob shad byed//spyod pa du
19a2(rgyud): mtshan nyid mchog/gshin rje gshed po 'jigs gzugs kyis//sku dang gsung dang thugs su 'grub/dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogasu//ma he mchog ni
19a3(rgyud): bkug la zhen//sbrul nag gis ni brgyan par bya//lcags kyi rdo rje gzugs par bya//sku yang ser po dag tu bya//gyen berdzes pa yi khyad par gyis//mag
19a4(rgyud): la thod pas yang dag bskor/sma ra lkog sku sor por bya//hrIHSh+NIHla sogs sdigs brjod cing //lcags kyi rdo rje mkha' la gsor//rdo rje gshin rje
19a5(rgyud): gshed sbyor bas//seng ge'i sgo yang de la bya//nus pa cung zad skyes pa ni//rol cing gling du 'jug par myi//ger dang bde ba'i cha kun gyis//drug las
19a6(rgyud): skyes sogs glu blang bya//de nas rgyal mtshan khams mthong na//dor ni 'o ma rab bsgrub bya//lA ma lnga sems cig goms pas//phyag rgya chen po rab bsgrub
19a7(rgyud): byed/phag mo yi ni gzugs kabyung ba'i//btsun mo kun la 'khyud pa yis//dpa'i bo seng ge bzhin du spyad//'dod pa'i don kun rab tu 'grub/
19b1(rgyud): nas da ni bshad bya ba//phyag rgya ma ni rab sgrubs thabs//gsang sngags chen po yi ge gcig/de yi bzlas pa mngon pa shwad bya//yi ge hrIHlus byung ba yis//ma he/
19b2(rgyud): yang dag bsgo mo bya ste//rdo rje dkyil 'kho ra la gnas pa//me he steng du bsgom par bya//gang yang cung zad gcod cing 'bigs//mtshon che sna tshogs//zugs
19b3(rgyud): de na//ma he sna tshogs sgrub pa yi//blo drang ldan pa'i phyag na bsnams//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//dbyig pa gshen rje gshed sgrub thabs//yi ge hI ni
19b4(rgyud): gsang sngags tshe//ma he chen po la bcibs pa//phyag ni 'bum phrag rdzogs pa'i phyag/sku ni mi ro'i thal bas bskus//ri rab dang ni mnyam pa'i lus//
19b5(rgyud): gser gi sa gzhi thugs par mnan//de nas yang dag bshadad bya ba//bye ba'i phyag can sgrub pa'i thabs//yi ge hU~M las byung ba'i gtso//wi kr-i ta na gas
19b6(rgyud): sngags che//oM hrIMSh+Ti wi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT ha hA hi hI hu hU he hai ho hau haM hoHphaT swA hA/dwagos pA thams cad sgrub pa yi//dam tshig sgrub thabs ba shrad par
19b7(rgyud): byed/ sngags kyis dub pas kha zas bza'//ngan pa dang bral rnyid dka' min//sha chen dang ni rta dang ni//glang po che yi khyad par dang //bai glang gi dang khyi dang ni
20a1(rgyud): bong bu rnga mo lce sbyong //sngon po dang ni bsres pa yo//snum tshon gyis ni lus byugs na//lus la byugs pa tsum gyis ni//'gro ba thams cad dbang
20a2(rgyud): du 'gyur//snang mdzod sa dri bair dang //de bzhin bil ba'i lo ma dang //saM phag phyi ma bskyes pa dang //gsor shing lo mo'i khru ba rnams//'di yis
20a3(rgyud): dril phyis byas gyur na//khams gsum po ni dbang du 'gyur//drug dang chu bur de bzhi nu mdze//dril phyis byas pas nyams par byed//gci ba chen po btang
20a4(rgyud): btung bar bya//rdo rje bdud rtsi de bzhin du//'di ni rnal 'byor mchog giH gro//rlung byung me tog btung ba bzhin//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
20a5(rgyud): gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las spyod pa ston pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rim par phye ba bcu gcig pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das
20a6(rgyud): skyes bu chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo tsar tsi ka'i rnam pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing phrag mo'i rnam pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhwa
20a7(rgyud): po dang /dbyangs can gyi rnam pa'i tingange 'dzin la yang snyoms par zhugs pa dang /gau ri ma'i rnam pa'i ting 'dzin la yang snyoms par zhugs te/mchod par
20b1(rgyud): glu 'di dag brjod par mdzod//U r+g+haM kye gshin rjegashed nag bla//srin+d+ra pa'i gzugs can ra na khyod//bdag gis khyod mdzod shin tu 'jigs//khros
20b2(rgyud): po'i rang bzhin nyidi thong mdzad//mtho ris sA stengs so 'og bcas//khyod kyi gar gyis g.yos par mdzod//an tse nag po bcag 'bru ba'o//khro khyod ro langs zhi gar
20b3(rgyud): mdzod//rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs sprul zhing //mdangs nag tshad ni thung bA la//bde chen ngo bo bro gar gyis//rdo rje dbyangs can ma gsol 'debs//hrIHSh+T+r-iHsngags
20b4(rgyud): dang grwar gyis khyod//srid pa gsum gyi 'khrul pa chod//snying rje khros pa'i dang grol gar//'gro bas dang ni dro mchu 'gyur//de nas yang drug bshad byi ba//bzlas pa
20b5(rgyud): yi ni mtshan nyid mchog/de bzlas pa gang zhig rab bzlas na//dngos grub yangs pa thob pa ni//myur bar ma yin dal bar min//ring du mi yin thu nga min//sngags ni/
20b6(rgyud): cung zad thos par bzlas//gri shin+da rje slob dpon mi mchog gi/ma he moM dang so gnyis dang //bA yang dang ni rta dag dang //bong bu rnga mo'i rus pa las//bzlas pa'i phrang
20b7(rgyud): ba rab bsgrub bya//zla ngo gcig gi bcu bzhi la//bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis//sha lnga dag ni bsdu byas nas//bzlas na dngos grub 'grub pa'i mchog/ril bu dag
21a1(rgyud): ni so sol//rnal 'byor pa yis gshin gshed sgom//mkhas pas ni srung mi mgo //khrag gis kyang gA'i mgo bsgom bya//khAn+d+ram gyung na
21a2(rgyud): 'byung po rnams//mkha' 'gro ma'i stong phrag dag/bdud dngadu yi dgas tshogs kyang 'chi//gshin rjeg da rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis//rnal 'byong bdag nyid 'jam pa
21a3(rgyud): no/des ni las kun+d+ha pa yin/ bri/sa na dus rmyi sgyur//skye balnga bas smras cu gas na ri'i mi yod na myur 'am//de bzhin sa ni y-i/
21a4(rgyud): gtor ma drug cu rgyu thog sbyin//dbyug gu d+heg cu rtsa bzhi shes//rtog tu chung zad ci TI dang //de bzhin cung zad 'thung ba dang //gzhan yang bza' ba rnams cad
21a5(rgyud): kyi//phud ni go shin rje gro shed lnga dbul//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/bla ma la ni yon dbul ba'o//las ni thams cad sgrub pa dang //bdag nyid ne bar
21a6(rgyud): byA b+h+yor//blo dge nyid kyang ni dbul ba dang //rta dang ba lang glang po dang //gsar dang de las gzhan pa dang //rang gi chub po de bzhin du//me dang skye
21a7(rgyud): cho ma ngo //de bzhin du ni skri zla dang //na bza' sna tshogs dag dngo ni//gdugs dang rdul yang mdzes pa dang //khyim dang ga na dang bren mi dang //de bzhin nu
21b1(rgyud): dang rol mo dang //ral gri dang ni rgyan dag dang //brtul zhugs can gyis bla ma dbul//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i
21b2(rgyud): rgyud las nye bar 'khor ba'i las kyi khyad par thams cad zhu bya ste rim par phye ba bcu gnyis pa'o////de nas sems can thams cad kyi//sdig pa dag ni ji snyed pa//
21b3(rgyud): de dag gcod pa'i gri gug ste//zho sdang gcod pa'i shu bos can no//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//ring ba'i thos pa sgrub pa'i phyir//rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma sgrub thabs
21b4(rgyud): na mkha'i khams kyis dbus gtogs par//nyi mo'i dkyil 'khor mchog bsam bya//gnas der rtse lnga pa yang sgom//de yo steng du gnas dgod bya//mthing
21b5(rgyud): mdog nag po 'jigs tshul la//phyag drug 'jig su rung ba ste//phyag na rdo rje rnam bsgom bya//phyag gzhan dag la gzhan dag dgod//shar du sangs rgyas mkha'
21b6(rgyud): 'gro ma//phyag drug gti mug rdo rje mtshungs//lag na 'khor lo 'jigs par byed//bsgomo bya sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor du//lho ru rin chen mkha' 'gro ma/
21b7(rgyud): phyag drug pha mau dang mtshungs po//phyag na rin chen rab 'bar ba//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom por bya//nub tu pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro mo//phyag drug pad+ma 'dzin pa
22a1(rgyud): /byung du las kyor ma//rlung gro 'dzin pa'i dkyil lji khyo rnams pa//mo la so mas pa mtshams bzhir// mo r+yAHma bya ba rtum
22a2(rgyud): zhugs can//l-I s+ye m+b+ha le de bzhin grwar/glu ma yin byed par ro//lus kyi cho ga mthong ba des//der ni skyod skyes bsgoms par bya//tho bya dbyig po dang pad+ma//
22a3(rgyud): de bzhin gzhan ni rol gri'o//oM badz+re rAk+Shin+ti/oM bud+d+he TI kin+ti//oMR+Sha ki maiHk+Sh+ma ShI nA DA ki nI/l-i na~M ga ma~M/mtshams su/oM mu gAr rjeH
22a4(rgyud): dat+tA d+hI/oM pad+ma ga~M/oM khan+da ho//'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis rdo rje maM byA'i 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs gsungs pa'o//ring por thos pa sgrub rin du/\u0f7f
22a5(rgyud): mkhar 'gro mya bsgom bya//de ni gsang sngags kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur te/oM a kA sha tse r-i badz+ra DA ki nI swA hA//de nas yang dag bshang bye ba//rdo rje sa 'og
22a6(rgyud): sgrub thabs so//so 'og rnam par bsgrub don du//gnod mdzes rdo rje bsgom par bya//phyag drug mdog sngon 'jigs pa yi//phyag tu gtun shing dgod par
22a7(rgyud): byed dkyil 'khor gyi ni dkyil ngag tu//'di ni rab tu dgod par bya//shar du spyan mo dgod par bya//de bzhin myo ru mA ma ts+tshe/nub tu lha mo gros pa
22b1(rgyud): //sgrol ma byudrug/phyug+sa/s+yA da//mau d+h+r-i g+h+ra b+h+yo smra dado bstan no//ma po la sogs su chos su dgong // du la sngags m+b+ha d+hA //sArA sa rkun pa sgra rag
22b2(rgyud): mas kyi tshigs na sa/ d+hI myed/rdo smra b+h+r-i na sa/rmi la d+hA m+b+ha /de nas yod /
22b3(rgyud): /bdun pa'i rgyu ma wAn d+hIk+ShikhA 'kho //mkha' snyid nyid nr-i pAN+Da hU~M//hU~M mchog ni ri tu phyug/phyag gnyis bI la zhal gcig pa//sgyu mdo'i ldang
22b4(rgyud): 'jigs pa byed//nyi ma'i d+hIHmA 'khor sted du banan/r+N+Na mra gding po ba mdzes pas//g.yos pa sras glo khu tshur bcas//phyug g.yon pa rdA pa'o//mi
22b5(rgyud): tsu hU~M ti t+ti//gsang sngags 'di ni mkhas pas pan//rta yi mchog tu byur bar dgrags//shar du bI dbang bsgom bya/m+b+ha b+h+yog/su ni rim grom+b+ha//nub tu bdun
22b6(rgyud): pa'i la dz+nyAste//bdag pa phyag dag ji lta bar//thams cad da dang 'dri bor nom/rgyu nga 'di yos ni thams cad rje//gau shegs su gsol bar rlob tu glegs
22b7(rgyud): phyag mo'i sa su/nga rgyun mas su na/na gle sa/de ga 'a ga /gan shing da na //
23a1(rgyud): /lcags kyu dang ni zhags pa dang //gar la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//sgru ba na dun rtag tu sgom//sgo chags g.yon par bsgom par bya//rangan//
23a2(rgyud): phyag mtshan de bzhin g.yos//ji ltar rta mchog sngags kyis ni//rdo rje so 'og gri yang gter//rta mchog rnal 'byor nyid kyis ni//khams gsum na mkha
23a3(rgyud): khams su 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las dngos grub nges par bstan pa ste rim por phye ba bcu
23a4(rgyud): gsum pa'o///de la 'di ni sred bu brgyad pa'i dmachog gi mchog ste/aM u kA ro mu kha~M sUrba d+harmA d+d+haM Ad+ya nut+pan+na twAta oM AHhU~M/dpal ldan gshin
23a5(rgyud): rjeg shed bsgoms la//slob ma rnam snang mdzad du sgom//ye shes thig mchog rtsem rtsi//shin tu mi nyi ma pa gzhug nas gdag/de la 'di ni dkyil
23a6(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i dam tshi go/oM AHhU~M/dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur rim par bya//de yi sgo yi nyi shu'i tshad//bzhi pa'i rnam lnga mnyam byugs pa'i//srung
23a7(rgyud): pa sangs rgyas kyis rab brtags//de la 'di ni rdo rje chen po gsol ba btab pa'i dam tshigo/e ma ho sangs rgyas slob dpon che//oM ma he chos dang tshogs kyi
23b1(rgyud): ga/dmatshig dmatshig bdag lnga stsol//byang chub sems kyang bdug la stsol//do la 'di nis chen po yongs su bzung ba'i tsho gum+b+ha/rdo rjesa'i lha mo kug la//
23b2(rgyud): ma khyung+ga ni dbang du 'gyur//skyob pa sbyangs rgyas thams cad s+ho//skyed pa yi ni khyad par dang //sa dang pha rol phyin pa la'o//sgo ni deH/lde 'khor che brgyad/
23b3(rgyud): chen dag ni bor ba l+la//bdag nyid chen pos shos par bya//yid du 'ong zhing legs smras pa'i//mu khyud sgo tsa mau shes par bris//lha yi snam bu 'dre de tsam+bo//
23b4(rgyud): rdo rje lha mo ldan pa yis//klu dang rol mo gang yang dgod//mched snam sgo yi byed nyid de//'grom dang ngos kyang de tsamo//do shal srin mi do dang ni//nyi ma zla
23b5(rgyud): me tog zeng //de lags dang 'phen dag gortsi byes yi thig rgyub tu//mo chen po'i snam bu de yi byed//de la snying po chen po 'dis//bdag nyid 'kho
23b6(rgyud): rnam par dgod//der ni rang gi phyag rgya 'ang bsten//dam tshig ye shes gzhug pa ste//de ltar dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya//shar du da//ra po chen po ste/
23b7(rgyud): lhar ni ser po dang ldan pas//nub kyi tshor ni dmar po'o//byang du ljang ku dang ldan par//in+d+ra nI la 'od 'dra ba'i//dbus kyi char ni yang dag bri//de la phyid/
24a1(rgyud): rgyud da pa dad+ya//las chog ma nas ni//rtag tu phyug rgyu mkha' mnyam pa//r+m+ma ts+tshe ga tu bri//dI yi dam+b+ha ts+tsha d+hArmAshAr du
24a2(rgyud): 'kho po shAd don //phyogs na na sbyinas da ni//sa da
24a3(rgyud): khru gang dang ni ldan par bya//dri yi dkyil 'khor rtse mo ni/sor bzhi po la zlum por bya//gting du sor gnyis zab pa la//de la sor phyed mchur byas pa'o//
24a4(rgyud): blugs gzar pad+ma'i 'dob 'dra ba'o//kha ni mthe bo'i lte gang la//de la sor gcig tsom zab pa//rgyud 'di ru ni rab tu sngagasadakyil 'kho rau du ni ma zhu/
24a5(rgyud): dang /mtsho mis med lnga ni byas pa dang //sems can srog ni gcod pa dang //nya dang sha ni mngon za dang //chung la mngon par dad pa dang //chad lha'i
24a6(rgyud): brtul zhugs 'dzin pa dang //mngon par dbang ni ma bskur dang //kun tu 'khyam zhing ldem pa dang //grong gi glu mi byed pas kyangag shin rje ga shed chud//
24a7(rgyud): mngon gzhol na//nag po'i tshig ni ji lta bar//grub pa 'di la the tshom med//de nas byams pa la sogs kyis//rdo rje ngas pa 'di mthong nas/
24b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' kun//mi smra bar ni sdod par 'gyur//de la 'di ni rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga'o//'byung bzhi'i sa bon chen po las//'khor lo bzhi ni rab bsrud
24b2(rgyud): gr-i nas bzhi rab tu sbyor ba bsam/na mkha'i la ni g.yo bar byed//rkang pa dag gi 'og tu yi//lte bar ri ste snying kar li//ba kho la ni yi ge gI//yi ge yaM//
24b3(rgyud): ni nAg chen po//drag la rngam pa rab 'gyur ba'i//gru gsum sreg pa'i me ltar 'dar//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur dmar//rdo rje sa gzhi 'dzin bzod pa'i/
24b4(rgyud): ser po chen po gru bzhi pa//ri rab ri yis mnan pa yis//nor 'dzin de ni bsgom par bya//dkar po zlum po bsil chen po//sprin bzhin du ni char pa 'dzin//rgya mtsho/
24b5(rgyud): du ma chus gang po'i//gangs kyi ri bo ltar bsil ba'i//gnas bzhi ru ni sbyor bas na//khar ni snang ba mtha' yas te//slob ma rdo rje bsgom par bya//myur ba ru ni
24b6(rgyud): 'bebs par byed//de la 'di ni dri ba'i cho ga'o//rdo rje chos ni mgron chen po//snang ba mtha' yas bde ba che//gsungs shig 'dod cha/chos chen po//dge dang mo//
24b7(rgyud): dge legs por dro//khru gde nas ni brtsams nas ni//ji srid khru ni stong gi bir//slob ma chen po 'phar bar 'gyur//de ni dbab pa'i cho ga'o//'jigs
24'a1(rgyud): /gzugs ri mo'i mtshan nyid ni//de nas yang dag pashad par bya//sa ni 'dzum rI b+hU byas la//byartul zhugs can gyis bzlas pa bya//sran+den ru
24'a2(rgyud): 'o ma de bzhin sha//bu ra mA tin ni ni la sogs//snum dang rnam pa'i lo mo dang //ne ti de bzhin rdzogs//dang por dkar por bri bar bya//kha dog gzhan gyis
24'a3(rgyud): de nas sgom//rdo rgyu sa dang ni btsag drag las//rgyu skyigs lta bu'i mdog tu 'gyur//yung ba de dag rams dag las//de bzhin kho dog ljang kur 'gyur//
24'a4(rgyud): sngon po dag ni dmas kyis bya//de bzhin du bas nag pa'o//sdong ros kyis ni se ro bo ste//dmar pa de bzhin 'tshal gyiso/2/de la bil pa'i snying po bzhag
24'a5(rgyud): ha cang nyung dang mang ba min//mangs na nag por 'gyur ba ste//nyungs ni de bzhin 'bul bar 'gyur//gzugs ni khri dang zhi ba'o//mtshan nyid dag ni bsha
24'a6(rgyud): par bya//rol bzhi par gsungs pa ste//khro bo sgrom la thung bar bshad//sna ni sar bzhi bya ba ste//dpral bkos ko mchu de bzhin//mgrin pa 'gram pa
24'a7(rgyud): de bzhin mtshan//sor bzhi dag tu bya ba yin//nyi shu rtsa bzhi lag pa la/nI gyen du sor ni nyi shu yin//lag pa rkang pa gdong ji ltar//mi hUM ni mthe bong
24'b1(rgyud): grang tsam ste//rna ba gnyis la ser gnyis bsgrags//'bras bu gnyis la de bzhin brizhi//mchu ni sor gnyis sdoms pa'o//lte bar sor gcig zab pa yin//lus
24'b2(rgyud): ni mgrin pa bor ba yi//gdod ni sum 'gyur lus la dgod//ral pa cod pand yi chad//rin chen cod pan sor drug pa'o//ral pa gcig ma rab sgrub thadas//
24'b3(rgyud): dri nas yang dag bshang bya ba//gnod sbyin mo ni sgrub 'dod pas//ral pa cig ma rab sgrub thabs//phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig ste//gri gug dang ni thod pa la/
24'b4(rgyud): shin tu sbom la mdog sngo ba//dkyil 'khor dbus su bsgom par bya//dzi b+ha la ni shar du sgom//ba su d+hA ra lho phyogasu//chu dbang nub tu dgod par bya//byang du rna cha kos
24'b5(rgyud): ko 'phyang //me la sogs pa'i mtshams dag tu//gnod sbyin mo bzhi rnam bzhi bya//ku ha la kye he ni gyi haM//sun d+ha ri cho ga bzhin dgod//der ni sgo bau rnams bsgoms
24'b6(rgyud): tedo tho ba la sogs mnyam par ro//'khor lo snga ma mthong po bzhin//de bzhin mdog ni rab sbyang bya//phyag mtshon bdag ni lhar 'dzin pa//mkhas pas phyi nas sngags
24'b7(rgyud): bzlas te//oM e ka dze Ti ba su d+hA ra Ni swA hA/pu k+ka si ni rab sgrubs thabs//de nas yang dog bshad par bya//gang zhig bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni//'jig rten
25a1(rgyud): gsum lnga 'tsho nus pa//sgyu mngag sa zhal ban+d+he pa//phyug ba bong bul bcims byu//pUk+ka sa~M yi lus bsgom bya//zhugs pa tho ba mdun drug/
25a2(rgyud): dang /brtul zhugs can gyis gzhu bcas sgom//oM puk+ka si aM zhes sngags brjod//'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//dris
25a3(rgyud): mod la mi snang bar//'jam pa'i rdo rje grags 'gyur ba//'bar ba'i gser 'od 'dra ba yis//ser po zhal gsum phyag drug pa//gzhon nu'i gzugs ni 'dzin
25a4(rgyud): pa'i mgo ni//mi mthong bya ba'i don du sgom//shar du mdzes ma dgod par bya//de bzhin lho ru skra can ma//nub tu ser po bsgom par bya//byung du nye ba'i sgra can ma//
25a5(rgyud): thams cad phyag na ral gri dang //'khor lo la sogs gzhan la dgod//thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa//sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o//sra bo ni yi ge/
25a6(rgyud): maM las byung //dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus na bzhugs//thams cad zhabs ni g.yon brkyang bas//ri bing can gyi gdan la bzhugs//'od zer can dang ri khrod ma/
25a7(rgyud): de bzhin nor 'dzin skul byed ma//me la sogs pa'i mtsham pa bzhi ru//bsdus pa dgod skya snying po la'o//mya ngan med dang yul 'dab dang //'bras kyi sgyu ma
25b1(rgyud): byig pa'o//slong dang ljang dang yang ser po//dkar po'i lus ni bsgom par bya//kun kyang zhal gsum phyug drug pa//dkyil 'khor dag tu gdab par bya//tho ba la
25b2(rgyud): sogs sgo ba bzhi//bsgoms na mthong bar mi 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las 'jam pa'i rdo rje
25b3(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba ste rim par phye ba bcu bzhi pa'o////'phags pa 'dzad gu la'i sgrub thabs/de nas yang drug bshad par bya//gang zhig bsgrim/
25b4(rgyud): po tsamA gyis ni//chu yi stong nas 'gro 'gyur ba//ser po zhal gsum phyag drug pa//sa bon phu lus yang dag byung //sku tshon phyag ni sbrul bsnams pa//rmi
25b5(rgyud): bya la ni zhon par dgod//shed du rme bya dgod par bya//de bzhin lho ro khro gnyer can//nub du ri khrod lo ma tsan//byang du rdo rje lcogs sgrog me/rma bya'i
25b6(rgyud): sgra dang spyi blugs dang //lo ma dang ni lcags sgrog mo//de dag rnam par bsgom par bya//sir dang dmar dang de bzhin ljang //kha dog sngon po dbye ba nyid//mkhas
25b7(rgyud): pas 'od ltar bsgom par bya//de bzhin sngags 'di dag kyang bzlas//oM phu dzaM//tho ba la sogs sgo ru dgod//me tog la sogs mtsha mas su dgod//
26a1(rgyud): 'dzang gu la ya~M sbyor ba yis//chu yi sbyong nas rtag tu 'gro/ku ru kum+b+hi rab sgrub thabs//de nas yang dag bshad par bya//gang gis bsgoms
26a2(rgyud): pa tsam gyis ni//klu yi bu mo rab 'gugs pa//kha dog dmar po zhil bzhi pa//phyag brgyad dang ni rab tu ldan//hI yi sa bon las byung bas//klu ni 'gug/
26a3(rgyud): par byed pa yin//phyag brgyad du ni klu dgod de//mtha' yas la sogs klu rigs brgyad//lus ni sbrul gyis rab tu brgyan//brtul zhugs can gyis
26a4(rgyud): mdzes ma sgom//sngags ni oM ku ru kr-il+le hrIHphuHswA hA/de nas gsang ba bshad par bya//bsdus nas yin gyis rgyus pa min//gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis
26a5(rgyud): ni//lha yi bu mo 'gugs byed pa//phyug gnyis pa la zhal cig ste//phyag ni mdo' dang gzhu bsnams pa//lus ni ser po chen po yi//rdo rje lus
26a6(rgyud): med bsgom par bya//shar du dga' ma bsgom par bya//lho ru 'dod pa'i mdzes ma sgom//nub tu 'dod pa'i lha mo sgom//byang du 'dod pa'i lcags kyu'o//
26a7(rgyud): 'dod pa'i lha mo thams cad kyi//phyag tu mda' dang gzhu bsgom bya//ser dang dmar dang de bzhin ldang //dmar skye dag ni bsgom par bya//mtshams rnams
26b1(rgyud): su ni rtag dgod pa//mi 'gag de bzhin mtshams kyi bdag/dbye dang spre'u rgyal mtshon no//sgro yi phyogs kyi bshud par bya//'dod pa 'gyeng dang 'gyeng bag can//
26b2(rgyud): dran dang de bzhin mda' gri can//lha rnams de dag thams cad kyi//dbul gshin rje gshed po sgom//bud med kyi ni pad+mo ru//rdo rje lus med bsgom par bya//yi ge
26b3(rgyud): yid las yang dag byung //kun tu 'khor bar rnam par 'phro//bslus shing g.yengs pa bsgom par bya//myos nas bde ba'i 'dod yid kyi//dam po'i gos kyis yongs
26b4(rgyud): dkris te//rkang pa'i drung du lhung bar 'gyur//der ni sngags kyang bzlas par bya//yi ge oM ni ring por drang //yi ge swA hA mtha' mar sbyin//yi ge si ti'i sngags
26b5(rgyud): bzlas bya//che ge mo zhig bdag dbang gyur//thams cad du ni bsgoms byas nas//nag po'i tshig ni ji bzhin gyis//rnal 'byor 'dod pas de thos 'gyur//
26b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las lus med rdo rje'i sgrub thabs rim par phye ste bco lnga pa'o///
26b7(rgyud): he ru ka chen sgrub pa'i thabs//de nas yang dag bshad par bya//rnal 'byor 'khor bar bcings pa la//gang zhig shes po myur grol ba//phyag gnyis pa la zhal
26'a1(rgyud): gcig ste//kha dog sngon po phyung gar can//rdo rje phyag tu bsgom par bya//gzhan yang thod pa bsgom par bya//spyan gsum sgra ni gyon du 'grong //
26'a2(rgyud): phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyun//kha T+wAM gA ni go yon phyogasu//phreng po dag gi rkang pa rgyan//sa bon hU~M las yang dag byung //yi dgas le gnas rtag tu dgod //
26'a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas lnga ru rab sbyor ba//thod pa lnga ni dbu la'o//cod panA la ni mi bskyod skom//ha ru kAr grags bsgom par bya//shar du chos kyi 'khor lo ma//sangs
26'a4(rgyud): rgyas byang chub lho ru'o//'dod pa kun gyi 'khris ma nub//byung du he ru ka nyid 'dra//rgyan kun gyis ni rnam rgyan pa'i//kha dog sna tshogs rnam par dgod//gzum
26'a5(rgyud): mdze sau yi dwags la bzhugs pa//gti mug thams cad nyer 'joms byed//chos kyi a shad dbyug pa'i tha//de bzhin yid bzhin nor bu'i shing //lha mo rnams kyi
26'a6(rgyud): phyag g.ya su//rdo rje yang ni bsgom par bya//chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad la//thod pa'i snod ni g.yon pa la//spyan ma mA ma kI sgrol ma//gos dka
26'a7(rgyud): yi 'ong ba rnams//me la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi ru//'khor lo phyi rol gshin rje gshed//shes rab mthar byed rta mgrin dang //'khyil par
26'b1(rgyud): bzlog par bsgom pa dag//'khyor m+b+ha yin slo bams te//cho ga las mthong bas//ga shin drug shad nag bla rgyud las spyo ng+ga//sman pa'i rim par phyo po badra thA/
26'b2(rgyud): / pA lda na nas byas ma//sa sa rgyas gzugs na dusam+b+ha par bya//spangs rgyas gzugs ni bskams pa las//mA khas pas /ra lo
26'b3(rgyud): par bya//glu bzhi yi ni sbyor ba yis//'khor lo bskyed par bya ba ste/rtswartsi ka sogaso glu dang ni//drug pa las skyes sogs par byed//snying rje khros pa'i dang sgro
26'b4(rgyud): byizhengs//khams gsum kun gyi gti mug gsol//dang sgrol gsal bas ma btsugs bzhengs//bdud 'di dag las rgyal bar mdzad//'jig rten rdzog
26'b5(rgyud): bstod nyid ji ste bzhugs//da sgrol 'jig rten bsod nams kyis bzhugs shing //byang chub 'dod pa'i 'jig rten mgron bas nas//khyed ni stong pa nyid la
26'b6(rgyud): par byed//ji myur skar mda' 'phro ba bzhin//byang chub sems la zhugs par gyur//rdo rje 'ching dang ngo bo nyid//snying rje dang ni 'dod tshogs sems//dang
26'b7(rgyud): skom pa rnal 'byor te//gnyis pa rjes kyi rnal 'byor yin//gsum pa shin tu rnal 'byor te//bzhi pa rnal 'byor chen po'o//rdo rje sems dpa' rdzogs pa yin//
27a1(rgyud): /rnal 'byor yin par 'di ltar 'ad//de ni 'thun m+b+ha yo sgra//dz+haswA nal 'byod yon par grags//'khor lo thams cad yongs rdzogs pa//shA
27a2(rgyud): tu rnal 'byor yin par bsgrags//skye dang gsung dang thugs rnams dang //lha y-i mig+na so gos byin rlabs dang //s+ye shes 'khor lo gtsug pa dang //bdud rtsi/
27a3(rgyud): myang ba dag dang ni//mchod dang bstod pa chen po dag/rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya'o//slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya//bde gshegs bka' las 'da' mi
27a4(rgyud): /de bzhin spun la khro ba dang //nyes pa bsgrags par mi bya'o//byang chub sems kyang btang mi bya//bdag gzhan chos la smad mi bya//sems can
27a5(rgyud): ni byams pa dag/nam yang btang bar mi bya'o//yongs su ma sminas myos can la//gsang bar dog ni bstan mi bya//bdug sogs phung po brnyas mi
27a6(rgyud): grong po'i chos ni sun mi gdon//gdug la byams pa rtag tu btang //chos la tshad ni gzha mi g+ha//sems can dang pa can mi bsku//rtag tu dam tshig
27a7(rgyud): basbyin par bya//bud meng shes rab rang bzhin lo//smod pa nyes pade bzhi no//rnal 'byor slongs mis rgyu mi bya//rnal 'byor spang bar mi bya ste//rtag par/
27b1(rgyud): rgyun tu gsang sngags pad+ma//rtag tu dam chog lnga sogs bstun//gal te dag med rgyung gyur te//bla mA dam chog la gnod na//des ni do la 'khor d+h+yas ma/
27b2(rgyud): de de shegs rnams pa nyes pa pashugs//snying rje can gyis mi brtag par//dang pus bla ma'i dam tshig spyad//nyes pa ma lus rnam sbyangs sems kyis ni//
27b3(rgyud): gtan la sogs bzlas pa mchog gzhal bar//rtag tu b+h+ra ma la ni bla mar b+ha//brtani zhing du la la snying rjeg cig tu sems//dad dang lcug bya'i bsam pas brjod pa'i/
27b4(rgyud): slob ma dA ma lA ni gus pa dang //dang phyus+t+ra gshin d+h+r-ig shi la gus pa la//brtu lnga zhugs ldan pus de ni yongs sbyin+d+ha b+hU//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga
27b5(rgyud): po thams cad kyi mchog tu dga' bo chen po'i ngo ba rdo rje'i chang gi gsung nye bar thos nas cing mi smra bar gyur te//'di lta bu'i tshe du brjod pa tshad du brjod//brtul zhugs
27b6(rgyud): mthar thug thod pa chen po ltar//'khrul 'khor mthar thug gA shin rje gshed kyi rgyud//rgyud kyi mthar thug pa ni 'dus pa ste//byung bar mA gyur 'byung bar
27b7(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro//e ma'o zhi ba chen po'i chos//e ma'i khro ba 'jigs mdzad pa//e ma'o mya ngan 'das pa'i mchog/e mo'o 'khor ba zhi pa nyid//e
28a1(rgyud): ma'o 'di ni rab tu mtshor//nyes pa gang de ston gyur//byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med//dngos po ma yin bsgom bya min//khams ma yin zhing
28a2(rgyud): rnam shes min//na mkhri'i khams dang mtshungs pa nyid//na mkha' lta bur bdag med pa//chos 'di bde ba chen po ste//sa yang ma yin chu min te//
28a3(rgyud): me min rlung min na mkha' min//rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis//bskyed pa yang ni rab gnas nas//dngos po thams cad dngos med bshad//dngos po/
28a4(rgyud): med ces ma bsgrags pa//rnal 'byor sbyor ba dang 'brel phyir//chad pa ma yin rtag pa yin//yan lag med cing kha drog med//thog ma bar dang mtha'
28a5(rgyud): spangs pa//dngos po thams cad med par 'gyur//mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid//de nas bcom ldan 'das tsartsi ka chen po la sogs pas ched du brjod/
28a6(rgyud): ma ched du brjod//bsod nams sdig pa drug dang ma 'brel bas//mchog tu dga' bo dri med dag pa yi//mgon po de bzhin nyid kyi gter chen gcig pu dang //
28a7(rgyud): kun kyang snying rje'i sems kyis mgon 'di yod//chos rnams ngo bo bde ba chen po'i dngos//mchog tu dga' ba 'di yi ngo bo nyid//de la gzugs med
28b1(rgyud): bsod nams med cing sdig pa med//skyo dang 'gag pa dag ni yod pa min//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rdzog shod nag po'i rgyud la byung
28b2(rgyud): chub kyi sems kyi rim par phye ba ste bcu bdun pa'o///de nas gtam rgyud bshad par bya ste/bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa'i dus su bcom ljon
28b3(rgyud): 'das thub pa chen po la byang chub kyi bar du bcad pa'i phyir shin tu 'jig su rung ba'i 'jigs pa chen po ston cing bdud kyi dpung chen po lhags te/de'i dus na bdud chen po las
28b4(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs tAM/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams laswa gai shrIn rje gshed kyi khro bo nges par phyung ste/
28b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis nges par phyung nas kyang lag na rdo rje thub pa chen po'i bka' bzhin byed pa la/phyag na rdo rje khyod 'di lta bu'i gshin rje gshed kyi khro bo'i gzugasu bsgyur
28b6(rgyud): te/bdud dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /lha rnams kyang choms shig/chings shig/rtogs shig ces gsungaso//de'i dus na ji ltar bdag
28b7(rgyud): gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa thos te/skad cig la bzung zhing don bzung ste bsdus nas rab tu yid la byas so zhes gsang ba chen po'i bdag po chen po rdo rje rigs
29a1(rgyud): kyi gtso bo nA da ku bai rA'i yab kyis de skad cusku gsungaso//ur+yan gyi yul nas yang dag par byung ba dngos grub thams cad bskyed par byed pa rgyud kyi rgyu la
29a2(rgyud): 'a phrag bdun pa lus Sh+Tig shin rjegashed nag pa'i rgyud las len baspyod de'aM//de bzhin gyi shegs pa thams cad kyi sgyu gsuMd rgyags kau shin
29a3(rgyud): gshed nag po'i rgyud rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po mkhas pa d+hi paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang /bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ci/
29a4(rgyud): zhus te gtan la phab pa'o////slad kyis lo ts+tsha ba dge slong dar ma grags kyis bac+doMs la de las kyang dge slong rdo rje grags kyis bcoso////rgya gar
29a5(rgyud): skad du/ya mA ri kr-iSh+Na karma sarba tsakra sid+d+ha ka ra nA mi tan+ta rA dzA/bod skad du/gshin rje gshed dag nag po'i 'khor li las thams cad grub par byed pa ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi
29a6(rgyud): rgyal po//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
29a7(rgyud): sku dang /gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la gti mug rdo rje dang //ser sna rdo rje dang /'dod chags rdo rje dang /phra dog rdo rje dang //sa rdo rje dang /chu rdo rje dang
29b1(rgyud): rdo rje dang /rlung rdo rje dang /byang chub kyi snyoms bde ba chen po ma dang /yon tan gyi phreng ba ma dang /sems kyi rgyud tshim par byed pa mya dang /brtson 'grus k+Shi bo ma dang //bajug
29b2(rgyud): spros mye dang /me tig mye dang /mar me ma dang /dri chab ma dang /de la sogs pa dpag tu med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//de nas lha mo bai ti lu stan las langs te/
29b3(rgyud): thal mo sbyar nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'di na gdug pa can rnams kyis sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar bgyid pa dang /
29b4(rgyud): ma 'ongs po na yang theg pa chen po pa dang /sems can thams cad la'ang 'tshe bar bgyid pa dag 'byung na de rnams ji ltar tsher bcad par bgyi/de nas bcom ldan 'das bgegs
29b5(rgyud): thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las snying po 'byung //hrI/de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das nyid
29b6(rgyud): zhal drug pa phyag drug pa zhabs drug pa nga bor gyur nas maM he ru gnyis pa la brdzes te/ma hI'i bdag po chung ma bcas par oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/
29b7(rgyud): zhes zhal bzhed pa dang bcas pas/oM gsung zhing mnan par gyur to//lha dang /lha ma yin dang /bdud thams cad kyang skrag cing 'dir ba dang bcas pas 'dud pa
30a1(rgyud): gyur to//chang pa dang dbang po la sogs pa thams cad kyang phyag 'tshal zhing 'dud par gyur to//danas bcom ldan khro ba yi//rgyal po chen po rab 'jigs
30a2(rgyud): padad thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas//gsung ni 'di skad bka' sprul to//de nas sgrub pa bshed bya ba//rtsibs brgyud dbus kyi lte ba lnga//bdag nyid phyag dang zhal
30a3(rgyud): rnams ni//drug drug ldan par gyur pa sgom//zhabs kyang de dang 'dra bar ste//g.yos kyi dang po'i phyag na ni//rdo rje tho ba g.yas gnyis na//rdul gri de zin na
30a4(rgyud): g.yon gyi yang //dang por zhugs pa bsdigs mdzub ldan//gnyis par gtun shing legs par 'dzin//rdo rje dril bu thams bsnams//stang zhal nag
30a5(rgyud): /rab 'jigs pa//zhabs gnyis rdo rje skyil krung ste//brkyang bskum grar gyis zhabs bzhir gnas//stag lpags kyis ni rnam dkris shing //seng ge se ral ral pa
30a6(rgyud): nidu gyen 'greng bsdus te spyi bor yang //thod po'i phreng bas rnam par bcings//'di ni khro bo tsha lnga pa skye//lag cha sna tshogs dag dag ldan//shar rtsibs
30a7(rgyud): la sogs rnam bzhi la//gti mug sogs te bzhi pa yang //dkar dang ser dang dmar ba yang //de bzhin bzhi pa ljang ku ste//g.yas kyis 'khor lo rin chen
30b1(rgyud): 'bar/pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje sku//g.yon gyis dril bu lcogs par 'dzin//mtsham su laM sogs las skyes pa//lha mo bzhi po nges par bsam//bdag po 'dra ste skrag
30b2(rgyud): nyams 'dzin//gA yi lha mi mtshan la ni//lI s+ye mu ti kur ldan no//rin chen phreng ba phyag gnyis bsnams//pi wang sgrogs pa'i gsung dbyangs can//gar gyi rgyas
30b3(rgyud): par 'gro ba yi//don la rtag tu brtson 'grus ldan//bdug spros sogs dang bzhi po yong //rang gi mtshan ma nges par 'dzin//phyag rgya'i sngags rnams brjod pas//
30b4(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gti mug rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungaso//oM dzi na jig/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
30b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag poste sngags 'di gsungs pa ni ser sna rdo rje'o//a rat+na d+h+r-i ke/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
30b6(rgyud): pas sngags 'di gsungs s+ho//oM I ro li ki ste 'dod chags rdo rje'o//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos phrag drog rdo rje
30b7(rgyud): sngags 'di gsungaso//oM pradz+nyA d+h+r-i//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po bde bar gshegs pas sa rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs
31a1(rgyud): rgyumAn+tad+hArmA rnanas yang 'acom ldan 'das na na ga shegs pa mas po bdag nan n+ya na d+d+hag 'dun du r+m+ma nAn+d+ha d+hA/dranas stong /
31a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi bdag bos medze rje'i sngags 'di gsung so//pad+d+ha hU~M/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das du bzhin gau shigs pa rnam
31a3(rgyud): cad kyi bdag pos rlung rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungaso//tAr a/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bde ba chen po bskyud par byed pa'i snga
31a4(rgyud): 'di gsungaso//lU s+ye/dri nas yang yon tan brgyud pa bla ma'i sngags 'di gsungs so//mU lI/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyangs can ma bskyed par byed pa'i
31a5(rgyud): sngags 'di gsungs//gI ti/de nas yang bcom+b+ha ldan 'das kyi glur ma'i sngags 'di gsungs//nI ti/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshad po'i sngags rnam
31a6(rgyud): gsungs pa ni/oM badz+ra d+hU paM/oM badz+ra puSh+pe/oM badz+re dI pe/oM badz+ra gan+d+he/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das thams cad 'gugs par byed pa'i sngags dang /
31a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzhug pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcing ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rje su dgos par byed pa'i snga
31b1(rgyud): rnams bcom ldan 'das dri bzhin pa sh+logs pams cad kyi bdag pos gsungs pa na/a dar+d+ha oM ku sha dzaHoM badz+rap+tA sha d+hA/A~M bad+d+hi nA ba/oM badz+ra A byA sha hU~MHb+hU
31b2(rgyud): ldan mkhas pas ci nus kyis//theg gis thig ni gdab pa la//tshang ldan 'jur mdung med pa dang //gsher zhing sar po mdzes pa yis//shar du bltas te gdab
31b3(rgyud): par bya//tshangs thig gnyis pa gdab pa yang //lho ru bltas te gdab par bya//de 'og mtha' yi thig gdab pa//byin zar gnas te dbang ldan pa ste//rlung gnas
31b4(rgyud): lamyo bral kha bltas te//nub tu legs par bri ba bya//daM nAs shir du kho ba zlas te//byung du prI te byin zar gnas//bden bral min pa'i mthu' ma gang /
31b5(rgyud): blta ba bden bral phyogs su'o//slob dpon ldeng min grogs po ni//ri dgas zhon pa'i phyogs 'dug ste//mtshams thig dang po gdub par bya//gnyis pa'ang
31b6(rgyud): bden bral phyogs 'dug ste//bgegs phyogs brgyad lce gdab par bya//dbus dang mtha' mar phye ba mo//gan+d+ha la yAs khang pa'i mtshan nyid mi//glu 'i zhir bgyi zhing sgo
31b7(rgyud): bzhi dang //rta babs bzhis ni brgyan pa yi//dbus kyi rtsibs bskyod lte ba lo//rdo rje thob bri bar bya//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dathus nyid de//gyi grig kyang ni bru~M
32a1(rgyud): shar ts+tshangs 'khor mtshan dzat+ta//rin chen sgyu yA phyogs rlobs la//pad+mad po nub tu gro//byung du rdo rjen+na t+tAH//shar sgo phyogs su' du/
32a2(rgyud): drA//grwa bzhir brgyud pa'ang nyis rtsig tu//mtshan ma rnams ni legs par bya//sgo yin rig tu bri ba meng //lcags kyi zhigs pa sgyug dril bu//gzhan yang na sun la
32a3(rgyud): ba hU~M/mchod pa le par dgram par bya//khu tshur dku gnyis bzhag pa dang //de bzhin dngul bIr nyug pa dang //kha na sa 'byin dang gar bstod dang //'dug spos nyug
32a4(rgyud): dang me tog mthor //mthe bong sgreng ste ring lus la 'am//gzhan la nyug tshul gnas pa ni//brgya po mchod pa'i lha mo dag/bstod dang legs gnas phyag rgyu
32a5(rgyud): yain+da//sku gsung thugs kyi lha rnams dang //rang lus bcug ste gnas pa la//sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa ni//oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA bA
32a6(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba tIT+Ta gI h+NaHk+Sha baiN+Te s+yAb+hAbA AHkau/oM sair+b+bA twAMsh+ma krAt+tham+b+hir+b+ha bAd+d+ha mra b+he gam+b+ha r+m+maSh+Ti/mig sogs byin k+She smra ba pa la//gte na
32a7(rgyud): kyis srung //dbang sgrubs stong pa nyid byis do//snying po'am ming gi yi ge mau ni/rigros kyi phyag mtshan bsnams pa yi//sgra rnams nges par bskyed pa/
32b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad kyang bdag pos bdud rtsi myang ba zhi sa bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sngags 'di gsungaso//oM AHhU~M/ngan
32b2(rgyud): cing 'bar bar rnam rtags te//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pas//zhe sdang rdo rje'i bdag pa ste//zla ba'i dbus su gti mug bsam//rin chen dbus su bsam
32b3(rgyud): pa yang //sngar sna nyid du bsam par bya//pad+ma'i dbus su 'dod chags bsam//sna tshogs dbus su phrag dog bsam//bsam bya ljags la sa bon te//'phros/
32b4(rgyud): pas bkug ste tshim par bya//shar nr-i dkar po chen po so//lho ni ser po nyid du'o//nub ni dmar por nges par shes//byang ni ljang kur yang dag ldan//de las dben
32b5(rgyud): re ga'i rim//dkyil 'khor sgom pa'i che na yang //byams dang skyeng rje dga' bting snyoms//tshad med pa yi rim pa yis//sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir
32b6(rgyud): brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po rnams//yong min med min gnyis ka mina?//gnyis ka min+de pa rang ma yin te//spros bral ngo bo med par sgom//oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA nA badz+ra swa b+hA
32b7(rgyud): ba At+ma ko hi/raM las nyi ma rnam bsgoms te//de dbus las kyi rdo rje ni//kun tu rtsa lnga'i rang bzhin te//de dbus hU~M las rdo rje ni//kun tu phra mos bgeg bcom ste//
33a1(rgyud): ra ba gur dang sgo gzhi yang //de yi 'og tu ngos por sgom//gru gsum gyen slong dkar po ni//shin tu gsal bar bdag gis dmyigs//zhwa sdang
33a2(rgyud): las ni sngar ma byung //byung zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro//byang chub sems la gzhol ba dang //gtong zhing thos pa'i khengs pa med//le lo bcom zhing khro ba med//
33a3(rgyud): ser sna mid g.yo yang med//sgyu spangs shes rab gsal ba dang //gcig tu theg pa che la gzhol//des ni dka' ba med par yang //gzhan gyi don du 'di brtsams
33a4(rgyud): na//grangs ni bye ba tshang ba yis//bcu bzhir tshang ba'i gsang sngags kyis//las rnams kun grub the tshom med//yang lha mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
33a5(rgyud): ces gsol to//de yi 'khrul 'khor ji lta bu//yi ge rnams ni ji ltar bri//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//bdun chen bdun dang ldan pa yi//
33a6(rgyud): mig legs par bri bar bya//las kun byed pa'i 'khor lo la//mchod pa yis kyang legs mchod la//de 'og las rnams brtsam par bya//bzlas pa'i
33a7(rgyud): mtshan ma rmi lam 'am//mngon sum byung bar gyur nas kyang //'khrul 'khor rnams ni bri bya ba'i//rmi lam mtshan ma 'di yin te//tshal chen zug pa'i
33b1(rgyud): b+h+yo g+sa //rtswa gang mchod na gang+gA smras//ngan pa rnams dngas dang //dubang bgyur rlol 'jog pa dang //rnamatshor rnams ldan rmAnal lAm+mA/trA/
33b2(rgyud): bran du 'khor rmin//dris par 'grub ste 'khor lo bri//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa gsungs te//yaM las byung ba'i rlung dkyil
33b3(rgyud): 'khor//sngon po gzhu'i dbyibs tsin la//ba dan ldan par nges par bsame//r-I las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor//gru gsum dmar po bsam par bya//ba~M lnga
33b4(rgyud): byung ba chu yin te//dkar po zlum po bsam par bya//laM byung sra yi dkyil 'khor ni//ljang ser gru bzhi bsam byas te//sngon du bsam bya lha rims bzhin//
33b5(rgyud): tar phyin nas nges par bsam//bruM las byung ba'o 'khor lo'i rtsibs//drug gnyis ldan pa'i lte ba la//bruM las gzhal yas khang pa ste//gdan dang ldan
33b6(rgyud): par spro pos bsam//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje bsdu ba'i phya ga rgya dang sngags kyis byed par gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bsdu bar bya'o//
33b7(rgyud): oM badz+rI sa mA dzaHlag ngar gnyis ni nges bsnol la//mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul byas te//se gol brdab cing brdung bar bya//lcags kyu la sogs
34a1(rgyud): rnam pa bzhis//nges par dgug pa la sogs bya//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag blos mchod pa'i sngags
34a2(rgyud): de gsungs su//oM ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha swAhA/bri bair s+yAd k+Sha ra pra tits+tsha swA hA/nag po rab ri med be ste//bum pa lto tshe ba tshang ba/mchu 'phyang mgrin ring gdan ldan par/
34a3(rgyud): snying por ldan pa'i sman sogs gzhugs//mgrin par ros bzung dag gis dak+Shi/mdab mar ldan pa'i lcug ma yang //dri dang ldan pa'i khA N+yai ni tAM//bdud rtsir ldan pa yis
34a4(rgyud): kyang mched//blor gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang //ba dan sil snyan rol mi yis//gus pas dkyil 'khor la yang mchod//'dzam bu'i gling ngam gleng gzhan dag/
34a5(rgyud): nor bu rin chen bkang ba yang //stong gsum la sogs de bzhin te//zhum pa med par byas te dbul//blo ldan sgrub pos sems can la//phan pa'i sems kyis srog
34a6(rgyud): mi gcod//ma byin par yang mi blang //'dod pa mi spyad brdzun mi smra//gnod pa'i rgyu phyir chang mi btung //gdugs pa rnams la bzlog te bya//dngos su 'am yang //
34a7(rgyud): na sngags dang gnano//'khrul 'khor dang ni ting nga min//sman gyis kyang ni byed ste//de ltar mi byed de yin//nges par dam tshig nyams par 'gyur//gnon
34b1(rgyud): dang log 'dren dag gis kyang //nges par 'chi ste dmal bar ni//yun rings sdug bsngal gyis srung ste//de bas nan tan ldan pa kye//bzod pa mi bskyod snying rje yis//sngags kyis
34b2(rgyud): ngesnga par bsad par bya//mi ldog pa'i sems su gnas//byang chub chu yi sa ra ro zhing //shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi//phyag rgya che la de gzhon to//ngo bo dang bral dngos po 'jig/
34b3(rgyud): ma byin byang chub bla dro ba la//brtson pas le lo dor bar bya//brdzun du shes bya dngos po rnams//de nas de bzhin gzhan la brjod//rgyas btab pa yi dngos po la//rgya ba shig/
34b4(rgyud): shaM sau rA ba ral gri yis//bcad cing rnam pa med pa lnga//bsad pa yang ni nga yis bsgrags//ud med pa yi ge rnams//steng gi g.yas phyogs nyid nas bre//'og gi yi ge
34b5(rgyud): bri ba ni//de nyid g.yon gyi phyogs nas bri//A li ka li nges bris te//k+Sha ma gtogs par dbus stong ste//de la bgags kyi mtshan ma 'am//ming sogs nges par bri ba
34b6(rgyud): yang /lci ba'i nang du chud par bri//'khor lo nyid kyang de 'dra ba//gra bzhi drag tu bri ba ni//ma ni dri 'dod pa'i ka li dang //a li min ta lhag ma yin//gdug pa'i yi ge
34b7(rgyud): bcu bzhi po//ming dang bcas par phyogs bzhir bri//dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pa yis//bzhi pa gcig gi mgo stengs su//sum bskor nyid ni shis pa yin//las kun
35a1(rgyud): /rgyu ma pa/hU~M sgyu sna / na/smya//rnam ts+tshar mad pas rgyu ban//byug sa pa/ t+sAd+hAr+m+mad+hAH
35a2(rgyud): las kyi sgrub pos shes par bya//las kun byed pa'i 'khor lo ni//bde gshegs kun gyi snying po ste//de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya snang ba'ang yin//'khor lo 'din
35a3(rgyud): bcug pa gang //sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig/dam chos smod pa'ang de bzhin zhe//'khar los bsgyur ba'ang dbang du 'du//lha min pra ti 'dra zhi bar byed//dag
35a4(rgyud): bcom gsod pa'ang de zhi la//brgya byin nyid kyang dbang du das//de lta bu yi 'khor lo de//thog ma ro bris te de 'og tu//byin rlabs mi nor de nyid la//mchod pa
35a5(rgyud): gus par bdag gis bya//mchod mon las rnams byas pa la//'bras bu 'byung min 'khrul pa'ang //'bras med dal pa nyid yin no//yang lha mo ro langs ma nyid
35a6(rgyud): stan las langs te mchod pa chen po byas te 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po//'khor lo 'dri ba'i sdug cha gang //bre gzhi skyug gu ji lta bu//gcig gam 'on
35a7(rgyud): dri tha dad//bcom ldan 'das kyis bo shang gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//ligaso lagaso//de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung shing
35b1(rgyud): dungangs bshad//ji ltar las rnams bye brag yod pa ltar//bri ba'i gnas dang gzhug pa'i gnas//tha dad de bzhin 'khor lo skug/snag cha tha dad 'bru rnams bzhin//grang
