35b2(rgyud): khyer chen po skyeng 'dod dam//skyes pa srung bar 'dod na yang //gro ga de bzhin oM b+hai shun//zla gar ni sha'i shun pa 'am//rasA li kha ches 'khor la ni//bskul ba'i
35b3(rgyud): tshig dang ldan paro//so ma byatong ba'i khom por du//sbrang mar le/nak+Sha/'khor lo gzhug/srung pa dkar pos legs par di/nang par shar du kha bltas te/
35b4(rgyud): me tog dkar po dag gis mchod//bdag nyid dkar po'i mdog tu bsam//mdun du skyes pa zla ba la//mtha' dag gnas pa bdun du bsam//sangs rgyas phyogs
35b5(rgyud): bcur bzhugs pa yis//bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa yis//chu rgyun dag gis dbang bskur te//de 'og bzlas pa brtsam par bya//swA hA'i sngon du bskul tshig ldan//
35b6(rgyud): bud med lnga ni gi wang ste//phyi rol mtshams bzhir phur pra yis//bgrags bskrad steng du bla re bye//phyi mAM skyes pa'i ji bzhin no//bye brag tu yang skyes pa 'am/
35b7(rgyud): bud med ni bar 'dod na yang //ga bur tsan dan dag gis ni//shing sha shing gi shun pa las//'khor lo yi go legs bri ta/shang du nang par bltas te mchod
36a1(rgyud): las kun byeng dan+d+ha thab la yang //snod gsungs zhalnga wAnu bgod par bya//phyi rol mtshams bar phur pA yas//baglags bskrad steng du bli za
36a2(rgyud): bum pa kha rgyan dang ldan zhing //rin tshan 'bru dang sman du ldan//dri zhim tshe dang ldan par bya//gos bzang gis ni mgrin pa dki/phyogs bzhi dag tu bzhag par bya//
36a3(rgyud): thang ka 'am dkyil 'khor la mchod//dri 'am chu dang mi tig dang //bsres pa'i skyor mos chu yang blugs//gzer bu steng gis sbyin bsreg bya//chu des gzhon
36a4(rgyud): yang gtong bar bya//bar ma chad par nyin bdun du//de ltar rgyun tu gtor ma sbyin//phyi nas 'khor lo rin chen de//bum pa'i nod nas rnam phyung ste//rgyal
36a5(rgyud): mtshan rtswa la btags na su//gnas mthun/por yang bzhag par bya//zhi bar byed par the tshom med//sngar bshad pa yi shing shun dang //dur khrod ras
36a6(rgyud): la sgrub po yis//yung ba'i khu bas 'khor lo bri//so ma btang ba'i kham phor du//sgrub pa'i rkang rjes sa dge dang //snang mdzad chu dogs sa dag dang /
36a7(rgyud): ri dang laM se btags nas ni//ldong ros dang ni yud pa yis//khu bas sbrus te gzugs byas la//'khor lo gnyis dril yung ba dang //ldeng ros kyi ni
36b1(rgyud): khu bas bsdu//sbyong kar bcug sa gzhug par b+ha//song ljang phur pa sor brgyud pas//lus la sogs pa gdab phyur bya//drug rnams 'od bo'i lam du yang //
36b2(rgyud): khung bur brkos te gzhugs par bya/lom las dbang chen gyis mnan cing //sum las skyes pa de stangs na//sna tshogs las kyis mnan pa yi//kham por srung
36b3(rgyud): si dkri par bya//rgyal chen dag ni ser po yang //dbang chen la gnas lhor bltas te//bsgyur bya ser po'i ris minan par//bsams nas bzlas pa brtsam par byed
36b4(rgyud): snun med par stam+b+ha y-i// gi mtha' can lnga skyong bzlas//gtod ma rgyun tu sbyin par bya//rings pa chen po'i las 'di yis//dmag gi dpung yang nges par
36b5(rgyud): 'ge' tsam la ni smos ci dgos//sran ni len gsum bsngags pa yi sa//dur khrod ras la 'khor lo bri//rims dang dug gis zin pa ste//de yi steng du
36b6(rgyud): bzhag par bya//bdag nyid dkar por rnam bsams te//tshogs bya ba cing gdon par bya//de ni de nas ni bar 'gyur//dge dag res par 'dod na yang //
36b7(rgyud): byed khu ba dur khrod sol//gcig rnam bsres te so ma btang //kham por gnyis lo 'khor lo 'di//pho dang rmi mi bskur phyogs gnyis//mi nor bris ma
37a1(rgyud): sbyar la//ro bsregs sa dang thal bas g.yogs//steng du bzlas shing spel ba ni//stam+ba na dang ku ru lo//swA hA med pa'i sngags 'di yis//kha bcing ba ni
37a2(rgyud): nges par 'gyur//gang zhig bsad par byed pa la//snying rjer ldan pa'i gang zag gis//gdug byed las 'di byed pa la//gshin dag lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/
37a3(rgyud): zhag cig gis ni 'grub par byed//bcu bzhi nyi ma phyed pa ni//bya rog sgro rtsa'i smyu gu yis//dur khrod kyi ni ris dag la//dug dang tshe dang ske tshe dang //nim pA che ga/
37a4(rgyud): gsum dag dang //tsha ba'i mor khu dur khrod sa lA//skyo byed mdzub mo'i khrag gis bri//ro bsregs pa yi thul ba dang //bsgrub bya'i rkang pa'i rjes kyi sa//mi yi
37a5(rgyud): rus phye la sogs la//gzugs byas de yi snying kar ga zhug/dur me dag la de bso zhing //khros pa'i sems kyis khri bzlas na//skad cig tsam gyis 'chi ba
37a6(rgyud): ni//de yi khyim 'am dur du sba//de lha'i las kyi de 'grub ste//mtshan mo phyed na kha lhor blta//bdag nyid 'jigs pa'i gzugs can te//zhul sogs
37a7(rgyud): sngon du gsungs pa ltar//ma he'i steng na mche ba gtsigs//gsus khyim tshol gyen skra 'bar//spu sogs gzhan yang de 'drar//ba spu dag gi bu ga nas//
37b1(rgyud): 'jigs mtshon sna tshog sa thogs pa yi//khro bo mang po 'phro ba ste//bdag nyid bskal pa'i mo ltar 'brur//bsgrub bya mdun du bsam bya ba//mtshams med rdzogs
37b2(rgyud): ba'i sdig dang ldan//dri ma can de phyogs gos 'chang //grong khyer skye bas 'tshe ba can//grang ba'i reg pas lu so la rgyas//mtshon gyis btab pa byas pa la//
37b3(rgyud): gcan zan sogs za mdun du bsamo//dag tu'ang de ltar yang yod brjod//lcags kyi khyud mos yan lag bsdams//tsher mas dbugs pa byas po ste//lus ni/
37b4(rgyud): lpags pa med par bsam//ske tshe lan ches lus byugs te//a chu ba yi sgra 'byin bsam//de yi mgon skye bas bsal byas nas//gshon rje'i lte ba'i tha mar
37b5(rgyud): bzhag/be con thogs pas de za'o//'di ltar bsad pas sangs rgyas kyi//sras bu de ni skye bar 'gyur//los kyi sdig los de grolo//gsod pa'i sngags de spel
37b6(rgyud): ba ni//hUM che ge mo mA ra yA hUM//bsgrub bya nang dag dbye ba na//ma hArta yi lkugs pa dge/yang nai ro dang dur khrod ras//rta dang ma hi byi la 'am//khyi deng nim pa'i
37b7(rgyud): mdab khu dang //khyim bya'i khrag dang ske mo tshi bisra//dang ni 'khor lo 'di bris te//rnam par 'gras pa bskul dang ldan//rta sbal dag gi nang btsug ste//ma
38a1(rgyud): tI'i tshig par rlung bcug wA//skyong phrag brgyan chung par bzlas//sa pa'o shing bskos den \u0f7f//do d+hASh+TaHsa pa nyid d+hA na//dog chad brgyas ma
38a2(rgyud): 'thab par 'gyur//A mu kaM dang oMsa? kyi/bi dr-iSh+Ta la~M badz+ra/rims kyis thabs par bya ba la//dur khrid /bache ba la//arga shing gi lo ma dang /
38a3(rgyud): drang tsA rje dang //khrag gis 'khor lo bri der bya//bri ba bskos la ri mo dag/seng ldong mdab ma dug myed la//bas zhing khros pas lnga brgyu /khyim drang la
38a4(rgyud): gyi bzhi myed dang //du khrod smras na rims kyi sku 'dzin//rgyus pa'i las kyis rgyuste 'dod na/gi ldeng gis na ga glul//'khor log nyi sbyi na nom bri t+ta/
38a5(rgyud): bskul tshig ldan par yi ge bri//zla drug thang gi mdun dag tu//gnod sbyin dang ni gnod sbyin moste//rin rgyun tshwa 'gyes pa dang //gshin dgra sor po
38a6(rgyud): zla sor la//gnas par bsam te khri bzlas te//'bigs pa nor 'dzin 'dra bar 'gyur//oM dzig mo puSh+TiM oM/gro ga sogs kyi shog shog la/
38a7(rgyud): gi wang dang ni rang byung gi/me tog dag gis bi bste//yang na tha ltag khrag dang ni//bil ba'i lo ma'i khu ba dang //ras dmar po yi khu ba dang //rtsi rnams
38b1(rgyud): bskul la bri bAr bya//sgra tshul gyis ni 'khor lo bri//bum pa mar sum ldan par 'azhag/dus bzhi dag tu mchod dan// me tog dmar pos mchod pa'o//de tshe bzlas/
38b2(rgyud): pa tshul dag ni//ho ba shaM ku ra hU~M//de mya thug tu lha rnams kyang //dbang du byed par nges 'gyuraro//gr-i ga dag la bri ba ni//zla ba gzus zin dus dag gam//rgyu mi
38b3(rgyud): nyin par bri bAs+t+waM//sdud pA dmar pos 'khor lo dkr-i//me tog dmar po sa mchod pa bya//b+h+r-id pa kha sbyar nang bzhag ste//bzlas pa khris ni brgyu byin gyi//bu mo'ong rnyed
38b4(rgyud): par nges 'gyur//dur khrod kyi ni ras dag la//gur gum sogs kyis 'khor lo bri//yi ge thig les rnam bskor te//a mu ki dang mA mA kI/mA~M hU~M na dang rnam spel la//
38b5(rgyud): bsgrub bya'i gos kyi mtha' ma la//legs btags chos kyi dbyings nyid du//bsgoms nas zlos shing 'gro na yong //lha dang lha min gyis mi mthong //bdag nyi
38b6(rgyud): gshon dgra nyid bsgoms pas//chu yi steng nas 'gro 'dod na//rdul drani lho yi rnam par te//ur+yan du ni bdag rang nyid//nges par steng 'gro gzhan dag kyang //dum
38b7(rgyud): nags kyi ras bal lo//skud pa bkal baM gzhi nu mas//sum sgrol du yang de yis bya//gdug sngags stong du tshangs par te//bzlas tshul sngon du gsungs pa bzhin/
39a1(rgyud): skur ma rgyus kyings la ban+d+ha//ze ba'i sbyin ma 'du de 'ad l+yA// la 'khor gyi ni lhar ban+d+hag+sa g+ha/gzhan gyis mAngan b+hasgra gzhan la ga gas/
39a2(rgyud): ma lus mtshon dag ngas spyod //gce tshul yang dngas par byed//me hU~Mg la su na gzhan du min//shrIlnga stsogs kyi rom du ni//legs par dgrig sa dang
39a3(rgyud): bskums//lcags gan myu ngag gis dkri bar bya//bzlas shong mdzad pa byed pa'i tshe//dngul dag gi ni ring sde bzhin bya//'bar bar gyur pa nyid na yang //
39a4(rgyud): ba legs par rnams byas te//bskor ba brgya byig du ma byas//de nas blo ldan sgrub pa pos//khar bcug tsam gyis 'dod pa skrag/phyung na sngon ltar rnal ma nyid//
39a5(rgyud): gso ba 'dra bas 'o mas kyang //nges par 'khrul 'khor bkru bar bya//rigs sngags 'khrul 'khor las grol te//rnal mo nyid la gnas pa yin//snum
39a6(rgyud): ster dag gi sa bon la//nywa lcibs dang ni b+hi ting ka/khu bas yang de byugs pa la//thaMd paM sas ni rnam nga bar//sgras ta~M bzlas pa grangs med bya//
39a7(rgyud): tshe mchi dang gtor ma dag/yongs rgyas 'bros bu rnams blangs te//khar bcug mkha' 'gro byas 'gyur//de la 'di skad ces bya ste//zhus dang 'das byung
39b1(rgyud): gadrug pa dang //mngon par gas pa'i ting 'dzin//dkyil 'khor rnam par spros pa dang //thig gis gzhal yas mtshon pa dang //rdul tshon phyogs las rnam par
39b2(rgyud): byartags//yang dag byin gyis brlabs pa dang //bdud rtsi myang bar bya ba dang //chungs pa'i gnas bzhi sgom pa dang //sngags kyi dngos med bzhin mtshams//
39b3(rgyud): chos 'byung dang ni sgrub bya dong //bzlas dang de yi grangs tshod dong //'khor lho dang ni yi ge gnyis//dris te dri yis bstan pa yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
39b4(rgyud): 'byung po rnams lnga gtor mas tshim par bya ba zhes bye ba'i ting 'dzin bzhi dang de bzhi ni sdug tshang //so sa las kyi bye brag ste//bsdus teng yis bstan pa yin//nganas
39b5(rgyud): ts+tsho m+bu ldan 'das kyisgra 'byung po rnams la gtor mas tshim par bya ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/spyod du gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di d+hA/
39b6(rgyud): A~MhrIHdz+dzaHwi kr-i tA nIn hU~M hU~M Ta phan+d+ha swAhA/'byung po rnams dang rnam sprul to//tha mar sbyar ba byas pa ni//hi ha hi n+d+he pheM pheM swA t+te/dung khAdi rkyen gyis rnam ba
39b7(rgyud): zhe sdang gshin gyi shi rdo rjen//spros med na mkha' lte bu las//snying rjenanas kyis su sprul pa//ye shes khri rgyal ba 'jigs pa'i//du
40a1(rgyud): mun tshon sku la 'dud//gar dgu nyams dang ldan pa yi//gto mug rdo rje gshin rje ga shong//skye med don dum dang nyid lus//thabs kyi sprul pa/
40a2(rgyud): skur bstan pa/'jigs byed drag ngo'i cha lugs can//zla ba nya 'dra khyod la 'dud//bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar ba yi//ser sna ga shinani rdo rje ni//'dzin papo
40a3(rgyud): las grol ba yas//gdug pa 'dul phyir khro bo sprul//gtar 'chang ser sna grol mdzad pa//gtso ma gser 'dra khyod la 'dud//chags pas ma lus dbang mdzad
40a4(rgyud): pa'i//'dod chags gshin rje rdo rje ni//skye med rnam dag chos dbyings la//khams gsub dag khro bar sprul//ma chags spyan ldan thugs rje can//ba na 'du
40a5(rgyud): lta bu'i sku la 'dud//shes rab thabs ldan he ru ka/phrag dog go shin rje rdo rje ni//rnam rtog dpe dang bral ba las//thugs rje'i sprul pa'i khro bo ni//'gro don brtson
40a6(rgyud): pa'i ral gri n+dan//sna tshogs mdog can khyed la 'dud//thams cad bskyed pa'i lha mo che//dbang po lta bur bsgyur mdzad pa//khams gsum gzigs pa'i spyan dang ldan
40a7(rgyud): rnam snang can gyis bdung bzhi 'jigs//bde ba chen pos rtag tu dgyes//ye shes spyan can khyed la 'dud//kun sdud lha mo rin po che//rnam rtog skyon las rnam grol yA
40b1(rgyud): dus gsum bde gshegs bdag gir byed//rin chen tog can mdzes pa'i sku//don dum thugs chung 'khor ba sel//ma lus kun gyi bdag la 'dud//'dus byas
40b2(rgyud): mA lus sreg byed pa//rnam rtog zhi ba'i rang bzhin las//khams gsum ma lus sgrol bar byed//'od dpag med kyis rab mdzes pa//ma chags phyag na bsdams
40b3(rgyud): pA yi//phrin las dag byed can la 'dud//thugs rjes g.yo ba'i rang bzhin can//'jig rten gsum dag sgrol bar byed//gnyis med bde chen dang nyid las//
40b4(rgyud): phrin las grub pa'i rang bzhini can//btang snyoms bzhugs par 'gro ba 'dul//kun tu las kyi rgyal la 'dud//ces gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa la so sor yongs su
40b5(rgyud): bstod do//de nas yang thams cad kyi bdag pas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/lha mo rnams kyi sku la btsud de//gdug pa 'jigs pa'i yi ge ni//bcu bzhi pa la
40b6(rgyud): dmigs pa yang //'khor bar dmigs par bya ba 'am//nyi ma'i steng na skyes pa ltar//dmigs te ma yangs brjed pa med//bzlas pa nyid ni de ltar bya//
40b7(rgyud): bye ba tshang bar babs pa yis//rab 'byams las la mi 'grub pa//mdo da de yis thams cad 'grub//'bum dang sa ya bzlas pas kyang //phra mo'i la sau rnams
41a1(rgyud): pa pyod//gzhan du ma 'gro sems shes na//de lta'i rdul du bzlas pa bya//yul gzhan blo ni 'grub las//bskal par bzlas //du bras ma cu//
41a2(rgyud): mi 'dres sems kyis 'di bzlas shing //lam du zhugs pa'i skyes bu la//stag sogs chu yis mi 'jig so//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//dbang gis blo sbyangs ra
41a3(rgyud): ldan du sa//'bras thob de med mi 'grub ste//de bas de ni ba shad par bya//bum pa'i dbang gis thog mar sbyang //gsung ba'i dbang gis gnyis par ste//gsum pa
41a4(rgyud): bye ba de nyid ni//shes rab ye shes de yin te//de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yin//brdzun g.yo dngos po ma lus pa//bsgom par bya ba'i dus nyid la//rlos ni yongasu mi
41a5(rgyud): sgom ste//kun gyi mtshan nyid ma shes na//skem pa kho na dri min te//thams cad dngos nyid yongs shes na//de ni sgom par yongs su bsgrags//de nyid bla ma'i khwa yis te//
41a6(rgyud): 'bad pas mnyes bye de mi smad//de la thams cad 'byung ba ste//bla ma la smad g.yo sgyu can//nges par de ni dug dang yang //gdon chen dag ni ma lus pas//'chi zhing
41a7(rgyud): par de gyur nas//dmyal bdag tu yun ring lhung //bskal pa du mar sdug bsngal te//rtag tu chonges 'dengs par byed//de bas blo gros chen po la//nam du'ang mi
41b1(rgyud): smad gzhan du na//bkur sti phu dud 'gro ba la//phan pa'i sems kyis de ltar bya//gzhan yang bsgom par bya ba nyid//gang dag dbang po'i lam 'gro ba//de yi ngo bor bdag gis//
41b2(rgyud): byid/bsam gtan mi byed de blo yis//kun tu blo yis bsgom par bya//bcom ldan bdag po chen po yis//gsad dbang lag na rdo rje la//brosA nas gsang ba'i dbyangs 'di
41b3(rgyud): gsungs//gzugs sgra la sogs drug po rnams//dngos med mkha' dang 'dra ba las//longs spyod yul du du mar snang //shel le tshon ni ji bzhin du//'dod po lnga dang chos
41b4(rgyud): rnams la//rtag tu rnal 'byor spyod par sheg/a la la ho//rol du gsol/mnams par mdzod/mi 'dzi ni sgyu ma lta bu la//gar gyis dgyes pa'i rol pa mdzod//
41b5(rgyud): rig bya dgag pa med pa la//mi g.yo bzhin du rol par mdzod//ho chags pa med pas chags par mdzod//de nas yang dag rab bshad pa//sngags dang phyag rgya dbang
41b6(rgyud): bsrur ba'i//de yi mtshan nyid bshud pa'i phyir//gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to//lce la sgom pa'i rdo rje ni//rdo rje gnod mdzes nag po ste//kha ni kun tu gyes pa no//las
41b7(rgyud): gnyis thal mo nges sbyar te//gung mo'i rtsa ba'i tshigs nyid la//mthe bong nges par sbyar bar bya//mdzub mo gung mo'i rgyab rtser sbyar//'di ni dam tshig phyag rgya ste//snying ka
42a1(rgyud): dpral ba lkog ma dang //spyi bor byin gyis brlabs par bya//oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT u d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/gzhan yang rdo rje sems ma sogs//phyag
42a2(rgyud): rgyas dbang bskur dbu rgyan brtag/gti mugo rdo rje lnga sogs pa//so so'i bdag po dribu rgyan cing //dbang bskur tshe na bum pa che//phyag gis bsnams te dbang bskur//'a
42a3(rgyud): lo las kun byed pa la//gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis//bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis bstod//gtug pa skrag byed 'khor lo mo lhor 'bar//dus gsum khro rgyal he ru ka
42a4(rgyud): yi thugs//las rnams dag byed phrag dog rdo rje ste//ma lus tshams gcod gsol bas su yi dang //hUM dang pheMT kyi gdug rtsub sbyor bas gsung //kun gyi rang bzhin byed
42a5(rgyud): kyis gshin rje yi//lhor 'dzud bka' las des kyang mi 'da' zhing //phyogs bcu'i sprul pas gnas na 'gugs mdzad pa//ma lus kun byed 'khor lo che mchog la/
42a6(rgyud): gzhan gyi don rdzogs gus pas phyag 'tshalo//khyod ni dpa' bo thub chen kun gyi bdud//nga yis lam bstan bdud rnams mi phyed kyang //dam las 'da' zhing log pa
42a7(rgyud): kun skyed la//khyod kyang bka' las ma 'da'i las rnams sbubs//tshe dang srog bsdus yan lag rnam par bcings//bdud rtsi chu rgyun rnal 'byor nga la 'dod pasgrub
42b1(rgyud): na/dus ni sbyin bya khyod ni dum las ma 'da' shig/ces dang la gshin rje dgra nag po'i 'khor lo gzhan gyi lto bA la gnas 'cha' bar 'dod pa'i gtan 'pho ba ma yin pa'i tshe byo'o//
42b2(rgyud): 'khor lo skyid kar lta ba'i tshe//sa bon tshul te lte ba la//yI ge mA lus 'dod pa yang //mtshan nyid ngan pa'i rtog pa las//blol te mtha' gsum ngo bo las//kIn zad
42b3(rgyud): pa'i bdag nyid la//u ni hU~M gi bdag nyid do//de ni sems kyi rang bzhin nyid//dga' las 'das pa'i ye shes te//thabs ni shes rab ldan pa las//dus thabs
42b4(rgyud): bstan pa'i bdag nyid kyis//'thob ste gzhan du de mi 'thob//chu 'gram tshan po bas mtha' dang //dur khrod shing drung dgon pa ste//dben pa'i yul dang ma mo'i khyim//
42b5(rgyud): der ni mgon po 'di la 'bad//gzhan du bsgrubs kyang de mi 'grub//skad cig de la rang bzhin kun//nges par mi skrang rig pa yi//lam du gyur pa med par shes//'bras/
42b6(rgyud): bu da ni rgya chen te//mtha' yi 'thob pa de yin//de nas yang thams cad kyi bdag po bde bar gshegs pas rdo rje sa'i cho ga gsungs//skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad
42b7(rgyud): kyi//spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis//sa dang pha rol phyin pa la//lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur//srung ba'i dkyil 'khor rab gnas pas//sdang ba'i log 'dren skye
43a1(rgyud): /bau dang //bgags rnams bsal ba 'di skad gsungs//dpal ldan bdag ni rdo rje 'dzin//srung ba'i 'khor lo rab skyong bas//bdag gis yo shes rdodz+nyA sa/
43a2(rgyud): lus ngag yid du bcas pa dgas//sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni//khro bo gshini rje nag po'i bdag/slob dpon gyi ni dkyil 'khor bri//zhes suni gsum gyi bar
43a3(rgyud): du brjod par bya'o//dkyil 'khor gyi ni drung nyid du//dar gyis gdong ni bkab pa la//sgo drung gnas pa khyod gang yin//slob dpon gyis ni rab brjod do//de bdag
43a4(rgyud): skal ba ldan par brjod//ji ltar bla med dpa' bo yis//mgon la dbang ni bskur ba bzhin//bla med byang chub granas bya'i phyir//bdag la'ang mgon pos dpa
43a5(rgyud): bskur gsel//me tog sogs te mchod pa'i mchog/rab 'byam rgya mtsho ma lus pas//slob dpon dpa' bo de nyid la//yang yang mchod cing bstod pa'i tshogs//
43a6(rgyud): rgyas par mnyes bya dri 'og tu//dpa' bos de la dbang rnams sbyin//de nas rgyal po bde chen po//dpa' bo longs spyod kun ldan pa//'gro don brtson pa'i sku gsum
43a7(rgyud): bodag/nyid kyis 'di skad bka' stsal to//sbyin sreg med na 'bros mi 'byin//de bas bdag nyid dam pa yis//de ye las la 'bad par bya//gos nag rgyan gyis
43b1(rgyud): rnam rgyan la//gshin rjer rnam bltas rnal 'byong pas//khro bo'iskyil krung bcas pa yis//sman te'i stan la bdag 'dug nas//las rnams bsgrub par bya ba ni//mtshan ma//
43b2(rgyud): 'am nyi ma byed nyid lnga//rang byung me yi dkyil 'khor du//hUM phaT mtha' na yod pa yi//sngags kyis thog ma bar tha mar//sbyin bsreg bya ste mi no//dur khyong me 'am rus pa/
43b3(rgyud): 'am//rdo nyid las ni byung ba 'am//tsaN+Da li yi khyim nyid nas//thab khung gru gsum can dar ni//tshur ma can+da gyi bud shing rdzang //rlung yab s+phar te hUM dz+wa la r-I//dz+wal hUM
43b4(rgyud): badz+rod me sbyar brjod//lag g.yas ku sha bcas pra yis//mthe bong sran lag rtse ru gzugs//oM e h+ye hI mahA b+hU ta di ba ri Shi dI dzi sat+ta ma gri hi tr-I ai hU te a hA raM asmin
43b5(rgyud): maM nr-i he t+yo b+ha ba zhes brjod la spyan drang //'bar ba me yi dbus nyid du//ming de zad byed ces bya ba//khro bo me ltar phun sum tshogs//ba sru kham pa de bzhin du//du
43b6(rgyud): ba'i mdog can zur mig steng du gzigs//sgra che mche ba bzhin ldan stobs po che//yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te//bzhugs nas drag po'i yi ge badz+ra//spyan
43b7(rgyud): gsum pa la phyag bzhi pa//rig pa'i gnas la legs par bzhugs//zhal bdun rnam gtsigs ma he la//bcibs pa du ba'i phreng rnams 'khrigs//phyog
44a1(rgyud): gnyis mdung dang rdo rje 'dzin//gnyis kyis rdul glo gri glug 'dzin//de yi g.yas kyi phyogs nyid du//de bzhin mdun gyi phyogs nyid dam//spyan drangs/
44a2(rgyud): byin rlabs ldan pa la//oMr+g+haM sogs kyis mchod pa bya//oM ar+g+haM br-i tIts+tshe swA hA/lag g.yas mdzub mo mthe bong dge/skam pa lta bur rnam byas pas//chu blangs bskyod
44a3(rgyud): bAs dbul bar bya//oM ba tA ma mthar ni sngon gyi brjod//zhabs bkru ba l-i shes pa yin//dgang bzar yu ba sor bcu drug/de min sor bzhi zabs sor ginyis/
44a4(rgyud): zur gsum dbus su sor gnyis tshad//rtse gsum phreng bas yongasu bskor//de yi dbus su'ang mtshan ma ste//stag sbrul gang 'dod pas mtshan bya///khu bcud
44a5(rgyud): 'dzag pa sngor gcigro go/khro bo rdo rjes mchu yi dbyibs//byin rlabs sor gcig tshad can no//blugs gzar yu ba sor bcu bzhi//zabasu ser gcig gru gsuM
44a6(rgyud): dang /yu ba'i mthar ni rtse gsum pa//gdengs pa byini rlabs mngon spyod kyi//gzar bu yin par nga yis bstan//gnamA lcags tsher mA can sogs shing //de la
44a7(rgyud): de bas sangs rgyas 'jigs//sreg rdzas gzugs brnyan la sogs sreg/stong du tshang bas 'bras bu ni//nges par 'byin par byed pa yin//g.yon gyi rtsa der dgang
44b1(rgyud): banang sa//g.yas pa rmugs kyis ga nor ba yin//kho na pad+ma chud pa ma yin//ser mo gnyis par dargyas//rdo rje bar gyi thong pa dag/srog rdzas smin snong yin lo//
44b2(rgyud): rnams rdo rje rin chen dpa'/hUM phaT na mAthu' can gyis//bsreg byas rje me dang rgyu//nam pa' lci bu'i dbus su gnas//kha bye ga nas pa rtag tu'o//kun tu'ang
44b3(rgyud): khi phye ste/de bar bya//bzhi gnyis 'drab ma'i steng du ste//lte ba dang ni yang dag ldan//lhani cig rnam par shes pa'i lha//na mkha' nyid du nges par 'bar//de yi mtshan
44b4(rgyud): mdo shes byu ga/rdul gyi rnam pa re di //thig le yi ge med pa ste//rgyun mi 'chud par 'od kyis gnas//brkyang ba shAg s+t+ya sgra yi tshad kyiso//a rgas rab tu sgyu
44b5(rgyud): bar bya//sdor gsungs 'byung ba rnam pa ni dang //namakha' yang dag ldan pa yis//sor mo lnga dang nges ldan pas//gang gi sbyi bsreg des bya'o//gzhan dag sa
44b6(rgyud): gsum gyis bsres//dmigs pa thams cad 'gags par 'gyur//sten med stong pa namakhye'u dra//shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi//phyag rgya chen po dbang du 'gyur/
44b7(rgyud): bide gshegs kun dang mnyam 'gyur ba//shes rab dang ni snying rje ches//'gag pa med pa'i chos 'gyuraro//bde chen na mkha' lta bu ste//rnal 'byor pa yi dmigs
45a1(rgyud): b+h+yams ma gas sku//mi ma dru ga pas mchod//drung da shing mang byu nga//rnami sa nas nga /
45a2(rgyud): dma' ba yon//nim pa de bzhin med sbed de//sa bde bsnyen thos shi dang //dur dzad shing bu sbyar bcug/rtsu ba'i cha las rnam byung ba/dung khri
45a3(rgyud): rnams bsgrags lnga//de las yum shong b+h+rUM bayin//mye dog 'gu ba'i ba shig pad//nem pa'i mang ma thas badru//nang rjes sa dang pod byud/
45a4(rgyud): sa sa sa dang ni//rmadang shAg dang pa sh-id byu //gci ni myu sa// //sus nga rdeg dang thaM /del gas 'i
45a5(rgyud): sbyar rnyed pa'i rdzas rnams ni//dag dang khrig dang spyi byed ste//mangs khrubral posal ba nga /'bras kyi dbye ma la sags la//dgra ba dag gi gtsus
45b1(rgyud): lo//mgo nas pa rnams te ral gri yos//dum bur ga tub cing lcags phyeng du//khrag dang chud mi rnams dang //bong bu'i gtsun la phan ldan pa'i//gdug pa'i yo glu rnams
45b2(rgyud): bzlas pa'i//rdzas la gsang gtod byas nas kyang //slob dpon la sdang rmongs pa 'di//bai ni rgyu sbyin de sreg dbul bar bya//de la 'di skad ces bya ste//'byung ba tshi ma
45b3(rgyud): gter ma dang //bstod bzlas maMny+tsasau par bya ba dang //dbang gi dbye ba bstan po dang //dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya ba dang //de yi sa la mchod pa sogs//cod pan du
45b4(rgyud): bde gshegs bzhag/mngon spyod hom gyi tshig dang /bsdus nas bar du rnam pa brgyad/pad dkar po 'dra mgrin pa ring //gzugs mdzes ha cang ring ba min//
45b5(rgyud): lus la rdul 'byung yid 'phrog ma//dri ni shin tu'ang nim pa yini/lha stangs mig sogs ni dgus 'dra//mgrin dang lto ba'ang ri dgas kyi//skal bzang rked
45b6(rgyud): dgas kyi//glang na d+hits+tshin ban 'di la che//myos shing na ma rab tu rgyus//gzhan slong kun rdzob bden pa ni/grong thung dri yi sku yang thu //rkang lag dang ni
45b7(rgyud): bzhini ring ma//nya yi dro bri bang ring ma//zla 'dre skye gnas rab tu ring //skyes gnas rlung ning yin leg drug/bong ring de'ini ni num mkhrag//sgra srab t+pal sgyu yan
46a1(rgyud): /rgyug r+m+ma// na /byung ba sgos sa // sa sa ston// naldan
46a2(rgyud): sas/m+benA sa sa rgyung rgyas tu zhin du bla/ sa nga sa / ngan
46a3(rgyud): ngal phyin stan min/ga nyis de lta gas bu yin// sa/nga ba das rjes
46a4(rgyud): ba /sogs smras pa skyes lag sas ng+ge dag su mi n+yAg /
46a5(rgyud): sgyi drug banyis//sen mo bangs sa shes seM na//'i rnam brlags da bus gnas//hU~Mpa mi si rang zhin mas// rnaM sogasas su
46b1(rgyud): pas nan tan ye shes te//chos kyi dbyings 'dra dgu pa ste//gshin dgrar bdag nyid 'dod bya yin//rgyun gyi bye brag lus la gnas//de ni 'di skad byu ba ste//rlig pa shas//
46b2(rgyud): rab bstan pa dang //bskyed pa'i rgyu yi bye brag ni//tha mar bstan te sdom gsum mo//mtshon par byed pa'o bdag nyid de//mtshon bya sngon brtan nyid yin no//ga shin rje gshed
46b3(rgyud): nagu po'i las thams cad grub par byed pa'i 'khor la'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogaso///rgyu gar skad du/shrI badz+nyA ma hA b+hA be nA ma tAn+tu/bad skad du//dpal
46b4(rgyud): 'jigs byed kyi rgyud ces bya gi/dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po khros pa'i rgyal po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo//de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi//bsgrub pa yang dag rab bshad//de
46b5(rgyud): yis lha rnams thams cad la//drag shul che zhing 'jigs par byed//de la thog mar sngags pas yid du 'ong ba'i gnas gang yang rung ba'i gnas la dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par
46b6(rgyud): bya'o// de la gnas gsungs pa ni/dur khrod dam/chu klung gi 'gram 'am/shing cig gam/mtshan ma gcig pa 'am/bzhi mdo 'am/ri'i rtse mo 'am/khang stong rngom/ma
46b7(rgyud): me'i khyim 'am/lha'i khang pa 'am/'thab mo'i gnas sam/grong khyer ram/nags khrong ngam/grong la sogs pa'i gnas su sngags pa gnas te/rdo rje 'dzegs byed chen
47a1(rgyud): po'i rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i ming gri rgyud 'dir dbang bskur ba'i rnal 'byor pas dbang dang /dgug pa dang /bsad pa dang /bskrad pa dang /dbye ba dang /rengs pa dang /
47a2(rgyud): ral gri dang /mig sman dang /sa 'og dang /ril bu dang /gser 'gyur dang /bcud kyi len pa dang /nor dang /'byung po dang /ro langs dang /sha za dang /gnod sbyin dang /
47a3(rgyud): gnod sbyin mo dang /klu la sogs pa'i cho ga 'dis bsgrub par bya'o//de la cho ga ni dang por re shig sngags pas ro bsregs pa'i thal chen gyis lus byugs te/mtshan phyeng na gtse
47a4(rgyud): bu spa bsil ba byas la 'phags pa ma he'i gdong can gyi rnal 'byor gyis dur khrod la sogs par dkyil 'khor bris te/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/rta babs bzhi yis rnam par
47a5(rgyud): rgyan//dril bu dar gyi 'phan la sogs//me tog phreng bas rnam par klubs//grwa rnams dag ni thams cad dang //sgo khyod kyi ni phug dag tu//rdo rje rin chen gyis smras pa//
47a6(rgyud): zla ba phyed pa de bzhin no//de dbus 'khor lo bri ba ni//re'u mig dgu pa zlum po'o//sgo gcig pa ni dbye bar bya//lhag ma yongasu bcad par bya//de dbus mi ro bri bar
47a7(rgyud): byed shar du mgo bo lhor lags//nub tu rgyu ma byang du rkang pa gnyis//shar gyi grar thod pa/lhor thod tshol/nub byang du dur khrod kyi ras/byang shar du skyes bu gas
47b1(rgyud): shing lnga btsugs pa'o//de dag ni 'khor lo'i dbus su mtshon ma'i phyag rgya lnga'o//de nas 'khor lo'i phyi rol gyi phyug rgyu rnams nA shar phyogs kyi snam bu la gri gug dang /mtshan
47b2(rgyud): rtse gcig po dang /gtun shing dang /chu gri dang /rdo rje rtse gcig po dade//lcags kyu la sogs pa rnams bri'o//lho phyogs kyi snam la ste re dang /mdang dang /
47b3(rgyud): kha T+wA~M ga dang /dbyig to dang /'khor lho dang /rdo rje zhags pa la sogs pa bri'o//nub phyogs kyi snam bu la rdo rje dang /ral gri dang /glu rlung dang /phub dang /grwar+b+ha
47b4(rgyud): dang /dril bu dang /rlung gi ba dan la sogs pa bri'o//byang phyogs kyi snam bu la sdigs mdzub dang /'phe ni rtse gsum pa dang /glang po'i lpags pa dang /rdo rje
47b5(rgyud): drang /mdung dang /me thib la sogs pa bri'o//sgo bzhi dang grwa rnams li ro langs chen po bri'o//gal te mchog gi dngos grub 'drid na mar khu chen po'i mar me dbul//
47b6(rgyud): mI dang /bong bu dang /rnga mo dang /khyi dang /wa dang /me he dang /glang po che dang /ba ling dang /ba mon dang /lcag dang /ri dgas dang /phag pa la sogs
47b7(rgyud): pa'i sha rnams dbul bar bya'o//gzhan yang bya rgod dang /'ug pa dang /bya rog dang /khwa dang /chu skyar dang /thing rol dang /bzhad dang /rma bya dang /khyim byang
48a1(rgyud): ri stsogs dang /khyung chen po la sogs pa'i sha rnams dngul bar bya'o//shin tu mnyam par gzhugs pas bza' ba dang /sgron mo dang /sbyin srog dang /
48a2(rgyud): gtor ma'i las bya'o//dkyil 'khor gyi grwa thams cad du khrag gis chag chag bya'o//dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed ma he'i gdong gi sbyor ba la gnas pas lha ba shas thams cad
48a3(rgyud): dbul bar bya'o//de nas sngags pas sngon du skyed pa byas ste/bdag zhi bar gyur pa'i shin tu 'thun pa'i grogaso sam/bdag cig pu rnam par snani mdzad kyis lus byugs te/
48a4(rgyud): gcer bur rung nus sgra bsil/mtshan phyeng na cing te'u krol la ha he zhes bya zhing mnyam par ste/rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor du dngos grub 'dod pas 'jug pa
48a5(rgyud): rab tu zhim pa'i chung la sogs pa btung ba dang /gza' ba'i ro rnams dbul//phyi nas dngos grub dang /dngos grub ma yin pa la dmigs la de'i steng du dpal rdo rje 'jigs
48a6(rgyud): bye chen po ma he'i gdong can bsam par bya'o//de'i mdun du g.yas bskum du gnos la nga rgyal drang bcas pas sem rtse gcig tu shrI tu mnyam par gzhag pas yi ge bcu
48a7(rgyud): pi'i sngags bzla bar bya'o//de nas 'jigs pa chen po byung ni/de la sngags pas 'jigs par mi bye te/gab te 'jigs par gyur na/de la bgegs chen po'i bar
48b1(rgyud): tshod 'byung //bar chud byung na dngos grub mi 'grug/de bas nA sngags pas 'jigs par mi bya ste//rnal dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po dgyeso//dgyes nas khyod ci 'dod ces
48b2(rgyud): gsungs pa dang /de la rig 'dzin gyis smra bar bya ste//ral gri dang /snga 'og dang /migo sman dang /gser 'gyur dang /bcud kyis len pa'am//nga las gzhan yang
48b3(rgyud): yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub nges par bdag la stsol cig ces brjod na/de la thi tsam med par stsolo//brgya zhig la sngags pas de dag ma grub na yang de'i phra mo'i las thang
48b4(rgyud): nges par 'grub bo//'di ni 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i ming dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor lo'i sbyor ba'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor bstan po ste rtog pa dang po'o//
48b5(rgyud): denas las kyi tshogs kyi cho ga rab tu bshed rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/bsad pa dang bskrad pa la sogs pa sngags pa khros pas dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i sbyor ba la
48b6(rgyud): gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyis bya ste/dang po kho nar sngags pas re shig gnod mdzes su bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnal 'byor gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro//rnal 'byor phyi
48b7(rgyud): rgyud la lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas thog mar ni de bya ste/de la 'di'i las ni ji ltar bsad par 'dod pa'i sngags pas dur khrod kyi ras la/dug dang /khrag dang /lan tshod
49a1(rgyud): tshe dang /nim pa dang /d+hu du ra'i khu bA yis rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor l-I lo tshwa bcu drug pa bya rog chen po'i sgro rtsa'i myu gu'am/mo'i rus pa'i b+hU
49a2(rgyud): gcer bu skra bshegs pas kha lhor bltas te/ma he'i gdong gi sbyor bas bro bar bya'o//me gnyis kyi dbus su bosgrub bya'i ming bcas par gzhag la de yi ge bcu pas
49a3(rgyud): bskor zhing hUM brgyad bri/zur rnams su phaT kyi yi ge rnams bri/bdag nyid tsha bo'i mer gyis lus byugs la/thong po gnyis kyi dbus su 'khrul 'khor rab tu bcug la
49a4(rgyud): sgyeskyed bu gsum gyi steng du bzhag nas dur khrod kyi mgal bas me rab tu sbyang te/rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzlas//de yis skad cig gis the tshom
49a5(rgyud): med par 'che'o//gzhan yang rims kyis thebs par 'dod na 'khor lo de nyid mi'i nya phyis gnyis kyi dbus su legs par bzhag la mi thab kyi 'og tu khru phyed bskos la bcug/
49a6(rgyud): nas me swa ran rims nad kyis 'dzin no//de la le tshe bcu drug pa'i rab tu sbyor ba 'di gsungs te/'on kyang 'di'i khyad par ni yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i sngags dang ldan pa yi/
49a7(rgyud): ge btu ba'i sngags bsgrub bya'i ming dang /lhan cig tu yi ge dang sngags spelo//sngon du gsungs pa'i rdzas dang lhan cig tu bya rog gis gtogs pa'i lhag ma mi gtsang ba
49b1(rgyud): dang /rnam par snang mdzad dang lhan cig tu dur khrod kyi rasna la byugs te//de la sngon du gsungs pa'i tshogs 'khor lo bris te/dur khrod du sbas na 'chi bar 'gyur//shing gcig gi
49b2(rgyud): drung du sbas na bskrad par 'gyur ro//mtshan ma gcig par sbas na dbye bar 'gyur ro//chu'i nang du sbas na rengs par 'gyuraro//khyim du bzhag na zhi bar 'gyuraro//byung nas ldegs
49b3(rgyud): par bkrus na grol bar 'gyur ro//gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba gsungs pa ga shi na rje'i 'khor lo sngon gyi chags dur khrod kyi ras la bris te/dur khrod dam/lam bzhi mdo dang //shing /
49b4(rgyud): gcig dang /grog mkhar dang /chu 'gram dang /mtshan ma gcig pa dang /rgyal po'i sgo dang /rnam par snang mdzad dang /rdo rje chu dang /dur khrod kyi sol bas bsgrub
49b5(rgyud): bya'i gzugs brnyan chad sor brgyad pa byas le de'i snying khar 'khor lo'i sngags bcug ste/mi'i rus pa'i phur bus gnas lngar gdab par bya'o//tshigs thums cad la
49b6(rgyud): tsher ma rnon pos dgang bar bya'o//de thod pa gnyis kyi dbus su bcug ste/de grag mkhar dang gnas bdun gyi sas gshin rje'i 'khor kha~M gang tsam zhal gtsigs pa/
49b7(rgyud): gsus pa che ba/zhal gcig pa/phyag gnyis pa/phyag na ral gri dang /zhags pa 'dzin pa/gi tser bu skra bsil ba byas la/de'i snying khar thod pa gnyis bcug ste
50a1(rgyud): nyam byed dusan skyod na drang khrod dam rU bsgrags pa'i sar smras te/shin tu rang par mgo ltung bstan la/kha thun du phu pa tha'o//khyum du 'ongs pa dang
50a2(rgyud): par gzhag pas ma hi'i gting gi sbyor bas bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcam par yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzlas pa byas na nyi pA gsum gyis 'chi'o//phyung nas bkres na thar par
50a3(rgyud): de nas ras pa'i rab tu sbyo ba gsungs te/ la pa'i lpags pa la dug la sdigs pa'i rdzas yo ge cu pa'i sngags bris la/lkugs pa de bad+ma'i byar rkang rje
50a4(rgyud): rdul dang /bcin btang ba'i shul gyims ba/ la de'i sgras baning bar bya'o//phyi nas bong bu'i gcin dang /rnam par snang mdzad dang lhan cig tu brdzis l-i khom por dgang nga
50a5(rgyud): bya'o//der 'khor lo bcug le ro bsregs pa'i me lnga bzhag ste/rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la gshin rje'i sbyor bas yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzlas pa byas na zhag gcig gis
50a6(rgyud): rarings par byed//'di ni phyis rjesu gzung ba mi 'grub pa'i rab tu sbyor ba'o//sngags pas shin tu khros pas ba tu sbyor bar bya'o//gzhan yang dbye ba'i rab tu sbyor ba 'di ni
50a7(rgyud): gshin rje'i 'khor lo sngon gyi tsho gas bris la/gnas bdun gyisas ma he dang /rta byas te/de gnyis gcig gi stong du go cig bzhag laM/de gnyis kyi sgong ka
50b1(rgyud): lang drug ste/nem pa'o shong drung du bzhag ga/'khor la yang mad ts+tsha khrag gos thos//'di ni sngags kyi/drag ste/shin tu mam par gzhag pas smra na dag ga
50b2(rgyud): ba.ud par byed//ngan su sngags pas sma par 'dod nagran sna bdun gyi seMs rnga ma ng+yas la/yi gr-I sa yo su su gyur pa las myi ga dkyil 'kha zla ba pyod pa'i rnam pa ngas
50b3(rgyud): de'i steng ngo bsgrub bya dmi gyes la/ ba tu ga shin rje'i gzu sa lag pas dbyug pu'adzin par dmigs te de'i di bru~Mg pas rdeg cing kha m+b+ha ru ba lta seMn po khyed par rnam pa
50b4(rgyud): sam par //'khyor ma de 'i ste gang drug skyengs pa'i tshig la swA ying dang sbrul bu yang dag par bris la bcugan zhag bdun gyim tsam meng par spyod par
50b5(rgyud): dri nas gzhon yang rab tu sbyor ba gsungs te/nyi ma'i ches gtum po tsha bI'i mi khrus byugs la nim pa'i shing la 'jigs nas/da buM zhag la de'i lus kyi mer khru
50b6(rgyud): byos kyis bzhar la da gunas par bai //mar khrod zlas ni su lha chen po'i rgyal mtshon gyi ras blangs la de bsregs pa'i bar gyi du ba'i drug pa de dang maur khud gci
50b7(rgyud): tu byas la bskrad par 'dod pa de'i mchil l+h+wam la da bsku'o//de'i lag pa dang rkang pa gnyis la yang byugs na skad cig gis de skrod//de nas gzhan yang rab tu/
51a1(rgyud): bA gsungs pa ni dur khrod kyi ras sum/gr-i ga'i lA ma la rang gi dkyil 'khor bya rog gi khrag dang byA rog gi smyu gus bri bar bya ste//rlung ga dkyil 'khar gyi
51a2(rgyud): dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel te ga tor ma za ba'i migrin par bcings la/bya rog gzung nas ma he'i gdong po'i sbyor ba ra gnas pas khaM lhor bltos la 'phang ste/de'i
51a3(rgyud): skad cig gis bya rog bzhin sa kun tu 'khor ro//gzhan yang bskrad pa ni che ba'i mar khus bskus la nim pa'i shing las gtor ma za ba'i tshad blangs la/tshang de'i shing pa'i
51a4(rgyud): nags kyi shing mas bsregs pa'i thal ba de blangs la gang gi mgor blugs pa de skrod par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang dbye ba'i rab tu sbyor ba ni/bya rog dang 'ug pa'i bshog
51a5(rgyud): pa dang /bram ze dang /gtum pa rnams kyi sku gcig tu byas la/da du ra'i shing la me rab tu sbyar te/du ba med pa'i mos bsregs lo/de'i thal ba blangs la yi ge bcu pa'i
51a6(rgyud): sngags bzlas nas bud med dang skyes pa gnyis kyi bar du thal ba bzhag na/de skad gcig gis 'byed par byed//de nas dur khrod kyi ras blangs la dug la sogs pa'i rdzas
51a7(rgyud): kyis bran pa'i bar du bsgrub bya'i ming bris la zer mo dang /sbrul gyi spu dang /lpags pa blangs te/de lo bcug nas sdong bu byas te/gang gi khyim du sbar ba der phan
51b1(rgyud): skyon 'thab par 'gyur//de nas bas dbyar 'dud pa no ba shang gcol gzugs btsun byas la/de'i steng du ngus pa skye sa ra tu b+hags lnga/dung khrod kyi ma la smra ba shig pa
51b2(rgyud): byAsA lA//snor baHsa te ma he'i gdong pa'i sbyor bas nam byed na de ba chis ga go//gang ni ming du ba rgyas por byas na do zhing rdeg gis 'chi'o//rdo rje 'jigs byed chen
51b3(rgyud): po nyid kyi rab tu sbyor ba 'di gsungaso//de nas bskyod par 'dod pas rgyal mtshan gyi res la le tshe bcu drug pa'i 'khor lo lo yi ge bcu pa'i sngags sngon du gsungs pa'i rdzas dor du
51b4(rgyud): khrod kyi sol bas gang gi ming dang bcas pa bris te/nim pa'i shing la rgyal mtshan bzhag nad skrod por 'gyur//de nas rengs par 'dod pas gshin rje'i 'khor lo g.yam pa'i/
51b5(rgyud): raris la ba bla dang yung bas gang gi med dang bcas pa legs par bris la bzhag na/darings par 'gyur ro//gal te sngags pas dbang du bya bar 'dod na/grog mkhar gyis
51b6(rgyud): dang /gur gum dang /gi ljang dang /ba bla dang /yung ba rnams lhan cig tu byas te/bsgrub bya pho'am/gal te mo'i gzugs brnyan chid sor bcu drug pa byas la/gi wang
51b7(rgyud): dang /srini lag gi khrag gis gri ga lig shin rje'i 'khor lo dris te/de'i snying kar bcug nas rang gi khyim du bzhag la me tog dmar pas dus gsum du dbul ba da /
52a1(rgyud): /khanab tu bltas yig bcu d+ma'i sngags bsu byA d+hA sman/zhag bdun thos byargya b+h+yon yang dbyung du 'gyur na yang phra ma'i mo lta tsaM sa/de nas yung dgug bad+ma
52a2(rgyud): 'dod na/de la zod pa la 'khor lo gyi wad dang srin leg gi khrig gis bris te/sang ldeng gi mo la 'phro zhing ga dbye ba'i ming dang bcas drar bzlasan/de srid cig gis rlung
52a3(rgyud): shugs bzhin du gugs par 'gyur//de nas sngags pas zlos par bya ba 'dod na tu de rje'i 'bras bu A pA la/sha tshun dang ldan smrig tu shing srin gyis dzes da de mang
52a4(rgyud): bsres nas bza' ba dang btung ba la sbyin//sngags kyang bzlas pa bya ste/de skad cig gis skyo bar 'gyur zhing dag bdun gyis 'tsho'o//de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor bya
52a5(rgyud): pa/gshin rje'i sngags dur khrod kyi res la drug lnga sogs pa'i rjes kyis bris te/mar mtshon po dang rnam par snang mjed kyi gzugs brtan byas la/de'i phyeng khror 'khor
52a6(rgyud): bcug nas pa'i gnas su song la ro bsregs pa'i me lA mtshon rnon pos brnyebs nas rnam par brtsegs pa'i sbyor bas rnal 'byor mi gnas la/rnam par snang mdzad kyis lus
52a7(rgyud): byugs te/kha lhor bltas nas bsregs ni dmyur du 'chi'o//de nas dpral ba'i rab tu sbyor ba byung ba ni bya rog dang lug pa'i rus pa blangs la de gnyis la lcags kyi tshe snrums
52b1(rgyud): bsrub kyi mang dang rgyun rtag tu myog byudra ba'i sngags bris la//gcig phuganas su gnas te/gang gi ming dang bcas par bzlas sh-ing /dag cag la gtog blang na 'dral ba
52b2(rgyud): do nas ga shin rje'i khong pa go go'i 'dubu ma la bud med dang rgyas pa'i ming bris nas sprul pa'i gsus par bcug na/gang gi ming nas pa ma tu skyes na
52b3(rgyud): de'i yan lag mtshon gyis 'khrugs par 'gyuro//de nas bu mo rings pa'i rab tu sbyor ba 'di gshin rje'i sngags dur khrod kyi ras la dug lnga sogs pas bris la/ro bsregs pa'i
52b4(rgyud): sol bas gzugs brnyan mtho glang tsam gyi tshad brtsigs la/de'i snying kar 'khor lo bcug nas rkang pa g.yon pas mnan lnga/ma he'i sbyor bas che ge mo'i bu mo myur bar rings
52b5(rgyud): par gyur cig ces yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzlas ni rengs par 'gyur//'di yi las rnams ni gzhan su la yang smra bar mi bya'o//gol te sngags pa rmongs po'i bdag nyid
52b6(rgyud): can gyis ni dmyal ba rengs par lhung //dkon mchog gsum lA gnod pa byed pa dang /bla ma la brnyas par byed pa dang /dam tshig dang bral ba dang /sngags dang rgyud la
52b7(rgyud): 'bye bar byed pa dang /sems can le 'tsho ba 'di rnams la phan pa'i phyir sngogs pas snying rje gdungs pa'i sems kyis gnod pa rab tu sbyar bar bya'o//gal te gnan la byas
53a1(rgyud): na dam tshig nyams nas che ba chen por 'gro'o//ngas rgyud gzhan du'ang bshad/slob dpon la ni smod byed dang //theg pa chen po skur pa dang //sngags
53a2(rgyud): rgyud rab sbyor ye shes la//'phya bar byed pa'i mi gang dag//de ni 'bad la bsad par bya//yang na gnas nas g.yo bar bya//rnal 'byor snying rje med pa yis//
53a3(rgyud): gzhan la rung rung byas na ni//de la de bzhin las de ni//phyir ldog par ni 'byung bar 'gyur//ci phyir sems can tho brtsom phyir//rnol 'byor pa ni 'di la'o//
53a4(rgyud): 'di ni 'jam dpal 'jam pa'i mchog/dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las las thams cad grub pa'i rtog po ste gnyis pa'o///
53a5(rgyud): de nas go rims ji lta ba'i cho gas sngags gtu ba rab tu gsungs te/rab tu gtsang ba'i yul khams su sngags pas gnas la sngags btu bar bya ste/ji ltar drug pa/
53a6(rgyud): dang po dang //lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang //drug pa yi ni gnyis pa la//dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa//gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la//yang ni dbyangs yig
53a7(rgyud): gnyis pa ldan//bdun pa yi yang gsum pa dang //bzhi pa yi yang gsum pa la//dbyangs yig bcu gsum dang ldan pa//lnga pa yi yang lnga pa la//dbya sa yig/
53b1(rgyud): bcu gcig dang ldan pa//drug pa yi ni dang po dang //yang ni rlung gi sa bon sbyin//lnga pa yi yang lnga pa la//bcu dang gtsig gis mnan ldan pa//bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa la/
53b2(rgyud): bcu gsum pa yis mnyam mnan pa//drug pa yI yang gnyis pa la//dbyangs yig lnga pa dang ldan pa//gsum pa yi ni lnga pa dang //rlung gis sa bon de nas sbyin//
53b3(rgyud): dbyangs yig bcu gsum yang dag ldan//bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa dang //de nos rlung gi sa bon sbyin//drug pa ya yang dang po dang //bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa dang //de la rlung
53b4(rgyud): gau sa bon ni//dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa dang ldan//bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa la//dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa//de nas maM yi sa bon sbyin//rlung gi sa bon do
53b5(rgyud): bzhin no//de nas yI ge tha ma sbyin//dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa dang ldan//rlung gi sa bon de bzhin mchog/drug pa yi ni dang po dang //de nas yi ge tha ma sbyin//
53b6(rgyud): dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa dang ldan//yang ni rlung gi sa bon dang //gnyis pa yaM ni dang po dang //de ni gnyis 'gyur ldan par bya//bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa la//dbyangs
53b7(rgyud): yig gsum pa dang ldan pa//de nas me yi sa bon dang //lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang //de nas rlung gi sa bon sbyin//dang por rnam par snang mdzad sbyin//mchog gi dbang
54a1(rgyud): phyug du myur ba/lnga pa yin ga sa pa dang //gsum pa yin dang na//mangs pas lan gnyis ga par bya//'don 'jam la zhes bya ba'o//
54a2(rgyud): 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyud 'khor lo//ma he gdong can rtse sngags te//'bum bzlas pa yis las kun byed//'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste//ma byung 'byung bar/
54a3(rgyud): mI 'gyur ro//bdun pa yi nI zin pa la//dbyangs yig bzhi pa dang ldan pa//me yi sa bon 'og tu skyon//de nas mnga' bdag bcu drug mtha'//bdun pa yi/
54a4(rgyud): ni gnyis pa lnga//rabyangs lag bzhi pa dang ljon zhing //gsum pa yi na dang po la//'og tu mo yi sa bon gad bas//mnga' bdag bcu drug mtha' ma ste/
54a5(rgyud): drug pa yi ni byin pa la//dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa//dang po yi yang dang po dang //dpyas yig bdun pa dang ldan pa//'og tu mi yi sa bon sbyid
54a6(rgyud): 'di pa yi ni dang po la//dbyung pa yig ginyis pa dang ldan pa//bzhi pa yi nI lnga pa ni//mkhas pa yis ni lan gr-iny+dzis ba rjid//dang por rnam par snang mdzod sbyin
54a7(rgyud): mtshogs brgyad pa ngas borda la//dbyangs yig drug pa dang ldan la/ na thig les rgyud//lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang //gsum pa'i ni
54b1(rgyud): 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste//ma he'i gdong can sbyor ba yis//thams cad las ni byed pa'o//las kyi sngags su grags pa ste//sum 'bum bzlas na lus kun byed
54b2(rgyud): drug pa yi ni dang po dang //lnga pa yi yang lnga pa la//dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa//bzhi pa yi ni dang po ste//de yi lnga pa glad du bzhag/dang po yi ni dang po dang 'di ni//
54b3(rgyud): dang por rnam par snang mdzad sbyin//dran pa de bzhin mthar byon na//stong pa'i lha yis mnyam mnan pa//lnga pa yA ni gnyis pa dang //gsum pa yi ni dang po'o//'di ni/
54b4(rgyud): mA he gdong can gyi//snying po'i sngagasu rab tu grugs//yi ge ri re 'bum bzlas na//'jig rten gsum gyi las ni gang //ci yang rung ba thams cad byed//sngags thaH
54b5(rgyud): ba'i cho ga'i dus 'dir mchod par bya'o//'di ni 'jam dpal zhes bya ba/dpel rdo rje 'jigs byeng chen po'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las sngags btu bya bstan pa'i le'u sti gsum
54b6(rgyud): pA'o////de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bsgrub pa yang dag por bshad/sngoni thams cad la bdag med pa sngon du 'gro bas/lhar dmigs par bya ste/dang por re
54b7(rgyud): shig rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i sngags brjod pas/chos thams cad bdag med pa'i ngo bor byas nas/na mkha'i dkyil du yaM gi rnam pa las grub po'i rlung gi dkyi
55a1(rgyud): 'khor mdog dra ba'i rnam pa bsam mo//de'i steng du dang po'i dbyangs yig las gyur bISh+Ti zla bI'i dkyil 'khor dmigs te/de'i stang du d+hIHyA rnam pa lus
55a2(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i gzugs su gyur par bsam par bya'o//der a'i rnam pa las grub pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam ste/nyi ma'i dkyil 'i khor dI las 'od
55a3(rgyud): zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /rig pa'i lha mo dang /khro bo la sogs pa shin tu bskul
55a4(rgyud): te/yung 'ongs nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par rlabs mo//de nas yang 'jam dpal dang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa de rnams gcig tu gyur nas/
55a5(rgyud): ma'i dkyil 'khor du bsam par bya'o//'od zer 'bar ba'i rnan pas dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar khyab par gsal bar bya'o//de'i steng du hUM mdog nag po'i 'od zer
55a6(rgyud): lnga dang yang dag par bsam ste/hU~M de las 'od zer gyi rnam par 'phros pas/snron du gsungs pa bzhin du yang zhugs te/yi ge de las rdo rje chen po rnam par gdang
55a7(rgyud): pe kha dog nag po'i 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa rnam par dmigs par bya ste/rdo rje de las phra mo'i rnam pa sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dang /khro bo dang /
55b1(rgyud): rig pa'i lha mos na mkha' til gyis gang bu ltar gang ba nyi ma la gnas pa rnam par bsam par bya'o//de sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyis ni sems can yongs su smin par
55b2(rgyud): btul nas byang chub lnga rab tu bkod do//yang de nyid lhan cig tu bsdus nas rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan la rab tu zhugos par bas mo//rdo rje'i gzugs de nyid zhal dgu pa/ma hi'i
55b3(rgyud): gzugs can/'jig pa'i dus kyi me ltar 'bar ba/rdo rje 'jigs byeng chen po khams gsum za bar nus pa/zhal cig pa/he ha zhes ljags 'dril ba/rnam par
55b4(rgyud): gtsigs pa'i khro gnyer 'jigs pa/khro gnyer gyi 'gram nas smin mo dang spyan 'jigs pa chen po'i dus ltar drag pa/mi'i khrag dang /tshil dang /zhag dang /rkang za
55b5(rgyud): ba/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha lnga sogs pa la bsdigs mdzub byed pa/brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /khyab 'jug dang
55b6(rgyud): gnod sbyin la sogs pa zo ba/thod pa gtsigs pa'i rtse mo 'jig su rung ba'i thod pos thod byas pa/'jigs pa chen po can/paT tsos sgrogs shing thod po'i 'phyang
55b7(rgyud): 'phrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/zhabs bcu drug pa/gcer bu'i gzugs mtshan ma gyen du 'gyen du 'grang ba/g.yon brkyang ba/gsus pa che ba/skye gyen du brdzas
56a1(rgyud): pa/'jigs pa chen por byed pa/pheM ces sgra sgrogs pa/phyag sum cu rtsa bzhi dang ldan pa/glang po che'i lpags pa rlon pa 'dzin pa/dpal rdo rje 'dzin//
56a2(rgyud): byed chen po/ma he'i gdong can rnam par bsam par bya ste/de ltar shin tu bsam pa brtan par byas/de kho na nyid kyi sbyor ba la shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i sngags
56a3(rgyud): pos rtag tu bsgom par bya ste/g.yas dang po na gri gug/gnyis pa na mtshon rtse gcig pa/gsum pa na gAtun shing /bzhi pa ni chu gri/lnga pa na rdo rje rtse gcig/
56a4(rgyud): pa/drug pa na sta re/bdun pa na mdung thung /brgyad pa na mda'/dgu pa na lcags kyu/bcu pa na dbyug to//bcu gcig pa ni kha TI ge/bcu gnyis
56a5(rgyud): pa na 'khor lo//bcu gsum pa na rdo rje/bcu bzhi po na rdo rje tho ba/bco lnga pa na ral gri/bcu drug pa na tsong to'u'o//g.yon pa yi dang po na thod pa/gnyis
56a6(rgyud): pa na mgo bo//gsum pa na phub/bzhi pa na rkang pa/lnga pa ni zhags pa/drug pa na gzhu/bdun pa na sgyu ma/brgyad pa na dril bu/dgu pa na lag pa/bcu pa
56a7(rgyud): na dur khrod kyi ras/bcu gcig pa na skyes bu gsal shing la gtsugs pa/bcu gnyis pa na ma thag/bcu gsum pa na thod tshal/bcu bzhi pas sdigs
56b1(rgyud): mjug/bco lnga pa na 'phan rtse gsum pa/bcu drug pa na rlung gis byur ba'i dur khrod kyi ras/phyag gnyis kyisku glang po che'i lpags pa rlon pa 'dzin pa'o//zhabs g.yas pa
56b2(rgyud): dang pos mi/gnyis pas ma he/gsum pas glung /bzhi paso bong bu/lnga pas rnga mo/drug pas khyi/bdun pas lug/brgyad pas wa/zhabs g.yas pas
56b3(rgyud): 'di dag la zhon pa'o//zhabs g.yon pa'i dang pos bya rgod/gnyis pas 'ug pa/gsum pas bya rog/bzhi pas ne tsaM/lnga pas khra/drug pas khyud chen po//
56b4(rgyud): bdun pas re skyugs/brgyad pas bzhad/zhabs g.yon pas 'di dag mnan pa'o//dpal 'dzi khyed chen po'i dang po'i zhal ni rab tu gre nag pa ma he'i rnam pa shin tu khros pa
56b5(rgyud): can/rA g.yos kyi zhal gsum la dang po sngon po/gnyis pa dmar po/gsum pa ser po ste/mnga' bdag gi zhal gsum shin tu khros pa/rA g.yon par zhal
56b6(rgyud): gsum la dang po dkar po/gnyis pa dud ke/gsum pa nag po rab tu khros pa/gtsigs pa'i zhal rab tu bsam par bya'o//rwa gnyis kyi bar du dbus kyi zhal
56b7(rgyud): dmar po rab tu 'jigs pa/zhal nas khrag 'dzag pa bsam par bya'o//stang du 'jam dpal gyi zhal cung zad ser ba yod tsam khro ba byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/
57a1(rgyud): spyi bor ral pa lnga dang ldan pa rnam par bsams te/zhal rnams thams cad spyan gsum par sgom ste/'di ltar bdag nyid rtag tu rtsa gcig tu dmigaso//
57a2(rgyud): nyid dpal rdo rje 'jogs byed chen po ma he'i gdong can du bdag nyid yin par bsgoms nas/dpa' bo'i gnas la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas/de nas phyi nas sngags bzla bar
57a3(rgyud): bya ste/bzlas pa'i dus su rang gi snying kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams te/de'i steng du rang gi sngags kyi yi ge dgod par bya'o//'bar ba dang /phyi nas me yengs pa'i
57a4(rgyud): yid kyis bzlas pa bya'o//sbyor ba 'di la gnas pa'i sngags pa yis//rtag tu 'jigs byed las kun bya//dur khrod gnas la bsgom bya zhing //rtag tu bdud rtsi lnga
57a5(rgyud): rnams bza'o//de yis sgrub las sgrub gzhan med//gzhan yang mar mo che za zhing //mtshan mo rgyu ba'i rnal 'byor pas//sum 'bum rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas bya//
57a6(rgyud): 'di bzlos pa yi sngags pa yis//thams cad las ni byed par 'gyur//'di ni 'jam dpal 'dzom pa'i mchog/dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyud las/
57a7(rgyud): sgom po'i rtog pa ste bzhi pa'o////de nas dpal 'jigs byed chen pos bstan pa'i bris sku'i cho ga rab tu gsungs pa/dpa' bo'i ras sam/rol bkang
57b1(rgyud): pa'i ras sam/me tog can gyi ras sam/bu skyes pa'i ras sam/da ma rnyed na ras gang yang rang bya la/ri mo mkhyen bzang po rnam rtog myed pa/mi khra ba/gtsang ga
57b2(rgyud): mkhas pa/yid gzhungs pa/dad pa dang ldan po/brtse ba can/sbed pa dang bral ba/'di ltar yon tan dang ldan pa'o//de lta bu'i ri mo mkhan gyi lag pas dpa'
57b3(rgyud): bo'i ras la bri bar bya'o//gal te dngos gra ba 'dod pas dpa' bo'i yon sbyin no//de la cho ga ni gsang ba'i gnas su gnas la/shan tu mnyam par gzhag pas bri bar
57b4(rgyud): bya ste/ri mo mkhon dang sgrub pa pos mthong ba la 'jig rten pa gzhan gyis mi mthong bar bri bar bya ste/zhabs bcu drug pa/phyag sum cu rtsa bzhi pa/zhal dgu pa/gcer
57b5(rgyud): bu kha dog nag po g.yon brkyang ba/'jigs pa chen po yang 'jigs par byed pa'i rnam pa tsan/mtshan ma gyen du 'grang bar thang ka bri bar bya'o//zhal dang po ma he/rwa'i
57b6(rgyud): g.yas su zhal gsum pa ste/sngon po dang /dmar po dang /ser po shin tu khros pa bri bar bya'o//g.yon tu dkar po dang /dud ka dang /nag po'o//de gnyis kyi dbus
57b7(rgyud): su rab tu dmar ba bri bar bya'o//de'i steng du 'jam dpal gyi zhal ser po cung zad khro ba bri bar bya'o//phyag g.yas par gri gug dang /mtshon rtse gcig pa dang /gtun
58a1(rgyud): shing dang /chu gro dang /rdo rje rtswa gcig pa dang /sta re dang /mdung dang /mnga' dang /lcags kyu dang /dbyig to dang /kha T+wAM ga dang /'khor lo dang
58a2(rgyud): rdo rje dang /rdo rje tho ba dang /ral gri dang /cang te'u'o//phyag g.yon pa na thod pa dang /mgo bo dang /phub dang /rkang pa dang /zhogs pa dang /gzhu dang /rgyu ma dang
58a3(rgyud): dril bu dang /lag pa dang /dung khrod k+Shi ras dang /skyes bu gsal shing gi phug pa dang /me thab dang /zed tshil dang /sdig mdzub dang /'phan rtse gsum pa dang
58a4(rgyud): rlung gis bskyod pa'i ras so//phyag gnyis kyis glang po che'i lpags pa rlon pa 'dzin pa bri'o//zhabs g.yas pas mi dang /ma he dang /glang dang /bong bu dang /rngam
58a5(rgyud): dang /khyid do/lug dang /wa rnams so//zhabs g.yon pas bya rgod dang /'ug pa dang /bya rog dang /ne tso dang /khra dang /bya chen dang /ri skyegs dang /bzhad
58a6(rgyud): rnamaso//'di lta bur 'dug pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po bri bar bya'o//de'i 'og tu dur khrod chen po yang bri bar bya'o//'jigs pa chen po byed pa/srin po dang /zhing
58a7(rgyud): spyod bar langs dang /ldan pa skyes bu mdung rtso gtsugs pa'i gzugs de mthong bar bye'o//n+ya gro d+ha'i shing dag gi steng du skyes bu 'phyang po bri bar bya/skyes pa
58b1(rgyud): bsogs bzhin yang bri/mdung gos phug pa'i skyes bu yang bri/bya sna tshogs dang /b+hu rog dang /khyo dang /sku sbyang dang ha hA byon pa blo/sgrub pa po rnams kyang bri ste/bcom ldan 'das
58b2(rgyud): laTI cig tu lta ba gcer bu sgre bshig pa/phyog rgya lngas rgyan pa/cing te'u dang /thaMd pa dang /kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa/thod pas spyi bor rgyan pa/dgod cing dur khrod der 'jug pa bri/
58b3(rgyud): 'di ni gsang ba'i bris skye ste/gnas gcig tu legs par bzhag la/shwa chen gyis spos dbul/de'i mdun du dung chen gyi phreng bas bzlas pa bya/sngags pa mnyam par
58b4(rgyud): gzhag pas dus gsum du 'bad la bris sku srung ngo //gzhan gang yang mi bzhi go/gzhan gang gi mdun du yang mi dge mo//glug pa dang /btung ba dang /bza' ba dang /
58b5(rgyud): ston mo ni sha chen rtag tu mtshan ma bza'o//gal te mchog gi dngos grub 'dod na dus gsum du rnam par snang mdzad dang khrag gi spros bris sku'i mdun du dbulo//'di ni 'jam
58b6(rgyud): dpal 'jam pa'i mchog rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las bris sku'i cho ga'i rtog pa ste lnga pa'o///de nas sbyin sreg gi lis kyi cho ga gsungs pa/
58b7(rgyud): ji ltar sngon gyi rim pa ste/dang por re shig sngags pas pi'i gnasu phyin la/mtshan byed na sbyin sreg gi las kun byas te/gang du gsungs pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor la da
59a1(rgyud): /pa yis las thams cad bya'o//de la lngas ni 'di rnams yin//gal te bsad par 'dod na dur mi'i rus pa dang /rnam par snang mdzad dang /bong bu'i spangs dang //
59a2(rgyud): khyi'i spangs//tshar ma dang /sgra dang /sngon mo dang /de dag thams cad che ba'i mar khus sbrus la/mi he'i zhal gyi sbyor bas shin tu mnyam par gzhag la/kha sbyor
59a3(rgyud): bltas te ro bsreg pa'i mi lnga/gang gi ming dang bcas par brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs na the tshom med par de zhag gsum gyis 'chi'o//yang na phyogs gcig tu gnas la me
59a4(rgyud): thab gru gsum byas nas/der sngon du gsungs pa'i rdzas kyis gtum po'i me la sbyin sreg bya ste/sbyor ba des nI las de nyid 'grub po//de nas dpral bar 'dod na bya rog
59a5(rgyud): drang /'ug po dang /rma bya dang /sbrul dang /sgra dang /'bras phub dang /mA hau dang /rti'i shA dwang /lhan cig tu gang gri ming dang bcas par yo ge bcu pa'i sngags
59a6(rgyud): kyis dur khrod kyi me la besregs na des 'bral bar 'gyuraro//yang na dur khrod kyi shing lA gtum po'i me rab tu sbar la/khyim du gnas te/gong gi rdzas de besregs na
59a7(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu yang nyi ma bdun gyis 'dra'o//de nas bskrad para'i 'dod na bya rog gi shaM dang /rnga mo'i rtug pa dang /lhan cig tu chang dang yang dge bar ldan pa
59b1(rgyud): rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su/dur khrod kyi shing la mu rab tu sbar la/gcer bu skra bshig pur bsgyur nas/kha lho phyogasu bltas te/gshin rje'i sngags kyis tshe
59b2(rgyud): ge mo'i ming dang bcas par lag pa g.yon pas sbyin sreg stong byas na/skrod pa las gzhan du ma yino//de nas rangs par 'dod na/bla blo dang /yung ba dang /ldong ros
59b3(rgyud): dang /gri wang dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la kha byang du bltas te las kyi rje su 'brang ba'i sbyor ba dmigs nas/gang gi ming dang bcos par sbyin sreg byas
59b4(rgyud): na//de nyi ma bdun gyis rengs par 'gyuraro//de nas grong bskrad 'dod na/nom pa'i shing la me rab tu sbyar la/khyi'i sha dang /sbal pa'i sha dang /khyim bya'i shaM dang /
59b5(rgyud): rnga mo'i rtug pa dang /byi la'i khrag cig tu sbrus la/gshin rje'i sbyor ba la gnas pas/grong gi ming dang btsos par yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis rlung gi dkyil 'khor
59b6(rgyud): gyi dbus su sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu byas ni grong skrod par 'gyur//las de rnams ni shin tu yang mnyam par gzhag pas bya ste/gzhan du na sngags pa rang nyid lnga
59b7(rgyud): 'bab par 'gyu ro//gzhan gang la yang mi bstan no//de nas zhi bar bya bar 'dod na mar dang /sbrang rtsi dang /'o ma dang /dur ba dang /bcas par/pa la sha'i
60a1(rgyud): shong la mo rab tu sbar na zhi bar 'dod par dmigs nas yul gyi shar phyogs su kha bltas te gnas pas dus gsum du sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na ngas
60a2(rgyud): yul zhi bar byas par 'gyuraro//de nas rgyas par 'dod na til dang /'bras dang /nos dang /mar dang bcas pas u dum pa re'i zheng la me rab tu sbyar na las kyi rjes su
60a3(rgyud): dang bI lha'i sbyor ba dmigs te/kha byang du bltas nas mnyam pas yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis dus gsum du sbyin sreg stong byas na rgyas par 'gyur ro//de nas dgug
60a4(rgyud): par 'dod na ske tshe gzugs brnyan byas la de nas seng ldeng gi me'i dbus su gshin rje'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs na ma grub pa yang 'grub par 'gyuraro//nyem
60a5(rgyud): bdun gyis gang 'dod pa the tshom med par 'gug so//de nas skyo bar bya bar 'dod na/bye rgod chen po'i tshang dang /sha chen bsregs na skyo bar 'gyuraro//de phub ma
60a6(rgyud): me la bsregs na bde leg su 'gyuraro//de nas nor nor ma yin par bya bar 'dod na/r-is bal gyi me lu d+h+ya du ra'i 'bras bu dang bcas par mtshan mo yi ge bcu pa'i
60a7(rgyud): sngags brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na shin tu chud zos par 'gyur//a ru ra bsregs na slar rdzas de nyid du 'gyuraro//rje btsun gyi mdun du sha chen chang dang bcas
60b1(rgyud): zla nga drug tu mtshan mo sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyang byas na yul thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyuraro//ba ljang ga sha drang khrag tu bcas par gang gro ming dang bcas par smin sreg stong byas
60b2(rgyud): nide ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bran du gnas par the tshom med do//khyi sha rdo rje chu dang bcas par skyes pa'i bdag nyid kyis mtshan mo gang gi ming dang bcas pa sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad
60b3(rgyud): byas ni bdag nyid kyis nor dang bcas par dbang du 'gyu ro//rta'i sha rnam par snang mdzad dang bcas pa gshin rje gshed kyi sngags kyis sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad gnas gcig
60b4(rgyud): tu gnas la/mtshan mo rgyal po lnga dmigs nas byas na zhag bdun gyis 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur//glang po'i sha khu ba dang bcas pas me'i 'jig rten kun la/
60b5(rgyud): demigs la yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis mtshan mo sbyin sreg stong byas na zhag bdun gyis dbang du 'gyuraro//nywa dang she dang chang dang bcas pas 'jigs pa med par yi ge
60b6(rgyud): bcu pa'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na bud med thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro//de nas bskrad par 'dod na/bya rog gri sha ma 'dres par yi ge bcu pa'i sngags
60b7(rgyud): kyis gang gi ming dang bcos par sbyin sreg stong byas na/nyi ma bdun gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu yang rab tu 'bros ni/phra mo'i mi lta ci smos//de nas bya rog gi tsheng de /
61a1(rgyud): 'bras kyi phub ma dang lhan cig tu d+hA d+hA ra'aM shing la mo rab tu sbyar nus/yo ga bcu pa'i sngags gang gi mying dang bcas par nA mra phyud na sbyin sreg byas na/
61a2(rgyud): bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur//de nas dbang du bye bar 'dod na sreng ldeng gi me lA ti lA dang /'bras dang /bud med kyi me tog dang lhan cig tu rdo rje'i chu dang bsres te/rna
61a3(rgyud): gyi gzugs dmar po dmigs nas kha nub tu bltas te/yi ge bcu pa gang gi ming dang bcas par sngags pas bsregs na/nyi ma bdun gyis dbang du 'dus te/de ji
61a4(rgyud): sresrid 'tshe ba'i byar du mi 'dra'o//de nas 'gugs par 'dod na bdud rtsi mar dang bcas par seng ldeng gi me la gang gi ming dang bcas par sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas ni de
61a5(rgyud): skad cig gis 'ong bar 'gyur//las 'di rnams ni sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa'i sngags pas bya'o//gzhan pas byas na sngags pa 'jig rten pas dpyas par 'gyuraro//ji
61a6(rgyud): ltar bye brag mi bya ste/gleng la yang bye brag sbyin par mi bya'i//bye brag phye nas sngags pas dngos grub mi 'grub pa/des rgyud gzhan lus kyang bshad/ji ltar bye
61a7(rgyud): brag ma skyes po//de bzhin bya ba'i bye brag smros//rdo rje sems dpas kyang mi 'grub//gang gi mdun du'ang sngags pa yis//de phyir las rnams mthong mi bya//
61b1(rgyud): gzhan dang lhan cig tu mi bya//gal te sngags pas lngas bya 'dod//de dag cig pu zhig gis bya//sngags pa de yis las kun byed//'di ni 'jam dpal 'jam pa'i mchog
61b2(rgyud): rdo rje 'jig byed kyi rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las sbyin sreg gi los kyi cho ga rgya che ba'i rtog pa ste drug po'o////de nas bsam gtan gyi las kyi cho ga ji lta bu yang dag par
61b3(rgyud): gsungs te/bsam gautan dang sngags kyi rab tu sbyor ba las dgos pa thams cad rab tu bsgrub par bya ste/de'i cho ga'i dang por re shig rnal 'byor pa ma he'i gdong pa'i sbyor ba
61b4(rgyud): la gnas pa'i sngon du sbyang ba byas pas las thams cad bya'o//re pha las yongs su gyur pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal bar 'bar bar rnam par bsams la/
61b5(rgyud): steng du bsgrub bya ge tsi re bu skra shig pa/bred par gyur pa bdag gi mdun du rnam par byas mo//de nas rang gi lus las khro bo'i gzugs mang po rnam par smos te/khro bo
61b6(rgyud): de rnams kyis rol gris btab cing khrag 'thungs par bsam par bya'o//bsgrub bya de'i sha za ba dang /rgyu ma drangs par bsam par bya'o//'di skad smra bar bya ste/dkon
61b7(rgyud): mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dang /bla ma la bskur pa 'debs pa la rgyob shig rgyob shig/song shig song shig bsams pa tsam gyis rdo rje 'dzin po yang zhag
62a1(rgyud): bdun gyis 'chin phra myo srog chu gus gzhan lta ci smos/de nas gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba 'byung ni ma he'i gdong pa'i sbyor ba gsung ba
62a2(rgyud): gnas te las thams cad bsgrub par bya'o//me'i dkyil 'khor gyis dbus su bsgrub bya ngu bar bsams la/de'i mdun du srin po mang po bsam par bya ste/srin po de
62a3(rgyud): ngag tha dad pa'i lus can ma rungs pa/shin tu gtum par sha za ba dang /khrag 'thung bar rnam par bsam par bya'o//gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya rnams
62a4(rgyud): te/bya rgad dang /bya rog dang /'ug pa dang /waM rnams dang /khyi rnams kyis sha za ba dang /khrag 'thung por rnam par bsam par bya ste/bsam gtan 'di'i
62a5(rgyud): rab tu sbyor bas the tshomo med par 'chi'o//dpag tshad brgyan gnas pa'i skyes bu yang sems kyis bzung bas bsam gtan brtsa mo//sngags pas bsam gtan brtan
62a6(rgyud): par bya'o//de nas 'bral bar 'dod na ma he'i snying kar bsgrub bya bsam par bya ste/bsgrub bya gzhan rta'i snying kar rnam par bsam par bya'o//rta dang ma he gnyis
62a7(rgyud): phan tshun 'thab par byed par bsam ste/ji srid du rta dang mau ha gnyis skye bar ma gyur gyi bar du'o//phyi nas bsgrub bya de gnyis rab tu mi mdza' bar bsam par bya ste/
62b1(rgyud): mas pa snom+b+ha tsam snyam bdunaHsna myur 'thab pa d+hu hA/kunan du ma ran//don su bslad pur 'od nod du yol su yo mu m+bAr shA rnam pasam par byas/
62b2(rgyud): deri rgyu ba du yi ge rnam pa lus gyur pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor TI ba phyed ba'i rnam par bsam pa na'o//de'i steng du ba ba~M byA gan+d+her dzA sgri TI shig pa phrad par gyur par bsus
62b3(rgyud): par bye ste/ma he'i gdong can gyi sbyar bu la gnas pas de'i rgyob tu gAshin rje'i gzugs log pa g.yas pas dbyug pa 'dzin pa sgra bsilnga ba rnam par bsam par byeste/
62b4(rgyud): rnga mo de khA lhor bskrun lta btang //de'i ming dang bcas par gshin rje'i sngags brjod pas rnam par bsam par bya'o//rnal 'byor bas 'di bsnams pa tsam gyis zhog
62b5(rgyud): bdun na 'di ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa yang skrod par 'gyur//gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba ni bya rog gam/bya rgod kyi rgyub tu bsgrub bya skra grol ba gcer bu rnam par
62b6(rgyud): bsam mo//de'i rgyub tu gshin rje rnam par byasam par bya ste/lag pa thob thogs po bsgrub po'i sku gzung bdo ma he'i glidang can gyis bka'e bsgo ste/
62b7(rgyud): bsdus nas song bar bos ma par bya ste/rtse gcig pa'i sbyor ba bsam par byas na/rtse gcig pa'i sbyor ba dis zhag bdun gyis spyod bar 'gyur ro//de nas 'dzugs
63a1(rgyud): par byed par 'dod na yi ge yau las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor//de'i steng du sa las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/de'i steng du gshin rje'i gzugs lha/
63a2(rgyud): kyu dang zhags pa lag tu thogs pa rnam par bsam mo//ma hai'i gdong ba'i rnal 'byor la gnas pas de la bka' bsgo//gshin rje song la yul che ge mo nas bu mo che
63a3(rgyud): ge mo myur bar khug cig/de skad bskul bas yi gi rnam par bskyod de song bar rnam par bsam par bya'o//bsam gtan 'di'i rab tu sbyor ba la gnas pa'i sngags
63a4(rgyud): pas khams gsum du gtogs pa'i bud med bkug la rol bar bya'o//ji ltar bsam gtan brtan par gyur na 'di'i rab tu sbyor ba de dag bya'i gzhan gyis mi bya'o//
63a5(rgyud): de nas sbrul gyis zin pa blang ba'i rab tu byed pa gsungs te/rang gi snying kar pad+ma dkar po mdab ma brgyad pa rnam par bas ma mo//de'i stong du dbyangs yig gsum pa
63a6(rgyud): mdab me brgyad pa rnam par byasam mo//de yis ni 'og gi klu'i gzugs rnam par bsam par bya ste/de'i spyi bor yi ge i kha dog dkar po las bdud rtsi 'jig pa
63a7(rgyud): bsam par bya'o//klu de'i mig rnams nas bdud rtsi 'phros nas bsgrub bya de'i lus la thim par bsam par bya ste/bsam gtan 'di'i sbyor bas khams gsum
63b1(rgyud): yongs su grang ba'i dug kyang med par 'gyuraro//drug khur stong yang za nus so//de nas zhu ba'i bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba 'byung ste/bsgrub bya mdun du bsam ste/dri'i
63b2(rgyud): rlung pa gnyis la yi ge yaM las gyur rI rlung gi dkyil 'byor bsam par bya/de'i steng du gus bya ba'i gnas su ma'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum kha dog dmar po raM gyis byin
63b3(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa bsam par bya'o//de'i sbyong du snying kar sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa mdog ser po lam gyis byin gyis brlabs pa bsam par bya'o//de'i steng du po
63b4(rgyud): bu'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam par bya'o//de'i dbus su yi ge ba mgo thur du gnas pa las bdud rtsi 'dzag par byasam ste/'di ni legs par rnam par bsams nas rlung
63b5(rgyud): gis me rab tu sbar te/me des dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bsregs par rnam par bsam/dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi drod kyi bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor de zhu bar bsam par bya'o//
63b6(rgyud): 'di'i sbyor ba tsam gyis ni//de yi bud med zhu 'gyur te//'o ma yi ni shing bzhin du//zhu bar byed par the tshom med//de nas rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i blon pa dbang du bya ba
63b7(rgyud): 'dod na sngags pa ma he'i gdong can gyis rnal 'byor la rab tu gnas la/de nyid mdog dmar por bsams te/bsgrub bya gang du gnas pa de'i steng du gnas la/phyi nas rangag
64a1(rgyud): lus 'jam dpal mdog dmar po phyag na lcags kyu dang zhags pa can phyung ste/'jam dpal des bsgrub bya'i snying ka dang mgrin pa bcings nas bkug par bsam/
64a2(rgyud): ste/'jam dpal gyi sku la rab tu gzhug go/bsgrub bya de mos par bsam par bya ste/de'i snying kar yi ge bcu pa'i sngags rnam par bsam par bya'o//yang kha dog dam
64a3(rgyud): po sgrub pa pos ye shes kyi gzugs kyis yi ge la gzhug par bya'o//de dang bsgrub bya gcig tu gyur par bya'o//bsam gtan 'dri'i rab tu sbyor bas nyi ma bdun gyis 'khor
64a4(rgyud): los bsgyur ba yang dbang du 'gyur te//ji srid mtsho'i bar du the tshom medo//rab tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i sngags pas mi g.yo ba'i bsam gtan gyis bya'o//rgyud gang
64a5(rgyud): la yang mau sbyin no//gral te sngags kyang mi bstan/dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ma he'i gdong can gyi bsam gtan gang la yang mi sbyin/smra bar yang mi bya/sngags
64a6(rgyud): kyi dbye ba yang mi bya/bris sku yang gang gi mdun du yang mi bkram ste/thang kau yang gsang bar gzhag go/rgyud 'di rab tu sbyor ba dang /bzlas pa dang /smra ba gzhan su la yang
64a7(rgyud): 'ga' tsam yang mi sgra gal te smras na dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed dang /gzhan yang rnal 'byor ma rnams dang /mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis za'o//dam tshig nyams par 'gyur
64b1(rgyud): bsdu/de'i phyir sngags pas su la yang mi sbyin//de nas dam tshig mnyam pa dang /rnam+b+ha bur rtog pa med pa dang /dam pa'i brtul zhugs can dpa' bo bla ma la gus bdul ba can/
64b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshogs pa'i bstan pa la nges par 'dzin pa/rgyud sbasdu pa/mi khro ba/snying rje dang ldan pa/bzlas pa dang /bsam gtan la phyogs pa/rnam par smin pa la 'dzem
64b3(rgyud): pa/'di lta bu'i ston khyad par can ni slob ma bzang po ste/dkyil 'khor dam pa dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po la mchog tu gus pa/snying rje chen pos yid brlan pa/rnam
64b4(rgyud): par rtog pa med pa/mtshig tu bla ma la gus pa rab tu brtag pa la shin tu rnam par bsams te/bla mos de lta bu'i slob ma la dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyud sbyin no//
64b5(rgyud): sngags pas gzhan la byin na de dang slob mar bcas nas dmyal bar 'gro bar the tshom medo//'jig rten 'dir ni 'jigs pa chen por 'gyuraro//'jig rten pha rol tu ni dmyal bar
64b6(rgyud): 'gro'o//dam tshig kyang nyams par 'gyuraro//'di ni 'dzom dpal 'jam pa'i mchog dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis rgyud las bsam gtan gyi las bsgrub pa'i
64b7(rgyud): brtag pa ste bdun pa'o////dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor lo'i rgyud 'bum pa nas btus nas phyung po rtog pa'i phyogs bklags pas 'grub pa/dpal
65a1(rgyud): /rdo rje jig chen pomA hA'i gdo can dngos gyub 'grub paSh+Tid+h+r-ig+h+ra paT+wA~Mgas+ho///dngul Ar+yAn g+ho gnas tshon po nas dpal 'dzum dngul gyi rgyud la/
65a2(rgyud): byu ba d+hA d+hA/ma na rje 'dzugs da rkyen pa'i skye zlum dmi sher kyi mye/hrI pan smra snron dang mi la~Mt+ta ng+ges gyon nis med pa gso/
65a3(rgyud): rgyug gyi paN+Di tA mchog gi dngos skye ba'i sa pa d+hi ro phyag rdum g+ho zhal snga nas dang /da kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rdo rje grags kyi bsgyur ba'i//bcom ldan 'dasu
65a4(rgyud): gau shin rjegashid la phyagalo//don dam chos sgra zhi ba nyid//gang 'dir khams gsum rnam rgyal te//gshin rje dgra zhes grags pa yi//'khor mo
65a5(rgyud): bskod pa'i chog bshad//yon tan ldan+da phyi'i sngags pa yis//cho ga bzhin du mnyes par bya//dur khrod dben pa la sogs par//dkyil 'khor khro che du \u0f7f//dri
65a6(rgyud): dang 'i khyirnam sa dang //nyi rnamags pa b+h+yod+mo //babyung la sogs dan//gnon yang tshigs kyi 'kho sa dang //byin byed pa'i bye drug gis/
65a7(rgyud): pang mchod pa byes nas ni//khor la bro dang btu bdang //drang ba dang ni sra ba rtsams//sngags pa rnal 'byor ldan pa sa//m+b+hi oM phyog sul bstam te//
65b1(rgyud): /ud na pa na/A dz+ra sam+b+ha rmAT+Ta//gsang sngags na u da na//'khor mo zla ba ma p+tA g+h+ra//dngas nas so nA d+hA ban+d+ha glu par//kun nas rnam ngas
65b2(rgyud): /na//'dren rlung gi dkyil 'khor//rim pa gsum du bskor ba 'o//nad skyugs mkhar bcu drug b+h+yo//'di na ga shin rje'i grong khyor tAM//snyid po gsum gyis
65b3(rgyud): //de la khye ma mu khyud gasmam//kun tu lhags ris b+he/ra bste//mu khyud de dag rer yang //khong pa sum cu gnyis dang ldan//dgro ba'i rjes bzhin gos du pA ni//
65b4(rgyud): 'khor mo 'di ltar dris nas ni//phyi rol mu khyud tha ma la//yi ge ka sogs de yig mthar//da nya bsal nas dgod par bya//yi ge d+hA sogs k+Sha yig mthar//de
65b5(rgyud): rje su bri bar bya//mu khyud dbus mo dag la ni//dbyangs yig bcu gnyis nyis 'gyur dgod//btu dang dgod sogs rtsom pa na//mtshan ma 'di dag shes par bya//zla ba
65b6(rgyud): mrig dang yon tan dang //reg byed mnga' dang dbang po dang //rgya mtshobakr-i shrIs gza' dang phyogs//dregs pa nyi ma yan lag sogs//tshes zhes bya bar rab tu grags//
65b7(rgyud): phyi rol mu khyud tha ma la//shar gyi tshangs thig nas brtsams naso//rim min gza' can khang pa nas//yi ge bkra shis tsam blangs te//nang gi ngos kyi mu khyud kyi/
66a1(rgyud): rmongs thog/ge ni dris dag la//phyogs bzhir dmig du b+h+yang+ga/rim min phyogs can khang pa nus//yi ge dmag go chad thA sa te///shar du
66a2(rgyud): de'i g.yas gAyan bzhag/rim min bkra shris khang pa nas//dbyangs yi go gnyis pa can blangs nas//mig gi chud du byas nas ni//de yi ngos la re re gzhag
66a3(rgyud): nub kyi tshangs thig nus grangs pa'i//rgya mtsho can gyi khang pa nas//dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa ldan pa//mig gi che du blangs nas ni//lho'i ngos su de bzhin/
66a4(rgyud): sbyi/nub nus rim pa min pa'o//zlo ba can gyi khyim nas ni//dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa ldan pa//mig gi cha du blangs nas ni//lho ngas de rjes sbyin par bya//
66a5(rgyud): de nyid dbyangs yig gsal ba ni//mig gri tsha du blangs nus kyang //sngon sbyin nub kyi ngosu sbyin//nub nas bkra shis khang pa nas//dbyangs yi ge btso gsum pa
66a6(rgyud): lhun po//mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni//nub kyi ngos su de bzhi ni sbyin//byang nas bkra shis khang pa nas//dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa ldan pa//mig
66a7(rgyud): gi ched du blangs nas ni//byang gi ngos la de bzhin sbyin//rlung gi sa bon zhes bya ba//mig gi tshad blangs de bzhin sbyin//mda' can khang po na gnas pa'i//
66b1(rgyud): kug na smra na na na dus//rdzun rgyu ldan tu tu/rgya ma /rnam na na
66b2(rgyud): shar mtsham su ri ri sbyin//rgya mtsho'i khang pa la gnas pa//dbyangs yig gnyis pa ldan pa dge/rim min yon tan khridang pa nas//zla ba'i ched du blangs nas ni/
66b3(rgyud): sgyu mtshams su de bzhin sbyin/ri mu mi nu bAk+ka shes khang pa naso//dbyangs yig lnga pa ldan pa dag/yan lag can gyi khang pa nas//zla ba'i ched du blangs nas ni/
66b4(rgyud): nub mtsham su de bzhin sbyin//rim min chos can khang pa nas//dbyings sreg gsum pa ldan pa dang //rim mon bkra shrIs khang pa nas//zla bo'i ched du blangs
66b5(rgyud): nas ni//byang shar mtshoms su de bzhin sbyin//de ltar dgod par byas nas ni//dri nas drang ba brnam par bya//dam tshig rjesu dran byed cing //rdo rje shugs dang
66b6(rgyud): ldan pa yi//shar gyi tshangs thig ngos gnyis nas//yi ge zung ldan pa sa nas ni//dbus kyi khang par gzhag par//phyogs gzhan chings thig ngos dag
66b7(rgyud): na//de bzhin zung ldan drangs nas ni//de bzhin dbus kyi khang par bzhag/de nas shar gyi yi ger yang //rim pa gnyis po'i khang por grangs/phyogs gzhan du
67a1(rgyud): yod do bzhin no//shar gyi zung rdzun gsum pA yang //rim pa gsum pASh+Ti khang par dang //phyogs gzhan du yang de bzhin no//mAtshams kyi yi ge ya bral 'dis//rang
67a2(rgyud): rang gi ni mtshams su dra sta//de drug byung ba'i khong sbyang du//dbyangs kyi yi ge drang byer bya//dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi la ni//ming gi yi ge dang bar bya//sngo sI'i la skye dang
67a3(rgyud): 'thun pa yi//bskul ba'i yi ge dgod par bya//bsrid dang bslad dang bye ba la//yi ge phaT ni bzhag par bya//mnan pa la yang yi ge la me//zhi ba lnga ni yi ge oM/
67a4(rgyud): rgyas pa de bzhin yi ge sku//dbang la baM gyis brgyan pa ste//dgug pa lo ni yi ge //de la lus kyi 'od zong ni//zhibachus rgyus pas//da'ang ni nade ste dran po ni
67a5(rgyud): dbye dgug bskrad pa dpung dang 'thun//mnan pa dag ni rgyas pa bzhin//drang ba'i sbyor ba byas nas ni//sre ba'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya//gnyis med sngagos dang ldan pa yang
67a6(rgyud): dbus kyi bAtA shis yi ge yang //rlu ltar 'od kyi gong bur bya//sngags kyi rgyal po ba nu ba yong //'od kyi gong bu de nang du//'dod po'i bsgrub bya bzhan drir bya//de dkyil
67a7(rgyud): rang ming dang por bzhag/phyogs kyi khyim na gnas pa yi//yi gzung ma thams cad dang //de tshe 'od kyi gong bur blta//sngags kyi rgyal po bcu pa yang //bcu gnyis
67b1(rgyud): khyim du sgrol toblo//byon rlob b+h+yo zhes bya ba yang //ljang pa rol zur sna paH//yongs su dag pa dgod byas nas//mchod dang gtor ma byas nas no//spro bya dag ni brtsam par
67b2(rgyud): bye du las kyi sh+ya ba dzaM lta bar//'khor lo las ni blang bya ste//zhi ba dang ni rgyus pa la//shin tu rgyas pa'i ras la bya//dbang dang dgug la smad 'tshang sogs//
67b3(rgyud): dodang bye dang bskud po dang //mnan pa la ni dur khrod ras//gI wang gur gum zhi ba rgyus//dbang dang dgug lA ts+tshan dun dmor//mnan pa la ni sdong ris sogs//bskrad la bya
67b4(rgyud): rog khrag gis te//dbye ba rta dang ma he sogs//bsad la dug la sogs pas bri//dge ba'i las la bzang po'i shing //dge min la ni rus pa dang //lcags la sogs pas
67b5(rgyud): bra bar bya//zhi lA shwar po lta dbang la nug/rgyas la byang ste drag po lho//gzhan ni ci rigs sbyar bar bya//zhi rgyas dbang dang dgug pa la//sa bskor rim bzhin dgod par bya//
67b6(rgyud): gan mo bskor dag ni rim par bzlog/bsad bskrad de bye ba mnan pa la//sa bskor rims las bzlog pa ste//gonam bskor dgi ni rim bzhin bri//de ltar legs par mAM kris
67b7(rgyud): na//'khor lo rang la ldog par 'gyur//de bso nan tan bskyed de bya//ras kyi 'khor lo legs zin nas//dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor te//ras kyi 'cho
68a1(rgyud): ladun te/d+hAd+d+ha zla'i myur ba y-is/dkyil lo 'kho po bar+N+Na ba sh+tsa//ram kyi 'khor lo mchod na //bdon pa'i spyan sa
68a2(rgyud): dmigs par bya//rdo ltar gsu mya pa'i cho ga bzhin//'khor lo sgrub byas nas ni//gsang stegaso bzlasmra ba pa rnam par bya//oM badz+ras ma ya s+t+wa~M/dom tshig gi
68a3(rgyud): skyugs so//oM badz+ra ba~M ga/rdo rje shugs kyi sngags so//oM badz+rA mA sa me d+hi sa me mahA sa ma l+ye yi ge bsre pa'i sngog so//oM badz+ra sa mAdze/'a
68a4(rgyud): skye ba'i sdug so//oM brje sa me yi yA ma nA d+hIs do m+b+ha ya//yam+b+ha do ru NAsmr-id la/yang ma yen+te ya/k+She yan+te ni rnam smra na/de nirtsa'i sku
68a5(rgyud): ti/las thams cad pa'o//shA n+ti ku ru s+yAt+t+ra/zhi bar bskul ba'o//praSh+Ti ku ru swAd+hA/rgyus pa'o//byA shaM ku ru smiH/dbang gi'o//mA ra ya phaT bsad pa'i
68a6(rgyud): ur+thA T+Ta ya k+ShuH/bskrad pa'i/b+h+yo b+h+r-i ya d+h+waM laM/mnon pa yI'o//IM kaiR+ShA yAM h+nidzadzaM dgug pa yi'o//oM mr-i ng+ku ra dgrol ba'i sdug so//U 'i
69a1(rgyud): lho bskor//drug pa bskum gnyen rtse gcig bya//bdun pa las kyi lhag chad bskang //grangs kyi las la khyad par du//las kyi gtsor ni gang sgrub de'i//
69a2(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor ba nyi ma bzhi//las kyi bye brag 'di shes na//zhi bas 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob//rgyas pa ston drug dang 'byor//dbang gi mos pa rnam bzhir bsgyur//
69a3(rgyud): dbye bas gsang sde brgyad dang 'byed//mnan pas dbang po drug 'ching byed//gzhan yang ji lta de bzhin du//sngags dang rdzas kyi sbyor ba la//dpyad na dngos grub mi
69a4(rgyud): 'grub ste//gal te yid gnyis za gyur tam//bsam pa 'gyur rom dad pa nyams//de tshe dngos grub nye ba yang //phyir dezlog 'gyur bar gdon mi za//dad pa
69a5(rgyud): brtan par bsgrubs pas na//nam mkha' med par gyur na yang //sngags kyi dngos grub med mi srid//lha dang drang srong gis bshad pa'i//rigs sngags bslu ba mi
69a6(rgyud): skyed na//'dod chags bral bas bshad pa yi//gsang sngags sbyor bas bslu ba ni//ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro//chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i//
69a7(rgyud): don la the tshom med pa yi//mkhas pa la ni dngos grub nye//rtog cing dpyod pa'i rtog ge ba//de la sgrub pa'i dngos grub ring //man ngag dam pa brtan byas kyang //
