69b1(rgyud): slob ma yid gnyis za gyur na//de la dngos grub ring bar bshad//bla mA man ngag smras byas kyang //slob ma yang gnyis mo bzhing //bla mo'o man ngag dam pa zhes//gratsos smras/
69b2(rgyud): byas na 'grub par nges//de yi phyir na sngags pa yis//rang gi yid gnyis spang ba'i phyir//bla ma mnyes par bya ba gtses//bsnyen bkur byas pas nus mthu che//gsang
69b3(rgyud): sti brjod pas bar chad med//yon tan phul ba byas pas ni//rang sems rin chen rnam gnyis 'gyur//rin tshon gnyis las grub par 'byung //dkon par gyur na sngags
69b4(rgyud): pa brjod//bsngags na yon tan 'byung 'gyur te//bsngags pa dag ni ma byas na//ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu yang //gang gis bsngags pa ma byas na//de la 'dod don
69b5(rgyud): mi ste ro//dad pa sangs rgyas dad pa chos//dad pa dge 'dun dad pa ma//dad pa bla ma dad pa pha//dad pa lam chen dad pa gru//dad pa yid bzhin nor bu ste//dad pa
69b6(rgyud): gsang sngags dngos grub nyid/rgyu dad pa bsod nams nor yin te//de yi phyir nA sngags pa yis//rang sems dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir//gzhan la gus pa mtshig tu
69b7(rgyud): bkur//rdzogs s+ho///s+yAde nas gzhan yang bshad bya bo//sngags pas rtag tu brtan pa ni//ru spol 'o ma zhes bya ba//de bzhin 'od kyi lo ma dang //
70a1(rgyud): rgyu'am pa ma pa nyid du//de kon mo ma khru ba dang //sgyu smonan myo na dang //'o tu byud nano//rlung sngonan gyis nan patsug
70a2(rgyud): gas sbyin sman/sa kyi rnam smin sgyos ge na pa ma lan/de phyi/glu na du /chos ni ga shad du ni/
70a3(rgyud): nga ba kyi//zhag ga sam rnams ra ba snang /oM mA dang pa ga ma'i rgyu gus btu//'jim pa rnam pa spyad nas ni//
70a4(rgyud): nas ni meng gas pa nas// me m+b+ha /rjegs pas stug hU~M/
70b1(rgyud): tId+d+hod+d+he b+hU nAn rdzas//nAm gyi dus la sngags pas blang //cha gsum snod du zhag gsum bzhag/kha yi che ni byugs pa ste//dbus mA'i cha ni bdud rtsi nyid//rna
70b2(rgyud): ni dong ba ste/'di rnams so sor brten pa na//tha mal 'bras bu gsum g+ni b+h+yo//byi lo'i slar tshad de dang sbyar//ma sbya na lar nyes pa med//tshogs par brten nas byA
70b3(rgyud): bar bya//re re stan yid nyes pa med//dam rdzas rmad du bsgyur te brtun pa'i cho ga rdzog so///nad med rnams kyi byang chub grub rtags bshad pa'o////dbul rdo rje
70b4(rgyud): 'jigs byed la phyag 'tsha'o//de nas yang dge bshad bya ba//bcom ldan nyid kyi sku gsung thugs//rdo rje rnams las byung ba yaM//rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yi//lho phyogs rtse
70b5(rgyud): mtsho pha bskol nas//de na gshin+da rje'i grong khyer ni//ga la ba yi gnas su byon//mi bzad zhabs ni bcu drug gis//lcags mkhar sgo med bcu drug brdzis//ye shes
70b6(rgyud): gcig mtshan ma yis//dbus kyi lcags mkhar chen po brdzis//de tshe bdud chen las rgyad nas//ha hi hi hi sgra sgrogs pas//chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa//gzir bzhin du
70b7(rgyud): ni ra smras pa//dpa' bo chen po ga la ci//dpa' bo'i dgongs pa bdag gis bgyi//bdag cag brog gi snying po rnams//tshul bzhin 'bul gyis dpa' bo bezhes//lha mo
71a1(rgyud): yin sde brgyad kyi srog gi yang snying phul ba ni/gshin rjes lha phul ma mo snya ma//sbyin pom+WA rA phul gnod sbyin k+She/mi yis na phul sa bdug sa//btsun gyis ci
71a2(rgyud): bul bdud kyi da//de rnams cig tu dral ba ni//bran du yang ni khas blangs//gtan tshigs chen po de yi phyir//ye shes lha yi dgongs pa dang //bsnyen pa nyams 'og rab chung //
71a3(rgyud): nas//lha yi bsnyen pa rab chud nas//sngon gyi thugs dam las mi 'da'//mi 'grub pa ni mi srid do//ya ma rA dza sa do med ya//ya me dro ru Na ya da ya//ya da ro ni ra yak+Sha
71a4(rgyud): yA/yak+Sha yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/hUM hUM phaT phaT/de skad smras pa dang /rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yis//chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa//gshin rje pho nya la sogs kun//rlo la/
71a5(rgyud): ba'i ging du byin gyis brlabs//me dang sring mo bu mo dang //'khor bcas kun la bka' bsgo ba//lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la//nga yi bstan pa 'byung ba'i tshe//rnal 'byor
71a6(rgyud): rigs 'dzin ldan pa la//bka' bsgo'i las rnams tshul bzhin gyis//zhes pas dam bcas pa dang /mnan bzhin du mna' boraro//gtam brgyad kyi rtog pa rdzogs
71a7(rgyud): s+ho////rgya gar skad du/shrI rak+Sha ya mA ri tan+ta rA dza nA ma/bod skad du/dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/dpal gshin rje gshed
71b1(rgyud): dmar po la phyag 'tsha lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsang dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhun
71b2(rgyud): so//der bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung thugs kyi snying po gsang ba las shin tu gsang ba'i mchog/e ma ho//phyag
71b3(rgyud): na rdo rje ldegaso legaso//snying rje chen po byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje/zhe sdang rdo rje/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying po gshin rje gshed dmar po'i
71b4(rgyud): sku nyon cig/phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/de shin rje 'joms pa po rnams ji snyed lpags pa 'di bshad du gsol//gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang //phra ma rdo rje
71b5(rgyud): gshin rje gshed dang ///'dod chags rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang /phrag dog rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang /zhes pa ste/rdo rje tsartsi ka dang /rdo rje phag mo dang /rdo rje dbya/
71b6(rgyud): can ma dang /rdo rje gau ri'i yang ngo //zur du bum pa bzhi rnamaso//de ltar rab tu bskor ba'i gshin rje gshed kyi tshogs chen po rnamaso//de nas nges par bcom ldan 'das
71b7(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje/rdo rje sems dpa'/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bos par gyur to//de nas nges par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
72a1(rgyud): kyi mnga' bdag/bdud thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gcig nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams la nges par phyung bar gyur to//
72a2(rgyud): sngags kyis dgug drung dbang chen dang //de bzhin nus pa rnam mang po//ral gri sgrub thabs rgyal srid dang //pha rol snga ni rnam 'joms dang //mi snang mig sman bcud de nyid
72a3(rgyud): dang /nges par grib la 'phrog par mkhas//ro langs gnod sbyin sgrub pa dang //sbrul dang gdug pa'i tshogs srung drang //sbyin sreg dkyila'i khor las rnams dang
72a4(rgyud): byang chub sems ni rnam spyod dang //nyer mkho thams cad spyod pa dang //pha rol grong du rab 'jug pa'o//'od zer lnga ni mnyam 'khrigs pa'i//rdo rje srung ba'i don
72a5(rgyud): bsgom bya//sa yi cha yid rdo rje yis//de bzhin rab dang ni gur//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa po bdud thams cad rnam par
72a6(rgyud): 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa 'di thams cad kyi sa bon nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams
72a7(rgyud): la nges par byung ba//dbus su ya'o//k+Shi ma me dang yats+tsha ni rA dza do ru Na ya ni ra ya yig la sogs pa gshin rje 'joms par 'gyuraro//gti mug k+She yig la brjid
72b1(rgyud): g+hu/pra many+tsing+ga brjod mA yig lha'o//'dod chags nyid kyang mo yig la//da yig la yang phyug dag yin//lnga rnams gshin rje 'joms parlung sgrub //ji yig tsaHkA /
72b2(rgyud): bidz+rod//sa yig la ni phag mo ste//dbyangs can ma brjod do yig la//ru yig la ni gau rIr 'dod//Na ya ni ra zur bzhi ru//mi yi thod pa bzhi rnams so//de nas nges par
72b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag gshin rje rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/zhe sdang chen po'i rigs 'di sgom pa'i rnal 'byor
72b4(rgyud): 'di gsungs so//sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod par ldan//blo bzang sems can don dang cig/byams sogs yon tan yang dag rdzogs//dad dang thos pas rnam par rgyano//
72b5(rgyud): brtse ba'i bdag nyid can sngo dro//thog mar kha sogs dag byas te//skye bos dben phyogs dur khrod sogs//bde ba'i stan la rang brtsam bya//rang nyid pad+mar nyi ma la//
72b6(rgyud): rnam bkod shin tu gsal ba'i bsti//de 'od rnams kyis sems can don//phun tshogs byas nas spyan drangs te//bla ma rdzogs sangs rgyas po sgom bya//mi lus ma
72b7(rgyud): dkyil rnams khyab pa//dmigs te de rnams la ni phyag/lus kyi tshogs kyis rnam par brtson/tsartsika sogs rnams kyis mchod//de nas sdig pa rab bshags
73a1(rgyud): rgyu/lus dgra yod kyis yang dag sdig/byas dang byed 'gyur du bzhin du//gang yang rjes su yi rang ga/myogon po dus gsum byas de bshags/hA/
73a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang mtshungs rnams kyi//brjod nams tshig sA l-i rjes yo nga //rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dam chos btsas//tshogs mchog rnams lo skyab su mchi/
73a3(rgyud): mtsho khyad rnams sgyur//rang lus drug ni dbul bar bgyi//dam chos thams cad ston mdzad cing //shin tu mthar thugs mdzes par bzhugs//yang dag rdzogs
73a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dam chos//de nyid sbyin srogs rang bzhin la//sku gsum ye shes thob phyir du//rab tu dang bas gnas par bgyi//sems can rnams kyi don sgrub phyir//
73a5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed bgyi//bsod nams yang dag nyer sgrub grang //rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs bsngo//dpal ldan gshin rje mthar byed du//gyur
73a6(rgyud): nas bdag gis 'gro phan bgyi//smon lam 'di ni btab byas te//de dang de rnams blos gshegs bya//brtse bas cho ga bzhin bltas te//sna tshogs stong pa
73a7(rgyud): rnam bsam bya//sbyor ba bral ba'i rang bzhin te//rgyu nyid kyis dang mtshan ma med//rnam par rtog dang bral nyid phyir//smon pa rnam par spangs pa'o//oM shUn+ta
73b1(rgyud): dz+nyAn badz+rIs+thu b+hU wa At+makr-I ha~M/yaM ri byaM lo/dkyil 'khor bzhi/bsdus pa'i b+h+rUM yig las skyes pa'o//khya pa ban+dug sa ba bsgom par bya//gru ban pa la sgo bzhi pa/
73b2(rgyud): bI bes bzhi yis rgyun pa ste//do shal do shal phyed pas spras//lha dang lha mos legs par mdzes//sna tshogs rtse mo rlung bskyod pa'i//ba da ni dril bu mnyam par ldan//
73b3(rgyud): de yi dbu gnas pa yig gis//sna tshogs pad+mo rnams bsam bya//dr-ir ni lte ba'i dbus gnas pa'i//sna tshogs rdo rje dathug par bcas//mtshan ma mtha' dag yongs
73b4(rgyud): byugyur nas//zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par sgom//pad+ma nyi ma mnyam mnan cing //ma he dmar po'i steng bzhugs pa//g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni//bdud rnams thams
73b5(rgyud): cad nges 'joms pa//nyi ma bye ba'i 'od ldan lha//ro langs ma yis mgrin mkhyud cing //dpa' bo zhal cig phyag gnyis pa//klu ni brgyad kyis rnam par rgyan//
73b6(rgyud): spyan gsum dmar po 'jigs po skye//khrig ldan mgo bo'i phreng ba can//g.yos na rdo rje dbyug pa dang //g.yon na thod pa 'dzin pa'o//khro bo zhal dang mnyam ldan
73b7(rgyud): zhing //ljags sgra mche ba gtsigs pa can//khro gnyer ldan zhing sku rgyas pa//stag gi lpags pas rked pa g.yogs//thung zhing gsus 'phyang 'jigs par
74a1(rgyud): byed//dri med dag pu'i 'od zer 'bar//ro langs mya y-i g.yas pa na//gri gug glu yon na thod pa can//spyan gsum ldan zhing s+yA glo lA ba//phyag rgya
74a2(rgyud): lngas ni rnam par rgyun//mgo yi phreng ba mnyam ldan zhing //gtso bo'i mtshul myang ba mo//shar gyi mdab ma la gti mug rdo rje ku 'i//rdo tsir tsi kA dang snyoms par
74a3(rgyud): zhugs so//lho'i med ba ma la phra ma gshin rje gshed ser po//rdo rje phag mo dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o//nub kyi mdab ma la 'dod chags gshin rje gshed dmar po
74a4(rgyud): rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o//byang gi mdab ma la phrag dog gshin rje gshed ljang ku rdo rje gau rI dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o//tsar tsi kA nag mo//phag
74a5(rgyud): mo sai ro mo//dbyangs can ma dkar mo//gau ri ldeng kuM/g.yon na thod pa g.yas na gri gug ste//phyag dang zhal dang dbyibs ni dpa' bo ji lta bzhi no//me'i zur du mu
74a6(rgyud): men gyi bum pa bzhin mnyam gyis gang ba'o//bdeni bral du gser gyi bum pa gu rtsiso gleng ba'o//rlung du byi ru'i bumau pa sih+la sa gang ba'o//dbang ldan du dngul gyi bum
74a7(rgyud): pa ga bur gyis gang ba ste thod pas kha bcad pa rnam par sgom pa'o//dra ba 'ching ba'i sngags gsungs pa/gtso bo dpa' bo'i ni/oM hrIHSh+T+rIwI kr-i tA na na
74b1(rgyud): Ta baTadAhA/snying po'i sngagaso//oM tsa k+Shok+Sha yai ka rA ya/gr-iHgr-ih+Na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swAhA/nyo ba'i snying po'i sngags//oM ma hA yak+Sha sen+ta d+hU pa ta yo mahA dur dAn ta dra ma k+Sha/
74b2(rgyud): yA/n+de shaM ma nA shA ya/bi dA yA be drA p+ta ya/ r+the TahrIt+ma/phreng ba'i sngags//oM dweSh+kaSh+Ta re d+he nu rung /tranad+hIHts+tsha dza.AhA/ts+tshin mi 'i gas//
74b3(rgyud): oM m+bo ha an+ta tA kr-i ti hU~M hUM \u0f7f/A pI sh+tsi na an+ta kr-itad+d+he hU~M phaH/oM r+yA g+h+ra an tAkrot+ta hUM hUM phaT/oM I ri Sh+yaM in+ta kr-itits+tshe hU~M/dpa' bo bI ni'o sdug s+ho/
74b4(rgyud): oM mo hA ra tI d+h+r-i dzaHau bi shu dzaHau rA ga \u0f7fdzaHoM IraSh+Ta rodapa' bo'i dbang phyug ma ni'i sngags so// maR+Ye meR+YA b+hi g+hA t+ta/
74b5(rgyud): au badz+dzatsi kr-i/hA ra hA ra/bruM TIk+ShI ra ya/ba muk+Sha yA dzaMHoM g+hota/pu k+tor+t+ti/badz+nyA mA ma kI/b+hU ru d+hi ra/saM d+hA ra si d+hu rah+yaMHoM mAn+ma ma?r+thA
74b6(rgyud): badz+ra sa r+ShusmA ti/dA ra da ra/zer /phyur pha ra/kaM pA kr-i pa/tu nA/hAM a mu kaM dziHm+b+hi gai b+hI /bar+d+ha kiM kle/g+hA g+h+r-i ra/shau tepra yi
74b7(rgyud): a mu taM dzaMHgdengs can mtha' yas sngon po yis//sgra bcings shin tu 'jigs pang mdzad//klu ni 'jig pa dmar pa yis//rna 'i drag pos rna rgyan byas//
75a1(rgyud): rigs ldan+da sna tshogs dpung pa'i rgyun//gdangs can se po dung skyong ni//lag gangabya dag tu 'dzin pa ste//pad+ma da/ po do shal mdzes//karka nan
75a2(rgyud): sngo bsangs kyang //mchod phyir thogs pas mdzes po ste//gdengs can nor rgyas bdud rtsi yi//kha dog lta bu'i ska rags byas//pad+ma rtsa lta bu dkar ba'i mdog/
75a3(rgyud): pad+ma chen pos rkang gdub byas//thams cad phud kyi rnam pa sgrogs//lho gnyis phreng ba'i mche ba can//zhes pa 'khor ba myang 'das kyis//gzugs can
75a4(rgyud): gshin rje gsod pa ste//rnam rtog thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir//sngags kyis yang dag byin rlabs bya//rang nyid sa bon lcags kyus dgug/zhal nas
75a5(rgyud): zhugs te thams cad du//mkha' khyab rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun//zhal nas zhugs rnams snying khar zhu//der ni sa bon phyung byas te//rdo rje'i lam
75a6(rgyud): nas zhu ba ste//rang 'od pad+ma'i nang gonas pa//sa bon rang bzhin can blta bya//sa bon de rnams kyis byin rlabs//'od zer mi bzad 'phyo ba ni//mkha
75a7(rgyud): pas cho ga bzhin bsgom bya//bltas te snying khar zhu byas la//rdo rje'i lam nas nges phyung ste//rang gi rig ma'i pad+ma yi//ze 'brung lha mo'i tshogs bltas/
75b1(rgyud): s+yA rgyun rdzun dutu nas s+ho//dag pa smra gus na ya // dru rjod ga/rnanas kla/rlan /
75b2(rgyud): rol bces de nam kyis mchod ga/me mye gshin drug shid //blam sbyin pa'i gzugs ra hrI /khyod mang/ na kyi d+ma jigs//rnam
75b3(rgyud): nan smosu//da ga sa rnaMs stengs dang //se ng+ge ni 'og gas//chags pas brgyan pa'i ga da//gdan rdzong ni langs lag/
75b4(rgyud): dmar zhing thung bste//rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs sprul pa//rdo rje dbyangs can mas btud che//grong mdzad khyod ni bde ba che//hrIHgsang sngags dag gis
75b5(rgyud): ste gsum po yi 'khrul pa sel//snying rje'i khra brje btsun khyod//gor mdzad 'gro ba rnams la gzigs//oM sarba ta thA gA ta pri dzA badz+ra swa b+hA wa at+ma ko d+hi/sgra
75b6(rgyud): tshogs rnams thams cad ni//sgra brnyan dang mtshungs rnam par blta//'khor lo'i gtsol bstod byas te//de yis de rnams de lta bzhin//gti mug rdo rje'i rang btsun
75b7(rgyud): khyod//shin tu 'jigs pa gshin rje gshed//ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin//sku yi rdo rje khyad phyag 'tshal//phra ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod//shin tu 'jigs
76a1(rgyud): pa'i gshin rje gshed//thugs kyi rdo rje rab gsal ba//rin chen rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal//'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod//khyab bdag chags pa'o//
76a2(rgyud): chos 'byung gnas//dbyangs mchog kun gyi mchog gi mchog/gsung gi rdo rje khyod phyog 'tshal//phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod//las kun byed pa'i gshin rje gshed
76a3(rgyud): sku yi rdo rje rab gsal ba//phyag na ral gri khyod phyag 'tshal//sangs rgyas kun gyi ring bzhin khyod//sangs rgyas thams cad gtsog bsdus pas//sangs rgyas kun rab
76a4(rgyud): mchog gi mchog/dkyil 'khor dbang phyug khyod phyag 'tshal//oM/\u0f7f/yig las skyes pad+ma'i snod/mi mgo gsum gyi steng gnas pa//dag par rnam par
76a5(rgyud): bskyed byas te//der ni 'og tu me dkyil 'khor//zur gsum raM yig las byung ba'o//der ni 'og tu rlung dkyil 'khor//sngon po g.yo ba gzhu lta bu//ba dan
76a6(rgyud): gyis mtshon yaM las byung //der ni de'i ming dang po las//bskyed de rnam snang la sogs pa//bum yig sogs las yang dag byung //glang po che la sogs pa lngas//
76a7(rgyud): hUM skye rdo rje'i kha chod kyi//bkab pa mkhas pas bsgom par bya//me la rlung gis bskyod pa na//dar ni zhu ba rnam bsam bya//rdo rje'i ro menyam dag gyur cing //shin tu
76b1(rgyud): ma med pa mas //d+hU / sa sno saur+b+ba sgra rnams//rgyu dungs yo shes dang ponan can//rdzogs gzugasas rab gag cong//mchog ga rA N+Di k+Shod bzlas nas/
76b2(rgyud): de nyid gsum gyis byin pa bus bya//dkyil 'khor bdag po che ma byi ste//skye la rdo rje gtsang ma lji//b+h+rUM yig yingad dag byung ba lta dede//de 'od sbu gu'i rnam bye la//yang dag
76b3(rgyud): bkug pa de yis kyang //rdzogs sangs rgyas kun sna tshogs gnas//dkyil 'khor ba rnams de bzhin gzhin//ye shes 'od kyi snying khar bkug/kun tu rtog pa thams cad
76b4(rgyud): sbyangs//'og me tha ma dbus dbye bas//der yang gzung ba gcig yod min//de nyid kyis ni 'khrul gzugs med//glang la 'khrul pa gnyis la gnas//thams
76b5(rgyud): da chen sems 'khrul med//lus ni sgo dang spyad pa'o//de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshod dmang po'i rgyud las/mngon par
76b6(rgyud): rtogs pa'i le'u ste dang po'i//de nis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byed kyi//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'ching chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis
76b7(rgyud): gsol ba ban po/las kyi bye dang rab kyil so//ci lta sems na sa rgyu drug/rdo rje chenapos pa shad du gas so//ye shes rgyamatsho rnams nyan 'tshal//de na
77a1(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang rgyal po//nyes pa thams cad gos pa'i bdag/las kun rab tu sgrub pa pa//gsung ni 'di dag bka' stsal te//de nas bcom ldan 'das de byizhin
77a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje'i mthu mnga' ba la mchod pa byas te phyag 'tshal ba/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te yang dang yang du phyug 'tshal zhing /
77a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung mnyan to//de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos//dbang byed 'khrul 'kho rab gsal byed//gshin N+yeg shad nag 'khrul 'khor rnams//ma
77a4(rgyud): byung 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro//bud med dbang byed phyir de bzhin//bsrung ba'i don du bye ba nyid//gi bi bzung bya zhi ba la//gro ga de bzhin sdug shun la//'khor lo
77a5(rgyud): gnyis ni mngon bris te//na maHming ni nang du sgrol//nag po rtsa ba sogs spangs te//kham phor gnyis ni kha sbyar la//mar dang sbrang rtsi'i dbus bzhag ste//
77a6(rgyud): srad bu dkar pos dkri bar bya//me tog dkar pos thun gsum du//shar du kha bltas mchod par bya//gshin rje mthar byed zla shel 'od//bdag nyid bsam
77a7(rgyud): te 'du 'god bya//bsgrub bya zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lo//zhen pa bltas te dbang bskur bya//bum pa dkar po zla 'dra ba//bdud rtsi lnga yis gang rnams la/
77b1(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas khrus byed pa//bltas nas bzlas pa brtsams par bya//oM hrIHSh+NIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hU~M phaT phaT na maHlha sbyin gyi shAnA ti ku ru na maHzhi ba'i dam chags
77b2(rgyud): gsungs pa'o//skyes pa rnams kyi zhi ba la//gur gum gyis bris rgyas pa la'ang //kha che rnams kyi 'khor lo gnyis//swA hA ming gi nang du spel//bsgrub bya'i ming
77b3(rgyud): ni blangs nas ni//mar dang sbrang rtsi'i dbus bzhig nas//kham phor kha sbyar du bzhag ste//srad bu ser pos dkri bar bya//me tog ser pos thun gsum du//byang
77b4(rgyud): kha bltas mchod par bya//gshin rje 'joms pa sku mdog ser//bdag nyid nges par blta bar bya//bsgrub bya ser po zlo bar gnas//bum pA ser pos dbang bskur bya//
77b5(rgyud): dbang bskur ba ni bsgomos nas su//rgyas par byed 'dod yang dag bzlos//oM hrIHSh+NIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hUM pheMT phaT swA hI/lhas sbyin gyi puSh+Ti ku ru swA hA/bau ShaT au/
77b6(rgyud): hrIHSh+NIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hAM/bau Sho Ta lha sbyini gyi puSh+TiM ku ru bau ShaT ces pa gsungs te/bIcom ldan 'das kyi rgyas po'i dam tshig gr-i/gro ga 'am/
77b7(rgyud): yang nai ras la yang //rgyo skyegs khu ba 'am tsan dan dmor//ming med khrag dang bsres pa yis//'khIr gnyis ni mnya mo dris te//hoHyig gis rlung du spel
78a1(rgyud): rgyu/nag pa lus gdus na na du sa say+YA kla ba//s+yAng ma su /bdun
78a2(rgyud): tu mngon par phyogs byas te//me tig dmar pos mchod par bya//bdag nyid gshin rje 'joms k+She ni//sku mdog dmar po cher 'bar ba//bsgrub bya zla ba dmar pa
78a3(rgyud): lo/zhon pa nyid kyang rnam pasam b+ha//rang lus las 'phros 'dra zer ni//dmar po lcags kyu'i sgribs rnams kyis//bsgrub byA bkug par bsam so nus ni/
78a4(rgyud): spro ba'i sngags ni khri bzlas bya//de yis bsgrub bya ba rgyal 'gyur zhing //rkang pa dag la de bzhin 'byol//gos dang bral ba'i sgo grol ba//bsams te bzlas pa
78a5(rgyud): brtsam par bya//gal te dbang du ma gyur na//bud med seng ldeng me la ni//myur sogs spyor bcas brtul zhugs can//'khor lo de ni gdung bar bya//oM hrI
78a6(rgyud): d+hIHwi kr-i dz+nyA na na hU~MtrUM Ta daH/ha~M/lha sbyin gyi mchod sbyin pa shing ku ru hau oM d+hISh+Ti wi kr-itA na na r+b+hu hU~M phaT phaT bau ShaT/lha sbyin gyi bai shA mA na mochod sbyin
78a7(rgyud): SheT/ces pa gsungs te bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang du bya ba'i dam tshig gi/dur khrid res sem yang ni ni//rang byung bskus pa'i ras dag la//rgya skyegs sba
78b1(rgyud): rnon khrag bskyes byas//'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam sa te//dzadza~M rAg+na dang ni d+hIHyig gyis//brlab ming ni rlung sbrul b+ha//btsun mo'i pad+ma'i snod duni//
78b2(rgyud): sbyar bzhag ste mchod par bya//srad bu dmar pos dkris nas ni//me tog dmar pos mchod par bya//bdag nyid gshin rje gshed po ni//'tshams kyi nyi ma ltar 'bar
78b3(rgyud): ba|lcags kyu kha dog dmar po yis/9/bsgrub byi bkug pa nyid bsgom bya//lcags kyu rnams kyis snying phug cing //zhags pas rked pa la bcings te//rlung gi dkyil
78b4(rgyud): 'khor sbyor ba las//seng ge dmar po mnyam zhon pa//rdzas lnga yaus ni bsang bya ste//de ni 'ong bar rnam bsam bya//gal te bsgrub bya ma 'ongs na//seng ldeng
78b5(rgyud): shing me 'ab ba la//'khrul 'khor de bsos brtul zhugs can//der ni bzlas pa yang dag brtsam//oM hrIHSh+TiHwI kr-i tA na na hUM hUMHpheMT hrIHA mu ka A kaR+ShA
78b6(rgyud): ya hIHoM hrIHSh+NIHwI kr-i tA nA na hUM hUM phaT phaT dzaHlha sbyina? A kaR+Sha ya dzaHces pa gsungs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi bkug pa'i dam tshig go/blo ldan dur khrod
78b7(rgyud): ras ma la//yung ba yi ni khu bo yis//'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris te//laM yig gis ni nang du spel//bsgrub bya'i ming ni yang dag blang //kham phor kha sbyar/
79a1(rgyud): du bzhag ste//kham phor ser po steng bzhag nas//der ni mkhas pas ri mo bri//dang po ri mo bzhi bcu bdun//mnyam par gzhag skye mnyam bri bya//cog brgyad du grags
79a2(rgyud): rab ni//de yi steng du yang dag bri//hUM yig dang ni ba yig ste//de yis ri rab nang du sbrel//de yi nang du laM yig gis//dbang chen dkyil 'khor dgod par bya//sna tshogs
79a3(rgyud): rdo rjes mnan pa laM//srad bu ser pos dkri bar bya//bdag nyid gshin rje gshed po ni//sku mdog ser po rnam pas ma bya//lho ru mngon phyogs rnal 'byor pas//dbang
79a4(rgyud): chen dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i//bsgrub bya sor po rnams bsams nas//ri rab kyis mnan myur dgod bya//sna tshogs rdo rje mnyam mnan la//dbang chen dkyil pa 'o
79a5(rgyud): lngasna 'og tu//man der sogs 'jigs rung ri//gangs ri g.yo med mtshungs rnams kyis//bsgrub bya mnan pa bsgom bya ste//de nyid bzlas pa bya ba nyid//oM hrIHhrI
79a6(rgyud): wi kr-i tA na na hU~M hUM phaT phaT/laM lha sbyin swa s+thA na staM b+ha yA la~M swAhA/zhes gsungs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi rangs pa chen po'i dam tshig go/ngag ni rengs par 'dod pa yis/
79a7(rgyud): rang bzhin 'khor lo gnyis bris naso//bsgrub bya'i ming rnams nang spel to//de nas spos shing sngags bzlas bya//oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT laM/
79b1(rgyud): stu sbyinA yan+d+ha prAT+TakAr+ya stakr-i ta/tInI pa ra ya ta ba R+sha pa ka/ba ra ta ya to bIR+sha ba kaM/ba rA ta ya d+hA daHs+yAnA gas+t+yad+ha na ku ru li/zhes pa gsungs te/btsam
79b2(rgyud): nyi ma gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur//dur khrod ras la 'khor lo gnyis//snang bzhin bri byA ba rtu la zhugs can//skye tsha dang ni lan tshwas kyang //drug nim pa
79b3(rgyud): kyang ste//de bzhin ldan tshwa tsha ba gsum//dur khrod sol ba nyid dang ni//sgyu byed mdab mo'i'o khu ba dang //de bzhin gtum po'i sa bon nyid//mdzub mo'i khrag ni blang
79b4(rgyud): byas te//tsi tra ka yi khu ba 'am//tshwa sgo can gyis blangs te//gdol pa'i rdza ma'i dreg pa dang //ltogs pa can gyi skye gu yis//gdug pa'i sems kyis bcu
79b5(rgyud): bobazhi la//nyi phying na bri brtul zhugs can//ma rungs pa rnams bsang rgyu yi//sna tshogs sems can rnam 'joms pa'o//hUM yig gis ni rnam spel bya//lhoru
79b6(rgyud): mngon phyogs rnal 'byor pa//bdag nyid gshin rje gshed po ni//gtum po chen po khro bo'i gzugs//thod pa'i dum bus rnam par rgyan//ma ho la zhugs
80a1(rgyud): ljags 'gyur ba//gsus pa che zhing 'jig su rung //gtsigs shing gyen du 'bar ba'i sgra//de bzhin slar smin ma ser//g.yas pa rdo rje'i dbyug
80a2(rgyud): pa ched de g.yon pa thod pa nyid kyang ste//rnam 'gyur mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ bskal pa'i me ltar yang dag mtshungs//de ltar bdag nyid rnam bsams te//
80a3(rgyud): de mdun bsgrub bya myur dgod bya//dri ldan rims gzir nad rnams kyi//gdug pa'i lus la gzir ba dang //gos dang bral bas 'dar ba dang //nyams chung lus ni rma
80a4(rgyud): dang ldan//'bras kyi phreng bas yan leg bskor//mtshon cha yis ni gzir bar bya//grang ba'i rlung gis nye bar gtses//ma yi dbus su yang dag gnas//ma hi
80a5(rgyud): dag dang stag dang ni//khyi dang mchu rings can rnams kyis//sangs rgyas sde ni rnam 'joms pa'i//ma rungs chen po za byed cing //mthar byed lta ba'i nang na gnas//
80a6(rgyud): cher ma rnams kyis lus gong ba//gdos dang sgrog gi rkang par bsdams//de bzhin dum bu dum bur byas//lpags pa med par byas bsams te//ske tshe dang ni
80a7(rgyud): lan tshwas byug/sId yig brjid pas bsam par bya//de yi lus kyi srung ba sogs//bcang nas bdag mdun dgod par bya//de yi go cha bgos byas te//
80b1(rgyud): stong pa'i lus bzhin sgom par byas//bdag lus las byung gshin rje gshod//khro bos bdag nyid sku rnams kyi//dri ni gdung bar bsgom bya zhing //zhag dang tshul dag
80b2(rgyud): 'thung bar byed//de mdun gau shin rje bsam byi ste/lag na dbyug pa stobs po che//gdug pa de yis gdungs pa ni//ma rungs de la rnam bsgom bya//de yi nang
80b3(rgyud): grol blangs bya ste//bye rgod kyis khyer mkhyo'i dkyil 'gro/klu rnams kyis ni sa 'og 'gug/dran med la sogs rnam par gzir//de ltar bsgrub bya rnam bsams te
80b4(rgyud): sems ni snying rjes des mo khyud byas//'khor ba las ni bton byas haM//sangs rgyas zhing rnamasu skyes 'gyur//dri nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thang
80b5(rgyud): thugs rab tu dgyes te tshig 'di gsungaso//e mra'o gsod pa 'di ni bzang //gsod pa gsod pa ma yin te//ci srid sdig pa las grol ba'i//'chi ba 'chi ba
80b6(rgyud): nyid ma yin//sdig pa stong phrag rnams byas nas//mnar med sogs par gnas 'gyur ba//e ma sangs rgyas bdag nyid che//gsod pa byang chub thob par mdzad//
80b7(rgyud): slar yang snying rje rnam mdzad nas//bsad 'os sems can gsod par mdzad//e me snying rje mchog gi stobs//snying rje dman pas mi 'grub po//oM hrIHSh+T+r-iH
81a1(rgyud): wi kr-i tA nAn n+tuts+tsha phaT phaT/b+h+r-i ba dat+ti m+bA rA yA d+hA/oMd+hIHwi kr-i tA nan hu~M hU~M phaT phaT hU~M phaT/de ba dar+d+ham+bA r+ya ya hU~M phaT/ces pa gsungs
81a2(rgyud): tedanabacom ldan 'das kyi rnam par rtog pa chen po gsod pa'i rdo rje/'khrul 'khor sngags dang /rgyud kyi gsod pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig go/de nas 'khor
81a3(rgyud): lo gnyis bris te//phaT kyi yi ges rnam spel bya//bsgrub bya'i ming ni blangs byas te//thod pa kha sbyor du dgod bya//srad bu nag pos yang dag dkri/sdung
81a4(rgyud): ba'i sems kyis nyin phyed nu//dur khrod rnams su sba bar bya//gshin rje mthor byed du yang dmigs//mdun du bsgrub bya dgod par bya//rta deng mA he
81a5(rgyud): mnyam zhon pa//lag no mtshan thogs de gnyis dang //khro bo 'dus pa rnams kyis bskor//gnyis ka'i phyogs su rnam pas ma bya//khro bos dkris pa yi sems kyis//
81a6(rgyud): ginyis po de dag dbyug 'gyed par//bsgom bya 'thab mo'i bsam pa can//bsgoms te bzlas pa brtsam par bya//oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hU~M phaT phaT/de bdat+ta
81a7(rgyud): ya d+he dat+to bi dwe ShA ya phaT/ces gsungs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbye ba chen po'i dam tshig go/sngar bzhin cho ga de nyid kyis//'khor lo gnyis ni bri bya ste//hUM dang
81b1(rgyud): phaT yog rnam sprul bas//da pa kha sbyor du ga/dang //srang bu nag pos yang dag dkris//ma myo'i tshal rnams pra b+hA//gA shin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gzung //mdun du
81b2(rgyud): bsgrub bya rnam bsgom bya//yi byung d+h+r-i gau dkyil 'khor ni//nag po gzhu yi rnam pa la//rnga mo chen po mdog sngon po//dI yi steng du rnam bsgom bya//de la ma rungs che brgyun
81b3(rgyud): te/lho yi phyogs su de khyer la//khre tshogs rnams kyis gdungs pas na//nges par sangs rgyas rnams kyang bskyod//oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hUM phaT phaT/de ba dat+taM un+d+ra
81b4(rgyud): Ta ya hUM phaT/ces pa gsungs te bcom ldan 'das kyi bskrad pa chen po'i dam tshigo//khros pa gshin rjer bltas rnal 'byor//khrig bcas ro bsregs thal ba dang //dug dang /
81b5(rgyud): len tshwa ske tshe dang //til mar skyo byed mang ba de bzhin//dur khrod ras la 'khor lo gnyis//de ltar rim pas bri bar bya//grwa shin rje'i lus gnas bsad pa la//rta dang ma he
81b6(rgyud): dag las dbye//rnga mo'i lus gnas bskrad pa la//zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la//rgyas pa zla ba ser po la//btsun mo'i snying khar dbang du byed//lkugs par yi lus la
81b7(rgyud): gnas//lhun po'i dbus su rengs pa ste//seng ge sha ra b+ha gnas dgug/de ltar gzhan rnams las mtshon bya//gi dri skye skyugs nyid dang ni//kha che yi ni bye brag gis//
82a1(rgyud): gro ga'i mdab ma la bris dbang //'dir ni 'grub 'gyur the tshom med//kham phor kha sbyar du bzhag ste//dge ba'i sems kyis yang dag bzung //bya ro//
82a2(rgyud): /sgro yi skyug gu yis//nyi ma'i gung la nges par brtum//ro bsregs pad+ma kha sbyar la//gAshin rje go shed bdag rnal 'byor las//oM hrIHSh+NIHsogs kyi sngags
82a3(rgyud): brjod cing //lho ru gnas pa'i tshor gcod bya//zhi la mtha' yi yi ge yi//dbye ba ni gnyis kyis yang //phyi nas dbus kyi ya yig gis//lhag maSh+Ti yi ge ci
82a4(rgyud): bde ba'o//sngon du bsnyen pa khri bzlas te//las 'di rab tu sgrub pa ni//gshin rje gaushed dmar rab sbyor las//ye shes rdo rje yis bya ste//drag po chen po'i 'khor
82a5(rgyud): lo 'di//bris pa gang du gnas pa dang //yi ge bris pa'i khyim du yang //rtag tu 'thab mo 'byung por 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
82a6(rgyud): dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/'khrul 'khor gyi dbang du byas pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////ri bo skye bos dben phyogs dang //leT
82a7(rgyud): sbas yid pa'i khyim rnamaso//thang sku bkram ste rnal 'byor bdag/sngags kyis dgug pa yang dag brtsam//zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkor//gri gug
82b1(rgyud): skrod pa 'dzin pa mo//khrag 'gugs pa lI rab sbyor la//tsartsi kA skom rnal 'byor pasdu//de nas bcom ldan 'das grwa shin rje chen po 'joms pa'i rdo rje khrag 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting
82b2(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/rdo rje tsartsi kA'i sngags 'di dag gsungs so//oM badz+ra tsaMrtsi ke sid d+hen+na nI la hA ri Ni rat+na tra ye/u pa ka ri No ru d+hu ra A kAR+Sha yaM dzaHkha ni rab tu gdangs
82b3(rgyud): bya ste//sngags 'di rjesu dran par bya//khams gsum pa'i khrag chen po//'dir ni 'gugs pa the tsom med//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshed pos chang
82b4(rgyud): dgug pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/rdo rje phag mos chang dgugs pa'i dam tshig 'di gsungs//oM g+ho NA~M su g+ho N+De badz+ra mA me k+ShI/b+ha ra b+hu ra/
82b5(rgyud): sam+b+ha ra sar+b+ba ra/d+h+r-i tru ka ma d+hu A kaR+Sha ya dzaHrdza mkhan lag pa byis pa'i sas//bum pa byas te kun nas bsgribs//rkun po'i sgra yi gzhir bzhig ste//sngags ni
82b6(rgyud): rjes dran par bya//baid+d+hi tas ni mchod rten du//sngags 'di'i bdug nyid che ba bstan//'bad pos brtan par dmigs byas nas//chang dgug pa ni rab tu 'gru//de nas
82b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'ongs gshin rje chen po 'joms pa'i rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs//dbyangs can mas sngags 'di gsung /
83a1(rgyud): ma nu n+ya byA bad+hAn/dz+wa la dzA ma?/mir+thA bAd+hAr+d+han/d+hI rId+hi rI/bud d+d+hi bad+d+hA na s+yAH/bzung nas ji srid chos gcig nas//kun nas zla ba rdzogs pa'i
83a2(rgyud): bar//legs sbyar byed 'dod brtsam bya ste//ji srid zla ba'i rjes 'jug las//ngag gi dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur//de nas tshigs bcad brgya byed cing //khams
83a3(rgyud): gsum pa ma lus pa//ma lus lus pa med par 'khrugs//de nas bcom ldan 'das mthar byed chen po 'joms pa'i rdo rje'i khu ba 'gugs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
83a4(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te//khu ba 'gugs pa go rIs sngags 'di gsungs so//oM a~M kaR+Sha ni a kAr+d+ha ni/gau rI dzaHhriHduSh+Ta s+ya duSh+TA ye/shu kra A
83a5(rgyud): kaR+Sha ya rjeHdzaHhUM swA hA/mkha' sgo rdo rje lam dang rlung //dril bu lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las//bzlas dang sgom par rab sbyor las//khu bo'i tshogs rnams 'gu
83a6(rgyud): par byed//dben pa'i nags khrod rnamasu yang //las 'di rab tu bsgrub bya ste//mtshan mo bdun gyis rab sbyor gyis//'dir ni 'grub par the tsom med//
83a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed chen po dus 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/dbang bskur ba mchog gi dam tshig 'di nyid
83b1(rgyud): kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams las nges par byung bar gyur to//u dum ba ra man+da ra//pa ra d+hA ta ka mA li ka/kar ni ka ra'i phra ba yang //bu khyod zung la byin gyis rlongs//
83b2(rgyud): khams gsum pa yi ral gri che//sangs rgyas thams cad phyag mdzad pa//bzung nas bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur//las kyi ral gri dang mtshungs mchog/shesra rab thabs
83b3(rgyud): kyekyi rang bzhin no//rdo rje dril bu'ang sgrub pa'i phyir//mnyes shing gsang ba'i rdo rje zung//khyod ni slob ma bsdu bar gyis//'di ni btung ba rin chen te//'grub pa'i lus ni
83b4(rgyud): rab sgrub byed//skyes bu byung ba'i chu 'thungs cig/mnyes gshin kun tu ye shes nyid///slob ma'i khaM yis btung bya ste//gshin rje gshed ni rab sgrub phyir//
83b5(rgyud): rdo rje slob mo bdag nyid che//sems ni shin tu dga' bar mdzod//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyu las sngags
83b6(rgyud): phyir grag pa'i rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u ste ra um pa'o//de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //ral gri'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya//khab len lcags kyi rang
83b7(rgyud): bzhin las//ril gri yang na dngu chu yis//phywa byas khru gang tshad kyis ni//ril gri rnam am bairtul zhugs can//bcu bzhi yang na brgyad pa la//
84a1(rgyud): khrud dngas su brgyung ba //bdud rdom+b+ha dang yang dag ldan//thun gsas khri phrag bzlas par bya//zla bas so'i bcu bzhi las//gaN+DI zla
84a2(rgyud): mchod pa snron 'gro bar//zla ba gcog gis 'dum zlog bzlas//'bum phrag lngas ni 'grub par 'gyur//grubo nas ral gri rab tu 'badra//snang ba chen po'i khyod
84a3(rgyud): ze lnga//dra nas gzung bya 'grub par 'gyur//'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal mi//'jigs byed ga shin rje gshed sbyor las//gang tshe ral gri grub rnal 'byor//
84a4(rgyud): rkyed rmongs ni grub byed de'o//gA yul du de yi bzod par dka///rkang pa gnyis dang rkang bzhi dang //blta phyir phyogs bcu rnamasu 'gro//lha dang lha min rnams mi
84a5(rgyud): brjong //mi yi 'jig rten smras ci dgos//rgya mtsho'i 'jim pa blangs b+has//zla ba gcig gis yo da sdug/oM buM'iyi ge snying khar dgos/d+hIH
84a6(rgyud): hrIHlasngags sngags pa ni k+Sha//char pa mo 'ad dus rnams su//blo drug bzlas pas 'gyub pad+ma 'gyur//sgra lda na ga dag gi shA rnams dang //nim
84a7(rgyud): sems bsres byas te//de las ri lung byas nas ni//skye mtshar zhugs byas brtul zhugs can//khri brag tsam zhig rab bzlas pas//chu rlabs rangs pa
84b1(rgyud): mchog yin//gtum po sa bon brgya blangs te//sran ma 'bras dang bsres pa ni//'bum phrag bdun du rab bzlas pas//lha ni sbyin sreg las gzigs 'gyur//
84b2(rgyud): dur khrod kyis ni gos mA blangs//gzugs brnyan bya ba brtul zhugs can//skyo byed khu bas byug pa yis//khri phrag gcig gos 'bugs par byed/
84b3(rgyud): phrag bzhi ni bzlas pa yis//don grub sa bon kun bsags pas//gnyid log langs te bya ba dang //tshor bar yang na the tsom med//rgyun lom gyi nam blangs te/
84b4(rgyud): sngags ni 'bum phrag bzlas pa las//spyi bor rab tu byugs tsamra gyis//spyi ba'i nad ni rnam par 'joms//lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas te//lag pas
84b5(rgyud): spyi bur mnye bar bya//nid kyis nyams pa medo 'gyur te//'dir ni the tsom yod ma yin//bram ze yi ni sha dag dang //dur khrod thal bas don//gshin rjeg
84b6(rgyud): kyi spyi gzugs bya//phyag gnyis dang ni zhal gi cig pa//glayas pa rdo rje chen po skye//de bzhin g.yon na mi mgo'o//sku mdog dkar po 'jigs byung chen/
84b7(rgyud): de yis ma rungs 'joms par byed//sha dang bdud rtsi lnga yis ni//nyi mo sor gtor ma dbul//rtag tu gsol btab rnal 'byor pa//bdag gi dgro ba 'dzums//
85a1(rgyud): par mdzod//ces pa brjod de mtshan mo nya la//dgra ni tho rangs 'tsho bar 'gyur//yang na nu bar 'gyur ba ste//myos pa la sogs kun tu 'khrag/dgra/
85a2(rgyud): bo'i rnam snang blang bya ste//mi yi rkang ni reb brkang bya//'bum phrag bzlas pas rdzogs nas ni//shing gi rtse mor sbyang bya nyid//rtag tu yi dgas tshal du ba skor//
85a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor dbang phyug mnyes na bde//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya//ro lings chen po'i sgrub thab so//thams cad 'grub par byed pa'i mchog/sna tshogs bya
85a4(rgyud): ba rab sgrub pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rjeg shid dmar po'i rgyud las/zla 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi
85a5(rgyud): pa'o////de nas rgyal srid sgrub thabs mchog/'di las yang dag rab pa shad bya//'phyang ba'i'o shing ni bzung bya ste//ma nyams de bzhin rma med pa//
85a6(rgyud): brangs la gdung bar bya de yang //bzlas pa'i phreng bar rab bsgrub bya//za ba zla ba'i bcu bzhi la//sha lnga yis ni byug par bya//bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan//
85a7(rgyud): bzlas par 'grub par byed pa'i mchog/'di yis 'bum phrag bzlas pa yis//nges par rgyal srid 'grub par 'gyur//e ma sngags kyi nus pa ni//gnyid
85b1(rgyud): log smra ni sgrogs par byed//gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ldan pas//skad cig kyang ni 'jigs mi bya//gang gang 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pa//de dag thams cad thob par 'gyur/
85b2(rgyud): ma he dang ni chu srin dang //stag dang de bzhin gzhan rnams kyis//dom dang lce spyang drag dang ni//spre'u yang ni bye brag las//skrod tshe lan tshwa de bzhin du//sha ba dza na tshwa ba
85b3(rgyud): gsum//'di yis sku gzugs yang drag sgrub//'jigs pa'i gzugs can gro shin rje gshed//de la gsol btab rnal 'byor pa//hrIHSh+NIHla sogs sngags
85b4(rgyud): bzlas te//rgyal po che ge bsad nas ni//bdag de rengs par sbyar bar bya//bya ba bzlas pas 'grub 'gyur te//bden zhing bden par the tshe mi med//de nas gzhan
85b5(rgyud): yang /rgyal gyi zla ba'i dkar phyogs dang //nyi mar bsgrubs la yang dag sbyar//rdul ldan gosa? ni yang dag blang //thang sku mchog ni bri bar bya//bri bya bkra shis
85b6(rgyud): mchog snag tshwa//chen po yang dog ldan rnams kyi/sku mdog dkar po drag shul che//phyag gnyis dang ni zhal gcig mchog/g.yas pa rdo rje 'bar ba ste//g.yon
85b7(rgyud): bas 'jig pa'i mgo bo 'dzin//zhabs ni g.yon brkyang rnam 'gyur dang //rin tshon cod pan rnam par rgyan//rin chen rgyan rnams yongasu rdzogs//'od zer phreng bas
86a1(rgyud): kun tu 'khrigs//gsod pa'i bskum pa'i rgyul blo n+ti//lkog gi rgyu la ngas par sbyar+ya//thun mongs kha dog yang dag ldan//ji m+b+hi'i dbyibyas ni rnam
86a2(rgyud): bar gnas//'dus byas lce ni bsgrub par bya//ci ltar 'byor pa'i ched la ni//de yi mdun du sbyin bsreg bya//nges par zur gsum dkyil 'khor lo'o//sbyin
86a3(rgyud): bsreg 'bum gyis de rgyal srid//thob 'gyur 'di ni the tsom med//de nas gzhan yang /zla ba gzas zin dus su ste//gal te nyi ma la blta bya//dur khrod
86a4(rgyud): thal ba yang dag blangs//gzugs brnyan bya ba brtul zhugs can//shrI gI ri dz+nyI shu lnga dang //nim pa d+ha dur lo mas//mkhas pas cho ga 'di yis ni//gcis
86a5(rgyud): tu byas te gzugs brnyan bya//sku mdog sngon po drag shul che//phyag gnyis dang ni zhal gcig pa//ma ho la bzhugs rnam 'gyur zhal//rdo rje dang ni thod pa 'dzin//
86a6(rgyud): bsgrubs te sku gzugs rang bzhin la//mchod pa byas na slar yang ni//rgyun tu hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs sngags//'bum phrag bzlas te mnyes par bya//sde bcas
86a7(rgyud): g.yog 'khor bcas pa yis//rgyal po che ge gzhom bya ste//bzlas pa 'bum gyi bdag rnal 'byor//byas nas 'bum phrag khyad par las//mchod pa'i
86b1(rgyud): las ni yang dag ldan//bzlas pa'i skyon srug cho ga 'dres//sems can dron mchog blo dang ldan//rgyal srid thob 'gyur tho tsom med//de nas gzhan yang/bkra shis kyi//
86b2(rgyud): ras la rdo ba'i na mkha'i chu yis zla mtshon gyi gos bkrus te thang sku mngon par bri bar bya'o//zhal cig pa dang phyag gnyis pa//sku mdog nag po 'jigs rung ba//dbu skra
86b3(rgyud): 'bur ba yang dag ldan//mgo bo'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang //gri gug dang ni thod pa phyag/ma he'i steng du bro bar bya//de ni sgom pa brtsam byas ste//dgra yi mdun du rnar
86b4(rgyud): sgom//gri gug gis ni bcad byas te//tshil dang zhig rnams 'thung ba dang //rgyu ma rnams dang 'jim pa dang //khrag ni mang po 'thung ba byed//'bum phrog tsam gyis
86b5(rgyud): bskur bar 'gyur//yang na rma yis snying khar gzir//de nas gzhan yang /mi yi rus pa sor bzhi pa blangs la/hrIHSh+NIHla sogs pa'i sngags nang du spel ba
86b6(rgyud): dgra bo'i sgor mnan pa byas na//gal te brgya byin dang mtshungs pa'ang 'khor dang bcas pa skrod par 'gyuraro//gcig pu skye bos dben par 'dug ste/rje btsun gyi
86b7(rgyud): thang sku bkram nas/phyogs bcu na zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mdun du byas nas/mi'i rus pa bcad pa'i khrag chen po dang be sras
87a1(rgyud): drag/pa'i bya rog gi khrag gis sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad/ rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo la/sa bon bcu gnyis dang /de nyid du dgra bo'i ming dbus su spel
87a2(rgyud): la/nacho ga khrag dang bcas pa'i kha sbyar ba tha yig gsum gyis phyi rol tu bskor ba bya rog gi mgrin par btags te/gal te 'bab chu la bsgyur ni de'i tshe 'khrug par
87a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro//de kho na ltar sa bon bcu gnyi su bri bar bya ste/phaT phaT hUM hU~M na na tA kr-i biSh+NIHhrIHoM/ji ltar 'byor pas phud mchod nas//stobs po che yi bdug
87a4(rgyud): pa phul//gal te 'brib tshul bsgyur na de'i tshe 'khrug par 'gyuraro//grol te ma gyur na byi rog gi bshog pa la lan bdun medo pa bsngags pa byas nas/dgra bo'i
87a5(rgyud): sgo nang du ming dang spel ba ni 'phel du 'khor dang bcas pa skrod par byed//de kho na lhar rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su/tsha ba gsum dang drug dang skye
87a6(rgyud): tshe rnams rus pa chen po'i 'dri skyug gis me'i sa bon gyi dbus su/tsheg drag dang bcas pa'i g+haHyig gnyis kha sbyar ba'i tha yig gsum gyi phyi rol du bskor
87a7(rgyud): ba'i me'i bud shing gi me la gdung bar bya ste/de'i skad cig la bu dang chung ma dang g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa 'chi bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa thod
87b1(rgyud): spyod drug nga gas gshin gshed dam pa rgyurnams/rgyag rlung rje m+b+ha sna /denas ros ldarnams 'joms//'dis su yang dag ga /
87b2(rgyud): bram thi ma yi rdul gos la//rgyal dang nyi mas yang dag brtsam//ma he'i zhal gyi b+h+ring spu bri//brgyu phrag phyug ni rab gsalnga ba//de ni phyag mtshan rnon po bsnams//zang
87b3(rgyud): du ni bri bar bya//thang sku dkar po bri bya ste//pad+ma dA// pos mchod par bya//sngags kyi bzlas pa 'bum phrag rnams//byas te de bzhin pad+mo skar//theng su bsgom pa mngon
87b4(rgyud): phyos pad+mo//ba dan stong du 'dzin pa ni//rkang gnyis rlung bzhi la sogs pa//skye bo rnams kyi mthong gyur gang //de nas thams cad gdong gi zhan 'gro/seng gi mthong ba'i
87b5(rgyud): gling po bzhi//den gzhin yang /tshangs pa'i sa bon mar khu che//kud+hA rI dz+nyAn gyis ldan pa//rnga mo'i gcin gyis yang dag ldan//rim bu byo'o brtul zhugs can/
87b6(rgyud): ring ste gdong bar thig le byas//pha rol sde ni rnam par 'joms//ASh+Ta ka shri DUr song skye//brgyad pa 'am yang na bcu bzhi la//thun gsum du ni zla ba gcig/sngon
87b7(rgyud): bsnyen 'bum phrag gcig byar 'gyur//oM sid+d+hi a nan ta nA la hA ri Ni pa ra s+yai n+ya bi nA shA ni hIHswAhA/'di nyid kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur//mthong ba las pha rol gyi sde
88a1(rgyud): rnam par 'joms shing gang la bltas pa de 'bros par 'gyur ro//de nas gzhan yang /shing gcig rtsa bar phyin nas ni//mchog gi ro la 'dug byas te//
88a2(rgyud): g.yas na rAlA gri 'dzin pa dang //g.yon brkyang ba yi zhal gyis ni//hrIHSh+T+r-iHla sogs pa'i sngags mtshan mo mtha' dgra bzlas par bya ste/de'i tshe ral gro yongs su
88a3(rgyud): 'phro zhing de'i tshe pha rol gyi sde rnams spya ///de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmang po'i rgyud las/pha rol gyi
88a4(rgyud): sde rnam par 'joms pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o////de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos//mi snang 'grub par rab gsal mdzad//thog mar mi snang ba sgrub pa'i don du/bArnal
88a5(rgyud): 'byor pas rgyal dang nyi ma'i nyin mo brtsam zhing sngon du yang dag par btags la 'bum phrag bzlas par bya ste/de'i drod 'byung bar 'gyuraro//gzis bzung ba'i dus nas pa Ni nA
88a6(rgyud): ka ri'i rtsa ba dang /ro dang /khaM g+hu ri dang /e ra bA Da'i rtsa ba dang /thams cad gcig tu byas te ril bu byas nas khar bcug na mi mthong bar 'gyuraro//de bzhin du gzhan
88a7(rgyud): yang /kho Do dang /dzA s+thi dang /dzi yan ti dang /brid+d+ha ra ka'i rtsa ba dang thams cad mnyam par gcig tu byas te/b+he ga'i gcin la nyi ma gsum bsgos la ril bu byas nas
88b1(rgyud): khang bcang bar bya ste/mi mthong bar 'gyur ro//de nas gzhan yang /gzas bzung ba'i rus na/ud+b+hi'i mchu dang /ro dang /d+hu d+ha rA kA na ka hA ya nyid/pa Da b+hi'i gcin gcig la yAng/
88b2(rgyud): dag par bzhag ste/ril bu byas nas khar bcug na mi snang ba'i mchog gA/de nas gzhan yang /byi ba'i mig dang /bya rgod kyi mig dang /sa 'og rkyang bas kyang cha mnyam por
88b3(rgyud): gcig tu byas pa'i ril bu po shang laM du gzhug par bya ste/skad cig de lAs da mi mthong bar 'gro bar byed//de nas yang /nyi ma'i res la bye ba'i mig bar du blangs te/tsi
88b4(rgyud): kra ka sngon po'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig/bya rgod kyi khrag gis brtag par bya ste/mi snang ba mchog go/dro nas gzhan yang bA shrI mAn sa dang /ba la mAn sa dang /ba hU~M ra pha
88b5(rgyud): la bsnyems te dar gos kyis dkris nas bram ze'i thod pa la me lce'i dreg po 'chags par bya'o//de'i mig sman gyis mig gnyis la byugs na mi mthong bar 'gyuraro//de nas
88b6(rgyud): gzhan yang gdol pa'i me tog dang /shwa tA ba d+ha dang /'dab bzangs kyi mig rnams ril bu byas te khar bcug na de mIs mi tshwa thong bar 'gyuraro//de nas gzhan yang
88b7(rgyud): madra ba bzangs blangs la nyi ma bdun gyi bar du dengul chu ma shA ka cig byas te bza' bar bya'o//des blun du gyur pa gang yin pa de dang /lhan cig bdag nyid kyi khu bas thig
89a1(rgyud): spyan ma mdzong ba myu //'dus ma snang ba spyod ma//mag spya ba shad par byaste/thog mAm+WAr shog mug sman sto na du/
89a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi sdigs 'bum drug lnga yongs su bzlas te mig sman sgrub po ba rtsam par byo//dung drung bya rgod dang ko rer rnams kyi mig blangs te/mnyams nas
89a3(rgyud): sa 'og gi sbrang rtsi'i khri bsdu/dar gris kyi sdong bus drag pa 'chags par 'gyuraro//gang gis 'dis mig sman thugs pa tsam gyis/sa yi bug mthong bar 'gyur//
89a4(rgyud): skar ma lag la/b+h+r-i ha ti dkar po'i rtsa ba dang /dzaM yan+ti nag pa'i rtsa ba dang /lce sbrang gi mig bsnams te/spang rdzis lhan cig btags nas TIg le byas nas
89a5(rgyud): zug mthong bar 'gyur/thA mi ya d+ha'i til mar dang /bi shang ke rA ri'i rtse bo'i khu bar dza dang bcas pas/dar gos la gzhon mas byas pa'i srad thos pa
89a6(rgyud): nas sdong du byas te/mi mi thong pA la d+h+r-ig pa 'chags par byas la/mig sman b+h+yas ni des pAr gter mthong bar 'gyuraro//de nis gnon yang rgyal gyi rmA
89a7(rgyud): dang /skar ma snrums la zla mtshan gyi gos blangs te/brkyang pa 'am bcu bzhi pa la rdo rje tsartsi kA'i thang sku mngon par bris la/mchod pa chen po byas na mtshan ma
89b1(rgyud): 'brum phrag gcig bzlas na nges par rmi lam gyi gtor mthong bar 'gyur//de nas gzhan lang /shing nim pa'i rtsor srong ste/brgyad pa 'am bcu bon pa la thang smra'i mdun du/
89b2(rgyud): tsartsi ka bsams nas lce spyang gi mgo'i steng du khri brag bzlas na tsartsi ka drung du 'ongs nas bdag gis ci bya 'dri bar 'gyur zhing sgrub pa pos bdag la mig sman gyi grub pa rab tu rtsol
89b3(rgyud): ces pa dang /bdag la ri'i bcud ldan gsol ces brjod par bya'o//gi bong dang lce spyang gi mi gr-i dang dngul chu dang /shing tA lA'i khu ba dang /sbrang rdzu mnyam pa rnams
89b4(rgyud): mkhas pas ril bu byo'o//'dis mig sman byas pa'i mig ni/sa'i bu ga mthong bar 'gyuraro//lce sbyang gi mig dang /bya rgod kyi mig dang /ku rA ra nA'i de kho na ltar/
89b5(rgyud): g.yon pas g.yon pa dang /g.yas pas g.yas pa bzung ste/til mar chen pos dreg pa 'chagaso par bya'o//'dis mig sman byas pa'i mi ge nI sa'i bu ga mthong
89b6(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//de nas gzhan yang gi wang dang /mi'i mkhris pa dang /ga pur gyi dngul dang /de bzhin du ha rong byin nas brtag par bya'o//'dis mig slan byas na si'i
89b7(rgyud): bu ga mthong bar 'gyur//de nas gzhan yang /grub pa sna tshogs gnas kyi don//nor dang 'bru sogs phun sum tshogs//lcags brgyad 'joms shing na mkha'
90a1(rgyud): la/spyod pa nyid kyang sbyar bar 'gyur//sngon du bsnun pa'i don du sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas nas dngul chu'i sgrub thabs brtsam par bya'o//
90a2(rgyud): thog mar dngul chu blangs te/tsi tra ka dmar po'i khu bas bsnur bar bya'o//de'i rjes la zangs kyi khu ba dang /gser gyi phye ma byin nas Sha DA ka'i khu bas bzhi cha tshad kyi
90a3(rgyud): no bu byA'o//glang po tshul sha dang /rdzong ros kyis mnyam po rA togs te snong grul spyad kyi nang ngur d+d+he byin nas bsro bar byo'o//gong bu gyur pa phyid mar byas nas/
90a4(rgyud): r-itI'i tshod kyis rlangs 'joms shing gis rnye dang mtshungs par 'gyur//ro 'di dag til myor chen pos bsnor nas/lgang cher dang /mu zos til mor chen po nyi ma gtsu
90a5(rgyud): btso bar bya ste/ji srid slar gong bur gyur gyi bar du'o//sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig cung zad zos pa la skyes bu lo stong phrag tu 'tsho bar 'gyur la/dngul bcos nas gser du
90a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro//gzhan yang swA hA sa'i khu ba byin nas dngul chu bsnur bar bya ste/ji srid gang bur gyur gyi bar du'o//sha tA la dang 'dzum b+hi'i ri'i khu ba dang /shwe kha/1
90a7(rgyud): brus bu'i shun pa sa ser mi nyam po sbyin nas kong dri nang du ba zhag s+ho//de nyid kyis rab tu byugs par byas zhing bskams la byinas skyong bung bsregs pa byeste/myur du
90b1(rgyud): gong bu'i tshod du 'gyuraro//ra ti gnyis kyi tshad kyi nyim+bu nyi shu rtsa gcig ji srid pa rlol ma dang skyur po sbyangs shing thams cad du bud med brten pa yang spang yar bya ste/skyes bu ma
90b2(rgyud): phrag bcu gi nyis su 'a nang /mkha' la spyod pa nyid thob par 'gyuraro//bAM ga bcom na sa dngul chur 'gyuraro//de nis gzhan yang /rIn dz+nyA ni la'i khu bos/su baMts+tsha
90b3(rgyud): mAr+t+ti dang /baSh+Ta s+thir ta'i rtsu ba me nye bar bya ste/nga tshwar dang /nar do Ni'i khu bas gong bur b+hi'o//klong d+ma'i nang du bzhug nas pa ri'i til mer la sbyar ba byiste/
90b4(rgyud): baM drug ge gong bur 'gyu na lpags bdud rnams nges par gser du gyu mi/zos pas mkha' la spyod pa nyid thob para'i gyur ro//mthong ba dang reg bcom gyis la
90b5(rgyud): rnams su 'tsho bar 'gyuraro//de nas glozhin yang /dngul chug ma ro'i khu bas bsnur bar bya ste/som n+tad/pa l+yA sha'i rtsa ba dang /nA ga kai shA ra'i shun pa dang /
90b6(rgyud): gcig dang /kan+d+hi ni nyid dang /de bzhin du skur ba Da'i 'o ma dang mnyam pos bsgo bar bya ste/thun gnyis kyi gong bur 'gyur//cung zad zos pa tsam gyis nges par

98a3(rgyud): bzlas kyi//bdud rtsi char pa bsgom bya ste//'tsho bar ying+ga ni thA tsom med//sa bon yi ge rdzogs pa ni//'dzin pa bcings pa'i mchog yino//kha dog ser

98a5(rgyud): rnams kyis bcings pa la//spyi bor gser 'joms legs par rtogs//de ltar gzhan rnams kyang g.yon pa dang phol mig dang /dmu chu la sogs pa gos pa
98a6(rgyud): legs par tshar gcod pa'i rab tu sbyor ba mang pos kyang ngo //de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal blos//srung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor mdzad//bgegs dang log 'dren 'dug
98a7(rgyud): pa rnams//dgug pa'i don phyir yid gsungs pa//bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin//srung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor las//'bar ba'i sku dang dbyug po yis//
98b1(rgyud): lus gsum lngas skyes dgas par bya//slob pa sangs rgyas rnams kun gyi//lha mo khyod ni dbang por gyur//slob dponag shin rje 'joms dkyil 'khor//ra pa ni
98b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor byi bar bgyi//gos kyis gdong pa bcings nas ni//dkyil 'khor khang po'i nang bzhag nas//kye khyed su zhes brjod bya ste//bdag skul bzang zhes smra byar
98b3(rgyud): bya/blo bzang po la ba nang byas nas//bla ma mchog la gsol btab bya//dbang skur don du gus chen gyi la///mdordo bo'i rjesu gsum brjod bya//ji ltar sangs rgyas chos
98b4(rgyud): tshon gyis//rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur las//bdag la mgon pos yang dag dbang //mchog kyang dngag pa stsal du gas la// dang rol mo de bzhin mchod//
98b5(rgyud): mchod yon zhabs bsil de bzhin nyid//slob mas mchod pa la dbul bya//yang na dar ni bstod pa bya///de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po//stong nyid yang dag gsung bar mdzad//
98b6(rgyud): oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na budz+nyA swa b+hA ba~M A ko ha~M/oM pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ki ha~M/oM d+harma d+ha tuswa b+hA graM Ad+g+ha ka~MhU~M/de nas sbyin sreg ragA rI shar b+h+yo//ge ba la sogs rab bya
98b7(rgyud): las/gong gi sbyin sreg kyis 'grub 'gyur//las kun rab tu sgrub pa po'o//zhi ba'i sems kyi zhi ba la//rgyas pa'i sems gyis rgyas pa pa//rang dag
99a1(rgyud): sems kyis dpung la nyid//drag po yis ni gsod pa la'o//zlum po rnam pa zhi pa ste//rdzing bu rnam pa rgyas pa'o//dbang la zla ba phyed par brjod//
99a2(rgyud): mkha' khams mdog can bsad paM la'o//zhi ba la ni khru gang yin//de bzhin khru gnyis rgyas pa la'o//ji ltar rgyas pa de bzhin dbang //sor mo ny+dzi shu bsad pa la'o//
99a3(rgyud): khru byed brtsigs pa zhi ba la//rgyus pa la ni khru gang ngo //lnga gnyis bsad pA las byas te/dzaM/Ni ltar dgug pa de bzhin dbang //zhi ba'i sbyin sreg tsas gcig la//
99a4(rgyud): zla ba nya lnga rgyas pa ste//bcu bzhi pa la mngon spyod do//brgyad pa la ni dbang gis los//shel dang nya phyis zhi ba la//mu tig 'bras bu rab bsngags te//dung
99a5(rgyud): dang po daM tsi ta dang //nad med pa la mi rus so//tsan dan dmar pos bgos pa yi//byi ru yi ni khyad par las//drag mig lung thang de bzhin du//mi rus nA ga pa
99a6(rgyud): NI yi//brgya phrag gcig ni zhi ba la//de bzhin brgyad lhag rgyas pa la//dbang dang dgug pa nyi shu lnga//drug cu rtsa bzhi mngon spyod la'o//brgya phyed sngags
99a7(rgyud): kyis bsgrub po la'o//ril bu rgyu bar bya sngags la/phreng ba rnams ni thams cad kyi//de bzhin lhun po gnyis rgyu bya//zhi ba 'dzub mo la bzhag s+ho//bung mo
99b1(rgyud): la ni rgyas pa'o//dbang dang dgug pa med mod lnga//char bcad pa ni mtha rlung la'o//kha dog pa' po zhi ba lta//kha dog ser po gyes pa la//dbang la dam po rtag drasum
99b2(rgyud): bya/nges par gsong la nag po 'dod//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang /thugs ga shin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i le'u
99b3(rgyud): sti bcu pa'o////rnal 'byor bzhi dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba dang /ston mo dang /myang ba dang /bldag pa dang /btung ba la sogs pa
99b4(rgyud): yang dag par ldan pa'i dri dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phyi ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /dril bu dang /badran la sogs pa rnams kyis
99b5(rgyud): yang dag par grang ba'i rol mo'i sgra chen po lnga bsgom par bya ste/mdun du gtor ma'i snod sgyogs sam zangs gzhong gi nang du bza' bre tsam bcas pa'i chu khyer ba gsum ji ltar
99b6(rgyud): rnyed pa'i dam tshig gis rdzas dang ldan pa bzhig la/de rab tu gsal bar drang du bzhag la sgom pa brtsam par bya'o//na mkha'i dbyings su pad+ma mdab ma brgyad pa zo ba dang bcus
99b7(rgyud): pa bsgom par bya'o//ze 'bru la yaM yi ge rlung gi dkyil 'khor kha dog sngon po gzhu'i dbyibs can/mthal gnyis su g.yo ba'i bi dan dang rgyal mtshan brgyad kyis rgyan pa'o//
100a1(rgyud): de'i steng du ri yig dmyur po las skyes pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa dmar po zur gsum la raM yig gis mtshan pa'o//de'i steng du ru yig gsum
100a2(rgyud): yongs su gyur pa la/mgo bo gsum gyi sbed bu la gnas pa'i A/\u0f7fyig dmar po la skyes pa'i pad+ma'i snod phyi dkar la nang dmar ba'o//dar pad+ma mdab ma du rgyud pa'i rnam
100a3(rgyud): pa bsam par bya'o//de la shwar la sogs pa'i mdab ma la/brim aM dz+ri khaM hUM gi yi ges rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnams dang /de bzhin du ma la/
100a4(rgyud): sogs pa'i zur du/l-I mAM bAM tAM bAM gri yi ges spyan ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnams bsam par bya zhing /yi ge bcu po 'di rnams yongs su gyur pa las go k+Sha dA ha na
100a5(rgyud): rnams dang /bI re shu mA mu zhes pa 'di rnams kyi yo ge rnams kyis mtshan pa'i dam tshig gi rdzas bcu po 'di rnams pad+ma'i snad du blta bar bya'o//de'i steng du oM yig
100a6(rgyud): kha dog dkar po des bkab pa'i rang bzhin bsams la/oM yig las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro//de'i steng du hU~M yig dkar po las byung ba'i dbyug pa de'i sa bon
100a7(rgyud): gyis mtshan pa blta bar bya'o//de nas slar pad+ma'i snod las 'og gi spyong bu la/oM AHhUM lan bdun bzlas cing brornyed la bsgoms te/snga ma bar ma chad par rlung gi/
100b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bskyed do//mi'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'bar bas gdungs shing bkol te sbyar bas 'brar ba'i gong bu lnga sogs pa dam tshig gi rdzas bcu'i rang bzhin mtha' dgra zhu bas
100b2(rgyud): rdo rje'i dbyugs pos bkrug pa blta bar bya'o//de nas sgyur rdo rje'i dbyug pa zhu bar gyur te/bdud rtsi nyi ma 'tshar ka'i mdog lta bu dngul chu'i rnam par bsam par bya'o//de las sla
100b3(rgyud): oM AHhUM gi yi ge gsum lngas 'thon pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams kyis khams gsum ma lus pa la gnas pa'i bdud rtsi shin tu mang bar blangs par sgom zhing //de nyid
100b4(rgyud): rab tu gzhug par bya'o//de nyid rab tu bcug pa la mkha'i rnam pa shin tu gsal ba'i tshogs bsil ba'i sbrang rtsi 'dus pa'i gzugasu brtan par zhi bya zhing /phyi nas yi ge gsu
100b5(rgyud): gyis byin brlab par bya'o//khwa dog dri ro phun sum tshogs//dri med ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od//ye shes bdud rtser rab sbyor gyis//'bad nas gtor ma rdzogs byas te//
100b6(rgyud): gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'i sngags pa khro bo phyag na zhags pa dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa spros nas/
100b7(rgyud): phyogs skyong rnams kyi snying la lcags kyus phug cing //mgul pa la zhags pas bcings te bkug par bsam par bya'o//de nas oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM
101a1(rgyud): sun rdo rje dang /rmigs mdzuH mdzad pa bkugi ste shar du bzhug par //sngags de nyid kyis skye bang mtha'i stong gyi gangan la/na pa tsha spyod pan canag rdzan
101a2(rgyud): tshon dang la po 'an pa/g.yenan dung dang kau ts+tsha b+hU dzI ga/dkyi gi sman du mi rang bar bzhag pa/yang denyid a ga shi
101a3(rgyud): zhon pa dbyug pa 'dzin pa spyi ru bzhag par bya'o// rje nyid kyis chu lha kha dag dar po dring 'gro la zhon pa/phyag nI kArI zhugs pa can nub tu bzhug par gyur/
101a4(rgyud): yid de nyid kyi.a lus ngan sa pe g+hA t+tar lo ga pa phyug ni b+h+r-i m+bu r+yA dang /nA kA li can byed du rdeg par byAn+tu/denyid kyis klung snu pA/ri be+e b+hA ba lA gnas pa/
101a5(rgyud): g.yas na grang phreng dang gasta 'dzin pa/g.yon no ste zug dang /la du 'dzin pa doni /de nyid kyis dbang phyug de/bo khyu mchog la zhon pa ral pa 'a
101a6(rgyud): pa byag na rtse gsum dgod pa can/phyag gnyis de/ma la 'khyud pa dbang ldan du bzhag par spyor//yang de nyid kyis mi lha dmar ba rnal gnas pa phyag na 'dang /
101b1(rgyud): b+hU d+ha dwags can mod pa /ya pa smon pa byA nA b+h+yo dug po dang du mag tha~M nga ba sa pa po n+d+han ban
101b2(rgyud): b+h+yo/yang de nyid kyis m+b+ha lta du nga'i mdog can ri dgas so 'i phyi gnas pa rlung du dag par bye/yang de nyid kyis nyin dmang po phyug gi sa kyis pad+mA ni b+hi t+t+ra na la
101b3(rgyud): nas paskyed du zhag pad+mo 'o// deny-i kyis zla ba gang po phyug gnyis kyis su srung 'dzin pa shi N+Da la gnas pa snang du zhin pa/yad nyid
101b4(rgyud): na sbyin pa skye sa dang /mi gas dzi/debyug pa dang /klung bre'i dzin pa sa ng+yas rgyun pa dang pa phy-i gas pa sgrad nag pa gyur//
