101b6(rgyud): shing rtu la glenas pa/g.yas bya tshig shiphrin pa grasasdigs mdzu 'dzin pa de nyid du bzhig par //de nas khyo gshin rje ga shrI kyi gzugs phyu
101b7(rgyud): naphung pa dzin pa rnams la/khro ba 'igrin pa 'a nyid thugs kyi ma dzan kyis 'dug ste/de rnams kyi slong me /mgrin pa dang /spyib rna na
102a1(rgyud): yang sngags 'dis phur pa gdab par bya'o//oM hrIHd+d+hiHwi kr-I tA nA na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/sarba In+da A d+hI nak+ShI lA ya hU~M phaT/ces pa'i phur pA btab/
102a2(rgyud): pa'i mthar grub pa'i mA cung bsdus la lha de rnams thams cad kyang gshin rje mthar byed kyi rnam par bskyed par bya ste/byang chub kyi sems khu bas sam yang na nga'i tshes
102a3(rgyud): bon dang mtshan ma'i rim pas bskyed par bya'o//de las sa bon hriHyig las rdzogs pa dbang po'o//sa bonaSh+T+r-iHlas rdzogs pa gshin rje'o//sa bon bi las rdzos
102a4(rgyud): pa chu lha'o//sa bon kr-i yig las rdzogs pa lus ngan no//sa bon ta yig las rdzogs pa dbang ldan no//sa bon A yig las rdzogs pa me lha'o//sa bon na
102a5(rgyud): yig las rdzogs pa bden bral lo//sa bon na yig las rdzogs pa rlung lha'o//sa bon hI yig las rdzogs pa zla ba'o//sa bon hU~M yig las rdzogs pa
102a6(rgyud): ma'o//swa bon phaT yig las rdzogs pa tshangs pa'o//sa bon paT yig las rdzogs pa nor 'dzin ma'o//sa bon swA yig las rdzogs pa thags bzangs riso//
102a7(rgyud): sa bon hA yig las rdzogs pa 'byung po thams cad ces pa'o//de ltar bskyed rnam par bsams nas/de rnams kyi mig la sogs pa rnams la/gnas ci lta bar
102b1(rgyud): mig la sogs pa bskyed cing /lus la sogs pa rnams la sku rdo rje lnga sogs pa rnams dang /gshin rje mthar byed kyi cod pani nyid dang /dang por mchod yon bsang gtor dang
102b2(rgyud): zhabs bsil la stsogs pa phul/phye nas gtor ma'i yo byad bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i rim pas sngon du ste/de nyid gsum gyis mngon par bsngag cing /slar de rnams kyi ljags//
102b3(rgyud): kyi rab tu sbyor ba rnamasar bsams la/phyi nas sngags 'dos bdud rtsi dbul bar bya'o//oM rak+ta mu ku TA ya/rak+ta dzA TA yA/rak+ta mu khA ya/rAk+ta sha ri rA ya/rik+ta b+hu
102b4(rgyud): dzA ya/rak+ta muN+Da mA lA b+ha ra NA ya/rak+to ra tha sa mA ru nA ya/rak+ta pad+ma U sa nA yaM/rak+ta b+ha ra Na b+hu Sha NA yaM/i daM bi la gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ma ma bi gr-I ha ra ha ra/tsa tu ra mI
102b5(rgyud): rAn ni bA ra yaM nai bA ra ya/trA sa yat+tA sa yaM/b+hU ma ya b+h+r-i ma yA/ts+tshin+ne ts+tshin+na/b+hin+da da b+hir+tha/nai sha ya nA sha ya/sho Sha yaM sho ShA ya/ts+tshe dats+tsai ngaM/b+he da b+ha da/hwA/
102b6(rgyud): phaT baT swA hA/phyi nas yan lag so sosa? dbul bar bya ste/au in+d+ra ye ni meHhIHya mA ya na muHSh+TiHba ru NA ya na maHbi ku be r-I ya na ma?/kr-i a shA nA yA/
102b7(rgyud): na maHti ag+ma ye na maHAHnai ri d+hA ya nam/nai b+ha ya be na maHna tse ye na maHhUM U yaM na maHhUM/brah+ma Ne na ma phaT/ba su d+ha rA yaM na maHphaT/bi rma
103a1(rgyud): sogs la dngul bu gyul//de rnams li sgrub pa bos phul ba'i bdud rnams cad gsal bar longs spyod par mdzod//de gnas pa rnams la rdo rje gsor la 'ching
103a2(rgyud): dang bcas par dril bu khrol zhing bstong pa byas te/gti mug dgi' ma la sogs pas mngon par spyod pas//gsal bu gad pe cing /shad pa rnam pa brgyad
103a3(rgyud): spyod par bya'o//de la sngags 'di yin to/ha ha he ha ho hi hUM hUM/gshegs par bya ste/oM aHmuHces pa 'dis kyang ngo //phye nas sgrub pa po'i mngon par/
103a4(rgyud): 'dod pa yong mdzad //khyud kyis sems can thams cad don/jilnga'i rje spu 'thun grub pa stsol//sangs rgyas yul du gshegs mdzod//slang nas kyang ni
103a5(rgyud): pa mdzong //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ga shin rdzog med dmar po'i rgyung la mo//gta ma'i len ldan cig pa'o//
103a6(rgyud): denas nges par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i chen po la bstod pa/gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/
103b1(rgyud): /shin tu 'dzugs rung gshin rdzog sheng //snyan pa sangs rgyas kun ra bzhin//s+ya ste rdorje druglu 'tshalo//phra ma rdo rje rang zhon khyod//shin tu 'jigs rung ba shin drug she
103b2(rgyud): brags kyi rdo rje rab gsal pa//rin rgyun rdo rje khyung phyag 'tshol//'dang rmugs rdo rje ma zhin khyod//'dod chugs rjes kyi 'byung gnas gtso//dbyangs mchog kun gyi
103b3(rgyud): gi mchog/gsung gi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshalo//phyug dog rdo rje rang bzhin khyod//lus kun byed pa'i gshin dzA ni shad//dzA yi rdo rje sa gsal ba//phyag ni ram
103b4(rgyud): khyong phyag 'tshal//sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyed//sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa//sangs rgyas kun rab mchog go mchog/dkyil 'khor dbang phyug
103b5(rgyud): khyong phyag 'tshal//rdo rje spyan dang /rdo rje sbyin dang /rdo rje shangs dang /rdo rje ljags dang /rdo rje dang /rdo rje thugs ces pa'o//zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i sbyin
103b6(rgyud): lo sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'i dam tshig go/de nas drag shul gshin rje gshed //dkyil 'khor 'di las rab bshad bya//gshin rje gshed po rab gsal
103b7(rgyud): ba/'dod po'i don kun sgrub par byed//gsar pa lags par skal ba dang /legs pa'i tshad ldan gtsang ma yi//srad bus thig gdab shes rab can//gshin rje
104a1(rgyud): d+mo 'an//mnan khyod rnams ca nan rdzus//gas rnams cad ma nga rnams//nr-i la sag+sa na gru
104a2(rgyud): ma par dbyabs kyi snrel 'khor te//de ni kun+da namAH//las s+t+rI rdo rje par bya/rnams ya dag 'khrigs//de yi dbus su rdo /
104a3(rgyud): hrIdISh+Ta yang dag mags//'khor lo shing rjer bri bar bya//'od zerd phreng bas yang dag ma khrig ste/rin chen skyo ru shi bahU~M/pad+mo ga 'di 'brug
104a4(rgyud): sbyin gyi mdog dang mtshungs pa'i 'od//ral gri byang du bre byung bya//'khor lo shar gyi zung du d+hi/snro ru rdo rje zla ba bya//nub tu pad+mi brib ste//
104a5(rgyud): r+ya baHsa pa'i//'dren lnga dang yang dag /ral gyi khyong du zla bAr bya//shAnab+hi s+thi ru thob ste/ r+dz+nyA d+hI b+hUg+h+ra b+hI nga //'a ma skyes nuts+tsha
104a6(rgyud): 'o//byang dural gri rdo rje n+te//dkyi pa'i khor rdzogs pa shes bya ste//mchod pa'i khyad par rnams bya'o//'dzi yon lnga yis sangs rgyas rnams/
104a7(rgyud): nyi med par mchod per bya//de zinan gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ga shi ni rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor chen po'i le'u ste
104b1(rgyud): rku/ na na zhan sa \u0f7f/smyos sun snang na ga /phyogs pa da na can pa nga ba
104b2(rgyud): gas skyes shAt+l-i//byed kyi/phyag ga sus//deN+Di ga b+h+ya / cwo hrI
104b3(rgyud): bri ga/rtag tu hrI sreg gis ma //rgyud ma smyig sgru skye//rnam pa gnang byung nas//thugs cid pan nga //gnas pa skye
104b4(rgyud): sbyin pa d+mo//gsum rgyu // pA ba / rna la darje su ba ni bcon//dmang po'i nas nas 'byu ba ste//dbang bsgyu 'ad/
104b5(rgyud): rgyal po'i skas su rAH chu hU~M//dun su 'byung 'i sa smyig/gta mthu bsnga rab pa shad//sngags can da par gyur ban/
104b6(rgyud): ma sa gas 'i da sa pa /ga kyi su sa pa ni//maung sgyu
105a1(rgyud): byas nas ni//lha rnams tshim byas rnal 'byor pa//hwA hA'i rnam pa slar dran bya//dkyil 'khor gsum na byas nus na//brgyu dang bcu gnyis byucu drug rnam
105a2(rgyud): mkhas pas cho gos yang dag bri//sngags rnams thams cad dgod bya ste//grub pa'i sngags rnams brtul zhugs can//ri mig bcu gnyis la dgo bya//mi r+g+haM rgyu ba
105a3(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum//ma lus lhag me med par 'grub//ya ma rA dzA sa do me ya//ya me do ru Na yod ye//ya da yo nI rA yak+She ya//yak+ShaM yats+tsha ni rA ma ya//yau dbus
105a4(rgyud): shar du k+Shi dgod bya//lho ru 'jam pa'i rdo rje ste//mi yig nub tu bri bar bya//byang du de yig dge byed//bsgrub bya'i ming ni blang bya zhing //phyogasau bral stong pa la bzung bya/
105a5(rgyud): hUM dag gis ni nang sbal bya//las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya//yats+tshi nirA dz+nyA swa de ru//NA yau ni ra ces phyi rol//thams cad don phyir sgrub pa la//g.yon nas
105a6(rgyud): brtsams te yang dag bris//re mig rim pa gsum pa yi//mdun du cig dir ri mig la//hrIHSh+T+rIHces sogs sngags rnams kyis//shar nas brtsams te brib
105a7(rgyud): byad/do mdzar dor ba'i re mig la//re mig brgyad po yang dag bri//a mu ki ku ru mA ra ya uts+tshi Ta ya/ba shI ku ru/bi de ShA ya/shA ni taM ku ru/puSh+Ti ku ru/
105b1(rgyud): nos pa de lta bu la sogs pa las kyi rjesu 'thun pa las dang po au yog mtha' ra na myaHmtha' ran pa Sha T+Ta gau ShaT hU~M phaT yi ge ldan pa bon/zhi ba rgyus pa dbang mthar byed//de bzhin
105b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/'khor lo snang ba zhes bya ba'i dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//
105b3(rgyud): thugs rje mnga' ba bcom ldan 'das//zhe sdang gshin rI gshed sku mchog/zhe sdang gis mnan 'gro gzigs nas//zhe sdang thams cad zad par mdzad//thugs rje mnga'
105b4(rgyud): ba bcom ldan 'das//gti mug gshin rje gshed sku mchog/gti mug gis mnan 'gro gzigs nas//gti mug thams cad zad par mdzad//thugs rje mnga' ba
105b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das//phra ma gshin rje gshed sku mchog/phra mas mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas//phra ma thams cad zad par mdzad//thugs rje mnga' ba bcom ldan 'das
105b6(rgyud): 'dod chags gshin rje gshed sku mchog/'dod chags kyis mnan 'gro gzigs nas//'dod chags thams cad zad par mdzad//thugs rje mnga' ba bcom ldan 'ang//
105b7(rgyud): phrag dog gshin rje gshed sku mchog/phrag dog gis mnan 'gro gzigs nas//phrag dog thams cad zad par mdzad//byams pa tsar tsi kA rab brjod//de bzhin
106a1(rgyud): snying rje phag mo'o//dga' ba dbyangs can ma rab grags//btang snyoms gau rI gzugs can ma//bdag nyid dngos po thams cad kyis//rdzogs gyur dkyil
106a2(rgyud): 'khor rnal 'byor pa//snying kha'i sa bon las sgro bya//'dir ni 'grub 'gyur the tsom med//de nas spyod pa'i mtshan nyid mchog/'di las yang dag rab bshad bya//'dzin//
106a3(rgyud): byed gshin rje gshed gzugs kyi//sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub phyir//dgon pa chen po'i so phyogasu//ma he mchog la zhon bya zhing //sbrul rnams kyis ni rgyun
106a4(rgyud): byas nas//ljags kyi rdo rje bsgom bya ste//gyen 'grang khyud 'jigaso la sogs pa//dbu skra da mor ser dag tu bya//spyi bor cod pa no rnams kyis bskor//sma ra ser po
106a5(rgyud): dag byas la//hrIHSh+NIHla sogs brjod cing //rdo rje dbyug pa yang dag gsor//de nas seng ge'i sgra byas te//gaushin rje gshed dmar rab sbyar las//cung
106a6(rgyud): zlang nus pa thob pa ni//rol cing glong du 'jug par bya//ska lnga pa bzang po gar bya zhing //drug las skyes sogs byu blangs bya//de nas rgyal mtshan khyams bltas te//
106a7(rgyud): de ni 'o ma rab sbyar bya//'o ma goms pa'i sems gcig gis//phyag rgya chen po rab bsgrub bya//phag mo'i gzugs su bsam bya zhing //btsun mo kun la 'di
106b1(rgyud): bi bya//steng gi ltar spyod rnal 'byor pa//'dod don thams cad grub par byed//de nas phyag rgyar sgrub pa'i thabs//'di las yang dag rlab bshad bya//sngags chen yo ga//
106b2(rgyud): gtsug po ste//de yi bzlas pas rab brtan bya//hrIHSh+T+r-iHso gas sa bon yang dag byung //ma he'i gdong ni rnam par sgom//rdo rje dkyil 'khor monyam zhugs pa//ma/
106b3(rgyud): he'i steng du bsgom par bya//gang su sa la 'bigs pyod pa//sna tshogs mtshon cha'i rang bzhin can//mA ha'i gdong ni sgrub pa la//blo ldan phyag rnams las sgom bya//
106b4(rgyud): de nas rdo rje dbyug pa yi//sgrub thabs 'di las rab bshad bya//hrIHyig sngags ni chen po ste//ma he chen po la zhon pa'o//'bum gnyis yang dag rdzogs pa'i phyag
106b5(rgyud): thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs pa'i sku//ri rab lhun po dang mnyam pa//sa yi 'og tu mnan pa'o//de nas bya ba'i phyag sgrub thabs//'di las yang dag rab bshad byo//
106b6(rgyud): sngags che na bi kr-i tA na na//gtso bo hUM yig lasra byung ba//oM bi kr-i tA na na hA hA tI hI hU~M hUM he he ho hai swA hA/dgos po thams cad rab sgrub phyir//'di las dam tshig sgrub
106b7(rgyud): thabs bshad//sngags kyi dub pa'i bza' ba ni//bzang por rnyed par dga' ba'i zas//sha tshon dang ni rta nyid dang //glang po che yi khyod par nyid//ba glang rang bzhin
107a1(rgyud): 'dud/ du r+m+mA b+h+yaHda//sgyu khru tshun sa Am+b+ha la drug/ thun po bsgos pa bcoM ba g+h+ra/dun lngam+b+hal phyugs tsam gros//tshwa rmA/
107a2(rgyud): mas drung da/ m+b+hi'i wa /bzhin sam mas ma nyid//so pe b+h+ya ma bye mas pa'om//sa shing la ma rnas da /
107a3(rgyud): lus la sa byi s+ho/de bzhin rdo du kyi //'di ni rnal 'byor ma ga cog/rang 'byung mi d+hI/spyong bar ldan//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su dadru
107a4(rgyud): dang thug pa go shrIn+ti~M d+h+r-i ga shed dmar 'i hU~Md lhas//spyod pa dang dam tshig sgrub pa'i len+d+ra bcu bzhi blo'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po
107a5(rgyud): d+h+r-ig d+hA gyi k+Shi rnam pa'i tid 'dzin mi stom phyur zhugs b+h+rUM dang/rje b+hag ma'i rnam pa'i ting 'dzin lha snronam+b+ha pa zhugs byung de/dbyangs tsan+do mra'i rnam
107a6(rgyud): na s+yA gas pa dang //kaud+hAng+ka rnaMm pa'i da 'dzin la sems mas /ng+ge'ib+h+rUM brjo mad+hAd/ga shin rjeg
107a7(rgyud): dbang /bla ma smin pa'i gzugs rang bzhin//khyod mthong kho ba rnam par 'jigs/ mkhA/ bzhin spangs///khyod kyis gang mdzad sa skyengs pa
107b1(rgyud): sma bla dag dang sa 'og g.yo//chags pas brgyan pa'i khro bo'i yid//grwar mdzad khyod ni ro langs lags//sku ni dmar zhing thung ba ste//rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs sprul pa
107b2(rgyud): rdorje dbyangs can mas btud che//gar mdzad bde ba chen po khyod//hrIHhrIgasong sngags dag gi khyod//sa gsum po yi 'khrul pa stsal//snying rje'i khri brje btsun
107b3(rgyud): khyod//glur mdzad 'gro ba rnams la gzigs//de nas bzlas pa'i ma chen nyid mchog/'di las yang dag rab bi shwad bya//gang gis bzlas pa'i rab spyir gyis/
107b4(rgyud): rgyu chen dngos grub thob par 'gyur///myur ba ma yin bul bri min//ring po ma yin thung ngu min//sngags ni cung zad thos pa ste//gshin rje'i slob dpo ni mi yi mchog
107b5(rgyud): mo hA me dang glang po che//ba lang rang bzhin rta nyid dang //bong bu rnga mo'i rus paM gzung ///bzlas pa'i phreng ba rab bsgrub bya//zla ba zla ba'i bcu bzhi la//sha lnga yis ni byaH/
107b6(rgyud): bya zhing //bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan//mchog gi dngos grub rgyur bzlas te//chos gcig ril bu rnal 'byor pa//mkhas pA gshin rdzog shed bsgom bya//yang na
107b7(rgyud): mi yi mgo bo ni//khrag dang ldan par rnam bsgom bya//khri phrag tsam gyis 'byung po rnams//mkha' 'gro ma rnams stong phrag gis//gshin rjeg shad kyi rab sbyor
108a1(rgyud): lus//yi dwags tshogs rnams bsad par bya//bzlas pa 'bum gyis rnal 'byor bdag/de ni las kun byed pa yin//bye ba bzlas pas 'grub 'gyur te//bye
108a2(rgyud): ba lnga yis smos ci dgos//nyin re bzla ba so so 'am//yang na li rnams so so la//dbyug gu drug bcu rtsa ba nir mkhas//gtor ma drug bcu rtsa bani sbyi ni//rtag tu
108a3(rgyud): cung zad za bi gang //de bzhin cung zad gling 'thung ba//gzhan yang bza' ba thams cad kyi//phud no ga shin rje gshed la dbul//de nas bla mar yon dbul bas//'di
108a4(rgyud): las yang dag rab bshad bya//bdag nyid zhi ba nyid phyir dang //las kun grub pa'i phyir du yang //phangs pa med par dbul byas te//bdag nyid dngul gyi rna rgyan dang /
108a5(rgyud): gser dang nor dang ma ma dang //de bzhin bu dang chung ma dang //bskyed byed sring mi bu mo dang //rnam pa sna tshogs na bza' nyid//gdugs dang rnga yab mdzes pa nyid//khang
108a6(rgyud): pa khri dang dri bzang dang //de bzhin glu dang mi nyid//ral gri dang ni rgyun nyid kyang //bla mar rab dbulci brtul zhugs can//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
108a7(rgyud): gsung thugs pa/shin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/nye bar mkho bo thams cad sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o///de nas sems can thams cad
108b1(rgyud): gyi bdud 'joms pa'i don du/dmyur bya nyid ni 'dod chags la sogs phyi'i nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'i don to//spyan gsum nI 'dus pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /dUltar byung bri dus
108b2(rgyud): gsum mo//phyag gnyis ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'joms pa'i phyir ro//shes rab dang 'khyud pa ni stong pa dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i sbyor ba lnga so//
108b3(rgyud): klu brgyad ni rnam par shes pa brgyad mtshon pa'i phyir ro//mgo ba'i phreng ba brgya phyed ni/yi ge lnga bcu pa'i sbyor ba la so//g.yon no thod pa ni/ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsi'i ro yongs
108b4(rgyud): rdzogs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no//g.yas na dbyug pa ni//phung po dang /nyon mongs pa dang /lha'i bu dang /'chi bdag gi bdud bzhi rnam par 'joms pa snying rje'i
108b5(rgyud): rang bzhin no//g.yon brkyang ba ni khams gsum pa rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir//lha mo'i phyag g.yon na bdud bzhi'i khrug dang bcud len gyi ro du ma myang ba'i phyir thong po'o//
108b6(rgyud): g.yas pa ni dngos pa dang dngos po med pa'i rnam par rtog pa gcod pa'i phyir gri gug go/mo rungs pa 'dul ba'i phyir khro bo'i gzugs dang gsus pa 'byung ba nyid do//mya ngan
108b7(rgyud): las mi 'da' ba nyid las dbu skye ser po gyen du 'gyong ba nyid/gru bzhi ni sdug bsngal ba dang /kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /lam gyi bden pa bin rab tu rtog
109a1(rgyud): !//pa'i phyir//sgo bzhi ni bdud bzhi kun tu skrag par byed pa'i phyir//zur bzhi ni tshangs pa'i gnas yongasu rdzogs pa'i phyir//ka ba brgyad ni rmi lam dang /
109a2(rgyud): dri zi'i grong khyer dang /brag cha dang /sgyu ma dang /sbrel pa dang /smig rgyu dang /me long gi gzugs brnyan dang /chu'i zla ba lta bu brgyad kyi rang bzhin nyid las na ma khA/
109a3(rgyud): ltar dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'i don no//gang gis skyes bu rab tu 'joms pa nyid lngas dra ba phyed pa rnamaso//rta babs bzhi ni sbyin pa
109a4(rgyud): dang /snyan par smra ba dang /don dpyod pa dang /don 'thun pa nyid dang /yang dag por srong bu bzhi rnam par dag pa'i phyir//de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i//sgrub
109a5(rgyud): thabs 'di las rab bshad bya//mkha' dbyings dbus su gnas pa yis/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mchog bsam bya//phyag tu rdo rje rnam bsgoms nas/
109a6(rgyud): lhag ma phyag gzhan rnam dgod bya//shar du sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma//phyag drug gti mug yang dag mtshungs//phyag na 'khor lo 'jigs byed tshwa/
109a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor la bsgom bya//lho ru rin chen mkha' 'gro ma//phyag drug phra ma yang dag mtshungs//phyag ni rin chen 'jigs byed che//nyi ma'i
109b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la bsgom bya//nub tu pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma//phyag drug bad+ma 'dzin pa'o//byung du las kyi mkho' 'gro ma//dkyil 'khor snying po rol gri ma'o//me l+ya se sa
109b2(rgyud): zlazlo bzhi ru//lha mi rnam sgom pa rtul zhigs can//skyeg mi phreng baM gi rI du zhin//kaum drug gi khyad par nyid//de nas sgo skyong bsam par bya//las kyi chog mthong
109b3(rgyud): yi dang byi tho ba dbyug pa dang //pad+me de byizhin ral gri'o//oM bud+d+ha nA~M ki ni/oM badz+nyA nA ki nI/oM rat+na DA ki ni/oM pad+mA nAkr-i ni/oM karma nIkI ni/waM ma~M na~M gaM zur
109b4(rgyud): du'o//oM mud ga ra dzaHoM dar+N+Na hUM/oM pad+ma baM/oM khang+ga ho/zhes gsungs bcom ldan rdo rje can//rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs//ring po nas thos grub don du/
109b5(rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma sgom bya//de ltar rab tu 'grub pa'i sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa ni/oM I k+She sha tsa ra badz+ra DA ki ni swA hA//de nas rab tu bshad bya gzhan//
109b6(rgyud): rdo rje sa 'og sgrub pa'i thabs//sa dog 'jug pa sgrub don du//gnod mdzes rdo rje bsgom par bya//phyag drug sku ma dag sngon po mdangs//phyag tu gtun shing dag
109b7(rgyud): par bya//dkyil 'khor snying po'i dbus su ni//'di dgod rab tu bsgom par bya//shar du spyan ma dgod byo ste//de bzhin l+yA ru mA ma kI//nub tu lha mo gos dkar mo//byang
110a1(rgyud): du sgrol ma dgod par bya//me tog bdug pa mar me dri//mye la sogs pa rnamasu dgod//tho ba la sogs sgo rnams lnga//sbrul gyi rgyun dang ska rags te//lasa?
110a2(rgyud): kyi cho ga mthong ba yis//'khor lo 'di ltar bsgom par bya//rdo rje sa 'og rnal 'byor ldan//bug pa rmi lam du shes 'gyur//de nas rgyal po bdud dkyil 'khor//'di
110a3(rgyud): las yang dag rab bshad bya//mkha' la spyod nyid sgrub don du//rta mchog rab tu bsgrub par bya//phyag gnyis pa dang zhal gcig pa//sku mdog ljang ku 'jigs rung
110a4(rgyud): bA/nyi ma'i steng du yang dag bzhugs//shin tu 'jigs byed rta yi zhal//g.yas pa ral gri khu tshur te//g.yon pa'i phyag ni thod pa ste//oM phu phu hi hi/snga
110a5(rgyud): 'di bzlas bya shes rab can//rta mchog rab tu grub pa'i phyir//shar du rdo rje ma rnams gsam//lho phyogasu yang myur 'gro ma//nub tu rgyal po bdun pa ste//byang
110a6(rgyud): du rta mchog dgod par bya//gtso bo'i zhal dang phyog dag gis//thams cad g.yas kyis bsgom bya nyid//sngags 'di yis ni thams cad nyid//spro ba dag tu rab tu/
110a7(rgyud): grags//gling bu pi wang rdza rnga dang //rnga zlum yong ni zur du'o//ba lang rna ba glang chen sna//bzhin bzang bzhin ngen de bzhin du//gtun shing dang ni dge sta dang /
110b1(rgyud): lcags kyu zhags pa nyid kyang ste//gar la sogs tshul rnal 'byor las//sgo bzhir rtag tu bsam par bya//g.yon du ya ba si bsam bya//de bzhin g.ya su rang rtog so//
110b2(rgyud): rta mchog sngags ni ji lta ba//rdo rjes 'og g.yo bar byed//rta mchog bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas//khams gsum mkha' la yongs bskor//de bzhin gshegs pa tha
110b3(rgyud): kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/rnam par dag pa dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pating sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//
110b4(rgyud): de nas 'di la thig gdab pa'i dam tshig lngas/a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+har+m+ma NAM/a d+ya nud pan ne twAta/slob ma rnam snang du byas te//ga shrin rje mthar byed dpal gzugs kyis//
110b5(rgyud): ye shes srad bu rtse gzung mchog/legs par mnyam gzhag gdab par bya//de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i dam tshig go/oM AHhUM ring ba dkyil
110b6(rgyud): 'khor nyis 'gyur la//sgo yi nya shu cha dag ste//ba yi rnam lngas yang dag byug/srad bu gnyis ni yang dag brtag/de la 'di ni rdo rje chen po la gsol ba btab pa'i dam
110b7(rgyud): tshig go/e ma sangs rgyas slob dpon che//e ma chos dang tshogs kyi gtso//bdag la dam tshig de nyid gsol//byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol//de yang 'di
111a1(rgyud): /ni sa chen po yongs su gzung ba'i dam chag glo/rdo d+hA saSh+Ti wA mr-i spyan dra swA ta//sgrub pa sangs rgyas thams cad \u0f7f//spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang //sa dang
111a2(rgyud): rol phyin rnams la//lha mo khyed ni dbang du gyur//dkyil 'khor gyi ni brgyud tshi//shrIs bya bdag nyid ma rnams kyis//rnams chen dag nI do byi ste//yid du 'ong
111a3(rgyud): legs par spras//sgo mi ti khyud shes d+yos+t+wa~M/de phyed lha yi snam bu'i//dzA rje lA mo yong dge ldan//glu gar rol mo sogs rnams kyis/ ye byed N+Di 'gram
111a4(rgyud): dang lcogs//ces pa drab phyed kyang //nyi zla me tog phreng snyam ze//de yid phyed kyi rdul tshon sa//de ponan dkyil 'khor phyi rol thig/de la 'din stong po n+d+he/
111a5(rgyud): bdag nyid dkyil 'khor me khye'o lnga dgod//de nas phyag rgya bcas pa sbyin//dam tshig gis ni yi ge gzhun/de ltar dkyil 'khor rab tu skrag/shang phyogs
111a6(rgyud): pu ni da/ po che//sbyor ni sa bya yang dag ldan//nA gyi sa nI dam ba ste//ljang gu byung du yang dag ldan//'od 'bar in+d+ra nI la'i tshul/dbus kyis hU~M
111a7(rgyud): yang dag bri//de nas phyag rgya dgod par bya//las kyi tshig mthong ba yis//dbus su rdo rje yang dge bri//'khor lo shar du menyam par bri//de bzhin g+ho ru

111b2(rgyud): gzung yu ba'i tshang bya'o//kuni nas khyu gung tshad dag gis//de pyid dkyil 'khyer bya ba ste//sor mo bzhi yi tshod dang ldan//zabs ni sor mo gnyis pa la//
111b3(rgyud): tshad ni sor gsum mo//dma' ba the bo'i lto gang ste//rgyar ni sor mo gnyis pa'o//pad mad pa rnam pa'i thugs gzar dang //tshad ldan rgyad du rab tu bsngags//dkyil

111b7(rgyud): cad kyi gcen rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i tshi ga thos nas cang mi smra bar gyur to//de la 'di ni rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshigo/de yang 'byung chen sa bon gyis//'khor la bzhi la

112b3(rgyud): pa drug ni rnams kyi /de bzhin dag pa na 2/so skye ba zla sa //de bzhin dam pa m+b+ha rgyal gyis so//bil bI'i snying po la mi sbyin//dman
112b4(rgyud): da phyug /nag padun tu gyug/du ni smr-i zhi ga rnams nas mAn ba/

112b6(rgyud): mgrin pa mgul bI bzhin dz+nyAnashAd+hI hrIni'i khru gang m+b+ha//gyen dus ma //byug dang zhabs dang gdong ji bzhin//sig gi mad ni mAH
112b7(rgyud): rna bang sor mi de nyis rab gsung 'o//de bzhin sgo yi shubasi la bzhi//mchu dang song mo gnyis ran gsungs//skye ba'i zabs ni sor bzhi'o//zhal gyi che ni lus /
113a1(rgyud): te//mgrin pa'i rnam pa nga bar 'ad//ralnga pa dang misbrul gyi tshad//sbyor ba sod ma cod pan dru/de nas bla phyugs pa rngam gu l+le'o//sgrub pa
113a2(rgyud): 'di las rab bshad bya//gang gis bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni//chu yi steng du 'gro bar byed//zhal gsum phyag drug sor mo ste//chu yi sa bon las byung ba
113a3(rgyud): phyag na sbrul dang sru chen mo//rma bya'i bzhin pa dag la dgyes//shar du dgod bya rma bye mo//de bzhin sgo ru khro gnyer can//nub tu rare khrod lo ma can//byang du rje
113a4(rgyud): rje lcags sgrog ma//sgro dang spyi blugs yal ga dang //lcags sgrogs rnams kyang bsgom par bya//ser po dmar po de bzhin ljang //sngon po'i kha dog rab dbye
113a5(rgyud): las//de ltar bsgom bye shes rab can//de nas sngags kyang bzlas par bya//oM phu dzA phu dza/sgo ru tho ba sogs dgod cing //zur du me tog ma sogs dgo do//
113a6(rgyud): 'phags mdzaM gu li rnal 'byor//ldan pas rtag tu chu stengs 'gro/de nas ku ru kul+le yi//sgrub thabs 'di las rab bshad bya//gang gis bsams bcom
113a7(rgyud): gyis ni//klu yi btsun mo 'gugs par byed//sku mdog dmar mo zhal ba ni ma//phyag brgyad dang ni yang dag ldan//hrIHyig sa bon las byung ma/
113b1(rgyud): klu rnams 'gugs par byed pa mo//mtha' yas la sogs rigs brgyad kA//phyag brgyad l-i ni dgod par bya//rgyun rnams thams cad brgyan pa'i lus//rang bzhin
113b2(rgyud): bosgom bya brtul zhugs can//sngags ni ku ru kul+le hrIHpu swA hA/de nis 'di la gsong ba bshad//mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par mid//gang gis rnam par she
113b3(rgyud): tsam gyis//lha yi bu mo 'gugs par byed//phyag gnyis pa dang zhal gcig ste//phyug na mda' dang gzhu basnrums po//sku mdog ser mo sku chen ma//2
113b4(rgyud): med rnam par bsgom par bya//shar du dga' me bsam bya ste//lho ru 'dod pa mdzes pa mo//nub tu 'dod pa'i lha mo ste//byang du 'dod pa la sgro mo'o//'dod
113b5(rgyud): lha mo thams cad ni//phyag du mda' gzhu bsgom par bya//ser po dmar po de bzhin ljang //dkar dri mar dag ni bsgom par bya//zur nyid du ni rtag tu yang //mu lag
113b6(rgyud): uSh+mA bA stan te/chu sngon rgyal mtshan yang sgron//tshol rab tu bshad par bya//kan dur ba ka de bzhin du//dran pa dang ni 'tshams kyi bdag/lha rnams dag ni tha~Md
113b7(rgyud): /spyi bor gshin rje gshed po sgom//bud med bya rog gdong mthar gnas//rdo rje lus med rnam bsgom bya//shing yig sngags ni yang dag 'thung //kun nas rnam par/
114a1(rgyud): /b+ha ste//'khrul rnying 'khrugs par bsams byas nas//'dod yig byung ba la spro ba//gos dmar gyis ni rab bkres pa//rkang pa drug la ltung ba nyid//de
114a2(rgyud): la nges par sngags bzlas bya//oM yig dbyangs kyis phye ba lo//swA hA yi ge de nas sbyin//shing yig sngags ni brjod par bya//che ge bdag gi dbang gyur cig/zhag
114a3(rgyud): bdun du ni bsgom par bya//ci ltar dmar po'i gsung bzhin du//'dod pa thob 'gyur rnal 'byor pa//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//sku dang gsung dang thugs
114a4(rgyud): gshin rje gshed dmor po'i rgyud las/lus med la sogs pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o///de nas he ru ka chen gyi//sgrub thabs 'di las rab bshad bya/
114a5(rgyud): 'khor ba bcings la rnal 'byor pa//gag gis shes na myur grol 'gyur//zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo//gtum chen phyag tu rdo rje bsnams//
114a6(rgyud): gzhan la thod pa dgod par bya//spyan gsum dbu skra gyen du 'greng //phyag rgya lnga yi sna rnam par rgyan//gro yon gyi tshi la kha T+wAM ga/rkang gdub chen pos rgyan po'o//
114a7(rgyud): hUM yig sa bran las byung ba//rtag tu bzhud cing yo dregs gnas//sangs rgyas lnga yi rab sbyor las//spyi bor thod pa lnga rnams so//mi bskyod cod pan du bsams
114b1(rgyud): te/ ru brjod rnam bsgom bya//shar du chos kyi 'khor lo dan//sangs rgyas byang chub m+b+hi ro//nub tu 'dod pa lnga rnyed de//he ru ka mtshungs byung dro'o//sna tshogs
114b2(rgyud): gzugs rkyen rnam pa dad //rgyun rnams kun gyis brgyan pa rnams//yi dag so lo gnas mdzem pa ni gzugs//gti mug thams cad nges 'phrog pa'o//de bzhin chos
114b3(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo dgad/yi bzhin nor du dpag bsam shi /bum bzang de skaMm b+h+yA mo yi/dz+nyAn phyag g.yos chal rjeHb+h+yami yi thod pa g.yas min la//dkyil lo/
114b4(rgyud): 'khor lo nges par sgom//spyan ma mA ma kI sgrol ma//gos gur shin tu yod 'jig/me la sogs pa'i rgyung sbyin laM//phyi rol dkyil 'khor gshin rjeg shed/
114b5(rgyud): shes rab mthar byed rta mgrin dang /'khyil bar bcas par bsgom par bya//'khor lo can bsgom rnal 'byor pa//klu bzhi'i rab tu sbyor ba yis//'khor lo can
114b6(rgyud): bskul reg par //tsar tsikle stsogs klu snyan gyi//rol mo drug rnams kyis glu blang //rje btsun snying rje'i khro bo zhengs par mdzod//jo bo bdud rin po 'dri las
114b7(rgyud): rgyal ba//dgas pa'i thugs kyis rje btsun panangs pa mdzad//'jig rten 'gron gnyer stang nyid bzhugs sam ci//rje btsun 'jig rten bsod nams dbang gis ban/
115a1(rgyud): 'jig rten byang chub rang bzhin 'gronA gany+dzar nas//khyod nyid stong nyid sems shing bzhugs sam ci//ci ltar skar mda' 'phro ba ltar//byang chub sem/
115a2(rgyud): la de nas bzhugs//snying rje chags pa'i sems kyis ni//rdo rje 'dzin pa rang nyid zhu//dang por rnal 'byor bsgom par bya//gnyis pa rje su rnal 'byor te/shin
115a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor gsum pa yin//bzhi pa rnal 'byor chen po'o//rdo rje sems dpa' kun rdzogs pa//rnal 'byor ces por mngon par brjod//de yi rgyu 'thun lha yi sku//
115a4(rgyud): rjesu rnal 'byor ces par bsgrags//'khor lo thams cad rdzogs pa yis//shin tu rnal 'byor rnam bsgoms nas//lha yi spyan sogs byin rlabs dang //sku
115a5(rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs nyid dang //ye shes 'khor lo rab gzhug dang //bdud rtsi myang ba nyid dang ni//mchod chen bstod pa rnams kyang ste//de ni rnal 'byor chen po
115a6(rgyud): nyid//slob dpon nges par mi smad cing //bde gshegs bka' las 'da' mi bya//de bzhin khros pas spun rnams kyi//skyon nyid rab tu bsgrag mi bya//sems can
115a7(rgyud): kun la byams pa'i sems//nam yang dor bar mi bya'o//byang sems spang por mi bya zhing //rang gzhan chos la smad mi bya//yongs su mi smin sems can la//
115b1(rgyud): gsang ba rab tu dra skrag mi bya//bdag nyid phung po rnams mi slad//bcom ldan chos rnams su ni mi dbyung //gdug pa'i byams pa rtag spangs shing //chos la tshad nyid mi
115b2(rgyud): bya'o//dad pa'i sems can smra mi bya//dam tshig rnams ni rtag tu brten//shes rab rang bzhin bud med rnams//su no 'byin las dang skyon nyid do//slongs mos mi
115b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa//rnal 'byor rnam par spang mi bya//rtag par rgyun du sngags bzlas shing //dam tshig la sogs rtag brtan byo//bla mar de bzhin dam tshig don//gal
115b4(rgyud): te bgo med las gyur na/de tshe dkyil 'khor nges bros te//bde gshegs rnams la nyes pa bshags//bla ma la dad dam tshig bsrung //rab tu ston min brtsa
115b5(rgyud): can//nyes pa mtha' dag rnam spang sems//bzlas pa mchog gzhol bsam gtan can//skyes bu do rtag bla mar bya//brtan zhing rnam dul snying rje yi//sems cig dang
115b6(rgyud): dang dam tshig dang //bzod pa 'dzin pa rab sngags te//gshin rje gshed gus bla mar gus//slob ma la bshad yongs smin bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsha
115b7(rgyud): pa thams cad mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin ce na/rdo rje sems dpa'i gsung nye bar gsan nas cang mi smra bar 'khod do//'di lta bu'i ched du brjod pa gsungs pa/'khrul
116a1(rgyud): 'khor mthar thugs gshin rjeg shed//brtul zhugs mthar thug thod pa che//rgyud rnams mthar thug 'dus pa ste//ma b+hung byung bar mi 'gyur ro//
116a2(rgyud): e ma zhi ba chen po ches//e ma drag po 'jigs su rung //oM ma mya ngan 'das pa mchog/e me 'khor ba dag gi brgyud//e ma 'od ni shin tu mtshor//ra
116a3(rgyud): skyon de ni yon tan 'gyur//byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med//dngos po med cing sgom pa'ang med//khams med rnam par shes pa'ang med//na mkha' mnyam pa
116a4(rgyud): nyid du gnas//nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pas//chos 'di bde ba chen po'o//sa med chu med me med cing //rlung med na mkha' yod ma yin//rdo rje sems
116a5(rgyud): dpa'i rab sbyor las//skye ba 'di ni rab tu gnas//dngos po thams cad dngos med brjod//des ni rang bzhin med par brjod//rnal 'byor nyid ldan rnal 'byor pa//
116a6(rgyud): chad pa mi yin rtag pa min//phyag med zhal dang kha dog med//mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid//nges par bde min dngos po kun//thog myi bar dang mtha' ma
116a7(rgyud): spangs//de nas bcom ldan 'das tsa rari tsi kA chen mo la sogs pas ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs//e ma mchog dga' dri med dag pa ste//bsod nams sdig dang
116b1(rgyud): yang drag ma 'brel ba//mgon po snying rje'i thugs kyi gnas pa 'di//kun tu snying rje'i gtor tshon gcig pu ste//mchog tu dga' ba 'di yi rang bzhin ni//bde tshon rang bzhin
116b2(rgyud): chos kyi ngo bo ste//de la skye dang 'gag pa yod ma yin//gzugs med bsod nams med cing sdig pa med//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/
116b3(rgyud): gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/byang chub kyi sems nges par bshad pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o////de nas gtam rgyud bshad par bya ste//bcom
116b4(rgyud): ldan 'das thams cad sangs rgyas pa na/dpa' bo 'jig su rung ba du ma'i bdud kyi dpung gi tshogs rnams lhags te/bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po'i byang chub rnam par gzhom pa
116b5(rgyud): 'dod pa de'i dus na bdud chen po las mchog tu rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las khro ga
116b6(rgyud): chen po gshin rje gshing 'di nges par phyung bar gyur to//nges par phyung nas phyag na rdo rje la bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen pos bka' stsal pa//phyag na rdo rje khyed khro bo gshin
116b7(rgyud): rjegashed kyi gzugs 'di yang dag par zung la//bdud rnams dang /klu rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /srin po rnams la skrag pa dang /
117a1(rgyud): 'jigs pa dang /bsad par gyis shig ces gsung so//de dus na bcom ldan 'das la dngas su dzaswA ta/skad cig gis blad pA nas drelnga par bzung ste/yang /
117a2(rgyud): dag par bsdus la bsngags shing sems la yang legs par bskyod do//'di gsungs pas/gsang bdag chen po pha rol grong //'jug phyir 'di ni rab gsal bya//
117a3(rgyud): 'gro dang 'ong bar 'dod pa de//mnyam par gzhag ste sngags bzlas bya//bye ba bzlas pas 'grub 'gyur te//bye ba lnga rnams kyi brjod cing //dang po'i rnal 'byor yang
117a4(rgyud): dge brtsam//bdag nyid na mkha' dang mtshungs par//thog mer sgom pa'i dus su yang //sems ni cig par nges gzhug bya//ji ltar rmi lam rang bzhin sems//
117a5(rgyud): 'gro zhing slar 'ong bar byed do//de bzhin skye bo nyid bya ste//pha rol du ni 'gro zhing 'ong //ji ltar sems ni ring por 'gro/slar yong skad cig las bzlog byed//bur med
117a6(rgyud): goms pa'i sbyor ba la//de bzhin nyid du rnam par gnas//ji lta'i rang bzhin gnas bya ste//gzhul mda' bzhin brjod par bya//de ltar yid kyis gzhu 'di nyid//
117a7(rgyud): bar chad med por 'gro ba nyid//zla ba 'am nyi ma'i sbyor ba yang //sems ni rlung la nges gzhug bya//lus dang rnam par bral po yid//de nyid du ni 'ong zhing 'gro/cung
117b1(rgyud): zad drod ni yang dag thob//gnang ba thob pa'i slob pa po//ji ltar lus kyi nad 'gro zhing //grong las pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur//sgra gcan dang pyad sbyar ba las//zla ba nyim thabs/
117b2(rgyud): 'gro/rlung gi bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor pa//'pho ba go 'phang kun bsgrungs te//'chi ltas mtshan nyid shes byas la//'pho ba'i cho ga ma chen por bya//rgyub ces mi rgyu ji lta
117b3(rgyud): 'di//sna tshogs dang 'od kyis skye 'gyur//thung sel bshing la mi rtags kyi mthar//de nas sto bar yang dag ngasam//sgying kha mgrin par man pa'i snrog/snu brag lani
117b4(rgyud): rnam par n+d+ha//de bzhin go shegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ga shin rjeg shed dmar po'i rgyud las/pha rol gyi grong du rab tu 'jug pa'i l+r-i'u ste bcung du pa'o//
117b5(rgyud): dpal ga shin rje gshed dmang po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho//yon ten mtha' yas pa mnga' ba'i bla ma dem bri chos kyi rgyal po che'i bka' lung gis/
117b6(rgyud): dpon chen kun dga' bzang pos yon bdag byas pa'i dus na/kha tsho'i paN+Di tar hu la shrI b+ha dA dang /bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge sbyong blo brtan gyis/dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag
117b7(rgyud): kha chen pora'i sgyur /tshig rgad du/shrId+ha ga d+hAn seM dzi nam hA dz+nyA maM/da du/dpal bcom ldan 'das mi na
118a1(rgyud): pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba/bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis zlos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan/
118a2(rgyud): 'das lcang lo can gyi gnas rdo rje'i ri bo'i zom na btsugs te/byang chub sems dpa' phyug na rdo rje dang /'jigs byed rgyal po dang /klu'i dbang po dang /nyi ma dang zla ba'i
118a3(rgyud): gdong can dang /ye shes bkod pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba'i de kho na nyid shin tu sbas pa'i mdzod la mnga' brnyes pa/de
118a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du yang dag par nges pa/rigs dang tshogs dang dam tshig dang brtul zhugs chen po phyag rgya rgya mtsho lta bu'i tshul la gnas pa/
118a5(rgyud): glagasang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba'i bde ba chen po la rnam par rol pa/thabs shes rab bla na med pa'i kha sbyor las nges par 'byung ba'i ye shes can/'gro ba thams cad
118a6(rgyud): kyi kun nas sdang ba dang brag la nyal 'joms pa la mkhas pa dpag tu med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugaso//de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje stan las langs
118a7(rgyud): te dbus ma geyas pa'i lha ngas la gzugs nas thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal te//rdo rje dbang phyug rdo rje tshe//rdo rje'i rgyal po kun pa
118b1(rgyud): po//sangs rgyas thams cad skyed mdzad yub//byed chen 'khor lo bdag la gsungs//srid gsum 'thibs po sel mdzad cing //mya ngan 'das la mi gnas pa//lus can kun
118b2(rgyud): rlob rtse chen po//'dren pa khyod lam bstan du gsol//blo gros snying rje bstan ldan pas//thabs ni gang zhig mngon bsgoms na//sku lnga phyag rgya 'grub 'gyur ba//gtso bo der
118b3(rgyud): ni 'dir bshad gsol//rdo rje dkyil 'khor char 'byung ba//'bum phrag rgyud chen las gsungs pa//ral pa gcig phreng dkyil 'khor gau tso//skyes pa gang lags brtse ba
118b4(rgyud): gsungs//zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'i bdag po rab tu dgyes pas 'dzum pa mdzad//zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog lnga phyung ste/
118b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te slar 'dus pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyangs te bcom ldan 'das nyid la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas spyi gtsug tu
118b6(rgyud): nub par gyur to//de nas yang dbu'i gtsug tor gyi nor bu las zla ba dang kun da lta bu'i 'od zer dkar po byung ste/dbu'i steng du dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par 'byung ba'i rnam
118b7(rgyud): ra bkod pa mngon sum du mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor mngon par 'byung ba'i mdzod/rdo rje sgeg pa chen po ralnga gcig pa'i gsang ba mchog zhus pa
119a1(rgyud): legs legaso//rdo rje 'chung 'di ni khyod kyi dus yin zhing 'di ni khyod kyi snang bar byed pa yin//nga yang sngon rdo rje ri bo'i zom 'di nyid du byang chub sems dpa' skar ma//
119a2(rgyud): la dga' ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ba na/de bzhin gla shogs pa thams cad dang ye shes ril pa gcig pa'i gsang ba lhan cig tu rnam par rol pas sems can dpag tu medra pa smin
119a3(rgyud): par byas pa rjesu dran no//de bas na khyod kyis snying rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pas gsang sngags kyi nges par 'byung ba'i rtog pa 'di legs par nyon la yid lta zung cig
119a4(rgyud): dngangos khyod le bshad do//byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/oM AHhUMHoM oM hrI t+ma hUMH/
119a5(rgyud): AM AHsarba ta thA ga to gar+b+he badz+re ta tA sA rA dz+wA la hUM phaT swA hA/oM AHsarba ta thA ga to mA tri badz+re ta tA bA yA sa ra bo hU~M phaT/swA hA oM A~M badz+re dz+nyA na hUM phaT oM aH/badz+re pA ye hU~M phaH/
119a6(rgyud): oM AH/badz+ra tsakra a hU~M phaT swA hA/oM AHbadz+ra rat+na i hUM phaT swA hA/oM AHbadz+ra pad+ma u hUM phaT swA hA/oM AHbadz+ra bi shwa yai hUM phaT swA hA/oM AHbadz+re haM/
119a7(rgyud): mo ha oM hUM phaT swA hA/oM AHdz+ra war+N+Na I hU~M phaT swA hA/oM AHbadz+ra rA ga u hUM phaT swA hA/oM AHbadz+ra dweShA ai hUM phaT swA hA/oM A~MHbadz+raHs+thi ra oM hUM/
119b1(rgyud): /pUT swA hA/oM Ats+tsha badz+ra yo ga A hU~M phaT+Ta swA hA/badz+ra dzA l+yA aHhU~M phaT swA hA/oM AHbadz+ra b+ha la A hUM phaT swA hA/oM AHbadz+ra rU pA Ni ka hUM phaT swA hA//oM AHbadz+ra sh+mab+ha6/
119b2(rgyud): hUM phaT swA hA/oM AHbAdz+ra ga~M d+hi Ta hUM phaT swA hA/oM AHbadz+ra re s+yai te hUM phaT swA hUM/oM AHbadz+ra s+phaR+ShA pe hUM phaT swAhA/oM Adz+dzabadz+ra d+harmA ya hUM phaT swA hA/oM AH
119b3(rgyud): dzIT+Tetwe sha trUM phaT sAt+ma/oM AHbadz+rI U s+yai kak+ShA hUM phaT sAhA/oM AHbadz+dza a~M ku shA ri hU~M phaT/s+phohI.oM ts+tshiHbadz+ra pA shi rI hUM phaT swAn+tu/oM.A~MHbadz+ra dz+rad+hi
119b4(rgyud): ya hUM pheT swAt+ma/au AHbad+d+ha g+hAt+kA lI hUM phaT s+t+raihUM/A~M swAHbI shud+d+ha sarba d+har+m+ma b+hA ba shud+d+hi hAMHoM badz+ra shred+d+haHsan+d+hu b+h+yarmAHbadz+ri shud+d+hi haM/oM yi gra shud+d+haH
119b5(rgyud): sarba d+har+m+mAHyo ga shud+d+ho haM/rdo rje mi bskyed ral pa gcig/mi bskyod pa ni byang sems bcas//rdo rje sgron ma rdo rje dang //rdo rje zhags pa rnam par sgom//gti mug
119b6(rgyud): bag chags 'dod chags dang //zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor lor gnas//ri rab nyi zla ba dan las//'byung bzhi'i rdo rje de bzhin no//khyams bzhir me long pi byung dang //dri
119b7(rgyud): mchog zhal zas las byung ba//gzugs spyi dri rdo rje mo//mkhas pas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag/phyogs bral na bza' chos 'byung dang //maN+Dal mari me las skyes pa/
120a1(rgyud): reg chos zhing dang snang ba yis//sgo bzhi lcags kyu zhags pa dang //lcags sgrog dril bu yongs gyur pas//rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs sgom//rang mtsho/
120a2(rgyud): ka pA las rab mdzes//ga tu mi drug chang tshing 'khrigs pa dang //'ur 'ur 'bar bas khyab pa dang //keng rus 'jigs rung shar sogs kyi//phyogasu g.yon bskor gyis
120a3(rgyud): legs gnas//ha ha ra dgod pa dbang ldan du//byin zar dpal gyi nags 'chi lo//mun pa mi bzad bden bral du//rlung du ki li ki lir sgrogs//mi mnyam med
120a4(rgyud): pa zur bzhi yin//dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi ste//bsam gtan bzhi ni rta babs bzhi//rnam thar brgyad phyir ki ba brgyad//byang chub yan lag bdun dag phyir//dra ba
120a5(rgyud): deng ni dra ba phyed//phyogs bzhir tshad med bzhi yin te//pad+ma 'khor lo shes rab thabs//rnam par shes brgyad yongs dag po//de ni dur khrod chen po brgyad//zla be ma
120a6(rgyud): long nyi mnyam nyid//sa bon mtshan ma kun tu rtog/yongs gyur bya ba sgrub pa ste//nyer rdzogs chos dbyings ye shes yin//lnga phung dang ni dri ma bzhin//chen po bzhi/
120a7(rgyud): dang spyod yul brgyad//rnam bzhi tshor ba rnam dag lha//ye shes bdag nyid 'khor lo'o//dgod dang phrad 'khyud 'khrig pa dag/pu dze o e go ra de ma//ka o hri
120b1(rgyud): kA lAk+Sha ho//brags sun sems//hA hi hrI hrI&ha~M/u ai u UM au au//rnam pa sna tshog ste rnam par smin//rnam par 'joms dang rnam mtshan bral//dga'/
120b2(rgyud): dang mchog dga' dga' bral dang //lhan cig skyes dga'i mtshan nyid do//dgod dang phrad 'khyud 'khrig pa dag/bde chen dug phyir bum pa dang //gsang ba shes rab bde//
120b3(rgyud): ba che//dbang bzhi rgyal po thob par 'gyur//dzaHhUM baM hoSh+Ta dmigs pas dub dang gzhan goms 'dod//rnam par mi rtogs de nyid bsgom//rmi lam na mkha'i sbyor ba ni//
120b4(rgyud): nyin mtshan rtag tu rnam par gzhag/spyi bo snying kha lte bar ni//zla ba pad+ma nyi stang du///haM dang hUM dang a zhes pa//yi ge bde gsal mi rtog rgyud//snying po 'pho dang tha mi

121a1(rgyud): /dang rgol stsogs//'do la the tshom ma d+hal//gnyis sbyor rgyun ma 'an du ba dang //kun nus 'dagasapa lhan cig skyes//bung bas ma tog r+Na ltad na/
121a2(rgyud): rnam pa kun tu sgrub pa'o//oM a kA ro mu kha satwo d+har+m+ma NI A d+ya nuti pats+tshit+ta ta sad+d+ha ni swa b+hA br-id+d+he/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ba' stsalAM pa dang /byang chub sems
121a3(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa 'khor de dag tha mas ts+tshed rab tu yi rangs te/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod cing mchod pa bsam gyis mi
121a4(rgyud): khyab pa thams cad kyis mchod pa la brtson par gyur te/'jig rten mgon po bcom ldan legs//'gro ba nyon mongs bsgrub slad du//stong pa'i ting 'dzin spangs
121a5(rgyud): nos ni//khyod kyis byams chen skur bstan mdzad//thugs rje chen po bcom ldan legs//sems can sdug bsngal bsgral srid//zhi ba'i mtha' la ma~M gan
121a6(rgyud): par/drabartse chen rnam par 'phrul par mdzad//bad chen rgyal po bcom ldan legs//lus can bde don sgrub smradu//zug med dbyings thugs ma gzhol par//
121a7(rgyud): degyes chen kun tu skyed mdzad legs//gtso ba rdo rje rgyal po legs//skye bo dub pa ngal bso'i phyir//mtho'i cig rgyun chad mi bzhugs par//ma lus 'tshal
121b1(rgyud): bsgrub pa rmad//de nas 'khor gyi tshogs phal po ched drug dang //rdo rje'i rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad d+ma bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces ga/
121b2(rgyud): sprul pa'i nges par gyur pa thabs dang shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab cing gzhal du mod pa'i ting 'dzin la gnas bzhin du thams cad byin gyis be rlabs kyis sanas can thadel
121b3(rgyud): byin gdags pa'i don du cho 'phrul chen pa du ma bstan to//bcom ldan 'das kyis myung bka' stsal pa/gdul le zhig bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi brgyud pa'i gasmang ba
121b4(rgyud): po rgyud kyi rgyal po nyan po dang /'dzin pa dang /'chang ba la sogs pa de dag na rmyil ba thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur//rdo rje 'bang bye khrag 'thung gi dkyil 'a /
121b5(rgyud): spyi bye ba khrag khrig mang po yid de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyuraro//dran pa tsam gyis tshe rabs thams cad du yi dam byed par 'gyur//me 'am mi ma yin pa la sogs pa
121b6(rgyud): gnod pa thams cad dang /'tsho ba dang /yaM ra ba dang /bA/mi shes pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur//gang gi khyim na gnas pa de yang mchod rten du bya bar 'gyur/
121b7(rgyud): rigs pa dang dngos grung thams cad kyi gtar tshad med par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis da ska ces bka' stsal pa dong /byang chub sems dpa' di dag dang /spya //

122a6(rgyud): 'byung //bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol//sems can kun gyis mi skyes pa//skye dang mi skyes rnams spangs pa'o//'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rab 'byor ba
122b1(rgyud): mchog tu rtag par sbyor ba'o//rin chen thams cad 'byung glonas dag/dri myed na mkha' dang 'dra ba'i//rgyal mtshan chen po sbresgreng byas te//nyi ma chen pos dbang bskur ba'o//

122b3(rgyud): yang dag mdzes pa 'gying de'i 'gros//sna tshogs ye shes sna tshogs che//zla gsang thig le'i mchog nyid//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
122b4(rgyud): kyi bdag po kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/'gog pa chen po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa

123a1(rgyud): sgrol//byang chub skye gnas pade mchog dbyings las mi nyams dga' bu'i gar mdzod cig/a la la ho//sngon gyi zhen pa'i mtha' dang dong bskams nyon mongs

123a3(rgyud): nyid chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po chen po zla gsang thig le bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/rang gi thugs kyi gsang ba'i

124b1(rgyud): kyi gsang ba chen po thams cad kyi bzhed pa/bde ba chen po zhes bya ba/'od DUr chen po sprin gyi tshogs nyid kyi sgra dang /gsung dang /thugs rdo rje mchog las phyung //de nas de bzhin/

127b1(rgyud): dongomo tshar byang chub che ba 'di nyid 'gro brtan bzhin bad thob pa//pha rol phyin drug dngos nyid gang la yang ni mi brten par//mi skye mya ngan 'das pa'i gzungs dang rtag tu rnam par

127b5(rgyud): dri ma med pa dang 'dra ba'i spyan gyis kun tu gzigs shing 'dzum pa dang bcas pas zhal rgyas par gyur nas/yang tshad med pa mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul
127b6(rgyud): phra rab kyi tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po bskal pa rgyas pa'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho ma lus lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /rdo rje dang /nor bu rin pa
127b7(rgyud): tshe dang /pad+mo dang /las kyi rigs thams cad las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /rdo rje 'dzin dang /rin chen 'dzin dang /chos 'dzin dang /sna tsho
128a1(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po thams cad dang /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi tshogs chen po dang /thugs las byung ba dang /mtshon dang dga' ba dang /gA mr-i la/
128a2(rgyud): sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen po'i g.yog gi tshogs tshad med par 'dren par byed pa dang /'gugs par byed pa dang /'jib par byed pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje
128a3(rgyud): na mkha' la 'gro ba dang /na mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i tshogs dang /grangs med pa'i rdo rje 'phrogs par byed pa'i tshogs dang /gzhan yang phyi rol gyi rdo rje dang /rin po che
128a4(rgyud): dang //pad+mo dang /las kyi rigs las byung ba'i rnal 'byor dang /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang /na mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs rnam par bde ba chen po gyur pa dang
128a5(rgyud): bcas pa'i kun tu gzigs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad pa dang /rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i rnam par gnon pas kun tu gnon pas rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pas
128a6(rgyud): 'debasra shing tshems kyis 'debasdu po dang /rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i kun tu 'brel ba'i phyag gis gar mdzad pa dang /rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i sgeg
128a7(rgyud): pas 'gying ba dang /spyod pa dang mi spyod par bcas pa'i rnams dang /kun tu 'dod d+ma'i rnam par gnon pas 'khor gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la byin gyis brlabs
128b1(rgyud): nus dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gdon mi zla ba zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi rgyab po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gsungs pa//bdag nyid nyid mnyam gzhag dang //de bzhin sku yid
128b2(rgyud): nyid dang //sngags dang phyag rgya de nyid ni//de yis dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'gyur//yan lag thams cad sgom las 'das//rtog dang mi rtog rnam spangs pa//'dren dang thig wa/
128b3(rgyud): yang dag 'dus//'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog ces bya//chos dang chos min rnams spyod pa//chos rnams thams cad brtag par bya//rnam dag na mkha' 'dra ba yis//dkyi/
128b4(rgyud): 'khor 'di ni bstan pa yin//'dod chags mi chags 'dod chags mnyam//chu la pad+mo dmadra ba 'dra//rang sems bsod nams shin tu chags//'di ni dkyil 'khor mcho
128b5(rgyud): yino//gzugs dang gzugs min dri med pa'i//gang khams kun la 'jug 'gyur ba//sems ni chu dang bskul byed pa//dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhus pa'o//de nas
128b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po g.yog dang bcas pa dang /pho nya dang pho nya mo dang /namakha' lnga 'gro ba chen po dang /na mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i cho
128b7(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'dzin gtso bo chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//kye ma'o rab dgyes sems dpa'
129a1(rgyud): /mchog/kye ma'o rab dgyes phyogs bsgyur ba//rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs mchog go/dkyil 'khor gsang pa nyid kyis gsungs//sangs rgyas sbyor ba sgyur/
129a2(rgyud): che ba//rdo rje sbyang ba bla na med//'jig gsum bde mchog thob 'gyur ba'o//gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs//rin chen pad+mo sna tshogs che//sna tshogaso sbyong po gas
129a3(rgyud): mdzad pa//rnam grangs thig le rje 'jig rten du//rnam dag dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byod ma thams cad gang dang bcis pa'i phyag pad+ma
129a4(rgyud): song mo'i mdub ma kun tu 'brel ba'i rdo rje'i thal mo dang /gar rnam par 'gyur ba'i brjid bag tu bcas pas 'grol zhing mA mAchu tshoms kyis mnan nas chu skyes sar po'i mdug
129a5(rgyud): ma bzhin gzigs par bshad pa/glu'i phyag rgyas dbyangs len pa dang /gcig le gcig bskul ba dang /bdag nyid kyi dpung pa la 'dregs shing g.yos dang g.yon pa
129a6(rgyud): rnam par gnon pa'i tshul gyis/oM dz+haiM a la lo la hU~M//kun tu snad ning mi chags byung //mi chags pa'i bde mchog gis//bdag gi rnal 'byor gzungs kyi rnams/
129a7(rgyud): skyobs shing bde basbyin mdzad pas//a la la la ho//bsam gyis mi khyab na mkha'i rang bzhin te//bzhengs shing gzhan la stobs la grub par mdzod//chags pa
129b1(rgyud): gas ma thas//'od sgyu ga ma b+h+yo dag masanam ga/dam su d+hA gA ba sngonan ma pa nan pa ngas 'du coM kying sa rgyu hU~M g+sa /
129b2(rgyud): thugs sa dbang phyur /shin tu dgyes pa chen po kun tu mengs spyad pa rdu rje ba li nas bya ba'i ti 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te/sprin tu dgyes pa na du rdo rje gi
129b3(rgyud): za ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i gor sna tshogs shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rnam par gnan par gar mdzad//shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje'i dbyung
129b4(rgyud): mgung ler/rdo rje rnam par rol pa chen pos rnam par ros/rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje bzhed pa chen pos bshad cing nyid kyi sgyu dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i zla ba'i thog yo
129b5(rgyud): dkyil na/oM meng+ga suM khA b+h+rUM zhes brjod nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag mi ye shes dbyings phyug ma byung //snying du zla gam rdzun pa yin//gnyis pa mi
129b6(rgyud): go ma sta Ta//mtshan du thog le ldan byas pa//ye shes gsang bar rnal 'byor ma'o//A s+t+rai ka lho 'dren byu//dbus su mi brtag byas te//de yi mgo dang mjun
129b7(rgyud): dag tu//khro bo gnyis po mchog bsam bya//'di ni btsun mo'i rab gsal ba//dkyil 'khor rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'o//'od ni dran pa tsam gyis kyang //bsod nams ku
130a1(rgyud): gyis byin rlob 'gyur//a l-i gnyis dbus ri mor bri//ldan pa 'dren pa yang dag ldan//de stong zla gam thog le dga'//mgro mjug gnyisu gzhan
130a2(rgyud): yat+na traM//'di ni don dam gsal ba ste//rin chen rnal 'byor ma dbang sbyin//dran pas bsod nams 'thob 'gyur te//sdig pa rnams kyang 'jig par byed//a la
130a3(rgyud): gnyis dang ldan byas te//cheg/dag yi ge gnyisu bshad//'di ni rab dga' kun tu chags//chu srin ma/zhes bstan pa yin//dang po bskal pa chen po yi//tsheg
130a4(rgyud): drag po dang bces pa gzhan///sangs rgyas kun gyi a li 'di//sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed//bdag nyid la'i yang na gzhan//phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab
130a5(rgyud): ste nganabasrub bya'i dkyil 'khor grub byed na//dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur//'di ni dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog/yi ge'i phyag rgya'i mngon gnas pa'i//
130a6(rgyud): 'dzin pa 'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba//bris pa yis kyang khyad par 'gyur//e ma'o bde ba ye shes cha//de yi ye shes tshe 'di la//'dod byed bde ba bsten byed
130a7(rgyud): cing //'di yi tshul gyis thob par 'gyur//khams gsum mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir//'di las rgya che mchog gzhan med//sgrub pa po yi sems can kun//
130b1(rgyud): tshe'adi nyid la spangs rgyas 'grub//zla gsang zlog lo gsad pa'i rgyal po chen po shin tu dkyus pa rdo rje gdon mo za da'o dam tshig go dkyil 'khor tshun po rgyus pa mchog tu gsang
130b2(rgyud): ba las/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyi gsang ba chen po rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor te
130b3(rgyud): dang po rdzag so///de nas bcom ldan 'as de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshor du gyuradagyes pa'i ying bde ba dang /mgu ba dang /yid dga' ba
130b4(rgyud): bskyed nas/gar dang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje bzhud pa mdzad cing yang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba gnyi su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba 'du ba mdzad nas/bcom
130b5(rgyud): ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs par gyur to//bde byed chen po bshad pa shod//bde ba chen po bshad pa shod//gsang pa chen po bshad pa shod//dgyes pa chen po
130b6(rgyud): bshad pa shod//khyod las 'dod chags yang dag 'byung //khyod las zhe sdang chen po ste//khyod las bde byed sdug bsngal dang //khyod las khams gsum thams cad
130b7(rgyud): 'byung //khyod las skyes pa mnang dang //khyod las 'did gzing rud med dang //khyod las 'dod las rnam grol dang //khyod las byang chu bla med 'byung //khyod las//
131a1(rgyud): na mkha' rlung dag dang //khyod las gzi brjod mya yi khams//khyod las de bzhin chu dungs//khyod las spyod dang mi spyod kun//khyod las sangs rgyas dpa
131a2(rgyud): chen po//yang nas yang du 'byung bar 'gyur//khyod las chos dang dge 'dun dang //khyod las pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs//byang chub sems dpa' dpa' chen dang //
131a3(rgyud): dang skye bo thams cad 'byung //khyod las rdo rje sems dpa' dang //khyod las dri med pad+mo dang //khyod las rin chen tshad med che//de bzhin rdo rje sna tshogs 'byung //khyad
131a4(rgyud): las phyag rgya sngags kyi rnams//khyod las rig pa snying wa 'byung //de nas bcom ldan 'das sbyin mi 'dzums par smin ma brkyang ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams
131a5(rgyud): cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa chen po dang /rnal 'byor mtshon mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ba dang /nam mkha' la 'gro
131a6(rgyud): ba'i tshogs dang /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /gzhan yang lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /
131a7(rgyud): me 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa kun 'dus pa thams cad la skad cig skad cig tu kun tu gzigs nas brjid pa dang bcas pa'i phyag 'jam po
131b1(rgyud): nyid kyi snying ka'i rdo rje gasdong zhing /nyid kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rdo rjes su chags pa rab tu rgyas pa chen po'i lta byas 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan to//nyid kyi thugs pad+mo zla ba'i dkyil
131b2(rgyud): 'khor yi ge'i thig pa'i dkyil nas phyung ste kun tu snang bar byin gyis brlabs nas/shin tu dgyes pa gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang /
131b3(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo //dang po'i yi ge bcu ga sum pa//thig lang bcas pa bsam byas te//bde chen rgyal bzhin bzhag byas la//gzhan gyis mi byed TIg lid
131b4(rgyud): bcas//yi ge drug pa 'dren pa ru//tshul bzhin 'og tu yongs su brtag/'di ni gsang ba chen po ste//rmad byung yi ge'i phyag rgya'o//bde chen bde bar bskyed po'i phyir/
131b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgrags pa yin//ye shes kyi ni phyag rgya 'angs//skad cig snying pos rgyas brdzun//dkyil 'khor rnams kyi 'chad pa po//ston po rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyu
131b6(rgyud): de ba chen po bskul byed pa'i//sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs par byed//yi ge ye shes grub pa yis//ye shes dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur//'phrul gyi mige dang shes ra
131b7(rgyud): //mi shas ldog pa 'joms par byed//rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'dra bar//tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur//bde ba chen po rig po che//sdug bsngal 'dod pa 'joms
132a1(rgyud): byed pa'o//shes rang ye shes dngos gru //byang chung rgyu dang 'thob 'gyur te//rig ma 'dum phrag brgyas bskor cing //snrums dpa min+d+ra pa de dang //
132a2(rgyud): pad+mo mnyam smyon bas//thal mo brgyud+ma ste rol ba yis//tshe dang ling che rnal dang na//dran pa tsam gyis 'thob par 'gyur//'dod pa yis ni dgos pa'i rnamam+b+ha/
132a3(rgyud): myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur//'og dang steng gi rnamapa' la//bdag 'dod bzhin du 'di 'od byed//sa yang rnam par drug nas su//sgribs chen de 'di 'ang
132a4(rgyud): byebyid//sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed de//byang chub pa rini gdon mi bya//bde ba chen po'i rnam mdzad pas//gzhom zhing de bzhin myang bya yi//rdo rje blo yis bdun
132a5(rgyud): kyi rnams//rnam par 'gyur bas thams cad bskul//bde ba chen po gtong ba yis//skad cig nyid du gsol bar bya//grub po'i rdo rje 'dzin pache//dpa
132a6(rgyud): chen pos dgug par bya//rdul 'byor ma rnams ci 'dod par//rnam gnon tshul gyis gnon par bya//dbang po nye dbang dbang chen po//gnod byed stobs kyis nan
132a7(rgyud): gnas par//rab tu rnam 'joms gnon pa yis//gzhom pa'i tshul gyis bsgral bar bya//mtshan che lnga yis rnams gnon pas//gzhon gyi bud med brtson
132b1(rgyud): kyi ma'o bde ba 'ad bar gnas pa'o//snyoms can chen pos grol byos te//byang chub sems ni byed 'byung bas//sems dpa' bdag nyid mchod par bya//dam tshig
132b2(rgyud): rjes ldan pa yis//rnal 'byor rtag ma // rkyeg motho ris 'gro bar byed//rdo rje'i shugs kyis thams cad du//sems can skad cig byed dru //sa
132b3(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi gan su 'gyur//sems can rnams dang grags chen po//thams cad kyi nau rigs rnams dang //pha rol phyin rnams skye gnas te//de bzhin rigs dang pha
132b4(rgyud): rol phyin//de dag 'di la rab tu gnas//dbang por gyur pa brtan chen po//yon tan tshogs ni na mkha' bzhin//de nyid dngos po thams cad la//thams cad dus gsum
132b5(rgyud): mnyam gnas te//rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu byed//sems dpa' thog ma tha med yin//bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i shin tu bde ba chen po'i rdo rje chos
132b6(rgyud): kyi yi ge zhes bya ba yi ge chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shwa so//bcu gsum gyi ni yi ge che//ye shes thig le ldan pa ste//rdo rje yid 'byung lhags pa yi//ha la ra stegs dbu
132b7(rgyud): bskor bya//'di ni yid las skyes pa s+ho////shin tu dgyes tshe mdzes pa yis//yi ge'i phyag rgya phyag rgya che//gtso bo'i spyan sngar gnas pa yi//gsang ba'i snying gi pad+mo
133a1(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab byas//de ni de ma thag nyid du//shin tu dgyes pa'i mnyes par 'gyur//gtso chen rdo rje sems dpa' la//de yi dad byas mnyes byas
133a2(rgyud): te//dbang po yi ni sbyor ba yis//de dang rol pas myur du 'grub//de gnyis phan tshun dgyes pa las//shin tu dgyes pa'i gzhir gyur te//rig 'dzin mchog gi gzugs
133a3(rgyud): ldan dang //lha mi kun gyis mchod par 'gyur//dri dang lhan cig rol pa na//lce tshen tshangs pa gtogs 'dod rnams//phyag rgya sbyor ba'i tshul gnas pa'i//bdag nyid
133a4(rgyud): che la phyag byed pa'o//nyes gsum dri ma spangs pa yi//shin tu sbyor ba'i rgyas btab pa//sems can gar ni byed pa dang //sems dpa' tshul mnyes par byed//de ni
133a5(rgyud): sa dang na mkha' la//bde bar gnas shing 'gro bar byed//sna tshogs lha mo bde che ba'i//sna tshogs bde bas nyer spyod do//phyag rgya'i gar gyis gar mdzad cing //
133a6(rgyud): sems can myur du rtogs par byed//ral grir gyur pa gzi chen po//na mkha' kun tu phan tshun 'gro/lha mo 'phrul gyi 'gro ba dang //lha myin klu yi bu mo dang //gzhan
133a7(rgyud): yang 'phrul ldan mi bu mo//de yis bud med kun bsgrub bya//phyag rgya'i ye shes rab gnas pas//de nyid kun tu 'gro byed de//ji tsam 'dod par dkyil 'khor du//
133b1(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' cho gnas so//sangs rgyas thams cad myur du 'grub//thams cad chos ni bde chen po//dge 'dun tshogs med thams cad rnams//de dag thams cad de yin//
133b2(rgyud): dbang po nye dbang dbang chen gyi//thogs med stobs kyis bkug nas su//rdo rje sems dpa' thabs gnas pas//gzhan gyi bud med brtson par byed//de la sogs pa mtha'
133b3(rgyud): yas pa//phyag rgya ye shes bsgrub bya ste//skad cig skad cig bsnyen pa yi//bdag gi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur//gnyis med sbyor ba 'di yis ni/de ni dngos grub
133b4(rgyud): kun 'gyur te//bdag med nga rgyal med 'gyur te//snang ba med cing yi ge med//shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i yod dang rjes su 'thun por mdzad ma'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'i ye
133b5(rgyud): shes+ho///lha mo rdo rje kI la ni//dang por oM gyis rnam rgyan pa//bgegs mthar byed dang ldan pa ni//dbang mchog sbyin par mdzad ma ste//de yiskye bud
133b6(rgyud): med snying kha ru//bdag nyid kyis ni byin+de brlabs te//dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis//mkhas pas tshul bzhin bsgom par bya//de nas rnal 'byor chen po de//rna myor
133b7(rgyud): dbang phyug byin rlabs pas//na mkha'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag tu//mdzes pa'i spyan dang rol cing 'gro/bdag gam 'on te gzhan dag la//phyag rgyad yis rgyas btas
134a1(rgyud): to//rdo rje dad+mo phye ba yis//sgrub pa pos ni myur du sgrub//pad+mo rnam par phye byas te//phyag rgya sbyor ngas rol pa yi//phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na//
134a2(rgyud): 'gro dang 'ong ba gdon mi za//g.yas dang g.yon pa'i tshul gyis su//ldeg pa'i phyag rgya bzung byas te//sbyor ba chen po sgom byas no//de ma thag tu na mkhar 'gro//
134a3(rgyud): bdag nyid gan rgyal gnas byas te//nyid kyi steng du phyag rgya bzhag/nyid kyis byin rlabs phyag rgya la//sngags pas tshul bzhin bskyod par bya//g.yas dang g.yon
134a4(rgyud): gyi glo dag tu//dgyes dang 'dza' ba gnyis bzhugs par//mi g.yeng phyag rgya bzhag byas te//bdag nyid shin tu dgyes par sgom//'di yis dngos grub 'thob 'gyur
134a5(rgyud): te//'di dag lhan cig 'grogs pa yis//gzungs ma kun gyi dkyil 'khor du//sangs rgyas la sogs thams cad 'gyur//'di dang lhan cig sbyor ba yis//nam
134a6(rgyud): mkha' bdag po sangs rgyas bzhin//sangs rgyas kun gyis byin rlabs pas//de na sangs rgyas ngo bor 'gyur//dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas//nub gcig bdud rtsi
134a7(rgyud): dbyung byas te//gzungs ma'i phyag rgya la brten nos//rmad 'byung nyid ni 'thob ces bshad//mtshan gyi mtha' dang nyin gyi mtha'//dngango bor gnyi ga 'dug byas na//
134b1(rgyud): sngags kyi dbyings phyug gar 'gro ba//de dang lhan cig dngos grub 'gro/phyed dam yang na rnam phyed na//rig ma'i dbyings su reg bya zhing //sgyur bas khros pa'i sgra sgrogs pas
134b2(rgyud): gyad kyi 'byed pas brtsam par bye//bgyi ba'i mjug du de ma thag/'o ma mchog ni btud byas na//de nas de ni rdo rje 'grub//zla gasnang dkyil du 'gro bar byed//bya ba de
134b3(rgyud): bzhin bzlog pa dang //ci bong brtan pa byas pa las//byang chub sems ni 'char ma thug/'phrog ma yi ni dngos grub//'di yis rin chen grutsug nyi du yig snga mtshan mo byas 'gyur/
134b4(rgyud): madros grub 'phrog byed do//sangs rgyas dngos grub nyid kyis 'thob//'di yis snying kha'i zla gsang la//thig le nyid du brtag byas na//de ni dri ma thag tu yang //zla gsang
134b5(rgyud): thig le'i mchog 'drar 'gyur//'di yis reg pa tsam gyis kyang //dngos grub gang dga' thob byed//rdo rje'i phyag rgya gzi chen po//rgyal po 'di ni rnam par rgyu//'di ni sgrub
134b6(rgyud): bi'i dus su yang //rnam par rtog pa yod me bya//rtag tu mi rtog 'gyur ba lis//nan tan gyis ni bsgrub par bya//sdug bsngal ba yi sems can lnga//sbyin pa bzhin rtog
134b7(rgyud): tu sbyin//de la bde ba sbyin byas te//mi ston nam yang sbyin mo bya//shin tu dgyes pa'i sems mtshan mo dpo med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo DA kI li kA li shin tu dgyes pa
135a1(rgyud): bdun chen po 'thob par byud pa'o//thog ma oM s+t+wa 'thung chen po//rdo rje shin tu da sgra dang 'phrul//'di ni 'dod chags thams cad la//'ad chags
135a2(rgyud): byed snyoms par 'thob//rol pa'i sbyor bas bud med la//'di ni rtag tu mnyes pa ga/'di yis 'gro ba gsum dag tu//dngos grub myur du 'thob par byed//pradz+rI/
135a3(rgyud): khaM rgyas pa'i spya//sngags mkhan da ni skad cig 'gyur//gtso ba yI ni bde mchog gis//A li kA lo mAnyam sbyor bya//spros pa'i phyag rgyu rgyus btab s+ho//
135a4(rgyud): skad tsog spyad par bya//dus dag tu ni reg pa dang //gzhug pa yang ni rtag tu bya//bskyod dang mnyes pa de bzhin du//mnyam du 'grogs pa'i cho ga bya//bskyed pa
135a5(rgyud): dang nI sbrang po dang //skad cig skad cig bsnyen par bya//gar dang kun nas bskor ba dang //'dzib dang de bzhin btung byi dang //the tsom med pa'i sems kyis dri//dam
135a6(rgyud): dang ni bsgrub par bya//phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa//mi g.yo cher ni dngos grub ste//sangs rgyas byang chub dngos grub dang //bskal par gnas pa smras ci dgos
135a7(rgyud): 'di ni dngos grub 'thob ma thag/pad+mo 'dzin pa'i rjes 'gyur te//lag ni pad+mo 'bab khyer bzhin//blo ldan mi gam+leng bskal par gnas//brjid pas dpal
135b1(rgyud): ldan d+yAm+b+ha//'di ldan zhing du g+ho bats+tshat+t+ra//rnal 'byor tshon b+ha dang na nas//khyod ldan gyi mchog guts+tsha hU~M yoM//pad+moSh+ma gzugs kyi dkrol 'khor du//don dang
135b2(rgyud): dU gnas par 'gyur// ldan te ga kuni grogs 'gyur to/dngos kyi rom bde spyod gyub//yu~M ga sa~M ni byug // la sa smras gzus brgya
135b3(rgyud): byini gyis brlabs nas bde myangs na//pad+ma bde ba'i bdag por 'gyur//gzhan gyi bud meng bdag nyid kyis//phyag rgyu 'di yis rgyus btib tA//bsten ng+yas 'dod pa'i gan
135b4(rgyud): nyid du//sngags mkhan 'gyur ba gdon mi phye//sdug cing la sogs rgyun pa yi//nyi ma'i 'od zer sar byung byin no//dri mod yangs pa'i lta ba yis//pad+mo sems
135b5(rgyud): dpa'i tshe 'grub po//ji tsam na mkhar nye bar ni//dpa' bo chen po 'phur byed//rig ma 'bum phrag brgya tshogs kyi//lha mi yis ni mchod pa byed//sangs rgyas sras
135b6(rgyud): dang bcas kun gyis//sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag nyid mdzod//'khor ba nyid na gnas pa'i tshe//'khor ba'i dri mas mi groso//phyag rgyo 'de yis rgyas ba ba ni//
135b7(rgyud): rtag tu nyon mongs dag 'gyur te//smon gyis phye ma sbyor ba yis//sbrul ni gsad par gyur pa bzhin//zla gsang thig le'i dga' byed 'di//tshe 'di nyid la
136a1(rgyud): 'gyur te//'di yis ma nu yi ngo bas yos//dgos pa thams cad dngos grub bo//gang 'dod dngos grub don yod pa//'khor ba 'di dang pharol
136a2(rgyud): gyi//mkhyechen phyag rgyu 'de nyid kyis//dran pa tsam gyi de dngos grub//shin tu dgyes pa pade mo phreng ba des bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgyus sheso//dang por oM dang yang
136a3(rgyud): drudug ldan//tha mor bsgyings pa'i hU~M nyi//dbus su rab kyis rdo rje bzhag/yi ge 'di ni rmang 'byung ba'o//phyag rgya 'ad yi rgyas bta bas//sdig pa skad
136a4(rgyud): med par 'gyur//yamyos gsum 'di na dngas grub mo//dpal gyi bsgres po 'thob par 'gyur//badrad dang bdud la sgo rjes 'jug pa//me rdzogs par ni rgya mi byeng
136a5(rgyud): sna tshogs rdo rje ma nyam sbyor bas//de yis khams gsum 'phrog par byed//bdag gi mthu yis rnam rgyal te/de yi khams gsum longs spyod do//phyag rgya
136a6(rgyud): 'di yis rgyas bta ste//pad+mo rdo rje rab ldan bya//phreng byeng phreng ba'i tshul gyis su//phreng ba bskums te 'dzin pa bzhin/'di yis byin gyis blo rlabs byasot+ta/
136a7(rgyud): bsten na myur du dngos grub pa//ge yes deng ga ron gyi smyon bsgyur bas//chu skyes cani ni sbyid byas te//phyag rgyas btab sbyor ba byas na//bla ma'i dngos grub thob pa
136b1(rgyud): da//rdo rje rnal 'byor nya ba yos//rdo rje bdag spyod mchod byed//de dag kun gyis bskor byas nas//dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bsgyur ro//rdo rje snyoms dpa' dpa' bo yis//
136b2(rgyud): 'jigs shing skrag pas byin byed pa//rang nyid kyis ni phyag rgyu'i gzungs//nyid kyi dngos grub stabs par byed//gzhan ni yang dag pha rol byin//sangs rgyas rnams kyi
136b3(rgyud): ljon rgyan//de yang de lo 'jigs skrag nas//rang gi dgyes mchog stobs par byed//bdag nyid chen po dmigs gsum dang //che ba'i pi ni ngo bzhi dag/rdo rje 'dzin dang
136b4(rgyud): gtogs rnams dang //rang gi sdug pa stobs par byed/gshin rje sha ka rgyu lo ba yang //rdo rje 'dzin rje dngos grub la//'ongs nas bdag gi sdug pa'i rnams//srog ni
136b5(rgyud): phyir yang stobs par byed//gzhan gyi 'phrul gyi lus kyi rnams//khams gsum lam la gnas pa dge/myur du nye bar 'ongs nas kyang //bdag nyid dngos grub sbyin
136b6(rgyud): bar byed//sna tshogs gnyen ni rgyal po che//dbang phyug dam pa sna tshogs byed//de yang nyer 'ongs gtsug gtugs te//rnal 'byor sna tshogs ma sbyin byed//gnad
136b7(rgyud): sbyin sngon po'i gzugs la sogs//sha za yi dgas bu mo rnams//sbyor ldan phyag rgya blang byas te//brtag pa mchog gis brtag par bya//thams cad las byed dang/
137a1(rgyud): na//'das sa klu ba myur du g+huH/sgyu da rnam dang //d+har+m+mA m+b+ha sa sam+b+ha m+b+ha/ sa na nas//
137a2(rgyud): myu du ma r+m+mag/gzugs nga seM na //gad slo rgyu sa sam+b+has
137a3(rgyud): ma //de na po ngang //gang cig nas shA dus//di la 'a pa
137b1(rgyud): de bzhin gzungs mA'i tshogs rnams dang //rnal 'byor mA dang mkha' 'gro dang //phyi dang nang gi tshogs rnams dang //lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo//lha min dngos grub lus kyi mchod//
137b2(rgyud): grul bum ma 'am yi dwags sam//sha za 'phrul gyi mi bu mo//'di ni snying khar bzhag pa yis//rdo rje 'dzin du bdag nyid 'gyur//sangs rgyas yang na nyi ma dang //la d+mo dang
137b3(rgyud): sna tshogs blo//lha dang lha min mi dag dang //gzhan yang gnod sbyin srin po dang //bdud dang bdud kyi tshogs rnams kyi//gzhan gyis 'phrog por yongs ma nus//lha dang
137b4(rgyud): lha min gyi mtsho cing //dngos grub khams gsum 'gro bar byed//lha dang lha nin rten byed cing //skad cig nyid du 'gro bar byed//sangs rgyas rnams kyi mkhyen pa'i yul//
137b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing kun tu//rig pa'i rigs ni brgya dag dang //de ni rtsen cing 'gro bar byed//'jigs med yon log kun spangs pa//thog ma tho ma med 'gyur te/
137b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen sbyor bas//dgyes pa'i rmod mchog gcig tu 'gyur//rdo rje'i nang na rdo rjer 'gyur//rin chen nang na rin chen 'gyur//pad+mo'i nang na pad+mor 'gyur/
137b7(rgyud): sna tshogs nang na sna tshogs mchog/de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/mnyam dang mi mnye ma chos kyi dbyings//phyag rgya'i ye shes byin sa pas//dam pa sna tshogs//
138a1(rgyud): nyid du 'gyur//gzugs mi sdug pa gzugs mchog 'gyur//mig med pa yang mig ldan 'gyur//rna 'on pa yang sgra thos te//glen pa yang ni yid nor
138a2(rgyud): 'gyur//de la sogs pa dpag med pa//mig gi phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur//de yi lus la ston ni//ston dam pa mdangs cher 'gyur//ji tsam de ni na mkha'i
138a3(rgyud): mthungs//'phur zhing 'og tu 'bab par byed//ngo ni ri yang phug nas 'gro/sa dang sa yi 'og tu ni//sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul rnams byed pas//de ni skad cig 'gro bar byed
138a4(rgyud): sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du//sngags mkhan 'gying bar gar byed pa//bde ba chen po bskyed pa yis//sems can ngo ni 'jug par byed//mi g.yong
138a5(rgyud): lta ba'i bsgyur ba yis//las rnams thams cad de yis byed//'dogs pa dang ni lta ba yis//gar dang rnam par bskor ba dang //'gro ba thams cad 'bab byed//
138a6(rgyud): ri dang sems can thams cad la//smra ba dang ni sgra 'byin dang //ci dga' bar ni mngag par byed//sdug pa'i lta bas srog chags rnams//brdeg pa dang ni bsgrol
138a7(rgyud): bar byed//gtum dang gdug 'jigs che ba dang //khro bo'i lta bas bsgral bar byed//shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje spyan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'dod pa'i lhan tha/
138b1(rgyud): 'ag pa spyod pa'i yo gar drug sa nus ma //da la gyisarnam pa dag+sa k+Sha/tha mar 'brug go ts+tshi pa/rdordzun rgyud rgyas pa smra//da
138b2(rgyud): byed po shad pa yin//phyug rgyu 'di ni phyug d+hA che//sang+yas rgyas rdo rje dpa' bo ste//gang gis 'di na bsgoms ma thagarjegasum gyis byin rlob 'gyur//de dag gam
138b3(rgyud): yang ni gzhan yang rung //'od yis nyid kyi snying khye ru//bsgoms te gnyis med sbyor byas na//sangs rgyas sku ni rab tu 'grub//de sgrubs nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//byung
138b4(rgyud): med kun dang rtsen byed de//A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas//sems can dman yod dngas grub bo//shin tu skal ldan thams cad dang //sangs rgyas skal ldan 'thob 'gyur
138b5(rgyud): sbrul derje ldan pa thams cad kyi//chu skyes zhabros la bsnyen par byed//lha dang lha mrin bu mo de'i//rig mos mthong na dga' byed//phyag rgyatI yo shes rgyan pa yi//
138b6(rgyud): 'dod pa'i gzugasu 'gyur//spyad dang mi spyod mi drug dang //lho dang klu dang gnod sbyin drung //mi 'am ci dang skyes bu mo//dngas grub pos ni 'brog mi nus//de la so
138b7(rgyud): pas stod byed//'jigs par 'gyur ba'i sems kyis ni//bla ma bzhin du mdzod byed cing //kun gyis bstod mchod sti stang byed//de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/
139a1(rgyud): rnamakha' mtha' klas lha rnams dang //nyi ma bcu yi 'odu zang bzhin//rnal 'byor chen po 'grub pa 'gro/sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing kun tu//'od kyis thams/
139a2(rgyud): cad mnyes byed cing //sngangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams//zil gyis mnan te gnos par 'gyur//sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid la//sras rnams 'dud cing
139a3(rgyud): phyag byed//sgra dang lha min grul bum dang //tshangs pa gtogs 'dod kyu chen po//phyag rgyu'i ye shes byin rlabs dang //'jigs shing skrag pas 'ong bar byed/
139a4(rgyud): bcom ldan dngos grub bka' stsal stsol//ji ltar thugs la dgongs pa bzhin//spyi bos bka' byung gdul dka' rnams//de dag thams cad sgrub par byed//
139a5(rgyud): mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhi pa yi//dam pa rnams kyang bskyang bar bgyi//zla gsang thig le'i mchog nyid kyi//dbang bskur ba yang blang bgyi ste//rigs lnga rnams
139a6(rgyud): kyi sdom pa nyid//rnam pa bzhi po thams cad blang //chu skyes dngos grub khyod zhabs drung //'tsho ba'i bar du bdag cag 'bangs//khyod kyi spyan sngar zha 'bring du//
139a7(rgyud): ci bgyi zhes ni bka' nad do//phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab no//spyod bcas mi spyod dga' byed//rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyi mchog/shin tu bde dang mdza' ba
139b1(rgyud): myo/rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i sku chen mo byed ba dbo mod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i tor 'dzin to///dang por oM sbrang thig le skye//gzhan gyis ma byed khrus
139b2(rgyud): bcas pas//gnyis kyi dbus su bzhag pa ni//gsung gi rdo rje shin tu degyes//bde gsung sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//mchog tu ro ni myong byed pa//dam chos sgra yis
139b3(rgyud): gang byas pa'i//gsung gsal rna ba dga' bar byed//yi ge'i phyag rgya chen po 'di//byang chub chen por grub byed de//ston ston sdug mtho ba'o//tshad med ljon 'dzin po'o//
139b4(rgyud): dpal ldan phyag rgya 'dis btab na//dpal kun bdag po de ma thag/bdag drang bdag gir 'dzin spangs pa//sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'thob/phyag rgya 'di yis bdag
139b5(rgyud): gam gzhan//rgyas btab 'dod pa spyad byas na//dngos grub rmad du byung ba yi//de yis myur du 'thob par 'gyur//sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po//sgrub pa po yi bka'
139b6(rgyud): nyan te//ci ste rmongs pas 'da' byed na//de yi srog ni tha ma yin//de yis srung ba byas na dpal//tshe dang lang tsho bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje gsung gis bstan pa bzhin/
139b7(rgyud): gdon mi za bar 'thob par 'gyur//phyag rgya ye shes rjes bsdus pas//sgrub pa mi byed cung zad med//bdag nyid thams cad sprul pa ni//mchog gi ye shes dngos grub
140a1(rgyud): 'gyur//phyag rgya'i ye shes byin rlabs la//sangs rgyas byang chub mi ldog dang //chos dbyis me mnyam rab klas pa//dngos grub bdag nyid gshe
140a2(rgyud): nas kyang //shin tu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis//sems dpa' chen po de khrid do//rang gi ting 'dzin ldong ba'i tshe//dam tshig mchog tu bsrung bya ba//ji snyed
140a3(rgyud): namakha'i dkyil 'khor du//'dod pa thams cad de spyod do//rnal 'byor chen po mi 'da' zhing //ngan song gsum yang mi 'gro byed//de ni cung zad 'og sdug bsngal
140a4(rgyud): 'gro ba thams cad myong mi 'gyur//rdo rje gsum de rmad 'byung bas//sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags byed//bgra sngags mtshams sbyor rnam grol bas//na mkha'i rim
140a5(rgyud): par 'gro 'ong byed//lha yis rtag tu mchod byed de//mchod par byas pas shin tu mchod//sems dpa' chen po 'gro 'dug kyang //bde byed kun gyis bdag nyid
140a6(rgyud): dge/gnos dang zas dang btung la sogs//na mkha' las ni skad cig rnyed//bud med rin chen mchog mkha' las//bsam pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur//
140a7(rgyud): las kyi dbyings ma ma lus pa//de yis khams gsum thob par byed//rnal 'byor sbyar ba dngos grub kyi//rnal 'byor grub chen 'phrog par 'gyur//'di las
140b1(rgyud): brtul zhugs drug pa med//da/'thub 'di dang 'dra me//thun mod ma chog tu bye ba laste//'dod pa'i lag sa sbyang sdud pas 'gyub//dge ba'i bar rigs kun tu//soms
140b2(rgyud): na pa krung ba 'gyur//gzugs mthun gyi 'a chen pa//rgyal po chen po 'gyu/gsung thams rjedape med pa dang ldan pa zhes hU~M rdo rje shin tu \u0f7f
140b3(rgyud): bde ba chen po 'thob par byed pa khams gsum kun tu snang bar grags pa pad+mo'i rigs kyi tshogs zhal gyi gsung gis dgongs pa thams cad 'grub par byed pa'o//
140b4(rgyud): oM bcas mi phyed tha mor skye//rab tu sems ni bde ba ste//rdo rje rab dgyes bde byed che//dbus su ming ni sbyar bar bya//phyag rgya 'di yis dngos grub che//byang chub sems
140b5(rgyud): ni rab bsdubs pa//'di yis byin gyis bzlas ma thag/bdud rtsi'i mchog ni rlod par 'gyur//thams cad 'dod pa ldan byos na//de ste thams cad sems kyang rung/
140b6(rgyud): sa sems tham ma da //rmugs mkhan reg pu'i rgyum ba shAn+tu/ yis rdo rje dzin nyid dang //rdo rjed pa'i ba nyid du yang //sna mo'i pU rgyus sbyin smra /
140b7(rgyud): skad cig tu ni 'thob par 'gyur//lha mo rnams dang gar byed cing //de ni rab de gyes bdag po khrid//pho brang dgi' byed zad kyis che//rab tu chen po 'di 'job tu//seng
141a1(rgyud): gdan rab 'jog byed do//bzhi dang bzhi yi mchog nyid kyi//rdo rje pad mo sbyor ba yis//de ni khrid nas dbang bskur ro//de nas rdzogs spungs tsho pan
141a2(rgyud): med//byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus che//yod dang med pa'i 'dod spangs pa//de la phyag ni byed par 'gyur//rdo rje sems /lkog 'jog byed de//rang gi spyad pa'i
141a3(rgyud): tshul gyis ni//pha rol phyin pa thams cad dang //sangs rgyas kun gyis mdun du bskor//sa gsum thams cad kun tu ni//sems dpa' chen pos ston byed pa//res
141a4(rgyud): 'ga' shin tu dga' spyod po//res dga' khab nas 'byung ba dang //res dge'i byang chub res 'ga' lhums//ris dga' sgyu dang res dga' 'opho//ras dga' spyod chen
141a5(rgyud): rol pa dang //ras dga' bdud las rgyal bar mdzad//res dga' byang chub mngon byang chub//res dga' 'khor lo bskor mdzod//res 'ga' sna tshogs 'jug par
141a6(rgyud): mdzad//res dga' dus su shin tu mdzes//res 'ga' bud med skyes pa dang //res dga' lha dang skye dgu'i bdag/res dga' 'dod dbang rgyal po ste//res dga'
141a7(rgyud): 'dod la rgyal gyis phyogs//ras dga' zhi la res 'ga' dag/ros 'ga' gdon chen bgegs mdzod//de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa//phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas
141b1(rgyud): ShA pa//tso dgar dngos grub 'dod pa la//bdag gos dab smyon par byed//mi byang chug sbyor ba yas//'dren pa mi phyud nye byas te//phan rgyun reg pa chen po yis//rdo rje can rgya/
141b2(rgyud): do 'bigs te//gzungs me mang po tshogs kyi rnams//bde byed chen po gzhan ci smos//spyod bcas mi spyod bde dam po//'bad pa mi dgos 'thob par 'gyur//brjid pas byang
141b3(rgyud): chub snying po ru//rtag rdzab ste gnas 'gyur te//phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa//sbyor ba rjes sdud ljon pas so//thams cad cha ni rnam bral ba//byang chub sems ni mchog
