141b4(rgyud): bzhin du//yi ge 'dis ni sbyor ba yis//bdag nyid chen por de 'gyuraro//rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po tshim pa'i yid la skyes pa dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i/
141b5(rgyud): phyag rgya ste//las thams cad grub par byed pa'o////dang por oM na sbyor ba ste//tha mar gnyis po rdza rnga'i sgra//rab dgyes rdo rje byin rlabs pa'i//lha mo dang
141b6(rgyud): byeng lta sa su bzhag/'di ni srungs rgyas thams cad kyi//rab dgyes thob pa rmongs byed ma//rdo rje ye shes thugs gnas pa//dngos slob thams cad sgrub par byed//
141b7(rgyud): sdigs mtshon yi ge phyag rgya 'dis//bdag gam gzhan la rgyas btab ste//rdo rje 'dab skyes bcug byas na//de nas de myur dngos grub po//thams cad laso byed/
142a1(rgyud): dang lnga dang ldan//tsho dang lang tshe//la ldan palta/rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra 'drab ste//rdo rje snrums da gyung//sangs rgyas rnams dang dpa' bo ma//drangs
142a2(rgyud): rgyas kun dang rtson byed cing //sde dbang rnams dang lha rnams kyi//'phrul gyis bud med 'phrog byed do//rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa chen po dang byed kun tu myong ba me tog gi rgyal
142a3(rgyud): mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba las thams cad byed pa chen mo gdon mi za ba'i gzhan gyis mi phyed ma'o///
142a4(rgyud): tshangs pa'i gsungs gau nga ror bcas//tha mar dril bu'i nga ro gnyis//dbus su ming gi phreng po ste//yi ge 'di ni chu 'dzin mchog/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
142a5(rgyud): yid kyi dngos grub 'thob byed//'dod pa yid ni thams cad rnams//yi ge skad cig 'grub par byed//'di yis rgyas btab bud med rnams//bdag dang rang gi slob ma'ang
142a6(rgyud): rung //de nyid sbyor bas bstan byas na//rdo rje 'dzin dpal 'dra bar 'gyur//rnal 'byor mAM rnams bdag por ni//myur du mkhAs 'gro byed//tshangs pa gtogs 'dod
142a7(rgyud): dbang chen dang //lha rnams kyis ni mchod par 'gyur//lha mo'i tshogs dang rtson byed cing //lha mo kun gyi bdag por 'gyur//'phrog byed la sogs bdag po che/
142b1(rgyud): 'jigs par byed dang rgyu byung ba//sems can kun gyi mag dam pa//snyoms dpa' chen por da 'gyur//stug po'i tshogs kyi dbus su no//brjid la sogs pas spyod pas
142b2(rgyud): 'gro/brjid tshe pad+mo chen mo la//thams cad kun tu brjid pa yis//bde byung chen po myong byed//rab tu dgyes pas bsregs pa bzhin//rab tu skal ldan mgrin mkhyud pas
142b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen por dri gnas te//'di ni snying la bris pa yis//ci 'dod pararo ni 'dod pa'othob//phyag rgya chu smras btab byas te//de ltar byas na phyag rgya dgyes//rdo rje shin tu//
142b4(rgyud): dgyes pa chen mo'i dri ma med pa'i mdog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste/thams cad las byed pa dge ba'o//dang po nyid du oM bya ste//thog le'i rgyal pos nye bar
142b5(rgyud): rgyan//tsheg drag bcas pa 'dren pa gnyis//ldan pa tha mur bzhag byas te//rdo rje rab dgyes rgyan byas pa//rdo rje ston ka dbus su bsam//'di ni sangs rgyas thad
142b6(rgyud): kyi/ye shes snang ba rab bsgrub pa//yi ge yi nAM phyag rgya 'dis//nyid kyi snying khAr rgyas btab no//sangs rgyas ye shes mchog byed pa//de yis ston ka ma dngos grub
142b7(rgyud): sde dbang lhar bces lha rnams dang //gnod sbyin srin por bcas pa dang //sbrul dang mi 'om ci gnas pa//thams cad 'di yi g.yog tu 'gyur//'di ni 'od zer rab
143a1(rgyud): 'bar ba sres//sangs rgyas mchog gi blugs ldan du 'gro ste//sna tshogs rab 'byung yang dag khyab/chos mchog dam pa byed pa gtod byed cing //spya/
143a2(rgyud): bcus mi spyod 'jig rten snang byed//sprin dang bral ba'i zla ba'i 'od ni chog byed//mkhre' dbyings rnam par bsgyings pas rab tu dga'//A li kI li pad+mo mchog la//myong zhing
143a3(rgyud): mchog byas bskang / gnas par 'gyur//'di yis sdig pa'i thAg byed//'di yis myur du dga' bar 'gyur//'dis ni byed ba'i dro ba de//'di yis dngos grub grub
143a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur//skye ba'i sdug bsngal rgyab phyogs pa//tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa// mas kyi stong
143a5(rgyud): bu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen ma ste//thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes 'grib par byed pa'o///dang po oM dang ying dag ldan//tha ma ma pa'i yo
143a6(rgyud): gnyis//rdo rje shin tu dgyes po che//dbus su gsal ba'i yo ge bAsam+b+ha//'do ni sangs rgyas thams cad k+Shi//sna tshogs chen ma'i mdun du'o//sna tshogs chen po
143a7(rgyud): 'di yis ni//sna tshogs ye shes dngos grub bo//sngags mkhan nyid kyis byin rlabs pa//sna tshogs sna tshogs bdag chen 'gyur//sdig pa'i yin lag kun spangs/
143b1(rgyud): tA//nga nams kun gyi yan lang/ma//kun tu 'gro ba'i dngos grub ni//'di nyid kyis ni rab tu 'grub//sna tshogs sgyu ma'i bod chen rjes//sna tshogs chen po'i bskal par
143b2(rgyud): gnas//rdo rje'i bdag nyid rgyan pa yi//bud med kun dang rtsen por 'gyur//de nas de yi chos dbyings nas//dbang phyug mchog gi dngos grubo//pad+mo'i mdun du thog ma'i
143b3(rgyud): lha//byas te rdo rje bsgrub par bya//mthe bong srin lag de phyung ste//kho yi nang du bzhag par bya//chang bzhin myang bar byas na ni//mod la 'dod pa'i gzugasu 'gyur//
143b4(rgyud): A lI kr-I lo rab sbyor bas//bud med rnams dang rtsen par byed//blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi//'di ni shin tu dgyes zhes bya//bsil ba dga' byed chen mo ste//sna tshogs
143b5(rgyud): 'di ni 'gro la gnas//dang po I ni gnas pa ste//tra tau dang ldan tha mar byi//rdo rje shin tu dgyes che ho//sgeg mo dbus su bskul ba'o//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad
143b6(rgyud): gyi//ba sgeg par bya ba sprul pa yin//'di dag mnyam par sbyar ba yis//sgrog mos ye shes bskyed par bya//rdo rje blo ldan brtag po yis//badro bar 'dod pa
143b7(rgyud): pad+mor gzugs//'dod pas 'dod pa spyad par bya//myur du 'dod pas dngos grub bo//de nas rdo rje 'dod dpal te//bde byed thams cad nye bar sgrub//sems can kun
144a1(rgyud): kyi 'dod skyed pa//bde ba chen por de 'gyur//mthu yis pha rol phyin pa'i mchog/pad+mo'i tshul du skrag pa yis//rdo rje sbyor thabs la gnas pas//rdo rje
144a2(rgyud): chen po de dngos grub//ci dgar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis//rtag pa'i lam dang yang dag ldan//rtag pa'i chos kyis rjes 'thun spyod//bsgrubs na rtag pa rtogs par
144a3(rgyud): 'gyur//'di yis kun tu bzang zhes bya//de ni dngos po kun yin to//'dod pa med cing nyon mongs med//nga rgyal med cing 'dzin med pa//sangs rgyas mchog tu rtag pa
144a4(rgyud): yi/sangs rgyas chen po de yi dngos//dpal ldan thog ma tha ma med//chos rnams kun gyi rje su 'thun//'dis ni dngos po thams cad kyi//sangs rgyas bdag
144a5(rgyud): por bdag nyid 'gyur//sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dang //'di la khyad par cung zad med//shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje bdag po'i dpal shin tu dgyes pa sgeg
144a6(rgyud): mo dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i yI ge'i mchog gi sri ///dang po oM bcas lha mo yi//tha mingad tsheg drug mi byed gnyis//de gnyis dbus kyi phyogs nyid
144a7(rgyud): he zhes bya ba rnam rgyan te//shin tu dgyes pa'i rdo rje cha//bzhad pa nyid ni rab tu sbyar//yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis//nyid kyi snying la rgyas btab na//phreng ba'i rgyun
144b1(rgyud): gyis rnam brgyan pa//dpal ldan des ma thag tu 'gyur//yid kyis ji ltar bsdams pa bzhin//de ni sangs rgyas yul du 'gro/de ni de phyir sangs rgyas mthong //chu rgyu sa//
144b2(rgyud): de dang rtsen par byed//de nas 'dus pa dgyes 'gyur te//sangs rgyas yang dag zhing nyid nas//sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde ba che//dngos grub rnal 'byor de la sbyin//byed pa
144b3(rgyud): dang ni zlog pa dang //bde ba chen po 'phrogs pa yis//rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dbang phyug la//gsang ba chen pos mgu bar byed//thabs bcas shes rab chen po la/
144b4(rgyud): rgyal ba nyid kyis stobs byed de//A lI kA li mnyam sbyor bas//bde ba chen po mgu bar byed//bde ba thabs kyi dngos grub rnams//sgyu ma'i tshul gyis bsgrub par
144b5(rgyud): bya//yi ge yi ni phyab rgya 'di//shin tu dngos grub mchog tu brtag/rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba'i phreng ba rgyas pa dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste//
144b6(rgyud): lus thams cad kyi don gyi dngos grub sbyin pa'o///oM ni dang por gtsug tor bya//ti tA skad skyon tha mar te//dbus su he dga' zhes bya ba//bde
144b7(rgyud): chen dga' ba rdo rje dbyangs//rdo rje shin tu dgyes che yi//phyag rgya 'di ni rab dgyes 'brel//bris pa dang ni 'dzin pa dang //dran pa yis kyang dngos grub stir//
145a1(rgyud): ts+tshar+m+ma/sdig du kun las grol byed kyang //bsod nams thams n+na bar nan/mo dag thams cad mA lus sgra \u0f7fnasems na h+yan/
145a2(rgyud): rgya'i yi gru rgyun te 'gro/'jig dz+nyAn thams cad kun tu bskur sti byed//rig ma stong gis mngon par mchod byed cing //rig 'dzin mu sman bud med rnams kyis ni//g.yog rnga
145a3(rgyud): drukar po'i tshogs kyis g.yob byed pa'o//'jig rten dbang po 'di mchog 'brel pa 'thog/blo ldan na mkha' ngos ni thams cad//rdo rje 'dzin gyi dgyes pa'i rna lhor ma/
145a4(rgyud): yid 'ong ba'i spyan ni rgyas pa dang //rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bde bas 'bigs pa yis//mgul nas 'khyud pa'i brtson pas rol bar byed//pi bung gling bu yo mtshan
145a5(rgyud): snyan gyis//glu blangs dngos grub rgya che thob par byed//ji snyed yang 'ong ba'i glu dag ni//'jig rten grags pa'i bde ba'i byed pa dag/bde ba'i sgra yis bskyed par rnam
145a6(rgyud): bsgyur ba'i//de dang 'thun pa'i dbyangs 'dis sgrub par byed//Sha Ta pa da gar dza'i dbyangs//glu ru blangs pas pad+mo gnas//dngos grub myur du 'thob bor byed//
145a7(rgyud): 'di yis byin rlabs dag pa dang //'di yis byin rlabs bde ba'i rnams//sbyor ba 'di yos sbyar ba yis//'dod byed thams cad 'thob par 'gyur//shin tu dgyes
145b1(rgyud): po chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog tu dgyes pa chen mo'i dbyungs dpe med pa zhes bya ba'i yi gle'i phyag rgyu'o//de ban/oM na dang por to//dbus su hod myos blong /
145b2(rgyud): tshe//rdo rje glur byed dbye pa gnyis/'di ni thams cad bode byed//sangs rgyas rnams kyi rab dkyis nyid//rnal 'byor yi ni d+has btAban//bing dang ldan par byang rnying
145b3(rgyud): 'dra//'ag min gyi ni gnas chen du//sangs rgyas rnams dang thabs gcig 'grogs//da bye chen po dbang chen dang //chos kyi rgyal po byed chen 'theg/de spyad
145b4(rgyud): gar gyi gtsug lag las//bsgrir ba byed pa bshad bye dang //ji snyed de snyed phyag rgyu'i rnams//gnyis min 'dus pas 'dis dngos grub//kye ma'i dgyes pa
145b5(rgyud): byed che//kye ma'i bde ba bde chen po//kye ma'o 'dod pa 'dod chags che//kye mo'i sna tshogs bdag nyid che//de la sogs pa tshad med pa//'jig rten gyi ni yo byad
145b6(rgyud): rnams//pad+mo gsal ba gar gyis ni//rnal 'byodrug dbyas das grug/sangs rgyas kwin rgyu phyug rgyu 'di//sna tshogs gar ni ston byed pas//myur drug ni mi
145b7(rgyud): byis pas//gar gyi gtsug lag dngos grub bo//rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i dpalo bde ba chen po dga' byed gang zhes bya ba'i yi ge phyag rgya phan tshun bcu
146a1(rgyud): rgyal mtshan dang bdan gsum pa'o//bcu gsum yi glu dang po nyid//rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che//rdo rje'i spu na sna tshogs che//tha mar 'byur dang 'dra bI dza//
146a2(rgyud): nam khar zla skar 'dra ba yi//phyag rgya'i ye shes rmad 'byung ba'i//'di yi thabs kyis mnyam gzhag ste//gzung ba gsal bar gzung ba yi//tsha ba'i gser gyi gzi
146a3(rgyud): brjid 'dzin//ye shes snying khor bsam par bya//na mkha' nyi ma bum 'dra bar//de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid//shin tu rmad 'brung
146a4(rgyud): thob par 'gyur//rnal 'byor kun gyi bde 'brel ba//rdo rje blo mchog dngos grub bo//sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin dag yi//sna tshogs chen po thob 'gyur nas//'dod
146a5(rgyud): pa'i chos kyis mi gos blo//'dod pa chen po sten par byed//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pa shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje ma
146a6(rgyud): lus pa lus pa med pa'i rdo rje'i sku dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge chen po'i phyag rgya'o////de bzhin oM ni bzhag bya ste//rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che ni/
146a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i sgra ni bde 'bral ba//tha mar khro bcas sbyar bar bya//phyag rgya 'di ni bde mchog ste//bar bcas pa yang thos par 'gyur//khams gsum ngo bo thams
146b1(rgyud): no//b+hU ya thos padas bla byug/'di las sangs rgyas thams ca da//tshe 'di nyid la da rlu \u0f7f//zung mod pad+ma ud pa lnga dang //myu lus rgyal/
146b2(rgyud): 'i rnams dang rten//rdo rje pa dz+ha sgyu bas na//dga' byed myur du dngos grub pa//rab tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i tshad med pa'i yon tan
146b3(rgyud): gyi sgra po med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba don gyi dpal thams cad grub por byed pa'o///oM ni spyi gtsug thig le gAs//rab dgyes chen ma rdo rje can
146b4(rgyud): rdo rje dri ba der 'brel ba//tha mar gnas shes rab sbyar bya//'di ni sa su rgyas thams cad kyi//sna tshogs chen mo'i mdun du 'gro/sna tshogs chen ma
146b5(rgyud): 'di yis ni//sna tshogs ye shes grub par 'gyur//bdag nyid rdo rje rgyan pa yi//de ni mtshan ldan kun dang rtsen//de nas chos dbyings gnas pa des//
146b6(rgyud): A lIkI li mnyam spyir byaste/dger byed lhan cig rgyun byas ni/dbang phyug dab pa des grub 'gyur//'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' mo//zla ldan
146b7(rgyud): gyes nas byadri dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhis kyi ba yi ge'i phyag rgya mchog gi drug tir rnams byas/shin tu
147a1(rgyud): rgyu na da/ na na//bram gyi grog sag/d-i nas bya rgya//dus da pa/
147a2(rgyud): ma ldan ma na// tshigs rmyi gas /skyes nas rkun ma sa// byud grog
147a3(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyi sathams ca/na mra pa'i mnyam pa nyid pa s+ho//ra hU~M rgyas pa'i dang shin tu dgyes pa na pa
147a4(rgyud): N+Ti shAn pags bya sems can thams ca don thams cad sgrub 'o//de bskyon ga shegs pa thams cang kyi mra dang /gsu
147a5(rgyud): rdo rje'i bdag pa m+bu ga so TIg+sa le na shad pa'i rgyal po mi chos kyi 'kho sa spyi gnyis pa'o//de nas
147a6(rgyud): sa dzin sa hrI hU~M nga ba nyid kyi sgyu dang /kus dang /gas las shrIng d+hA dgyes pa chen pa gad ni rje ma
147a7(rgyud): po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen pa pashad nis cing me gsung bar gyur \u0f7f//de nis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul thun dang mnyam pa di
147b1(rgyud): klong pa pod nga /thams ca gas ga sa drugasug smras rnams kyi sas su spyodas/da rgyab smo smra nargyun po dang bcas pa rnas kyis ma /
147b2(rgyud): du byas pa ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i namakha la 'gro ba dang /namakha' la 'gro ba'i tshugs dang ldan pa/byi nang gi pho nya dang po nya mo rab tu byas pa rnams shin tu ma
147b3(rgyud): d+hA ra NA/dpes shing skyed ni rgyas pa yis//bzhengs nas dgyes pa chen po yi//brjod pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing //thal mo sbyar nas gtsug nyid du/
147b4(rgyud): ni de pa yis ni 'dud ba byed//bsgral ba yi ni dbyungs 'di yis//de dag gcol mnyes pa byed//kye ma'i chos ni ngo mtshar che//kye mi'i spyod pa dri mtshur
147b5(rgyud): sa pa skyel byed pa yang de/'byung/myu na nga ba 'dren//kye ma rab dkyis yang dag 'ag/kye ma bad ba dag pa tshe
147b6(rgyud): ci ga byung po yang dag pa/sdo ma'i phyug rgyumanyam par bdugs//kye ma'i sgrub pa rnyed 'thung da//kye ma phyirol phyin ma ma
147b7(rgyud): 'i ster mthung shig/ tshogs dgas so//se mi'i dag pa gsum sbya ga/'i rdo rje ma sbya sa//kye ma pa po byed /
148a1(rgyud): rtse ma'i dbang po gnyis sbyor ba//kye ma'o mchog dang marnam pa'o//ts+tsho ma ga ni dag pa che//kye ma'o glu rang dri ma med/
148a2(rgyud): mo'o sim snyan rnam par brel//kye mya'o brda bya dang mun pa sel//kye ma'o dag byed me tog phreng //kye mdo pog snang dge ba ste//kye ma 'o mer me mun pa sel/
148a3(rgyud): kyi ma'adri ni shin tu bsil//kye ma'o rnal 'byor mnyam par sbyor//kye ma'i sbyor ba namakha' 'dra//kye ma'o sa sa rgyas rdo rje mchog/kye ma'o rin chen po
148a4(rgyud): mchog bskyed//kye ma'o sna tshogs pade mchog ldan//kau mo'o sna tshogs sgyu mi mdzad//kye me'o ngo mtshar sangs rgyas dang //kye ma'ongango mtshar dpa' bo rnams/
148a5(rgyud): kye mo'ongo mtshar sems dpa' rnams//kye ma'o ngo mtshar lha yi rnams//shin tu dgyes tshe rdo rje la//rgyun pa kun gyis bstod byas te//rdo rje sems dpa'i
148a6(rgyud): 'gying ba yis//dga' dang bang byed skyes par 'gyur//de nas pha rol phyin thams cad//'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dgyes 'gyur te//sems dpa' che la phyag
148a7(rgyud): byas nas//mchog gi dbyangs kyis bstod par byed//chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum bcas pa//yangs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad de//phyag dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis//
148b1(rgyud): ra tud kyus ldan sbyinam sgyur//yod ma 'dzum par smon drug mogs/ ba na n+tu //du de'i dbyes ni rnam ra ya sa//snum rgyangs kyi /
148b2(rgyud): pA cung zad rjems kyi smra gnon//tshams kyi drang po kun /mi dag rnaMs pa'i dbugs 'byin cing //rab tu dkyis chod rjes par bsgyud//dad pas bye la longs spyod mchog tu
148b3(rgyud): ba'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab bstan//dgongs pa'i darang dang ldan pas 'gro ba yi mtshan chen po'i sgo nas 'dul mdzad cing //gsang ba'i thig le 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni rdo /
148b4(rgyud): rmu gu ts+tshaR+Sha sta te//'ji rten ga ma pa myur bye na cis de de dag shugs don du nga /m+b+han+ta ra ldan padam tshig pa las 'azung //bde mdzod padi spyod dga' la ral
148b5(rgyud): bzhini mdzod//thams cad dga' ba'i nga nyid thig le'i dkyil du bskyed mdzad//byang chub snying po 'gro ba'i lam 'di bde bar bskul la bsnyen par mdzod//ngo mtshar de bzhin gshegs pa'i
148b6(rgyud): dam tshig rig pa che la dgyes shing bzhugs//bdag cag 'ang shes rnams dang bral ba nyid kyang bzhugs spyod 'dzem bcas pas//chungs pa'i rgyal po dbang ldan pas kyang de ni de la rag luso//
148b7(rgyud): la la ho//yangs pa'i spyan can drangs shing bcug ste rol po tshul bzhin mdzod//rnam dag ye shes chungs 'gro ba rnams kyi sdig pa khrus//byams ma'i gzungs mi bdag nyid ci dang gyu//
150a1(rgyud): mdzod la//thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin dag pa'i chu des bu dag bskur cig//mi ga yo mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ye shrIs thob 'dod phyir//
150a2(rgyud): dradam tshig chen po gsum po 'di la gnas nas ni//zla gsang thig le'i dbyings su bdag cag dogs med 'gro bar bgyi//dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni//shin tu
150a3(rgyud): srid pas skyo ba yi//sangs rgyas kun kyang 'dod pa bzhin//glu blangs myur du bskul bar 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das la dbyings kyi rgyal po 'dis bstod
150a4(rgyud): pas shin tu dgyes te de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpar bcas pa dang //rdo rje dang rin po che dang /pad+mo dang /las kyi rigs kyi btsun mo de dag
150a5(rgyud): thams cad la rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos mnyes par mdzad de//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang //rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs
150a6(rgyud): rnams dang //byang chub dpar bcas pa dang /na mkha' la 'gro ba dang /na mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs su bcas pa'i rnams dang // phyi nang gi rdo rje rigs las skyes
150a7(rgyud): pa rnams las shin tu dgyes pa dgyes pa chen po'i gar dang dbyangs dang /rdung ba dang /zhi ba'i thal mo la sogs pa rnam par mdzod pa chen pos rab tu mdzad nas///
150b1(rgyud): dmachog chen pa rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa 'dod pa'i dbang mo dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bde byar nA dA mi gsung bar gyur to//de nas de dag
150b2(rgyud): kun dgyes nas//shin tu dgyes pa nyid byas te//thal mo sbyar nas sa steng du//dbus mo'i lhung nga btsugs mdzad de//chos kyi phyir ni gsol ba dede bas//dkyil
150b3(rgyud): 'khor dmachog bdag nying la//bcom ldan 'as dgyes pas//bshAd+tha d+h+r-i ga lams can bde nyid kyi//bde dus dkyil 'khor sgrub par ba byed //de nas
150b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dam tshig 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lo snyoms par zhugs te//dkyil 'khor mdzad do//phyag gnyis gar dang bcas
150b5(rgyud): pa yis//mdun du thal mo bkan par bya//sor mo kun gyi rtse mo la//pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs rnams bsam//de dag ming gri brda yis ni//sngor mo thams cad brtag par
150b6(rgyud): bya//sbom po phan tshun bskol byas te//shes rab mchod rten du ni brtag/rdo rje mchod rten slar byas te/lhag ma 'ong bzhin spro bar bya//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/
150b7(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin ma ga/gang gis bcings pa tsam gyi kying //sangs rgyas byang chub byin rlob bo//phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas//rtag pa'i pha brang 'gro'o
151a1(rgyud): byed//sangs rgyus snang mdzad dpal dang ldan//btso ma'i gser gyi kha dog 'dzin//shes rab ldan pas sbyor byas na//'di yis myur du dngos grub bo//
151a2(rgyud): sbruskal ldan 'phrul gyi bu mo la//'di yis byin rlabs grwar byas te//rdo rje pad+mo bzhag byas nas//sems ni bzhugs pas bskyob byas la//de nas sems de blangs byas
151a3(rgyud): te/blo ldan dets+tshargyas btung byas te//grub pa gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du//yang dag dngos grub 'gro bar byed//shes rab dang ni 'phrul gyi 'am//de bzhin gshegs
151a4(rgyud): pa 'phral rtag 'thob//sangs rgyas rdo rje blo ldan gyis//kun tu 'phrog par yong mi nus//shin tu dgyes pa kun tu longs spyod pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol
151a5(rgyud): tu phyin pa'o//thal mo de nyid khro skyes pa//sbom po skyil krung bzhag byas te//sna tshogs phong ba 'bar byed pa//rnal 'byor gyis ni lhag ma spro//'di ni rdo rje thams cad
151a6(rgyud): kyang //shes rab pha rolnga phyin ma gsal//phyag rgyu 'di yis rgyas btab pas//rdo rje ye shes bla na med//'di yis myur du 'thob par 'gyur//phyag rgya 'di yis
151a7(rgyud): rgyas btab pas//'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang //ring du sdig pa 'jig par byed//tshe dang dpal dang ye shes skal//rdo rje 'dzin gyis thob par 'gyur//
151b1(rgyud): 'di ni dbang bsgyur tsam gyis kyang //rdo rje 'dzin rjer de 'gyur te//rdo rje dkyil gyi mtshan btab pas//san 'od zhing 'gro bar byed//'di ni dga' byed rdo rje rigs//rdo rje
151b2(rgyud): bud med 'gro gas pa dang //rdo rje gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor du//rdo rje sems nyid 'thob par 'gyur//ji ltar dngos grub 'dug pa dang //sangs rgyas rdo rje dpa' bo rnams/
151b3(rgyud): skad cig gcig gis 'dren par byed//bsgral dang mnyes par bya ba dang //rgyas btab de bzhin rmongs pa dang //gso bar byed dang za ba dang //phan tshon du mi skyed par byed//
151b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya ba shin tu dgyes pa bde ba thob par byed pa dpe med pa'i rdo rjer byed pa'i phyag rgya'o//
151b5(rgyud): rdo rje'i thal mo de nyid las//khro mo rgyab ni bskum byas te//sor mo lhag mAM snga ma bzhi ni//phyag rgya 'di ni dbang bskur ba'o//rims dang gdon dang dugI l-i sogaso//de mA
151b6(rgyud): thag tu 'phrog par byed//'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang //sangs rgyas kyi ni dgyes pa 'thob//'di nyid kyis ni dbang bskur dang //'di nyid kyis ni bde dam pa//'di
151b7(rgyud): nyid kyis ni rgyal po che//'di nyid kyis ni dpal dam pa//'di yis rtsegs byas pa yis//rang dga' 'gug pa dngos grub bo//mi la 'di yis byin rlabs te//nyi ma phyed
152a1(rgyud): ma spyad byas na//'dri ni de ma thag tu yang //dpal ldan rdo rje gaN+DI brjid 'dzin//nyi ma bcu gnyis 'du 'drar 'gyur//zhag bdun gyis 'gyur
152a2(rgyud): gzhan gyis min//sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dul ba dang /dge ba thams cad dbang du byed//grol 'dod rnams kyi mun pa sel//blo ldan phyag rgya mchog tu 'gyur//
152a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//bde ba chen po gzi brjid dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba//ba dadun gsum pa'i 'jig rten gsum du bde ba chen po
152a4(rgyud): 'thob par byed pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po'o////pha rol phyin pa'i phyag rgya nyid//dge ba'i khro mo dang bral ba//pha rol phyin pa'i chos yin te//
152a5(rgyud): tshig dang tshig rnams bral ba'o//phyag rgyu 'di ni bcings pa yis//chos kyi dbyings nas rje ru 'gyur//sangs rgyus kun gyis dbang bskor bas//dbang phyug dpa
152a6(rgyud): par de 'gyur te//thams cad dag lo mos pa yis//pad+mo dmar po mchog 'dzin 'gyur//pad+ma sgyu ma rnams mdzad pas//sna tshogs chen por de 'gyur ro//
152a7(rgyud): sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog pa byed//sems can kun la thams cad sbyin//'a dod chagasachen po nyes spangs te//de ni bdud rtsi 'dra bar 'gyur//'di ni
152b1(rgyud): myur ra du grwar byas pa//sgrub par mi byed cung zad med//'di ni pad+mo sbyor ba yis//bde mchog rtag pa thob par 'gyur/shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i mos par byed pa'i dpal
152b2(rgyud): pad+mo phreng ba zhes bya ba thams cad kyi don dpal shin tu de gyis par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o//'di nyid gnyis pas spyi gtsug tu//bsgyur nas bzhag par byis pa ni
152b3(rgyud): ma lus dri ma 'brog byed pa//sna tshogs chen por der 'gyur ro//'di yis dbang ni bskur ma thag/khams gsum sna tshogs phyi dra pan 'gyur//sna tshogs dbang
152b4(rgyud): po rgyal po che//sna tshogs gzugs dang sna tshogs bdag/sgrub pa thams cad bde dam po//'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug rmyi la//'dod pa'i byed kun sgrub byed pa//thams
152b5(rgyud): cad 'di yis dngos sgrub bo//bud med 'di yi sa byin+da rlabs nas//sto bsangs khur tses dkar mo dang //de dang lcen cig gar byas pa'o//sna tshogs bdag po chen
152b6(rgyud): por 'gyur//sngo bsangs zhing ma phreng ma dag/byin gyis brlabs nas dus gsum du//mtshan gyi mthar ni bsnyen gyis nas//las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur//
152b7(rgyud): rigs don can dang sme ma dang /gar mkhan de bzhin gar byed dge/phyag rgya ye shes byin rlabs te//bsnyen dang dngos gru ba thob par 'gyur//shin tu dgyes pa sna tshogs
153a1(rgyud): bde ba sbyin par byed pa zhes bya ba 'dod pa zhes bya ba 'dod par byed pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya de dag bstan pa'i
153a2(rgyud): rnams//gar gyi tshul gyis rang gi gnas//dam tshig mchog gi dam tshig gis//dngos grub chen po'i mthur 'gyuraro//thal mo de nyid sbyar byas te//rdo rje
153a3(rgyud): bcings pas bcings par bya//de nas dga' byed dbang bskyed de//'da' yi tshul gyis bzung bar bya//'di ni rab dgyes gtso bro yi//pha rol phyin mchog sdug
153a4(rgyud): pa yin//sangs rgyas rnams kyi myos byed pa//dpa' bo rnams kyang rmongs par byed//'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang //mi shes byed pa 'jig pa byed//las/
153a5(rgyud): kyi don ni dka' bzhon du//dga' nas bran bzhin byed par 'gyur//dga' dang lhan cig gar byed cing //'di dbang sar ni 'gro bar byed//dpal rdo rje sems dpa'
153a6(rgyud): shin tu dgyes pa kun tu bzang mo'i dgyes pa chen mo'i bde ba gnyis su med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o//snying kar gzung ba'i sbyor ba yis//
153a7(rgyud): 'di yis las kun byed 'gyur te//bdud rnams thams cad 'bigs par byed//rgyal ba 'dod chags bral spyod pa//bde gshegs mya ngan 'das kun dang //thams
153b1(rgyud): 'di yis slong bar byed//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byas nas//myur du lus la sbyor bar byed//dbang po nye dbang dbang chen gyi//gdug pa thams cad 'joms byed de/
153b2(rgyud): 'jigs byed drag po tshon po yis//gdug pa thams cad gdung bar byed//rdo rje pad+mor bcug pa yis//mche bas ma mchu bzung byas te//sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba
153b3(rgyud): dpung pa brkyang ste gar du bya//sna tshogs chen po rab rgyas pas//bde chen po yi bde 'thob bo//'dod ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//'dod dang thar par grub byed te//
153b4(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na//'dod pa bzhin du 'phror bar byed//rab dgyes 'brel pas gar byas shing //na mkha' gzungs ma'i thabs nyid kyi//phan tshun bcu pa'i
153b5(rgyud): glonon pa yis//bcings na 'di yis dngos grub bo//de ni de ma thag tu yang //lha dang lha yin mchod byed de//dbang po nye dbang dbang chen dang //nyi zla gshin rje chu dbang rnam/
153b6(rgyud): sbyin po yis ni phyag byas nas//rang gi dpal mchog stobs byed de//rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyang //nyid kyis dpal can stobs pa yis//brten pa de la mgu byed
153b7(rgyud): cing //sangs rgyas dgos pa rab sgrub byed//'di yis las kyi rdul gyi rnams//las dang rjes su mthun 'gyur te//rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnam mdzad pas//sangs rgyas
154a1(rgyud): kun dang mnyam sbyar te//gzungs dang gnyis med sbyar ba yis//yid la 'dod pa'i las kun byed//'dzum dang gnas dang smras pa dang //spyod pas
154a2(rgyud): gar byis byas pas so//gzhan drug kyang de dngos grub che//pad+mo'i mdo ba ma rnams phye bas//byang chub sems ni rab sgrub pa//sgrub pa pos ni pad+mo sgrub//de bzhin
154a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi//bde ba gnyis su med pa'i dpal//shin tu dgyes pa'i pad+mo mang ba ma zhes bya ba shin tu nga gyes pa'i chen po'i bde ba 'thob par byed
154a4(rgyud): pa'o////thal mo de nyid bcings pa yis//bcings pa gyen du bzung byas te//mthe'u chung gnyis ni sgreng byas te//de bzhin sbom po gnyis kyang bya//phyag rgya
154a5(rgyud): 'di ni chu srin zhes//rgyal mtshan ldan par bshad pa yin//rdo rje sems dpa' sprul pa ste//'dod bral chags par sgrub pa yin//phyag rgya 'di yis bde ldan gyi//
154a6(rgyud): po brang chen por 'gro byor byed//der byon chos kyi 'khor lo dag/bla med par ni bskor bar byed//sangs rgyas pha rolnga phyin mas bskor//sdig spangs rnams ni
154a7(rgyud): bkug nas kyang //spyod po drag pa'i tshul gyis ni//bskal pa bye bar bsnyen par byed//yang dog byang chub gnas pa yi//sangs rgyas 'di yis mnyes par byed//
154b1(rgyud): na snga dgyes te sna tshogs che//sna tshogs ye shes skye ba yaM//rang gi da ma tshig gsungs pa yi//sems dpa' chen po sgrub par byed//bla med dngos grub thams cad kyang //
154b2(rgyud): 'di yis thams cad grub par byed//sbyor dang ldan pas byin rlabs te//snying khar nye bar bsam byas na//lus kyi rnga bo tshulo 'di yis//thams cad las ni byed du gzhub
154b3(rgyud): gar dang dbyangs kyi ro dga' dang //sil snyan brdung ba rnams byed dang //pi bad gling bu rdza rnga yi//phyag rgya 'di yis bsgrub par bya//dpal rdo rje shin tu dgyes po chen po'i
154b4(rgyud): thugs kyi dgyes pa dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//thal mo de nyid mnyam bzung nas//'gying zhing 'gyid bso gar byas te//bcing pa chen po bcings
154b5(rgyud): byas nas//sbyor ba chen po gnyis su bya//khu tshur gnyis po dku nyid du//g.yon du 'gying bas brtan par bya//phyag rgya 'di ni rgyal la sogs//bde ba dam pas mchod
154b6(rgyud): byas te/'bying ba'i sbyor bas gar byas na//dngos grub thams cad grub par byed//'gying ba tsam gyi so sbyor ba yis//'gyong ba thams cad 'phrog par byed//lha dang /
154b7(rgyud): lha min rig ma yis//'bum phrag rgya yis mchod par byed//rab tu dgyes po bde mchog che//kun tu gar byas gnas par 'gyur//klu mo lde dang lha min dang /
155a1(rgyud): da dAnan mo 'am ba tu hU~M //na mkha' 'gro mu'i khyor 'gyur te//rnal 'byor ma kun 'ad pa che//gzungs marnams kyi dag pa bdag/gsang ba pa rom//
155a2(rgyud): byin pa'i rje//las kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni//thams cad las ni byed por bshad//sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che//gsang chen sbyor bas dang shA grub po//dpal shin tu
155a3(rgyud): dgyes pa bde ba chen mo sems can thams cad sgrol bar sbas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa'o//phyag rgya de nyid monyam bzung ste//lag pa'i 'dab ma
155a4(rgyud): gar dad bcas//myur bar steng du dor ba yis//mgyogasu 'gro ba dngos grub bo//'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//rmad byung dam pa mchod byas pa//skor ba
155a5(rgyud): gar gyis mchod b+h+yos na//thams cad las byed dngos grub bo//gang drug da ngos grub med pa dang //gang dag bde ba med pa'i rnams//de dag phyag rgya 'dis btub na
155a6(rgyud): dmakha'i dkyil 'khor 'gro bar 'gyur//de yis thams cad las rnams ni//rmad 'byung dam pa 'grub par byed//btsun mo chen mo de bzhin gA shugs//'di yis
155a7(rgyud): ni 'grub par byed//gzhan yang mchog tu rgya che ba//mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kyi dbyings//btsun mo dam pa de bzhin gshegs//phyag rgya'i sbyor bas dngos gru bo//
155b1(rgyud): dang ba ba chen po rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa'i me tog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid 'og go ngos su dUr//steng du cung zad bsgrub par bya//'di yas sangs rgyus thams/
155b2(rgyud): cad kyi//bde mchog yid ni tshim byed pa//'dis ni bcings po tsam gyis kyang //bdud rnams shin tu rang bar 'gyur//phyag rgyu ba cings te bsdigs po phyis//
155b3(rgyud): smuskrag nus dngos grub sbyin par byed//sangs rgyas dam tshig gsum gnas pa'i//'di yos mchod pa byis par 'gyur//de nas gtso bo 'dis mnyes nas//mchog gi
155b4(rgyud): thibs ni stobs par byed//phyag rgyu bcings po sbyor ba yis//'di ni thams cad byed par 'gyur//rgyun tu byas na rnal 'byor pa//dngos po thams cad byed par 'gyur//
155b5(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad 'breg byed do//bde ba pad+mo 'thob byed cing //tshe 'di dang ni pha rol du//phyag rgyu'o gnas skye de 'gro'o//dpal shin tu dgyes po rnon po
155b6(rgyud): byu ba thim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgyu ste//dri ma thams cad spongs padapal shin tu dgye so ma'o//thal mo dI ny-id sbom po skyeng //lcug mi gsal ba'i nyi ma bzhin//
155b7(rgyud): 'di ni sangs rgya so thams cad kyis//ya nas mchog tu snang byed pa'o//thog ma med nas bskor ba yi//'di yo pa gti mug 'brog byed de//mnyam par gzhag nas/
156a1(rgyud): /bcings mthug/sangs rgyas kun gyis byon gyis rlob//mnyam nyid seM gas dri med dang //pad+ma dra ba dga' bya tshe//sna tshogs dra ba dpal chen po//blo
156a2(rgyud): byed chen po 'thob par 'gyur//rdo rje dgyes pa chen po'i dpe med pa'i dpal dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//g.yas dang g.yon pa'i lag pa yis//brjid pa'i gar gyi gar
156a3(rgyud): byebyi zhing //thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te//g.yon gyi khru tshur spyi bor bzhag/rgyal po rnams kyi phyag rgya 'di//mchod pa thams cad grub byed do//thams cad don rnams grub
156a4(rgyud): papopa dge/bkra shis rgyal ba 'thob par byed//gang zhig bcings pa tsam gyis kyang //mchod pa'i sprin nyid rgyas pa che//mtha' yas dri med gzi brjid dang //sangs rgyas
156a5(rgyud): zhing ni dngos grub bo//phyag rgya sbyor bas sbyar byas te//skad cig gcig gis gar byas nas//rdzogs sangs rgyas dang sras mchog kyang //'dri yis thams cad 'tho ba
156a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur//sna tshogs kyi no sbyor ba yis//sna tshogs gar gyis gar byas no//dpa' bo thams cad kun tu 'gro/phun sum tshogs pa 'dis 'gru'o//dpal shin
156a7(rgyud): tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i sems 'phel bar byed mi zhes pa'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po dpal kun tu
156b1(rgyud): bzung po shin tu dgyeb chen po bde ba'i bdag nyid rnam par sdung mdzad chen pra pra shrad du mthus klas pa/dri 'dzin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsung du zlags
156b2(rgyud): thig le mchog tu pha rol tu phyin pa//gsang po chen po dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu dgyes pa//rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskal
156b3(rgyud): pa'i mthas klas pa zhes bya ba gsum pa rdzogs so////de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i gsang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag
156b4(rgyud): rgyu'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad nas slar yang bde bar cad mi gsung bar gnas par gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang /pha rol tu phyin ma rnal
156b5(rgyud): 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs thams cad dang /na mkha' la 'gro ba dang /na mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas phyi nang gi rdo rje rigs gtogs pa
156b6(rgyud): 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs thams cad la slab dbugs phyung ste/de las bzhengs nas gar mdzad cing rab tu dgyes pa'i spyan rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la yang dang
156b7(rgyud): yang du lta zhing dbyangs kyi mchog bde ba 'dis glu blangs te dgyes par byed do//rnam mang bde ba'i rol pas bdag nyid chen po yis//skye dang mi skye'i chos nyid ya mtshan
157a1(rgyud): /rmad dag dpal bstan pa//shin tu bde ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten 'dir phyung ste//rang bzhin drug pa'i gzungs mu'i dkyil 'khor bskyed par mdzod//
157a2(rgyud): drongo mtshar rmad du byung bas bde bas r-I laM mdzad cing //bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin 'dus pa rnams pa 'bugs 'byin cing //gsang ba'i thig le dngos nyid na mkha' 'dre ba
157a3(rgyud): rnams spyad de//bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i longs spyod rgyu las dbang mdzad pas//byang chub mchog gi lam 'di nyon mongs mtha' dang rnam bral zhing //bde ba'i
157a4(rgyud): 'byung glonas skye shi med pa'i sgo mor pad+mo rnams dag pa//nyanA mongs mi go sgyu mar gnas pa chu zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin//e ma'o kun tu bzang po rig pa rgya chen
157a5(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa//dngos nyid med pa'i chos la dga' ba'i rol pas go zungs su 'gyur//sangs rgyas kun gyi bde mchog bdud rtsi rus yan//ji ltar bde la rten
157a6(rgyud): cing kun tu snang bar mdzad//kye ma bde mchog bde bas rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod//sdug bsngal 'gro ba'i las can bde bas tshim par mdzod//byams pa'i can ldan
157a7(rgyud): thugs rje rnams 'gro ba kun la shar mdzad nas//gti mug thibs po'i mun nag byang chub sems kyis gsal bar ston//de ni 'dus pa'i tshogs la bde sbyin rol
157b1(rgyud): pa'i rgyal pos gsungs//byang chub mchog gi sems des snying po dbang bskur cig/dbyangs kyi phyag rgya 'di yis ni//skad cig skad cig bskul byas na//rab tu dgyes pa'i
157b2(rgyud): bdag nyid kyi//mdun du gnas te dngos grub sbyin//de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes po chen po'i bde ba'i bdag po kun tu bzang po rdo rje zla gsang thig le chan
157b3(rgyud): ba la//rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ba gsang ba chen po tshad med pa dang //mchog tu pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang //rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs chen mo de rnams kyis bstod cing
157b4(rgyud): bskul ba byas pa dang //gsang ba thabs kyi bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa ljongs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di la snyoms par zhugs nas
157b5(rgyud): shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i dkyi la 'khor chen po 'di rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //gru bzhi
157b6(rgyud): pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs rnams pa bzhi yis rgyun//dor dang dril bu'i chun po dang //nyi ma zla ba rnam par rgyun//rin chen mu tig 'bras bus spros//do shal gdu
157b7(rgyud): bu rnams kyis rgyun//sna tshogs gdugs ni rnam bris pa//sna tshogs phreng ba gos kyis rgyan//sras bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste//ka ba brgyad mchog yang dag gnas//
158a1(rgyud): dbus kyi dga' byed stan la ni//dngul la sogs byas rnam par rgyun//sna tshogs pad+mo dUr gyis g.yogs//thams cad stan+da te dgra ces bya//dbus su
158a2(rgyud): rdo rje shin tu dgyes//stan de la ni bzhag par bya//tshad med pad+mo dmar 'dra ba'i//sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs//yid bzhin nor bu dbu rgyan
158a3(rgyud): ldan//rin chen gtsug gis rnam par mdzes//tshad med dar ni sbyangs pa yis//dbu la chu ni pos mdzes par bya//sna tshogs sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/sna tshogs
158a4(rgyud): ye shes rab tu gnas//chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam gyis//dga' byed yid tsam g.yon tu 'dud//g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje che//snying kar gsor la shin tu brtson//
158a5(rgyud): de la sogs pa'i yon tan ljon//thog ma nyid du rnam par gzhag/slob ma 'am yang na gzhan yang rung //mtshan kun gyis ni rnam rgyan pa//tshul bzhin byin gyis
158a6(rgyud): brlab bya ste//dbus kyi dkyil du bzhag par bya//bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam gzhag ste//de la sogs pa yon tan gtso//dbus kyi stan lho 'dug pa na//bdag ni rab
158a7(rgyud): dgyes zhes su smra//des ni slob ma byin rlabs te//thams cad las byed phun sum tshogs//rdo rje pad+mo las 'byung ba'i//gsang ba yis kyang dbang bskur ro//rab
158b1(rgyud): dgyes la sogs yon tan ldan//yid 'ong bu mo btsal byas te//mgrin pa dpral ba snying spyi bor//lha la sogs pa'i 'bru bsgoms te//mtshan ma phyag rgyar rab 'bar ba//
158b2(rgyud): rdo rje pad+mor mnyam sbyor ba'i//rang la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis//tshul bzhin thams cad bzhag par bya//mdun du lha mo smyos byed ma//ma mchu 'dzin pa'i ro la dgyes//
158b3(rgyud): dkar dmar kha dog 'dres pa yi//thams cad rgyan dang yang dag ldan//lho ni bcu drug lon pa'i mchog/shes rab can gyis mdun du bzhag/g.yas su lha mo gsod/
158b4(rgyud): byed ma//mtshon cha'i mda' ni 'dren par brtson//do shal rkang gdub dag gis rgyan//lo grangs nyi shu lon pa ste//gser gyi ri bo zhu bo 'dra//chu skyes spyan ni yod tsam sngo//
158b5(rgyud): sems dpa' che la dgyes mdzad cing //'di ni tshul bzhin bzhag par bya//rgyab tu lha mo rmongs byed ma//pad+mo dmar po mdog gi 'od //chu srin rgyal mtshan mdzes ma'o//
158b6(rgyud): sku tshe'i tshad ni nyi shu gcig/dga' byed 'dod pa'i ro la dgyes//sna tshogs na bza' yang dge gsol//sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs//sna tshogs pad+mo sbyor la
158b7(rgyud): sogs//gar gyi bya ba rab bslabs bzhag/g.yon du sna tshogs chen po ste//sna tshogs dgos pa'i rjes bslabs pa//sku tshe'i tshad ni bcu gnyis ldan//rna la
159a1(rgyud): /pa lA shin tu brtson//lha dang lha mon mi yi rnams//'phro ba thams cad myos 'gyur ma//sna tshogs rgyun gyis rnam par klubs//sna tshugs dang sngo na bza'
159a2(rgyud): gsol//grwa rnams kyi ni thams cad du//gzugs sgra dri ro dag gi rnams//bdug pa me tog gsung ldan pa//gzi brjid chen po 'od dang ldan//ci rigs par ni bzhag par
159a3(rgyud): byad//sgo pI phyogs rnams thams cad du//rang gi las kyi phyag rgyar ldan//skal ldan dga' la rnam mos pa//sgo srung bzhi ni bzhag par bye//gzhan yang rnam par sna tshogs
159a4(rgyud): rnams//pi blang gling bu brdab pa dang //rdza rngu rnga chen mu kro dang //mu re dza dang da ra deng //gAr dang dbyangs dang bzhad pa che//rol mo'i yo byad sna tshogs rnams//dga'
159a5(rgyud): byad dkyil 'khor bzhag par bya//phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad do//dkyil 'khor 'di'i phyi rol du//rdo rje na mkha' 'gro ma bzhag/yi dwags rgyal po yang dag
159a6(rgyud): zhon//dpa' bo 'jigs byed gzugs 'dzin te//skal ldan rang gi lag car ldan//gdug pa'i sems kyis bsdigs byed cing //sha khrag dang ni rgyu ma dang //rkang dang
159a7(rgyud): tshil bu za spyod pa//dkyil 'khor byas te 'dug pa ni//tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bzhag par bya//dga' bar byed dang 'dren par byed//gsod pa re byed dang spro bar
159b1(rgyud): byed//rdo rje mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi rnams//shar gyi phyogs su bzhug par bya//gzi brjid che dang 'byur byed ma//'jigs byed bong bu'i lho ru ste//gtsug lag mthong
159b2(rgyud): ba'i rgyu yis ni//mkhas pas tshul bzhin bzhag par bya//chags chen mo da chags bral dang //'khor lo mo dang rgyas 'debs mo//rab tu sbyar bas sbyor byas te//ci rigs
159b3(rgyud): nub tu bzhag par bya//sna tshogs lus dang srung ba dang //gnod sbyin ma dang yang dag 'phrog/sngags dang phyag rgyas byin rlabs te//sngagaso mkhan tro tsa rigs byang chub
159b4(rgyud): bzhag/shar gyi gr-i ru bzhag pa ni//bya rog gdong ste mig 'dra zhing //'jigs pa'i mig dang 'jigs pa'i gdong //ji ltar rjes su 'thun byas te//yi dwags stan
159b5(rgyud): la yang dag 'dug/sna tshogs mchog gi mdog 'dzin te//lag pa dri dang khar gzhong thogs//mchog tu sha dang khrag za ba'o//nub dang lho yi mtshams bzhag pa/
159b6(rgyud): bzhad dang 'ug pa'i gdong ring ma//khros pa'i khyi dang phrag gi gdong //gsus po che la lto 'phyangs ma//nub byang gi ni mtshams dag tu//rnga mo bong bu'i gdong 'dzin dang //
159b7(rgyud): khros pa'i ra dang byi la'i gdong //sgyu ma'i mgo nas za byed rnams//shar dang byang gi mtshams dag tu//keng rus dkar po 'dzin pa ste//khros pa rus pa'i phreng bas klubs//
160b1(rgyud): rab sres pa//kun las 'phags pa ro yi mchog/tshogs kyi dbus su bsgrub byas te//btung ba bzhin du myangs pa yis//rdo rje blo ldan bskal par gnas//rnam pa sna tshogs
160b2(rgyud): nye ba'i zas//bza' ba dang ni bza' bas mchod//mchod pa nye ba'i zas lnga dang //tshad med 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas//tshad med rnal 'byor ma tshogs la//skad cig skud cig
160b3(rgyud): mchod par bya//sngags mkhan tshun bzhin mnyam gzhag ste//'byung po rnams la gtor ma byin//lha rnams kyi ni thams cad la//he ru ka yi phyag rgya yis//nyid kyi
160b4(rgyud): gtor ma byin rlabs te//spyan drangs gtsang spras byas pa dbul//gzungs kyi tshogs ni de rnams la//mnyes pa byas nas slar gshegaso//rnal 'byor ma chen dkyil
160b5(rgyud): 'khor du//slob ma'i mcho ga ni gzhugs par bya//mtshungs par spyod pa rab mdzes ma//sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris//lag pa g.yon gyis bzung byas te//
160b6(rgyud): rab dgyes longs spyod phyag rgya yis//bcug nas sgo yis grwa nyid du//blo ldan dam tshig bsgrag par bya//'di las mi bya cung zad med//thabs dang shos rab sems nyid
160b7(rgyud): kyis//rtag tu dog sa po med byas te//'dod pa lnga yi yon tan spyod//gzhan yang dam tshig nyams po dang //skye bo gang dag dam la gnon//brtul zhugs khyod kyis nga
161a1(rgyud): rga//dru satwo//dzAg rgyun pon+na da ba b+h+ya//gang dag skyob dpon skyong byung dang //gang dag bka' rnams mA~M byung bya//de dag khros nas khyad chud pa/
161a2(rgyud): blo ldan skyed las btung bar bya//dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang //slob dpon la yang gnod byung pa//rdo rje khro bo'i bsdus pa yi//dam tshig bsgrim pa
161a3(rgyud): sprul ba ste//de nas dam tshig blud byas //rdo rje bdud rtsi re yi mchogadu chen par ni bzhig pa b+h+ya//rdo rje b+ha dung rtsi'i chu thA de//kyai dmyal pa mi
161a4(rgyud): khyod kyi sgyid la kun tu gnas/dam tshig bsrungasaM pas dngos grub ste//rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'di 'thung //oM bidz+nye u daM kau hUM trAM//dam+bu tshig pa ni'i rgyu /
161a5(rgyud): bzlas pa'o//byin gyis brlabs te 'thung du gzhug/gzhan du dam tshig mi 'gyur te//dngos grub nyid du'ang 'di 'gyur ro//bdag ni dam tshig skal dag
161a6(rgyud): nas//slob mo sngags ni brjod du zhugs//sgra grwar gnas nas bri bya ba//kye khyod dga' ba ci la dang //'jug pa sa kyang smra bye ba//bdag ni skal ldan par
161a7(rgyud): mchog le//rab de gyes 'phrul l-i baidag dga' ste//mchog tu dgo' la bdag doga'o//de nas rnal 'byor ma mchog gis/dkyil du me tog por byas te/
161b1(rgyud): me tog gang la lhung ba yi//lha nyid du ni dngos grub bo//dbang bskur ba yi phyag rgya yis//dri nas spro bar dbang bskur bya//bum pa rnam pa bzhi yis kyang //mnyam par gzhag
161b2(rgyud): ste lnga po yis//pad+mo dkyil 'khor zhugs byas te//de nas yid ni dab bskor bya//ci rigs par ni gzungs mo'i rnams//bdag ni skal ldan zhes su smra//gang dga'
161b3(rgyud): ba myur ba yi//sgra de nyid ni bag+h+nAnA par hU~M//dga' bar byed pa'i gzugs mdo la/khyod kyis rtag tu sgrub par gyis//de nas rgyal dbang sgrib ma do//nang gi smras par spras pa
161b4(rgyud): gsang ba mnyam por 'jug pa yis//sbyor dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya//rdo rje po lus drangs po//sbom pa dang ni dbang gispu blangs//rdo rje //na du bzhig byas nas//rtag
161b5(rgyud): bla dge ba bde ba che//kye ma'o dam tshig pa de brjod cing //kye ma bde pa blang bar bya//'di ni gseng ba zhes bya ste//dbang bskur ba yi thabs mche zhe gro/rdo rje slob dpon bdag
161b6(rgyud): hU~M rme//rang gi kha ni rdo rje bzlog/sems dpe' chen po drungs byas na//snye mas kyis byang chub bde ba'i thog//'di ni ma tshig tu gas ba ste//dbang bsgyur ba yi dang ba
161b7(rgyud): slob ma mi shes pa rnams la//'di dag thams cad bsgrags mi bya//rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya'o//yang nas yang du brtag par bya//'di yis dbang ni bskur me zag/slar ma
162a1(rgyud): tshogs kyi bdag por 'gyur//sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi//slob dpon nyid du bde bar 'gyur//gzungs ma rnams kyi dga' ba'i bdag/sangs rgyas
162a2(rgyud): rnams kyi rjer bshad do//mkha' la 'gro ba'i khyor 'gyur te//ri dang 'gro ba kun gyi bdag/de nas shes rab ye shes dbang //slob ma mchog la sbyin par bya//gzungs mo de
162a3(rgyud): ni bdag nyid la//bla ma nyid kyis byin rlabs te/dngos grub 'bras bu myur 'thob phyir/slob ma la ni sbyin par bya//dbang bskur shin tu sbas pa yi sa//rdo rje slob dpon tshul
162a4(rgyud): ji bzhin//blo ldan the tsom med pa'i phyir//rnam pa bzhi po 'di sbyin no//de tshun tsod ni slob ma la//rgyud kun las ni gang cung zad//yi ge'i tshul gyis sbas pa rnams//
162a5(rgyud): gsad pa mchog ni bstan par bya//de nas de nyid langs byas te//slob da pon rkang par gtugs byas nas//rgyal po dbang phyug bde dam pa//thams cad yon ni dbul
162a6(rgyud): bar bya//gzungs de de dag thams cad la//ci dga' bar ni yon yang 'bul//slob dpon cung zad gang 'dod pa//yid la bsams pa'i yon yang rung //dam tshig 'das
162a7(rgyud): pas 'jigs sa yis//de dag thams cad dbul bar bya//slob dpon la ni yon gyi mchog/rigs kyi khyab par dbul byas te//seng ge'i gdan la nyid kyis ma//
162b1(rgyud): spos rgyas byon ni yon mchog spyan//klung po rin chen gas dag dang //srong mo b+h+ra ma'o yan mchog yin//rdo rje sems dnga'i ra sa smin te//yAn du mchog gi yon yin no//
162b2(rgyud): rin chen pad+mo'i chung ma dang //shing d+had+hA ni shin tu rgyun//sna tshogs rin chen rnam dag byA//mU tig phreng bas shin tu mdzes//nu mo rin chen dra ba'i yis//rgyun te sna tshugs rdorje
162b3(rgyud): la'o//rgyu la ba yi ni dbang phyug dang //rlung ma bla ma dbul bar bya//'phrul gyi gzhon pa sna tshugs pa//glang po N+Di ni shin tu rgyun//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi de//nA
162b4(rgyud): tan bla mo dbul bar bya// ma'i yon gyi phyug rgyu 'di//rdo rje blo ldan sgrib ma yis/ste byede byed kun 'dod na//dga' dang mos pa'i sems kyis bya//de la sogs pa'i sbyor
162b5(rgyud): bayis//rab dgyes gdon mi zla ba'i bde//gang gis myur du 'thob 'gyur te//slob dpon gtso mchog nyid du 'gyur//chos rnams kun gyis dbang phyug rgyu la//rdo rje blo lnga no
162b6(rgyud): mchog tu gyur//rin chen kun gyi rigs kyi rgyal/de bzhin sna tshogs rigs kun tu//pad+mo'i rags kun dpal dang ldan/rdo rje rigs kun bdag por de//sangs rgyas kyi
162b7(rgyud): ni rigs kun dang //rgyal ba'i gtso bo mchog tu 'gyur//dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor la ga //nyid dang slob ma'i tshigs gyur pas//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che//sems dal
163a1(rgyud): par bya//d+hI yi sgras byu gas de lta sogs//nang gi mchod pa mchog gi rnams//phyug rgyur sgyur ba tshul gnas te//tshul ban na m+b+hi d+d+he b+h+ru~M l-iM phyir bya//lus dang ngan
163a2(rgyud): sems byin byed kyis//mchod pa'i bdag nyid mchod par bya//'dod pa'i ral pa myong ba yi//myongs na mchod pa 'thob pU r-I/tshud po kun gyi tshi ga yis/
163a3(rgyud): rang rigs khyad par shes byas te//sgrub pa thams cad sgrub byas nas//dngos grub thams cad myur du 'thob//dkyil 'khor lda hrI mthong bas//dga' mgu
163a4(rgyud): rangs pa'i yid kyis ni//rdo rje sam+b+ha sa la phyag byed cing //rang gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba 'debs//bde byed chen po'i skyel mo N+Di/rigs kyi khyad par gyis ni rje
163a5(rgyud): lha rnams kyang ni re re yang //sems kyi khyad par mchog mtha' yas//'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba//mtha' yos chos ni yongs pa basbyin//'dod chags rnams kyis
163a6(rgyud): dkris pa yi//sdug bsngal gzir ba'i mtha' nas 'gro//'dod pa'i mchog gi longs spyod rnams//mos pa'i rjes su zhugs ni myed//kun tu chags par mi 'gyur zhing
163b1(rgyud): bde bas longs pa'i yid dang ldan//byang chub snying por bgrod pa ni//dam bcas rnams dang sems kyis so//de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa thams cad kyi bdag po ku
163b2(rgyud): tu bzang po chen po//rab tu bzhed cing spyan zur gyis gzigs pa'i thugs kyis shin tu dgyes pa kun tu longs spyod pa'i dkyil mo krung gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa
163b3(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas/skyil mo krung chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba rang gi phyag rgya'i ye shes nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //g.yas dang g.yon gyis
163b4(rgyud): tshul gyis ni//rkang pa gnyis ka bteg byas te//bdag nyid brla ni mi snang bzhin//rtsa ba skyil mo bcing bar bya//sbyor ba gar mkhan tshul gyis ni//gar gyi sbyor bas gar bya'o//
163b5(rgyud): rdo rje gdan gyi bde ba che//'di yis bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur//gdug pa dang ni dgu thams cad//skad cig gis kyang smos ci dgos//rab tu dgyes po'i stan 'di yis//
163b6(rgyud): yang dag byang chub myur du thob//mi byed pa ni thig ler bcas//'og gi phyogs su yi ge drug/shes rab can gyis bskyod cing bzlas//'byung ba'i tshe na phaT ces bshad/
163b7(rgyud): pad+me mi phyed 'dren pa dang //thig ler bcas pa sbyor bar bya//mi phyed oM dang yang dag ldan//tsheg drag bcas pa bde 'byung na'o//bud med la ni zhag bdun du//'di yis rtsen
164a1(rgyud): /par byas pa na//namakhan thams cad gang bu so//sangs rgyas rnal 'byor chen po mthong //rab dkyis langs spyod gnas pa yi//sems dpa' che la slong
164a2(rgyud): mdzad de//gzungs kyi pad+ma las byung ba//bde byed mchog gi dbade bskur ro//de nas rab dga' bde thob bya//sems dpa' de ni dngas grub bo//thog ma dang ni mtha' me
164a3(rgyud): par//'dod pa thams cad de mongs spyod//tshe dang dpa lnga dang phun sum ldan//gdon dang dug dang che ba'i nad//mkha' 'gros nye byar gtses pa dang //sdig can 'khor
164a4(rgyud): ba las grol te//sa rnams kun la rnam par rgyu//gzi brjid nyi ma shar dang 'dra//sna tshogs 'dra ba 'bar byed pas//sna tshogs thams cad snang byengad cing //de yi
164a5(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi//nad dang mya ngan 'jigs chen 'phrog/phyag rgya 'di yis sbyor ba yis//ye shes lnga ni bsten par bya//rtsa ba'i skyi lci mo zhes bya ba//
164a6(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i lus kyi don//thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o//bdag gi rkang pa dbus su bsdu//de yi rkang pas bcings byas te//sems dpo'i skyil mo bzhin du
164a7(rgyud): 'brel//'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang //khams gsum sgrub par bzhed pa yin//yi ge rnams ni snga ma bzhin//rang gi lhar ni sbyor ba rtson pas/
164b1(rgyud): bskams sam yang na bsgyud kyang rung //sngags pa 'di yis dngas grub ste//sngags kyi sems 'dzin gtsang ma yi//zhag bdun sgom pa skam byas nas//yang dag drungs/
164b2(rgyud): grub nyid du 'gyur//phyug rgyu 'di yis rgyas btab te//sbyor ba shin tu bstun byas nas//gdon mi za bar rgya lnga po 'thab//yid bzhini dgos pa thams cad byed//rdo rje sbrul
164b3(rgyud): mo krung ngo //gzungs ma ste bcing ba ni//rin po che ltar sbyor byas te//rang gi rkang pa mi snang bya//rin chen kun gyi skyil mo krung //'di ni rin chen thams cad kyi//dbul zhing phongs
164b4(rgyud): pa 'joms byed de//sdig pa thams cad 'phrog byed ma//gnod pa'i dug kun 'phrog par byed //gdug pa thams cad rmongs byed de//dgra rnams thams cad 'joms par byed//
164b5(rgyud): khro ba thams cad 'dzum byed de//gdug pa rnams kyi rgyas 'debs na//mau g.yeng zla ba gcig gis ni//'di yis rgyal po drangs grub bo//yid bzhin las rnams thams cad
164b6(rgyud): byed//ce ste bdag nyid rgyal blo ru//mchog tu rmad 'byung sgrub 'dang na//rin chen sems kyi rin chen mtshan//gsang ba'i phyag rgya tshul gnon pa//rgyal po khams gsum
164b7(rgyud): rgyal byed pa//zla phyed tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur po rin po che yi skyil mo'o//de bzhin rkang pa gnyis bzhag pa//pad+ma 'dra bar sbyar byas te//bdag gam de bzhin gzhan/
165a1(rgyud): /lung dang // sngon dang+gA ba.u gyu//da lus snyoms can rnams da //mdan na sangs rgyam rnams dag dang//rdzun snyom myusas byung byu byung du 'dran/
165a2(rgyud): ba gdon mi za//bde ldan po brang chen po yis//bde byed 'di yis 'thob par byed//sems can khams rnams thams cad du//sems dpa' chen po 'gro 'ong byed//
165a3(rgyud): pad+mo'i skyil mo'o//da bezhin skyil mo rgyas byas te//sna tshogs tshul gyis sbyar ba blo//sngags mkhan chen po'i sbyor ba yin//sngags mkhan yi ge shin tu brtson//zlos
165a4(rgyud): pa byed cing rnams bsgoms no//dngos grub rtag pa 'thob par 'gyur//mi g.yeng sngon gyi gdug pa yo//las rnams thams cad 'phrog par byed//sna tshogs skyil du/
165a5(rgyud): gnas pa yis//bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur//sna tshogs kyi ni skyil mo'o//dri nas mkha' 'gro skyil mo rgyas//thams cad khrig ni 'phrog byas te//gzungs ma
165a6(rgyud): sri ni rkang pa gnyis//yid kyi gnya' bar rkang pa 'dog/rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba yis//bstan pa khri gro rnams 'brog par byed//mnyam par gzhog nas gzungs ma
165a7(rgyud): yi//rkang pa gcig ni mgul nyid du//sbyor dang ldan pas bteg byas na//zaso rnams thams cad 'phrog byed de//btung dang bza' ba bca' ba dang //gos kyi rgyan gyis
165b1(rgyud): klubs bya yos//de bzhon zhag 'dun nyid kyis kyang //thams cad lngas byeng gdan mi za//tshangs pa gtogs 'dod dbang po yi//dngalnga tshon mchog ni 'phrog par byed//lan dang //
165b2(rgyud): skyes 'i tshul gyis nI//khams gsum rim pa rgal bar byed//migo ni btsums par byed 'gyur ba//'gyu b+ha gsum po rnam par 'jig/rus sbal bzhin du mim gzhug
165b3(rgyud): /dmi g.yeng skad cig bcing byas ni//gdug pa'i srog chags thams cad dang //dgra dang spyod bcas mi sbyong brog/sbrul pa bzhin du mnyam gzhag ste//dkyil 'khor chu
165b4(rgyud): rgyas bskor bar bya'o//mA lus rnams kyang rmangs byed de//khams gsum rnams kyang rgal por byed//gtogs 'dod kyi ni mnyam gzhag ste//sa gsum rnams kyi rgyas
165b5(rgyud): gdabu bya//gar dribang gi ni mnyam gzhug ste//sa gsum rnams ni g+hur byed gzhug/dril bu yi no mnyam gzhag ste//sa gsum rnams ni gdab par bya//gzhon nu'i sgrol
165b6(rgyud): mo btsongs pa yis//sangs rgyas bde chen 'thob par byed//skyil mo phyod na mnyam gzhag nas//gnyis pa yis ni mnan byas ni//khams gsumo thams cad gon
165b7(rgyud): 'gyur zhing //'dod byed thams cad dngos grub bo//dga' byed ma yi mnyam gzhag pas//skyil mo rab tu dga' thob ste//dga' byed ma yi yid 'ong ma//khams
166a1(rgyud): gsum thams cad dngos grub bo//rigs 'dzin rnam par gzhag byas te/khams gsum skad cig mnan par bya//dpal khams gsum rnam par
166a2(rgyud): rgyalnga ba yi//mdor 'dus gzungs ma'i bcings pa yis//'jig rten gsum ni rnam rgyal te//skad cig khams gsum bdag por 'gyur//rtag par phan tshun 'brel
166a3(rgyud): po yis//dpung pa gnyis ni skum byas te//thams cad sgo ni 'gegs pa yis//mche bo sbom po rab tu sbyar//g.yas kyi brkyang bskum tshul gyis ni//gnon pa'i
166a4(rgyud): mnan pas bsdigs byas te//mau phyed sbyor bas bskul byas//khros pa'i sems kyis myang bar bya// yon pa'i brgyad bskum sbyar bar bya//myur du mnan pas
166a5(rgyud): bteg bya zhing //mthe'u chung bong ba'i lcags kyu yis//mdzub mo lce la reg byas te//sa bon tshig drug hri ldan pa'o//thig le'i spyi bor rgyun byis pas//bdud rtsi
166a6(rgyud): 'am ni rig ma drang bar bya//lce yi thog mar spro byas te//'dren pa'i tshul gyis drang bar bya//rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyi ma gzhag ste//kha yi phyogs su mche ba yis//sbom
166a7(rgyud): po lce dang 'dra byas te//khros po mche ba sbyor ba pos//sor mi thong ba bzhin byas nas//khrag mang po ni bo tung bar bya//yi ge dang po aM dang ldan spyi bor thig le ldan
166b1(rgyud): byas to//'og gi phyogs su ra yis gdags//u 'dron dngos brgyan par bya//'di ni kho bo'i snying po ste//mchog tu thams cad las byed pa'o//gsod pa dang ni 'dren
166b2(rgyud): po kun//dbang dang dbang rnams byad la sogs//de la stsogs po'i las gzhan yang //tshul bzhin sbyar bas byed par 'gyur//shi ba bzhin du myig btsums nas//
166b3(rgyud): rang gi lus ni bskum byas te//bum bu lnga mtha'i sbyor ba yi//dgra rnams thams cad bsad par bya//nga ro dang pa yang dge ldan//bdag nyid ngo bo thams cad bya//
166b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas chen po sgo mo byas te//zhi ba'i 'od zer sprin phung spro//de yi lus ni zhi bar 'gyur//de yi sems can thams cad kyi//tsha ba gradon dang drug la sogs//
166b5(rgyud): sdug bsngal mkha' 'gro'i mche ba dang //'jigs pa thams cad bral bar byed//shes rab pha rol phyi ma mnyam gzhag/bdag nyid kyis ni tshul bzhin du//'di yis
166b6(rgyud): thams cad nang gi rnams//sdug bsngal dogs par 'phrog par byed//de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa//nam mkha' sa steng las kyi rnams//snying khur rdo rje sems dpa'
166b7(rgyud): bzhag/yid bzhin thams cad byed par 'gyur//myur du rdo rje slob dpon la//sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas//gus pa zhes sar bcas pa yi//shin tu lhag par
167a1(rgyud): phyogs par bya//nam yang rdo slob dpon gyi//somyas ni dkrug byar mi bya ste//tswi ste shes rab 'cha lnga bus byed//myur du ma rog lhung bar 'gyur
167a2(rgyud): nad dang tshe ba dgra drug dang //gdon dang tsha bdug nyid kyis//slob dpon zhabs la smod byed do//gti mug chen por de 'chi'o//bla ma los ni dngos grub 'thob zla
167a3(rgyud): ma mtho ras bla ma bde//de bas nan tan thams cad kyi//bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag
167a4(rgyud): po kun tu bzang po dpa' shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje dam tshig dbang bskur
167a5(rgyud): pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung drang thubs rdo rje mchog gsang ba sbas pa chen po zla gsang thig le'i rgyud
167a6(rgyud): kyi rgyal po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor te bzhi pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs
167a7(rgyud): pa'akhor dang bcas pa'i tshogs//rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang /rnal 'byor ma dang //rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs dang //rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
167b1(rgyud): namakha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi g.yog rnams mchog tu dgu' ba chen po skyes to//ca tso 'byon cing dbyangs chen blo brjod par gyur to//kye ma'ordo rje sem pa dpa s+thA/rdad+ha/
167b2(rgyud): shin tu dgyes pa che//sna tshogs thabs ni bde byed che//sna tshogs ye sheso bde ba che//kye ma kun tu bzang po yi//dge ba'i ye shes bde ba che//gang ba de phyir rig me
167b3(rgyud): yi/pad+mo las ni gnas pa mdzad//kye ma'o rig pa shin tu za ba/shes rab pha rol phyin pa bde//sems can kun la shes rab kyi//mun pa'i thibs po sel bar
167b4(rgyud): /mdzad//kye ma'o thams cad ngo mtshar che//mkha' 'gro'i dra bas gar mdzad cing //rnam par mdzad dang myang ba dang //mnye ba dang ni 'phrog pa'i mchog/e ma'o byin//
167b5(rgyud): tu rab tu dgyes//skal ldan skal la spyod pa dang //sna tshogs skal bas bde byed tshe//sna tshogs rdo rje shin tu mdzes//de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po
167b6(rgyud): shin tu dgyes pa chen po kun tu longs spyod pa'i 'dod pa'i lha shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po la gnas pa la rnal 'byor ma thams cad dang /mchog gi pha rol phyin ma la sogs
167b7(rgyud): pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo thams cad rang gi gdan las bzhengs te/shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i 'gying ba'i bdud pas phyag byas te/shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i
168a1(rgyud): bde ba 'thob par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya chen po 'dis mnyes paro mdzad do//sgyu ma'i bde bas na mkha' kun tu gleng ba yi//sprul pa'i rang bzhin/
168a2(rgyud): skye ba mchog gi bde ba sten te//rjes su chags pa'i pad+mo dga' bas kun khyab cing //chos kyi bde ba nyid kyang kun tu btang snyoms mdzad//a ma'o//'di lta'i
168a3(rgyud): gzugs ma bde mchog dpal dang rnam ldan ma//byams ma'i phyogs su mi gtong ye shes nyid kyis 'jug/'dod pa'i yon tan 'di rnams chos nyid rnam par dag
168a4(rgyud): dug gsum dbang du mdzad cing mos pa rnams mi bskyod//ngo mtshar phyogs dang ma bral byang chub snying por bgrod//de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po 'dzum
168a5(rgyud): pa dang bcas pa'i spyan rgyas pas 'khor de dag thams cad la yud tsam kun tu gzigs te//rdo rje pad+mo dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dpal chen mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge
168a6(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te//cang mi gsung bar mnyam par zhugs te//dbugs mi rngub dbugs mi byin//dbugs rab tu gtong bar mi mdzad//kun tu mi gzigs
168a7(rgyud): kun tu rnam par mi gzigs/bzhengs par mi mdzad/bzhugs par mi mdzad/gshegs par mi mdzad/gsung bar yang mi mdzad//rnam par rtog pa yang mi mdzad/
168b1(rgyud): basmin du bcom ldan 'das shin tu bde ba chen posra na mkha'i dbyings thams cad shin tu khyab par shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba las btsal te rgyas par mdzad pa na//der de

168b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad ya nga 'du ba mdzad nas/yang nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gzigs te/bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa dang /gnyis su med par longs spyod pa dpal
168b4(rgyud): chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/bskul nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs te/byang chub kyi sems chen po la yang thim pa na/khoms gsuM
168b5(rgyud): 'dir dam pa'i chos ston pa dang /'jug par byed/bstan pa la gnas par byed pa 'ga' yang med/sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun 'jug par byed pa yang med
168b6(rgyud): khros pa dang gtum po chen po dang /rngam pa dang /rab tu gdug pa chen por soms pa dang /'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi mun byas bsgribasngo pa dang /gtum 'khrug
168b7(rgyud): chen po dang /gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa dang /gzhan gyi sems 'phrog pa dang /gzhan gyi bud med kyis 'chums pa dang /tshig rtsub mo la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang

169a2(rgyud): po 'di brlag go zhes sngon gyi skyon lam las kyi stobs la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gzig so//thabs dang shes rab kyi thugs rje'i smon lam rbA da rje
169a3(rgyud): rnamakha'i dang+yas kun te yang dag par gnas pa 'di lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi ma sa thams cad rab tu brlag par gzigs nas//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byeng

169b1(rgyud): g+hi rgyal ba rnams kyis bsgrags gasdad pa'i 'gro ba kun gyi yid dang 'thad pa'i gsang tshon 'di phyung ste//rnam dag spyod yul gzhan gyi mi 'phrogs na mkha' la//dngos med rol

169b5(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje 'dzin yang dag pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba bde ba chen pos rgyan po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
169b6(rgyud): par zhugs te//bzhengs nas phyogs bcu mtha' yas rab 'byam mthas klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun gzigs nas ngo mtshar du gyur to/kye ma'o khams gsum
169b7(rgyud): 'di stongs so//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams dang bral bas gdug pa thams cad kyis 'di dag nye bar gtses//gnod sbyin dang srin po thams
170a1(rgyud): cad dang /nad dang /'tsho ba dang gdon chen po dang /nyon mongs pa dang /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par zos zhes dgongs pa na//
170a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gtod pa'i rdo rje ye shes kyi bde ba chen po dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te//
170a3(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang /gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes bde ba chen po'i rang gi rdo rje dang pad+mo las byang chub kyi sems nye bar bsngo bar bya ste/nyid kyi sku dang /gsung dang
170a4(rgyud): thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //thog ma rare oM ni thig ler bsam byas pa'i//rdo rje sems dpa' bcas pa 'brug gi sgra 'byin po//mi phyed 'dren pa yang dag gnyis

170b1(rgyud): skyil mos g.yon du yid tsam+ba 'gying bas 'dud pa//g.yas kyi rdo rje gsor zhing 'dzum dang bcas shing spyan rgyas pa//che ba'i chen po dbu lnga pa//phyag ni bcu drug rnams dang ldan//
170b2(rgyud): sna tshogs sku ni mchog 'dzin pa//kha dog rnam lnga gzi brjid chen//mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin//rdo rje skyur mar rab tu gnas//mkhas pa gang gis snying kha nyid

170b5(rgyud): le las na mkha' shin tu dgyes pa 'thob par byed pa'i bde bo chen po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo //oM yig tsug tu thig le ste//mi
170b6(rgyud): phyed theg ler bcas pa yi//'og tu gzi brjid yang dag bcas//mthar ni dra ste tsheg drag bcas//'drir ni rin chen thams cad kyi//snying po mchog tu rmad 'byung ba'o//
170b7(rgyud): phyung ba yis ni nam mkha' dang //sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun tu//'od zer sprin phung rgyas byas te//slar yang de nyid bzhugs par 'gyur//de yi thugs kar zhugs nas kyang //

172a1(rgyud): klubs pa yos//zla ba bzhon du rnam grol ba//badz+rod pas gar ni mdzad cing bzhugs//'di yos pad+mor gnas spyod du//tshe 'di d+d+hi la 'thob par
