173b6(rgyud): 'das mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thug sa rdo las byung ngo //oM sarba ta thA ga te ma hA
173b7(rgyud): sa mai tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM//de nas bcom ldan 'das bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thug
174a1(rgyud): /rdo d+hA lasa? d+hA d+hA//oM sad+g+hat+ta dz+nyA byA twAk+Shau d+hA m+b+ha nA s+thA nA dz+nyA nA brAd+d+ha smA b+hU b+hU Ut+mak+Sha hU~M//dAn+tas bAn+taum+b+ha ldan das+yA kun tu byAts+tshanra bAn+d+ha yang
174a2(rgyud): dge ba'i tshul sbyin par mdzad do//oM dga' dge' sbyong pa che//oM dga'odage'i thu thogs chen po//oM dge'o dge'i sku chen po//oM dge' dga'o gsu
174a3(rgyud): chen po//oM dga'o dge'o rin po che'o//dge'o dge'o sna tshogs che//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas bcom
174a4(rgyud): ldan 'das la rang gi dkyil 'khor bshad par gsol ba 'debs te//dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rdo rje yi//dga' byed bcom ldan nyid kyis shod//gang gis
174a5(rgyud): sems can bde nyid kyis//dkyil 'khor rab tu thob par 'gyur//dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi ba//rgya lo ba'i bdug pas gsang ba gsungs//gang
174a6(rgyud): gis dkyil 'khor myur byas nas//dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyan du 'gyur//dkyil 'khor bde ba'i gzhi nyid ni//gsong ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi'o//dkyil
174a7(rgyud): 'khor rgyan pa'i bdag nyid de//gsang ba bcom ldan nyid kyi gsungs//dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i ye shes ni//dkyil 'khor snying po zhes bya ba//dkyil 'khor
174b1(rgyud): nI ci rigs par//glatso bo chen po nyid kyis shod//dkyil 'khor mo mnyam ye shes ni//dkyil 'khor bsrung ba pad+mo ste//dkyil 'khor rab dgyes 'thob byed
174b2(rgyud): pab yis//chud med dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzod//de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i 'byung gnas zhes
174b3(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang //gsung dang thugs rdo rje las
174b4(rgyud): phyung ngo //gzugs dang lang chos rgyan pa yi//bu mo mig yangs bzung bya ste//shes rab can gyis byin rlabs 'brus//mnyam par gzhug ste byin rlabs nas//
174b5(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bdag/dri bzhin gshegs kyi btsun mo bzhog/gnyis po mdun du bzhag byas pa//brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i gnas//rdo rje
174b6(rgyud): sems dpa'i btsun mo ste//thugs ni dgyes par byed pa yin//gsum pa lho ru bsam b+hu ba//dge basbyin pa'i bdag nyid bzhig/rin chen 'byung ldan btsun mo che//
174b7(rgyud): dbang bskur yon tan 'thob byed pa'o//bzhi pa tshul khrims chen mo ste//de nyid tshes ngan yang dag gnas//rdo rje chos kyi btsun mo ste//de sbyin dga' byed ma yin no//bzod/
175a1(rgyud): bya tshan ma byung dus+ho//sod pa'i bdag nyid zad pa skyon//brdzunarba rdo rje gdun mo za//dam chog gnas nA spyod byed pa'o//glu dag tu thams cad du//
175a2(rgyud): snga ma bzhin du mchod la sogs//sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//sgo smad rnams ni rnam pa bawI//ci 'dod par ni mchod bya ste//slob ma mchog ni gzhugs
175a3(rgyud): par bya//phyag rgyas lag pa rgyan byas te//'dzum dang bcas pa'i 'dod chags mig/rgyun kun gyis ni rnam par klubs//spro ba che bas gar bya zhing //lha yi 'gying/
175a4(rgyud): ba'i 'dun pa yis//dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya//mig ni der gyi gos nyid kyis//g.yogs te lag pas bzung nas kyang //sgo yi grwar yang gzhag
175a5(rgyud): byAbya ste//smon lam mchog ni sma ru gzhugs//rdo rje chen po bdag ces bgyi//rang gi lha rnams phyug bgyi ste//rang gi dgyes gnas las byung ba'i//bde byed rkyen
175a6(rgyud): mos mnyes par bgyi//ji lta bzhin du mnyam nyid 'thob//me tog phreng ba der byas te//lha mo rgyan mo bzhis su gsol//khyod kyi dkyil 'khor bdag 'tshal lo//
175a7(rgyud): lha mo gang la lhud pa yi//de yi lag nas bskor ba bya//lha mo 'di ni khyod dang 'thun//sems tshe khyod kyis 'dod par gyis//de nas slob ma de yis ni//bdag gi rab dgyes
175b1(rgyud): la btugs byas te//zlu ma la ni dbang blangs bya//shin tu sbas pa'i 'phags pa'i dbang //bcom ldan bdag la stsal bar mdzod//de nas sbyor ba chen po yi//snyoms par zhug
175b2(rgyud): te de bde ba//slob dpon rdo rje phyung byas te//spyi bor rab tu bzhag par bya//lag pa yis ni ma rig par//kha lA rab tu sbyin par bya//khyad par du ni drang byas te//tsi bde bar ni/
175b3(rgyud): btung bar bya//gzungs me de dag thams cad la//rdo rje yis ni sbyin par bya//de nas slob ma mchog nyid kyi//bla mo la ni yon dbul ba//ma dang srong mo bu mo dang //chung ma
175b4(rgyud): dang ni rang gi bu//bdag nyid dang ni rgyal srid dang //de bzhin longs spyod dbang phyug dang //rdzas dang nar dang gter rnams dang //glang po rta dang shing rta dag/bla ma la n+ya
175b5(rgyud): yon mchog ste//dga' ba'i yid 'gyur dbul bar bya//phye yi sbas pa gsang ba dang //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang //rdo rje dang ni gzungs ma'i rnams//'ding
176a1(rgyud): /d+ma'i drungs gru dri bar bya//dang po yong dag shrIs byu nas//das grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//gsang
176a2(rgyud): yini dkyil 'khor 'di//tsa ste rmongs pas sla byas ni//slob dpon gyi ni dpe tshig nya bas//myu radu zla byung chun cadan du//bstan pas rnam par 'jig par
176a3(rgyud): 'gyur//dang por dam tshi ba gzhug byas te//phyi nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya//gzhan du byas ni dpa' khri'i rnams//dmyal bar bskal par grangs
176a4(rgyud): mdo sbyi//de bas blo ldan rdo rje yis//nan tan dam tshig bsgrags mi bya//sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas//dam tshig srung lnga brtson par bya//gzhan du byas
176a5(rgyud): na sngags mthun gyi//sdig sa le sogs pa'i don mi 'grub//skye rnams kyang ni dam tshig gi/ga som yang banas su mi gnang sbyi 'jig rgyun 'dir sdug bsngal //
176a6(rgyud): 'jig rten pha rol dmya le b+ha'i rnam+b+hasta//dam tshig spyod pa 'das byas so//rmongs pa'i bdag nyid du su 'thob bo//slob ma de yang de bzhin du//zlo zhan ldog bsngal 'a
176a7(rgyud): 'gyur to//des na sngags kyi dor mi smin//lha rnams kyi ni mchog tu bde//dam tshig med pa'i sleb ma la//nams kyang sbyin par mi 'gyur ro//de bse ma tshig
176b1(rgyud): /gtso yon do//zlog ma dang mchog sbyin par bya//sngags rnams dang ni phyug rgyu yang //da zhin thabs dang shes rab rnams//dam tshig de rnams thams cad kyang //sngags
176b2(rgyud): pas gas de ba sbyong ba yis//dmyal ba ngani stong bzlog pa'i phyir//bu dong slob m+b+ha sbyin par byed//sngags kyi dngos grub bstod nams byed//gtsang ste dogs pa med
176b3(rgyud): par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dal//dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin bri byas te//gzhon nu'i chud ni bcu drug ljon//dam tshig slob ma'i dkyil 'khor du//
176b4(rgyud): bzhag nas cho ga 'dis gzhug bya//dam tshig rnams ni 'di yin te//sbrang rtsi sha dang dri chen po//nyi ma zla ba'i blo chen dang //rdo rje las byung chu bsgrubs rnams//dkyil/
176b5(rgyud): 'khor la sogs tshul bzhin gzhag/dam tshig yi ge bzhug pa yis//myur du dam cig sgrub byas ni//dga' byed dam tshig dngos grub ste//dngos grub thams
176b6(rgyud): cad 'thob par 'gyur//dam tshig 'di ni sna tshogs te//'dzin pa yis ni mtha' ru 'gyur//mi 'ongs sangs rgyas chen po dang //rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po cher//
176b7(rgyud): rlo ldan dbang bskur blangs pa yis//dbang bskur phun sum tshogs pa kun//sangs rgyas kun gyi 'thob 'gyur te//dbang bskur ba yi yid du 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs
177a1(rgyud): pa thams cad rgyu dam tshig rdo rje ye shes chen po zhes bya ba mchog tu gsung ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor te lnga pa'o///de nas bcom ldan
177a2(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu dgyes pa chen po yid bde bar gyur te/bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'deb so//bdug pa thams cad rnam
177a3(rgyud): 'dul ba//'jigs par byed pa chen po 'di/rdo rje khro bo chen po yi//dkyil 'khor chen po rnams bshad phyir/'jigs byed chen po rnams 'dul ba//dkyil
177a4(rgyud): 'khor rdo rje thams cad kyi//khro bo'i dam tshig dad dpon gyi//gsang ba chen po nyid kyis shong //de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems//
177a5(rgyud): dpa' de bzhin gshegs bya thams cad 'dren pa'i khro bo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te//nyid kyi sgra dang /gsung dang /thugs
177a6(rgyud): rje ye shes las 'di phyung ngo //oM badz+ra ma hA tsaN+DA sar+b+ba duSh+TaM ta ka ha na da ha po tsa hUM phaT//'di phyung ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
177a7(rgyud): 'di thams cad khro bo chen pa'i mthus rnam papa'i drun tu g.yos//kun tu ga yis/dang /klu dang /drin po lha ma yin dang /namakha'i sdong ngong /mi ngas
177b1(rgyud): tsi dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /gnod skyon dang /srin po thams cad 'khrugs pa chen por gyur to//de nas 'jigs pa chen pos nyon pas de dag brgya byin gyis thad du lhags na
177b2(rgyud): khargya byed bdag nyid kyang skyabs med par mthong nas tshangs pa'i thang du phyin tshungs pa yang gtogs 'dod kyi gan du phyin te/gtogs 'dod kyang dbang phyug chen po'i thar
177b3(rgyud): du phyin te//de nas dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid kyi mthu 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs su byas te//'jig rten gyi khoms 'di dag thams cad rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus
177b4(rgyud): kun tu snang bar byas te/lha rnams ma 'jigs shig/klu rnams ma 'jigs shig/gnod sbyin rnams ma 'jigs shig/lha ma yin rnams ma 'jigs shig/dri za rnams
177b5(rgyud): me 'dzegs shig/lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams mi 'jigs shig/nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyis khyad par 'di lta bu gzhan 'gas kyang rab tu brdzi nus sam//khyed
177b6(rgyud): nams ni dgar spyod pas mnos shig ces dbugs phyung ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba'i
177b7(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i khro gnyer chen po zhes bya ba//khro bo chen po'i snying po nyid kyi sku dang /gsung dang /
178a1(rgyud): bzhi na du skrag nas dbang phyug chen po ye'i thad du nye bar lhag so//de nas dbang phyug snga ma bzhin du bdag gi che ba nye bar ston cing gtogs 'dod la smras
178a2(rgyud): pa//khyod kyang mo thu che ba'i lha che na po ste//gdug pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi bdag po yi na//ring gi mthu rgya chen po'i rdzu 'phrul nye bar ston pas gdug pa
178a3(rgyud): rnams dbugs dbyung bar mdzod cig/dri nas gtogs 'dod de ma thag tu rang gi mthu 'jigs byed kyi gzugs 'khor lo 'i nag po chen por bsgyur nas rdo rje'i
178a4(rgyud): skyed drag po chen po'i dgang ba'i gdangs 'byin pasu 'jig rten thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen
178a5(rgyud): po yang khro bo chen po'i pad+mo 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu pad+mo'i dra ba 'chang ba'i khro po thams cad slar
178b1(rgyud): hA/bcom ldan 'dam kyi thugs kar zhugs so//zhugs nas khro bo chen po'i snying por badrag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas//bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang /gsung dang thugs
178b2(rgyud): rdorje'i kha nas phyung ngo //oM pad+mA many+dzu dz+wa la ma hU~M kro d+ha pa ta ba~M mu khe ga khe//sar+b+ba duSh+TaM/khA hi khA hi sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nI//dA me da ma//badz+ra doSh+To ta ka Ta mai ta ma ta/klo Ta kroT/
178b3(rgyud): br-idz+r-i kha ra/tsi pA la durga be gi/tre saM tra sa/mUh+ma badz+ra bA Da ba mu kha pra mA te pra me ta hU~M phuT/ h+ye rje hI hai/tsi tu ra mu kha/be shra pra NA sha na/hUM hIr+dz+dza hU~M
178b4(rgyud): d+hIhrIHha//de nas 'dri gsungs ma thag tu tshangs ris chen po 'dar phad pad cing kha breb tu 'gyel te/rngab 'tshal lo//de nas tshungs pa chen po dri me tshur du gyur te//dbang
178b5(rgyud): phyug chen po la dris pa//lha 'di ni shin tu mtshar du snang ngo //de nas dbang phyug chen pos tshangs pa la bskul ba/khyod ni sems can kun gyi gtso bo//lci'i tshogs
178b6(rgyud): bcwo ga cad kyi bdag po//khyod ni 'jig rten gsum ni ga tong ba dang byed ba'o//rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan po de'i phyir//khyod kyis gdug pa'i sems can dang /gdug
178b7(rgyud): pa'i lus can thams cad brlag par gyis shig de nas tshangs paso rang nyid kyi mthu deng //tshangs pa chen po srin po'i gzugs su mi ngon par stsal nas//'jigs
179a1(rgyud): byed chen po lta bur gradong bzhi pa//me lce stong gis gzi brjid can gyi lus migul ba dang bcas pas bgad pa chen po 'byin pas lha'i tshogs kyi
179a2(rgyud): gdug pa thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzung po yang lha thams cad rab tu bzang po yang lha thams cad rab tu 'joms
179a3(rgyud): pa zhes pa khro bo chen po'i ti nge 'dzin la yang dag par snyoms par zhugs te/rdo rje chen po 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i khro bo chen po'i snying po nyid kyi sku dang /gsung dang
179a4(rgyud): thugs rdo rje'i ye shes kyi thugs kha nus phyung ngo //oM badz+ra b+hai ra ba/ma hA kro d+ha/sar+b+ba duSh+TA nA sa ma b+huk+Sha ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/badz+ra yak+saM ha na ha na hUM phaT//de nas 'di
179a5(rgyud): phyung ma thag tu brgya byin gyi khang pa 'di thams cad dum bu ba rgyar rnam par bshig ste/ri rab kyi rtse mo yang 'gul zhing kun tu 'khor nas gnas par gyur//
179a6(rgyud): brgya byin 'khor drang bcus pa yang kha bu ba tsam du 'gyel te brgyal bar gyur to//de nas langs te dbang phyug chen po la bltas pa dang /dbang phyug chen pos kyang
179a7(rgyud): bskul ba/khyod ni lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po ste/mthu che ba yin la sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad kyang de khyod la mnyes par
179b1(rgyud): byed bya yin na de ltar bdag nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu nyo bar ston cig/de nas lha'i rgyal po chen po brgya byin de rlung nyid kyi mthu gnod sbyin dang /srin po'i gzugs nye bar ston ni dgadu
179b2(rgyud): po'i tshogs thams cad la gdug pa dag mi 'jigs shig de'i rdzu 'phrul 'di lta bu dag mthong na sus kyang zil gyis gnon mi nus so zhes dbugs 'byin par byed do//de nas
179b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kun d+ha bzang po yang sngags kyi lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/lha de dag thams cad nyid kyi sku dang gsung
179b4(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje'i ye shes las 'jug par mdzad de/bcu ga nas kyang khro bo chen po thams cad phyag rgya chen por mngon par bsgyur nus bdag nyid kyang khro bo thams cad 'byin
179b5(rgyud): ba'i khro bo chen po'i gzugasu dmigs te/mche ba chen po 'byin pa/zhal mi sdug pa/spyan stong pa/nyi ma chen po stong gis gzi brjid can/rab tu mi bzad par byed
179b6(rgyud): pa'i mi rlung gis 'das pa'i mdog sngon po'i sku//dur khrod chen po'i dpal chen gyis phyag/rgya mi'i keng rus dang /khrag dang /sha dang /klad pa dang /rkang dang /tshil rnams
179b7(rgyud): nus su gsol ba/mi'i lpags pa rnam g.yogs te bsdams pa/mi'i mgo bo'i phreng ba dbu la 'dzin pa/seng ge dang /glang po che dang /bong bu dang /rnga mo dang
180a1(rgyud): /ma he dang /phag dang /lce spyad dang /ra dang khyi dang /'ug pa dang /bya rog dang /bzhud dang /byi la dang /gzig dang /stag la sogs pa'i khro bau
180a2(rgyud): byol song gi gdong brgya stong mang po rang gi bai spr-i'i bu ga nas phyung ste/dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis shwar phyogs na 'jigs byed chen po 'dul ba rnam par
180a3(rgyud): gnyer ba'i 'jigs pa lta bu'i spyan dang /zhal rdo rje'i mche ba chen po gtsigs pa/'dzags par byed pa'i khro bo chen po brgya stong gi g.yog dang /shar phyogs
180a4(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so//lho'i dkyil 'khor du yang rdo rje khro gnyer can khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang /'khyil bar gyur tra gnas
180a5(rgyud): so//nub kyi dkyil 'khor du yung pad+ma chen po rta gdong khro bo brgya stong mang mo'i g.yog dang /nub kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so//byang gi dkyil
180a6(rgyud): 'khor du yang rdo rje 'ur 'ur chen po'i khri bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang /'khyil bar gyur te ga nas so//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu gyes pa khro bo chen po'i
180a7(rgyud): tshogs brgya stong med pos bskor nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhugs te/khro bo chen po'i tshogs de dag dang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po sa kun
180b1(rgyud): tu spyad cing khro nga chen bu'i rnam par brgya stong mang po'i ro rab kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa snong phyung nas/nam khwa'i dbyings rab 'byam thams cad du gang bar byas te/stong
180b2(rgyud): gsum gyi stong chen po 'a'ajig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang gleng par byas so//de nas gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis de dag ma thod nas 'jigs spangs
180b3(rgyud): skyabs ma mthong nas/rang rang gi bdag po'i thad du song ste/rje cig rje cig nyid kyi bdag la skyobs shig/de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bdag po
180b4(rgyud): dog bdag nyid kyi mthu sprul nas slar yang bslang ste/'jig rten gsum po thams cad yongs su bsgom du bcug nas/'jigs byed gdungs pA nga li skyabs su song
180b5(rgyud): zhes bsgo yang skyabs su 'gro ba mI ldan cing /slar yang rang gi rgyud kyi nga rgyal bskyed de/'jigs byung chen po brgyad pa zhes bya ba phyung nas ri rab kyi bdag nyid chen po
180b6(rgyud): rta bar ston cing /dgad pa chen po'i nga ro 'byin par gyur to//oM ma hA b+hai ra ba bauSh+Ta~M Sh+Ti/thA Ta T+Ta ta b+hU ta/hu ho a ti/'on kyang ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse'u chung rgyud
180b7(rgyud): tsam yang ma 'gul to//de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po 'dul bar byed pa'i khro bo des he ru ka'i re re 'byin cing mgo bor mnan nas bsnun te/he ru kas bdag nyid
181a1(rgyud): rgya mthu chen pos 'jigs spyod chen po'o/ ro 'byon cing sgyu ma'i sgrubacu dru sma nas/lkug dang rus pa dang rlud rnams bskyod rlo ma tsham mdzad
181a2(rgyud): pas/de'i 'khor la rab tu ston par mdzad de/u ma dang 'ga' 'ga' yang rnam par bcom mo//ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgren mor byas te sma phab nas/
181a3(rgyud): khro bo bdag nyid kyi mthu nye bar spel cing 'khor thams cad kyang btul/skyabs len du yang bcug/dam tshig la yang gnas par byas te yang drug par zhugs so//
181a4(rgyud): dade nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen po drag po bshad pas bzhad cing rdo rje'i khro gnyer khro bo chen po'i zhal nas ma 'jigs shig/
181a5(rgyud): ma 'jigs shig ces dbugs 'byin par byed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen pos khro bo'i tshogs kun la bka' stsal pa/
181a6(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA yA/ma hA tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na yai/ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta yai/tad+ya thA/oM bo d+ha bo d+hA/ma hA b+he rA ba da ra ba pa hA ri ha ra hA ra/gr-ih+Na gr-ih+na/mA ra mA ra/
181a7(rgyud): d+hir+tha b+hAn+de/shI g+h+raM ma hA badz+ra/tsaN+Da sar+b+ba duSh+TaM ta ke ha ni ha na/da ha da ha/ba tsa pa tsa/mtha me thaM hUM phaT/'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jigs byed chen po'i 'dul bar
181b1(rgyud): spyod pas rang gi sku na mkhru'i dbyings kyi rgyud du bskyed do//khro bo brgya stong mang po rnam par bskor ba'i zhal mche ba gtsog swA te/'khyil zhing bsgyur ba phyag brgya stang mang po la
181b2(rgyud): mo tshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa zhal sna tshogs mang po brgya stong mau lce bzhin du rab tu 'bar ba'i sku brgya stong rnams 'jigs byed chen po ga na pa der song ste/rdo rje drug/
181b3(rgyud): bopo'i gad mo cher 'byin pas gzhan cing mdun na gnas so//oM ma hA badz+ra he ru ka badz+ra aT+Ta D+hA hA sa hA sa raM ha ha ha ha hUM ha/oM ti/de nas dbang phyug chen pos rdo rje drag
181b4(rgyud): bro bshad pa chen po thos nas g.yog dang bcas par khas bub du 'gyel te brgya la bar 'gyur nas//mgo la zhabs kyis bsnun te gtod por mdzad do//oM badz+re
181b5(rgyud): b+h+r-i ku Ti/ha nA ha na/gauh+na gr-ih+Na hUM/ma ta ma tA kiny+tsi rA ya sI/sUR+ya sa ha pa ha sti/re ka ba su rA dza la la rtsi dra dzA la ti/mra hA r+m+ma rtaM A ka N+yA A kar+N+Ne a bya wa ma
181b6(rgyud): byaM waM me/kr-i ni btsakrab+hai ra pi hri da yaM hUM b+hI/dr-i nas rdo rje khro gnyer chen po'i khro bo'i chen pos bzhad pas gzhad cing 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pa
181b7(rgyud): gzugs su mngon par sprul nas 'khor lo can gyi mdun du ston to//de nas 'khor lo can gyi 'khor 'jigs pa chen pos nyin te/khas bub du 'gyel te rab
182a1(rgyud): tu brgyal zhing rje cig bdag cag la skyabs shig ces smra zhing /skyabs med par bdag nyid kyis mthong nas 'khor la can la skyabs su song /
182a2(rgyud): ngongo//dri nas bISh+Tas kyang bdag nyid kyi mthu mang po rab tu nye bar ston cing shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i mdun du granas te rgyu ba la zhugs so//kA le kI 'e gdug
182a3(rgyud): pa nye ba'i khro gnyer gyis snying dral te ji srid ma 'thungs kyi bar du de srid rang gi gnas su song shig/de nas khro gauny+tsir chen po rab tu 'khrugs gtum por gyur nas
182a4(rgyud): de drangs te bsdums nas snying dral to//de'i khrag lha nyi ma'i khro gnyer chen po gnod sbyin chen po'i gdon gyi bdag nyid yang dag par tshim par mdzad do//oM badz+ra pa
182a5(rgyud): sUn+tu b+h+r-i ku Ti kri d+ha m+b+ha hA gra ha~M ha ra pa ta rU ba su su d+he/ra ma sa meng mad dze na/oM b+hA b+h+yo b+hI/de nas 'khor lo can de sems rab tu brlab par gyur te gnas so//
182a6(rgyud): de'i chung mi rug mI ni dang /ma hA shrI dang /lAg smi yang g.yog dang bcas par rnam par bya com ste/sna tshogs rnams rnam par btul nas bzhugaso//de nas
182a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis rta gdong chen po'i rgyab tu gcig bsnun nas gtong bar mdzad do//oM badz+ra bi Da bi mu kha khaM kha khA hi khA hi/tsi tur mu khaM/bi ba bi ba
182b1(rgyud): An+ma drA rmA b+hU kan+d+ha rbA d+hA trAd+ha g+hA twAnA/ T+Ta d+hA/bad+ho sa stsu// k+Sh+ma r+m+ma d+hAn+d+ha rad+hArmA/don sadz+ra r+g+ho r+N+Na ga durgyun ba tu snad rgyan pa mdzud du
182b2(rgyud): khar khAs d+hA Ni lda nas/ga skyengs shi/rje ga sgrubs shig smras so//kI kA'i gdug pa'i gad sma m+WA du sring song /khyod kyi rgyu ba tsurnan
182b3(rgyud): mdum drinas smras so//de na dzinan rten pa shA hU~M la rnags /rgyu muM bai N+Din+d+he g+ne /snyid drungs nas/ga
182b4(rgyud): lags /shA /klung bye /la du dang /dus pa na sa nis phyog so //de'i rlu shrI rIm da/skAr s+t+rai t-i dang / rnams kya
182b5(rgyud): nAmA ra brnam/ tshogs gang gad+hAl nA 'aM/ rgyug gi hU~M sa hrI ts+tshiSh+T+r-i tI zhes kyi/nas ban pa ldan ji shin tu m+b+ha che
182b6(rgyud): dri ba chen pas klas pa nga bas rgya ba ga di /ting bar mdzadzad//oM dz+wal buM chu'i d+he kro d+hi/A kAR+Sha si~M/I kaR+Sha m-i kr-i rlung /
183a1(rgyud): dz+nyA gU ts+tshab+h+yarmAs g+h+nAn+ma dz+nyAn+tu/rgyunas du drugan dur+m+mAn+dar+d+hanA trAr+thar+m+ma dz+nyAn posgra nAm ShAdz+dzi sa sman rAkA N+Da/dAr+N+Na dz+nyAn man du /
183a2(rgyud): blar gyur to//de nas brgya byin 'gyi de bri chen pos mgyings twe/mi bzed par khros gnad sbyin chen po khyod su'i blan yin zhes de la smras so//de nas rdo rje gan
183a3(rgyud): sbyin chen po khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/sgyid nas gtsug gi nor bu phyung snying yang yang dril te/de'i sha dang /khrag dang /klad pa dang tshul bu dang /rus pa dang /
183a4(rgyud): za' bya rnams bzla'i bar zhugaso//de nas de'i 'khor rnams 'jigs shing sdungs pa'i yid du g+hur tI/sbubs su nye bar 'gyur ro//de'i lha me'i tshogs rnams
183a5(rgyud): kyang bcom nas de'i gnas par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po khri bo chen po rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma rnams dang /rol cing shin
183a6(rgyud): tu dgyes pa'i kun tu longs spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po na bzhugs//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas
183a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la bskul bar mdzad do//oM ma hA su ra ta badz+ra me hA kro d+ha se ha ro pa saM he ra sar+b+ba kro d+ha mA/sha ma sha ma/pra sha ma pre sha ma/sar+b+ba kro d+ha/
183b1(rgyud): ud+d+ha mU kr-i d+hA/sA sa ma ya ma hA maN+Da lA/s+yA pA yu s+thA pa ya/sar+b+ba kr-i d+hA ma duSh+TA pra draSh+Ta bA ba ya//bo dza ya bi dza yu shakla bad+ma biSh+mA ra ma hUM shA rA ma hau b+hA ga pa/
183b2(rgyud): u r+ya tAM sau Sh+ya kro d+he/sar+b+ba tA thA ge ta sad+d+he su ma ya~M tsaM ho//su ra ta sa mA y+YA i tAM/de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dwe gyis pa chen po khro bo cherU pos khro
183b3(rgyud): thams cad 'dren pa dang /gzhug pa dang /bcing ba dang /dbang du bya ba'i phyir/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //oM dz+waHhUM ba~M ho//TIk+ki
183b4(rgyud): DAk+ShI hUM r+d+haHhUM TaM k+ki hUM dz+nyAM/A kAR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha yA/bAM d+ha ya ba shiM ku /sar+b+ba kro d+ha/sa ma yaM/dz+raHhUM baM hai/Tak+ki hU~M dz+nyA/hUM Tak+ki hUM/de nas khri zo chen
183b5(rgyud): po'i dam tshig dri dag thams cad 'ongs nas/rang gi dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lor 'khyil bar gyur te/kye bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sa bka' stsal du
183b6(rgyud): pabasol zhes smra zhing gnas par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo thams cad kyi bku'i 'khor lo'i rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
183b7(rgyud): zhugs te/khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo chen po phyung ngo //oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha ma hA kro d+ha sha hUM phaT/de nas de dag la khyod kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs
184a1(rgyud): pa gdug pa'i sems can chen po rnams gsos shig ces bka' stsal to//de dag gis bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rab tu gdug pa rnams
184a2(rgyud): gsos zhes gsol nas/dri nas cang mi gsung brla bzhugs par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pas khro bos phyag bsnol te brtsir nas
184a3(rgyud): rdo rje bdud rtsi khro bo'i dbang mo chen mo phyung ngo //oM badz+ra A mr-i tA/ma hA k+Sho d+hI shwa ri ud shrI dzaHute shrI dzaHbadz+ra A mr-i tI d+hI AHdI nas bcom ldan 'das
184a4(rgyud): ma bdud rtsi chen po de dag kun tu khros te sman ma bsgyur ba'i gzigs phye'i zhal bzhad pa/ru lu ru lu zhes pa'i sgra 'byin cing rang gi pad+mo la bcom ldan 'das kyi
184a5(rgyud): rdo rje bcug+na nas bdud rtsi yang dag par sgrub pa'i rig ma 'di phyung ngo //oM aM mr-i ta saM dzI ba ni ma hA mr-i ta mu khe/pra be shra ya pra be sha ya/sar+b+baM badz+ra pad+me sad yo ge/
184a6(rgyud): ma hA bo d+ha tsit+ta/pi tha pri tha/mUrti a/de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa/gdug pa de dag thams cad snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid kyi lus sos par gyur te/
184a7(rgyud): sems dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad mthong nas ngo mtshar bar gyur te/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo la skyab kyi gdong
184b1(rgyud): nus/phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du khro bo'i 'khor rnams gnas par gyur to//de nas de dag rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis/bcom ldan 'das la bstod par byed de/khyod ni
184b2(rgyud): sems can kun gyi yab//phan byed de bzhin yum yin te//gtso bo 'dus pas bdag cag rnams//'jigs pa che las skyob pa ste//rje bri sdug bsngal thams cad sel//khyod
184b3(rgyud): ni 'gro ba'i dbang po rje//khams gsum 'di ni byed dang gtong //che ba che khyod skye bo skyong //thog ma med khyod nga ro thigaso//nga ro'i stong ni cha yang med//gtso bo yig med bdud
184b4(rgyud): rtsi yi//rab dgyes bde byed gtong ba yis//'gro ba kun la phan bya'i phyir//de ni sangs rgyas thams cad rnam//rab dgyes 'gro la bde ba'i phyir//mgon po khyod kyis
184b5(rgyud): gtong ba mdzad//sems can 'dam gyis mi gos shing //bla na med pa byang chub lam//sna tshogs sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pa//sems can sbom pa ngoms mdzad cing /
184b6(rgyud): 'khor ba dpa' grong grol mdzad do//myur du bde la dgongs pa mdzad//dngos po kun gyis thams cad du//rgyal ba kun gyi mi dpogs te//zhi ba'i rnam par zhir 'gyur ba//
184b7(rgyud): rdul dang bral ba 'jug pa spangs//ni mkha' sgom las rnam 'das pa//rnam rtog dri mas ma gos te//sgyu ma kun las yang dag 'das//'dod pa kun la rgyab phyogs pa//
185a1(rgyud): gtso bo khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal//dregs pa med pa 'jigs byed lu//byang chub mchog ni thob kyi bar//bdag cag skyabasu rab tu ma/
185a2(rgyud): ji srid 'tsho ba mchis pa dang //dmyal ba rtsub mo'i 'jig rten du//ltung bar gyur pa ji srid pa//khyod kyi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi//byang chub mchog tu bdag/
185a3(rgyud): cag kyang //dri med skal par gyur pa yi//gtso bo bdag cag dbang bskur ba//badre ba chen pos stsol du gsol//de nos bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes
185a4(rgyud): pa chen pos de dag gis gsol ba'i tshig nye bar gastan nas mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/zhugs ma thug
185a5(rgyud): tu bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba dang yid bsgrub pa'i thabs mang po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ste/badre ba chen po'i spro ba'i 'phrul chen po'i
185a6(rgyud): lha'i 'khor thams cad dbang bskur te/de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha chen po de dag bde ba chen po'i spro ba'i cho 'phrul gyis dbang bskur bas yid
185a7(rgyud): bde bar gyur te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang dang yang du gtugs nas bskor ba byas te/ji lta ba bzhin du kun du yongs su bskor nas gnas so//de nas
185b1(rgyud): ma rlo du kun tu su patsun pa dro bzhin ga shogs pas pa d+ma// ma shin tu thos pa 'dang nan+yA Sh+Tid rgyu ba du na Sh+Ta nan rgyu
185b2(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas/de ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro mo dang de ma chen mo zhes bya ba nyid kyi
185b3(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //oM sar+b+ba ta thA gA ta ma hA badz+ra kro d+hai shwa rI sar+b+ba duSh+TA na mU dra NaM/mA hUM pa la yA na lash+ma shAn b+hU ShA Ne/badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha daMSh+TA kA rA la kri ti/
185b4(rgyud): ba da na/satwa she tAM/pre sha ma ni/hUM hUM ma hA kro d+ha shI ri hUM phaT phaT/'dis ji lta ze bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas/dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du bzhag ste/dpung pa
185b5(rgyud): bcu drug la phyag ni mtshon cha sna tshogs bstims pa/zhal gsum pa mdog in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'bar ba 'dra ba/rdo rje dang thod pa'i khur ba dang /thod pa dang /mdung dang /
185b6(rgyud): sta gr-i dang /zhabs pa dang /rtse gsum pa dang /be tsAn dang /mu su ra dang /'khor lo dang /ka na yA dang /to mo ya dang /gzhu dang /mda' dang /sheg ti dang /gri rnams
185b7(rgyud): phyaphyog na 'dzin pa/thod pa'i phreng bas dbu rgyan byas pa nyi ma brgya dang me'i 'od 'dra ba'o//de'i mdun du rdo rje khrag 'thung chen mo de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang tsha lugs 'dzin pa
186a1(rgyud): ga shAn / d+hA shA du du rnamanan t+yAm+b+hadz+nyAn tu /Am+b+har+m+ma/
186a2(rgyud): mgu t+ta/nAr du ti ra ra tra/dA ri p+'u rI/ta kau b+hA l+yA/us+t+rai khA DA kA~M/badz+ra trA~M shU lA gar+b+ha ma t+te kro d+hA nA/ts+tshad+hA d+hI trUM hU~M/hU~M he run+ti mun+t+ra pri yai hUM phyin
186a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen po'i gzi brjid chen po'i mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin lo snyoms par zhugs te/rdo rje nyi ma
186a4(rgyud): khro mo'i dbang mo chen mo nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //oM hUM traM ma hA sUr+ye badz+ra kro d+hau shA ri bi d+ha ma/ma tha ma tha/grA s+ya gr-i swa/sar+b+ba duSh+Ti
186a5(rgyud): b+hub+haduSh+TAM hUM phaT/oM hUM traM tAM/tra tra tra/khro mo chen mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor du bzhag par bya ste/gzi brjid chen po ri ge tor+ya zhing
186a6(rgyud): shin tu 'jigs pa mo bzhin 'bar//dpung pa bcu drug rno ba ste//dbu rgyan thod pas brtsegs par bya//spyan ni rab dmar sngo bsangs mdog/mtshon cha'i cho ga
186a7(rgyud): ni bsnams par brtson//gdugs pa thams cad 'chi'i byed cing //yo dwags chen po'i sbyin la zhon//rang gi g.yog gis mdun du bskor//de nas bcom
186b1(rgyud): ldan 'dus pad+mo 'byung gnas bkod pa'i 'od kyi phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/pad+ma'i dra ba khro mo'i dbang mo nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang
186b2(rgyud): thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //oM hrIHbadz+ra pad+me m+b+ha hUM ban+d+ha mu khe/kha kha~M/khA hi khA hi/ma hA ma ho/d+ha ra pi ko be hUM he hU~M hU~M hu ha/hUM hUM hrI/hi sha hi shwe/ma hA badz+rA ba da ba
186b3(rgyud): mu la mi ho t+yo t+ye/hUM hUM/hi hi hU~M hrIHhUM/dkyil 'khor nang gi dbus nyid du//'di ni rgyab tu bzhag par bya//rno ba chen po zhal gsum pa//rta gdong gyen du ston pa ste//
186b4(rgyud): khro mo chen mo dpung bcu drug/rnam par bsgyur ba'i mi sdug gdong //mi ro'i rta la yang dag zhon//khra ga mang po la 'thung byed pa//mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste//
186b5(rgyud): khros pa'i dbu rgyan thod pas brtsegs//'od zer rnon po gtong byed cing //g.yog bcas dkyil 'khor rgyan te gnas//de nas bcom ldan 'dis yang gdon mi za ba'i ye
186b6(rgyud): shes khro mo gnyis su med par 'du ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/gdon mi za ba'i drag po dang ldan ma zhes bye ba khros pa'i dbang mo chen mo
186b7(rgyud): 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //oM sarba a mo b+ha ma hA bi shwo shA ri hUM hUM hUM/haM haM haM/ma hA kro d+haM gu mu khe/ma hU~M bi shrI ba da ri Ni/sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra
187a1(rgyud): shA ma ni hUM hUM phaT//'di nyid kyis ni ci rigs par//rdo rje gdon mi za ba yi//dkyil 'khor g.yog bcus rnam pa bzhi//sna tshogs dam tshig
187a2(rgyud): bzhag byas te/sna tshogs gzugs dang khyad par ldan//kun tu yongs su bskyor nas gnas//bskor ba dang ni btsums pa'i gdong //rab tu drag la ro myang zhing //
187a3(rgyud): gdong gnyer thod pa'i rtse mor byas//dpung pa bcu drug gis brgyan pa'i//khro mo chen mo gdong gsum pa//za byed mi bzhin lta ba yi//de yAM ngo bo thams cad kyi//
187a4(rgyud): g.yog ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis//bskor bar shes rab can gyis bzhag/rang gi phyag rgya mtshan mar ldan//dpung pa brgyad dang ldan pa yi//de ni cho ga ji bzhin
187a5(rgyud): du/'byung mo'i phyag rgya yang drag zhon//dur khrod bzhin du 'jigs byed pa//phyi yi rnal 'byor ma tshogs rnams//de dag kun tu yongasu bskor//bzhag gam
187a6(rgyud): bri bar bya yang rung //dI ni dA lta'i stan la gnas//bzhin mi sdug pa dpung bzhi mo//gdug po'i khro mo rnam bsgyur bcas//de la sogs pa'i rim par ldan//
187a7(rgyud): mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//de nas rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/yang dang yang rang rang gis mngon par gang bar
187b1(rgyud): zlos smras mngon par mchod nas gsal ba 'debs so//rnal 'byor ma yi sngags chag sa dang //phyug rgyu mAn+ti tsi rlugs par//gsang ba'i gang ni bde chen mo//bcom ldan de ny-i/
187b2(rgyud): nyid kyis gsungs//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor ma thams cad rnam par spro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/rnal 'byor mA thams cad kyi
187b3(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya sbas pa dang /de kho na nyid dang /gosang ba rnams/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+hA ra sU tA a nu rA gi nI ma hA kro
187b4(rgyud): hU~M phaT/oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra A kaR+Sha Ni ma hA kro d+ha shwa ri hUM hUM/dzA dzA hUM hUM/oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ku la a nu rA gA ni many+dzu kro d+he shwa ri hUM he he hUM phaT/oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ro gra mi hUM traM/
187b5(rgyud): d+h+r-i shwa ri hUM swA swa hUM phaT/oM sar+b+ba badz+rA d+ha ra ma hA te dza oM b+hi She bi hU~M to hUM/oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA sUr+yA b+hi ku Te kra ro ki tra ta Ta ta hUM phaT/oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA ke tu kai tu
187b6(rgyud): kr-i d+hi shI ri ma hA br-i dza yot+ta ye hUM hU~M tAM trAM phaT phaT/oM swad+d+he badz+rA d+ha raM mA hA badz+ra kro d+he Ar+d+ha A sa hU~M hUM t+yai tr-i hri da ya hUM phaT/oM swad+g+ha badz+ra d+ha ra mA hA kro d+ha b+hakli NIn+d+ra
187b7(rgyud): b+hak+Sha b+hak+She hUM tri/oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ma hA tIn+ti kro d+ha shwa ri ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+d+ra hUM hUM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na ha staM ts+tshe da ya hU~M hUM me Ta ma~M Ta/oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra tsakra d+ha ri Ni me ho gr-i du pi ni hUM hUM/pa ta ya po te/
188a1(rgyud): /ya ma hA badz+rA tsakr-i NA/tsUr+N+Na y+YA tsUr+N+Na ya/hU~M hU~M phaT/oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+hA ra ma hA shAH/pra d+hur+N+Na n+du dz+nyA ma ta ma tA phaT/oM sUr+b+bA badz+ra d+hA ra mA hA b+h+r-i shA mu khA n+tu
