188a7(rgyud): ma hA kro d+hi sh+ya sh+ye hU~M ho/oM hU~M trAM hrIHoMHde nas rnal 'byor ma de dag mgu rangs dga' bar gyur te/yang dbyangs 'dis gsol 'ded so//bde ba mchog ge
188b1(rgyud): rgya chen dgongs su gsol//bsam gyis mi khyab byed mchog dbyings dang ldan/mAM g.yo gsung dang bral ba'i dbyangs snyan pas/gzungs la rol pa'i bde bya ba zhes su gsol//
188b2(rgyud): ngo mtshar chen po cho 'phrul snang mdzad cing //snying po byang chubo bgrod pa rnams kyi lam ston te/rgyud rnams yang dag gang la'ang mi rten pa/bde ba mchog gi gzungs kyis
188b3(rgyud): grol bar mdzod//ra mu ma hA su hU dzo hi ni dz+wA laM su hU~M pU m+bu/ma hA su hUM dzo i ni dz+wA laM su hUM ba~M b+h+yAM dz+nyA ma hA su hU/i ni dz+wA la su hU u dzi/u ma hA s+yA hU dz+re/dza i nri dzA
188b4(rgyud): sle hUM/A la la la ho//ma hA suM hU~M ram+ba ra mai trA su hU~M/oM la la la to/mU hA su twAM Na/dI nas bai com ldan 'das rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro margyun mo dmo tshig ces bya ba'i
188b5(rgyud): tItitad 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //oM sar+b+ba ta thA g+hA ta ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra
188b6(rgyud): hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kro d+ha gi nI hUM phaT/oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA he mu ba ti hUM phaT/oM badz+ra DA ki nI ku mA re prI ye hU~M phaT/oM badz+rA DA kri ni dr-i sh+ye mA ra yu hUM phaT/oM badz+ra DA k+She ne ma hA/
188b7(rgyud): badz+ra muSh+Ti ta na/ts+tshi ta ya b+hI ta yaM/sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM phaT/oM badz+ra DA kI nI ma hA badz+ri kro d+ha ye ra le li hUM phaT/oM badz+ra DA kiM ni mahA kro d+ha tsakr-i NAM ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/oM dz+ra
189a1(rgyud): An+tam+b+har+thamyA t+ma NA d+hAkAdz+nyAd nu ma n+tan+na d+hA k+ShA rmA d+hA nan tAHts+tsha \u0f7f/oMSh+TAr+N+NaT+Ta kan+do mAr+d+ha dzA tAk+Sh+mats+tsha baT/A byAdz+ra nA ka nam+b+ha s+thAm+b+ha rA t+na d+hU Ta/
189a2(rgyud): oM badz+ra DA kI nI ma hA mr-i te ka b+h+r-i s+yA trA saM hU~M pha kr-i/oM badz+ra DA kau nA~M mr-i s+t+rai saum+b+ha kr-i trU~M shA ra~M hU~M phaT+Ta/oM ba~Md+d+he DA kr-i ni mai hA a mr-i ta~M pu dUn d+ha ri hU~M b+hiT+Ta/oM bidz+ra Ti kr-in
189a3(rgyud): b+h+r-ibyA kA lI hUM phaT/badz+rI DA kI nI pi ba bi kA ru d+hi raM ma hU bedz+nyA ba lI hU~M phaT/oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra she ni b+hak+Sha b+hAk+Sha hUM phaT/oM badz+ra DA ki nI maN+Da badz+ra shri ni hU~M phaT/
189a4(rgyud): oM badz+ra hU~Mkr-inI mai hA badz+ra pIsh+tse hU~M baT/dza~Mdz+dza kI nA~M A~M nA ya A~M nuy+ya hU~M phaT/su~M badz+ra DA ki nI mahA badz+ra bi b+h+r-i na~M buM gu m+bA rA ya dz+nyA biT+Te/oM badz+rA DA ki nI mAN+Da badz+radzA/
189a5(rgyud): lA ya b+hU smiM ku ru hUM phaT/oM badz+rI DA ki nI mAhA dz+ra bi g+hA ti hUM phaT/oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+rI daMSh+TaM hU~M phaT/oM badz+ra DA ki nI mA hU~M badz+ra kI lI pra bi sha pri bi
189a6(rgyud): phaT/oM byAdz+nye DA ko ni ma hA puny+tsa mAM swe sha ni hU~M phaT/oM badz+rA DA kI nI ma hA ka ra bi badz+ra d+hA ra NI hUM phaT/oM badz+ra DA kI nI AM kaR+Shi Ni mahA pang+gi rI lci mu ku hUM dz+dzaH
189a7(rgyud): hUM phaT/oM 'adz+re DA ki n+ya A bi sha ni hUM hUM phaT/oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA ban+d+har+b+hu d+hurba rban+d+he/oM badz+re DA ki nI ma hA to She Ni sa ma ye hUM hUM A aHoM badz+ra ma hA rIk+Sha sa mA
189b1(rgyud): ru dz+nye rA mo da pr-i ya/mAt+ma kro th+yA kar+d+han+tut+s+yad+b+ha b+h+yok+ShaHoM badz+ra many+dza rAk+Sha sa A kaR+ShA pa be sha ya/sAd+d+ha badz+ra kA la shi na~M banar+d+ha nUn+na dz+nyA hUM paT phaT/oM badz+ra rAk+ShA s+yA be d+hA ba d+hA r+ya/
189b2(rgyud): bi sha ya bi sha NAM sar+b+bA na hU~M hU~M phaT/oM badz+ra ma hA rA k+Sha sa/ban+d+ha ye ban+d+ha ya/sar+b+ba na ma hA bI kr-i tA na nI/hA ya gr-I ba hU~M phaT/de nas rdo rje na mkha' l-I 'gro ma rnal 'byor/
189b3(rgyud): gyi dbang phyug chen mo de dag thams cad rab tu mgu na ste/yid dkra' bar 'gyur te/dbyangs rkyen mo 'di 'byin par gyur to//kye ma rdo rje sems dpa' yi/rdo rje sbyor
189b4(rgyud): rab bstan pas//mkha' la 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid/ci bde bas ni sgrub par byed//de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos yang rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ma de dag kun
189b5(rgyud): glu dga'i bAr bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo //oM TI ki nI A kAR+Sha ya pa be sha ya/ban d+ha ya to Sha ya/a/satwA na dzarje
189b6(rgyud): DAkiM nI hU~M ta yaM hUM dz+nyoHdza hUM baM hoHrbakrI d+b+h+yAMd+b+h+yAM/au he ru ka mah+ni badz+dza/U kaD+D+h+ya AM kAr+N+Na/be bi sha ye pra be she ya/baM d+hA ya baM d+ha ya/to Sha ya two Sha yA/hUM nU
189b7(rgyud): piT oM badz+ra pang+ge ma hA ga rab su khyA/A kAts+tsha/bra bo sha yaM/dan d+hA/mo hwA ya/to Sha ya/hahahi/khro bo'i sngags kyi tshogs 'dis rdo rje rna
190a1(rgyud): /'byor ma dang /mkha' la 'gro ma dang /mkha' la 'gro DA dang /rdo rje 'phrog par byed ma de dag la sogs pa de dag dgug pa dang /gzhug pa dang /dbang du bya//
190a2(rgyud): ba la sogs pa'i las bya ste/gtor ma'i mchod pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig he ru ka'i phyag rgya dang /Tak+ki rgyal po'i phyag rgya dang /rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya sbyin te/las
190a3(rgyud): thams cad la sbyar ro//rdo rje'i thal mo ji lta ba bzhin bcings te/khro bo gnyis lcags kyu ltar bya/sbom po gnyis phan tshun rtse sbyar zhing /zhi ba gnyis kyang rab tu sgreng
190a4(rgyud): lhag ma gnyis brgyang ste 'od zer ltar btang ba 'di ni phyag rgya'i mchog yin no//phyag rgya 'di ni gzi brjid che/lha dang lha min phyag byas pa//sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin
190a5(rgyud): la sogs//bsngags shing mchod pa byas pa yin//bcings pa de nyid 'bebs pa dang //thams cad tshogs ni 'dzud par byed//gdug pa thams cad gsod byed ma//
190a6(rgyud): srin mo thams cad za bar byed//rnal 'byor dam pa gnas pa yis//'di yis las rnams thams cad byed//las rnams thams cad sgrub pa po//mi ldan dngos grub
190a7(rgyud): mi 'gyur te/'dod chags zhe sdang gnyi mug rnams//bsnyen pas dngos grub myur du 'thob//rdo rje bcings pa gnyis su byas te/mtho'u chung gnyis brkyang ste/
190b1(rgyud): phran tshun bsnol khros pa gnyis gyen du sgreng ste snying kur bstan nas/brkyang ba sgyum gyi tshul du gnas pa 'di las thams cad byed pa'o//'di yis thams cad lasna kyi rnams//
190b2(rgyud): ji tsam yid 'dod byed par 'gyur//tshe 'dir sdig pa grang byas pa//'di yis thams cad 'phrog par byed//de dag thams cad myur 'gyur te//dngos grub yid bzhin
190b3(rgyud): rin chen no//ji snyed namakha'i lam dag tu//rnal 'byor 'di yis 'phrul par byed//rigs 'dzin mchog ni mtshon par yang //cho ga grub pa slar yang 'ong //thal mo sbar te sgom
190b4(rgyud): po gnyis dbus su sbyar//lhag ma mdab ma kha bye bltar byas pa ni pad+mo'i gdan no//sbom po gnyis rtse mo thur du bstan pa ni/rta gdong gi'o//gang gis sbyor byas skrod cig du//
190b5(rgyud): de yis dngos grub chen por 'gyur/bcings ma thag tu 'phur 'gyur ba//'dod pa bzhin du nye bar 'grogs la sogs dngos 'dod pa bzhin//myur du slar yang ldog par
190b6(rgyud): 'gyur//de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa//phyag rgya 'di ni sbyor ba dge/nga ni bstan de rgyal ba'i rnams//rnal 'byor pa yi drang bar bya//rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad
190b7(rgyud): kyang //phyag rgya'i yan lag mchog des sbyar//de nas na mkho' la 'gro ba chen mo de dag 'dod pas gzir ba rnams rengs te/rang gi gzugs ni bsgyur ba yis//bzhengs te/
191a1(rgyud): gar ni rab mdzad cing //dur khrod kyi ni sa chen du//mgu ba chen pos brtags par byed//phyag na thod pa gri dag dang /rdo rje kha T+wA~M rnam par 'dzin//
191a2(rgyud): skasbrul ldan rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan//dbu smug rnam par bster ba'i zhal//badre ba'i cha lugs sbyor ba yis//bde ba dam pa ljongs sbyong myong //rab tu rmongs pas
191a3(rgyud): bsnyen byed cing //rab dgyes khrol gsol po 'dibs//zla ba dri mo stong pas shin tu rdzogs pa'i spyan mnga' bas//thugs rje'i dbyings rlom nyid du bdag cag bskyed
191a4(rgyud): 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tsha bas gdungs pa yi//byang chub des ni kun tu tshim par mdzod//A la l-i la ho/mchog gi rol pas yang dag sgo 'byed cing //byang chub
191a5(rgyud): mchog gi lam 'di snying po nyid kyis ston//gsang ba'i bdag nyid bde bas zil mnan te//rmongs shing bying ba'i rnams la thugs rjes sgro la//oM la la la ho/
191a6(rgyud): che ba'i ye shes lhun gyis mngar ldan pa//phyogs kyi thugs rjes ma zin snyoms par dgongs//bde ba mchog gi gsang ba'i gnas nyid du//mya ngan 'da' ba'ang
191a7(rgyud): longs spyod bsten pas 'grub//'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos bstan kyang //rmugs pa'i 'gro bas bdud rtsi'i ngos ma mthong //kye mai ho ma skyes chos te snying
191b1(rgyud): / las 'byung ba//bsam gyis mi khyab na mkha' drang mnyam//rab tu dgyes pa'i bde mchog 'bar ba'i gtso//rin chen sna tshogs kun 'dus 'di la gzigs//sngon med
191b2(rgyud): rol mo 'di la rol mdzad cing //dur khrod chen po'i dngos grub stsal bar mdzod//thugs rjes pad+ma'i dbyings las bskyed par mdzod//a la la la ho/ji ltar pad+ma 'di
191b3(rgyud): lngal chags med bzhin//sdug pa'i bcings pas ma zin rnams grol te//'jig rten gsum po dI la gzigs nas rol mo mdzod//bdag cag dam tshig 'di la 'dus
191b4(rgyud): shig snang ba'i rnams//mnyes mdzod shin tu bde ba bzhengs su gsol//'gal ba'i yid dang mi chags rdo rje la//nam mkha' ji bzhin mi 'gyur tshul bzhin gnas//
191b5(rgyud): khams kyi rang bzhin ba nabs shing rnams khro yang //byams pa'i thugs rjes kun tu gnas khyab mdzad//e ma ho bde sbyin phyag 'tshalo//rang bzhin grub pa'i bde ba
191b6(rgyud): dngos grub gsol//chags med chags dang ldan pa'i longs spyod kyis//dam tshig skyon med bdag cag rol pa mdzod//thugs rje gsal ba'i byang chub sems chen des//
191b7(rgyud): 'gro ba kun gyi bag chags rnam par sbyongs//rgyu dang rkyen la ma brten rang bzhin grub//ma chags dri med yongs su gsal zla ba bzhin//'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni
192a1(rgyud): mnga' mdzad de//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun tu bde bas brdzun//'di yis gtso la bskul byas na//dkyil 'khor nyid du dngos grub bo//l+r-ing
192a2(rgyud): gdung gnyen pa'i nga ro yis//dpyid kyi rgyal po klu blangs te//mkha' 'gro drag pa dri med pa'i//dgongs pa thams cad bstan byas te//rdo rje pad+mo yid 'ong ba'i/
192a3(rgyud): dngas grub thams cad sbyar bar bya//bad byed chen po 'di yis ni//bskul bas dgyes pa sbyin par byed//rdo rje can gyi yi gor ldan//dus gsum rab tu sbyar bar bya//
192a4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi zhin tu dgyes pa'i longs spyod dpal gyi bde ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
192a5(rgyud): /zhugs te/de dag thams cad la rjes su mgu ba mdzad do//g.yon gyi lag pa sna gzung byas te//gsang skyes pad+mo phye ba lo swa//rdo rje chen po g.yas nyid kyis//
192a6(rgyud): bcug na mchod pa 'thob 'gyur te//mkha' la 'gro ba dra ba 'das//mnyes pas 'dis nas dngos grub 'thob//oM dang a~M dang mi phyed rdo rje bde//mtha' ru phaT
192a7(rgyud): kyis stobs rab sbyor ba yis//kye ma'o bde ba mkha' 'gro dra ba che//rab dgyes dbang mo bde byed bde stabs mdzod//rnal 'byor ma tshogs gsal rnams la//
192b1(rgyud): rnam byas na//bde rkyen bde ba dgyes pa yi//rab dgyes dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur//rnal 'byor ma'i tshe ba rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/
192b2(rgyud): yoso so//mgo la thang mo phyed sbyin te/chu skyes la ni yongs su rdzogs//rdo rje bcings pa yang dag stan//pad+ma'i dkyil mo bcings par bya//'di mis brten por byas
192b3(rgyud): nA ni//bud med mchog ni 'grub por 'gyur//bde ba chen pos gar byed cing //rab dgyes bde byed gnod byed dang //kun tu 'khyud dang spyod byed dang //sna tshogs gor
192b4(rgyud): gyis gAr byas te//thams cad zas dang ros dngos grub//mchog gi bde bas dngos grub 'gyur//rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcings byos te//sangs rgyas sbyor ba bde chen po//
192b5(rgyud): mung ba'i thal mos bsgrub par bya//gsum gyis mtshams su rab bya zhing //'khur tses so yis btab byas to//ma mchu yang nas yang du bzung //'o ma 'dzin pa phyir
192b6(rgyud): nangs te/g.ya' byud pad+ma rnams byin bya//pad+mo phyi phyir rab many+dzu zhing //be ba mtshan pas rab tu sbyar//sen mos mtshan khung snyam mAng dang //rna ba gnyis su rab tu
192b7(rgyud): gzugs//dal nas rdo rje gzhug bya zhing //khro bo'i rgyal pos bskyed par bya//g.yas kyis shin tu bskyod byas nas//g.yon pa yis ni btang bar bya//sbyor ba 'di yis
193a1(rgyud): 1/brtson pa yis//mkha' 'gro'i 'khor lo mchod par bya//kye ma'o bde zhes rab brjod do//bde ba chen po dbyangs kyis bskul//yang dang yang du
193a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa na//blo ldan sgrub pas sgrub par bya//rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i spro ba ye shes so//de dag thams cad mgu nis ni//rdo rje 'dzin
193a3(rgyud): la gsol ba 'debs//nye ba'i zas ni thams cad dang //de bzhin nye ba'i yo byad rnams//bde ba bsgrubs pas sgrub pa po//sna tshogs chen po bsgom par gsol/
193a4(rgyud): sgrub pa thams cad sgrub byed pas/gdon mi za dka' rtug bgyid pas//gang gis myur du mnyam sbyor bas//dkyil 'khor rab tu rnam bsgyur bkye//de nas bcom
193a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis nye ba'i yo byad kha zas thams cad kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa//yo byad phyi yi thams cad dang /gos dang rgyan la sogs pa'o//nye ba'i kha zas rnams
193a6(rgyud): pa ni//sha dang khrag las yang dag sgrub//'bras bu rtsa ba tshad med do//mchog tu bde ba yid tshim pa//'di yis mchod pa byas pa na//mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub
193a7(rgyud): /'gyur//bus pa'i sha las rab sgrub pa'i// ma dam pas thod pa de gad //mkha' 'gro ma kun dbul byas na//dkyil 'khor 'dir ni dngos grub 'gyur//gtor
193b1(rgyud): ma'i mchod pa'i yo byad kyi ye shes so//dr-i nasa~M bag+h+nAn sau sha~M g+h+ra pa~Mpa thams cad dang /rdo rje 'dzin thams cad bzhengs te phyag 'tshal nas stong gcig tu skyug par 'dub mdzad
193b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so//rnal 'byor kun gyi ye shes mtshan+te//rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi//thams cad brda'u rnams dran 'gyur ba//bcom ldan 'das
193b3(rgyud): kyis bshed du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro myong ba dang 'brel ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin lnga snyems par zhugs te/rdo rje
193b4(rgyud): na mkha' la 'gri ba dang /'gro ma thams cad kyi brda'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs so//ka ni 'dod pa byed 'dod phyir//bdag ni 'dod can smras yin te//gti mug mdongs pas mi
193b5(rgyud): byin na//myur du dam tshig de nyams so//dam tshig dam tshig can mthong na//lag pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te//des kyang g.yon pa brkyang ba yis//rang gi nu ma rab
193b6(rgyud): bsdams ni//mgo bos g.yon du 'dud byas nas//phyag byed bde ba dris pa yin//lag pa g.yon pa dkur brten na//de yis phyag ni byas par 'gyur//g.yon pa ma gau ru bzhag
193b7(rgyud): pa yi//g.yon du 'dud pas phyag lan no//g.yon gyi smon ma bskyod pa yis//myur du phyag ni byas par 'gyur//sbyor ba shin tu brtson pa yis//snrums kyi smin ma
194a1(rgyud): phyug ldan bya//g.yas kyi lag pas snying khA ru//sbyor dang ldan pas mnye byas na//'di ni rdo rje slob dpon mchog/de yi mtshan mar shes par bya//g.yon gyi
194a2(rgyud): khro ma steng ba yi//nam zhig de ltar bstan byas na//lus che de ni khros 'gyur zhes//rnal 'byor pa yi rtags zhes bya//g.yon du 'gying ba'i bsgyings pa yis//
194a3(rgyud): ldeg pa snying kar brkyang bya ste//dbang mo dgyen du rnam bstan na//dri tshe mdza' bar rab tu brtag/chung ngu rtse mor byas pa yi//nam+ba zhig bskyod pa mthong ba na//de rtsa
194a4(rgyud): rig ma rnal 'byor dbang //rdo rje pad+mo rtsen par 'dod//sbo mu po nam zhig mthong 'gyur na//de la ston mo sbyin+d+ra par bya//gang tshe shin tu mthor ston na//mngon pa'i nga
194a5(rgyud): rgyal rab tu brtag/khro mo lcags kyi 'dra byas te//gang tshe sngags mkhan gyis bstan na//de tshe nges par dzi byas te//gzhan du na ni dmyal bar ltung //de nyid rnam
194a6(rgyud): par bzlog pa ltar//sngags mkhan gyis ni ma bsten na//de tshe myur du 'gro byas te/gzhan du byas na dam tshig nyams//gzhan rnams kyi ni phyag rgyu yis//
194a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis rnam ba skul na//las kyi sbyor ba shes pa yis//las de dag ni brtsam par bye//brda yis phyag rgya'i ye shes so//'dren pa med pa'i ye shes kun//
194b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu brtag/rtag tu chog drag rnam bral ba//'dren tshul rnal 'byor ma y-i'o//oM ni thAg lo bcas pa'i brda'//sbyor ba sngags 'dzin rnal 'byung
194b2(rgyud): bebartag/de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/sbyor ba'i dkyil du brtag par bya//rdo rje pad+mo mnyam par sbyor bas rjes su mnyes par byed pa dpal dam tshig ma zhes bya
194b3(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgyu'i ye shes so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po yang kun tu rgyus 'debs pa'i ye shes rdo rje
194b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di nyid kyi sku dang /gsung
194b5(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag te//sbom po skyil mo bgyid bar bya//khro mo gnyis ni sbyar bya ste//lhag ma 'od bzhin btang bIr bya//spyi
194b6(rgyud): kar b+hag rgyu 'di bzhag nas//thams cad las ni rab sbyar te//sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i di thil 'khor du//gdon mi zo ba'i dngos grub byed//thal mo de gnyis mnyam
194b7(rgyud): sbyar te//mchog dang rdo rje mnyam du sbyar//chung ngu gnyis kyang gdong sprad de//snying khor de bzhin sbom po sbyar//'di yis rdo rje thams cad rnams//dam tshig
195a1(rgyud): //'jogs byung rab mdzad cing //snyoms can+da rnam+b+has cad blun mdzad ma//de ni dngos grub 'brub par 'gyur//dany+tsid+ha las ni rdo rje dang //mchog nyid
195a2(rgyud): skyed pa'i tshul byas te//rdo rje thal mo gnas pa yAs//drang ba'i tshul gyis dang pa byas na//mig yang de nis dngos grub bo//gnod byed yid dag ldan pa 'das/
195a3(rgyud): rgyal ba ma chog kyang 'dren 'gyur na//lha dang mi yi bu mo dag/lha min la sogs sgros ci dgus//ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin//'di nyid kyis ni dngos byub ste/
195a4(rgyud): sngags kyi bzlas pa mnyam sbyar bas//mchog tu myur du 'dren par 'gyur//thal mo de nyid las byung khro//rtse ma yid tsam bkug d+has te/lhag ma 'od zer rtswa mi
195a5(rgyud): bzhin//des ni myos byed thob pa yin//'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang //bde bar gshegs kyang dbang bsgyur na//yid las skyes pa 'dod chags can//gti mug
195a6(rgyud): chos gnas smos ci dgyes//ci dkar 'dod chags sbyor bu yis//de yi sku las rnams byung 'gyur te//yang dag sbyor ba rnams ci 'grub//sbyor dang mi ldan dang
195a7(rgyud): gru med//spying kar 'a da kyis byas te//mgu ba'i sbyor ba bang chen pos//rgyu la mchog ni mnyes par 'gyur//mchog gi bzang ba 'di kun dang //'di yos
195b1(rgyud): sa rlom sa rnams cang dang //yid lta bsam pa rnams cad 'anag/b+hak+ShawAn dA na mag+ha byed nang //mamra bA pas glu ba myur du thug+sa/ dzAHla mo mnyam sbya //rdo rje bcug
195b2(rgyud): nas sgrim par sbyar//lhag ma 'di kyi tshul du gtong //dga' byed mchog ni phyag rgya 'di//sangs rgyaste 'bras bu dngos glu ba 'ju//rmyi la srid nAr dang b+hU ya~M rnams//
195b3(rgyud): bezhi na nor bu 'di dngas gruh+Na//daM ni dam thag tu yang //lha dang sgyu min mchod por 'gyur//bdog nyid kyis ni 'di bcings te//mkhas pa yis ni dus mchims phyir//
195b4(rgyud): gnu'i ltar rab tu sbyor ba yis//skye bar dab ni bsgyur byas+thA nA//rdo rje 'dzin pakun gyi dbang //de nas dran dus par 'gyur//lcu ga N+DIg nAm du mAnyam skye bas//na
195b5(rgyud): du ni dbang bsgyur bste//khams gsuMmyu bye dkyis pi dag bAn+d+he//smre sbyin rdo rje mi ga yeng ltagyur//de nyid 'khor lo bsgyur basmr-it+ma//spyi dkar 'khor lo bzhin du bskor//
195b6(rgyud): ci nam minyam stor bas//'kha ril bsgyur ba dbacu smrag//de tid gi yin pa sgyur te/la maman tshul du yang dge sbyo/bdun du ni mnam gun gyi pa de//
195b7(rgyud): na du ni rgyal bar 'gyur// nyid kha nas babang par sbyar//mnyam gzhag zla ba gcig tsam gyis//las rnams se mas cad rab grub pa//'gro ba tsam gyis byed par 'gyur/
196a1(rgyud): de nyid mnyam bzhag ste/rtse mo kha byed rnams bsgyur bas//sbom po tho bar rnam byas te//lo ma lkog ma rgyas par bya//rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis//
196a2(rgyud): sdig pa kun las rab tu grol//bsod nams chen pos byin rlob ste//bde byed thams cad grub par 'gyur//thal mo de nyid snying kar sbyar//mchog dang khro mo gnyis
196a3(rgyud): sbyar te//de gnyis tshigs gsum rab tu dgug/sbom po skyil mo tsam du bya//rnal 'byor dag tu sbyor ba yis//'di yis zla ba gcig byos na//'jig rten gsum las//
196a4(rgyud): rnam rgyal rjer//dpa' bo chen por de 'gyur ro//thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te//rang gi snying kar ba skor bar bya//de nas sngags mkhan chos ston par//mi g.yeng sems
196a5(rgyud): kyis de 'gyur ro//sbom po lce yi tshul bzhag pas//de nyid khar ni rnam bzhag na//'jig rten kun gyi thams cad dag/medar na zhag bdun tsam gyis kyang //dbyigs
196a6(rgyud): dang gser dang gos la sogs//bdud rtsi btung ba mchog gi rnams//'di yis thams cad 'phrog byed de//'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za//thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te//
196a7(rgyud): mchog rab gnyis ni 'og tu gzhug/chung ngu gnyis dang sbom po gnyis//sbyar te snying kar rab tu gzhug/yid la dga' ba'i las rnams thams cad byed//sgyu ma'i mthu
196b1(rgyud): dang srid pa mthar byed pa//rtug tu blo ldan la nA phyed gnyis kyis//khams gsum rgyal srid mthu chen thob par 'gyur//thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar to//rang gi ma mchu dbus nyid nus//
196b2(rgyud): sbom po ro 'thob tshul gyis ni//khro mo'i khor lo yang dgu spro//zhag bdun du na bai sgri mos pa yis//'di yis khrag 'dren dngos grub ste/sha zas bza' ba las kun byed//thal mo
196b3(rgyud): nyid ni bcings byas na//rdo rje gnyis ni pad+mor spor//sbor bor zur ni sbrel nas kyang //chung ngu gnyis kyang de bzhin te//mgrin pa nas ni rtse mo brkyang //thams cad las ni sbyar byas
196b4(rgyud): te//'di yis gdugs pa thams cad dag/rab tu sbyar bas 'jigs par 'gyur//thal mo de nyid mnyam gzhag nas//bcing ba dram pos bcing bar bya//sbom po gnyis no na
196b5(rgyud): du gzhug/khro mo gnyis kyang bskul bar bya//'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag//'dzums par rab tu byas par 'gyur//skad cig tu ni gnon byed do//de bzhin bsdus dang
196b6(rgyud): brtser bar 'gyur//phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas//de ni dngos grub thams cad kyi//dngos grub chen po bdag po dang //thams cad las don 'grub par 'gyur//phyag rgya
196b7(rgyud): 'di yis rgyas btab pas//rim par mar du 'gro 'ong byed//lo gcig gi ni sbyor ba yis//las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed//rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyi las
197a1(rgyud): thams cad byed pa'i phyag rgya'o//de nas rnal 'byor ma de dag thams cad rab tu mgu nas ro mtshar du gyur te//rnam par 'gyur bas gar mdzad cing //
197a2(rgyud): hi hi zhes pas glu ru len//ha ha zhes pas rab tu mgu//ho ho zhes pas mnyes par byed//he he zhes pas 'bod par byed//hUM hUM zhes pas gang bar byed//hA hA zhes
197a3(rgyud): pas skyod par byed//phaT phaT zhes pas bsod par byed//hAM hUM zhes pas pur bus 'debs//dzA dzA zhes pas 'dren par byed//saM saM zhes pas dam par byed//dge ba
197a4(rgyud): dbang ngo ro mchog/hUM b+h+rUM zhes pas gsod par byed//hUM b+h+r-i hU~M ru/hUM hUM zhes pas 'bar bar byed/hUM trAM zhes pas gzi brjid byed//tri tri zhes pas 'dren par
197a5(rgyud): byed//traM traM zhes pas mA chod par byed//dngos grub tha sa cad 'bras bu smin//hAM hUM zhes pas rmongs par byed//d+hI d+hI zhes pos 'dzums par byed//hriM hI zhes
197a6(rgyud): pos 'dren par byed//hUM hUM zhes pas 'phyan par byed//hr-i hr-i zhes pas rmongs par byed//hr-i hr-i zhes pas gnon por byed//ho ho zhes pas mnyes par byed//haM haM
197a7(rgyud): zhes pas srung bar byed//hUM hUM zhes pas gsod par byed//hu hu zhes pas mgu bar byed//g+hu g+h+raM zhes pas phreng bar byed//gaM gaM zhes pas tri ru byed//raM raM zhes pas
197b1(rgyud): rgyal bur byed//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i tshogs ngo mtshar cher gyur/rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te/rang gi sems mgu bar byed pa zhes bya
197b2(rgyud): pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po la
197b3(rgyud): phyag 'tshal te/gsol ba 'debs so//gnyis med mchog tu rmad byung ba//bcom ldan de nyid bshad du gsol//gang gis sems can grub pa 'di//gsang ba sbas pa grub
197b4(rgyud): por 'gyur//gar dang glu dang bzhad pa che//skrag mo rol pa bde ba ma chog/sil snyan gling bu rnam sna tshogs//brda ba dang rgyud rnams rab 'byor pa//gsang rgyud cho ga'i
197b5(rgyud): rim pa rnams//rdzu 'phrul blo yi che ba che//dngos grub thams cad grub pa yis//sngags rgyal khyod kyis bshad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan ngas rgyas rnams//thams cad
197b6(rgyud): bdag po rgyal po che//thog ma med nas spyod rmad byung //sna tshogs chen po rnams mi rtog/sna tshogs ye shes yon tan che//bla med chos kun dbang po ste//rig dang sngags kyi
197b7(rgyud): byudrag po che//de nyid chen po snying po mchog/blo rmongs phyag rgya rgyas 'bebs te//rgyas 'debs rmongs byed za ba po//gtong dang byed pa khyab pa che//sbyong ba sdig pa 'phrog par
198a1(rgyud): /byed//sdig pa'i chos rnams sol bar byed//dus ngan 'dod byeng khros pa po//gti mug chos rdzus 'drabs byar byed//sa dang bar snang de bzhin byed//de
198a2(rgyud): bzhin rnal 'byor po la sbyin//tshangs dang gtogs 'dod dbang chen pos//raM l-i phyag dang mchod par byed//de nyid skyod byed skyob po po//gsad pa'i gsang ba bde ba che//
198a3(rgyud): zla gsang thig le las byung ba'i//sbas pa chen po gsang ba ston//nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje//bde ba chen po 'byin po mdzad de//skad ldan nye bar longs spyod kun//
198a4(rgyud): bud med thams cad dbang du byed//rang 'byung mtshan du thig le ste//bcu gsum dra ba dbu ru ldan//'di yis bud med bskyed byas te//sde bon gyis ni rgyal po 'du//
198a5(rgyud): 'od zer gzi brjid 'bar po can//rang lasA myu gur 'dra ba yi//'og gi phyogasu bzhag pa ni//tAM byas myur du dra bar bya//dang po drang ba gnyis drang bas//tshig drag des/
198a6(rgyud): ni lcags kyu byas//lha dang lha min mchog gi bdag/khams gsum thams cad drang bar byed//'di yi tshul gyis sbyor ba yi//phani tshun du ni sgrub byas nas//rme da byung //
198a7(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs kyis//dngos grub byed pa sbyin par byed/bdag nyid rang bzhin mthong bar bya//sbyor ldan zla ba'i gzugs nyid du//de ste sa bon bzhag bar bya//de nyid de
198b1(rgyud): nyid thabs kyis gnas//sngags kyi sbyor ba rab sbyor bas//do nas sngags mkhan dor 'grub bo//de nyid sngags drung snying po dang //phyug rgyu rig dang mi ldan pa//sangs rgyas rdo
198b2(rgyud): rje sems dada' yang //'gru ba pa nyid du yong mi 'gyur//de nyid nang du sbyar byas na/snying po snying kar sbyor ba yis//phyag rgya phyag rgyas sbyar bar byas//sngags dang sngags
198b3(rgyud): kyi 'bru bsgoms te//rig ma rig ma nyid du sbyar//'di yis myur du dngos grub ste//mgyogs par 'gro ba rab tu 'grub//sangs rgyas kun gyi so cher po re//'byung dang
198b4(rgyud): 'byung las 'gyur ba nye//rnal 'byor 'byor don sgrub pa po//dpa' bo chen po 'gro 'ong byed//de nas de bzhin gshugs pa thams cad rab tu mgu rangs par gyur te/
198b5(rgyud): rdo rje'i dbyangs 'di sgrogaso//kye mo'o kun tu bzang po yi//rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med//bau shad pa gsad pa zhes brizhi pa//de nyid don du sgrub pa ste//snying po phyag rgya dam tshig
198b6(rgyud): ni/sngags rig rang gi lha nyid de//bdag gi de nyid ji bzhin pa//gsang ba rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs//dkyil 'khor dang ni dmyi tshig dang //gsang ba sbas pa de nyid
198b7(rgyud): de 'jig rten gsum gyis 'dud pa'i rim//dpa' bo chen ngos rab tu sgrogs//rdo rje pad+mo rnams mdzad pas//rig ma dang ni lhan cig rtsen//gdug pa thams cad ma
199a1(rgyud): byang dang //dam la zhe sdang bza' ba dang //slob dpon smod la bsgral ba dang //gzungs ma'i bdag por sgrub pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed//
199a2(rgyud): bya dang //rab dgyes bdag nyid bskul ba dang /sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang //bud med thams cad 'dod bya dang //bdud rnams thams cad drang bya dang //rdo rje kun tu
199a3(rgyud): gzhug bya dang //pad+mo'i gnas ni dgang bya dang //sgrub dang nye bar sgrub pa dang //shin tu sbyor dang sbyor che ba//sbyor ba rab sbyor sbyor skye ba//de rnams de nyid mkhyen pa'o//
199a4(rgyud): bde ba chen po nyid kyis gsungs//sgrub pa yi ni sbyor che ba//sbyor dang sbyor mar yang dag sbyor//de nyid gsal bar sems dpe'i tshe//phan par dgongs pa nyid kyis
199a5(rgyud): gsungs//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i mdo rjes su dris pa//rang gi thugs la bzhag ste/nyid kyi sku dang gsung thugs
199a6(rgyud): rdo rje las phyung ba/sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni//kun tu sbyor ba mnyam par ldan//de nyid phyag rgya chen po'i ste//ye shes lnga yis rjes su bskyod//dkyil 'khor
199a7(rgyud): phyag rgya bzhi pa ste//phyag rgya chen pos rjes su bsgrubs//rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed mdzad de//kye ma'o bde ba rnam par 'byung //snying po ye shes zhes bya ste//ye shes
199b1(rgyud): dang yang dag ldan//phyug rgyu yo shos phyug rgya che//dumachog mchog ni reg ma'o//sngags kyi yi go tshul 'dra ba//yi goSh+Ti byug rgyu don chen sbyin//'di yis sgrub pa byu
199b2(rgyud): ba'i gzungs//bdag gi de nyid lha de nyid//dri dag de nyid ce bzhin par//nga yis gsang ba rab tu bsgrags//dem tshig ma yin mi shes la//sngags rig pas ni bston mo
199b3(rgyud): bya//phyag rgya thams cad gsad bya ste//dam tshig rgyas 'debs gsang ba yin//de nyid lha yi sbyor ba ni//gsang ba gsang ba rab tu sgrub//rdo rje pad+mo rnams mdzad pas//
199b4(rgyud): rol paM phyi nang sbyor ba yis//rig dang lhan cig brtson bya ba/spyod pa dang ni 'khyud pa dang //de bzhin mchu ni so yis bzung //rdo rje brtan pa gzhug par bya//g.yas dang g.yon
199b5(rgyud): gyi tshul gyis ni//bskyod cing rnam par gar bya'o//gdug pa thams cad mnye bya ste//nub ma mtshan khung khur bcos gnyis//'gram pa dang ni brla gnyis rgyab//rkang pa
199b6(rgyud): lag pa 'jam po gnyis//mnyes pa'i sbyor po 'di yis ni//mdza' ba chen po de 'grub bo//'dod pa'i don gyi bar gcod dang //dam la zhe sdang bza' ba dang //zhe sdang can gyis
199b7(rgyud): zos 'gyur ba//khyad par gzhan dang gzhon yang bza'//rtag par mi phyogs smra ba dang //bla ma smod rnams bsgral bya ba//sha dang khrag dang klang pa'i rnams//drangs te tshogs
200a1(rgyud): rAk+Sha/kyi mchod par bya//'di ni bsad pa drag po ste//rdo rje slob dpon spyong ba dang //bla ma slong byed brtson pa la//dam tshig phyir ni bsgrub par bya//
200a2(rgyud): gti mug de ni 'grub mi 'gyur//sdug bsngal ba yang 'thob 'gyur te//thams cad nang dang khros cheni dang //'jigs byed nye bar 'tsho ba yis//bskul ba grang
200a3(rgyud): myed byi ba ru//sdug bsngal chen po sten byed cing //'o dod 'bod par sbrul gyi bdag/bstir med chen po brlag par 'gro/lus ngag sems ni bde dam pa/
200a4(rgyud): rig mo kun la ba skyong byas te//byang chub chen po bde ba yi//tshul bzhin du ni bsngags par bya//bskul ba'i snying po 'dri smras te/dza zhes skad cig skad cig du//
200a5(rgyud): rang gi gnas nas gnas pa yis//de nyid las ni bskyod par bya//bcu drug cha dang yang dag ljon//zla ba gsad pa'i thig le la//me tog dang ni 'dra ba nyid//rlung gis
200a6(rgyud): phul ba bskyed par bya//de ni bskyob N+ya k+Sh+ma pa ste//de bzhin du yang bskul bar bya//rgyun gyi phreng ni 'od gsalnga bzhin//blo ldan rtag tu bsgrub par bya//bdud
200a7(rgyud): rnams thams cad 'dren pa ni//lha mo rnams ni snying por bshad//zhags pa'i tshul gyis gzhug pa dang //de bzhin dgang ba bcing ba'o//sgrub pa lha yi sbyor bste/
200b1(rgyud): rjes su sgrub pa lha mo'i don//sgrub pa chen lo gnyi ga'i rgyu//mnyam par sbyor ba rdo rje'i mchog/nye bar sgrub pa gnyi ga gnas//shin tu sgrub pa bde dam pa//sau yi rnams
200b2(rgyud): mchu bzung ste//ma mchu mchog ni bsdam par bya//sbyor ba rab sbyor skalo ldan pa'i//rab dgyes ro myang bde dam pa//lha dang lha nyid yang dag sbyor//'di ni gnyis su med
200b3(rgyud): ces bya//snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis//nyid kyi gzugs ni bsgrub bya ste//bdag ni sems dpa' 'o zhes bsdams na//'di ni gnyid ming myur du 'gyur//gzugs
200b4(rgyud): dang sgra la sogs po'i lha'i//dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya//sbyor dang rab sbyor sbyor rgyu ba//rgyal ba kun gyi mchog gis gsungs//bcom ldan rdo rje sbyor ba
200b5(rgyud): ste/rab tu sbyor ba mkha' la 'gro//phyag rgya de dag rab sbyor ba//sbyor bopo chen po bsgrags pa yin//'di yis dpa' bo thams cad dang //sangs rgyas kun dang mnyamo sbyor
200b6(rgyud): brnyan sbyor ba'i dbang po bde ba che//tshe 'di nyid la 'thob por 'gyur//phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na//rdo rje'i bdag po chen por 'gyur//mnyam par sbyor ba sbyar ba yis//
200b7(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po myur du rgyal//yang dag sbyor ba sbyar tshul gyis//drangs te rab tu bcug nas kyang //rdo rje brtan pos bskul byas te//shin tu 'dod pas 'dod pa skyed/
201a1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro thams cad thabs mkhas ldan//rgyas dang de bzhin zag par bya//'di ni yang dag sbyor ba sbas//sbas pa rnal 'byor ma dkyil lo//'di
201a2(rgyud): yis yang dag dngos grub blangapa//rdzu 'phrul chen po 'bras bu 'thob//sangs rgyas byang chub bde che dang //byang chub mchog rab yang dag 'thob//gsang ba chen po rmad 'byung //
201a3(rgyud): ba|de dag de nyid sbas pa che//sangs rgyas rnams kyis dris pa'i rgya//nga yis yang dag rab tu bstan//gang gis yang dag ldan mthong dang //bdag po chen po ma chod
201a4(rgyud): byed na//de yis ston pa kun mthong ste//rgyal ba mchog la mchod par 'gyur//srid pa gcod pa por 'gyur te//'gro ba'i ston pa mchog tu 'gyur//de la lha
201a5(rgyud): kun mchod byed cing //skad cig skad cig phyag kyang byed//ji ltar ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas//phan byed 'jig rten skyes gyur pa//sna tshogs ye shes rjes bsdus
201a6(rgyud): pas//rnal 'byor chen por de bzhin 'gyur//rang gis dam tshig bsrungs pa yis//rdo rje sems dpa' bde skye bo//rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ldan pas//dngos
201a7(rgyud): grub chen po des 'thob po//rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan btang la//cung thad mi 'grub yong med de//phyag rgya kun gyi bde ba che//bdag nyid so sor rjes su 'grub//
201b1(rgyud): rlob dgyes mtshan dang mdza' chen mo//r-i dang reg pa'i cho ba'i cha//rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yis//dpyad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur//de nas de dbu mgu 'gyur to//
201b2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' bde che ba//sbyor ba 'dod pa'i gzir ba yis//sbyor ba chen pos mnyos par mdzad//ra ma ram sa ma ho ma hAs te//rab dgyes gdon mi za la bzhugs/
201b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//zla gsang thig ler yang dag ljon//bdag cag kun kyang dam tshig ste//skal ldan dri med ra dgyes kyi//rnal 'byor ma snying
201b4(rgyud): mchog nyid du//sbyor tshan nyid kyis rol pa mdzad//theg pa chen po bde che yi//pad+mo rdo rje'i rin chen gyis//rnal 'byor ma kun dkyil 'khor du//rab dgyes longs
201b5(rgyud): spyod gnyis bsten mdzod/bdag cag thams cad nyes bral te//gnod med de ni gser dang 'dra//nga nyid thams cad grub chen po//rab dgyes bdag nyid nyid bsten mdzod//
201b6(rgyud): spros pa 'khyud pa sbas pa dang //gzhug pa byad ni gtong ba'i mchog/'di ni sgyu ma'i brtan pa yis//ngad dpon rab tu brtag par mdzod//de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba che//
201b7(rgyud): po kun tu bzang pos 'dod pa thams cad langs spyod pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyisas pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzim la snyoms
202a1(rgyud): pad+ma zhugs te/rnal 'byor ma thams cad shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i kun tu mkhyud pa dang /spyod pa dang /gzhug pa dang /'dran pa dang /rab tu bskul
202a2(rgyud): ba dang /mnye ba dang /thigs pa dang /tshor bar bya ba dang /bskyod pa dang /kun tu bskyod pa dang btso ba'i rdo rje dang /pad+ma chen mi mnyam du sbyor bya la yang dag par
202a3(rgyud): zhugs te/shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos bde bas kun tu rgyas par mdzad cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cid dang /gzungs me'i tshogs thams cad la
202a4(rgyud): bskyod pa dang /rab tu rgyas pa dang /rab tu rnam par 'byin cing shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i mnyam nyid kyi tshogs kyis na mkha'i dbyings thams cad kun tu
202a5(rgyud): rgyas par byas te/gnas so//de nas rnal 'byor ma chen mo shin tu dgyes pa'i bdag nyid chen po de dag nyid mgu zhing bde bar gyur te/kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che//
202a6(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mgu ba che/bde ba chen po rangs par 'gyur//kye nI 'o ba rab bde ba che//bde ba nyid kyis phyag byed do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po//
202a7(rgyud): mgu ba chen po'i bde dang ldan//kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che//'jigs shing skrag pas sdud par byed//khros pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma//rab tu mi bzad dug dang 'dra//bde byed
202b1(rgyud): chen po'i ram pa yis//bde byed che la mchod par byed//skal pa chen po sring mo dang //bde byed bde bas rab mongs pa//mchod pa'i sprin phung bde ldan pa'i//rgya che mchog gis/
202b2(rgyud): mchod par byed//drag mo chen mo ma lta bu//rab tu gtum pA me 'dra ba//'ongs nas bde byed chen mo yis//gtso bo mchog la mchod par byed//lha dang lha mo thams cad
202b3(rgyud): kyang //klu mau dang ni rta gdong yang //'ongs nas bde ba sbyor ba yis//yid du 'ongs pas ma chod par byed//de nas dbang be g+ha chen po//bdag nyid chen po lha yi lha//kye ma'o/
202b4(rgyud): bde ba sna ba che ga nyid//sna tshogs sbyor ba bde ba che//mgu zhing rab tu rangs po yis//lha yi lha ni sngon du 'gro/dpa' bo bde la phyag byas te//kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che//rang gi
202b5(rgyud): bde bas mngon mchod cing //'jigs shing skrag pas mnyes par byed//tshad ming rangs pa bzhed pa che//glu glar mchog tu ldan pa dang //bza' dang bca' ba sha chen dang /
202b6(rgyud): sil snyan phreng ba ro chen dang //gling bu rgyud dang rdza rnga dang //pi ba pal ki ga hA la le//steg dang dpa' bo 'jigs pa dang //zhi dang rmad 'byung 'jigs byed dang //bdag
202b7(rgyud): dang khros dang sman rgyas pas//skad cig skad cig mchod byed cing //byed pa dang ni bzlog pa dang //'phrog pa dang ni gzhug pa dang //snyid ces pa dang tAM hAM dang //ta ha zhes pas mnyes
203a1(rgyud): byed cing //rab dgyes bdag nyid bde ba yi//rang gi chung mas mnyes pang byed//de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po rab tu dgyes pa bde ba chen
203a2(rgyud): pos na mkha' dang na mkha'i skabs thams cad la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /rang rgyal dang /nyan thos dang /rang bzhin gyis
203a3(rgyud): 'gag pa dang /ngo bo nyid med pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes la gnas pa rnams shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i thabs dang /shes rab kyi bde bas bkug ste dbang bskur
203a4(rgyud): nas/shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par 'jog pa/shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i chos nyid kyi rgyal po rjes su sbyong zhing mi mnyam
203a5(rgyud): pa dang mnyam pa/nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams chen po ma lus pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams su rab tu gzigs pas gzigaso nas/'jig rten
203a6(rgyud): dang lhar bcas pa rnams la bde ba chen pos khyab par mdzad de/sems can dang /rigs thams cad dang /gnas thams cad dang /spyod pa dang mi spyod par bcas pa dang /
203a7(rgyud): 'byung ba dang /'byung ba las gyur pa dang /sa'i 'og dang /phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched dang /bsags pa'i dbang po lnga dang /rnam par shes pa dang /shes bya //
203b1(rgyud): bdag ni dang /bdag gi dang /sna tshogs dang /sna tshogs ma yin pa dang /bus pa dang /rgan po dang /gzhon nu dang /bud med dang /skyes pa dang /skyes pa ma yin pa dang /
203b2(rgyud): srog dang /rab tu zad pa dang /'jigs pa dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid dang /shes pa dang /mi shes pa dang /shes rab dang /
203b3(rgyud): thabs dang /khyab pa dang /khyab byed dang /zla ba dang /dbang chen dang /nyi ma dang /me dang /gshin rje dang /chu bdag dang /lus srul po dang /tshangs pa dang /gtogs 'dod dang
203b4(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po dang /lho mo dang skal ba dang ldan pa dang /skal pa dang mi ldan pa dang /dngos po dang /dngos po med pa dang /mtshan dang /rdo rje dang /pad+mo dang /rin po che dang /
203b5(rgyud): ral gri dang /tho ba dang /dbyig pa dang /rtse gsum pa dang /'khor lo dang /sbyor ba dang /rab tu sbyor ba dang /stong pa dang /stong pa chen po dang /mchog tu stong pa dang /shin tu
203b6(rgyud): stong pa dang /stong pa rab tu stong pa dang /byang chub dang /byang chub kyi sems dang /yi ge dang /yi gi med pa dang /dra ba dang /lcug ma dang /cha dang cha med pa dang /thig le dang /
203b7(rgyud): ro dang /ro chen po dang /yid la byed pa med pa dang /rtag pa dang zhi ba dang /mi zad pa dang /thar pa dang /thar byed dang /grol ba dang /rigs pa dang /nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
204a1(rgyud): na mkha' dang /skabs dang /skabs med pa rnams la gcig tu stug por gyur te/rnam par phye nas mi snang ba'i tshul du gnas so//de nas de bzhin
204a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang /thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang /smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang /rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin ma
204a3(rgyud): rnams kyis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba chen po gsang ba chen po'i dgongs pa nges par 'grel
204a4(rgyud): ba chen po phyag mdzad de/mngon sum du yang dag par bskul nas dris pa/su ra ti sta ma sta ma si ha/gang phyir 'dod pa bde ba che//gang gis 'dod las byang chub 'gyur
204a5(rgyud): 'dod chags bral ba ji ltar bde/gang gis zhe sdang rdo rje tshe//gang gis gti mug rgyal ba che//gang gis 'dod chags pad+mor 'gyur//gang gis nga rgyal na mkha'i
204a6(rgyud): bdag/gang gis phrag dog gdon mi za//byang chub sems ni ji ltar bde//gang gis bde byed mchod par 'gyur//mchod pa yis ni ji ltar 'grub//ji ltar gzungs
204a7(rgyud): dang mnyam sbyor bas//yi ge mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur//ji ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga//bstan pa yis ni myur du 'grub//ji ltar gsang ba mnyam sbyor bas//rmad du
204b1(rgyud): 'byung ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur//ji ltar pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas//dkyil 'khor rab tu zhugs par 'gyur//ji ltar dri chu byang chub dang //dmar dang snang mdzad chen po bla//dam tshig nyid
204b2(rgyud): du ji ltar 'gyur//ji ltar btung ba rab tu brtag/de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po rdo rje pha rol tu phyin mis gsang ba chen
204b3(rgyud): mo de dag thams cad la rang gi bde bas mnyes par byas te/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbas pa chen po shin tu sbas pa mchog tu gsang ba'i dris lan chen po nyid kyi sku dang /
204b4(rgyud): gsung dang /thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs byed du//sems can nyon mongs sdang byed pas//de phyir nga ni rdo rje che//zhe sdang zhes ni bsgrags pa yin
204b5(rgyud): ngan song 'jigs pa chen po ru//sems can thams cad rmongs byed pas//de phyir 'di ni gti mug ste//rtog pa thub pa mchog yin no//thabs dang shes rab tshul nyid kyis
204b6(rgyud): 'gro ba thams cad dga' byed cing //pad+mo'i tshul tu rab rtogs phyir//de phyir 'dod chags zhes bya'o//bde chen sbyin pa'i sbyin gyis ni//sems can thams cad nga rgyal skyed//
204b7(rgyud): na mkha'i bde ba bsdus pa'i phyir//de phyir mkha' chen nga rgyal yin//ro la sogs pa'i mnyam sbyor bas//phrag dag rdo rje gdon mi za//sna tshogs pad+mo rab 'jug phyir//
205a1(rgyud): de yi phyir ni sna tshogs che//'dod chags bral ba dga' med phyir//bdag ni rab dgyes sbas pa che//'dod pa ma gtogs bde byud med //ded che 'dod
205a2(rgyud): par yin no//'dod chags med par byang chub med//byang chub med na'ang 'dod tshogs med//sdig pa'i nang na chags bral te//sangs rgyas bde mchog mnyes byed pas//
205a3(rgyud): 'dod chags 'dod las bde byed kyi//bde ba mchog tu rmad 'byung 'gyur//byang chub sems med bde byed gzhan//'jig rten gsum po 'dir med do//thams cad byang
205a4(rgyud): chub sems ngo bo//bde ba kun gyis tshim par 'gyur//be zhes pa ni rdo rjer bshad//d+hi zhes pa ni gzungs ma'i mchog/ci zhes pa ni zag par bshad//ta zhes pa ni
205a5(rgyud): bde ba che//mchod pa med pas bde byed med//badra ba med pas mgu ba med//mgu bas dngos grub thob par 'gyur//grub na bde byed rtag pa yi//phyag na rdo rje bde ba
205a6(rgyud): chetshe//'dod pa'i bde bas mchod byed cing //tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur//bde ba kun gyis gzhir gyur pa'i//chos kyi dbyings ni rnam par 'dzin//rdo rje 'dzin phyir//
205a7(rgyud): gzungs ma yin//hI zhes pa ni pad+mo 'dzin//'di dang mnyam par sbyor ba yi//yi ge myur du 'grub par 'gyur//'dod pa lnga yau yon tan kun//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi
205b1(rgyud): sprul pa ste//sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin//mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i longs spyod do//de phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga//de yis bsnyen na grub par 'gyur//sngags kyi sgyu
205b2(rgyud): dpal dang ldan//dbang phyug mchog gis sngags rgyal lo//rdo rje sems kyi thugs las skyes//mtshan can mchog tu sbas par bshad//de dang mnyam du sbyor blo yis//
205b3(rgyud): mchog gi dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur//pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba//dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub par byed//blo ldan de ru zhugs gyur na'o//dam tshig spras pa tshogs kyi
205b4(rgyud): rnams//dri chu byang chub dmar po'i mchog/sha chen sbrang rtsi mor nyid kyis//lus la kun tu khyab gnas te//de yi phyir ni dam tshig che//dam tshig 'di yis dngos grub
205b5(rgyud): ste/dam tshig yi ger ldan pa yis//sbyor ces sbrang dang bskyed byas ni//bza' ba dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur//de nas pha rol phyin ma kun//pad+mo'i gzigs pa rgyas pa
205b6(rgyud): yaM//'dzum bcas g.yon nas gar mdzad cing //rtag pa la ni yang gsol ba//rigs ni rnam pa du ru bstan//ji ltar sbas pa gsum zhes bgyi//sna tshogs chen po de dang /
205b7(rgyud): kun//bde la gnas pas bshad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba chen po zhes bya
206a1(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa banugs te/de nyid kyi su dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog du gas dra ba phyi rol tu
206a2(rgyud): byin ma'i de kho na nyid rab tu phyung //nga nyid sbyor ba bcom ldan 'das//rdo rje sems dpe'i don chen sbyin//rigs kyi khyad par lnga rnams kyis//spyod bcis mi spyod rnams
206a3(rgyud): lo rol//rtag pa mi bskyod rin chen mchog/'jig dbang gdon mi za grub rnams//rigs ni rnam pa brgyar bstan to//mdo ru bsdus na rnam pa lnga//lus dang dag dang yid
206a4(rgyud): rnams kyis//khyad par theg pa rnam pa gsum//de nyid gsum po rdo rje mnga'//bde ba'i gnas la rol pa mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
206a5(rgyud): cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur tA/rang gi sdom pa gso lnga ba 'debs so//sdom pa dngos grub kun sbyin pa//brtul zhugs dka'i thub sngags mkhyen gyi//dam tshig
206a6(rgyud): mchog tu snang pa'i rnams//bcom+b+ha ldan gyi stong ba nyid kyis gsungs//de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu byung ba mchog tu dgyes pa'i bang bra la mngon par chags pas
206a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen te/zhal rab tu bzha pas rgyas nas nyid kyi sku dang /gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo //sku dang /
206b1(rgyud): sang dang thugs smras pas//nan tAn du ni bsnyung bar bya//bsrungs pa yis ni bsod nams che//dngos grub shin tu skye bar 'gyur//de ni 'di yis rgya che ba'o//yid kyi
206b2(rgyud): dog dbyings chen gyi//phyag rgya bcings la sogs pas btab//sbas pa'i sku ni rab bsgrub bya//rdo rje gsung du rabo sbyor bas//chos kyi ngo bo phyag rgya brjod//ngag sbas
206b3(rgyud): bribrasang bar brjod pa ni//da ro spongs pa rdo rje'i gsung //rang sems rab tu 'bigs pa yi so//zla ba rdo rje rnam par sgom//rang bzhin gsum+b+ha po gcig tu sgom//'di ni
206b4(rgyud): yid sbas chen po yin//'di ni de nyid rgya chen mchog/rgyun tu sgom pa rnams byas te//gsum bsgoms pas ni 'grub par 'gyur//gnan min rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs//
206b5(rgyud): sbas gsum la sogs cho ga yis//phyag rgya thams cad rgyas btab ste//de bos nun tan thams cad kyi//sbas gsum rnam par sba bar bya//rdo rje mchog 'dzin chen po
206b6(rgyud): dang //gtso bo chen pos byin gyis rlob//blon po grang gis 'das byas ni//rdo rje 'dzin pa skad cig 'jig/sems dadang chen pa bral 'gyur na//ngan song gsum du yang
206b7(rgyud): dang pang //ji tsam namakho'i dkyil 'khor ba//shin tu mi bzad smin par 'gyur//de nas dam tshig de dag kun//rdo rje 'dzin la mgu gyur te//'jam po'i phyad gis
207a1(rgyud): gar mdzad cing //g.yon gyis phyag byas slar gsol ba//par dbang rnams snom par gar mdzad cing //mtha' yas phyug ni bcu pa'i bsgyings pa las/
207a2(rgyud): pad+ma'i lo ma 'jam po brgyad phye nas//gnyis min bde bar rdo rje 'jog mdzad de//sbas pa de nyid mi mnyam sad par gyur//rdo rje 'dam skyes zla ba yang dge 'du//thabs
207a3(rgyud): dang shes rab dgyes pa bde byed sogs//bde gshegs rnams kyi sbas pa nyid kyis shod//sbyor dang sbyor ma yang dag sbyor//zhi ba'i thal mo mchog tu bde//'dod pa
207a4(rgyud): lnga yi yon tan 'grub//sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o//de nas bcom ldan dam tshig rgyal//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che//de nyid sbas pa bskul ba yis//
207a5(rgyud): sdes pa ma lus 'chad par mdzad//rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas//cho gar ldan pas ngag dbang poskur//bde bar 'dod pa'i slob dpon gyis//de nyid 'di ni de las bstan
207a6(rgyud): 'di la khrus med nges pa med//dka' thub mod de dka' bo 'a med//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//nga nyid sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur//lus dang ngag sems//
207a7(rgyud): rdo rje yi//rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur//rdo rje dbab pa skyes 'gyur na//ji tsam 'dod par na mkhor 'phur//snying khar rdo rje khu tshur bcings//rdo rje lta bas rnam
207b1(rgyud): bltas te//dgyes pa'i tshul gyis bsnyen byas na//rdo rje sems dpa' skad cig 'gyur//rnam sgog dgyes pa'i rnam gnon pas//rab dgyes sar ni 'gro byed de//sangs
207b2(rgyud): rgyus bde ba chen po dang //grub pa yis kyang mchod byed cing //rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyu che mchog/'gyid pa'i longs pas gar byed pas//bde byed zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing //las
207b3(rgyud): kyi khyad par la sogs gnon//sbas pa'i gar gyis gar byas pa//sbas pa sbyor ba'o bdag nyid 'grub/sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gar byed cing //lag pa mang po rnam bsgyur
207b4(rgyud): dang rdo tAphyir brkyang dbyings su ldan pa dang //khro bar dri med lta ba yis//gdul dka' gnod pa 'jigs byed pa'i//'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal 'gyur//me 'bar nyi ma
207b5(rgyud): dbus nyid du//khro bo hU~M mdzad sgri ma byas na//myur du 'jig rten don sgrub phyir//'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal 'gyur//lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor bas//su rA ta ste/
207b6(rgyud): zhes smra zhing //ha ra thig le tshul sbyar na//rab dgyes de ma thag tu 'gyur//rab dgyes mchog tu brtag pa yi//sa chen rnal 'byor 'gro 'gyur te//lha mo bzhi da
207b7(rgyud): 'gro gas pa yi//sems can rnams kyi don kun byed//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bde ba chen po la phyag bzhes nas gsol pa//thal mo yang
208a1(rgyud): dag stur+ya b+has+yA te//phyag rgyu de nyid nyid kyis shod//rdo rje mchog la gsol ba 'debs//byang bya'i bdag nyid mchod par shod//gzugs dang s+thA dang /
208a2(rgyud): dri che dang //ro dang reg pa yod 'odra ba//thugs rje chen pos bsgrubs pA yis//dpa' bo chen po nyid kyis shod//de nas bcom ldan pade byed tshe//rdo rje sems
208a3(rgyud): dpa' bdag po che//byug rgyu bcing smra pa bde ba che//de nyid ma cho ga ni bshad par mdzad//dang po sa kyi phyag rgya ste//gnyis bya dem tshig phyag rgya yin//gsum
208a4(rgyud): pU byug rgya chen po ste//na pa las kyi phyag rgyu ba nga //de nas su gsung dathugs do rje//de ltar 'gyid bzhin paskum //sgra tshogs ye shes rjes su dag/
208a5(rgyud): tshogs tshon pos 'chad par mdzad//rtog pa'i sku ni ser po ste//mi'ispyod rdo rje dkar po yin//na mkha'i snying po mthing ka tshe//tshe dpag med pa pad+mo dmar//
208a6(rgyud): sna tshogs kha dag rgyu rgyu mchog/'od zer phreng bu rmed byung ba'i//gdon mi ze ba rdo rje che//don chen byed pa bsam par bya//rang rang rigs kyi gnas nyid du//myur
208a7(rgyud): du na mkha' 'gro byed cing //rigs kyi lha mo bzhi rnams kyis//rol pa dang ni mchod par byed//sna tshogs sbyor ba bde tsho ba'i//lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor ba/
208b1(rgyud): sbyor bdag bsgoms byas na//rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid 'gyur//rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog/rdo rje lnga sogs gdan bzhugs par//rang gi 'khor lo mchog/
208b2(rgyud): go rgyan//rang gi phyag rgyar gnas par bsam//pad+mo'i gdan gyi tshul gyis ni//brtse dang ldan pas sgom byas te//snying po sgras don gar byas pas//sbas pa che la bde byed
208b3(rgyud): nan 'gying ba'i bde bar ldan pa yi//rdo rje chen po de 'grub ste//sna tshogs dkyil 'khor rab nye ba//sna tshogs chen po 'gro bar 'gyur//bde ba chen po thams cad 'grub/
208b4(rgyud): pa'i sbyor ba chen po'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgyu rab tu rgyas pa'o//de nas phyug rgya bcings bshad de//rtag la sogs pa'i de kho ni//glang gis myur du bcings pa yin
208b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas dngos grub bde cher 'gro/thobs ni g.yas kyi logasu bya//de bzhin shes rab g.yon par te//zhi ba'i thal mo gsum nyid kyi//sbyor ba'i tshul gyis bsdu bar byed/
208b6(rgyud): sor mo thams cad bar bar du//mnyam du sbyor bas khyad par sprin//rdo rje yi ni thal mo 'dis//sangs rgyas thams cad nyid du sgrub//'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang //na mkha'i
208b7(rgyud): snying po'i gnas su 'gro/'di nyid shin tu bcings po yi//gsum du sbyor bas mchod pa bya//de nyid las ni sor mo kun//kun tu bskum te bcings par bya//rdo rje'i bcings pa
209a1(rgyud): 6/bsdus pa //brjod ba ldan par rnam bsgyurato//deny-i sgrom po rab bcug nus//khro ma'i rdzu mo rab tu dbyug+sa/'a rdo rje rigs kyi baN+Ding dzad+hA ra T+Ta/
209a2(rgyud): dpa' nyid 'grub byed//de bzhin bcing pA rnam bzhag ste//sbom po khro mo'i rtse mo sbyar//'di ni bcing ba bcing ba che//na ma khar 'gro la bar sgrub//de nyid bcing bas
209a3(rgyud): bcing byas te//khro mo gnyis po mtshan bzhin du//rtse mo sprad de dgug bya ba//bcing pa 'di yis pad+mo sgrub//bcing pa de nyid rab tu sgom//badre ba bcug nas bsdam byas te//
209a4(rgyud): las kyi bcing ba sbyor ba yis//don yod mchog gi rigs su 'gro/bcing ba de nyid bcing byas te//sbom dang khro ba'i rtswa mo sbyar//g.yas pa'i sbom po rdo rje yis//de mi
209a5(rgyud): dbus su bcug bye ba//de 'di bcing ba chen po ste//rab dgyes ro ni sgrub byed pa//gang gis bcings pa tsam gyis ni//rab tu dgyes pa nyid 'thob bo//dngos grub tham
209a6(rgyud): cad bde ba che//de yis 'di tshe 'thob 'gyur te//phyag rgya bcing ba'i cho ga yis//sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu gnas//phyag rgya bcing ba'i ye shes rnam par rgyas pa'o//
209a7(rgyud): bcing ba lnga yi cho ga yis//gcig gis rnal 'byor po sgrub mi bya//drug ni sbyor bas sbyor byas na//de ma thag tu rab dgyes 'gyur//bcing ba lnga yi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin
209b1(rgyud): rludru glu g+sa N+DI klog/na na la//rgyu / pa ts+tshe hU~M kha TI m+b+hi/nas pas la rig hrIts+tsha/sa rnaMs pa sa
209b2(rgyud): 'di las mi mdu 'thub pa g+hu /de bzhin skye ba g.yin pa ban ga/ga dgu ya ts+tsha ba~Mts+tshi /'di mas na chen sbrul ldan sogs//namakha' nye bar 'gru
209b3(rgyud): pabar+ya 'gyur//de bzhin g.yon pa snying khar bra zhig/g.yas kyang bzhag ste ting 'dzin gnas//di yis tshe dpag med pa nyid//tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur//de bzhin
209b4(rgyud): glagro nu skyed lta smad//lkug byu ga lus pa mi 'jigs sbyin//jigs lus ra b+hU d+h+r-ig+sa/TI g+he bag drug pa 'jigs //'di 'i sa thams cad 'phrog byer byed//
209b5(rgyud): miza bI'i nges pa yis//de ni chen po'i chen por 'gyur//rdo hU~M bcing ba gnyis byas te//g.yon pa gyi yo du spying bar bya//g.yas ni snying khyer gzung byas te//brjod pos rlub
209b6(rgyud): band cing gnas//bde ba chen po thabs gnas pas//'di yis rabad gyes nyid 'gyur te//bdi mchog nyid du spru po'o//tshe 'di nyid la ji tshom med//de bzhin pacing /
210a1(rgyud): bcing byas te//sbyor dang ldan pas bstan par bya//sbom po'i rtse mo pad+mo'i gnas//g.yon gyi khro ma'i rtse mor sbyar//g.yas pa yi ni sgom pa yis//
210a2(rgyud): mngon sum rdo rjer byas pa yis//bcug nas bde ba spyod bya zhing //skad cig skad cig bsdam par bya//de 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//dgyes pa dgyes mchog
210a3(rgyud): sgrub pa po//'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang //yang dog rdo rje dgyes pa 'thob//rab dgyes bde mchog longs spyod kyi//btsun mo dngos grub nyid du 'gyur//g.yas ni
210a4(rgyud): mi tshan mas drang byas te//lcags kyu'i tshul du bzhag par bya//rdo rje 'dod ma lcags kyu'i ste//rdo rje 'dod byang btsun mo yi//dang por 'dren pa de nyid bzhig/tha marat+na ra
210a5(rgyud): thig ler bya//rdo rje dgyes pa bde 'thob byed//ming ni dbus su bri bar bya//'di yis snying khar byas pa yis//de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog 'gro/phyag rgya bzhi dang
210a6(rgyud): 'grogs pa yis//lus 'dis che 'di 'grub par 'gyur//rab dgyes sbyor bar yang dag ldan//phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam 'grogs shing //rdo rje 'gying la sogaso slo
210a7(rgyud): pas//rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis//rab dgyes la sogs ma lus pa//rab dgyes rel po sgyings ma yis//skad cig nyid du 'dren par 'gyur//de bzhin sgom rma
210b1(rgyud): rtse mor sbyar//snying rje chen po dar bzhag pa//skal pa chen po rdo rje spyan//de nyid don kun stan byud ma//'di ni yang dag bcings pa yis//rdo rje rtag pa'i spyan du 'gyur//yod pa
210b2(rgyud): med pa rnam spangs pa//dngos po thams cad mthong bar 'gyur//rdo rje'i thal mo bstan bya ste//khro mo rtse mo zlum po yis//mthon por mtshan dang 'dra byas te//sbom por rje
210b3(rgyud): rje bstan pa che//de 'di bcom ldan 'das ma mchog/rdo rje pad+mo'i bde 'thob byed//rnal 'byor 'di na bcings pa yis//sbas pa chen po'i dgyes pa 'thob//de nas lha mo chen me
210b4(rgyud): dgo spros pa che bas gar mdzad cing //rdo rje bde byed bdag nyid la//bdud dang bcas pas phyog byas te//chos kyi yi ge thabs gnas nas//de nyid chos kyi gsol ba 'debs/
210b5(rgyud): chos kyi phyag rgya bde ba che//rdo rje bcom ldan bshad du gsol//sgrub pa pos ni rab bsgrims no//gang gis lha ni 'grub par 'gyur//gang gis myur du byin rlabs pas/
210b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub ste//bde byed gnyis kyis sgro che ba//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas 'jug 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das lha mo thams cad kyis gsol
210b7(rgyud): btab pa mkhyen nas/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs sbas pa las chos kyi phyag rgya chen po'i tshig 'di phyung ngo //bcu gsum bdag nyid 'dren pa ste//thig le lhar ni yang
211a1(rgyud): dadu ljon// mAr+yAN rA thaib+h+r-i l-iM g+han s+ho//rab tu dkris pa rdo rje dgyes//snying da drug rgyu 'ang byas nas//dga' byed lhan cig rgyur pyod cing //rlu
211a2(rgyud): dang mi spyod 'grub 'gyur te//rnal 'byor bde 'i chen por 'gro//de bzhin 'dren pa thog mar bya//rdo rje 'dod pa kyi blo mchog/har thig po yang dag ldan//cho gnyis gsum
211a3(rgyud): pa sbyar byos pa//'di ni snying khar ba zhig byas nas//bde bar na mkhar 'gro 'gyur te//bde ba shin tu rtag pa yi//'di yis mchog tu dngos grub bo//'dren pa de nyid
211a4(rgyud): thob mo ro bzhan/ltos m+b+has zhes pa hUM dang ldan//sgrus pa chen po rdo rje spyan//dbus su bskul bas 'grub par 'gyur//'phrul gyi spyan lnga nor che ba//'di yis rnal 'byor
211a5(rgyud): 'grub 'gyur te//rdo rje byang chub dgyes pa che//sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur//dang por 'dren pa de nyid bzhad//thi mar ha raM thig ler+ya bya//rdo rje dgyes pa bang
211a6(rgyud): 'thib byed//ming ni dbus su bri bar bya//'di yis snying khar byas pa yis//de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog 'gro/phyag rgya bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis//lus 'dis 'di
211a7(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur//rab dgyes sbyor bar yang dag zhon//phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam 'grogs shing //rdo rje 'gying la sogs spyod pas//bcom ldan 'dod ma 'grub par 'gyur/
211b1(rgyud): med lan don sa shes kyi phyug rgyu / nas cos ldan sbyong ba na//rnyogs ma mod po mchog/ga pa thams cad grang phyu /d+harmAn po da 'gyur
211b2(rgyud): /mdun du thog ma'i m+b+ha nyid du//rdo rje hU~M mdzud ny+tsi mi 'bar//nyi ma bcu gnyis gaN+DI brjid de//me 'byung rab tu 'ber bar ldan//'khor gyi 'khor lo de drug kun//
211b3(rgyud): khyo ni rgyuni mchog gis//bi rgyun te gdug pa'i tshogs rnams la//de ni yang dag rol pa mdzad//khro chen mchog 'dul phyeg rgyu 'di//sngags ni rang gi snying khor sgo ni//
211b4(rgyud): sgo mo'i bu mos mdun du bskor//khyi ma chen mo de 'grub bo//'di yis gdug pa thams cad rnams//hU~M skyes myur du brgyu bri bar 'gyur//de dge gdug pa ga pa che/
211b5(rgyud): 'jigs shing 'khrugs te rab tu 'jig/snabs shig+h+ra stobs shrI ces skye zhing //rdo rje gci la dran par byed//phyug rgyu 'di ni mnyam par gzhag/'gro ba thams ca dang
211b6(rgyud): byaste//la sa ma tshig thams cad sgrub pa pas/ rnams ni zhig pa /sbyid de ldan pas 'bum pa rnas te//las rnams thams cad byed pa na//gdon mi za ba dran
211b7(rgyud): 'gyur te//rdo rje sems dpa'ang sgrub par nus//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems depas gsungs so//khro bo'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so//de nas sangs rgyas che de dag
212a1(rgyud): /sangs rgyas nyid skyes thams cad mchog/gzugs ma rnal 'byor ma thams cad//rang gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs//phan tshun bde ba ldan pa yi//
212a2(rgyud): dga' bas 'khor rnams 'phags 'gyur te//rang gi bde byed skyes par 'brel//stsal pa chen mo rtsen par byed//de nus bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen pos
212a3(rgyud): rarlung gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs rnams la yang dang yang du gzigs te skye de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dren pa'i rig ma'i snying po 'dis sdud pa mdzad do//
212a4(rgyud): oM badz+ra ang+gu sha/du ru du ru/e h+yaM hi kaD+D+h+ya bi kaD+D+h+ya sar+b+ban+ma R+Sha ta tsakra sany+tsa ya/badz+ra ang+ku sha hUM phaT/'di yi phyag rgya rdo rje yi//bcings pa gnyis ni dam byas
212a5(rgyud): te/rdo rje khro mo dgrol bar bya//rdo rje'i khro ba rab sbyar ba//rno rje'i kyo ba zhes bya'o//'gro dang ri bo sems can rnams//phyag rgya 'di yis kun bkug s+ho//
212a6(rgyud): 'dod pas 'gying ba'i yid rtag rnams//mi yi bu mo smos ci dgos//rdo rje bcings pa mnyam gzhag ste//g.yon gyi steng du de bzhin bzhag/dbus su sbom mo
212a7(rgyud): bzhag par bya//rdo rje 'dren pa gzi brjid che//rdo rje bcing ba bsdam byas te//rdo rje sbom mo rtse mo spyad//bdag ni rdo rje zhes sgom zhing //bcing ba de ni dgrol bar bya//
212b1(rgyud): da btsong ba ngam byas te//dbang dang chung ngun rtsa pa'i mtshams//rlu sgrom mo nus rgyasate//rab dmos bdag spyod bskyod bdug//rnams rdo rje mchog gnyis bsgyud//mdud
212b2(rgyud): pa'i tshul du sbyar por bya//gzhug pa dang ni 'dren pa'i mchog/'di yis thams cad dngos grub pas//rnal 'byor phyag rgyu 'di nyid kyis//drangs te bcug nas ba tsang byas/
212b3(rgyud): dbang du byas nas bskyob par bya//de nas de dag thams cad dwangs bcug bcings dga' ba bskyed na/rang gi rab tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos/rang gi rgyal srid rjes su spyong
212b4(rgyud): nga rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa/sangs rgyas kun gyi tshul gyi tshul chen po//dga' byed zla gsang thig le yi//rab dgyes bdag nyid gsang ba 'di//sems dpa' chen po
212b5(rgyud): khyod kyis zung //de nus gdan las myur bzhongs te//thul mo sbyar te phyag bzhes nas//chos kyi ngo bor tshig smras pa//bde ba chen po bdag gis blangs//rang bde longs spyod
212b6(rgyud): gor byas te//rdo rje tshe yis 'di skad smras//rdo rje chos ni sna tshogs tshe//sna tshogs pad+mo gar rab byed//de nas pha rol phyin de kun//rab dgyes longs spyod gar byed cing /
212b7(rgyud): bde byed chen po'i bdag nyid rje//legs pa zhes pa sbyin byed de//legs legs so bde ba che//legs legs so ye shes che//legs so logaso sna tshogs che//logs
213a1(rgyud): stegs so dkris pan+de//bcom ldan 'das dgyes+yA pA'i thugs kyid skad ces bkur stu m+b+ha nas/pha rol tu phyin ma'i 'khor chen ma dag mngon
213a2(rgyud): par dga' bar gyur to//zla gsad thig le zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs so////lots+tsha ba rin chen bzang pos
213a3(rgyud): bsgyur ba'o//gsung rab don rtogs slob dpon gyis//lhag par bkrol te bstan pa la//ci rigs bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis//sems can sems bde thob par smon//
213a4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/sarba ta thA ta ga ta tA saM gra ha nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra//bod skad du/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
213a5(rgyud): mdo//bam po dang po/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das de
213a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje byin gyis brlabs dang /dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par dang ldan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
213a7(rgyud): rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur ba mnga' bsnyes pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes//
213b1(rgyud): /rnal 'byor chen po'i dbang phyug/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid thugasu chud cing thams cad kyi dgos pa mdzad pa nyid kyis sems can
213b2(rgyud): gyi khams ma lus pa med pa thams cad kyi ra ba thams cad yongs su skyong ba'i phrin las mdzadapa/thugs rje che ba rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag par dus gsum du
213b3(rgyud): bzhugs shing sku dang gsung thugs thams cad rdo rje lta bur gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs shing bsngags bstod pa/nor bu
213b4(rgyud): dang /rin po che chen pos smras pa/kha dog sna tshogs shing gi dril bu btags pa/dar dang /'phan dang /me tog gi phreng ba dang /rnga ma dang /dra ba dang /dra ba phyed ma dang /
213b5(rgyud): zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa'i 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu la 'di lta ste/
213b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang /kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang /na mkha'i snying po dang /rdo rje khu tshur dang /'jam dpal dang /
213b7(rgyud): sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /na mkha'i mdzod dang /bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
214a1(rgyud): dpa' chen po bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtswa dgu dang /gang+gA'i klung gi byed ma s+yAd N+yai de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang thabs gtsug tu bzhugs te//da yang 'a
214a2(rgyud): lhur 'dzam bu'i gling na de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med grangs med pa de dag gi spos kyu trail gyi gang bu bzhin du kun tu grang bar snang ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
214a3(rgyud): r-ire re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa rnams snang ngo //sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na yang chas kyi tshul 'di nyid 'ching ngo ///de nas bcom
214a4(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snong mdzad chen po na mkha'i dbyings thams cing bzhin du rtag par bzhugs shing sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lta bur gyur pa/de 'dzin gshegs
214a5(rgyud): pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pas rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa'/na mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo
214a6(rgyud): rdo rje'i byin gyi ste brlabs las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa nyid kyis thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje chen po'i ye shes
214a7(rgyud): dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i dbang du gyur pa/na mkha'i dbyings thams cad du spros pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas byang chub par gyur/
214b1(rgyud): cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ngo bo nyid dag par nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dag par thugasu chud pa/nA mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i gzugs
214b2(rgyud): thams cad du yang dag par ston pa mkhyen pas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i khams rnams 'dul ba'i spyod pa'i mchog tu gyur cing //de bzhin
214b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' nod cing don yod par mdzad pa nyid kyi thams cad dang mnyam pa med cing bla na med pa'i phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa/de bzhin gshegs
214b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis byang chub chen por sems dpa' brtan pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i tshig dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par
214b5(rgyud): bya ba'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi leg so zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dbang chen por bskur ba
214b6(rgyud): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsum pa'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i dpel dang /
214b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dga' ba'i chos chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab chen/
215a1(rgyud): /ba'i ye shes dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'chung pa dang /de banan
215a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za bar thams cad kyi dgongs pa mdzad pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha shin tu brtan par
215a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis srung zhing bskyang ba'i rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings
215a4(rgyud): pa'i ye shes rnams so//kun bzang rab tu gdon myi za//bdud dang raba~M dgyes gtso bo dang //mkha' skyes shin tu gzi chen dang /rin chen dngal dang 'dzum pa cho//kun tu
215a5(rgyud): gzis pa'i dbang chen dang //'jam dpal dkyil 'khor thams cad dang //mi gsung ba dang thams cad las//brtson 'grus ma rung sA dam du bzung //rdo rje lcags kyu muda'i gan
215a6(rgyud): dang //rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan 'dzum//pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo gsung //las dang go cha 'jigs byed bcas//thog ma tha ma med cing zhing //mu rungs khro ba bzod pa che//gni
215a7(rgyud): sbyin srin po dam pa brten//gzi chen dpa' bo khyab bdag che//u ma'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon//gtogs 'dod rgyal 'dod thub pa che//'jig rten skyong dang mkha' dngas//
215b1(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum dang //'byung tshon sems can+da don rab mdzad//thams cad gu lung tshangs pa dang //'khar dang mya ngan 'da' dang rtag/yang dgu 'tsho dang mchod pa
215b2(rgyud): che//sangs rgyas dag pA theg pa che//srid gsum rtag pa'ang de bzhin no//'jig rten gsum rgyal bde spyod dang //bde spyod mgon po rab 'dul mdzad//rdo rje gtso dang sa rab mchog
215b3(rgyud): ye shes pha rol phyin pa'i tshul//byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar dang //spyad dang de bzhin gshegs pa kun//sangs rgyas don dang sangs rgyas thugs//byang chub kun dang bla na
215b4(rgyud): med//rnam par snong mdzad rgyal dang mgon//rang 'byung gzungs dang dran po dang //sems dpa' tshe dang phyag rgya che//ting 'dzin sangs rgyas phyin las mdzad//yang dag sangs
215b5(rgyud): rgyas kun bdag nyid//sems can rtag don rtogs mdzad pa//sdong po chen po bde ba che//thabs chen dang ni mchog chen mchog/kun gyi mchog dang gnas dbang po//bcom
215b6(rgyud): ldan 'das byang chub chen po'i thugs byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas so//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
215b7(rgyud): sems cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'did dper natil gyi gang bu bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'as te/byang chub sems dpa'
216a1(rgyud): snyoms dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa gang nu ba der gshegs te/byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du
216a2(rgyud): rdzophyogs longs spyod pa'i sgra bstan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang gis phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon par ma
216a3(rgyud): rtogs par dka' ba spyod pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing ji ltar nu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bye sgyum/de nas byang chub
216a4(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bskul bas mi g.yo ba'i ting 'dzin de las bzhengs te/de bzhin gshegs
216a5(rgyud): pa thams cad la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de kho na nyid ji lta bu lags/ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/bka' stsal/
216a6(rgyud): par gsol de skad ces gsol pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsung gcig tu 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu rang gi sems la so sor
216a7(rgyud): rtog cing mnyam par zhog la rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar zlos shing sgrub par gyis shig/oM tsit+ta pra ti bo d+hi ka ro mi/de nas byang chub sems dpa' don
216b1(rgyud): thams cad grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gi snying ka na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur//
216b2(rgyud): gda' ba bdag gis rtog so//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu sems 'di ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na de ni ji ltar spyad sa pa de lta bur
216b3(rgyud): gyur te/dper na ras dkar po chen gyis bsgyur ba bzhin no//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang bzhin gyis 'od ga sel ba'i sems shes pa rgyas par bya ba'i
216b4(rgyud): phyir/oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da yA mi/zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'dis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de byang chub kyi sems bskyed
216b5(rgyud): por gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bkas byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas 'di skad ces gsol to//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta
216b6(rgyud): bur mthong ba gang lagos pa de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du mthong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying pa
216b7(rgyud): sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po khyod kyis mngon du gyur gyis de legs par sgrubs shig/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po de brtan par bya/
217a1(rgyud): ba phyir sngags 'dis rang gi spyod khang+gi zla ba'i dIkyil+yA 'khor la rdo rje'i dAb+h+rings su snyoms shrIg/au tISh+Tha badz+dza/byung chub sems dpas gsol pa/
217a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun tu bzang po'i sems rdo rje 'di sngags 'dis brtan par gyis shig/oM badz+ra At+ma ko ha~M/de nas na mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam
217a3(rgyud): pabapar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dbyings ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis
217a4(rgyud): brlabs kyis sems dpa'i rdo rje der bzhugs so//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa
217a5(rgyud): del rdo rje'i dbyings zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dbyings kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces
217a6(rgyud): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skyon bdag lags par mthong lag so//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
217b1(rgyud): kyisku bka' stsal pA/sems dpa' chen po de lta bas na skyems dpa' rdo rje de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sems sangs rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid rang bzhin gyi sgra grub
217b2(rgyud): 'i sngags 'dis ci dgar zlos la bsgoms shig/oM ya thA sar+b+ba te thA ga ta s+tha thA a haM/de nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i dbye/
217b3(rgyud): kyis bdag nyid dri bzhin gshegs par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te bos nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
217b4(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag byin gyis rlobs la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa de brtan par midzod cig/de nas de skad ces gsol pa dang /
217b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje der bzhugs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings
217b6(rgyud): kyis skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
217b7(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gisal
218a1(rgyud): ba'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs
218a2(rgyud): bya thams cad yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje las byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed/na mkha'i
218a3(rgyud): snying po'i nor bu rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur/kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po chos kyi ye shes ni bskyed/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin
218a4(rgyud): las thams cad la rab tu bzhag nas ri rab kyi rtse mo gleng na ba dang /khong bu rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu'i rin po tsha las byas pa grong na ba der gshegs te byon nas/de bzhin gshegs
218a5(rgyud): bapa rdo rje dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du byin gyis brlabs te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i gdan la zhal kun tu bstan te bzhag par gyur
218a6(rgyud): to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang /de
218a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du so so nas bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs te/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de
