218b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nus mnyam pa nyid du rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir/phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir bzhugaso//
218b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogasu par spangs rgyus nas ring po ma lon pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
218b4(rgyud): kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad na mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i dbang gis dbang bskur bya/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
218b5(rgyud): kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyis dbang po'i chos kyi ye shes dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thamacad nyid kyis gdon mi za
218b6(rgyud): zhing thagos pa med par ston pa/dgongs pa rdzogs pa/yid la re ba yongasu rdzogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas/de bzhin
218b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzung po zhes pa'i dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
218b8(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i rang gi
219a1(rgyud): /thugs kha nas phyung ngo //oM badz+rI sa twa/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kun tu ba
219a2(rgyud): po de nyid do//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur nas byung ste/sems can thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po yang dag par sbyangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/
219a3(rgyud): kyi phyogs phyogs su 'khod do//de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje byung ste/bcom ldan 'das rnam par
219a4(rgyud): snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs su zhugs so//rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu brten pa nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis
219a5(rgyud): brlabs kyis gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas na mkha'i khams thams cad kyi tshad dang mnyam par 'jug pa'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba can rtse mo lnga pa/de bzhin gshegs
219a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/phyag gnyis su
219a7(rgyud): gnas so//de nas rdo rje de las rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bas khyab par byed po rnams byung ngo //
219b1(rgyud): dra 'ang zer de dgag rtsom ltas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyo rdum shon d+hA mA b+hU de bzhin gshegs pan+d+han rmA b+hU rbu b+h+ya ngas du
219b2(rgyud): te khyab pa thams cad dang /nu mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad dang /'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad du de bzhin gau shegs
219b3(rgyud): baM thams cad kyi mnyan pa nyid rje ye shes mngon par byang chub bus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snyoms chen po bskyed pa dang /kun tu bzang po'i spyod
219b4(rgyud): pa sna tshogs grub pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thamaso ts+tshed kyi rigs mnyes par mdzad pa dang /byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang /mdud thams cad 'dula'i
219b5(rgyud): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang /dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ji srid sems can
219b6(rgyud): gyi khams ma lus shing ltas pa med pa rnams yongs su skyob cing thams cad la phan pa dang /byede bar mdzad pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang /
219b7(rgyud): mngon par shes pa dam pa'i dngos grub thob pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi rdzu 'phrul rnams kyi bar du bstan nas rdo rje sems dpa'
220a1(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin ni kun tu bzang po yin pa dang /shin tu brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu
220a2(rgyud): bzang po'i skur gyur te/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas chud du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//e ma'o bdag ni rang byung ba'i//kun tu bzang po
220a3(rgyud): sems dpa' brtan/de ni brtan phyir lus min yang //sems dpa'i lus su gyur pa yin//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i sku bcom ldan 'das
220a4(rgyud): kyi thugs kla nas byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sdu na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan
220a5(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul
220a6(rgyud): khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /sems can gyi don bya ba dang /thabs
220a7(rgyud): chen po/stobs dang /brtson 'grus dang /ye shes chen po'i dam tshig dang /sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang thams
220b1(rgyud): cad kyi dbang por bya ba dang /thams cad kyi byed pa dang /yod bde ba myong ba bya ba nas/ji spyod de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /mngon par
220b2(rgyud): shes pa rnams bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs par 'grub pa'i mchog thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
220b3(rgyud): kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang /dar dpyad kyi dbang
220b4(rgyud): gos dbang bskur nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub po'i rdo rje de de'i lag par byin no//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lag ni rdo rje lagan
220b5(rgyud): zhes ming gi dbang gis dbang bsgyur ro//de nus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje phyag g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings par bzhugs//phyag g.yas pa rje
220b6(rgyud): thugs kar gastor zhing 'phen pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing tshed du brjod pas 'di ched du brjod do//sangs rgyas kun gyi grub pa yi//rdo rje bla na med pa 'di//bdog ste bdag gri ldeg/
220b7(rgyud): tu byin/rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las 'byung ba'i sems dpa' byin gyis
221a1(rgyud): brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nasra de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa
221a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //badz+ra rA dza/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das
221a3(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje de nyid de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lcags kyu chen por gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang ma dzod kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu
221a4(rgyud): 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje lcags kyu chen po'i dbyings su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so//de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i dbyibs chen po de las 'jig
221a5(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba la sregs pa
221a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu godon mi za ba'i rgyal po nyid yin pa dang /shin tu brten pa'i phyir gcig
221a7(rgyud): tu 'dres par gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' chen po shin tu gdon mi za ba'i lus su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te rdo tshad du
221b1(rgyud): brjod pa 'di chod du brjod do//a thar rdo rje lus byung ba'o//stugs kyu das+yo p+na'i rgyal po dag/gang phyir kun tu sangs rgyas kyu'o//grub phyir kun nas spyan 'dron no//de nas/
221b2(rgyud): byu chub sems depa'i sems dpa' chen pa shin tu gdon mi zla ba'i rgyal po'i sgra di bcom ldan 'das kyi thugasa~M k+Sha nas b+hU /de bzhin go shegs pa thams cad kyi rgal sa
221b3(rgyud): phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam
221b4(rgyud): tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'drin pa'i dam tshig dang /sems can+da gyi khams ma lus shIng lus
221b5(rgyud): pa med pa thams cing dgug pa dang /thams cad kyi bde ba dang /yid bying ba myong bar bya ba nas/de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad 'dra ba'i byin gyis brlabs dam pa'i dngos//
221b6(rgyud): grub kyi bar gyi phyir rdo rje lcags kyu de byang chub sems dpa' gdon mo za ba'i rgyu la po de'i lag par de bzhin du byin no//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje 'gug
221b7(rgyud): pab rdo rje 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i dbang gis dbang bskur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'gugs pa rdo rje lcags kyu des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
222a1(rgyud): spyan 'dren nong tsha du ban+d+had pa dang rmad du brjod do//sangs rgyas kun gyis rdo rje yi//ye shes bla na med pa 'di//sangs rgyas kun gyi don grub phyir/
222a2(rgyud): kun nas spyan drangs dam pa'o//de nas yid bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i dam tshig lasgra 'byung po'i sems dpa'i byin gyis
222a3(rgyud): brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pare zhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs
222a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kyi nas phyung ngo //badz+ra rA gu/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thog pa 'di ni bcom ldan
222a5(rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/de bzhin gshegs po thams cad kyi me tog gi mdar gyur nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te
222a6(rgyud): gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje'i mnga' chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/phyag gnyis su gnas so//de nas rdo rje'i mda'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams
222a7(rgyud): cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa dang /sangs
222b1(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni shin tu bdud byed pa nyid dang /rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas
222b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bye de'i sbyor gyur te/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//e na
222b3(rgyud): bdag gi rang bzhin dag/rang byung blo dag dgyes byed na//'dod chags bral rnam dag bya'i phyir//'dod chags kyis ni 'dul bar byed//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po
222b4(rgyud): bdud kyi lus de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing
222b5(rgyud): bzhugs par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
222b6(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdud kyi rdo rje'i dam tshigs dang /sems can gyi khams mA lus shing lus pa med pa rnams mgu bar bya ba dang /thams cad kyi bde ba dang /
222b7(rgyud): ying bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi mchog thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje'i mda' de byang chub
223a1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no//dra nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i gzhu rdo rje gzhu/
223a2(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ming gI dbang gis dpyang bskur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje ri gzhu zhes bya bas rdo rje'i mda' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams/
223a3(rgyud): cad la bdud byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi//ye shes 'di ni dri mo med//'dod chags kyis ni chags bral bcom//
223a4(rgyud): bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig les byung ba'i
223a5(rgyud): sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' ba'i ngam tshig ces bya
223a6(rgyud): ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //badz+ra sA d+hu/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa
223a7(rgyud): 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/legs so zhes bya bar gyur no sa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/gcig tu 'dres par gyur
223b1(rgyud): nasu rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs su gyur to phyag gnyis su gnas so//de nas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam
223b2(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegaso pa'i sku rnams byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis log so zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rnams byas
223b3(rgyud): nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni shin tu dga' bar byed pa dang /rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i
223b4(rgyud): lus su gyur te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugos la gnas nas/ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//e ma'o thams cad mkhyen
223b5(rgyud): kun gyi//legs sbyin nang na bdag mchog pas/rnam rtog bral ba de dag gi/nges par dgyes pa bskyed pa yin//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal
223b6(rgyud): po'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla bo'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur
223b7(rgyud): to//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs
224a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi rab tu dgyes pa bla nu med pa'i ye shes kyi dam tshig dang /sems can gyi khams mu lus shing lus pa med sems can thams cad mgu
224a2(rgyud): bar bya ba dang /thams cad bde ba dang /yid bde lta mong bar bya ba nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i ro bla na med pa grub pa dam pa thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu
224a3(rgyud): de dag gi phyir rdo rje dgyes pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin ni//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams

224a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la legs so zhes bya bas rab tu dgyes par byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//sangs rgyas kun gyi legs sbyin pa//'di ni rab tu
224a6(rgyud): 'jug byed pas//rdo rje thams cad dgyes par byed//lha rdzas dgyes pA spel ba'o//byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drad pa'i
224a7(rgyud): dam tshig dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes dang /dgyes pa chen po dang /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dom tshig chen
224b1(rgyud): po'i sems dpa'o//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyis ba rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
224b2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thug
224b3(rgyud): ka nas phyung ngo //badz+rA ran+d+ha/de bzhin gu shugs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma theg pa 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad na mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi
224b4(rgyud): ye shes shin tu gtogs pa yin pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/na mkha' thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur nas byung ngo //nam mkha' thams cad kyi 'od zer
224b5(rgyud): de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas thams cad na mkha'i dbyings lta bur gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs
224b6(rgyud): kyis na mkha'i dbyings de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs nas/rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir
224b7(rgyud): yang na mkha'i khams thams cad las byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi mnyam par 'jug pa'i ched tsam gyi rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyibasu gyur nas de bzhin
225a1(rgyud): /gshegs pa'i phyag gnyis su bzlas so//de nas rdo rje rin pa tshwa'i hU~MHsa da las 'jug rten khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang /mnyam pa

225a3(rgyud): 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni namakha'i khams thams cad kyi snying po las shin tu byung ba dang /rab tu bstan/
225a4(rgyud): papo'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po'i sgrar gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nasr-i

225a6(rgyud): bdag yin no//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po'i lus de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smanA snga

225b1(rgyud): che' rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lnga snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rtogs par bya ba'i dam+b+ha tshig dang /sems can gyi

225b3(rgyud): don phun sum tshogs pa grub pa thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor bar rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i dbang gis
225b4(rgyud): dbang bskur nas lag tu rdo rje nor bu do byin no//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro//de nas bya
225b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje skyed pos rdo rje'i nor bu de rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'jog cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//sangs rgyas kun gyi sems ba'i

225b7(rgyud): gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyonas pa re zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
226a1(rgyud): cad kyi 'du bor gyi dam tshig ces bya ba btsun gyu shegs pa thams spyod b+h+yo 'di rung gi blugs klu nas //bad+hUt+tadz+dza/da nas de bzhin
226a2(rgyud): 'ashegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thog pa' ma ldan 'das pa ni rdo rje /nyi ma'i dkyil 'kho n+te mA b+hAr nas ma ldan d+hA s+'u d+ham+b+ha nga
226a3(rgyud): mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo nyi me'i dbyings su gyur te/bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su phranas so//de nas rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil

226a5(rgyud): /'od zer 'gyed pa la sogs pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu gzi brjid cha
226a6(rgyud): ba nyid dang /rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brji de chen po'i skyer gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad

226b1(rgyud): na pa rnams dang sbyir byed pa//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjod de'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thAm+b+ha/

226b4(rgyud): gyi khams ma lus pa med pa rnams kyi gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa dang /thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi

228b1(rgyud): par gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sti thugs kar zhugs te/gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibs su gyur nas phyag gnyis su

230a6(rgyud): ras gzigs kyi lus de bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas

230b1(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tI 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i dam tshig dang /sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus
230b2(rgyud): pa med pa rnams kyi bdag dang gzhan rnam par dag par bya ba dang thams cad kyi bde ba dang /yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi chos kyi ye shes dang /
230b3(rgyud): mngon par shes pa drug thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ros gzigs kyi dbang po dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nyid drang /
230b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dbang gis dbang bskud nas de'i lag tu rdo rje pad+me de byin no//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i spyan rdo rje'i spyan
230b5(rgyud): zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyi rdo rje'i pad+mo'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pas 'dod chags rnam par dag cing ma chags
230b6(rgyud): pa'i ngo bo nyid du gzigs shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi//de kho na nyid rtogs pa 'di//bdag skye bdag gi lag tu byin//chos
230b7(rgyud): la chos ni gnas par 'gyur//de nis yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi dam tshig las byung ba chos kyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes
231a1(rgyud): /bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes chen po'i dam chog ces bya bra de bzhin pa
231a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kA nas phyung ngo //badz+rA tIk+Sh+Na/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs lus byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan
231a3(rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/shes rab kyi ye shes kyi ral grir gyur te/byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/gcig tu 'dres
231a4(rgyud): par gyur nas rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so//de nas rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams
231a5(rgyud): cad kyi rdul shin tu phramAM dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes la sogs pa dang //
231a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rnams byas te/rdo rje sems dpe'i ting 'dzin ni shin tu 'jam pa'i dpal yin pa dang /shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres
231a7(rgyud): par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i skur gyur te/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa
231b1(rgyud): 'di chud du brjod do//oM ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/'dzum dbyangs bdag ni yin par dgongs//gang phyir shes rab gzugs med kyang //dbyangs nyid du ni dmigs
231b2(rgyud): pa yin//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi
231b3(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes kyi
231b4(rgyud): dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa'i dam tshig dang /sems can gyi
231b5(rgyud): khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad bcas pa dang /thams cad kyi bde ba dang /yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
231b6(rgyud): cad kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba'i shes rab dam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje'i ral gri de byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam
231b7(rgyud): dpal gyi lag tu de bzhin du byin no//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i blo rdo rje'i blo zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro//de nas byang chub
232a1(rgyud): /sems dpa' chun po rdo rje'i blos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje'i ral gri des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'drebs shing ched du
232a2(rgyud): brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul//dgra rnams thams cad gcod byed cing //sdig pa thams cid
232a3(rgyud): 'jom pa'i mchog/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dam tshig
232a4(rgyud): las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
232a5(rgyud): snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //badz+ra he tu/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs lngas byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de
232a6(rgyud): nyid de/rdo rje 'khor lor gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbyibs su gyur
232a7(rgyud): te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so//de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de
232b1(rgyud): zhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku rnams byung ste/sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul cho 'phrul rnams 'jig
232b2(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad du byis te/rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin pa dang /shin tu brtan po'i phyir gci
232b3(rgyud): tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i skur gyur te/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rgyo thugs la
232b4(rgyud): gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//rdo rje dam po chos can gyi//oM mA'o rdo rje 'khor lo bdag/gang phyir sems bskyed cim gyis kyang //chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
232b5(rgyud): bar 'gyur//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa
232b6(rgyud): rnams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nor cing bzhugs par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
232b7(rgyud): kyi 'khor mo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig dang /sems can gyi khams
233a1(rgyud): shong smras pa spyod pad+ma gyu nga byung ma ga pa la ra ma /rnanas na /pa nga na rgyu da na ga
233a2(rgyud): pa thams du kyis dam pa'i chos kyi kha lo bar ba dam po grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu da //smye byed rdo rje byung chub sem sna pa'i chen pa sems
233a3(rgyud): brag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i lag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje snying po rdo rje snying po zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dpung bskur ro//badz+haiM
233a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rdo rje 'khor lo des de bzhin gle shegs pa thams cad phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'jog ci de rgyud du brjod pa 'di
233a5(rgyud): rdo dang //'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//che sa rnams thams cad rnam par spyod//byi mi ldog pa'i 'kho po yang /de chu snyed po yin pa dgongs//de nas yang rtso
233a6(rgyud): ljin 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po mi gsung ba'i dam tshig las byung ba chos kyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
233a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzlas pa'i dam chog ces bye ba de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //badz+ra b+hA Sha/de nas de ben
233b1(rgyud): na sa ga na sa na dus spyan du na gnasu ma tu rgyu nu ma m+b+ha tu na NA du du hA/
233b2(rgyud): sa 'dug rten gyi khrims pam sna nga sa shin tu blam dang maskyes pa'i 'di bzhin gi gag su pa'i/sa myed na na skye gas pa rnam mi chos nyid kyi sgyur
233b3(rgyud): drung /ngas rgyas thams ca kyi rdzu 'di'i dang / 'phrul la seMn pa sa ni//rdo rje rnams dede'i ting nge dzin ni shin tu rgyug yin pa dang /shin tu brtan
233b4(rgyud): hU~M smye b+h+r-i g+hu nas byung rgyu'i sam sna rkyen pa myig sa med pa'i skye gyi nas 'i sa rnam pa snang hU~M gas zhanam te ched du rjo
233b5(rgyud): /oM da hrI na nga//ma pa N+Di g+sa sa //keng b+h+ri sa pa sa dge/TIg N+DI hU~M lngas rnam par gyu //de mam
233b6(rgyud): chu sems dpa'i chen pa tshig ma yin pa'i skyed bcom ldan 'as kyi thugs pa'i ma ji bzhi gshegs pa thams med kyi rgya ni thaba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas so
234a1(rgyud): yang dka' rjod cing bzhugs par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi rdo rje'i dam tshig
234a2(rgyud): las byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang /sems can gyi khams ma
234a3(rgyud): lus shing lus po med pa rnams kyi tshig grub pa dang /yang thams cad kyi bde ba dang /yid bde ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi gsang ba nyid thob
234a4(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub dam pa'i bar gyi phyir rdo rje bzlas pa de byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
234a5(rgyud): kyis rdo rje'i tshig ces rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje'i
234a6(rgyud): bzlas pa des yang dag par smra zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//rdo rje'i bzlas par brjod pa yin//de bzhin gshegs pa thams
234a7(rgyud): cad kyi//sngags 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur//rdo rje chos nyid kyi ye shes dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang /ye shes dang /chos kyi 'khor lo chen
234b1(rgyud): blo bskor ba'i ye shes dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi spros pa rnam par ldogs pa'i ye shes dang 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi
234b2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po'o//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po phrin las thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig
234b3(rgyud): las byung ba las kyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs
234b4(rgyud): bab thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //badz+ra karma/de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni las thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa'i
234b5(rgyud): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma theg pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi 'od zer du
234b6(rgyud): gyur te byung nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
234b7(rgyud): 'phrin las kyi dbyibs lta bur gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi dbyings ma lus pa de yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te
235a1(rgyud): namakha'i dbying sgra thams cad dang munyam pa'i tshad tsamA du gyur //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phran las kyi dbyigasu de las kyad rje ri dbyings su
235a2(rgyud): /gyur nas byug gnyis su gnas so//de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra rnam
235a3(rgyud): byung ste/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las la sogs pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /cho 'phrul
235a4(rgyud): rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nI de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las mtha' yas pa yin pa dang /shin tu brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres
235a5(rgyud): par gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i skur gyur te/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
235a6(rgyud): thugs la gnos nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//e ma'o sangs rgyas rnams kyi nges//'phrin las mdo po kun bdag yin//sangs rgyas don ni lhun grub phyir
235a7(rgyud): rdo rje las ni 'jug par 'gyur//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi
235b1(rgyud): thugs las byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das de
235b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs
235b3(rgyud): pa thams cad la mchod par bya ba la sogs pa gdon mi za bar tshad med pa dang /las kyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang /sems can gyi khams ma lus shring /
235b4(rgyud): lus pa med pa rnams kyi las thams cad grub pa dang /thams cad kyi bde ba dang /yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i 'phrin las nyid
235b5(rgyud): dang /ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
235b6(rgyud): 'phrin las zhes bya ba 'phrin lngas thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas de'i lag tu las kyi rdo rje de
235b7(rgyud): bzhin du byin no//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje sna tshogs rdo rje sna tshogs zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro//de nas byang chub sems
236a1(rgyud): dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs zhes bya bas rdo rje de rang na/spyong khar bzhag ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las la sbyong zhing chen du brjod
236a2(rgyud): pa 'di ched du brjod do//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog/bdag ste bdag gi lag tu phyin//las rnams thams cad byed tu
236a3(rgyud): bcug/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka' ba'i dam tshig las byung ba las kyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya
236a4(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi srung po'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di ring gi thugs
236a5(rgyud): ka nas phyung ngo //badz+ra rak+Sha/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs lasi byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/go chu brtan par gyur
236a6(rgyud): trete b+hu n+ye swa bcoMmA ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugasu zhugs te/gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje go cha chen po'i dbyibasu gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so//
236a7(rgyud): de nas rdo rje go cha'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/de bzhin gshegs
236b1(rgyud): pa thams cad la srung ba'i cho ga rgyas pa la sogs pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni brtson 'grus dam pa thub
236b2(rgyud): dka' ba dang /shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' chen po ba rtson 'grus thub dka' ba'i lus su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
236b3(rgyud): mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//e ma'o brtson 'grus go cha 'di//brtan po'i bdag nyid rab brtan bdag/de ni brtan phyir lus min yang /
236b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i lus su byed pa'i mchog/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po thub dka' ba'i lus de/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs na
236b5(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting
236b6(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig dang /sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa
236b7(rgyud): rnams yongs su bskyang ba dang /thams cad kyi bde ba dang /yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i sku 'thob pa'i mchog grub par bya ba'i
237a1(rgyud): bAr du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje'i go cha de byang chub snrum+b+has dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka' ba'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no//de nas de bzhin
237a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i grogs po rdo rje'i grogs po zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rje
237a3(rgyud): rje'i grogs po da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la go cha bskon zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//byams pa'i go cha dam
237a4(rgyud): pa ste//brtson 'i grus brtan pas srung ba che//grogs po chen por brjod pa yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad
237a5(rgyud): rab tu 'joms pa'i dam tshig byung ba las las kyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
237a6(rgyud): thabs kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ku nas phyung ngo //badz+ra yak+saMHde nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
237a7(rgyud): thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/rdo rje mchi ba'i mtshon che chen por gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
237b1(rgyud): kye thugs su zhugs te/gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje mche ba'i dbyings su gyur te byung nas phyag gnyis su gnas so//de nas rdo rje mtsho ba'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten
237b2(rgyud): kyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gaushegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdug pa 'dul ba la sogs pa
237b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /tshe 'phrul rnams byas nas/rdo rje sems dpa'i ting ngi 'dzin ni bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa yin pa dang /shin tu brtan pa'i
237b4(rgyud): phyir gcig tu 'dres te byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i lus su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te
237b5(rgyud): tshod du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//e ma'o bdag ni sangs rgyas rnams//thugs rje can gyi thabs chen te/zhi yang sems can don du ni//ma rungs par ni ston par 'gyur
237b6(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i lus su bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon
237b7(rgyud): phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu gtum pa'i
238a1(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting ngo 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i dam tshig dang /sems can
238a2(rgyud): gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang /thams cad kyi bde ba dang /yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skabs
238a3(rgyud): chen po'i ye shes dang /mngon par shes pa rnams thob cing dngos grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha de byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud
238a4(rgyud): thams cad rab tu 'joms pa de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khro bo rdo rje khro bo zhes rdo rje ming gri dbang gis dbang bskur
238a5(rgyud): ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khro bo rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha de rang gi khar bzhag nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsdigs shing /ched du
238a6(rgyud): brjod pa 'di tshad du brjod do//'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//ma rungs thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog/rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon rnon te//thabs dang snying rje'i bdag nyid do//
238a7(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba las kyi byin gyis brlabs
238b1(rgyud): rdorje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /gsung dang thugs rdo rje bcing ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa
238b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nAMs phyung ngo //badz+ra san+d+hi/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa
238b3(rgyud): de nyid de/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phya ga rgya thams cacad bcings par gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugasu zhugs te/gcig tu 'dres par
238b4(rgyud): gyur nas/rdo rje bcings pa'i dbyibasu gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so//de nas rdo rje bcings pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang
238b5(rgyud): mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang /ye shes la sogs pa dang /sangs
238b6(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur shin tu bcings pa dang /rab tu brtan
238b7(rgyud): pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
239a1(rgyud): mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te ched du brjod pa 'di cheng du brjod do//e ma'o rab tu brtan bcings pa'o//dam chog bdag ste brtan bdag nyid//bsam pa thams
239a2(rgyud): cad rab grub phyir//grol ba rnams kyang 'ching bar byed//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi
239a3(rgyud): thugs la saM byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khyod la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan
239a4(rgyud): 'dres kyis ngo bozhi na gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'ching ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin lnga snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya
239a5(rgyud): bcings pa'i dam tshig dang /sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med po rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /lha rnams kyi dgongs pa brtogs pa
239a6(rgyud): dang /grub pa thams cad dang /thams cad kyi bde ba dang /yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /b+h+yas
239a7(rgyud): rgya'i dbang dam pa 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje bcings pa de byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya
239b1(rgyud): dero lag tu de bzhin du byin no//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje wA tshur rdo rje khu tshur zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa
239b2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu chung zhes bya ba des rdo rje bcings pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'ching zhing ched du brjod pa 'di tshid du brjod do//'di de sangs rgyas thams
239b3(rgyud): rgyud kyi//byug rgyu bcings pa che ning na//sang sa rgyas kun gyi myur grub phyir//de ma tshig shin tu 'drang ba da ///de nis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa
239b4(rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa'i las dang /brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha brtan pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po dang /phyag rgya thams cad
239b5(rgyud): bcings pa'i ye shes dang 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las chen po'i sems dpa'o///bam po gnyis pa//de nas de bzhin gshegs
239b6(rgyud): pami g.yo ba zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bsgrubs te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams
239b7(rgyud): cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
240a1(rgyud): zhubs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs bya thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'di rang klu thugs ka nas phyung ngo //
240a2(rgyud): satwa badz+rI/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung mi thag tu rdo rje'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do//'od
240a3(rgyud): zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams
240a4(rgyud): cad kyi rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas btab nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang /mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje'i
240a5(rgyud): dbyibs chen por gyur te/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snong mdzad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod de//oM ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
240a6(rgyud): sems dpa'i rdo rje brtan pa bdag/gang phyir brtan pas lus med kyang //rdo rje'i lus su gyur pa yin//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya bas de bzhin
240a7(rgyud): gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs par bya na'i phyir rin po che'i pha rol tu/
240b1(rgyud): phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs
240b2(rgyud): kau nas phyung ngo //rat+na bid+d+ha/de nus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rin po che'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa
240b3(rgyud): de nyid do//rin po che'i 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur te de bzhin gsheg
240b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyug rgyas btab nas/yang gcig tu 'dres te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam bu'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyibasu gyur/
240b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snong mdzod kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
240b6(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen bdag nyid grags//gang phyir phyag rgya thams cad kyi//dbang gi tshul ni brtan po yin//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang
240b7(rgyud): phyag rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa rnam por snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag rgyas btab par bya ba'i
241a1(rgyud): phyir chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung bad+d+ha rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs ngas chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'o/
241a2(rgyud): rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //d+har+m+ma badz+rI/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'dri byung ma thag tu pad+mo'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung
241a3(rgyud): ste/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do//pad+ma'i 'odi zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs
241a4(rgyud): pa rnams kyi skur gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas btab nas yang gcig tu 'dras te/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i
241a5(rgyud): tshad tsam gyi rdo rje pad+mo chen po'i dbyibs su gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod
241a6(rgyud): e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cod kyi//chos kyi rdo rje gnang me dag/byang phyir rang bzhin rnam dag pas//'dod chags yin yang dri ma med//de nas bcom ldan 'das
241a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas
241b1(rgyud): btab par bya ba'i phyir las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs/
241b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //kar+m+ma/badz+rI/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung /
241b3(rgyud): ma thag tu las thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do//las thams cad kyi 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
241b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas btab ste/
241b5(rgyud): yang gcig tu 'das nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi thams cad du rtse mo bltas pa'i rdo rje chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/bcom ldan 'das
241b6(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yon phyogs zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//las kyi rdo rje mi gyi
241b7(rgyud): bdag/gang phyir gcig kyang sems can rnams//ma lus par ni las bzang byed//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang /de dag bskur ba chen
242a1(rgyud): po dang /rdo rje'i chos nyid dang /mchod pa thams cad ni de bzhin gA shegs pa rnam pa ts+tshed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po rnams so//de nas yang bcom
242a2(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cadadwa dgyes pa'i mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
242a3(rgyud): zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //badz+ra lA s+ye/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
242a4(rgyud): las 'di byung ma thag tu rdo rje'i phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do//rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i rtse mo de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
242a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/lha mo chen mo rdo rje 'dzin ma'i lus thams cad
242a6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid dang 'dra zhing kha dog dang /gzugs dang /mtshan ma dang /spyod lam sna tshogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i/
242a7(rgyud): rigs thams cad sdud par gyur pa/rdo rje sems dpe'i lha mor gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
242b1(rgyud): lan ma pas samamams mtham/amamanathas mam a Shasam mamamatham yamasan/ ma an ma ma ma
242b2(rgyud): laganas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//I ma'o radwa 'byung rnams kyi ni//mchod pa bI dag 'dra gzhan mod do//glang phyir 'dod pa dga' mchod byas//mchod pa thams cad
242b3(rgyud): byas par 'gyur//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i phreng ba'i dbang gi dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
242b4(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //badz+ra mA le/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thar swa cang
242b5(rgyud): kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rin po che chen po'i phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i dzin pa de nyid do//rin po che'i phyag rgya de dag las kyang 'jig
242b6(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdulA shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i re bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/lha mo chen mo rdo rje phreng bar de bzhin
242b7(rgyud): du gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod do//e ma'o rin chen
242b8(rgyud): mchod pa zhes//bdag dang 'dra bar grags pa med//gang phyir khams gsum rgyal mchog kyang //rab tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de
243a1(rgyud): /bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi klu'i mchog gi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nus
243a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //badz+ra gI tI/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung

243a5(rgyud): tshon mo rdo rje glur gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo'i g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di
243a6(rgyud): ched du brjod do//e ma'o bdag ni kun gzigs pa'i//glu mchog tshul gyis mchod pa yin//gang phyir sgra snyan 'dra ba yi//mchod pa rnams kyis mnyes par byed//
243a7(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
243b1(rgyud): zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gig thugs ka nas phyung ngo //badz+ra nr-i ti/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
243b2(rgyud): las 'ad byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas par gyur nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do//de bzhin
243b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi glar gyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa de dag thams cad las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i bya
243b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/yang gcig tu 'dres te/rdo rje lha mo chen mo rdo rje gar gyi skur gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon
243b5(rgyud): mi za bar grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//e ma'o mchod kun don mdzad pa'i//
243b6(rgyud): mchod pa rgya chen bdag yin te//gang phyir rdo rje gar tshi gas/sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu byed//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang /yid bde ba bla na med
243b7(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glu dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phyir/
244a1(rgyud): /las bla na med pa rnams na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'o//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas
244a2(rgyud): de bzhin bshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu tshim pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje
244a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yog mo'i gtso mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //badz+ra d+hU pe/de nas de
244a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/bdug pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi bkod pa rnam pa du mas
244a5(rgyud): rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad du khyab par gyur te byung nas bdug pa'i mchod pa'i mchod pa rgya mtsho de las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mA dang
244a6(rgyud): mnyam po'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas byung ste/yang gcig tu 'dres nas rdo rje bdug pa'i lha mo'i lus su gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi
244a7(rgyud): g.yon phyogs su khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang /nor bu dang /rin po che las byas pa'i grwar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du
244b1(rgyud): brjod do//oM ma'o bdag ni mchod pa che//rab tu sim ldan dge ba yi//gang phyir sems can dang ba ldan pas//myur du byang chub thob par 'gyu pa/de nas bcom ldan 'das
244b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slang mchod pa'i phyir rin po che'i rgyan gyi mchod pa'i dam
244b3(rgyud): tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol ka ma 'di rang gi thugs ka nus phyung ngo //badz+ra
244b4(rgyud): puSh+pe/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/me tog thams cad kyi ma chod pa bkod
244b5(rgyud): pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ngo //me tog thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi bkod pa de las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams
244b6(rgyud): cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/yang gcig tu 'dres te rdo rje'i me tog gi lha mo'i skur gyur nas/bcom ldan
244b7(rgyud): 'das kyi g.yon phyogs kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang /nor bu dang /rin po che las byas pa'i grwar na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas chad du brjod pa 'di ched du
245a1(rgyud): brjod do//e ma'o me tog mchod pa bdag/thams cad k+Sh+mI ni rgyan byed do//gang phyir mchod nas de bzhin gshegs//rin chen nyid du myur du
245a2(rgyud): 'grub//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slar mched
245a3(rgyud): pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang ba'i mchod pa'i dam tshig los byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs
245a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi pho nya mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //badz+ra A lo ke/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka las 'di byung ma thag tu thams cad
245a5(rgyud): du snang ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyi bkod pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do//thams cad du snang
245a6(rgyud): ba'i mchod pa bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/yang gcig tu 'dres
245a7(rgyud): te lha mo rdo rje snang ba zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang /nor bu dang /rin po che las byas pa'i grA na zla
245b1(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khar la gnas nas chud du brjod pa 'di chod du brjod do//oM ma'o mchod pa'i mar me ni//rgya chen dge ba bdag yin te//gang phyir snang bcas myur du ni//sangs rgyas
245b2(rgyud): kun gyi spyan yang thob//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzod kyi mchod pa'i
245b3(rgyud): len du slar mchod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dris mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs
245b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bran mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //badz+radz+re gan+d+he/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag tu dri thams cad kyi mchod pa
245b5(rgyud): bkod pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byed par gyur/nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do//dri thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pa de las
245b6(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/yang gcig tu 'dres te lha mo rdo rje dri zhes bya ba'i skur
245b7(rgyud): gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang /nor bu dang /rin po che las byas pa'i grwa na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas tshad
246a1(rgyud): du nga pa 'din du badzad do//oM mA ng+ga sI rang bzhin gyi//margyad pa rgyus yid 'ad da //gang da zhin tu shegs pa //lus nga/
246a2(rgyud): sbyinam badzin par 'gyur//de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rabab po dang /byang chub chen po'i yan lag bsags pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams ci
246a3(rgyud): chos kun tu snang ba dang /tshul khrims dang /ti nga 'dzin dang /shes pa dang /rnam po dag mi bdang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mdzad pa'i du rnams ni de bzhin pa
246a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi dka' btsun byud ba'o//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam chem gi lpags kyu'i dam
246a5(rgyud): las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo rje'i zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyems par zhugs nis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po 'dirang
246a6(rgyud): gyi thugs ka nas byung ngo //badz+re a~M k+sha to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chud kyi mas lngas 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byuh+ma d+hA'i
246a7(rgyud): sa sa kyang du myur nas kyi s+ye//bcom ldan las rdo rje 'dzi bang nyid do// bzhin gaganas pa thams cid kyi phyag rgya'i chags de dag las 'dzin
246b1(rgyud): mas thams pa rdu shin tu ba mod du marnam pa 'du shin du gags pa'o/rnam pa rgyu nas/rlung snron tu tu byung ba skyems du 'dzin dzA dzA rje lcags m+b+ha nas/
246b2(rgyud): b+h+r-i'i b+hung gyur nus/ ldan 'dus m+b+ha d+g+ha nu brtsegs pan+de ba rdo rje dang /ning mas skyem pa'i rdo rje hU~M gang shi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'ar la gnas
246b3(rgyud): nos de bzhin ni shegs pa mams rnyed byed ma tshig gis rgyun 'dzin cid ched du brjod pa 'di cid drug da/na ma mye/mi ma'i 'angs rgyas thams cad kyi//yang //
246b4(rgyud): sbyin 'dren brtan pa bdag/gang phyir bdag gis spyanA drangs pa//dkyil lakhyer phrin la brten par 'gyu //rnaMs yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad
246b5(rgyud): ma nig la 'jug pa sems dpo'i chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lo snyoms par zhugs nas dri bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya
246b6(rgyud): pa'i byas laka pa 'dir sh+yaM gas kunas b+hU //badz+ra hU~M//de skyed pan dag shegs pa rnams dang hU~M thugs la 'di rgyu ma thag tu ba'i rgyu gshegs pa
246b7(rgyud): kyidas tshigs 'ag de'i rdzun rgyu gis rgya ma na de yin 'i nyid na mags pa ma kyi tsun
247a1(rgyud): rgyu mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/yang gcig/
247a2(rgyud): tu 'dres te byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang /nor bu dang /rin po che las
247a3(rgyud): byas pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i sgo gang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'jug cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//e ma'o/

247a5(rgyud): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags sgeg sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
247a6(rgyud): par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi da ma tshig bsdams pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje pho nya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //badz+ra s+pho Ta/
247a7(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa'i phyag rgya mang por gyur nas byung ste/

247b2(rgyud): rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/gcig tu 'dres te byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bya ba'i skur gyur te/bcom
247b3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang /nor bu dang /rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje chos kyi sgo gang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa
247b4(rgyud): thams cad la 'ching zhing che du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//e mra'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//rdo rje lcags sgrog dam po bdag/'ching ba kun las grol ba rnams//sems
247b5(rgyud): can dron du 'ching bar 'dod//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbab pa zhes bya ba sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i
247b6(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cod kyi bran 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //badz+ra A be sha/
247b7(rgyud): denas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad du gyur nas byung ste/
248a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad las 'jig rten b+hi khams thams cad kyi
248a2(rgyud): rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra rnams byung ste/gcig tu 'dres nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dbab pa'i skur gyur te/bcom ldan
248a3(rgyud): 'das kyi khong bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang /nor bu dang /rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje las kyi sgo gang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa

248a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsdu ba'i byin gyis brlabs 'di gsungs so//badz+ra sa mA~M dza thode nas skad cig thad cig yud tsam de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa
248b1(rgyud): thams cad saM gal gyi mtshon mas bskul bu dang /'jig rten gyi khams rab 'brum sbyin gyi rgya mtsho ya thams cad nas 'dzag rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang //
248b2(rgyud): mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang bcas te 'dus nas khang bu brtsegs pa'i rtse mo rdo rje dang /nor bu dang /rin po che las
248b3(rgyud): byas pa ga na pa dang /bcom ldan 'odas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der gshegs nas kyang chad du oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA dwe ban+da naM ka ro me zhes brjod do//
248b4(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci gar zlos shing /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nis ched du brjod pa 'di che de du brjod do//e ma'o byang
248b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' yi//kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi//dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes//de nas de skad ces gsungs pa dang /
248b6(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang
248b7(rgyud): bcas te/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so//de nas de bzhin gshegs
249a1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi thugs las rang rang gyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khod kyi dkyil la dor dang bcas te phyang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi khang blo brtsegs pa
249a2(rgyud): rtse mo rdo rje dang /nor bu dang /rin po che las byas pa'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor du gyur nas snyoms par zhugs te/zhugs nas cherd du brjod pa 'a ched du

249a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang /thams cad

249a7(rgyud): po rang gi rdo rje sems dpa'i thog ma dang tha mo med pa'i rdo rje chen po 'dzin pa la ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab pa/rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che//
249b1(rgyud): dag shegs patsun//rdon dang ba kun tu babyung //ga 'tshal phyug na rdo rje la//rdod+ha zlum po sangs rgyas mchog/dzA rna ljags r+b+ba do banan gshegs na mang

249b6(rgyud): rdo rje dpal khyod la//rdo rje bzhad mo band pa che//rdo rje 'dzum pa ngo mtshar che//dga' zhing rab dga' rdo rje ston//phyag 'tshal rdo rje dga' ba la//rdo rje chos rab de nyid don//

250a1(rgyud): zab//phyag 'tshal rdo rje blo khyod la//rdo rje rgyu dang snying po che//rdo rje 'khor lo tshul chen po//rab bskor rdo rje las byung ba//phyag 'tshal rdo rje
250a2(rgyud): snying po la//rdo rje gsung ba rang rig mchog/rdo rje zlos pa rab sgrub sbyin//mi gsung rdo rje mchog grub pa//phyag 'tshal rdo rje gsung khyod la//rdo rje las rab rdo
250a3(rgyud): rdorje'i bka'//las kyi rdo rje kun rab 'gro/rdo rje nges pa'i rgya che ba//phyog 'tshal rdo rje kun khyod la//rdo rje srung ba brtan pa che//rdo rje gau cha sra ba che//brtson 'grus
250a4(rgyud): mchog ni thub par dka'//phyag 'tshal rdo rje brtson 'grus la//rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs chen po//rdo rje mche ba 'jigs pa che//bdud 'joms rdo rje mi bzad pa//

250a6(rgyud): zhog ming rnams 'chang ba ni//zhi ba brgya po rtsa brgyad 'i de//rdo rje ming dbang bsgyur la sogs//mchog rnams kun gyis de dbang bskur//bang zhig yon tan med
250a7(rgyud): rnams kyis//rdo rje 'chang ba chen po la//rtag tu dbyangs kyis bskyod pa ni//de yid rdo rje 'chang 'drar 'gyur//ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis//bdag cag gis ni
250b1(rgyud): bstod pa yin//theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'o//rdul tshun yang na rgyas par mdzod//mngon pa khyud la gsol ba ni//sangs rgyas kun b+h+rUM 'khor la che//dkyil 'khor nan
250b2(rgyud): bo dam pa yi//cho ga mchog ni bshad par gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'as rdo rje 'dzin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsal ba'i tshig thos nas de bzhin gshed/

250b4(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste//rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas ni//rdo rje dbyings zhes bgyi bar grags//sems dpa' che ba'i phyag rgya cher/
250b5(rgyud): sgroskyom zhing byin gyis rlob bgyid cing //dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du//ci rigs par ni mchis nas kyang //phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs//kun tu rnam por bltas nas ni//
250b6(rgyud): /rdorje sems dpa' zhes brjod nas//bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor//sar pa legs par bka lA nos kyang //tshad dang 'thun par mdzes pa yi//thig gis mkhas
250b7(rgyud): pas ci nus kyi//dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig godab cing //grub bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang //rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la//thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa//dar dang
251a1(rgyud): / ga phyung bas rgyun//\u0f88\u0f90 yo thAgs nA rnams rgyud dang //klu kun ma rnams rnams sa// na nu ts+tshan sa s+yA ba //dgul la ra rnarlan
251a2(rgyud): rdeg gdab bo//de yi rim bar nang zhugs la/'khor le 'dra ba'i rdo rje yi/thig gis yongs su bskor bar bya//ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis pa//rdo rje ka
251a3(rgyud): bA'i nad logs su//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas rgyan pa//dbu su dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs bzhag cing //sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun

251a5(rgyud): song nas ni//mi g.yo ba la sogs pa yi//sangs rgyas bzhi po thams cad gzhag/mi g.yo ba yi dkyil 'khor du//rdo rje 'dzin sogs mnyam par gzhag rin chen /

252a3(rgyud): bcings nas de yi dbang du gyur//de nas bdag nyid chen po rnams//gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes bgyis la//thams cad don kun grub pa'i phyir/
252a4(rgyud): thams cad mjed ces gsol bar bgyi//dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bzhin du las bgyi'o//de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
252a5(rgyud): chen po 'dir ni rdo rje slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa mchis so//de yi dang por na gzhug pa lags te/sems can gyi khams
252a6(rgyud): ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yangs su skyabs pa dang /phan pa dang /bde ba thams cad dngos grub mchog gi rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid kyi slad du'o//bcom ldan
252a7(rgyud): 'das dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir gzhug pa la snod du gyur pa dang /snod du ma gyur pa brtaka mi 'tshal lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bcom ldani 'dis de bzhin de
252b1(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams sems can kha cig ni sdig pa chen po dgyid pa yang mchis te/de dag gis rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs te mthong na ngan slong
252b2(rgyud): thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das nor dang /bza' ba dang /btung ba dang /'dred po'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang /dam T+wAM ga la mi dga'
252b3(rgyud): ba dang /sngar spyad pa la sogs pa mi nus pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/de dag kyang pidir ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du bgyid ci zhugs pa rnams kyi bsam pa
252b4(rgyud): thams cad rdzogos par 'gyur ro//becom ldan 'das sems n+dan kha cig nI gar dang /glu dang /gang mo dang /rtsen mo dang /kha zas kyi skyed pa la dga' ba rnams de bzhi
252b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thems cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid khong du ma chud pi la gnan gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug gi/de bzhin gshegs
252b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/yang dag par bsdus par gyur pa/bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang
252b7(rgyud): rangs par rnams 'byung bar byed pa de ni bslab pa'i gzhis 'jigs shing skrag nas mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te/de dag zhan stong gi dkyil 'khor gyi lam du 'jug
253a1(rgyud): ///'phya du sa grong kunas pa rnams sang dag ba dang masgru dus pa pa smra rlung gyun sgyu na du mdu myong da b+h+yo ng+tha/hA
