259b5(rgyud): chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur /rdo rje rnon po'i cho ga yis//sangs rgyas kun gyi shes rab mchog/rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin bstan pas//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
259b6(rgyud): 'gyur//rdo rje gsung ba'i cho ga yis//sangs rgyas gsung gi grub pa thob//rdo rje las cho ga bsgrubs pas na//rdo rje'i las skyes myur du 'gyur//rdo rje go cha bskon
259b7(rgyud): pas na//rdo rje sku ni thob par 'gyur//rdo rje gnod sbyin bsgrubs na ni//rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam par 'gyur//rdo rje khu tshur bcings pas na//phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa
260a1(rgyud): /'gyur//rdo rje 'dzin mA grub rbA/dzA rgyun po dga' ba thog/rdo rje phreng ba btsongs byas nA//sa ste rgyas kan+d+ha g+h+r-i dbyu sgyur 'gyur//rdo dzA g+hA yo ts+tsha
260a2(rgyud): yis//rdo rje glu nI len par 'gyur//rdo rje gar ni bsgyur ba yos//sangs rgyas kun gyis de mchod do//rdo rje bdag pa'i cho ga yos//'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed/
260a3(rgyud): rdo rje'i me tog sbyor byed pas//des ni 'gro ba dbang du byed//rdo rje snang po'i phyag rgya ches//rab mchog mig ni sbyin par byed//rdo rje dri yi tsho gas ni//sdug bsngal tha
260a4(rgyud): cad sel bar bya'o//rdo rje lcags kyu drangs pas de//'dren pa kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur//rdo rje zhags pa'i cha gas ni//thams cad rab tu 'jug par 'gyur//rdo rje
260a5(rgyud): lcags sgrog sbyor ba sa nAM//thams cad bcing bar nus pa'i 'gyur//rdo rje dbab po'i cho ga yi so//thams cad dbab par rab tu 'grub//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
260a6(rgyud): cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bshad de/thal mo dam du sbyar ba las//sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni//rdo rje thal mor bka' stsal te//rab tu bsdams
260a7(rgyud): phyir rdo rje bsdams//dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni//rdo rje bsdams las byung bas na//de dag bsdams pa rdo rje yis//bsdams pa bla med bshad par bya//rdo rje
260b1(rgyud): sngams pa dam byas la//gung mo myu gu lhur mnyam spong //gung mo nang du gzhabs pa ni//nAg/ gnyis pa yin pa rab sha Sh+ya chud mo rin chen 'dra ba dang //gung mo pad+mo
260b2(rgyud): ba dgug/sangs rgya ba lnga yi phyag rgya ni//de bzhin mdzub mo dgug pa'o//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yi//rigs kyi dam tshig 'dzin pa yi//phyag rgya bcings dang dpo
260b3(rgyud): grub dang //las rnams yang dag bshad par bya//zla ba lta bu'i lag gnyis kyis//gung mo btang bar gyur pa yi//mthe bong mthe'u chung so sor sgreng //sems dpa'i rdo rje
260b4(rgyud): sbrasgrang rdo rje//mdzub mo'i lcags kyu mdzub mo sbyar//legs so sbyin pa 'dra ba ni//rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po yi//phyag rgya mang po dngos grub 'di//mthe bong gzhibs la
260b5(rgyud): mdzub gnyis bcag/rtse sprad rdo rje rin chen yin//de nyid gung mo srin lag dang /mthe'u chung rnams ni bsnol brkyang po'o//de la srin lag mthe'u chung gnyis//mnyam
260b6(rgyud): ba'i gshibs pa rgyal mtshan no//de nyid las ni bskor nas kyang //de yi phyogs su bzhag pa'o//mthe bong gnyis ka mnyam par gshebs//mdzub ma gnyis ka bzhug
260b7(rgyud): ba dang //de nyid gung mo sbeng rtse mo//bkug pa rdo rje ral gri'o//de las sprin lag mthe'u chung gshibs//'khor lo yin par bshad pa yin//bsdams pas mthe bong
261a1(rgyud): //gnyis bkrol ba//bkan te kha phyogs bzhag pa'o//mtho bong mtho'u chung rtsa sprad bkyed /las kyi rdo rje yin par bshad//de las mdzub mo gnyis
261a2(rgyud): gshibs pas//snying khar brkyang ste bzhag pa'o//mdzub mo rtse bcug che ba la//mthe'u chung gshibs pa brkyang ba'o//mthe'u chung gnyis par mthe bong gnyis/
261a3(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis kyis brtsir ba'o//snying khar mthe bong bsnyams la bzhag/rab tu brkyang ba phreng ba'o//thal mo sbyar te kha nas dbyung //gar las thal sbyar spyi bor
261a4(rgyud): bzhag/rdo rje bcing ba thur du klags//rang gi thal sbyar gyen du gtor//mthe bong bsdums te rab tu bsdams//rab tu brkyang nas byug pa'o//mdzub mo go ci go pu
261a5(rgyud): bkug pa dang //mthe bong gnyis ni mdud pa dor//mthe bong mdzub mo bdu bur bcing //rdo rje bcing ba mdzub mo bsdams//de nas 'di rnams sgrub bshad de//
261a6(rgyud): rdo rje sgrub pa dam pa'o//rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis//rang gi phyag rgya snying khar bzhagakyide nas 'di rnams las bshad pa//rdo rje'i las ni bla na med//rdo rje
261a7(rgyud): dbyings sogs phyag rgya ni//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'dus pa yin//dkyil 'khor slob dpon slob mar bcas//de ma thag tu byin gyis rlob//sems dpa'i
261b1(rgyud): rdo rje bcings pa ni//rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra bar 'gyur//rdo rje lcags kyu bcings pa yis//sangs rgyas thams cad kun nus 'gugs//'dod pa'i rdo rje'i sbyor bas ni//rdzogs
261b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyang mnyes par byed//rdo rje dga' bas rgyal ba kun//legs so bas ni bstod par byed//rin chen rdo rje bcings pas na//sangs rgyas kun gyis de dbang bskur/
261b3(rgyud): nyi ma bcings pas ni//sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'dud 'gyur//rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'ching 'gyur bas//re ba kun yang rdzogs par byed//rdo rje bzhed pa'i tshul gyis ni/
261b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig bzhad//chos kyi rdo rje bcings pas ni//rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur//rdo rje'i ral gri thogs pas ni//nyon mongs thams cad des gcod do//
261b5(rgyud): rdo rje 'khor lo brtan byas pas//dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbang por 'gyur//rdo rje smra ba'i sbyor bas ni//rdo rje'i ngag mchog 'grub par 'gyur//las kyi rdo rje bcings pas
261b6(rgyud): no//rdo rje'i las dang 'dra bar 'gyur//rdo rje go cha brtan byas pas//lus ni rdo rje 'dra bor 'gyur//rdo rje mche ba'i mchog phyag rgyas//ma rungs bdud ni des 'joms so//
261b7(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings pas//phyag rgya kun kyang dbang du 'gyur//'dzum pas lha yi dga' ba rnams//phreng ba yis ni rgyan gyi rnams//klu yis rtag tu skad gsal //
262a1(rgyud): gar gyis mchod pa brnyes par 'gyur//bdug pas 'jig rten tshim par byed//me tog gis ni mdzes pa'i gzugs//myur mes snang ba gdag pa nyid/
262a2(rgyud): dri yis lha rdzas dri can du'o//rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs pa ste//rdo dz+haiM nags pas 'jug par byed//rdo rje lcags sgrog bcing ba ste/rdo rje dril bus 'bebs pa'o//
262a3(rgyud): nas chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do//badz+ra dz+nyA na sangs rgyas rnams//rdo rje dbyings ni brtan par byed//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa//chos kyi phyag rgya cho ga bzhin//
262a4(rgyud): sa ma ya s+t+wa~M zhes brjod na phyag rgya kun gyi dbang por 'gyur//A na ya stu zhes brjod na//gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas 'gugs//a ho su khaM zhes brjod na//sangs rgyas
262a5(rgyud): kun kyang mnyes par 'gyur//sU d+hu sA d+hu zhes smras nas//legs pa'i tshe ga gis de dgar byed//su ma ha ta te zhes brjod na//sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur thob/
262a6(rgyud): drub d+yo ta zhes smras na//chos kyi gze brjid nyid du 'gyur//uR+tha prA b+he zhes smras na//rab kyang rdzogs par byed//ha ta hUM he zhes bshad na//sangs rgyas bzhad pa rnyed
262a7(rgyud): pir 'gyur//sa~Mrba ka ri zhes smras na//mi bya ba yi rnams kyang sbyong //du kha Ni ts+tsha da zhes smras na//des ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcad//bud+d+ha bo d+hi zhes smras na/
262b1(rgyud): sa na na'agyu//khyA t+ta na rdzu nas smras na//sangs rgyasan ///s+'ub+hASha hU~M zhes smras sgra//kun m+b+ha da myu ra b+hUn+tu/naur thA
262b2(rgyud): ste nas smras ni//de ma thag tu 'ardzogs med 'gyur//sha~M truM b+hUk+Sha zlas smras na//dgro rnams thams cad za bar 'gyur//sir+b+ba sid+d+hi sa smras ni//\u0f7frmAs cad grub pa nyid du
262b3(rgyud): r-it+na ra ti m+b+ha yi dgal/ru pa sho b+his gzugs bzang nyid//shi tre so khyA bde basbyin+tu//sarba pU dzA mchod par byed//pra trA drA ni yid bder 'gyur//phas+t+rai gA mi 'bras bu thaM
262b4(rgyud): sr-i ti dzA gr-i gzi brti rme//su gan+d+ha ni dri mchod can//A ya t+yA je 'grogs par bye //A ya~M hi hU~M 'jug par byed//hUM s+pho Ta baM 'ching po che//g+hAr+t+ti e a rab bskyod pa/
262b5(rgyud): deras de rnams kyi tshon kyi phyirgya/sgrub pa dge ba bshad do//lce lo rdo rje dge bo sgoms na//las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur//g.yas po'i nang du bsgreng por bya/
262b6(rgyud): byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyu ste//sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o//mi g.yo ba yis sa reg pa//de bzhin rin chen sbyin bya'o//tshe dpag med pa'i ting 'dzin mchog
262b7(rgyud): gdon ma za ba'i mi 'jigs sbyin//de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams//mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya//rdo rje semaso sogs sems dpa' rnams//rdo rje las rnams byed
263a1(rgyud): pa ste//bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyi ga yis//lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang //mnga' 'bang ba yi tshul gyis ni//legaso zhes pa snying khar gzhag
263a2(rgyud): dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis//snying khar nyi ma brtan par bya//g.yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs//de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya//g.yas pa yis ni g.yon pa dbye//snying
263a3(rgyud): /khar g.yon pa ral gri mdud//mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang //rdo rje gnyi ga Sha nas dbyung //rdo rje gar bskor dkrol ba yis//thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor bzhag
263a4(rgyud): go cha mthe'u chung mche ba dang //khu tshur gnyis nA mnan pa'o//rdo rje 'gying ba'i tshul gyis su//bsam pa g.yos pas gdud par bya//phreng ba bcing dang kha~M nas dbyung //rdo rje
263a5(rgyud): gar ni bskor ba yin//rdo rje khu tshur tshur gyis ni//bdug pa la sogs de bzhin sbyin//sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yi//phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa yi//mdzub mo
263a6(rgyud): lcags kyu bcing ba ni//mthe'u chung la ste lcags kyu che//mkhrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis gdug//rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsgoms te mnan//de nas 'di rnams sgrub
263a7(rgyud): bshad pa//rdo rje las ni byed dang mnyam//rdo rje kun gyi rdo rje ni//rang gi snying khar goms par bya//de nas 'di rnams las phyag rgya//rdo rje'i las ni rnam pa meng //ye shes
263b1(rgyud): khro tshur bcings pas ni//sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par 'gyur//mi g.yo ba yAM bcings pas no//yid ni g.yo med par 'gyur//rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya 'das
263b2(rgyud): g+hazhan la phan+da byed ldan par 'gyur//dam chos 'khyer lo'i phyag rgyus ni//chos kyi 'khor lo bskur bar 'gyur//yang dag gis mchog gis myur ba ni//sems can kun la//
263b3(rgyud): mI 'jigs sbyin//rdo rje bgyid pa brtan byas la//rdo rje sems dpe'i bde ba rnyed//rdo rje lcags kyu skad cikra t+ta//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dri 'gugs//rdo rje mnga'
263b4(rgyud): yis rdo rje yi//lha mo mnyes par bdag nyid byed//rdo rje dga' bas rgyal ba kun//legs so zhes pas tshig kyang sbyin//rdo rje chen po nor bu sbyin//ston pa rnams kyis
263b5(rgyud): dbang bsrung //rdo rje nyi ma bcings pas ni//rdo rje nyi ma 'dra bar 'gyur//rdo rje rgyal mtshan sgreng bas ni//des ni rin tshon chur yang 'bribs//rdo rje 'dzum pa bcings pas
263b6(rgyud): ni//sangs rgyas 'dra ba myur bzhud 'gyur//rdo rje me tog bcings pasna ni//rdo rje'i chos nyid de yis mtho //rdo rje ralnga gri brtan bcings na//des ni sdug bsngal thams
263b7(rgyud): gcod//rdo rje 'khor lo bcings pos ni//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas kun gyi tshig rnams ni//rdo rje'i bzlas pa 'grub par 'gyur//rdo rje gar gyi
264a1(rgyud): 6 dasas+ho//s+yA m+b+ha rgyas kyang ni dbang du 'gyur//2gargyas lus btsongs pas//d+hU smyung ba thob pAr 'gyur//rje mcho ba bstongs pasam/
264a2(rgyud): rdo rje nyid kyang bdag gis choms//rdo rje khu tshur kun 'phrog cing //phyag rgya grub pa kun tu rnyed//rdo rje 'dzin pas dga' ba sbyin//rdo rje phreng bas gzugs bzang ba//
264a3(rgyud): rdo rje glu yis glu snyan cing //rdo rje gar gyis dbang du byed//bdug pa yis ni yid tshim pa//me tog gis ni rgyun rnams te//mar me yis ni gzi chen po//rdo rje'i
264a4(rgyud): dris ni dri bar ljon//rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs pa ste//rdo rje shegs pas 'jug pa'o//rdo rje lcags sgrog gis ni bcing //rdo rje dril bu bskyod pa'o//de nas phyag
264a5(rgyud): rgya thams cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad de/de la thog ma nyid du rdo rje bcing pa'i sor mo snying khar brdab par bya ste/snying po ni 'di brjod do//
264a6(rgyud): badz+ra ban+d+ha traT/de nas phyag rgya bcings pa kun rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje'i dbang du 'gyur ro//de nas rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snying
264a7(rgyud): po brjod do//a de nas yang dag par babs nas grogs po nyid du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro//de nas phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi sems dpa' chen po rjes su dran par bya
264b1(rgyud): b+h+yo snying po 'di brjod do//ma hA sa mU ya satwa ho/'dis phyag rgya thams cad 'grub ste/phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o//de nas spyi'i sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad/
264b2(rgyud): de la thog mar rang gi phyag rgya bcings nas rang gi phyag rgya'o sems dpar bdag gi snying po 'dis sgom mo//sA ma ya haM/de nas rang phyog rgyu'i sems dpar bdag sgoms
264b3(rgyud): nas/sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab bo//sa mA ya satwA A d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/de nas bsgrub par bya'o//sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o//de nas dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad
264b4(rgyud): de de la thog mar re shig nor grub par 'dod na snying po 'di yin no//aR+Sha sid+d+hi/'dis phyag rgya grub na nor chen po skye bar 'gyur ro//de nas rdo rje grub par 'dad na snying po
264b5(rgyud): 'di yin no//badz+rA sid+d+hi/'dis ci 'dod pa bzhin du rdo rje grub par 'gyur ro//de nas rig 'dzin gyi grub pa 'dod ni snying po 'di yin no//badz+ra bi d+yA d+hA raM sid+d+hi/'dis ji ltar
264b6(rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin du rig 'dzin 'grub bo//de bzhin du dam pa grub par 'dod na rang gi phyag rgya'i snying pos sgrub bo//dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o//de nas phyag rgya thams
264b7(rgyud): cad kyi spyi'i rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rjer bya ba'i phyir cho ga rgyas pa bshad do/nam phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs lhod par gyur tam/bdag rang gtong bar 'dod
265a1(rgyud): nA da nas stong pa'i dri brtan par byA'o//oM badz+ra sar+b+ba sam+b+ha s+yA/mA nA pA lA ya/badz+ra satwAt+to no b+ha t+tiSh+Tha ng+karnA me b+hU wa/sUtwoSh+To mo b+hU wa/a nurAr+m+ma
265a2(rgyud): oMd+d+ha3/mu Tar+b+hu ma d+hA la/sar+b+ba sid+d+hir+m+ma pra yod+d+ha/sar+b+ba kar+m+ma sarba me/d+d+ha thA yai d+hekA rASh+TAM/he ha ha~MHd+h+r-ig wAn/sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA badz+rA mA me mur+g+haM 'dzi
265a3(rgyud): wa mahA sa mA yA satwA AH'dis ni mtshams med pa byas pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslus pa dang /dam pa'i chos gling pa dang /nyes pa thams cad
265a4(rgyud): byas pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa pos rdo rje sems dpa' brtan par gyur pas tshe 'di nyid la ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad
265a5(rgyud): dom/dngos grub dam pa 'am/rdo rje dngos grub bom/rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub bam/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi dngos grub kyi bar du myur du thob po zhes
265a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//de nas phyug rgyu thams cad dgrol ba'i spyi'i tshi gu rgyus bya baM shud //de la zlog
265a7(rgyud): mamanyid du phyag rgya thams cad gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid nas snying po 'das dgrol lo//oM badz+ra muHde nas snying kha nas byung ba rin tshon rdo rje'i phyag rgya rang gi
265b1(rgyud): dbang bsgyur+ya ba'i gnas na gnas pas dbang bsku to/mdzub mo gnyis kyis bsgyur shing bcings nas/de bzhin du go cha yang smyung ba 'as b+hUHdang //oM badz+ra rat+na aSh+NIShiny+tsa/sar+b+ba
265b2(rgyud): mr-i drA mr-i tI d+h+ri ku ru ba raka bi ts+tshi na baM/de ni sI yang gi cha'i mthar phreng ba bcings pa gtang la/thal mi mnyam par brdabs te snying po 'dis mnyes par bya'o//badz+rI tub+h+ya/
265b3(rgyud): tshicho ga 'di sa phyag rgyu rnams dgrol ba dang /bcings pa dang /mnyes par byas nas rdo rje lta bur 'gyur ro//yang na rdo rje sems dpas kyang bya'o//rdo rje sems dpa' lan ci
265b4(rgyud): bzlas//ji ltar 'dod pa bdag bde bar//bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub por 'gyur/phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so//
265b5(rgyud): rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams//sgrub pa dang ni las kun la//'dir ni tsI dgar bzlas na ni//rtog pa kun las dngos grub thob//snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams//
265b6(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa'i tshul gyis ni//rtog pa las bri shad rang byas pa 'am//sgrub pa 'drer ni thams cad do//de nas gsang ba'i mtshad badzad cing //rdo rje'o bstod pe 'dis glu blangs
265b7(rgyud): te ga sung ba'i mchod pa bzhi bya'o//oM rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas ni//rdo rje rin chen bla na med//rdo rje chos ni glu blangs pas//rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur//de nas
266a1(rgyud): da sa dAkrol 'khyud du rnabastod du glu 'di nyid gos rdo rjerdo bar ldog pa gnyis gshogs pa gsang ba gyu//drug pa la sogs smras na rgyu
266a2(rgyud): pa byA ste/de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du byedrug pa la sogs pas mchod pa bya ste/mchod pa de dag rang rang gi gnas su gzhog go//de nas thams cad la ci nus pa
266a3(rgyud): mchod cig ces po sgronas de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la stso la ste/dzaM m+b+hi 'dod pa bzhin du 'dug pa la sogs pas mchod bu byed du bcun le/ji ster
266a4(rgyud): bzugs pa rnams ci 'byor ba'i ro dang /kha zlas la sogs pa rnams cad dang /dkyila'i kho chen por rdul pani yo byud thams cad kyis mithu bAr bA ste/
266a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin no//'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid//rdo rje soms dpa'i lAbA na 'dug/khyod kyis kyang ni
266a6(rgyud): rtag tu bcad //phyug na rdo rje brtul zhugs bad+d+hAn+te/oM sar+b+ba tA d+h+r-i gA tA sid+d+he badz+rI sa ma ya~M/tISh+Tha e ShatrUM d+hA ra yA mI/badz+ra s+yAtwA hi hi hi hrI hUM/de nas thams
266a7(rgyud): cad du su la yang ma bzla cig ces bsgol mno'i snying po yang bstan to//de zhes ji ltar zhugs pa rnams sl-i ra~M tsi ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol/
266b1(rgyud): byung ba cing snyoms dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas kha gyen du bstan to//snying po 'di bzlas shing dkrol nas/oM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad//rjes su 'thun pa'o//
266b2(rgyud): dngos grub stsol//sangs rgyas yul du bzhud bar mdzad//slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol//badz+rI satwA muHda lhor dkyil 'khor thams cad lA bya'o//dam tshig mchog
266b3(rgyud): bi phyag rgya rnams kyang dgrol bar bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtornyog pa rjob pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen
266b4(rgyud): po'i cho gro rgyas pa rdzogs so////bam po gsum pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes
266b5(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu yang de nyid kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
266b6(rgyud): de nyid de rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzungs 'dzin pa kun tu 'bar ba'i snying bro rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig gi phyug rgya'i lha mo rnamasu gyur nas byung ste/'jig rten gyi khams thams
266b7(rgyud): cad kyi sangs rgyas kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gzungs kyi ye shes bsgrubs te//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i
267a1(rgyud): gzugs su gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skye rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams/

267a7(rgyud): bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i ngam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin la snyoms

269a1(rgyud): dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad//khri yi stong du rdo rje brtsegs//rdo rje soms shes bshad pa'o//rdo rje rin chen khro yi ste//rang gi dbang ni bskur bar
269a2(rgyud): bshad//rdo rje pad+ma khri yi steng //mtshon cha zhes ni bya bar bshad//las kyi rdo rje khra yi steng //rdo rje kun zhes bya bar bshad//pad+mo'i steng du bri bar ni//'od kyi 'khor

269b1(rgyud): 'khor 'dir 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin te/de la thog mar rdo rje slob dpon gyi sums ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya rang gi rigs byacings te/'jug par bya'o//dug+sa

270a1(rgyud): gyis ni//dpung pa bsnol bar bcings nas ni//sangs rgyas nyid kyang snang bar byed//de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no//badz+ra rA ba
270a2(rgyud): ma ho//badz+ra aM ku shi dza~M/badz+ra mA ra ya mA raM ya phaT/badz+ra ban d+ha rak+Sha haM/de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i lta ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo//rdo rje lta ba chags
270a3(rgyud): pas ni//dga' bas mig ni rab tu bgrad//de yis bud med daltas pas ni//rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ba yin//rab tu myur bar mig bsgul zhing //mig gi rdzi ma
270a4(rgyud): 'gugs byed pa//lta ba gzi tsan yin par bshad//'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed pa'o//khro gnyer gnyer ma ro ba bsdus pa//khro bo'i mig ni btsums pa

272b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi da ky-i la 'khor byin gyis brlabs zhes
273a1(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gro rag pa'i mchog 'od smrasa? pra/oM rat+na sUk+Sh+ma badz+dza dz+nyA nas ma yo hU~M/de na snga de bzhin gshegs
273a2(rgyud): pache tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyila'i khi byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la
273a3(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te rang gi reg pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/oM d+harma sUk+Sh+ma badz+re dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mau za bar grub pas de
273a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje lus kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyi la 'khor byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

273a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe na de
273a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs de thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i 'od zer de rnams byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te/sems
273b1(rgyud): tsun thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shes+t+ra phra mo'i ting 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs pa brtan par byas te/yang gcig tu gyur nas tong
273b2(rgyud): 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i skur dmigs te gcig tu 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes su gyur te/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhug
273b3(rgyud): sode nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi thugasu zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra
273b4(rgyud): mo'i dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje 'od smras pa/sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra/de nas de smras ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kA nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
273b5(rgyud): de nyid byung nus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje'i dbyibasu bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs
273b6(rgyud): kyekyi rtse mi'i phyogs su gnas nas che du su brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//e ma'o//sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje phra mo'i bdag sde che//gang phyir phra yang che ba'i phyir/
273b7(rgyud): khams gsum yang ni rgyas par byed//de nas de skad ces smras pa dang /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
274a1(rgyud): shAs kya mar byugs na rab tu 'o yo shos kyi rgyun ma rgyus por bya ba sbyor bas d+mo nan pa zlogs pa thams cad+mak+Sho sa khyab pa
274a2(rgyud): byAs+ya nAs tshus rjes thams cad khyab par bya ba'i tshul skyes nas kha dpyi sa rnams da du rab tu skye ba'i rdo rje mnas kyi mtshan ma rnams kyi pa sa
274a3(rgyud): rlo skyes rnams da byung ba smos nas dri bzhin gshegs pa thams tsho kyi legs kyi rje rje 'i khyobyings su bdag nyid sbyin kyi pa rlungs te 'dun go/de nas
274a4(rgyud): nyid tshun de bzhin ga shegasuM pa tha mas cad kyis ng+ge bzhin gshegs pa thams rlung hU~M ye shrIs kyi rdo rje'i das seM rdo rje'i chos spyo du dmigs nas de bzhin
274a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad k+ti rdo rje'i ye shes phra ma'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la skyems par zhugs tI ba nags so//de nas de bzhin gshegs
274a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi ye shes kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje de la snod duzhin gshegs pa thams drud kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po 'di d+d+ha//badz+rAnA b+h+ye ta thA ga tA/
274a7(rgyud): de nas de byung ba zag tu bcom ldan 'das phyogan rje rje nas kyi mi 'jug pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams sla cu gas nas rdzug+sa
274b1(rgyud): sa sa thu te gnas so//da nas banadu gshogs pa thams cad kyisems dpa dz+nyA d+ha las gang nas rgyun pa 'di ng+ge byung nga //dz+dza At+mAt+ka dz+nyAR+Sha
274b2(rgyud): dwedz+haiM e sha tISh+T+r-i r-I kr-i ba d+ha zla be sha hr-i da ya~M/a h+ye badz+ra duSh+Ti/rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes kyi byug rgyu dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba'i
274b3(rgyud): gyis brlabs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyu dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyug rgya dang /dga' ba chen po ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste
274b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams ts+tshed kyi tI de 'dzin chen po rnams so//de nas de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad kyi nga bI phyug na rdo rje ye shes phye mor 'jug pa'i tshul
274b5(rgyud): skyes rang gi thugs zhugs te steng kha'i rdo rje'i dbyibs su byedag nyid byin gyis brnabs te bzhugs so//de nas rdo rje'i dpyos suM de las snying po 'dadi bzhi b+h+ri /
274b6(rgyud): badz+rarat+na Ad+h+r-i ka hr-id ya~M/badz+ri sAr+yA tiSh+Tha/badz+ro d+ha dzA gra bo twA da ya/badz+ra tA sa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya
274b7(rgyud): da 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i rkyen ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi re ba rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang/
275a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyu ste/de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad mA rin phra che'i tid 'dzin rta
275a2(rgyud): de nas yang phyag na rdo rje ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rang gi snying kha rdo rje'i snying par thugs nas rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag byin gyis brlabs nas bzhug so//
275a3(rgyud): de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi byung ngo //badz+ra pad+ma at+ma ka hr-i da ya badz+ra ko Sha/tiSh+Tha badz+rI tsakr-i hr-i dA yaM pra be she/badz+ra dzI hwA grA hr-i da ya
275a4(rgyud): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shes rab kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /'khor lo chen por 'jug
275a5(rgyud): pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshig gi spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
275a6(rgyud): kyi chos kyi tinge 'dzin to//de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po thugs ka'i rdo rje las byung nas ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje'i thugs der zhugs
275a7(rgyud): nas yang rdo rje shin tu phra mo'i dbyibasu bdag byin gyis brlabs te bzhug so//de nas rdo rje phra mo'i dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi byung ngo //sarba badz+ra At+ma kaM
275b1(rgyud): badz+raka bA r+yA/toSh+Tha bang+ga rak+Sha ts+tshe da ya/badz+ra suSh+Ti drA da yA/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyo las sna rdzogs pa'i yo shes kyi phyag rgya dang /thub par du//'byu
275b2(rgyud): brtson 'grus kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /bdud thams cad kyi dkyil la rnas kyi phyag rgyu dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'ching ba'i ye shes kyi
275b3(rgyud): phyag rgya ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi ting 'dzin to// yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rab tu phra ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan mas khyab pa'i tshul
275b4(rgyud): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ste/byang chub samras dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje'i skur gyur nas de nas yang rdo rje sems dpa' lo sogs pa
275b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi skur gyur te/ring rlung gi mtshon ma nyid kyi thugs kar bzhag nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i tshul gyis zla
275b6(rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas rang rang gi snying po'i ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzhug skye bzhugs so//de nas yang lhag ni rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
275b7(rgyud): tinge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa sgrub pa'i phyir rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do//de nas rab tu bshang ba ba//chos kyi dkyil 'khor
276a1(rgyud): dam pA ste//rdo rje dbying sna dang 'dra bas na//rdo rje pra mo zhus bshad do//dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul dum+b+ha k+Sha/sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang bzhag
276a2(rgyud): rdo rje dbus su sangs rgyas bri//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rnamasu yang //sems dpa' chen po rnams bri zhing //de bzhin thugs kar nyid phyogs rgyu//ti hUM 'dzin du bzhugs
276a3(rgyud): pa dang //phyag gnyis rdo rje bcings par bcings//de nas rdo rje phra mo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas po yin te/dkyil 'khor chen
276a4(rgyud): /po'i tshul du bzhugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas ye shes kyi mtshan ma lag tu byin nas rang gi sems lngas su rung bar bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya chen po'i ye/
276a5(rgyud): shes bslab pa//lce ni dkan la sbyar bya zhing //sna yi rtse mor bsam bya ba//rdo rje phra mo bde reg pas//sems ni mnyam par gzhag por 'gyur//rdo rje phra mo
276a6(rgyud): bde reg pa'i//mtshan ma gal te byung ban//mtshan ma de ni khyab bya ba//sems du kun tu khyab par bya//ji tsam 'dod pas snams gyu nas//khams gsum du yang
276a7(rgyud): kharba pa ra Sha gu ra//de nAs de yang ba sr-i ba nI//s+ya i/rtse rmoShA ba r-i du gau nAsa?//rde nA sa shrIR+YA ta klenau R+Ya pu rba gap+lur+tha/!u dzA uda? r+rang+ra swe tha mo glai pra wau/nr-i drAg+ga b+h+ra r+Yar+YaM/d+yA tra pred+d+henA
276b1(rgyud): pa 'asrung //ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi brtag pa'o//de nas dro rnams kyi snying po 'di yin+da no//s+yAk+Sha badz+ra s+pha ra Na/so hA ra Na badz+ra/badz+ra hr-i da tiSh+ThA/sems dpa' glang bri b+h+yAm+b+ha
276b2(rgyud): pa ni//mnyam 'gyur brtan pa chen po yis//sems kyis khyab pa'i tshul gyis ni//so mas can kun la des khyab bya//byams pas khyab pa'i tshul gyis nI/snying rje
276b3(rgyud): can ni gang yin pa//sems can kun don ldan pa yin//sgrub pa yis ni khyab par bya//kun kyang rang bzhin 'od gsol ba//gdod nas dog pas nA mkha' gzhin
276b4(rgyud): chos samu yang na chos ma yin//bsam pas khyab cing po dga' bar 'gyur//gdul dka' ba dang mtshungs 'dra ba//sangs rgyas byang chub snod ma yin//de dag rtogs
276b5(rgyud): par bya ba'i phyir//btang snyoms chen po goms por bya//de'i snying po ni 'di rnams yin no//ma hA mai tr-i s+pha ra NI/mu hA kA ru Na s+pha ra Na/sar+b+be bu d+ho pA ma te s+phar me/
276b6(rgyud): sar+b+ba satwAM sau bo d+ha la/de nas de bzhin pa shugs pa thams cad kyi rjes su dran pa'i ye shes bslab bo//na mkha' yi ni phyogs gzhan du//rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/
276b7(rgyud): 'gro dang me yang ni 'dug kyang rung //rdo rje'i dbyibs ni goms par bya//de bzhin du yang gnas kun tu//rdo rje phra mo sbyar ba yis//mnyam par gzhag pas snying khar ni//
277a1(rgyud): /rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sgom//ji lta ba yo rim bzhin du//rdo rje blam+bu'o tshul gyus nI//pyug nA rdo rje dpyongs chen po//gnas rnams kun tu
277a2(rgyud): bsgoms par bya//rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'o//sangs rgyas kun gyi dus kun tu//ji lta ba'i go rims bzhin//meny+tsom par gzhag pas bsgom par bya/
277a3(rgyud): de la snying po na 'di rnams yin no//badz+ra mu khi b+he bA/mahA bo d+hi sAt+ma A bai sha/badz+rI pA Ni d+hA rA shA ya sA ru baM/bud+d+ha U nu smr-i tI A be sha/rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis
277a4(rgyud): na/goms par bya ba bdag nyid kyis//zla ba'i dbyibs su bdag nyid ni//byang chub sems kyis sgom pa'o//zla ba'i dkyi 'khor dbus su ni//bdag nyid rdo rje'i
277a5(rgyud): dbyibs gyur par//bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bye ba//sems dpa'i rdo rje sgom pa'o//rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar lo//bdag nyid snying khAr rdo rje sems//bdag nyid
277a6(rgyud): kyis ni bsgom bya ba//rdo rje sems dpa' sgom pa'o//rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa//sangs rgyas gzugasu bdag nyid ni//bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba//
277a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub sgom pa'o//de la snying po ni 'di rnamaso//sa man+ta b+ha dra A bai sha/badz+ra satwa badz+ra A be sha/badz+ra satwa sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na a be sha/ta thA ga te haM/
277b1(rgyud): dung drun rnon thogs pa rlonan du cu chus spyod gdul ba'i byag tu shos pa byug+sa/'dug ni dro brtson b+h+yonas da dz+nyArnam// chugar+b+ha snu hU~Mg ban+d+hang
277b2(rgyud): dbang po g+hAN+Tits+tshi nA many+dzam+b+ha m+WA byas//sems can+da rnams nad rmu gos par byed//byad+mag ni rdo rje chen snron ts+tsha//rdo rje'i wAg+h+ra tu len+d+ha cig pa //dbang bgan pa ni m+bu
277b3(rgyud): sa gdon myi zla bar 'jig rten 'grugs//bdun ni rdo rje tshu sma dang m+b+han+ta mi/du de tshig N+DI lan cig da//byung po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas//da mas
277b4(rgyud): mas cad 'jig/bdag na sna tshogs lus dang rmAny+dza sa/d+h+r-idaSh+T+ri tshig tu lan TIg brjod//dab ba gas ni m+b+han+tamu sbyar bas//la swA~M rnam sna rnams sA p+la /
277b5(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kying rje'i byin gyis brnangs skyes bya ba'i ti de 'dzin gyi byAg d+hA'i ye gr-isuM bsgrub pa//rdo dzI pra mo'i tshul gyis ni
277b6(rgyud): dbus su bstim+b+ha byA ba//bdag nyid sangs rgyu m+bu b+hU nying+gang+ge//des ni sa sgra rgyal nyid du 'grub//de nas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyi byug rgyu'i ye shes bsrub gi/
277b7(rgyud): rdus gyu lo//sbyong 'ang rdo rje la sogs lal pa//bzlums na rdo rjes sogs pas//ring ga dngas grub sbyin par byed//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs
278a1(rgyud): mai ti 'dzin b+h+yo mchog po byug rgya'i ya shes bsgrub bo//rdo rje btsongs las logs byung ba//bad+ma drug rnams su bshad bsdu//ting 'jan/
278a2(rgyud): ni dam tshig mchog/de rnams kyi ni bcings pa bshad//dkyil mo krung 'dug gi ni rgyal du//g.yas bac+doMs de bzhin slar banus pa//snying khe ru gnos pa bzhi
278a3(rgyud): pa ste//rdo rje sems sogs dkyil 'khor ro//dpral bar gzhag dang lhag po dang //'breg pa dang ni dgong par sbyar//khang bye zhapa snying kha ral gri dang /
278a4(rgyud): khang rnaM sa dang kha nas dbyung //spyi'o tha~Mng+ga ka khyer bkrug pa//mdzub mAM gnyis bkug mdun de bzhin//de nas gzhan yang las kyi phyug rgyu bslab par bya'o//
278a5(rgyud): krI/grag+ma/marda/a gr-i 'aM tAM rtA.AM aiHbaM baMHtri TA/hrIHTa/b+hU na/kr-i sha/ha hi ba ba baM baM/paT/gras/de nas chos kyi las kyi mchog/
278a6(rgyud): bla mo'i rdo rje can rnams bslab//ye shes khu tshur dam tshig lus//gnyis su byas nas sbyar bar bya//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon
278a7(rgyud): par rtogs pa chen po'i rgyal ba rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so///de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
278b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchog gre bran med pa'i mchod pa chen po'i chog rgyus pas khyab pa'i los kyi dam tshig gi ye shes byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya bu'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
278b2(rgyud): par zhugs nas rang gi reg pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+hA tu a nut+tA ra pU dza karma s+pha ra Na sA mi yAM hU~M/dI na sa de bzhin gshegs pa mi
278b3(rgyud): dayo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad k+Shi rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting
278b4(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/oM sarba tAthA ga ta badz+ra satatwa a nut+tA rA pU dza kar+m+ma s+phA ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/de nas de bzhin
278b5(rgyud): gshegs pa rin chen 'byung byas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i mchod pa bla na med pa'i rgyu ge rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i
278b6(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'dri smras pa/oM sarba ta thA ga ta~M badz+ra rat+na a nu d+hA ra brA dza krar+m+ma s+pha ra Na
278b7(rgyud): sa ma yo b+h+yAM/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa che tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi mchod pa bla ni med pa'i cho gi rgyas po khyab pa'i las
279a1(rgyud): dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pad+ma zhugs nas rang gi rog pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/oM sarba ta thA gu tA
279a2(rgyud): badz+ra d+harma a nut+tA ra pU dza kar+m+ma sA ra NaM sa ma ye hUM/dwe nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi mchod
279a3(rgyud): pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog
279a4(rgyud): 'di smras pa/oM sarba ta thA gau ta badz+ra kar+m+ma a nut+ta ra pU dza kAr+m+ma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin
279a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
279a6(rgyud): zhugs te/snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe de bzhin gaushegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid chos kyi dbyings thams
279a7(rgyud): cad du khyab pa na mkha'i dbyings kun tu rgyas pa/rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyi bkod pa'i cho ge rgyas pa'i rab 'byam sprin gyi rgya mtsho'i lha mo
279b1(rgyud): rnams su gyur te byung nas/'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam sprin rgya mtsho rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa
279b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi bla ni med pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po blo skyed pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes par bya ba dang /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa
279b3(rgyud): sgrub pa dang /byang chub chen po'i snying por nye bar 'gro ba dang /bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon por
279b4(rgyud): rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bskyed pa dang /khams gsum thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba
279b5(rgyud): dang /dam po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang /sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don bya ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang
279b6(rgyud): cho 'phrul thams cad bstan nas bzhugs so//mchod pa'i sbyin rgya mtsho'i lha mo de dag kyang rang rang gi phyag rgyu lag pa gnyis kyis 'dzin cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams
279b7(rgyud): cad la tshi ga bzhin du yang dag par mchod de/rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjog pa 'di ched du brjod do//
280a1(rgyud): e ma'o//sangs rgyas mchod pa bdag/mchod pa kun ni byed pa phyin//gang phyir sangs rgyas nyid chen du//sangs rgyas kun+da gyi sku grub par
280a2(rgyud): mdzad//de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa la sogs bya'i las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdo rje'i bya ba zhes bya ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor
280a3(rgyud): 'dri bshad do//oM sarba ta thA gra ta sarba At+ma niR+YA ta na pU dza s+pha ra Ne karma badz+ri Ni hUM A/oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+yA ta na pU dzo s+pha ra Na karma gri dza
280a4(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nIr+yA ta na a nu rA ga pU dza s+thi ra Ne kar+m+ma bA Ne hUM ho/oM sarba ta thA ga tI sarba At+ma nir+yA te nA sA d+hu ka ra pU dze s+pha ra Na karma tuSh+Ti a
280a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' zhing bde ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sbyin 'dren ma dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par
280a6(rgyud): byed pa mo dang /de bzhin gshegasasu pa thams cad dgyes par byed pa mo rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po rnams so//
280a7(rgyud): oM na maHsarba ta thA ge ta kA ya a b+hi She ka rat+ne b+ho badz+ra me Ni oM/oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta sUr+ye b+ho badz+ra te dzo ni dz+wa la hrIHoM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta sha
280b1(rgyud): /ba brA daN+Da/ts+tshan+tu ma NA d+h+wa dzA a pra b+hA badz+ra d+hA dza a grad+d+ha/oM na maHsarba tu thA grA ta ma hA prI ta pra ma d+yA ka ra b+h+yo badz+ra hA s+ya ha/dbang mo tshan myo dang /snang ba chen mo dang /
280b2(rgyud): rin po che chen po'i chung 'bebs ma dang /rab tu dga' zhing mgu ma rnams ni de bzhin gra shegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i mchod pa'o//oM sarba ta nA ga N+Di
280b3(rgyud): d+har+m+mat+mA sarbA d+hId+hIrmAstu na mai mUSh+TatrAm+bu grI d+hI.oM sin+na tI thA ga r+b+he bAn+d+ha bI rA mid+g+ha ni rAng+ga r-I su nu mA mahA kro wAn+da gr-i d+ha/oM sid+g+ha trASh+ThakrAh+Na hwag+sa
280b4(rgyud): pa btI dr-i sing+ga pa tInan desbyin mo sar+b+ba maN+Da laM hUM/oM sarbi ta thA gau ti sit+tormAShi bud+d+ha saM b+hI ti b+hin ya~M/sbyin mo ban+d+ha \u0f7f/ye shes chen mo'i glu /
280b5(rgyud): dbyangs ched ma'i rjes su 'brang ma dang /dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug ma dang /sngags kyi spyong ma rnams nI de bzhin gi stegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mchod pani
280b6(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta d+hu pa m+me g+ha s+pha ra Na pU dza karma ka ra ka ra/oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pra sA re s+pha ra Na pU dza karme ki ri ki ri/oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ki dz+wA la s+phA raNapU
280b7(rgyud): kam ka ri ka ra~M/oM sarba ta thA ga ti kan+d+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na pU dza karmaM ku ru ku ru/sems can mo dang /byang chub chen po'i yan lag can ma dang /mig ljin ma ngi /
281a1(rgyud): dri ldan ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi mchod pa'o//de nas 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma lus shing lus pa med pa
281a2(rgyud): thams cad la mchod pa byed pa'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje zhes bya ba bshad do//de nas rab tu bshad bya ba//las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste//rdo rje dbyings dang
281a3(rgyud): 'dra bas na//rdo rje bye ba zhes kyang grags//dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni//sangs rgyas sku rnams bzhag par bya//rdo rje sems la sogs tshul du//
281a4(rgyud): lha mo phyag rgya bcas pa b+hI//de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje bya ba 'dir gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad du/de la dang po rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil
281a5(rgyud): 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis gzhug par bya ba/bcug nas kyang 'di skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dam tshig yin gyis/
281a6(rgyud): mchod pa bcu drug po 'di rnams khyod kyis nyin re zhing ci nus su gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o//de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol te las kyi dkyil 'khor bstan
281a7(rgyud): la thams cad kyi mtshan ma lag po gnyis su sbyin no//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod na gzhan gyis lte smos kyang ci dgos//de nas
281b1(rgyud): byang chub chen pa'i sems sgrub pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgyu'i ye shes bsgrub par bya'o//byung na mya sems ni brtan bskyed pas//bdag ni sangs rgyas yo nongs mthong /
281b2(rgyud): dka' bas bdag ni mchod byed na//sangs rgyas kyi ni bde ba'ang 'thob//byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas//bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing //phreng
281b3(rgyud): la sogs rab mchod pas//mchod na de ni dbang yang bskur//byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas//bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing //snyan pa'i glu yis
281b4(rgyud): rab mchod pas//mchod na bdag de mgu bar 'gyur//byang chub sems ni brtan+d+ha bskyed pas//bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsgom zhing //gar gyi mA cha pas bdag
281b5(rgyud): mchod na//sangs rgyas kyis kyang de mchod 'gyur//de la snying po nr-i 'di rnams yin no//bud+d+ha At+ma ko&haM/bud+d+ha A b+hi ShIny+tsa mi/bu d+hAs+thA ti kA ra mi/but+ta
281b6(rgyud): pU dza ka ra mi/de nas sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o//lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi//mchag gi tshul gyis phyag 'tshal
281b7(rgyud): zhing //de bzhin sangs rgyas kun mchad na//rtag tu phyag byor 'os par 'gyur//sangs rgyas thams cad bsod nams che//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje smyos//rdzas
282a1(rgyud): yo rang bas mchod na//myur du sang+yas rgyas 'thob par 'gyur//lus dang drug snyoms rdo rje yi s+yA//lha rdzas kyi ni bdag dbul bya'i//mchod pa//
282a2(rgyud): kun gyis sangs rgyas rnams//mchod na de yang mchod por 'gyur//lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi//dge ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad ni//yongs su bsngo ba'i
282a3(rgyud): mchod pa yi//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur//de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no//pra NA mi nut+ta da r+m+ma d+hA pU dzA ba rinAm+b+ha/de nas chos kyi ye shes
282a4(rgyud): phyag rgya bsrung bar bya'o//chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba//ngo bo nyid kyis gzod nas dag/chos 'di dag gis mchod pas ni//dga' ba'i badre ba thob par
282a5(rgyud): 'gyur//chos rnams kun ni 'dus pa yi//A zhes bya ba sgro zhes brjod//chos kyi phyag rgya 'di yis ni//de yi sdug bsngal thams cad gcod//'dir ni chos rnams
282a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi//rgyu ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste//dam chos 'khor lo'i mchod pa yis//mchod pas chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur//chos rnams thams cad ring
282a7(rgyud): bzhin gyis//sgra brnyan dag dang 'drar bshad de//chos kyi mchod pa 'di dag gis//mchod na sangs rgyas gsung yang 'thob//de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams
282b1(rgyud): yin no//s+yArba shud+d+ha sa man+ta b+hA dra/d+har+m+ma tsakra nISh+Ta pany+tsa/de nas tring 'dzin gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o//lus dang ngagra sems rdo rje yi//rang gi
282b2(rgyud): rdul ne phra mo rnams//rdo rje'i dbyibs su bsgoms na ni//rdo rje'i bdag nyid myur du thob//lus dang ngagra sems rdo rje yi//rang gi rdul ni phra mo rnams//sangs rgyas
282b3(rgyud): kun tu bsgoms na ni//chos kyi skur ni myur du 'gyur//lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi//rlung gi lus ni phra mo rnamaste//rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms na ni//rdo rje
282b4(rgyud): sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur//lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis//rang gi lus ni phra mo rnams//sangs rgyas kyi ni skur bsgoms na//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
282b5(rgyud): nyid du 'gyur//de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no//badz+ra kA ya/d+har+m+ma kA ya/satwe kA ya/bud+d+ha kA ya//de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes
282b6(rgyud): bslab par bya ste/rang 'byung la nI las kun gyis//'khyud pa'i bde ba'i mchod pa ni//phul nu rdo rje sems dpa'i dang //'dra bar de ni myur du 'gyur//shin tu chag pa
282b7(rgyud): par sbyor ba yis//dam du bzung ba'i bde ba ni//sangs rgyas rnams la phul 'gyur na//rdo rje rin chen 'dra bar 'gyur//shin tu dga' zhing bde chags pas//brtan
283a1(rgyud): pad+ma gyu pa ma tshad 'dubs//sangs rgyas rnams la phul na ni//rdo rdo rjes dang 'dra bar 'gyur//dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sgyur ba la NA kun tu sto//
283a2(rgyud): ba'i bde ba ni//mchod pa'i pir ni phul bas na//rdo rje las dang 'dra bar 'gyur//de dag gi gsang ba'i sbrang po ni 'di dag yin no//ra ti byAdz+rI/rA ga badz+re/ye ti
283a3(rgyud): karma badz+ra/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phrin las kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/snying kha rtse ljags rgya bsgyur ba
283a4(rgyud): dpral ba lnga sogs de bzhin du//kha dang rna ba mgo lhag pa//spyi bar 'phrag pa kho rkang bzhag/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa ro dam tshi
283a5(rgyud): gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o//phyag rgya chen pa'i tshul gyis ni//rdo rje bcings pa dam byas la//sbreng kha la sogs gnas tshul tu//bzhag nas rgyal ba
283a6(rgyud): rnams mchod do//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cudal mchod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o//oM kra sa y+ya sU trai raM kr-i na khaM shaM hU~M
283a7(rgyud): shino shI swaM//las kyi phyag rgya mngar bsdus na//las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bya//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mang ni par rtogs pa la mo
283b1(rgyud): rtog pa chen po'i rgyu la blo rdo rje las zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pA rdzogs so///de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin ga kyi/
283b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyud nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams rgyud kyi rigs kyi rtogs pa chen po'i cho ga
283b3(rgyud): /rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/oM sarba ta thA ga ta muSh+Ti bi/de nas
283b4(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis po rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas de bzhin
283b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad du rigs kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrag
283b6(rgyud): rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/a badz+ra satwa muSh+Ti sa ra/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis
283b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dum bu'i rgyal po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i
284a1(rgyud): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/oM badz+rA rAt+na muSh+NI trA~M/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa che tshad med
284a2(rgyud): pabs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gsheg smra ba thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
284a3(rgyud): dum+b+ha bu'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'od dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/oM badz+ra d+harma
284a4(rgyud): mr-iSh+NI khaM/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
284a5(rgyud): kyi rigs bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dum bu'i rgyal po'i cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
284a6(rgyud): phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/oM badz+ra karma muSh+Ti haM/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rang gi byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par
284a7(rgyud): snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po'i tshe ga rgyas pa 'di'i
284b1(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir rdo rje'i dngos grub ces bya ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do//de nas rab tu bshad bya ba//phyag rgyu'i dkyil 'khor dam
284b2(rgyud): pa ste//rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas ni//rdo rje dngos grub tsos kyang grags//dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni//mkhas pas rab tu bri bar b+h+yo//thog mar sangs rgyas
284b3(rgyud): gzugs bzhag ste//de nas phyag rgya bzhi yang bri//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//rdo rje'i phyag rgya la sogs bri//dA nas rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor
284b4(rgyud): 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas de bzhin du btsud de 'di skad smra bar bya'o//khyod kyi gsang ba'i le'u 'di su la yang ma bstan cig/de ci'i phyir
284b5(rgyud): zhe na/log par lta ba dang /sdig pa'i las byed pa'i sems can rnams kyang yod do//brtson 'grus chung ba dang /sbyor ba med pa dang /ri mo mi shes pa de dag rdo rje'i
284b6(rgyud): dbyings la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnamasu brtson 'grus chung pos mi 'jug ste/de dag gi don du rdo rje dngos grub
284b7(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig du gyur pa 'di ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi kham
285a1(rgyud): //rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang /phan pa dang /bde ba dang /yid bde ba thams cad myong bar byA ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje da
285a2(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub kyi bar du byin gyis brlabs so//khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba 'di rnams la yid mi ches shing //
285a3(rgyud): ma dad par mi byed cig/sems can dmyal ba dang /byol song dang /yi dwags kyi khams su ltung bar gyur pa 'am/mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus ma yin par shi bar
285a4(rgyud): gyur ta re zhes bsgo la gdong g.yogs bkrol te dkyil 'khor bstan to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig smros shig/bdag nyid chen
285a5(rgyud): po'i gang gi/phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings pa//bzlas pa'i snying po'i don tu ni//der ni bdag nyid bsgom par bya//ye shes 'di yi tshul gyis ni//phyag na rje
285a6(rgyud): rjes gsung ba bzhin//bdag nyid chen po'i phyag rgya kun//de dag kun gyis grub par 'gyur//de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba brjod par bya'o//rang gi dang
285a7(rgyud): po gshibs nas ni//rdo rje bcings pas bzung bar bya//de yis phyag rgya gang reg pa//de ma thag tu de dbang bskur//de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi chos nyid brjod par bya/
285b1(rgyud): rlon bran 'grus sbya /su rgyas phyug rgyu bcong bar //mgo 'di la tshul gyis no//yo ma phyag n+d+ha nga du gyu//do nas /m+b+ha na rgyums pyo ka
285b2(rgyud): dang gang dang nga sa dang blo//spyod pa la sogs byung ba rnams//sangs rgyas rnams la phul na ni//los kyi phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur//do nas dkyil lakhon thams cad sgyum
285b3(rgyud): po'i gsang ba'i phyag rgyu'i ye shes bslab par bya'o//mtshan ma brtan por rang gyur nas//dkar por gyur pa'i ras la gnas//mtshan ma mchod rten byin rlabs te//bdag
285b4(rgyud): nyid rdo rje dbyings su sgom//rdo rje bcings pa dam byas te//gung ma myu gu bzhin du gshig/mtho'u chung dang ni mdzub rtse sgreng //dam tshig mchog gi dam tshig
285b5(rgyud): rdo rje phra mo'o tshul du ni//rab tu mnyam par gzhog pas sgo m+b+ha//rdo rje prA madz+dzi dkyil 'khor de//de'adzin dpang du 'gyur ba'i rgyul//dza rje'i phyag rgya ga
285b6(rgyud): brdzings la//de gnyis rdo rje dam du gzung //mdzub mo'i mthe'u chung ba sgral ba ni//rdo rje dgos mchog dkyil 'khor lo//de nas sems dpe'i rdo rje m+b+ha la sogs
285b7(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bani ji lta ba bzhin du rlabs nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o//rdo rje'i dngos grub
286a1(rgyud): phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du mi g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi
286a2(rgyud): tshul du rang rang gi phyag rgya rnams su bris na dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub bo//de ltar ras dang /rtsig pa dang /na mkha' dang /gnas thams cad du bris na
286a3(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad 'grub bo//dkyil 'khor brtag pa nas brtsams te la la ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa nyid kyi tshe ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub/la la
286a4(rgyud): ni de nas brtsams nas nyin zhag gcig gis/la la ni nyi ma bzhis/la la ni zhag bcu drug gis/la la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang ji ltar
286a5(rgyud): 'dod pa bde blag tu don thams cad byed cing thams cad rjes su dga' ba dang /ro dang /zas dang /spyod pa thams cad kyi bde ba rnams du myong bar byed bzhin
286a6(rgyud): du yang lo gtsug gis mchog 'grub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs
286a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon//
286b1(rgyud): par rtogs pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //badz+ra satwa/de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'/
286b2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes sems can gyi khams mi lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyeb pa dang /phan pa dang /bde ba dang /yid bde ba
286b3(rgyud): thams cad myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa 'grub par bya ba'i bar du theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di
286b4(rgyud): bshad do//de nas rab tu bshad bya ba//sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste//rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na//rdo rje sems dpa' zhes kyang bshad//dkyil 'khor
286b5(rgyud): chen po'i tshul du ni//dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//rdo rje sems dpa' bzhag par bya//de nas dbug pa dang /
286b6(rgyud): bzhug pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes rnams bskyed par bya'o//de la thog mar 'di skad du khyod
286b7(rgyud): kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba dang /khod du ma chud pa su la yang gsang ba 'di ma smra shig/khyod ngan song thams cad du ltung kha'am/mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus ma yin
287a1(rgyud): /parar+ya shrI bar gyur taro zhes bsgo bar ba'o//de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub dam pa sgrub pa'i ye shes bslab bo//zla rgyas dkyil 'khor la 'dun
287a2(rgyud): ste//phyag rgya chen po longs bzung bas//bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar ni//bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur//de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi/
287a3(rgyud): gsang ba'i dam tshig ye shes bslab bo//'dod chags bral ba'i sdig lta bu//khams gsum ni yang gzhan med de//de bas 'dod la chags bral bar//khyod ni/
287a4(rgyud): nAnam yang ma byed cig/ma hA sa mi ya ha nA phaT ces mna'i snying po sbyin no//de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rnams su dom
287a5(rgyud): tshig gi sdom pa sbyin par bya'o//de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bzhi bcing ba bslab par bya'o//dngos grub kyang de bzhin no//ri mo la sog
287a6(rgyud): pa dang /lugs mo'i sku gzugs thams cad la yang ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho ga bzhin du byas na dngos grub thams cad de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro//rdo rje dbyings kyi
287a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas par bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du yang bya'o//de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das de
287b1(rgyud): na gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso ba byang chub sems dang 'dzin pa rdo rje sems dpa' phyug na rdo rje chen po la rdo rje dgyes pa'i snying po 'dis legs pa dgasam ta/
287b2(rgyud): oM legs rdo rje sems dpa' khyod//rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so//rdo rje chas khyod legs pA s+t+waM//rdo rje lus ni khyod legs so//rdo rje theg pa bla na myed//de bzhin
287b3(rgyud): pa kun gyi gsang //theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i//mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad//rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshon gyis kyang //dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/
287b4(rgyud): dag par byas nas bsgrubs na ni//sangs rgyas nyid kyang bde bar 'grub//rdo rje chos kyi sbyor bas ni//'dod pa kun gyi bde bas bde//tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub pas na/
287b5(rgyud): bde ba mi zad med mi 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa
287b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so////bam po bzhi pa//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu
287b7(rgyud): 'dus par gyur te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor lo chen po bskong ba la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab bo/
288a1(rgyud): /rdo rje snyems dpa' dzod+hidz+haiM//dzor+d+ha mgon hU~M ba bsgrub mngang //rdo rje dbyung bskur rdo rje 'od//rdo rje dpa khyod phyag 'tshal lo//rdo rje bzhud pa
288a2(rgyud): chos chen po//rdo rje ral gri mchog chen po'i//dkyil 'khor kun gyi rgyal po mchog/spros med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//rdo rje las dang srung ba che//gno
288a3(rgyud): sbyin gtum pa gdon chen po//rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che//phyag rgya kun la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dang byang chub che//sa A rgyus thams cad de bzhin
288a4(rgyud): shegs//rdo rje'i ye shes ye shes che//theg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//don kun gyi ni de nyid don//se ma can don chen kun rig pa//kun mkhyen kun byas
288a5(rgyud): thams cad de//kun gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//rdo rje bdag rab rdo rje mchog/rdo rje brtson ma rdo rje 'chad//dam tshig chen po de nyid don//sems chen khyod

288b4(rgyud): te/de bzhin pa shes pa'i sems tshon baM//rdo rje rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas gtso bo rgyal bka' nyan//rangs rgyas bshes gnyen rgyal mchog smos//
288b5(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad che dang khyab//ston zhi khro la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid che//yang dag mtha' dang che ba'i tshul//pha rol phyin pa kun mkhyen pa
288b6(rgyud): don dam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//kun tu bzong dang spyod pa mchog/bdud dang bdud ni rab 'dul ba//kun gyis/cho ga dang mnyam nyid mkhyen//kun tu 'gro khyod
288b7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas hUM zhes hUM zhes pa//rdo rje hUM zhes 'dul ba go//rdo rje thams cad rdo rje mchog/phyag na rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal//phyag bya mtsho
289a1(rgyud): /cing brjod pa dang //rim gro rA dwa bzhin gshegs pas bya//gang phyir rdo rje snrums brtan pas//rdo rje sems dpa' zhes khyod bya//rdzogs pa'i
289a2(rgyud): byang chub khyod rag lus//kun gzigs yab ni khyod yin te//byung ba dang ni 'byung 'gyur ba'i//de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis bsgrubaso//bstod pa'i rgyal
289a3(rgyud): po 'di yis ni//rab tu mos pas bstod byed cing //glu blangs gang zhig mcho byed pa//de ni rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur//sangs rgyas kun la mnga' mdzad pa'i//
289a4(rgyud): mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni//sems can kun don mdzad pa'i phyir//rang gi rigs ni skyed par mdzod//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo
289a5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol ba'i tshigo thos nas rdo rje de dag nyid kyi snying khar bzhag ste/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad
289a6(rgyud): bos nas 'di skad gsungs so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'tshal to//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ci'i phyir//
289a7(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pas smras pa/bcom ldan 'das dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
289b1(rgyud): kyis kyang zhabs gdul bar mi spyod pa de dag la bdag gi ji ltar sgrub par bgyi//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
289b2(rgyud): gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/snyoms par zhugs ma thag
289b3(rgyud): tu de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad na mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam par spros pa nyid kyi/rI rab ri'i rtse mo rdo rje dang /nor
289b4(rgyud): dang /rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs par yong gcig tu 'dus te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas bcom ldan
289b5(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka'i dpal gyi be'ur zhugs so//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs ba
289b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi thugs su bdag byin gyis brlabs te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams
289b7(rgyud): yongs su bskyab pa dang /phan po dang /bde ba'i dam pa thams cad 'grub pa dang /ma rungs pa thams cad gdul ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying
290a1(rgyud): chen po'i thabs kyi ting ngo 'dzin gyi ye shes la dmigs te//de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad kyi spyod rje chen po'i thabs khro bo'i dam chog rdo rje
290a2(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nAs de bzhinA ga shegs pa theng

290a7(rgyud): bar snang mdzad kyi phyogs kun tu rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste ched du brjod pa 'od ched du brjod do//e ma thabs
290b1(rgyud): sa 'dul ba yi//thabs chen ldan pa badrug yon to//gang phyir sems can 'dul thab sa phyir//dri ma med pa'i khro gnyer rag/de nas de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
290b2(rgyud): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spros pa med pa'i chos nyid la dmigs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo chen
290b3(rgyud): bo rdo rje'i dam tshig rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs
290b4(rgyud): pa thams ca kyi skyed pe rig pa'i mchog 'di smras 'o/oM su b+hA ni suM b+hA nI d+h+waM/gr-ih+Na gr-id+d+ha d+hI/gr-ih+NA pA ya gr-ih+NA pa yAd+d+ha/ nA ya ho/b+ha ga d+hA na badz+nyA d+ha
290b5(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ma thig tu bcom ldan 'das phyag ni rdo rjer gyur te/byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho
290b6(rgyud): sbyin thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sem+b+has dI ba'i 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs te/spyan drongs nos rdo rje dam
290b7(rgyud): tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug ste dam tshig gis bcings nas/yang gcig tu 'dres te rdo rje khro bo chen po'i lus su gyur nas bcom ldan 'odas rnam par snang
291a1(rgyud): mdzad kyi thug sak+Shar 'du ba ste ched du brjod pa 'ang chung ngu badz+rod do//e mA'o byang chub sems 'di ni//kun tu bzang zhing sdig med de//dang phyir sems

291a3(rgyud): spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te yang bka' nod cing dazhug so//de nas yang btsam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis dgug
291a4(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu zhes bya ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

291a6(rgyud): gyi dbang po dbang phyug chen po la stsogs pa ji skyed pa de dag thams cad 'jig rten thams cad na gnas pa'i cho gas kyis bskor ba ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams//
291a7(rgyud): ded bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i lcags kyus bkug nas ri ring ri'i gang na ba dang /rtse mo rdo rje dang /nor bu dang /rin po che las byas pa'i
291b1(rgyud): khang du brtags pa gang na ba den lkug snro nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi kha bru brtogs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang /nor du dang /rin po che las byas pa thams cad du bsgyur nas la dz+hang
291b2(rgyud): par gyur to//de nas phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs ka nas rdo rje de blangs te gsar zhing thams cad dang ldan pa'i khams gsum ji skyed pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi

291b4(rgyud): gis 'di skad ces gsol te//bdag cag gis ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/skyabs su
291b5(rgyud): 'gro ba sgrub par byos//kun mkhyen ye shes thob pa'i phyir//grogs po rnams kyis sgrub par byas//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'jig rten gsum po thams cad/
291b6(rgyud): kyekyi bdag po lnga tshon po 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pas dregs te cher khros par ston cing 'di skad ces smras so//kye/gnod sbyin du ni 'jig rten
291b7(rgyud): gsum po mtha' dag gi gtso bo//dbang phyug chen po byed pa po//'jig pa bo/'byung ba thams cad kyi dbang po/lce'i sgra chen po yin na/gnod sbyin khyod kyi ngag
292a1(rgyud): mkhamamamatham pa thams sacam cacas mthamasamamacan thasamamama.a tha ma' mams ca yamasas canaya ma yal ma san mamasaman ma yas tham mam
292a2(rgyud): ci'i phyir nyan/de nas yang phyag na rdo rje rdo rje gsor zhing bka' stsal pa/kyo sems can ma rungs pa dkyil 'khor du myur du zhugs la nga'i dam chog la//

292a4(rgyud): stsol pa 'di su zhig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa la bos+ya te 'di skad gsungs so//

292a7(rgyud): dog gi dbang por gyur pa dang /rang gi shes pa'i dbang gis 'khor mang po dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'jigs pa bstan pa'i phyir khro zhing gtum pa
292a8(rgyud): chen po rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs 'bar ba chen po gtong zhing ma rungs pa chen pos rtag tu dgod pa rnams bstan nas 'di skad smras so//kye nga ni 'jig rten gsum
292b1(rgyud): mtha' dag gi bdag po bas khyod kyis nga la ci'i phyir bka' spru la/de nas phyug na rdo rjes rdo rje de snyoms pa dang bcas pas gAsor zhing 'dzum ste 'di skad ces smras so//
292b2(rgyud): kyi lus srul po mi'i shA za bo/zas su ro bsregs pa'i thal ba za zhing kha zos dang /me la dang /gos kyang de las byed pa nga'i bka' bzhin du byos shig/de nis lha chen
292b3(rgyud): po dbang phyug chen pos 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag dang /na mkha' rnams khro bo chen pos non por byin gyis brlabyas te 'di skad ces smras so//khyod kyang nga'i bka' nyon
292b4(rgyud): la dam tshig kyang longs shig/de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das lha chen po zhes bya ba'i lha
292b5(rgyud): 'di ni rang gis 'tshal ba'i stobs kyis dregs pa dang /dbang phyug chen po'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la 'dud par mi btub na/de la ji ltar
292b6(rgyud): bgyi ba'i rigs/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig dran par byas so//
292b7(rgyud): oM suM b+ha badz+ra hUM phaT/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i snying po 'di brjod do//hUM/de nas de brjod ma thag tu khams gsum pa thams cad
293a1(rgyud): nas 'dus pa'i lha chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po'i dbang po thams cad kha bub tu 'gyel nyam thag pa'i tshig 'byin cing bcom
293a2(rgyud): ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la skyabs su dong ngo //lha chen po zhes bya ba'i lha de ni sa la 'gyel te dran pa med par gyur te shi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen
293a3(rgyud): bzhin du byang chub sems dpo' phyag na rdo rje la de skad ces bka'o stsal to//phyag na rdo rje 'jig rten gsum po'i 'khor lo 'di thams cad la skyabs sbyin pa byos te
293a4(rgyud): ma bsad cig/de nas phyag ni rdo rje khro bo chen po'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thos nas lha thams cad bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so//
293a5(rgyud): gal te khyod rang gi srog 'dod na sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la skabs su dong la da'i bka' yang nyon cig/de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//sangs
293a6(rgyud): rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas pa la skyabos su mchi'o//khyod kyi bstan pa'i bka' ni bdag cag gis ma 'tshal to//de nas bcom
293a7(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas de dag bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kye lha rnams 'di ni nged de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po//
293b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thub bo bcom ldan 'das/
293b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ste/sems can thams cad gdul po'i don bya ba'i phyir khro bo'i rgyal po chen por dbang bskur ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
293b3(rgyud): khyod kyi nang na yang lha chen po la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems can yod de/de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zhi bar mdzad pas sdig pa las bzlog par mi
293b4(rgyud): spyod pa'i sdig pa'i sems can de rnams tshar bcad pa'i phyir byin gyis brlabs so//de bas na khyed rnams 'di'i dam tshig la gnas par byos shig par bka' stsal to//de dag
293b5(rgyud): gos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cig srog yal ba las bskyab tu gsol/bdag cag kyang bka' stsal pa bzhin du bgyed cing mchis/bcom
293b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kye grogs po rnams 'di nyid la skyabs su dong dang de nyid kyis kun tu skyob kyis gzhan gyis ni ma yin no//de nas khams gsum kun nas
293b7(rgyud): 'dus pa srid pa gsum gyi bdag po de rnams bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de dag ga la ba de logs su bltas nas nyam thag pa chen po'i sgra mgrin gcig tu phyung nas 'di skad ces
294a1(rgyud): /gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'tsho ba'i sdug bsngal 'di las kun tu bskyab par gsol//bde bar gshegs pa kun tu bskyab par gsol
294a2(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje lha la sogs pa de rnams bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kye ma rungs pa rnams nga'i bstan pa la
294a3(rgyud): zhugs shig/rdo rje 'bar ba 'dis gcig tu 'bar bar byas nas khyed thams cad kyang thal bar byas sa re/de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//khyed ni bcom ldan
294a4(rgyud): 'das kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa/zhi ba dul ba/sems can thams cad la phan par bzheng ba/sems can thams cad
294a5(rgyud): la mi 'jigs pa stsol ba lags na/ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag sreg par 'gyur/de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos de dag la 'di
294a6(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to//kye grogs po dag gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bka' bzhin du byed pa de'i phyir nga ni kun tu bzang po ste/khyed lnga bu'i sems
294a7(rgyud): can ma rungs pa'i ngang tshul can sdig pa'i sems rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir gal te nga'i dam tshig la mi gnas na chud gzan par bya'o//gsol ba/de bzhin du bgyi'o//
294b1(rgyud): de na/bya ba ni rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs pa'i lha de dag gzhan dbugs dbyung zhing bslang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje
294b2(rgyud): bslang ba zhes bya ba 'di smras so//oM badz+rod tiSh+Ta/de nas de skad smras ma thag tu dbang phyug chen po mo gtogs par khams gsum pa 'dus pa srid pa gsum gyi bdag po
294b3(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kun brgyal ba las sems dbugs byung ste/lha'i bde ba myong zhing 'jigs shing bag tsha ba dang /ba spu langs pa med par gyur nas bco
294b4(rgyud): ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la lta zhing langs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang po lha
294b5(rgyud): chen pa 'di mi bslang ni/'di srog de chud gzan par gyur te ci rung /gsos na ni de yang skyes bu dam par 'gyur ro//de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin du bya'o snyam nas shi ba
294b6(rgyud): gso ba'i snying po 'di smras so//badz+rA yuHde nas 'di smras ma thag tu lha chen po lha'i bdag po shi ba las sos te ldang 'dod no ba snang ni ma nus so//dri nas bcom ldan 'das
294b7(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di lta bus 'dul lam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyod skyes bu chen po 'di'i bka' nyan par mi
295a1(rgyud): 'jug na khyod la 'dul ba 'di nyid yin gyi nga ma yin no//dbang phyug chen pos gsol pa/ci bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis ma rungs pa'i sems
295a2(rgyud): can 'di las skyabs mdzad par mi spyod dem/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ngas 'di bsgrub mi nus so//gsel ba/ci'i slad du/bka' stsal pa/
295a3(rgyud): deb zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis byuka' sprul pa'i don bdag gis ma 'tshal to//
295a4(rgyud): ji lta zhe na/khams gsum gyi bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las gzhan pa'i bdab po mchis par mi 'tshalan 'di stsal bas/de nas bcom ldan 'das
295a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes yang lha chen po la pos te 'di skad ces gsungs so//kye ma rungs pa'i sems can de'i bka' mi 'ani tam
295a6(rgyud): de nas lha chen pos rdo rje sems dpa' cheg thos nas 'khrugs shing khros par gyur to//de ltar 'gyel bzhin du yang 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs bstan te/'di skad
295a7(rgyud): ces smras so//da shi bar bzad kyi khyod kyi ngag mi nyan to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rab tu khros par ston cing rang gi rkang pa'i mthil nas

297a1(rgyud): 6/ba dang /bslab pa dang /dam tshig dang /sdom pa bzung la de'i dumatshig la yang gnas par gyis shig/de dag gis gsol pa/de bzhin du 'chal

297b3(rgyud): rje'o//mthu bo che ni sgyu ma'i rdo rje'o//sgra gzhon nu ni rdo rje dril bu'o//tshungs pa ni thub pa'i rdo rje'o//dbang po ni rdo rje mtshon cha ste/reg par rgyal po rnams skye

297b7(rgyud): par rgyal ba'i rdo rje ste/de la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi gtso bo zhes bya bar dbang bskur ro//de nas sa bla'i dbang po thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/mdzod skyong ni rdo rje
298a1(rgyud): tho ba'o//ma ni rdo rje mo'o//rlung ni rdo d+hA rlung //ku bai ran+d+ra rdo rje 'jigs pa'o//do la sogs pa na dzA rje pho nyar dbang bsgyurar+ya ra//de nas
298a2(rgyud): sa 'og gi dbang po lha thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/le ga ni rdo rje lcags kyu'o//gshin rje na rdo rje dus so//gtsug pud sa ni rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso bo'o//ba ru
298a3(rgyud): ni klu'i rdo rje ste/de la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran zhes bya ba'i dbang bskur ro//de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po'i lha mo thams cad rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas

298a6(rgyud): me ni rdo rje khu tshur te//de la sogs pa ni rdo rje rgyal mor dbang bskur ro//de nas bar snang la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni 'di lta ste/mi 'chi ba ni

298b4(rgyud): dbang bskur ro//de nas sa 'og na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni 'di lta ste/phag maM ni rdo rje'i kha'o//tsa mun tri ni rdo rje dus so//sna chad ma ni rdo rje rul

298b6(rgyud): ye shes rnams bskyed nas phyag rgya bcings pa thams cad bslabs te/rdo rje dam tshig mAna'i snying po 'di byin no//rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che//sangs rgyas kun gyis byon gyis

299a1(rgyud): /rdo rje phyug rgyu gnyis bcings te/mdzub mo lcags kyu \u0f7fts+tshings nAs ni//gar+b+ha zhed phyir yang bcu bA byA//dngos pa'i ngan somyos gang yin pa/

299b7(rgyud): ka badz+re sa ma ye sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA b+hany+dzaka hUM baT/bu daM med thams cad kyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

300b6(rgyud): te/ma rungs pa'i dam tshig gi sems can de rnams yang bsregs shin tu btsos pas pa'o dod tsher 'bod cing phongs pa'i sgra cher phyung ste/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin

301a3(rgyud): gsungs so//oM ma hA badz+ra khu ra kro d+hA pa ta ya sarba duSh+Ta lau/bi nA sha ye sarba duSh+TaM sa me yaM b+hik+ki rA bi d+hA nAM sa ya s+pho Ta ya b+hany+dza ya sarba duSh+Ta ses ma ya mu drA ban+d+ha
301a4(rgyud): gr-ih+NA ha na da ha pa tsa sarba duSh+Ta su ma ye satwAM/badz+ra sa ma ye hU~M phaT/de nas gsungs ma thag tu ma rungs pa'i dam tshig dang /phyag rgya dang /dkyil 'khor thams cing

301a7(rgyud): gyi/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//oM ha na d+ha ne badz+ra hUM phaT/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes
301b1(rgyud): yang 'phra sa rnam sogs pa gdon ma ngas pa thams cad 'gugs pani skyong ba 'dagasongs so//oM bAdz+ra A kAR+Sha yA shwe g+ho sman duSh+TA krA to/badz+ra d+hA ra satwAn+nar+b+ho dzAH

301b6(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag cag shA 'tshal ba nA ji lhur bgyi ba bka' stsol cig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//phyag na rdo rje sems
301b7(rgyud): can 'di dag rnams thugs rje chen po bskyed la thabs sbyin paM sgrub par gyis shig/de nas phyag na rdo rje'i thugs rje cheni pos sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i mtshan
302a1(rgyud): ma shes pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang snying po 'di gsungs so//oM bAdz+ra pra ti gr-ih+Na hr-i da ya mA kAR+Sha ya/yud t+ya yo myA ta mA mA d+hA ra d+he nA mo ya tA/
302a2(rgyud): tad+ya s+ya hr-i da yAM ni ska mi dra sA ma ya hI dza/de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do//snying khur rdo rje leg ngar gnyis//shin tu dam por bcings nas ni//rdo rje mdzub
