302a4(rgyud): pa ma rungs pa'i gdan thams cad dga' bo'i sgra phyung nas mchid rgal to rang go gnas smra dong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/bcom ldan 'das la
302a5(rgyud): yang 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'ad sa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma rungs pa 'dul ba lags par bdog la bka' stsal na/da bcom ldan
302a6(rgyud): 'das rims la sogs pa'i nad de rnams le ji ltar bgyi/bdag la bka' stsol cig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/oM hUM phaT/de nas
302a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag ni rdo rjes rims la sogs pa'i nad dgug pa'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs pa/oM badz+ra sa ma ya/A na ya sarba dr-iSh+Te dz+wa rad+hIts+tsha
302b1(rgyud): ya hU~M phaT/da nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu rims la sogs pa'i nad thams cad du rab de'i rtse mo'i phyi rol tu bskur te 'badad//de nas phyagan rdo rjes rlomasna las
302b2(rgyud): pa'i nang 'di rnams la bos te/'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kye bzod ldan rnams sems can gsod pa las ldog pa'i bslab pa gzung po'i sdem+bu pi long shig
302b3(rgyud): de dag gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni sems can gyi medangs phrogs te 'tsho bar bgyid na/de bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar bya gyi
302b4(rgyud): legs byar bka' stsal cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyug na rdo rjes rang gi las rnam par dag par gyur pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di gsung
302b5(rgyud): oM badz+ra kar+m+ma bi shod+d+ha ya sarbe oM ba rA Na ni Sh+Thad+d+ha sa t+ye na sarmA mr-i hU~M/dri nas phyug rgyu bcing ba bshad do//rdo rje thal mongs sgyur te/mdzub mo gnyis
302b6(rgyud): bkug nas kyang //mthe bong mnyams tAM sbyar nas ni//mnan pa 'di ni sdig 'phrog pa//phyag rgya 'di rims la sogs pa'i nang thams cad kyi gang btab pa la la
302b7(rgyud): byas la bstan na de khyed rnams kyis zong shig/khyed bdag srog dang bral le re//de nas de rnams de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol to slar dong ngo //de nas byang chub
303a1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol te//bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag sgrub pa thams//
303a2(rgyud): cang gsal ba dang /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i slad du nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung na dri la bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa
303a3(rgyud): ngan song de rnams thams cad ji ltar bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/oM k+Sha pa yA badz+ra swA hA//de nas byang chub
303a4(rgyud): sems dpa'i chen po phyag na rdo rjes ngu 'bod la sogs pa ngan song gi 'gro ba'i 'khor lo thams cad dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so//oM sarba oM pa ya A kauR+Sha
303a5(rgyud): bi sho d+ha na badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu ngu'i bod chen po la sogs pa ngan song na gnas pa rnams ri rab kyi ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol tu bskor
303a6(rgyud): 'khod do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes ngan snong gi sar lhung ba'i sems can de dag thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so//kyi bzod
303a7(rgyud): ldan rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /dam tshig dang /sdom pa dang /ngan song thams cad las thar pa'i phyag rgya dang snying po zung shog/
303b1(rgyud): de nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sdug bsngal bgyis gzir ba 'di las bsgrub tu gsol/bcom ldan 'das
303b2(rgyud): bdag cag rnams sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun dang /khyod la skyabs su mi che'o//de nas phyag na rdo rjes ngan song thams cad 'joms pa/zhes bya ba'i
303b3(rgyud): snying po 'di gsungs so//oM badz+ra pA NI be s+pho Te ya sarba a paM ye bAn+d+han nr-i pra mo kr-i ya/sarbA gA ye ga tI b+h+yaHsarba satwa sarba ta thA ga tA badz+ra sa ma ya traT/de nas de'i/
303b4(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings pa bshad do//rdo rje bcing ba dam bcas te/gung mo gnyis ka sbyar nas su//tha ma bzhi ni rtse mo sbyar/sdig pa 'joms par grags pa yin/de
303b5(rgyud): nas don song gsum gyi 'khor lo na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad phyag ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'di mthong nas ngan song thams cad nas shi 'phos nas/bcom ldan
303b6(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skyes so//ngar song de rnams kyang rgya mtsho chen po bor ro//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes ba
303b7(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te//bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i skyabs dang /phan pa dang /bde bo thams cad myong ba
304a1(rgyud): bgyi ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi grub pa dam pa'i 'bras bu'i thob par bya ba'i bar du 'tshol cig par bdag la bcom
304a2(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje stsal te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsol na/mi 'di rnams ji ltar bgyi ba de bzhin
304a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsol cig/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang gcig tu 'dus nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//oM badz+rI pA Ni ma hA maN+Da
304a4(rgyud): laM pra be sha ya sarba duSh+Ta ro tAn+ni bA ra yaM pra be bya pra mo sha ya tru rA dr-iSh+Ti par+yA paM mAM/bi sho d+ha ya nA sha ya bi nA sha ya/ha ha ha ha hUM/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
304a5(rgyud): thams cad kyis bka' stsalnga pa'i tshig de thos nas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par bskyab pa dang /phan pa dang /bde ba thams cad dang
304a6(rgyud): dngos grub dam pA nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo
304a7(rgyud): rje chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do//de nas rab tu bshad bya ba//dkyil 'khor
304b1(rgyud): chen po dam pa ste//rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba yi//dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog/'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya//rdo rje dam tshig la byung ba//spangs rgyas
304b2(rgyud): byang chub 'byin byed pa'i//ma rungs thams cad rnam par 'jig/de l-i sngags 'dis sras bu bre bar bya'o//oM badz+ra sa mA yaM sU tAM/mA tI kra ma hi//gru bzhir byo zhing
304b3(rgyud): sgo bzhir gdod//rta babs bzhis kyang rab tu rgyanA//srad bu bzhi dang ldan+da pa ste//dAr dang phreng bas shin tu rgyan//dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa rnams su//sgo khyod kyi
304b4(rgyud): ni mtshams rnams su//rdo rje rin chen rgyan par ni//dkyil 'khor phyi ma srad bu bre//shis rab can gyis de nang du//rdo rje rin chen gyis rgyan te//gru bzhi pa la
304b5(rgyud): sgo bzhi pa//ka ba brgyad dang rta babs bcas//rdo rje ka ba'i gnas mchog tu//dkyil 'khor lnga yis rgyan byas te//de ltar dkyil 'khor srad bu bre//srad
304b6(rgyud): bu bres par tshon rtsis dgang //dri la tshon+da la bzlas pa ni 'di'o//oM badz+ra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni//rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pa/
304b7(rgyud): /rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi po//yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya//de la sgo rnams dbye ba'i sngags ni 'di'o//oM badz+rod g+ha TaM ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya hUM/gser ram dngul
305a1(rgyud): las byas pa 'am//sa yang rung ste legs dri skya pa'i//pha bu glu bzhir byas pa la//sangs rgyas gzugs ni bzhag par bya//de la de bzhin
305a2(rgyud): gshegs bA thams cad spyan drang ba'i snying po ni 'di yin no//au badz+ra dz+wa la e g+ni pa dI p+ta A kaR+ShA ya sarba ta thA gr-i tA nAM/ma hA badz+ra sa mA ya hUM dza/sangs rgyas
305a3(rgyud): spyan sngar rdo rje ni//'bar bas bskor bas bzhag par bya//de bzhin byin chen 'od bskor ba//pad+mo rdo rje kun de bzhin//de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgyu rnams
305a4(rgyud): dgod pa'i snying po 'di yin no//hUM satwa badz+ri dzA la mA lA hUM phaT/oM rat+na badz+ri dzA la mA lA hUM traM/oM d+harmA badz+ri dzA la mA lA hUM hrIHoM kArma baudz+ri dz+r-IM la mA lA hUM
305a5(rgyud): aHrdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni//sangs rgyas spyan sngar de bzhin du//shes pas cho ga bzhin bri ba//rdo rje hUM zhes dkyil 'khor ro//de la rdo rje shugs
305a6(rgyud): kyi snying po ni 'di yin no//oM badz+ra be g+ha k+Sha ma hUM/'di bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad la yang srad bu la brgal ta
305a7(rgyud): thams cad du 'gro bar bya'o//de nas de'i phyag rgya bshad do//yid kyis ri mo bteg nas ni//rdo rje srad bu 'am gzhan yang rung //phyir phyung nang du zhugs kyang ni//
305b1(rgyud): /dam tshig 'gal bar de mo 'gyur//de yi dbus su sems dpa' tshe//phya ba na rdo rje phra ba na//ut+pa la char sngo 'char ba'i mdog/rdo d+hA d+hu zhus bya bar 'dus//mche ba cung zad//
305b2(rgyud): byung ba'i zhal//khro dang bcas pas 'dzum pa'i zhal//g.yon brgyang tshul de bzhugs pa ste//'byar de'i phreng bAs 'khrigs pa'i spyod//grwa yon pa'i zhabs kyi mthal
305b3(rgyud): rgyus ni//dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya//g.yas pa'i zhabs kyis u mA yi//nu ma'i steng du gnon pa bri//de yi snying po ni 'di yin no//hUM de yi phyogs ni thams cad du//
305b4(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo bzhag pa ni//khros pa mche bi byung ba ni//'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od//de nas de drag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no//oM badz+ra satwa kro d+ha hUM phaT/
305b5(rgyud): oM badz+ra kro d+ha A be sha ya hUM phaT/oM kirma kro d+ha rA ga ya hUM/oM badz+ra duSh+Ti kro d+ha sA d+hu hUM phATA/dkyil 'khor dam pa g+ha nyi sA pA ra ni//rdo rje shugs kyisaM brgal nas
305b6(rgyud): kyang //der ni rdo rjer dbang bskur bas//rdo rje khro byos bskor bar bri//de nas de rnams kyi snying po 'di bshad do//traM oM badz+rI b+h+r-i ku Ti kro d+he he ra ha ra hUM phaT/oM badz+ra
305b7(rgyud): sUr+ya ma hA dz+wa la mA lA kro d+ha dz+wa la ya sar+b+baM hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kro d+ha ke tu de hi hUM phaT/oM badz+ra hA sa kro d+ha ha ha ha ha hUM phaT/dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum par ni//rdo rje
306a1(rgyud): shugs kyis brga l+yA nas kyang //rdo rje sden bre bya ba//khro bo b+hu dag rnyid chen pos bskor//de nas de rnams kyi snying po shad do//hrIHoM badz+ra d+harma
306a2(rgyud): kro d+ha bi nA sha ya bi sho d+he yA hU~M phaT/oM badz+ra tIk+Sh+Na kro d+hats+tshin+da ts+tshin+de hUM phaT/oM badz+ra hAM tu kro d+hu pra be shaM ya maN+Da le sar+b+ba hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kro d+ha b+ha Shi ba ta ba ta hUM phaT/
306a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhi par nI//rdo rje shugs kyis baurgal nas kyang //rdo rje dbab pa bri ba ni//rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs kyi bskor//de nas de rnams kyi snying po bshad do//
306a4(rgyud): AHhUM badz+ra kar+m+ma hUM phaT/oM badz+ra ke ba tse kro d+ha rak+Sha hUM phaT/oM badz+ra yak+Sha kro d+ha khA da khA da hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kro d+ha muSh+Ti sA d+ha ya sa ma ya hUM phaT/dkyil 'khor gyi//
306a5(rgyud): ni gre rnams su//rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul bzhin du//ji ltar go rims bzhin du ni//gsang ba'i mchod pa kun+da bri'o//de nas de dag gi snying po'i phyag rgya 'di yin no//
306a6(rgyud): oM badz+ra lA s+ye rA gA ya hUM phaT/oM badz+ra mA laM aM b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM phaT/oM badz+re gI t+ye gA ta gA ta hUM phaT/oM pradz+r-i NI t+ye ba shaM ku ru hU~M dzaT/dikyil 'khor dam
306a7(rgyud): phyir la tu//rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang //de yi gri rnams nyid du ni//mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi rnams bzhag/de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no//
306b1(rgyud): dz+had+hU ba bud+d+ha s+phar Na sa mA yo ts+tshabaTA//oM badz+ra puSh+Ta pUdz+yA s+phA ra Na sa ma yai hU~M phaT/oM bad+d+ha A l+yo k+Sho b+hU dzA s+phA ra Na sa ma yAM hU~M phyan/oM badz+ra gan+d+ha pu dza~M s+phA ra NAs ma
306b2(rgyud): hUM phaT+Te/sgo rnams bzhi yi dbus spyi ni//lcags kyu la sogs bzhag par gyi//dkyil 'kho phyi rol gi nas rnams su//phyi rol rdo rje'i rigs rna mas so//de nas de
306b3(rgyud): dge gi snying po rnams bshad do//oM b+h+yaHa~M ng+ku shwa mihA kro d+hA A kaR+ShA ya sad+d+hi sa ma yo d+d+hi dz+dzaHoM badz+ra pA sha ma hA k+Sho d+ha prA ba sha~M ya sar+b+ba sa ma yi hU~M hU~M/oM badz+ra s+pha Ta ma
306b4(rgyud): d+hi ban+d+ha ban+d+ha sad+d+hi sa ma yaM hU~M baM/oM badz+ra A be sha ma hA kr-i d+hA a bi shA ya sarba sa ma ya~M hUM A/de nas yang 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam pa rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khar
306b5(rgyud): chen 'i cho ga rgyas par bshad do//de la dang po nyid du rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid kyis rdo rje khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgyas bcings te/zhugs shing zhugs nas de bzhin
306b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab ste/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i dbang du mchis te tshar bcad par rigs pa rnams
306b7(rgyud): ni tshar bcad do//bsdu ba'i rigs pa rnams ni bsdu na de ni ji ltar bgyi bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' stsal du gsol zhes byas nas rdo rje khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag
307a1(rgyud): rgyu ngag sbyong khar ji lta ba banon duHzhag ste/rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas nas yod ngom chog go phyug rgyu thams cad bangs shing /
307a2(rgyud): nas thams cad byin par 'gyur ro//de nas yang gi sang ba'i mchod pa bzhi byas nas bdug pa la stegs pa yang de gnas/de nas tshig 'di ste rdo rje slob ma chug rga
307a3(rgyud): rje slob dpon do rang gis khro bo rdo rje tI rIn ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te slob ma la yang snying po nyid dbu 'ching du chug shig/oM gr-ih+na badz+ra sa ma ya hU~M hrI/de nas gos
307a4(rgyud): sngon po bgos lnga mgo la gtsug tere sngon pos bats+tshos te dar sngon pos gdung dkris la sngags 'dis chu ga shig/oM badz+ra sa~Mm sa ye mA prA bau sh+yAm+b+hi/de nas bcu
307a5(rgyud): hUM rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang snying po 'dis de la dbab par gyis shig/oM badz+re A ba sha ya/de nas bzlas nas de ltar babs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs sde
307a6(rgyud): thams cad mis byin gyis brlab so//'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba thams cad kyang skad cig gis shes so//gnod pa yang med par 'gyur ro//
307a7(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro//hUM zhes byas pas kyang sems can thams cad la tsher bcad pa dang /ban gangags pa byed nus par 'gyur/
307b1(rgyud): lag/na rdo rje yang rtag tu de'i dgos pa thams cad slob po//de nas mna'i snying po byin cig/dro nas gdong ga yogs pa dkrol te dkyil 'khor chen pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston
307b2(rgyud): cig/dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro//'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag las rnam par rgyal bar nus pa ra dzI /
307b3(rgyud): hUM zhes byas pas lha chen po la sogs pa lha thams cing dgug pa dang /gzhub pa dang /macing ba dang /dbang du bya ba dang /mnan par nus par 'gyuraro//de bzhin
307b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' phyug na rdo rjes rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing rang gi dngos grub sbyin par mdzadapa
307b5(rgyud): de nas de la rdo rje'i dbang bskur ro//rang gi mtshan ma rdo rje rnon po ji lta ba bzhin du sngags 'dis log pa gnyis su sbyin no//oM badz+ra pA Ni badz+ra kar+m+ma kA ro d+b+ha bo/de nas sngag
307b6(rgyud): 'dis rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ro//oM badz+ra kro d+ha tAM u b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/badz+ra nAM me a b+hi She ka ta he badz+ra nA ma/de nas gdul mang btags paM de la k+ShuM zhes bya ba'i skye
307b7(rgyud): dang sbyar bar bya'o//de nas ye shes rnams bskyed //rdo rje khro bo mnyam gzhig nas//'bar ba mang bo 'ang can gyi//rdo rje daskyengs ni sring khamabasan//
308a1(rgyud): / smra /rgyun pa sh+tham+b+ha nan su// dang //da spyod du dungs rgyun//sos sanan mdu
308a2(rgyud): dbang du byed//rdo rje khro bor mnyam gzhag nas//'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po'i 'od//rdo rje pad+ma mgul du bsam//sems can thams cad brlag par byed//rdo rje khro
308a3(rgyud): ngo mnyam gzhag nas//'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po'i 'od//rdo rje thams cad spyi bor bzhag/skye bo 'di dag thams cad bsrungs//de nas ye shes kyi phyag rgya 'di/
308a4(rgyud): rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin no//hUM sar+b+ba badz+ra kro d+ha A be sha a/ho re t+no badz+ra kro d+ha b+hA Sha mo nA ya traM hUM/badz+ra d+hArmA kro d+ha nA sha ya hUM phaT/hU~M karma badz+ra
308a5(rgyud): kro d+hA rak+Sha//de nas lha thams cad dgug pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya bslab bo//hUM zhes bya ba bcings nas ni//lhag pa rdo rjer lcags kyur bsame//khros nas mdzub
308a6(rgyud): mo bskul nas ni/lha rnams 'gug pa'i mchog tu 'gyur//rang gi rkang mthil dbus su ni//rdo rje lcags kyu bris nas su//de nyid kyis ni rtags mnan ne//
308a7(rgyud): lha rnams nges pa nyid du 'gug/rdo rje'i lcags kyu nyid phyag rgya//legs par phye ste bzhag nas su//bskul ni u ma la sogs pa//bud med thams cad 'gugs
308b1(rgyud): mamamams samamasamathamasamathasathasam yam tham kams namayaHTham
308b2(rgyud): dUr 'gyur//rdo rje lcags kyu bzhag pa ni//mjug do nyid du de bzhin to//des mnan lha yi gang yin pa//de ni 'gugs pa'i dam pa'o//de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no//
308b3(rgyud): oM badz+ri kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/oM badz+ra karma aM ku shi kr-i d+hA A kaR+Sha ye hUM phaT//AM badz+ra kro d+ha daMSh+TA a gr-i A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/oM badz+dzi kro d+h+ya saM gAts+tsha AM kAR+Sha
308b4(rgyud): ya mi te badz+ra sa ma ya mnu s+pho ra hUM phaT/de nas phyag rgya rnam bzhi'i ye shes bslab bo//brkyang zhing bskam pas gnas nas su//rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyis ni//haM tsam gyis
308b5(rgyud): kyang skad cig gis//skye bo thams cad 'bebs par byed//rdo rje dag ni legs par smras//hU~M zhes bya ba bzhi ldan pa//sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yis//thams cad kyang ni nges
308b6(rgyud): par 'gug/rdo rje khro bor mnyam gzhag nas/rdo rje khro bo lha mchog gis//skye bo kun gyi bdud byed de//rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor to//yid kyis lus la go bgo ba//
308b7(rgyud): bdag gam pha rol rnams la ste//go cha chen po'i sbyor bas ni//skye bo 'di dag thams cad srung //de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin no//oM badz+ra kro d+ha kA yA be shA
308b8(rgyud): ya hUM phaT/oM badz+ra bi d+yo d+ha ma ma hA kro d+ha A na ya ho b+ha ga bAM badz+ra hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kro d+ha tiSh+Tha ha na da ha pa tse bi nA shA ya hUM/kA ra Na pA ta ya badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/
309a1(rgyud): oM ma no dr-i D+ha badz+ra kA btsa kro d+ha rak+Sha hU~M phaT/de nas sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo//rdo rje khro bor mnyam
309a2(rgyud): gzhag nas//badz+ra hUM zhes bzlas pa yis//gang dang geng la kun zhugs pa//phyag rgyas btab par dwa 'gyur ro//sgra chen du ni brjod bya ba//Tak+ki hUM phaT khros nas sum
309a3(rgyud): lan gcig gang la smras pa ni//rdo rje 'bar bas de mngon bkug/rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin cing //rdo rje lta bas bltas pa yi//sems can gang dang gang yin pa/
309a4(rgyud): de nas de ni dran nyams 'gyur//yid la bsad ces bsams nas su//snying khar rdo rje sgom par byed//hUM zhes bya ba nyid kyis kun//rang gi rgyas ni btab par dgongs//
309a5(rgyud): sems can gang dang gang dag la//yid kyi rgyas ni 'debs pa gang //phyag rgya 'dis ni shin tu yang //las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya//de nas de dag gi snying
309a6(rgyud): bo 'di dag go/Tek+ki hUM phaT/Tak+ki a/Tak+ki dzA/Tak+ki haM/phyag rgya re res kyang las bzhi rnams la phyag rgya'i snying po bzhis sbyar ro//de nas gsang ba
309a7(rgyud): khro bo ye shes kyi phyag rgya bslab bo//yan lag kun gyis 'khyud nas ni//hUM zhes gang la sbyar bya ba//dbang po gnyis ni sprad byas na//de yi srog ni ma rungs
309b1(rgyud): 'gyur//d+hU zhes bya bar ldan pa yis//margya spyad sos ni mchu bzung nas//dbang po gnyis ni rab spyad pa//gang yin du ni mngon sum 'gyur//hUM zhes sbyor ba gang yin pa//
309b2(rgyud): doni bde ba myong bar 'gyur//dbang po gnyis ni spyod gyur na//gang yin de ni sdug bsngal 'thob//hUM zhes bya ba rab sbyor zhing //dbang po gnyis ni sbed nas kyang //ya na
309b3(rgyud): lag kun gyis bcir gyur na//de yi lus ni bsrungs par 'gyur//de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag hUM ya/hU~M dz+nyAHhUM ho/hUM haM/hUM hUM/de nas 'jig rten gsum
309b4(rgyud): las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo//gang gis sems can la phan phyir/rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul
309b5(rgyud): byis ni//sangs rgyas rjes su dran byas na//de ni sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur//dbang phyug dang ni u ma yang //sa la bris te de ltur man no//ji ltar bris pa'i go rims
309b6(rgyud): bzhin//ut+pal tsho song 'tsher ba'i mdog/sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya//'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang //de ni 'jig rten gsum rgyu lA ga/rdo rje hUM dang
309b7(rgyud): 'dra ba yi//dngos grub rdzu 'phrul myur du 'grub//ji ltar ri mo bri ba bzhin//'bar bas bskor ba'i dbus bzhugs pa//sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis//sems dpa'i
310a1(rgyud): /shAN+DA ts+tsha d+d+ha//nanas ma shA //nga rnalas blan da//u smA du sa//myurA sa rgyusad
310a2(rgyud): 'jig rten kyi mas rgyu sa nangs ni//hU~M gau d+hAr+yA gA su mA y-i smin ma rmyil 'gyu //rdo rje na dang sngon tu 9/rdo rje d+hISh+Teb+h+ya b+hA r+tha//d+hI ni
310a3(rgyud): 'gyur/chos babyeng ldan pos 'jig rten dang /rnam sa ky-i rdo rje khrum/rdul snron ma par 'gyuro//sems dpa'i skye bo rab tu ba n+de//khre 'i skyegs kyis
310a4(rgyud): dag 'gyur/khyo ba chags pas chags par byed//khro bo legs pas dga' ba ster//khro gnyer gyis kun ma rung byed//khro bo nyi ma sa gzi brjid mchog
310a5(rgyud): dpal gyi khro bo don rnams sdud//ha hA rgod paso bdud du byed//chos kyi khro bo chos rnams sbed//rdo rje rAm gres gcod par byed//rgyu yi khro bo sdug 'phrul 'gro
310a6(rgyud): rlo ba skye ba'i tshig 'jog gi/las kyi skye bo lus ri s+t+wa~M//snang ba sIs ni snang bar byed/khro ba gnyed sbyin dkris ma//khro bo khro chur dngas gle bu ster//ngan
310a7(rgyud): rdzidam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do//rdo rje gnyis su phyir pa ni//de ma tshig mchog tu grags pa yin//de dag btsang ba bshad par bye//khri ba ba cing ba blu /
310b1(rgyud): smusmag dang rdo rjer byas nas su//mthe'u chung lcags kyur btsong bar bya//mdzub mo gnyis kyis bsdigs pa ni//'dzag rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya//de bzhin mdzub ma
310b2(rgyud): ngomo sbyar te//nor bu 'dre bar rab tu dgug/gung mo mnyam bskrod pad+mo dubyi//gung mo mdzub mo gnyis kas bsdigs//mdzub mo gnyis ka rdo rjer bya//g.yas pa khrigs
310b3(rgyud): rgyus dgug par bya//de nyid hUM zhes bya bas 'dod//logs pa sbyin pa de yin te//mdzub gnyis dpral ba'i gnyer mang bzhig/snying khar mdzub ma nyams bsgyur/
310b4(rgyud): sdig pa rgyud ste smra bar bzhig/mdzub mo kha rnaMs dgod ltar bya//mdzub mo sbyin ma sbyar ba ste//g.yas pa ral gri bcings pa'o//glung mdzub minyas sgyid 'a
310b5(rgyud): yi/khri yi nang na sa dbyung ba dang //mdzub mo gung mo rdo rjer sbyor//mdzub mo yis ni mgul bar bskor//mdzub mo gnyis ni mche ba che//mdzub mo bkug pas
310b6(rgyud): rdorje bcings//rdo rje l-I skye la sogs pa//sem+b+has ma'i byeg rgyu de nyid hU~M//zhes bya chos kyi phyag rgya ste/hUM zhes bya bar lhan cig go//de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi tshus
310b7(rgyud): byag rgya rnams bshad de//hUM ni sangs rgyas rdo rje mi//ni rje rje snyi /na yin/mi na rdo rje thams ca kyi/ hrI ted+yaha//
311a1(rgyud): /rmA rmArba/b+h+ya.A ka/ klu na da //rgyas ga ts+tsha zlanan// chug ga su rnams shAd
311a2(rgyud): sa nIHna r+m+ma yi//las kyi phyug rgyu mdor bzlas na//rdo rje 'gyid lasagos rgyal gyis//khro bo khu tshur gnyis smra ba shad//gung dong gling gis byug rgyu rnams
311a3(rgyud): sa kyi thugs ni gang du bya//de dong dor ni ba sgrer nas kyang //phyag tu de ni sgrar bar bya//phyug rgyu thams cad kyi tsha gA'o//de nas 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam
311a4(rgyud): dkyil 'kho tshon po sbyin mong pa'i phyag rgyu ba cing po bshod de//'jig rten gos mo rgyal phug d+hI n+ti//rdo man+te myo dam+b+ha nig gi/rdo rje hU~M zhes smrab
311a5(rgyud): ngas zlab thams cung yud kyi 'thag//mkhye rlung gnyis ka lcags gyur ba cing //rje sa kyi snang 'ogaN+Da/rdo hU~M lcags kyu'i byug+sa rgyu// seM
311a6(rgyud): da 'gas//rig pa des pathams cad //'jag rten gsuM m+b+ha /rgyal rnam pa //m+bus rgyud byung ni gan br-I ste/de bzhin la sa rnams rnas sa byed/
311a7(rgyud): rdo rje ma byes rgyas migs so//rang mnyam gnag pa mnyam nas ni//go bathams cad slong //rdo rje grong banas bya//dza rje ma byug nyis legs padun
311b1(rgyud): rdorje bcing bas bcings nas su//bsgyur to gtsug tu bzhag pa ni//tshwa dung nud mod 'phel ba'o//rdo rje bcing padam byas te//mthe bong mo nyi ma nas nang du gzhug/mdzu
311b2(rgyud): mo dam por bkug nas su//bcus pas zhabs su 'dug pa'o//'jig rten gsum rgyal bcings nas su//gang gi gzugs la rkang g.yon pas//legs par
311b3(rgyud): gnan pa'i sems can de//zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par 'gyur//rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te//gcig la gcig gis brdabs pas ni//sems can gang gi lus
311b4(rgyud): la ni//babs nas de yang rdob par byed//rdo rje phyag rgyu gnyis bcings te//bdog gam pha rol go char bya//mdzub mo gnyis kyis bcings byas na//nges pa nyid du srung bar
311b5(rgyud): 'gyur//rdo rje mthil du bcings nas su//yid kyis khros nas dgab bya ba//mthe bong rdo rje dam pa ste//rdo rje rin chen 'grub par 'gyur//sems dpa'i rdo rje ngam byas te//
311b6(rgyud): the bong gnyis kas gung mo munan//mthe'u chung rdo rje rtse mo na//rnon po dam tshig 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te//mdzub mo gnyis bkug bcings nas su//
311b7(rgyud): garu zhing phyir gcu byas pa ni//lha 'bugs pa yi dam pa yin//rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te//mdzub mo gnyis bkug rab tu mnan//mthe bong gnyis ka sbyar ba yis/

312a4(rgyud): mdzu mo gnyis kA das blor ste//glang mo mchedo rdo rje ni//gdug pa'i phyug rgyu 'jams pa'o//rdo rje byug rgyu gnyis bcings te//mnyam gzhag ste nI sting khar
312a5(rgyud): khro bi khu tshur gaN+DI ba ni//phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'dzeg pa'o//g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub stso la//g.yos pa'i mdzub mo bklag pas gzung //rab tu khris nis drag ga
312a6(rgyud): na/ri rab kyang ni ltung bar byed //g.yon pa'i mdzub mo rdo rje la//g.yas pa'i mdzub ma skyugs kyus gzung //rab tu khri b+h+ri ba krug pa yis//gdan rnam m+b+ha kA
312a7(rgyud): dbang du byed//rdo rje ba cing ba byas nas su//lag nga'i snying khar shin tu bsdam//rdo rje mdzub mo gnyis mtshan khung //byung ba yim ni snying 'byin to//mdzub mo gnyis rgya
312b1(rgyud): mo yis//mtha bod gnyis ka'i drung du ni//yid kyis khros nas btsor bya'o//rims la sogs 'gugs dam pa//rdo rje thal mo dam sbyar te//mdzub mo gnyis ka bA kun/nu
312b2(rgyud): mthe bo rab tu mnyam sbyar ba/ mAnan pa de ni sdig 'phrog pa'o//rdo rje phyug rgyu gnyis nang du//mdzub ma gnyis ni sbas nas kyang //legs par gyin du 'phangs pa ni//skye
312b3(rgyud): bslong ba'i dam pa'o//rdo rje bcing byed ma byaste te//gung po gnyi ga des sbyor nas//mtha' ma bzhi yi des sprad pa//skad drug tu ni sdig 'dul to//de nas de bzhin
312b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub pa'i phyag rgyo bcing po bshad do//rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bzung nas ni//dkyil 'khor dang po sra bus bre//srad bus bres la phyi nas ni/
312b5(rgyud): srad bu ji bzhin bre bar bshad//rdo rje phyag rgya gnyi ga yo//mdzub ma rtse mo rab sbyar ba//byas nas tshan rnams thams cad la//'bar ba'i lte bas dgug par bya//rdo rje/
312b6(rgyud): mdzub mo legs par ni//sbyar swa ba kon te bsdams nas su//rab tu khros nas dbye ba ni//sgro dbye ba yi mchog yin no//de nas rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgrub sa
312b7(rgyud): bshad do//brkyang bskum gyis ni tshul byas te//khro ba yin skad 'byin cing //khro zhing khro za'i lnga bas ni//las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya//de bzhin gshogs pa
313a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i las 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so//
313a2(rgyud): bam po lhu //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bsnyen gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa
313a3(rgyud): zhugs te rang gi rig pa dus pa 'di gsungs so//oM sar+b+ba badz+rI Ni/bAdza mA te a na ya sar+b+ba badz+ra satwA na hU~M dz+dzaHde nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
313a4(rgyud): dpa'i thugs ka nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid phyag na rdo rje 'dra ba/kun nas 'bar bas basbyor nas/rdo rje khro bo gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo
313a5(rgyud): rnams su gyur nas byung ste/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don bsgrubs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo
313a6(rgyud): gsang ba'i phyir sku dang /gsung dang /thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
313a7(rgyud): rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug nas tshang du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//gsu
313b1(rgyud): ba'i ye shes bla na med//de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i phyir//btsun mo nyid du gyur pa yin//hi/de nas yang phyag na rdo rje rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil
313b2(rgyud): 'khor rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so//de nas rab tu bshad bya ba//rdo rje dkyil 'khor ngam pa ste//rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na//khro bo'i goseng ba zhes bshad
313b3(rgyud): do|/dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni//dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre//dkyil 'khor lnga yi gnas rnams su//gsang ba'i phyag rgya bshad par bya//rdo rje
313b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//sangs rgyas sku gzugs bzhag par bya//sangs rgyas khro bo'i dam tshig kyang //ji bzhin par ni mkhas pas bri//rdo rje shugs kyis rgal

313b6(rgyud): rdo rje rdo rje'i lcogs kyu drung //mda' dang dga' ba de bzhin no//dz+ha rje shugs kyis rgalnga nas ni//dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis par yang //'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pa
313b7(rgyud): yin/rdo rje rin chen bri bar bya//khro gnyer dbus su rdo rje bri//de bzhin rdo rje gnyis rgyal mtshan//de bzhin sa yi phreng ba da'i//ngos su rdo rje bri bar bya//rdo rje shugs
314a1(rgyud): kyis rgal nas ni//dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum par ni//pad+ma'i dbus su gnas pa yi//rdo rje pad+mo lha rdzas bri//'bar ba'i dbus su pad+mo bri//ram
314a2(rgyud): gri 'khor lo de bzhin no//rdo rje lce yang tshul bzhin du//rtag tu de yi phyogs su bzhag/rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni//dkyil 'khor bzhi pa dam par yang //rdo rje/
314a3(rgyud): bskyal la rdo rje bri//rdo rje 'od ni chen por bskor//de yi phyogs ni thams cad du//'bar ba kun gyis dkrigs pa'i 'od//rdo rje thams cad go cha'i mchog/rdo rje

314a5(rgyud): kro d+ha sa ma yai dzaM/oM badz+ra kro d+ha ro ShAM aM ku sha a na ya sar+b+ba ny+dza/oM badz+ra ro Sh+Te kr-I ma badz+ri Ni pra shaM me A na ya hi dzi/oM badz+ra duSh+Ta kro d+ha to ShA yaM sar+b+baM dzaM/rdo rje

314b3(rgyud): \u0f7fkr-id+hId+d+ha mak+She NI bad+d+ha daSh+Ta~M a kA la b+hi ga n+de bA san+te/oM byAdz+ra kro d+ha puSh+Ta sa bye ba da~MN+Dal 'kho //de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bya rnams su
314b4(rgyud): dza g+ha la sog sa ng+ge'i gas pa'i mchod pa'i rig pa'i snying po rnams gsungs paM/oM badz+re hU~M Sh+TaM/badz+rahUM b+hU/dz+nyA d+h+r-i t+te/d+d+ha d+hU t+taM/phyi rol b+h+r-i
314b5(rgyud): 'khor mchod pa'i snying po rnams brjod par bya'o//oM badz+ra ti te/badz+ra Tan+d+ha/badz+ra d+hA tu/dASh+TaDoM ta/de nas sgo bzhi'i mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po rnams

315a1(rgyud): rigs kyi dmachog ge phyag rgyu dang 'dra ba'i phyug rgyu dang /lan gyi phyug+h+ra rgyu dang /sna ba'i phyug d+hA dang /ye gas kyi phyug d+hArnams kyis rdo
315a2(rgyud): 'chang ba mchod pa'i phyir gar gyis mchod par bya'o//de la gAr dang /lan gyi gA rarA dang /nye ba'i gar dang /ye shes kyi gar rnams kyis mchod po'i phyag rgya'i ye
315a3(rgyud): shes kyi ger rnams ni 'di yin no//de la dang po nyid du rdo rje dbyings su bsdus pa'i snying pos rdo rje glu len cing /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pas
315a4(rgyud): mchod pa byas nas/rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa' rdo rje'i phyag rgya drag tu gtog par bya'o//de nas ji snyed zhugs pa rnams phyag rgya rnams kyis yang dag
315a5(rgyud): par dbab par bya'o//rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis ni//rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis//rdo rje hU~M mdzad phyag rgyar ni//snying khar shin tu btsong bar bya//de nas gar
315a6(rgyud): gyi cho ga yi//rdo rje khro bo lcags kyu yis//sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang ngo //rdo rje mda' ni 'phang bar bya//rdo rje mda' ni 'phangs pas kyang // rje dga' bas
315a7(rgyud): bsgrub par bya//phyag rgya'i cho ga bzhin bkrol te//thal mo brdabo cing bcing bar bya//mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni//phyag rgya rdo rje mnyes par bya//mnyes
315b1(rgyud): nas dgos pa thams cad na//'dod bzhin skad cig nyid kyis 'grub//dril gar g+ho phyug rgya'i skyong ba ni 'di rnams yin no//sid+d+ha badz+nyA/A nA ya bAdz+ra/rA gA yA byAd+d+hA d+hA
315b2(rgyud): sA d+hu badz+ra/de'i 'og tu 'dra ba'i gar gyis mchod pa bya ste/de bzhin gar gyi g.yon pa ni//khu tshur g.yas pas bzung nas ni//bskyer zhing mdzub mo'i ngos kyis
315b3(rgyud): ni//dpral ba nyid lnga bzhag par bya//de bzhin gar byed nyi ma yang //bskor nas yang dag dgug par bya//rdo rje rgyal mtshan bsrung na sa ni//rdo rje hA tra zhes dgod
315b4(rgyud): mchod pa 'di yi cho ga yis//rgyal po lasogs mi kun kya//dbyung dang rab kyi gzi brjid dang //sbyin dang dgod pas mnyis par byed//de la 'di rnams ni
315b5(rgyud): 'dra ba'i phyag rgyu'i snying po 'di rnams yin no//e hrI badz+ra/dz+wA lA ya hU~Mdz+dza/dwe b+ha~M badz+ra/trA sa badz+ra/de bzhin grorang byeng bkrol nas ni//pad+ma kho dbus ltar bA ya~M/
315b6(rgyud): mdzub ma'i rtse mo snang khar bzhig/bsam pa g.yos der gdung par bya//de bzhin kar byed rdo rje yi//ral gris bgegs ni gcod ltar b+hi//mugal ma'i 'kham
315b7(rgyud): bskor ba yis//'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul du bskor//rdo rje'i tshig du glu len ltar//phyag na rdo rje mchod par bya//mchod pa 'di yi cho ga yis//thams
316a1(rgyud): /cad mnyes pa nyid du 'gyur/de la 'di rnams na nye bu'i phyag rgyu'i snang ba rnams yin no//ku m+b+ha ya bad+d+ha/tA ya dAr+d+ha/b+h+rar+m+ma ya b+hAd+d+ha/bru hirba rdza
316a2(rgyud): rdorjekhro bo'i mdzub yang da//bkan nasib+h+rUM myo sbyar nas kyang //bsgyur te de nas go drug tAr tu//mdzud mo'i rtswa mi bzhag par ni//rdo rje las kyi tshul gyis ni//lus

322b1(rgyud): sh+yo rA da yAn+tu/A rba m+WAr ho rA ga ya dz+nyA/ma drar+Na maN+Da lo rA bA r+yA gA yA t+ma/oM d+han TA pU d+hAg+sa rA sa ma u badz+ra kar+b+ha s+yA ma yA tsa ya t+na/oM 'adz+ra ka btse ba d+hArA
322b2(rgyud): rak+She hUM/au bidz+ra yak+Shi Ni mAM ra ya badz+ra diSh+Ta ye b+hin+da d+hi d+ha ya mu ga s+ye hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kar+m+ma mutshaM sid+d+hi hUM poT/nr-i nase lus kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa ji lci
322b3(rgyud): ba bzhin byas te/rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi ye shes rnams bskyed do//de la dang po nyid du nye ba la sogs pheM'i mya gIh+ma'i ye shes bslab bo//yam shing mdar po rnam
322b4(rgyud): kyi me//rab sbyar rdo rje khro bo yis//mnyam par gzhag pas snyo mos zhugs la//til bsregs par ni sdig bya srogs shing //yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni//byin za rab

323a5(rgyud): snying po ni 'di dag yin no//hUM badz+ra A kaR+Sha ya swA hA//hUM badz+ra rA gA ya swA hA/hU~M badz+ra ban+d+ha ya swA hA//hU~M badz+ra mA ra Na ya swA hA//mkhos pas yam shing skyur mo

323a7(rgyud): la//'dod pa'i 'bras bu khros bsregs na//'dod pa bzhin gyi gzugs rnyed do//de 'dra ba yi yam shing gis//byin za rab tu sbar nas kyang //mi snang me tog sdong bu yis//
323b1(rgyud): spobs na 'dod bzhin mi snang 'gyur//snum shing de dag nyid kyis ni//m+b+ha nyam par gzhag sgo mo sbar la//na mkha'i lcug ma'i me tog gyis//sbyin srog byas na mkha' la 'dra//

324a4(rgyud): h+ya ra ti badz+ra ba shaM ka raM sid+d+ha hUM/oM badz+ra gu h+ya sid+d+ha hUM/oM gu h+ya badz+ra sid+d+ha hUM/oM badz+ra d+ha ra gu h+ya sid+d+ha hUM/de nas rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes

329a1(rgyud): hU~M phaT/donasna yang phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyi thugs las snying po 'di phyung ngo //oM Tak+ki dza/des byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje skyong bris rlung gar

329a4(rgyud): ud+d+hi ma badz+ra d+ha ra~M sa ma ya ma nu smA ra~M sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha A kAR+Sha yA/pra be sha yan+ta.A be sha ya/ban+d+ha ya/sa ma yaM/gr-i ha ya/sar+b+ba kar+m+ma NI ma~M ku ru mu hA satwa hUM pa
329a5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rig pa'i des pas rang gi snying po bcom ldani 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir phul
329a6(rgyud): oM sum+b+ho nI sum+b+ha badz+ra bi d+yot+ta mya hUM phaT/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khro ba'i rig pa'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas rang gi
329a7(rgyud): snying po 'di gsungs so//oM badz+re shU la/de nas rdo rje sgyu ma'i rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi rig pa'i snying po dam pa 'di gsungs so//oM badz+ra sa ma ya d+ha ri Sha ya sar+b+ba hUM phaT/
329b1(rgyud): de nas rdo rje dril bu'i rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi rig+sa pA dam pa 'di gsungs s+ho//oM badz+ra g+har+N+Na raN+Da ra Na hU~M phaT//dri nas rdo rje thub pas rang gi snying po phulta ba/oM bad+d+ha ma na
329b2(rgyud): many+dzu pradz+nyA hU~M phaT/de nas rdo rje mtshon tshwas rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/oM badz+ra s+phu d+hA dA mi ka hUM phaT/rig pa'i rgyal po rnam so//de nas rdo rje 'khyil pa rdo rje khro bos
329b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'daste byug na rdo rje wA rang gI snying po 'di zhubasA la phyag 'tshal nas phul lo//oM badz+ri kuN+Da li ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha gr-ih+Na/ha na ha na/da ha da ha/be tsi be d+h+wa na sa
329b4(rgyud): ya badz+rA Ne mu da na po lA yai tI b+h+r-i tA sa hr-i dI yA badz+rI kro d+ha hUM ban+d+ha/dI nas rdo rje 'od rdo rje khro blos rang gi snying po 'di bul bya/oM badz+ra pr-i d+d+ha mA r+yA ya s+yo me kro d+ha hUM phaT
329b5(rgyud): denas rdo rje dbyug pa rdo rje khro sa rang gi snying po 'od bul lo//oM badz+ra daN+Da ya sed+d+h+ya duSh+TAM mahA kro d+ha hU~M brda/de nas rdo rje khro bo rdo rje ser pos rang gi snying ba 'di brel lnga/
329b6(rgyud): oM badz+ra pid+ma lo bA sha ya sar+b+ba duSh+Tam+bi ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT/rdo rje khro bo rnams so//de nas rdo rje gling sna tshogs kyi bdag pos bcom ldan 'das phyag na d+h+r-i r+N+Na la sbrid pa 'di
329b7(rgyud): phu'o//oM badz+ra sha d+ha ma hA ga No pa ti rak+Sha sar+b+ba duSh+Te b+h+yAM//badz+ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya hUM phaT/de nas yid rdo rje phreng bas rang g+hi snying po 'di phul lo//oM mA la gai Na ba ti/
330a1(rgyud): mA la ya U k+ShAR+Sha ya/pra bo sha ya ba sha~M ku ru mA rA ya hU~M//dwe nas rdo rje dbyung gis rang gi s+t+rIng b+h+r-i phul ba/oM badz+ra bA shr-I maN+Da ga N+ya pra ti bA shau ku ru
330a2(rgyud): hUM phaT/de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag pas rang gi snying po 'di phul lo//oM badz+ra bi dza ya bi dza ya ma hA ga Na pa ti hUM phaT/tshogs kyi bdag
330a3(rgyud): po rnamaso//de nas rdo rje b+h+yo ba rdo rje pho nyas rang gi snying po 'di phyag na rdo rje la phul lo//oM badz+ra mu s+ya la ku ru sAr+b+ba duSh+TAM hUM pA Ta/de nas rdo rje rlung gi pho nyas rang gi
330a4(rgyud): snying po 'di phul bya/oM badz+ra nI la ma hA be ga ga Na pa ti saur+b+ba duSh+Ti hUM phaT/de nas rdo rje me'i pho nyas rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/oM badz+ra a na la ma hA duSh+Ta
330a5(rgyud): dzAdz+wa la ya sar+b+ba b+hasmiM ku ru sar+b+ba duSh+TaM hUM phaT/rdo rje 'jigs pa'i pho nya chen pos rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/oM badz+ra b+hai ra ba badz+rA hUM da pa sha ya sar+b+ba duSh+TaM mer+d+he/
330a6(rgyud): yak+Sha hUM phaT/pho nya rnams so//de nas rdo rje lcags kyu rdo rje bran gyi rang gi snying po 'di bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phul lo//oM badz+ra ang+ku sha A kaR+Sha ya
330a7(rgyud): sar+b+ba mahA ts+tshit+ta hUM phaT/de nas rdo rje dus kyi rang gi snying po phul ba/oM badz+ra kA la mahA mr-i t+yu mut+pA da hUM phaT/de nas rdo rje ngan khrid kyis rang gi stong po phul
330b1(rgyud): oM badz+ra bi nA ya ka pyA dA b+h+r-i ku ru hUM phaT/dwe nas rdo rje klu'i rdo rjes rang gi snying po 'di phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phul lo//oM badz+ra nA ga badz+ra A na ya sar+b+ba da na da ne hir+ya gaR+Sha/
330b2(rgyud): ne muk+ta a lang+kA ra b+hi nI arbo pa kA ra Na ni badz+ra d+ha ra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ka ta/b+hin+da b+hin+da ha ra ha ra prA NI ma hA ts+tsha nga hUM phaT/bran rnamaso//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
330b3(rgyud): po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams cad 'gugs pa'i dam tshig 'di gsungs so//oM badz+ra ang+ku shra yaM dza A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/de nas nga gzhug pa'i dam tshig 'di gsungs pa/
330b4(rgyud): oM badz+ra pA shA kAD+D+h+ya hUM/de nas thams cad bcing ba gsungs pa/hUM badz+ra s+pho Ta baM/de nas las kyi snying po gsungs pa/oM badz+ra kar+m+ma sa ma kr-i ta/de nas bcom ldan 'das
330b5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes ri rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do//de nas rab tu bshad bya ba//dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste//chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bar ni/
330b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad srad pus bre//de la 'di ni srad pu bre ba'i snying po yin no//oM sar+b+ba badz+ra sU tAM A traM A kaR+Sha ya sar+b+ba maN+Dal hUM/dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus su yang /
330b7(rgyud): seng ldeng phur bu btab nas ni//de nas srad bu nyis rim du//byas nas de yis sras bus bre//de la 'di ni phur bu'i snying po yin no//oM badz+ra kI la ya kI la ya/sar+b+ba ba~Mg+h+nAM ban+d+ha
331a1(rgyud): gla tu rgyunan du na na rgyu na dun b+hU rgyun rgyu na na na nan kun /

331b1(rgyud): kr-ir+d+han+tu/b+hod+hA ba bad+hAd+hA thA sar+m+ma An+d+ra la /b+hag ba smro Ta/m+b+ha b+h+ya b+h+yoHnA~M d+b+ha An+ta yAs r+b+bo dz+dzaHb+hU !/oM badz+rad+hIHkrAd+hAd+haSh+ThA nA rAs+sa d+hU ny+dza/
331b2(rgyud): ba~M sh+mi kra trU~M ku ru sadz+nyo bI shwa rU pa~M tA gI sid+d+ha ye hU~M phaT+Ta/'jug gam phyir ni byung ba na//sring bri cig 'jug yid bsams nas//rdo rje shugs brjeng pa ste/
331b3(rgyud): rlom brgyal bar sh+ye//dI sa rdo rje shugs kyi snying pa ni dka/oM badz+ra ba~M rmAk+Sha mAhU~M/rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas //dkyil lab dang pa nga bzhin du/ga gi

331b5(rgyud): s+yA d+hA hUM/ shugs kyis brgas nas ni/dkyil 'khor gnas pa de bzhin te// khyil pa la sogs pa//rdo rje khri ma bzhig par bya//de la dag gi steng
331b6(rgyud): 'do rnams yin oM thA dz+wa le tA d+hi Sh+Tha bAdz+rad+h+we/A~M badz+ra s+t+rai me trUM/oM bAdzadat+ta hU~M/oM bad+d+ha bau b+h+r-i tahUM/rdo rje thugs kyis brgal nAs+thA naM//sgo ni bzhi b+h+yo rnams su ya /
331b7(rgyud): rje gling sbru la sogs pa//thams cid rim pa bzhin du bri//de dag gi das kyi nig steng pa ni 'dzirnams yin no//oM badz+ra d+ha matrUM/oM badz+ra mA ma hUM/oM bidz+ra ang+kun+tu/
332a1(rgyud): badz+ra a so hUM/rdo rje shugs kyis byargal nas no//dkyil 'khor gsum par bri ba ni//lho 'gro rim pa ji bzhin du//rdo rje tho ba la sogs pa'o//de dag gi
332a2(rgyud): snying po ni 'di rnams yin no//oM badz+re mus rbA b+h+rU~M oM badz+ra pA ti ts+tsha/oM badz+ra dz+wa la hU~M/oM badz+ra gratsi hU~M/rdo rje shugs kyis dArgi lA nas ni//dkyil 'khor bzhi par bya ba

332a5(rgyud): bzhir yang //sku ga rnams kyang de bzhin no//de nas rab tu bshad bya ni//cho ga rgyus pa ji bzhin pa'o//nga nus 'jig rten gsum pa'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen pa

332a7(rgyud): shes bskyed par byas/de khyod kyis su l-i yang ma smra shig/mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byos te dmyal bar lha dang ro zhes pasmraste/mdo'i snying po 'di sbyin no//
332b1(rgyud): rdorje khra bo ti rin ta r-i'i phyag rgya yang spyan cig/gal te dam tshig las 'das na//rdo rje khro ba chen po yis//dam tshig khyod kyi rigs pa sregs pas//klad pa nas ni brtsams//
332b2(rgyud): rAs kyang //lus rnams ma rungs par yang byed//dam tshig bcing ba'o//de nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'anges bcing //oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+ha ra/
332b3(rgyud): gr-ih+Na ba~M d+ha sa ma ya hUM/de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do//lag gnyis zla ba 'og tu btang //mthe bo mthe'u chung spel ba dang //las kyi phyag rgya dam tshig 'di/
332b4(rgyud): /rdo rje bcing ba zhes kyang bshad//de nas rdo rje'i chus dbang bskur te//snying po ni 'di yin no//oM badz+ra a b+hi She ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa badz+ra d+hA ra te sa ma glo gr-i/de nas g.yogs
332b5(rgyud): pas gdong g.yogs te/snying po 'dis gzhug go/oM badz+ra pra be sha ya/badz+ra pa be sha ya/badz+ra A bi she a bi sha a d+hI tiSh+Ti badz+ra hUM/de nas bcug nas snying po
332b6(rgyud): 'dis me tog gtor ro//oM pra tIts+tsha a d+hi tiSh+Tha badz+ra ho//de nas de dag lhung ba de 'das 'grub par 'gyur ro//de nas gdong gi yogs pa bkrol nas dkyil 'khor ro/
332b7(rgyud): rims bzhin du bstan te/lha gang yin pa de ni de la mi bstan to//da ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can log par lta ba dag yod de gang dag ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan
333a1(rgyud): rnams kyi yo shes gdan mi za ba ji ltar de bzhin ga/shegs pa rdo rje rigs phyug na rdo rjes dbyung bsgyur//de bzhin ga shegs pa nyid dam zhes dad par mi 'gyur ro
333a2(rgyud): nas pa ni dam tshig go/gzhan du na lha gang la dad pa de dag la mna'i snying po'i de byin nos bstan par bya'o//de nas rdo rje'i rin po che'i mtshan ma'i phreng bas dbang bskur nas
333a3(rgyud): las kyi rdo rje lag pa gnyis su byin la/rdo rje meng btags te ji ltar rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du bya'o//de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bslab bo//
333a4(rgyud): rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te//mthu bong nang du sbyar nas ni//mdzub m+b+ha bkug nas gzugs bkag//sems dpa'i gtsug tir zhes bya'o//rdo rje bcing ba byas nas ni//mthe za
333a5(rgyud): gung mo mthe'u chung sbyong /gzi brjid phu po zhes bya ste//gzi brjid chen po'i btsun pa'o//rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te//mthe bo mthe'u chung sbrel ba ni//
333a6(rgyud): dam du lcags kyi b+h+yo cings pa ste//rig pa chen po dam pa'o//rig pa chen po dam pa yi//phyag rgyu bcings nas rab btsir ba/snying khar mthe bo'i ngos kyis so//samra/
333a7(rgyud): dpa' yi ni snying por bshad//de nyid las gung mo srin lag/sor mo rab tu bsdams nas ni//rdo rje rin chen tshul du ni//bsgyur nas gdong du bzhag par bya//de
333b1(rgyud): bskyed de bzhag nas ni//spyi'o khar yang ni bsgyur bar bya//me tog bzhi pa zhes bya ste//pad+ma'i rig pa dam pa'o//de nyid spyi bo nas brtsams te//lus kyi dkyil 'khor bskor
333b2(rgyud): bar bya//sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'di//rdo rje las ni rab sgrub pa'o//sems ma'i rdo rje dam byas te/mthe'u chung rdo rje sbyang ba ni//thams cad rig pa'i snying po 'di /
333b3(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di ni thams cad sgrib//mthe bo mthe'u chung bcings na ni//g.yon pa'i ser me dbus ma gsum//rtse gsum pa ni dbus ma'i rtse//rdo rje phyag rgya gzung ba ste/
333b4(rgyud): rdorje rig pa dam pa 'di//rdo rje mdung zhes bya ba'o//de nas rab tu bshad pa ni//sgyu ma rdo rje la sogs brtags//rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te//g.yon pa'i rdo rje bcing
333b5(rgyud): bar bya//rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad de//rdo rje'i rigs ni kun gyi 'di'o//rdo rje de ni gnyis byas te//mtshan ma kun kyang des bzhag go/rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad kyi//
333b6(rgyud): phyag rgya rnams kyang 'byung ba ste//sor brkyang steng du bzhig pa dang //mdzub mos mtheb stan sbyang ba dang //oM zhes bya ba spyir bzhag nas//rdo rje steng du bzhag pa'o//rig
333b7(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs rnams so//rab tu brkyang nas lag gnas pa//lag pa'i rgyab du de bzhin te//khu tshur bcangs bzhag lag ngar bskum//kha yi
334a1(rgyud): phyogs su bskor bar bya//rdo rje khro bo phyag rgya'i tshogs//g.yon pa'i mthe bong steng du bzhag/phreng ba lji bcing ba'i thubs su sbyar//nor sbyin par ni g.yas
334a2(rgyud): pa ste//ral gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur mchog/'dus pa'i dbang po'i phyag rgya chen po 'dus pa'o//g.yas pa mdun tu gtan rings 'dzin//lag pa brkyang ba'ang de bzhin
334a3(rgyud): g.yas pa'i 'od ni 'bar bar bstan//rdo rje khu tshur bskyod par bya//pho nya'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshogaso//bsgyings bcas mi rngub mo'i khar mche ba//dbyug ba snun cing gnas
334a4(rgyud): pab dang //dpung pa bskum zhing sbyang ba dang /g.yas pa g.yon gyis 'dren pa'o//bran gyi phyag rgya'i tshogs chen po'i//dkyil 'khor kun tu bya ba ni//g.yon pa'i
334a5(rgyud): zur nas so//de nas rab tu bshad pa ni//sgrub pa dang ni las nyid do//sems dpa' gang gau phyag rgya gang //de ni bdag nyid nyid kyis kyang //bdag nyid goms par gyur na ni///
334a6(rgyud): phyag rgya dam par 'grub par 'gyur//gtsug tAr chen po srung ba che//gzi brjid phung po rab grub ster//rdo rje hUM zhes bya kun byed//snying khar bzhag pa thams cad 'gug/
334a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya rnamaso//thams cad rig pa thams cad 'grub//rdo rje rig pa dam pa'o//rdo rje mdung ni phyag rgya che//grub pa chen po sbyin par byed//sgyu ma'i
334b1(rgyud): rdorje rab 'grub pa//dril bu yis ni yang dag 'babs//dbyug pa'o shing ga pa mya ngan 'du'//rdo rje'i rdo rje gsod par byed//rig pa'i rgyal po rnams so//'bar ba'i mchog ni ma
334b2(rgyud): rung 'dul//zhi ba'i mchog ni thams cad gsod//dbyug pa'i mchog ni gsod pa ste//'jigs pa'i mig ni skrag par byed//rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya rnams so//myos pas rab tu
334b3(rgyud): myos par byed//phreng ba kun ni byed par bshad//'dod byed dga' bar byed pa ste//gsod pa thams cad gsod pa'o//tshogs kyi phyag rgya rnams//tho ba gdug po 'joms pa ste//

334b6(rgyud): rtog pa'i rgyal po las 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas po rdzogs so////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi
334b7(rgyud): rdo rje gzugs kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin lo snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso//oM badz+ra ba si traM swA hA//de nas
335a1(rgyud): yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rjes rang shi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so//oM badz+ra d+ha ra hAM/a radz+ra bi kra me hUM paT/yang byang chub sems

335a4(rgyud): oM badz+ra kar+m+ma ka re sAhA//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rig pa dam pas rang gi rig pa 'di gsungaso//oM badz+ra shU lA gre swA hA//de nas rdo rje
335a5(rgyud): myur ba'i rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi reg pa dam pa 'di gsungs so//oM badz+ra tsa kr-i hUM/rdo rje dril bus smras pa/oM badz+ra g+hAr+N+Na ka hUM/thug pa la rdo rjes smras pa

335a7(rgyud): po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di smras so//oM badz+ra dzA ye hUM/de nas rdo rje 'od kyis smras pa/oM badz+ro sau me hUM/de nas rdo rje dbyig pos smras pa/oM badz+ra daN+De hUM

335b4(rgyud): smras pa/oM badz+ra bA te hUM/rdo rje mas smras pa/oM badz+ra dz+wa le hUM/rdo rje 'jigs pas smras pa/oM badz+ra gra hai hUM/rdo rje pho nya'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnamaso//de nas rdo
335b5(rgyud): lcags kyus smras pa/A~M badz+rA daMSh+TaM hUM/rdo rje dus kyis smras pa/oM badz+ra ba she hUM/rdo rje da khrid kyis smras pa/oM badz+ra bin+d+ha hUM/rdo rje klus smras pa/oM badz+ra ha
335b6(rgyud): mai Ni hUM/rdo rje bran gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so//de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs//de nas rab tu bshad
335b7(rgyud): bya ba//rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste//gra bzhi pa la byang phyogs sgo//phyi rol dkyil 'khor srad bus bre//de yi nang du der yang ni//de bzhin sgo ni shar phyogs gdong //
336a1(rgyud): de yi dbus su ci rigs par//sangs rgyas gzugs ni bzhag par bya//'jog rten gsum rgyal la sogs pa//bzhi po de yi phyogs kun bzhag/
336a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de bzhin gtso bor yang //rdo rje'i phyag rgya bri bar bya//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//rigs kyi phyag rgya bri bAr bya//rdo rje glang sA la sogs pa/
336a3(rgyud): bzhi po rnams ni sgo srungs so//'jig mu dpel dang sgra dpeng dang //drur gro g.yon pa'i grwa rnams nas/phye li grA rnams phyag rgya ni//de rnams nyid ni bri bar bya//de nas
336a4(rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa'i rnams//ji bzhin par nI bshad par bya//de nas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'drar/ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byas te rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dam
336a5(rgyud): tshig gI las byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya'i cho ga bzhin du bcings la khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba su'i mdun du yang ngam tshig gi phyag rgya de rnams
336a6(rgyud): ma smra shig/g+hosang ba 'phel bar ma byed cig ces bsgo shig/de nas las kyi rdo rje de rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya'i steng du bzhig ste cho ga bzhin du chug shig
336a7(rgyud): zhugs nas rdo rje de de bzhin du po tshug/gangal bab pa de de'i dam tshig go phyag rgyu'i dbang du 'gyur to//des las thams cad b+h+r-idang //de nimi gi dong ga rmong
336b1(rgyud): bkrol nas dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bstan te/dam tshig go phyag rgya gsang ba smros shog/dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di khyod kyi//rtag tu las kun byed pa ste//ma dang sring mo
336b2(rgyud): rnams dang ni/chung ma bu mo 'dra ba'o//de la de'i snying po ni 'od dag yin no//oM sarba ga ma ni sarbe bak+ti sA pa la gr-i h+yA badz+ri Ni hUM pa Ta/'di lan cig bzlas pas bud med/
336b3(rgyud): thams cad dbang du byas te spyad na chos ma yin par mi 'gyur ro//ci dga' bar thams cad spyad nas bsgrub par bya ste/de nas sems can thams cad dag par phyag rgya thams cad
336b4(rgyud): yid kyis shes nosau las dam pa thams cad kyang byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'tshong bas gsungs//de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bslab par bya'o//dam tshig khri
336b5(rgyud): po mdzub bcug dang //snying khar yang ni bsdam par bya//ngos kyi mdzod spu khu nas dang //spyi bor gzhag nas gnyis su bya//g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo yIs//mdung
336b6(rgyud): rtse rtse gsum munan par bya'o//'di bcings pas ni yang dag par rig pa dam pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur//rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad kyi//geyon pa'i rdo re tsA bor/
336b7(rgyud): 'dus//dam tshig cho ga ji bzhin par//phyag rgya bcing ba bshad par bya//thams cad 'khor lo mdzub rtse bcu ma//dril bu phyag rgya'ang de bzhin no//de bzhin oM gi phyag
337a1(rgyud): rgyu dang //said+d+ha'i rna bar bya bste//r-ig+na d+haSh+Ti N+Dal po'i byuglu rgyu rnams//'a ba kunaN+DA m+b+ha dang //'din yang ba 'dam pa nyid//byu /
337a2(rgyud): dA'o khri tshur 'dzin pa dang //kha la~M grA mi phyug rgyu bskor ba'o//khro bo'i dam tshig rnams so//gtum pa'i phyag rgya phreng ba dang //rdo rje mngon des mdu pe min
337a3(rgyud): skye bor bzhig pa tshogs kyi ste//dkyil 'khor gyini snang ba'o//tshogs rnams kyi dam tshig go//lag pa bam+b+ham+b+ha pa khar bzhig ste//rgyab tu dang ni ba sbyor
337a4(rgyud): 'bor ba ma stug gtong ba ste//phye nas khar yang gnas par bya//pho nya'i dam tshig rnamaso//mtha ma gnyis ni khar bcug dang //btsir cing rab tu gnon pa'o/
337a5(rgyud): dpung pas stsol bas bsnol ba da /myur du phrogs pa'i do de bzhin no//bran myi rnams kyi dam tshig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dpe tshig gi
337a6(rgyud): brdzun pa'i rgyal ba las rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dkyil 'a khor b+h+rUM cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so///de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
337a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa

337b3(rgyud): chos kyi ngom bla 'ad gsung so//A~Mk+sha rAk+ShA rA hU~M hU~Mde nas rdo rje rig pa dam pas rang gi tsam+b+ha k+Sh+mI ma chog 'di ga sbyangs s+ho//oM hUM hUM badz+ra/denas dz+haiM d+ha sgyu mas

338a5(rgyud): skad bsgos nas kyang ma na'i snying po byin la/ji ltar dril bu 'di dkol ba'i//de'i sgra ji ltar mi rtag pa//de bzhin las kyi rdo rje khyod//mi brtag par ni ma rungs
338a6(rgyud): byed//rdo rje slob dpon sti steng med//rdo rje gros dang mi mdza' dang //gdug la byams dang skye bar ni//la te khyod kyis byas na'o//de nas gdong g.yogs dkal

338b2(rgyud): 'joms pa bla na med//rig pa'i rgyal po tI 'dzin rnams so//sems can gdul phyir khro ba mchog/zhi ba yis ni nges par gsod//dbyug pa 'dra la 'tshogs pa med//

341b2(rgyud): smros shig/khyod kyis lha'i rim bA ma mthong ba dang las mi shes pa stsa la yang gsang ba'i las 'di ma smra zhig/khyod dam tshig nyams par gyu tA re zhes smros shig/rdo rje slob

341b4(rgyud): payats+tsha hUM/AHhUM a la la la la badz+ri/de nas yang bdag la babs nas bdag nyid kyis 'jug ste/phyag rgya dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyi gar gyi mchod pas ma tshad par bya'o//
341b5(rgyud): de dIn tshod lus dang /ngag dang /lta ba dang /yid dang /rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams kyi las thams cad 'dod pa bzhin byed pa'o//de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol te/gar gyi mchod
341b6(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes slobs shig/sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyi//dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas te//rdo rje rig pa dam pa la//rdo rje la s+yai la sogs mchod//rig
341b7(rgyud): pa 'di rnams thams cad kyad//lha 'og go rims dri bzhin da//gar gyi mchod pa'i phag du yis//las kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya//nAM r+Ne gar phyi tshul byis ni//bag rga chen
342a1(rgyud): po mdor bsdus so//dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas nas//las kyi phyag rgya dgrol bar bya//gang gyi mchod pa 'di yis ni//gtso bo thams cad mchod na ni//rdo rje 'dzin
342a2(rgyud): pa che sogs kyi//las grub pa'i yang nges par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyirdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po las rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyi
342a3(rgyud): 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs de dag thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don du bskos nas phyir mi ldog
342a4(rgyud): pa'i sa la rab tu bzhag ste mkhyen bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gsang ba tha~Md 'dzin par
342a5(rgyud): dbang bskur na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba de gang lags/bka' stsol cig rI nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
342a6(rgyud): ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'di gsung so//sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin ni//ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba//de lta
342a7(rgyud): /de ltar sems can don//'dod chags la sogs gtsang bas bya//de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje gsang ba 'di gsung so//sems can thams cad pan phyir dang //sangs
