349a3(rgyud): sogs thams cad du//spyan ras gzigs dbang po yi//mdun du pad+mo dril bla yis//thams cad 'bebs pa'i dam pa'o//de la de dag gi snying po ni 'dri rnams yin//oM
349a4(rgyud): pad+ma A kaR+Sha ya sarba ma hA sitwA na hUM dzaHoM a ma~M g+hA pA sha krA d+hi hrI ho hU~M/oM pAd+mA s+pho Ta baM/oM pad+ma g+hAr+dz+dza a bai sha lA sarba AHbdag nyid kyis ni pA ba nyid nyid/
349a5(rgyud): pad+mi zhal bzhi sems dpar yang //bsgoms te de nas grub nas ni//skad cig gis ni gzugs ma 'gyur//de ltar bdag nyid bdag nyid kyis//rdo rje tshus kyi ting 'dzin kun
349a6(rgyud): pad+mo dAR+Wa bsgoms na ni//zad mi shes pa'i go 'phang 'thob//spyan ras gzigs dbang gtsug tor dbuso//bdag gis sangs rgyas gzugs no//bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms gyur/
349a7(rgyud): ni tshang bzhi med pa'ang mnyam par 'gyur//sna chags gzugs kyis ting 'dzin gnas//sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin du//bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms nas ni//sbyin
349b1(rgyud): ras gzims dbang mnyam par 'gyur//da la de dag gi sbyang ba rnams ni 'di yin ma/dz+raShI shwA d+hAr+m+mak+Sha yA pad+ma/shrAd+d+ha a b+hiSh+Ta ka ya/lak+sha shwa ra/da nas pakyil 'khor can
349b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo//de la re shig dang por ni phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes yin te/ji lta ri ri mo'i tshul du ni//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing //pad+ma
349b3(rgyud): la gnas sems dpar ni//bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid sgom//de nas de dag gi las ni 'di dag yin no//sangs rgyas phyag rgya che bcings nas//tshe dpag med dang mnyam par 'gyur//
349b4(rgyud): rdo rje pad+ma bcings na ni//spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur//sangs rgyas dbang gis bcings na ni//bde bar gshegs pas de dbang bsgyur//pad+ma pad+ma'i ting 'dzin //
349b5(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis ni sna tshigs mchog/sna tshogs gzugs kyis 'dul ba dang //sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur 'gyur//pad+mo sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis//pad+mo khro bo dbang phyu
349b6(rgyud): dpal//rdo rje 'jig rten+da dbang phyug gis//pad+mo 'dod ba'i dngos grub mchog/sangs rgyas dbang gis sangs rgyas nyid//rdo rje pad+ma grub mchog sbyin//'dod pa'i pad+mo ge lo
349b7(rgyud): ldan//dga' ba lIs ni legs pa sbyin//khro gnyer gyis ni khro zhing 'gyur//pad+mo ri nyi ma gzi brjid mchog/pad+ma zla bas mdzes pa che//banod pas rab nga nang grub pa
350a1(rgyud): 'thag//sbrul smras rlu sa m+b+ha ba mchab 'thab pa//bad+maral gros ljongs sbyang zab//mthun spyan gyis ni 'gugs pa sa//gas dAk+Sharam+b+his ni dngas grub cag
350a2(rgyud): pad+mo gar dbang gis 'grub ste//mi 'jigs rtag tu 'jigs pa med//rab gtum gyis ni mo rungs 'dul//pad+mo khu tshur rab tu sgrub//sgeg mo dga' zhing phyung ba'i nir//glur
350a3(rgyud): blangs gar bde bdug pas tshim//me tog mdzes shing me tog lta//dris ni michog gis drir yang 'gyur//rta 'grin gyis ni yang drag 'gugs//gdon mi zla bar dbang du byed//
350a4(rgyud): pad+mo lcags sgrog bcing ba che//dril bus kun nas 'bebs byed do/de nas pad+mo rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di yin te//rdo rje bsdam pa bcings nas ni/
350a5(rgyud): mthe bo mthe'u chung mnyam par sbyang //phyag rgya 'di ni chos dam tshig/sangs rgyas chos ni rab thob byed//rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni//mdzub mo gung mo sin lag
350a6(rgyud): mnyam//sangs rgyas rigs mchog phyug rgyu do//sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par byed//rdo rje bsnams po bcings nas s+ho//gung ma rnga rje rab mnyams pa//'di ni rdo rje rig dam
350a7(rgyud): par//phyag rgya yin te rdo rje 'grub//de las gung mo rin chen 'dra//rdo rje rin chen re'i 'grub byed//gung mo pad+mo'i tshul du byas//pad+mo'i dngos grub la par byed/rje
350b1(rgyud): smran du dudu rgyu na shA shA rgyun na ku smra du smra smra nga ga/ na du/
351a1(rgyud): /mau m+b+hany+dzam par sbyar nas no//bkan logs phyug rgyu bcings nas ni//legaso zhes bya sbyin par byed//pad+ma'i legs pa yin par grags//thal mo mnyam par
351a2(rgyud): rab sbyar la//mdzub mo rtse mo mnyams te dgug/mthe'u chung phyi nas mdzod bur bzhag/pad+mo khro gony+tsir zhes bya'o//rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la//sor mo thams cad dkyil
351a3(rgyud): 'khor du//snying khar rab tu brkyang ba ni//pad+mo'i nyi ma yin par bshad//thal mo rab tu dam sbyar la//mdzub gnyis rin chen 'dra bar bya//dpung pa'i spyi bor rab rgyan pa//pad+mo rin
351a4(rgyud): chen rgyal mtshan rtser//rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bor bzhag/kha dang bcas par rab brkyang nas//nyid kyi kha nas dgod pa dang //kha ni bcu gcig nyid du 'gyur//ting 'dzin pad+mar/
351a5(rgyud): bcings nas ni//mthe bo gnyis ni so sor 'gyed//pad+mo sgrol ba'i phyag rgya las//mdzub gnyis pad+mo'i tshul du dgug/pad+mo sgrol ba'i phyag rgya dang /dngos grub thaMd grub par
351a6(rgyud): byed//ral gri tshul du byas pa ni//pad+mo'i ral gri'i phyag rgya yin//mthe'u chung pad+mo chen por bya//mthe bo gnyis ni dbyug ltar sgreng //mdzub mo rtse mo dung chen bya//gung mo
351a7(rgyud): srin lag 'khor lo bya//rdo rje thal mor dam byis la//g.yas pa oM du nang du gzhug/g.yon pa'i mdzub mtheb bzlas pa bye//sor kun chus skyes kha bye 'dra//rdo rje thal mo
351b1(rgyud): spyo la//g.yon dang g.yas nas de bzhin du//'ab+h+ring byanas par byung bskor nas ni//skye bar bzhag pa pad+mA can//d+hU rnga thal myo ma byas la//rngo mo thams cad kha byu ba//bar
351b2(rgyud): dz+dza 'i snying khar ni//bzhag nus brtan par byed pa po//rdo rje thul mo dem byas la//gsong ba'i gnod sbyin tshul du ni//thul mo brkyang ste bskums nas ni//khar bzhig pad+ma'i
351b3(rgyud): nad sbyin mo//rdo rje khu chur bcings nas kyang //blung mo gnyis ni phyir dgug ste//rang gi man+t+ra ba'i rgyu bo munan pa//pad+ma'i khu tshur zhes kyang byashad//rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis
351b4(rgyud): rdo rje thul mo las byung ba//mtshad pa'i lha mo thams cad kyi//dam tshig mchog rnams bcing pa'o//rdo rje bsdam pa 'i sa byis la//mdzub mo gnyis nI mnyam sbya nas//mdzu
351b5(rgyud): mi gnyis ni phyir bkug la//rta mgrin gyi ni yin par bshud//'ad+mo'i thal mo mnyam sbyar la//mdzub gnyis mdud par 'dud pa ni//nges par zhugs pa'i phyag rgya yin//mthun
351b6(rgyud): mdzub lpags sgrog 'dra bar bya//rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyis ni//pad+mo thal mo muny+dza mo sbyar la//sprin lag mne'u chung gnyis bar du//mthe bo gnyis bzlog dam du bcing //
351b7(rgyud): nas pad+ma rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/hrIHgr-i kr-i hI/shri shi d+hi ta/gri ti kr-i pri/bi riSh+Ti a/pad+mo khu tshur gnyis byas la//las kyi phyag rgya ba sgrub par bya/
352a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs
352a2(rgyud): so///de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
352a3(rgyud): zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso//oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma sa ma yaM hUM/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa 'byung ba'i rig pa dam
352a4(rgyud): pa 'di gsungaso//oM badz+ra sa ma ye hU~M/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so//oM ma Ni rat+na sa ma ye hUM/
352a5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so//oM pad+ma sa ma ye hUM/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang
352a6(rgyud): gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso//oM karma sa ma ye hUM/de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos rang gi rigs
352a7(rgyud): dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so//de nas rab tu bshad bya ba//phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste//rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la//pad+mo'i gsang ba zhes bshad//
352b1(rgyud): dpa 'khor chen po'i rgyu 'dun//86 'khor tham pa cad skad bus r+b+ba//do dbus pad+mo'i stod dun/rdu rmongs kyi dbang po tho//de la phyogs rnams thams cud du//dam tshig mchog rnam
352b2(rgyud): lcag sgra bzhin//rang gi rigrI pa rnams ldan par//chos kyi rdo rje la sogs bro//hUM li dag gi steng po ni 'di rnam pa yin no//A~M sarbatwA thA ga tar+m+mA rme shwa retrUM/oMd+harmA sa mA ya badz+dza
352b3(rgyud): pad+mA nid+d+hi/oM bud+d+ha a b+hiShik+Sharat+na s+t+rai ma yad+d+haM/oM tA r+m+mas ma ye b+h+rU~M/oM bai shA mu She dz+haiM/sna chag pa'i zugs mchog dkyil la //rdo rje shugs kyis tshul nas nA~M//da
352b4(rgyud): dbus su pad+mo yis//bskor ba'i pad+mi bri bAr bya//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad de//pad+mo'i phyag rgyu gnyis gnas pa//pad+mo'i mtshan mo bri bar bya//byad gshegs nyid kyi nyid byan
352b5(rgyud): rgyade la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin no//hrIHoM pad+ma tA nA ga to//oM si man+ta b+hU dr-i pad+ma badz+ra a~M ku sha ko Sha d+hA rI r+N+Na trUM/yaM bed+yA rA tI/oM pad+ma duSh+TaM/de bzhin
352b6(rgyud): 'khor gnyis par yang //rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni//gtsug phud chu skyes che gnas pa'o//sangs rgyas dbang bskur bri bar bya//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//lte
352b7(rgyud): 'og rim pa ji bzhin du//pad+ma'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi//dam tshig mchog rnams bzhag par bya//de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin na//shrIHoM b+h+r-i ku TI be tA Di ri hA
353a1(rgyud): A pad+mA dzA b+he/oM sau ma nA pad+hAnAn+da/oM pad+ma mat+mA sa na akad sha r+d+hakad+hAdaM rA da ro au an+tha/ban+d+haHla pra tsawau ku su ma d+hA ra a au n+ma tAM sha sId+d+hi rba
353a2(rgyud): yan+tu hUM/de bzhin dkyil 'khor gsum par yang //rdo rje shugs kyis brtul nas kyang //de yi dbus su pad+me mdziswa//pad+ma'i phyag rgyu bzhig par bya//de bzhi hU~Mk+ShA nam/
353a3(rgyud): thams cung du//lha 'og+h+ra go rims ji bzhin par//pad+ma'i mtshan mar ldan pa laM//pad+mo la ni gnas par bri//de la de dag gi snying po ni 'od rnams yin no//b+hI dz+haiM/oM tA rar+b+her+dz+dza
353a4(rgyud): raM hUM/oM d+hIHhUM/oM pad+ma tsakra shaM kha d+hA ra NI/nI la kaN+De sid d+h+ya sid d+hA trAM/oM pAN+Da ra b+hu sen pad+ma saM b+ha be ba d+ha ba d+ha hU~M/de bzhin dkyil 'khor bzhi par ni//rdo rje shun
353a5(rgyud): kyis brgal nas kyang //pad+mo'i dbus su pad+mo bri//'bar ba'i phreng bas bskor 'od bri//de yi phyogs rnams tha~Md du//lta 'ag go rims ji bzhin par//pad+mo'i dbus na gnas
353a6(rgyud): pa yi//bad+ma'i mtshan m+b+ha ldan par bri//de la de gI snying po ni 'od rnams yin no//s+t+waM/oM pad+ma na d+hi shwa ri pU dza ya s+thAn ta thA ga tu nAn tan ta d+d+hi/oM A he sha ya~M pad+ma ka btsa ban d+ha
353a7(rgyud): kram na hU~M/haM/oM me ng+ga pran te ba la Sh+ma N+De ba~M shrI rU ba d+h+wer ce sa pa lasarba duSh+Ta khAde khAd hU~M biT/oM bad+da mr-iSh+Ti i mr-i/rdo rje drugs kyis gal nas na/sa
353b1(rgyud): rgyus mchod pa rnams zla ba//pad+ma lcags kyu la sogs rgyu/mngan na pad+mo'i margyun ma can//de nas de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams//oM pad+ma ra ti p+'udz+nyA ho//oM pad+ma a d+hi She /du tshor to//
353b2(rgyud): oM pad+mA gIt+te bA dza~M ga~M/oM bag+h+nAM ni rbi d+yaM d+h+wa dzata//oM d+hU pi bad+mAn hU~M/oM pad+mA puSh+pA trAM/oM bid+mA kA la~M sun d+hA re/d+hArma A mo ka pU dz+wA la hU~M/oM pad+mA g+hAn d+he hU~M/mchi
353b3(rgyud): rnams//oM bid+yA AM ku sha A kaR+Sha ya mas+t+rai pad+ma ku la nA/ha ya grI ba sa ma ye hU~M dz+dzaHoM a mo g+hA rA sha kro d+ha sa ma ya~M pra be shwa ya sarba sitwA sa ma yaM hUM/oM pad+ma shrI ka le
353b4(rgyud): oM pad+ma bAn+ta d+ha ri shI g+h+raM A be sha ya/sa m+ba yaM sha na mu ki oM/de nis phyag rgya 'di'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/pad+mo'i slob ma rnams
353b5(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhi na btsu ngo /'di skad du khyod kyis gsang ba 'di su la yang ma smra shig/khyod sems can dmyal bar lhung nga re//tshe gcig tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te re//de nas phye ba
353b6(rgyud): nas 'di skad du khyod kyi de mig lam du ci zhig snang zhes dris nas/des ji skad du smras pa de bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro//des gal te na mkha'i dkar bar mthong na ni de'i tshe de'i dngos
353b7(rgyud): grub dam pa'i ye shes bslab par bya'o//yang na ser po mthong na ni de nor 'grub po'i ye shes bslab bo//ci ste dmar po mthong na ni rje su dag par 'gyur ba'i ye shes bslab bo//
354a1(rgyud): ci ston pa po mthong na ni mngon spyod kyi ye shes bslab bo//ji ste sna tshogs mthong na ni dngos grub thams cad kyi ye shes bslab par shes nas ji lta ba bzhin du gdeng
354a2(rgyud): g.yogs pas bkrol nas snod ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes bskyed do//phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o//de ltar rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor tha~Md du yang snod
354a3(rgyud): lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab pa ni 'di bzhin du brtag par bya'o//de nas dngos grub dam pa sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/spyan ras gzigs dbang sems dpa' che/
354a4(rgyud): sna tshogs gzugs bdag nyid kyis//bsgoms na phyag rgya chen po yi//mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur//sangs rgyas dbang gis dam tshig ni//mnyam par gzhag
354a5(rgyud): pas brtan byas te//bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms nas ni//mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur//pad+mo pad+mo sems dpa' che//bdag nyid mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms//
354a6(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis ni dam pa yi//dngos grub thob pa nyid du 'gyur//rang byung gdon mi za ba yi//dbang phyug las kyi phyag rgya ni//cho ga bzhin bsgrubs myur bar yang //mchog gi
354a7(rgyud): dngos grub thob par 'gyur//de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no//oM pad+ma satwa haM sid d+hA hi/oM bud+d+ha oM b+hi ShaM kA kro d+ho haM sid d+hu ho//oM d+harma sa mA d+hi ra haM sid d+ha to//
354b1(rgyud): oM.a ma g+hA shwa ra hi sid d+h+ya mo//de nas nor sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di yin to//kha yi nang du dbyig bcug ste//sna tshogs dbang phyung phyug rgya che//byang ga nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni//gcig/
354b2(rgyud): tu gyur las stong du 'gyur//gser srang ba rgyad cha blangs nas ni//dam tshig mchog ni rab brtan pa ru//bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms nas no//gtsug tu gyur las stong du 'gyur/
354b3(rgyud): mumr-i trog 'brum bu khar bcug la//bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu//bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni//gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur//las kyi phyag rgya lag gnyis kyis/
354b4(rgyud): rin chen thams cad zangs na nI/bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na yang //gcig tu gyur los stong du 'gyur//de la de dag gi snying po ni 'od rnams yin no//oM pad+ma ma hA rat+na pra d+ha hUM du dzA/
354b5(rgyud): maM pad+ma su baN+Da pra d+hA hUM dza/oM pad+ma mu ku Ta pra d+ha hUM dzaM/oM pad+ma sar+b+ba rat+na pra d+hi hUM dzaM/de nas rje su dga' ba'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/sna tshogs dbang phyug phyag rgya che//bdag nyid
354b6(rgyud): kyis ni bsgoms na ni//pad+ma blangs te mdun gnas pa//gang yin des ni de mgur byed//dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yis//pad+mo dmar por dam bzung ste//bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni//
354b7(rgyud): dra 'ad thams cad dga' bar 'gyur//bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms nas kyi //pad+me blangs te ji lta ba//rdo rje lta bas de ltar ba sa//'jig rten thams cad dos mgur 'gyur/
355a1(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis n+d+hi//cho ga bzhin du pad+mo gzung //lag pa gnyis kyis bskor na ni//bud med thams cad der mgur 'gyur//de la de dag gi snying po na
355a2(rgyud): 'di rnamaso//oM bI shwo shwa rA ma hA pad+ma ho//oM pad+ma sa ma ya pad+ma ho//oM yo ga pad+ma ho//oM mAt+ma kar+m+ma ho//sna tshogs ye shes dbang phyug che//bdag nyid mdun du pad+ma bcad/
355a3(rgyud): phyag rgya pad+mo de nyid kyis//de yi mchi ba skad cig go/pad+mo bzung nas brtan bya ba//cho ga legs pa ji bzhin du//dam tshig dam pa de nyid kyis//nan tan kho nar ba zhig par
355a4(rgyud): byed//gang gis ming smos 'jig pa ni//ting 'dzin phyag rgya sbyar nas su//ji ltar de ltar pad+mo thogs//las de nges par 'grub par 'gyur//gang gis gzhig par khros na ni//
355a5(rgyud): lhas kyi phyag rgya sbyar nas su//bskor zhing brdab par byas nas ni//dri yi mtsho brdol bar 'gyur//oM ma hA pad+mats+tshe da mA ra yahU~M phaTar+m+ma oM sa ma ya pad+ma s+pho Ta nA sha ya ra ta phaT/
355a6(rgyud): aM d+harmA pad+mats+tshe de bi nA sha ya pre ta ya phaT/oM karma pad+ma s+pho Ta ya~M dzI bi tA ma s+ya kr-ita phaT/de nas chos kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i phyag rgyu ye shes ni 'di yin no//bud med du ni
355a7(rgyud): pad+mo bsgom//de steng bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgyur//pad+mo pad mchog rtse byed cing //mnyam par gzhag na dngos grub thob//bud med du ni pad+ma bas ma//de steng bdag nyid sangs rgyas
355b1(rgyud): bsgyur//rtse zhing dbu rgyan sangs rgyas ni//bsgoms na des ni do 'grub po//bud med du nAM pir+b+bo sa ma//de steng pad+mo r-I bdag na sbyar to//rtse zhing pad+mo pad+mo mchog/dag pa'i dngos grub thob
355b2(rgyud): por 'gyur//bud meng du ni pad+mo bsam//de steng sna tshogs bdag bsgyur te//rtse zhing sna tshogs pad+mo mchog/m+b+ha cho ge saM dngos grub thob phyur 'gyur//de dag gi snyed pa ni 'di
355b3(rgyud): rnamaso//oM badz+ra pad+ma si yo gra sA d+ha ya hriHoM bud+d+ha ma ku Ta saM yoH ga sAM d+ha ya shrI/oM pad+ma pad+ma saM yo grA s+yA d+ha yaM dz+hi/oM bai sh+tsa bAd+l-i saM yau ga sA d+ha ya sti/de nas pad+mo rigs kyi
355b4(rgyud): gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrub bo//sor mu ts+tsha sprad pid+mor bya//rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub gnyis spyang //nartse gnyis nor bu'i pad+mo ltar//rdo rje bsdams pa'ang
355b5(rgyud): de bzhin te//rdo rje bcing ba bsdams nas kyang //gung mo gnyis ni myu gur sgrib//mdzub mo srin lag gnyis bkug pa'i//phyag rgya shAkya thub pa'i brtan//chos kyi rdo rje snying khar
355b6(rgyud): bzhag/bsgyur te dpral bar bzhag pa dang //ting 'dzin tshul bang du bzhag/bsgyur nas spyi bor bzhag par bya//rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang bcings la//mchod rten pad+ma'i tshul du ni//
355b7(rgyud): gung mo'i go nyis ni bcing gyur na//sangs rgyas pad+mo yin par bshad//de las mthe bo rdo rje dang //mdzub gnyis ral gri lcags kyur bya//pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /gsang ba'i
356a1(rgyud): phyag rgya yin par bshad//de las mthe bo bsnol nas kyang //mdzub mos mdzub mo rab bzung la//drangs na rab dga' yin par bshad//legaso zhes pa'ang de
356a2(rgyud): bzhin te//rdo rje bsdom pa dam byas las//mthe bo gnyis mnyam bcug nas kyang //mdzub gnyis rtse bkug rtse mo ni//dpral bzhag gung mo pad+mor bya//de nyid las ni snying khar
356a3(rgyud): yang //nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang //de nyid las ni rgyal mtshan bcing //lhag par rab tu brgyang bar bya//rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la//mdzub gnyis rtse mo pad+mor
356a4(rgyud): dgug/de bzhin pad+mo ral gri ste//mdzub mo pad+mor byas pas sbyar//rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas la//mthe bo g.yon pa nang du bzhug/dung ste mthe bo tho bar sprad//sor mo bskum
356a5(rgyud): bskyed pad+ma mthe'u chung //de las thams cad bcum nas kyang //mthe'u chung pad+mo lta bur bya//mthe bo g.yas la sbyar ba yi//mdzub mor nor bu bgrang bar bya//rdo rje bsdam pa
356a6(rgyud): dam byas la//mthe'u chung pad+mo lta bur bya//mdzub mo sgreng ste gar byed pa//pad+mo spyan gyi yon par bshad//rdo rje bo sdam pa dam byas la//mthe'u chung pad+mo lto bur bya//dam du mdzub
356a7(rgyud): mo gnyis bkug ste//mthe bo gnyis ni go char bya//de las mthob gnyis mi tsho bar bya//mtheb gnyis nang du gzhug par bya//de nas rab tu bshad bya ba//dam tshig
356b1(rgyud): man mamamam pa thams samam cams mthamasamam can thasamamamasama' mas yamags man kam san tham yas ma
356b2(rgyud): mchog ni bla med de//rdo rje nang du bsdams nas kyang //mdzub gnyis pad+mo 'dra byas la//mthe bo phan tshun bsnol ba ni//gsang ba'i sna tshogs dbang du bshad//de bzhin rdo rje bsdams
356b3(rgyud): pa las//mthe'u chung gung mo mnyam sgreng la//mtheb mos rdo rje sbyar ba ni//gtsug pud dbus na de bzhin gshegs//de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las//mthe bo pad+mo 'drer byas
356b4(rgyud): la/kha nas dbyung ltar byas nas kyang //dpang tu tingange 'dzin ltar bzhag/de bzhin du rdo rje bsdams pa las//sor mo kun gyi ngos rnams ni//mnyam par dam du bsdoms
356b5(rgyud): nas kyang //mdzub gnyis rdo rjer mnyam pa'o//de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las//mdzub gnyis pad+mo 'drar byas la//mthe bo gnyis kyang bsnol nas ni//gung mo gnyis ni
356b6(rgyud): rtse sbyar bkug/de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las//mtheb gnyis rdo rjer rab sbyar la//mdzub mo ral gri lcags kyur bya//mthe'u chung pad+mo 'drir byas la//de bzhin du ni
356b7(rgyud): bsgyur nas kyang //mdzub mo g.yon pa sgreng ba la//mdzub mo mthe bo rtse sbyor ba//dam du bzung ste dgug ltar bya//de la mdzub mo gnyis bkug la//mthe bo gnyis kyis/
356b8(rgyud): ba snun pa ni//pad+mo dgyes pa bdag nyid che//legaso zhes bya sbyin byed kyi//de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las//sor mo kun gyi ngos sbyar la//mthe bo gnyis kyis mnan nas/
357a1(rgyud): ni//mdzub mo mnyam par sbyar ba'o//de nyid snying khar nyi ma bya//spyi bor pad+mo rgyal mAtshonu bya//phrab ste kha yi 'gram bzhag pa//pad+ma char dkod dkod pa yin//
357a2(rgyud): rdo rje nang du bsdams byas la//chos kyi rdo rje tshul gyis ni//mthe'u chung mtho bo rab bsdams //'din sgrol ma'i dam tshig yin//de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las//mdzub
357a3(rgyud): gud pad+ma ral grir bya//de bzhin nang du 'khor lor bya//zlos pa sbyin pa de bzhin no//de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las//mtheb mdzub skad de gnyis su bye//de nas snying dka r-i//
357a4(rgyud): skyusbyar ba ni//gsang ba'i srung ba yin par bshad//de bzhin rdo rje bsdoms pa las//mthe'u chung pad+ma 'dreng byas la//mdzub gnyis shin tu bkug nas kyang //mtheb gnyis
357a5(rgyud): phyir bskyed mche ba can//de bas khu tshur tshul gyis ni//mtheb gnyis ngos kyis btsir ba yi//pad+mo gsong ba'i khu tshur che//dam tshig mchog tu rab brtag pa'o//pad+ma
357a6(rgyud): l-I skye lo sogs pa//de dag gzhan rnams kun gyi ni//rdo rje nang du bsdams byas la//de 'dra bar ni bcing bar bya//de nas pad+mo gsang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya 'di yin te/
357a7(rgyud): d+hAgr-I bA h+ma/shrA sU d+hA hUM/bA rA krA hAM/dA r-ISh+Ta //las kyi phyag rgya mdor bstan khu tshur gnyis su bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i
357b1(rgyud): po chen po las chos gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho///de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi
357b2(rgyud): dam tshig 'byung bar byin gyis brlab pa'i pad+mo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa 'di gsungs so//oM d+harme sa mA d+hi dz+nyA nA ta thA ga ta hUM/de nas byang chub sems
357b3(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs kyi chos 'byung ba'i rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so//oM badz+ra d+harmA hUM/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying bas
357b4(rgyud): rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so//oM rat+na d+harmA hUM/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so//oM d+harma d+harma hUM/de nas
357b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so//oM karma d+harmA hUM/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
357b6(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos nyid kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so//de nas rab tu bshad bya ba//ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste//rdo rje dbyings
357b7(rgyud): dang 'dra bar ni//chos kyi ye shes zhes brjod do//dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni//dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre//de yi dbus su bri ba ni//ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
358a1(rgyud): de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//sems dpa' rgyu rnams cho ga bzhin//starmugs dbang phyug lta sogs pa//ti 'dzin la snyoms zhugs bri//de la de dag
358a2(rgyud): ni snying po 'di rnamaso//au dz+nyA da Tu d+hA hU~M/aM dz+nyA na bi shwe shwa re hUM/yau dz+nyA na bud+d+ha mu kun+da hUM/oM dz+nyA na d+harme shwa re hUM/i dz+nyA na a mo g+he shwa re hUM/aM dz+nyA naM pad+ma bud+d+ha hUM/au dz+nyA na/
358a3(rgyud): pad+ma badz+ra d+ha ra hUM/oM dz+nyA na pad+ma mA raM hUM/oM dz+nyA na pad+ma duSh+Ti hU~M/oM dz+nyA na pad+me b+h+r-i ku Ti hU~M/A~M dz+nyA ni pad+ma sur+yaM hU~M/oM dz+nyA nAM pad+ma tsa Da hUM/oM dz+nyA nA pad+ma hA sa hUM/oM dz+nyA na
358a4(rgyud): pad+me tA ra hUM/oM dz+nyA na pad+ma ku mA ra hU~M/oM dz+nyA nAM pad+ma na rA ye hU~M/oM dz+nyA nA pad+ma hA su hUM/oM DI dz+nyA na pad+ma narti shwa ra hUM/oM dz+nyA na pad+ma rakra hUM/oM dz+nyA nI pad+ma yak+Sha hUM/
358a5(rgyud): yaM dz+nyA na pad+ma muSh+Ti hUM/oM dz+nyA na pad+ma l-I s+ye hUM/oM dz+nyA na pad+ma mA le hUM/oM dz+nyA na pad+ma gI tai hUM/aM dz+ha na pad+ma nr-i te hUM/oM dz+nyA na pad+ma d+hu pe hUM/oM dzA na pad+ma puSh+pe hUM/
358a6(rgyud): oM dz+nyA na pad+me dI bi hU~M/au dz+nyA na pad+ma gan+d+ho hUM/au dz+nyA ni pad+ma aM ku sha hUM/oM dzI nA pad+ma a mr-i g+h+na pA sha trUM/oM dz+nyA na pad+ma s+tho Ta hUM/oM dz+nyA na pad+ma a be she hUM/de nas
358a7(rgyud): chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa lo sogs pa cho ga rgyas par byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug nas nyid skad du khyod kyis gzhan su la yang ma brjod cig/khyod
358b1(rgyud): sems can dmyal por lhung nas sdug bsngal byar gyur ta ra/de nas de'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste/'jig rten dbang phyug snyoms zhugs la//snying khar pad+mo bsgoms nas kyang //pad+ma
358b2(rgyud): ting 'dzin thob na ni//de ma thag tu myur bar lding //'jig rten dbang por snyoms rdzogs lo//dpral bar pad+mo sgom byas te//goms nas shin tu brtan gyur na//de ma thag tu mkha'

358b5(rgyud): b+hi ShaM ka A be sha/oM pad+ma dz+nyA na bi d+yo d+ha ma A ba sha/oM pad+ma dz+nyA na uSh+NI ShA a be sha/na mkha' 'am naM phyogs gzhan du//pad+ma'i ngo byi bas shig bsgoms nas kyang /
358b6(rgyud): tsha ga 'di ni grub 'gyur na//skad cig gis ni mi snang 'gyur//na mkha' la ma ni phyogs gzhan du//pad+mo'i dbyibs shig bsgoms nas kyang //de yi steng du bdag 'dug par//
358b7(rgyud): bsgoms par gyur na mi snang 'gyur//na mkha'i ri ma ni phyogs gzhan du//pad+ma'i dbyibs shig bsgoms byas la//gang tsho mthong ba de tshe blangs//mi snang bar ni myur du 'gyur/
359a1(rgyud): namakha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du//pad+maSh+Ti dbyibs ni bsgoms byas la//mthang ba'i pad+ma zas na//da ma thag tu mi sna 'gyur//de la de dag gi stong
359a2(rgyud): po ni 'di rnams so//oM pad+ma a~M kauR+Sha/oM pid+mi ra thA/oM paud+ma dz+nyA na gra h+na na/oM pad+ma ra sa ya hUM phaT/phyag rgya che bcings pad+mo ni//kha dog dbyibs rnams sku
359a3(rgyud): tshogs pa'i//dbyibs de lag pas bzung na ni//gzugs rnams thams cad 'chang bar 'gyur//pad+ma'i kha dag dbyibs rnams ni//sna chags pad+ma'i dbyibs bris la

359a5(rgyud): nayang //sgra yi gzugasu du 'gyur ro//pad+mo'i kha dog dbyabs rnams ni//sna tshogs dbyibs su byas kyang ni//de la zhon nus mkha' 'gro zhing //ci dga' gzugasu dris
359a6(rgyud): par 'gyur//dwe la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso//oM pad+ma d+hA ri bi shAR+ShA pa pra brta ya A ba sh+ma//oM bai shA pad+ma pre brta ya mAM au sa mA d+hi bi sh+tsa pad+ma u be shaM/oM bi
359a7(rgyud): shA pad+ma ma notakl-i pa A kA shi be shwa rU paM a d+hi tiSh+Tha mAM/gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya che//ting nge 'dzin gyis legs bcings lha//pad+ma blangs te rab byin na//gdon ma
359b1(rgyud): rlu dud du na / / / ts+tshanas smanan//ngan pa na nas nga//rgyu ts+tsha na spyod du ts+tsha// na sa na
359b2(rgyud): yid/phyag rgya gleng yang rung bcings la//ye shes pa d+ma gang byin pa//dr-i ni de yis myur dbang 'a gyur//dang yang rung po ny-i ba de tshig ldan//sa kyi rgyug N+ya bats+tshis nas ni//

359b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca N+DI chos kyi dam tshig gang+gAg+sa pa'i rgyu 'i hUM tshan pA la si ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshu ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho//de nas yong
359b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi las kyi dam tshig 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i pad+mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

360a3(rgyud): rdo rje na gyis rang gi reg pa dam pa 'od gsus no//e pa~Md+yA kAm hU~M/de sa byang chub sems dpa/rdo rje sna rgyogs kyis rlung gi rig pa 'di gsungs so//oM
360a4(rgyud): la dzi sa pa ste//da rje dbyengs dang khru// sa nas rgyu //daN+DI ba'i rgyu lta ni//N+Di mas nga s+yA s+'u hA/

360a6(rgyud): ra oM gai Shi shaM karmaM bdU d+h+waM/oM d+harma karma shwar dz+nyA na b+hU dza sa ma ni hU~M/oM a ma b+h+r-i karme shwa ri hU~M/oM pad+ma karma bud+d+ha hUM/oM pad+ma karma /

362a1(rgyud): dbang por grub par 'gyur//'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis//dam chog ces bya btsongs nas kyang //shrI shrI shrI shrI zhes brjod na//dngos grub dam pa
362a2(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur//'jig rten dbang po'i mnyam gzhag par//mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang //d+hi ga d+hi ga d+hi ga d+hig zhes brjod na//pad+mo khro bor 'grub par

362a6(rgyud): byed cing //pri ya pri ya zhes brjod na//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dgyes so//'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la//bud med kun dang rtse byed cing //a ho ra ti
362a7(rgyud): zhes brjod na//de ni rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur//'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la//bud med kun dang rtse byed cing //su kha su kha zhes brjod na//de yi bde ba nyams mi
362b1(rgyud): 'gyur//do l+ya de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams//oM sarba bud+d+ha pA dza pra bar+d+han pad+ma/u pra ta k+Sha ra pad+mA/oM rat+ta pra bar+t+tan+t+ra pad+mA/oM mAny+dza su kha bad+b+ha drA Da hUM/de nas pas t+yaH/
362b2(rgyud): /byAng+ge rgya chen po ji lta ba bzhin du 'asru ba par bya ste/de nas pad+d+ha thal sbyar te//dam tshig byug rgyu rdo rje dgongs//lus kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//gnas rnams kun+d+ha
362b3(rgyud): bzhag par bya//de nas pad+mo rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya ni bu zhes bya ba brjod par bya//las kyi phyag rgya des sgrub bo//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig
362b4(rgyud): brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po lus las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzog s+ho////de nis yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya byin
362b5(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyag rgya'i snying po 'di gsung so//oM badz+ra d+harma pad+me hUM/de nas phyag ni rdo rjes rang gi rig pa drom po 'di
362b6(rgyud): gsungs so//oM badz+ra d+hI/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje snying los rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so//oM badz+ra rat+na hrI/nga nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying gis rang
362b7(rgyud): gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs//oM d+harma pad+ma d+hi/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so//oM sarba mu khe hUM/de nas byang chub pa
363a1(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sman rab gzigs kyi dbang pos phyag myang zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so//de nas rab tu bshad bya'o//
363a2(rgyud): byag rgya bzhi mchog dkyil 'khor ste//rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba dang //dkyil 'khor chen por 'dra bar bya//phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dbu su ni//sangs rgyas gzugs ni
363a3(rgyud): zhig par bya//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//rdo rje pad+ma la sogs te//de nas dkyil 'khor 'di bo dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/ji lta ba bzhin
363a4(rgyud): du bcug sgro 'di skad du 'di khyod kyis su la yang mi brjod cig/khyod rtag tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba dang /mi bde ba ma spangs pas dris nas sems can dmyal ba
363a5(rgyud): lhung ngo ri zhes bsgo shig/de nas de yi ye shes bskyed par bya ste/log pas pa d+mo bzung nas kyang //bsgrims te legs par bsdams par bya//dri de sangs rgyas rnams
363a6(rgyud): mtshung na//myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur//mnyam por gzhag par gtsug pu dbus//sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab gzhug la//'gro zhing rdo rje 'gying bstan nu//
363a7(rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed//pad+mo'i pad+ma chen po'i gzugs//ting 'dzin 'dug ji lto bzhin//yid kyis su ni de bsad do//gang du phog par de rgyas pa'i//
363b1(rgyud): snga srogs pA y+r-i las byed do//khyaR+Yo pad+mo chen po'i gzugs//pad+mo rgyu grangs nyid du ni//byas te log pa skye bzung nr-is kya //bskor nas ngo bo ba lA sogs de byed//de nas de dag
363b2(rgyud): ki snying po ni 'di rnams so//oM badz+ra rit+na hUM/oM sar+b+ba tA thA ba ti U shrI pa ri pA ra Na mAM hA rat+na hUM/aM badz+rA hUM tra/oM gan+d+ha pU dzA sa d+ha ya hriHoM pad+ma mu ku Ta ta thA bA ta/
363b3(rgyud): sha~M ku ru satrA na lo ka shwa ra a b+hi She kaM si ma ya ho//oM pad+ma pad+mA mU ra ya sarbaM pre t+yAr+thi ka na si mA~M d+hi dz+nyA na d+h+r-i k+Sha/A~M bi shr-I paud+mi sarba kar+m+ma kA ro b+hA ba la li luM la l-i
363b4(rgyud): hUM phaT/de nas phyag rgya gsang ba'i ye shes bslab bo//chags pa dgos pa thams cad ni//bsgrub par bya ste dam tshig 'di//sgrub par dka' ba'i phyag rgya yang //rnal 'byor
363b5(rgyud): gyis ni myur du 'grub//de la 'dri'i dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no//oM sA d+ha ya pad+ma ra gaM sa ma ya a/de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya chen po thad
363b6(rgyud): bslab par bya'o phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho///de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
363b7(rgyud): kyi dbang pos 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs//oM sarba dzaM gad bi nA ya~M ma hA sar+b+ba a/A gats+tsha shI g+h+raM bi shwa rU baM san d+hA ra ya mo me tsi sarba sing
364a1(rgyud): drA ya prA yan+na hU~M/de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ngas gzigs kyi dbang bas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so//
364a2(rgyud): de nas rab tu bshad bya ba//'gro 'i 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor te//dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni//phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//de yi nang du pad+mo yang //de bzhin du ni
364a3(rgyud): bri bar bya//der ni 'dab ma kun khyab pa'i//sna tshogs gzugs ni bri bar bya//de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du btsung nas/de bzhin du bsgo te 'gro ba
364a4(rgyud): thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes bslab bo//'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i//dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas kyang //phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni//sna tshogs 'chang
364a5(rgyud): dang 'dra bar 'gyur//de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo//sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin du//mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms nas
364a6(rgyud): kyang //dbang po gnyis ni sbyar bar bya//dkyil 'khor da ni de grub bo//de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa//phyag rgya bcing ba rnams bslab par bya'o//ngongos grub rnams
364a7(rgyud): kyang de bzhin no//de bzhin du ras la sogs pa la yang bya'o//dkyil 'khor go cig po'i tshul du phyag rgya la sogs pa yang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro//de nas
364b1(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcag du 'dud nas byang chub snyoms dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la lcogaso zhes bya ba byin pa/rwa bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsung //
364b2(rgyud): theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa//rdo rje zag pa zla med kyi//mdo sde 'di ni legs po shad pa//rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs blo//rdo rje rin chen khyod leg so//rdo rje lus ni
364b3(rgyud): logs//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig las rtog pa'i rgyal blo chen po rdzogaso//
364b4(rgyud): bam po bdun pa//de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i rin po che rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/
364b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nA mkha'i steng po la ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol bya btab pa//na mkha'i snying po sems can don//sems dpa' chen po gzi chen du/
364b6(rgyud): rlon chen che ba'i rin chen mchog/rdo rje rin chen khyong phyag 'tshal//dbang bsgyur rin chen chen pa ni//dag pa che zhing dge brgya//sangs rgya ste rIn rkyen rnam dag ste//rin chen gyi
364b7(rgyud): chen khyed phyag 'tshal//namakha' namakha' las byung ba//namakha'i kun gyi 'ang cha ba//na mkha'i dbyings kyi phyogs kun gyi//ri kun mchog ni khyod byig 'tshal//rin chen
365a1(rgyud): /mdzod spu rin tshon 'byung //sangs rgyas mdzad du rini chen 'byung //sangs rgyas mdzad su dri bzhin gshegs//rin chen thams cad rang kun mchog/rin chen
365a2(rgyud): dgos pa khyod phyag 'tshal//rin che ni rin chen gtso rin drag/de bzhin gshegs pa kun rin chen//rin chen pad+ma na mkha' cha//mkha' ma mya khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
365a3(rgyud): rgyun yin pas ni mdzes pa che//mdzes par snang zhing rab mangs mdzad//don kun dag cing dag pa'i don//sbyin mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//chos rin chen ni rnam pa
365a4(rgyud): mchog/dge 'dun rin chen de bzhin gshegs//dbang bskur chen po 'jig rten don//don sbyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//sbyin pa rab sbyin sbyin pa'i mchog/gtong zhing
365a5(rgyud): gtong mchog sbyin mdzad pa//sems can kun don de nyid do ni//don chen don ni khyod phyug 'tshal//bsam pa'i rgyal po gaN+DI brjid che//smyon pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul
365a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad che//sangs rgyas kun te khyod phyag 'tshal//de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen che//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rgya ste/de bzhin gsheg
365a7(rgyud): pa dpal chen po//band chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi mchog/dbang chen khyab pa chen po ste/'jig rten gtso bo 'jig rten mchog/
365b1(rgyud): 'jig rten nyi mu khyod phyag 'tshal//rin chen phul bas rab kyi mchog/rin chen rgyan te rin chen 'dzin//rin chen snang bas snang ba chen+da//rin+da chen grags pa khyod phyag 'tshal//
365b2(rgyud): rin chen phung po rin chen don//nor bu rdo rje nor bu yi//rin chen 'byung ba sku rab 'o bar//rin chen sku ste khyod phyag 'tshal//tshe nyid shing ste rin tshe ni dbang //ro bo thams cad
365b3(rgyud): skong mdzad pa//bsam pa thams cad legs par mnyes//rin+da chen phung po khyod phyag 'tshal//srid rtsi khyab par bdag nyid kun//mchog par sbyin zhing mchog che ba//phun sum
365b4(rgyud): thams cad 'byor pa'o//rdo rje snying po bdag phyag 'tshal//ming brgya rtswa brgya do zhi ba 'di//su yang rung ba 'chang byed na//sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba//skad cig
365b5(rgyud): tu ni sdig medo 'thob//rin chen khyod la gsol ba ni//nor 'dus po ni bshad par mdzod//sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang gi mchog/nges pa'i rigs ni bskyed par mdzod//
365b6(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' 'di thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dam tshig ces bya ba
365b7(rgyud): rang gi snying po 'di gsungs//oM badz+ra rat+na hUM/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rig pa
366a1(rgyud): /dam pa 'di gsung so//oM sarba ta thA ga ta A sha pa ri pU ra Na ma hA rat+na hU~M/de nas byang chub snyoms dpa' chen po phyug na rdo rjes rlung gi rigs 'byung
366a2(rgyud): ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so//oM badz+rA hUM tA/dI nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so//oM ma NI hUM/
366a3(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so//oM pad+ma hrI/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tsha
366a4(rgyud): kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsu so//oM bi shwa ra rat+na hUM/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa na mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
366a5(rgyud): dbang gi rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//de nas snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje nor bu
366a6(rgyud): rin po che lta bu 'od zer rnams byung nas de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te/sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang
366a7(rgyud): gis dbang bskur nas yang gcig tu gyur te bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po'i thugs kar zhugaso//de nas na mkha'i snying po'i thugs las
366b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kun nas 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje dang nor bu dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyi dbang la sogs pa bkod pa dang /rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku rdo rje'i
366b2(rgyud): nor bu'i rin po che'i phyag rgya'i mtshan ma phyag na bsnams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i sku rnamasu gyur te byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rin po che chen
366b3(rgyud): po'i char 'bab pa lta sogs pa nor bskyod pa rnams kyis se mosna can rnams mgu bar byas nas yang slar b+hinA nus/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs thams
366b4(rgyud): cad du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nis ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//rin tshun
366b5(rgyud): thams cad bsdus pa ni//rdo rje rin chen rigs nyid du//'gro ba'i don du 'di gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs bskyed nas de bzhin
366b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad bsam pa rnams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di phul te don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so//de nas rab tu bshad byag/
366b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste//rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba li//thams cad grub pa zhes bshad pa//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi po//rta babs bzhis ni rgyan pa ste//srad bu bani da
367a1(rgyud): ldan pa la//dar dang phreng ba lnga ldis rgyan//dkyil 'khor chen po grwa rnams dang //sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnamasu//rdo rje rin chen spras par ni//phyi yi dkyil 'khor
367a2(rgyud): srad pus bre//de yi nang du rdo rje ye//rin chen les byung gnas bya zhing //ka ba brgyad kyi tshul du ni//rin chen sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba'i//dkyil 'khor lngar ni rgyan gyur
367a3(rgyud): par//dwere ni srad pu bri bar bya//rang gi phyag rgyas bskor ba yau//der ni sangs rgyas bzhag par bya//de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso//oM bud+d+ha rat+na hUM/oM badz+ra ma
367a4(rgyud): NihUM/oM badz+ra rat+na hUM/a~M ku ru hUM/A~M badz+ra rarAt+na pad+ma hUM/oM badz+ra rat+na baR+Sha hUM/re ba kun grub dkyil 'khor du/rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas kyang //rdo rje snying po dang
367a5(rgyud): gnas shig/rin tshin mchog ni sbyin par bri//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//lta 'og gi rims ji bzhin du//rin chen phyag rgyar ldan pa yi//sems dpa' chen po
367a6(rgyud): rnams bri'o//de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams//oM sarba ar+tha sid+d+ha bA dA hUM/oM badz+ra ma Ni tsa hA A k+Sha sha bAr+d+ha b+hA ga bA ni sr-id d+h+r-i sing+ga d+hA hUM/oM rat+na aM ku sha a
367a7(rgyud): kaR+Sha ya sarba ar+than sa ma ya shI g+h+raM sarba ta thA ga ta satwa ma nu sma ra hUM/oM ti rA ga ba shi ku ru sarba na kle sha gar+b+ha hUM/oM rat+na duSh+Ti hUM/rin chen phreng de'i dkyil 'khor
367b1(rgyud): du//rdo rje shugs kyis nal nus ni//rin chen phreng ba 'dzin pa'i mchog/nges pa'i dbus sku legs par bri//de yi phyog sa rnams thams cad du//lha 'ag gau rims ji bzhon par
367b2(rgyud): nor bu'i mtshan rnams lag thob pa'i//sems dpa' chen po rnams bri'o//de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no//oM rat+na tiSh+Ta tra/oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka rat+na mA le
367b3(rgyud): /hUM/oM rat+na ma Ni sU r+ye hUM/oM tsan+d+ra ma Ni d+hA dza sarbA sha pa ri pU ra A kA sha gar+b+ha hUM/oM ra tAr+tha hA sa hA sa hUM/rin chen pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du//rdo rje shugs kyis rga la
367b4(rgyud): nos ni//rin chen pad+mo 'dzin khyab pa//de dbus gnas par bri bar bya//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//lta 'og go rims ji bzhin par//nor bu mtshan ma 'chang ba yi
367b5(rgyud): snyems dpa'i chen po rnams bri'o//de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso//oM rat+na pad+ma hUM/oM he gA sa mA d+hi dz+nyi nA gar+b+ha hUM/oM rat+na ko Sha gr-i hUM/oM ma chi tsakra pra brta ya hUM/
367b6(rgyud): oM rat+na be shi hUM/rin chen char 'bebs dkyil 'khor du//rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni//rin chen char ni rab 'bebs pa'i//sems dpa' chen po der yang bri//de ye
367b7(rgyud): phyogs rnams thams cad du//mdor ni lag na phyag rgya yang //rin chen mtshan mar ldan pa yi//sems dpa' chen rnams cho ga bzhin//de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams//
368a1(rgyud): au rat+na br-iSh+Ti baR+Sha/ya sArba brta saM b+hA d+hau b+ha ga bAn NI tA to hUM/A ma NaM pU dza sa mA ya hUM/oM mA Nai ban d+ha ka baHhU~M/oM ma Ni doSh+Ta ka R+Sha la ma hA yAk+Sha
368a2(rgyud): ha ra ha ra sarbAr+thA nA ti sha ye hUM/oM ma Ni rat+na ban+d+ha saM ma ya hUM/rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni//gr-i yI phyogasna rnams thams cad du//lta 'o gra gI rims rdza
368a3(rgyud): bzhin parA/rin chen lce skye la sogs bri//de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so//oM rat+na ra ti hU~M/oM rat+na mU la hUM/oM rat+na g+h+ri N+ye hUM/ai rAt+nar+b+ha
368a4(rgyud): t+ye hUM/phyi yi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//rdo rje shugs kyi sna rgal nas ni//phyi yi dkyil 'khor gri rnams//bdug pa'i mchod pa la sogs bri//de la de dag gi snying
368a5(rgyud): po ni 'di rnams so//oM rat+na d+hU pe rat+ne/au puSh+Ti ma Ni/oM rat+na A lo kaM/oM ma Ni gan+d+he/sgo rnams byazhi yi dbus su ni//sgo ba rnams ni bzhag par bya/
368a6(rgyud): de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so//oM sarbe rat+na A kAR+Sha ru N+yA mi hA satwA b+ha ga bAn taM A kaR+Sha dziHoM sarba rat+ne pra be shA ya/sa ma ya pra be shwa ya saMm
368a7(rgyud): ya ma hA ma Ne rA dzaM ku la rat+na pA shA hUM/oM ma Ni ba na~M d+ha hUM ba~M/oM ma Ni r-it+na A bi sha ya e/de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir nor bu rin po che'i slob da
368b1(rgyud): mam thams samasamatham/amamathasamathas thamayam sam nasan yas
368b2(rgyud): nyid ji lta ba bzhin zhugs te cho ga rgyas pa bdag nyid kyis byas la/de nas rin po ches byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa grang ba'i nor bu'i slob ma dbang bskur ste//rdo rje nor du
368b3(rgyud): dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod do//oM bad+d+ha ma NAM sa mA ya baM/de nas kha dog ji lta bu rnyed pa'i gos blo gos phrag pA gcig tu gzir te de dang 'drad/
368b4(rgyud): mig g.yogs la snying po 'di brjod du bcug ste gzhug par bya'o//oM ma Ni rA dza ku lAn/de nas de ltar bcug nas 'di skad du khyod kyis 'di su la yang ma brjod
368b5(rgyud): cig/khyod tshe rabs thams cad du dbul por gyur ta r+ye/sdug bsngal las mi thar bar gyur ta re/sems can dmyal bar yun+de ring por bya nas par gyur ta re zhes
368b6(rgyud): bsgo lnga dam tshig gnyis su bya'o//theg pa chen po mngon par 'dus pa yang brjod par bya'o//de nas babs pa dang gter chen po gang na yod/ji ltar thob par 'gyur
368b7(rgyud): zhes rdo rje'i tshig gis dri bar bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pos thams cad sbyar sprul cig ces smras ma thag
368b8(rgyud): tu gdod g.yogs pa bkrol te de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi dbang gi dam tshig kyang bstan te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la thug gi bar du dkyil
369a1(rgyud): la tshon po bstan par bya'o//de nas ci 'byo bas mchod pa byas nas dgos pa rnams cad bsgrub par gyu'o//de nas ye shes b+h+yo b+hUg+h+ra rgyu ni 'angaman//
369a2(rgyud): rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya che//shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas btsongs//gter ba rkos nas ni gang dag ni//gter yad pa ni de mthong 'gyur//dam tshi gau gis ni mchog
369a3(rgyud): bcings la//gong na gter rnams yod gyur pa//der nI phyag rgya btsir na nI//de tshe bdag nyid 'byung bar 'gyur//rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin du//shin tu mnyam gzhag
369a4(rgyud): bsgoms na ni//gang na gter rnams yod pa yang //yid kyis shes pa nyid du 'gyur//rdo rje'i snying po'i ting 'dzin gyi//las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni//gang du
369a5(rgyud): phyag rgya babs gyur na//de nas gter yod shes par bya//de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so//oM ma hA ma Ni rat+na A dwi sha hUM/oM ma Ni pi Da pa ri sha ya hUM/AM rat+na
369a6(rgyud): so mA d+hi bru hi/oM rat+na A bi sha dar sha ya hUM/phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nu ni//gang du lus ni khor gyur pa//de na rin chen gter yod par//dam tshig nyid kyis
369a7(rgyud): shes par bya//dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang //gang du babs nas gnyis gyur pa//de nas rin che nA chen po yi//gter yod par ni shes par bya//ting 'dzin phyag
369b1(rgyud): rgya bcings nas ni//gang la bzlas pa bdag nyid kyis//rin chen chen po bdag nyid kyis//gter ni gang na yod par smra//las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang //gang tshe lag gnyis
369b2(rgyud): bAn tshun du//babs nas dam tshig bcings gyur pa//de nus gter ni yod par bshad//de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so//oM ma hA rat+na kA ya dang sha ya rat+na/
369b3(rgyud): oM I kA sha ga d+hA ma Ni rat+na/oM s+pho Ta s+pho Ta ya ni d+hi/oM ma Ni rat+na dz+nyA na sA yaM bru tri/oM pu na sa ma ya ban d+ha dar sha ya swAhA//phyag rgya che ne pi bsgoms nas naM//
369b4(rgyud): de bzhin gang du dgas gyur pa//de nas rin chen 'byung ba yi//gter yod ye shes shes par bya//gang du dogs yod der yang ni//dam tshig mchog ni mchog bcangs
369b5(rgyud): la/gang tshe nyid ni grol gyur pa//den gter ni yod par bshad//ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcingaso nas ni//gang du nges par dogs gyur pa//de na nges par gter yod par//
369b6(rgyud): ye shes bskyed de shes par bya//gang na yang dang yang dgos par//las kyi phyag rgya tshwa go bzhin//der bcings de ni gnyis gyur pa//gau ter yod par ni shes par bya//de la de dag
369b7(rgyud): gi snying pa ni 'di rnamaso//oM ni d+hi dz+nyA na A bi sha/oM rat+na na sa ma ya~M muny+dzi ni d+hi ban d+hi/oM d+harma rat+na bru hi ni d+ha ni/oM sarba karma Ni s+pho Ta ya dar sha ya d+hi ba na dA k+Shi pa/
370a1(rgyud): phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas ni//gtor rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang //gang na gnas pa dor ba bsan//da na yod par rnam par bshad//dam tshig
370a2(rgyud): mchog ni bcings nas kyang //gter rnams kun tu btsal nas ni//ga na gnas pa brtag gyur pa//de ni gter ni yod par bshad//ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings
370a3(rgyud): nas ni//gter rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang //gong na yod par rtag tu shes//de na gter ni yod par bshad//las kyi phyag rgya bcing ste nas ni//gter rnams
370a4(rgyud): kun tu brtul nas kyang //gang na yod par+ya las phyag rgya//bskor ba de na yod par bshad//de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so//oM rat+na sa mya ya hr-i da dang
370a5(rgyud): sha yaM/oM rat+na pa rik+Sha dz+nyA na A bi shA/oM ma Ni karma brAh+mA ya/de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgyu'i ye shes bslab par bya'o//dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor la//gter
370a6(rgyud): rnams kun tu tshol byed cing //phyag rgya chen po bsgrims na ni//babs par gyur na gter rnyed do//dam tshig ma tshig ni bcings nas kyang //bud med dang ni rtse byed cing //
370a7(rgyud): gang du phyug rgyud mo gyur tam//de ni gter ni yod par bshad//dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar na//gter rnams kun tu tshol byed cing //ye shes phyag rgya bo skams
370b1(rgyud): nas ni//gter gyi yo shos+t+ra 'jug par 'gyur//dbang po gnyis kyi ting 'dzin gyis//las kyi phyag rgya btsongs nas ni//glang du phyag rgya gnyis gyur pa//de nas gton ni yod par
370b2(rgyud): bshad//de la de dag gi snying pa ni 'di rnams so//oM mahA ma Ni sa~M yo g+hA bi shaM/oM sa ma ya so+o yo gI dr-i D+ho me b+hA bdi ni dz+nyAn sa yig/oM sarba kurma si s+pho Ti sa ma
370b3(rgyud): ka/de nas nor bu'i rigs chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes thams cad bslab bo//de nas phyag rgya chen po 'di yin te//zla ba'i dkyila'i khor dbus gnas par//ji lta ba yi ri ma
370b4(rgyud): na//phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na no//don gyi mchog kun 'grub par 'gyur//de nas phyu rgya chen po rnams kyi las ni 'di rnams yin no//sangs rgyas phyag rgyas ngas rgyas nyipa
370b5(rgyud): rdo rje snying pos gnyis rab 'grub//rin chen lcags kyus kun spyan 'dren//nor bu dga' bong rjes dgar byed//nor bu mgu bas dgyes par byed//no prA lA~M bAs+yA nad thob bo//
370b6(rgyud): nar bu phreng bas dbang bskur zhing //nor bu nyi mas gzi brjid ma tshig/yid bzhin nor bus ji dgar sbyin//rin chen bzhad pas nor thob 'gyur//rin tshon chos kyis chos kyang
370b7(rgyud): thob//gtong ba'i dpal gyis dam pa rnyed//rin chen ral gris mtshon chen po//rin tshon 'khor los dbang por 'gyur//smra bas btsal ba'i dngos grub 'thob//rin chan char gyi nor
371a1(rgyud): chen po//nor bu'i mchod pas rab mchod nyid//rin+da chen chos kyis brtan par byed//rin tshon mtsho bos nor thob bo//khu tshur nor bus dngos grub 'thob//
371a2(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no//rdo rje rin chen phyag rgyas ni//sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur 'thog/rdo rje nor ba
371a3(rgyud): chetshe bcings nas//rdo rje rin chen grub par 'gyur//rdo rje gnyis las nor bur byas//rdo rje 'dzin las nar 'thob bo//de nyid mthe bong rdo rje yis//nor bu sbyar te snying
371a4(rgyud): khar bzhag/mdzub gnyis pad+ma'i nor bur bcings//'jig rten dbang gis nor byin 'gyur//rdo rje las nor sna tshogs kyis//nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan sbyin/
371a5(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings mdzub ner bu yis//sangs rgyas rin chen nyid 'thab gi/mdzub mo mnyam te phyir bkug la//mthe bo rdo rjer bcings pa yi//rdo rje snying po'i phyag las byung //
371a6(rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje'i nor bur gsungs//'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang //rdo rje'i nor bu chen po 'thob//mdzub gnyis rin che ni 'drar bcings la//gung mo myu gur sgreng ba ste/
371a7(rgyud): 'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang //rang gi dbang bskur thob par 'gyur//de nas gung mo srin lag dang //mthe'u chung rnams ni pad+mor bya//'dis ni kun tu sbyin ras gzigs
371b1(rgyud): mtshon 'dzin pas ni nor sbyin 'gyur//mdzub mo mthe bo mtho'u chung rnams//rdo rje rin tshun tshul du bya//gung mo gnyis kyi sen mo sbyar//sbyin lag myu gu 'dra bar sbed//
371b2(rgyud): bsdam pa dam byas la//mdzub gnyis nor bur byas nas kyang //mtheb gnyis brkyang ba'i ngos snying khA/de ni kun grub pa sbyin par byed//rdo rje bsdam po bsdams nas kyang //gung
371b3(rgyud): mo gnyis ni nor bur bya//nor bu mtshan gyi phyag rgya 'di//nor bu chen po rab sbyin no//de nyid las ni mdzub mo gnyis//lcags kyu'i tshul du byas pa ni//don kun 'gug
371b4(rgyud): paba'i phyag rgyu ste//nor bu rin tshun lcags kyur bshad//de nyid las ni bsgyur nas kyang //mdzub mos mdzub mo gzung nas ni//mda' 'phangs pa yi tshul byas la//drangs
371b5(rgyud): nas 'gro ba dga' bar byed//de nyid las ni mdzub mtheb gnyis//skyur ba 'i legs zhes bya'o//de nas mthib gnyis sbyar ba yis//mdzub gnyis rtse mo sbyar ba dang //mthe ba
371b6(rgyud): kAnyis ni dbus sbyar lo//mdzub gnyis ngas dang sbyar ba ni//nar bu lte bar bshad pa ste//lta ba'i don rnams 'phrag byebying pa'o//don kun grub pa'i phreng ba ni//rang gi dbang ni rab
371b7(rgyud): sbyin 'gyur//de nyid snying khar mthe bo gnyis//spring ste ngas kyi sbyar ba ni//nar bu nyi ma'i snying khar bzhag/gzi brjid chen por rab sbyin 'gyur//srin lag mnyams te/
372a1(rgyud): smyung nas no//phyi ste smyo bor bzhag par bya//rdo rje nor bu chen po gtso//rU ba thams cad rdzogs pa'o//de nyid las ni 'gying byed cing //kha 'gram dgod par bskor
372a2(rgyud): ba ste/rin chen cher dgod zhes bya go/bzhad pas don rnams thams cad 'grub//ting 'dzin du sor mi skyom//nor bu pad+ma nor 'chang ba'i//de nas mtha' nas grol ba ni//
372a3(rgyud): sbyin pa chen po rab sbyin byed//mthe bo gnyis ni nang du dgug/mdzub gnyis nor bur byas pa ni//nor bu ral gri yin te mthus//'gro ba rnams kyi nor 'phrog pa'o//rdo
372a4(rgyud): rdo bsdams las 'khor lor bya//mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug nas kyang //mdzub gnyis nor bur 'drar byas pa//'khor los bsgyur ba thob par byed//de nyid thal
372a5(rgyud): mo'i tshul du byas//kha nas 'dron par byas pa ni//de bcings nas ni ngag gis kyang //rang gi bkas ni nor 'phrog 'gyur//rdo rje nor bu che bcings la//rin chen char
372a6(rgyud): ni rab 'bebs te//sor mo thams cad spring ba ni//phyogs bzhi nas ni nor char 'bebs//rdo rje nor bu che bcings la//gar byas gtsug phud dbus bzhag nas//kun la
372a7(rgyud): tshi ga bzhin mchod na//rin chen kun gyis de mchod 'gyur//don kun grub pa'i phyag rgyas ni//mgrin pa'i phyogasu 'khyud par bya//nor bu bcings pa zhes bya ste/
372b1(rgyud): srung ba yi ni cho gar grags//don kun grub pa de nyid las//gnod sprin tshul du khar bzhug pa//nor bu mche ba zhes bya ste//'jigs byed don kun 'phrog pa yi//rdo rje bsdams
372b2(rgyud): pa dam byas la//mdzub bkug mthe bo gnyis kyis ni//legs par mnan te btsir ba ni//nor bu'i khu tshur dngos grubo 'thob//dam tshig rnams kyi mched mchog rnams//
372b3(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul du ni//ji bzhin nor bu ldan pa la//'di ni dam tshig mchog tu btogs//gung mo nor bu'i tshul du bya//de dag nyid la rnam par btags//lcags kyu
372b4(rgyud): gcig sogs tshul gyi ni//las rnams thams cad rab 'grub byed//de nas nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no//tra gra tri hrI/shrI i r-i d+hA
372b5(rgyud): di di gri bi ri Da ya a/rin chen phyag rgya gnyis byas la//las kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po las don tha~Md
372b6(rgyud): grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogaso////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i gzungs
372b7(rgyud): kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyems par zhugs nas rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so//oM badz+ra rat+na b+h+rUM be hUM/de
373a1(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i phyag rgya 'od gsungs so//oM badz+ra a b+hi Sho ka mA le a b+hi ShIny+tsA sa ma ye hUM/
373a2(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rlung gi phyag rgya 'di gsungasau//oM rat+na a b+hi She ka hUM/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
373a3(rgyud): chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungaso//oM d+harma a b+hi She kau hUM/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di
373a4(rgyud): gsungs so//oM sarba ta thA gau ta oM b+hi She ka pU dza sa ma ye hUM/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa na mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi
373a5(rgyud): dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so//de nas rab tu bshad bya ba//phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste//rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la//rin chen gsang
373a6(rgyud): ba zhes bshad do//dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni//dkyil 'khor thams cad spyad pus bres//de yi dbus su tshul bzhin du//sangs rgyas phyag rgya bri ba ste//khri la gan+da
373a7(rgyud): pa'i nor bu'i gtso//rdo rje dbyings kyi mdun du ni//nor bu'i phreng ba pad+mo'i nor//nor bus bskor ba'i nor bu'i rnams//de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so//oM tra/
373b1(rgyud): oM ma Ne sA ma ye hU~M/oM ma ni rat+na a b+hi Sho kA mU lo hUM/oM mA Nai rat+na pad+ma hU~M/oM ma Ni rat+na br-i ti sa mya yo hU~M/thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du//rdo rje shugs kyis
373b2(rgyud): rgyargal nas ni//rdo rje rin chen dbus su ni//rdo rje nor bu chen po bri//de yi phyogs ni thams cad dri//lhag 'og go rims ji bzhin par//rang gi phyag rgya nor bu ldan//rin chen
373b3(rgyud): slob dpon nyid kyis bri//de la dri dag gi phyag rgyu ni 'di rnams ste//oM sirba ar+d+ha sid+d+he pra b+h+re ma ny+dzu br-idz+rI rad+d+ha sa ma ye maNi sArba ir+thAn me s+yAr+d+ham d+hi /oM mA Ni rit+na A kAR+Sha
373b4(rgyud): la swA hA/oM ma Ni rit+na swa ma ye aM ku sha ma Ni ku la dza/oM ma Ni rA ga sa ma ye hUM/oM ma Ni sA d+hu hUM/de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis par yang //rdo rje shugs kyis
373b5(rgyud): rgal nas ni//spyan gnyis dang ni ldan pa yin//nor bu de yi dbus su bri//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin bar//nor bu'i mtshan mar ldan
373b6(rgyud): pa yi//rang gi phyag rgya rnams bri'o//de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di dag go/oM ma Ni rat+na nAM tra A na ya ba shaM ku ru sar+b+ba ar+tha saM bA dA nA shI g+haM tiSh+Ti AM ku shi hUM/oM me Ni/
373b7(rgyud): rat+na rat+na mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/oM ma Ni rat+na sur+ya dz+wA la ya sarba ma hA rA dzi ni hUM/oM mi Ni tsin+da d+he dzA gri hUM/oM ma Ni hA sa hA sa hU~M/rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni/
374a1(rgyud): nor bu pad+mo bri bar bya//dwe yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//lcug 'og go rims ji b+hazhin bya//de la de dag hUM smyung ba 'di rnams//oM ma NI sa mA d+h+ya pad+ma na
374a2(rgyud): hUM/oM ma Ni rat+na d+ya gra sa ma ye hUM/oM ma Ni sa ma ya ko She hUM/oM ma Ni sa ma ya tsakra hUM/oM ma Ni pA sha gai n+d+he/dkyil 'khor bzhi pa dam pa rA ni//dzi N+Do shugs
374a3(rgyud): kyis rgal nas kyang //rdo rje rin chen ldan pa yi//rin chen char 'bebs der gnas shing //las kyi phyag rgya dza bzhin pas//yongs su bskor bar bri bar bya'o//nor
374a4(rgyud): bu'i mtshan mar ldan pa rnams//lta 'gi go rims ji bzhin bya//de nas de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'dre rnams//oM rat+na br-iSh+Ti sA d+hA ya ma hA ma NI hUM/oM mahA pU dza sa ma ye nai tra
374a5(rgyud): A/oM ma hA pU dzA sa ma na sa ma ye rak+Sha/oM badz+ra ma Ni rat+na dwiSh+Ta ka rA le ha ra ha ra hU~M/oM ma NI sa ma ya muSh+Ti hU~M/di nas nor bu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir las
374a6(rgyud): rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas rang gi slob ma rnams btsung ngo 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o//khyod kyis tshul 'di su la yang ma smra zhig/khyod rab tu dbul ba dang dus
374a7(rgyud): byas nas sems can dmyal bar lhung nga re zhes bsgo la rang gi nor bu'i dam tshig gi ye shes bskyed par bya'o//rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis//mkha' la rdo rje rin
374b1(rgyud): tshon bri//de dag nyid kyi ni dpral bar yang //gzhag na rgyal por nges par 'gyur//rin chen rdo rje btsongs nas ni//rdo rje rin chen mkha' la br-i//rang gi gnas su bzhag na na//
374b2(rgyud): denges par rgyal po nyid du 'gyur//rdo rje rin chenA ting 'dzin gyis//rdo rje rin chen mkha' la bri//ye shes rdo rje de bzhag na//nyid kyis grub pa'i rgyal por 'gyur//las kyi phyag

374b4(rgyud): a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/sa ma ya rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/d+harma rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsA maM/karma rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mau/phyag rgya tshan po'i snying khar ni//rdo rje rin chenA bsgom pa re bya//
374b5(rgyud): bsgoms nas mngon par dbang du bskur//mchog tu rmid du 'byung ba 'thob//mnyim par gzhag pas rdo rje yi//rin chen dpral bar bsgoms nas ni//rin chen rdo rje bcings
374b6(rgyud): gyur na//thams cad kyi ni rgyal por 'gyur//rdo rje ron chen ting 'dzin gyis//lce la rdo rje rin chen sgom//chos kyi rgyal po nyid du ni//dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur//rab
374b7(rgyud): monyasra bzhag pas rdo rje yi//rin chen gtsug gtor bsgoms nas kyang //las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni//las legs byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur//de la de dag gi snying po
375a1(rgyud): ni 'dri rnams so//oM badz+ra rAt+na hri dA yA ad+b+hiSh+Tato//oM bad+d+ha rat+na a b+h+r-i Sha ka drA/ai rat+na A b+h+r-i ShIny+tsa baM/oM badz+dza rAt+na uSh+NI Sha a dz+nyiSh+Ta na sa man
375a2(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po bdag nyid kyis//bsgoms ni rdo rje rin chen yang //ras la sogs pas bris nas ni//rgyal po chen po de 'gyur ro//rdo rje rin chen bla na med//ras la sogs
375a3(rgyud): po bre nas kyang //sems dpa' rdo rje bsgoms na ni//dam tshig rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur//rin chen rdo rje bdag nyid kyis//ras la sogs la bris nas kyang //bsam gtan
375a4(rgyud): phyag rgya bsgoms na ni//nges par chos kyi bdag por 'gyur//ras la sogs pa rdo rje yi//rin chen bris nas las rnams kyi//phyag rgya bsgoms par gyur na ni//bdag
375a5(rgyud): nyid las kyi bdag por 'gyur//de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so//badz+ra rat+na bin d+ha a d+hi tiSh+ThaHoM badz+ra rat+na bim pa oM b+hi She ko/ba~Mdz+ra rat+na bi ma bi ku ru gser ram
375a6(rgyud): yang na dngul yang rung //rdo rje rin chen bcings gyur ta ma//yang ni rin chen gzhan yang rung //snying khar bsgoms nas dbang bskur 'gyur//rdo rje rin che ni bla na med//gser ram
375a7(rgyud): rin chen gzhan las byas//rtag tu dpral bar bzhag na ni//nor che ba yi rgyal por 'gyur//gser ram rin chen gzhan dag 'o//rdo rje rin chen bsgoms nas kyang //
375b1(rgyud): rang gi khar yang bcug na ni//tshig la dbang bar de 'gyur ro//gser ram rin chen gzhan dag gi/rdo rje rin tshon bsgoms na ni//gtsug tor du ni yang bsgoms na//las rnams kun//
375b2(rgyud): gyi bdag por 'gyur//de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so//oM badz+ra rat+na hr-i dA ya U ba ra Na hUM/oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi She ka ma hA ar+tha pA da/oM badz+ra rat+na pa tsa pA de/oM badz+ri
375b3(rgyud): rat+na maN+Da karma pA da/de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsing ba'i ye shes bslab bo//phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas nr-i//rdo rje nor bu che bcings la//nor bu bud
375b4(rgyud): med bu gor btsug/de ltar dngos grub thob par 'gyur//dam tshig mchog gi nor bu ni//bud med bu gar btsug nas kyang //dam tshig mchog bcings thams cad kyi//
375b5(rgyud): /dbang bskur ba yi dngos grub 'gyur//rdo rje nor bu che bcings la//chos kyi phyag rgya bsgoms nor bu//de ni bud med bu gang bcug/bla med pa yi dngos grub 'gyur//las
375b6(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya nor bu bcings//bud med bu gaR+Sha lus phyag rgya//bcings par 'gyur na las kun gyi//dngos grub bla na med par 'gyur//de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso///
375b7(rgyud): oM ma hA sid d+hi/oM sa ma ya a d+hi She ka sid+d+hi/oM d+harmA sid+hi/oM karma sid+d+hi/de nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i phyag rgya chen po bcings bshad de//rin chen rdo rje myu gur bciste/
376a1(rgyud): bung mo srin lag mthe'u chung rnams//sor mo brkyang ba byas nas ni//spyi bor bzhag pa grub mchog 'thob//rdo rje bsdam par byas nas kyang //mdzub mo gnyis
376a2(rgyud): mdud mtheb gnyis dang //srin lag rdo rje bsgyur nas ni//mdzod sbrang ba zhig pa da thab blo/rdorjerin chen tshul byas la//mdzub gnyis ngos dang mtheb des spyad//da tid
376a3(rgyud): bsgri nas de dbyung 'thob//de nyid mthib genyis mjug gnyis na//chos kyi rdo rje tshul du ni//bcings nas dngul ba ban/ ni//chos chun gyi ni dbang bsgyur 'gyur
376a4(rgyud): los myi rdo rje bcings nas kyang //dbang rnams kun gyi phreng ba ste//bsgyur nas dpral ba nyid du yang //bzhag na dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur//rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ni//
376a5(rgyud): rdorje dbyings skyes dam tshig kyang //bcings nas rin chen dpral bar ni//bzhag ni dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur//mtheb gnyis phan tshun bsnol nas ni//mdzub gnyis kyi
376a6(rgyud): mo me //nor nu 'dra bar bklag pa ni//rdo rje nord rgyu chen po'i thog//rdo rje bsnum pa byas nas klung //rdo rje khu chur gung ma gnyis//ner bu 'dra bar byas nas ni/no ba byung
376a7(rgyud): ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur//rdo rje bsdam pa byas nas ni//gung mo nor bu 'drer byas la//mdzub mo srin lage gnyis pad+mo//kha bye 'dra bar byas pas 'grub//gung mo gnyis ni no//
376b1(rgyud): bur bcings//sor mo thams cad sgreng ba rnams//nor bu nyid du bsgoms nA ni//'khor rnams mchod dang ldan par 'gyur//gung mo mthe bo rdo rje yis//rin chen tshul du byas nas
376b2(rgyud): kyang //srin lag mthe'u chung mnyams pa yaM//khar bzhag lci ste nor bu sbyin//de la mdzub gnyis rdo rjer bya//de ltar de gnyis lcags kyur bye//mdzub mos mdzub mo drang ba dang /
376b3(rgyud): de nyid dga' bar rab sbyin pa'o//gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bcing //mdzub gnyis ngos la dgug pa ste//srin lag ngos gnyis 'dud pa la//mthe bo gnyis kyis bkab pa ste//
376b4(rgyud): de nyid rdo rje nyi mar bskor//dpung pa'i spyi bor brkyang bar bya//nor bu'i rgyal mtshan spyi bo'i rgyal//bzhad pa'i tshul du byas pa'o//rdo rje bsdam pa byas na ni//mdzub mo srin lag
376b5(rgyud): gyen du sgreng //de dag pad+mo 'dra bar bya//gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya//de las mtha' mar rab sbyin bya//rdo rje ral gri sbyar ba dang //rdo rje 'khor lo tshul du bya//de nyid kha nas dbya
376b6(rgyud): bar bya//mdzub granyis rin chen myo gur bya//sor mo thams cad bairkyang ba dang //de dag spyi bor bzhog pa ni//rin cheni tshar gyis char 'bebs so//de nyid go tshe'i tshul du ni//snying
376b7(rgyud): khar rin chen gnyis byas pa//mdzub gnyis nor bu 'dzin mche ba//dbus su mnyams pa khu tshur ro//de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo//phyag rgya chen po de
377a1(rgyud): dag nyid//snyom pa sbyar ba btsongs na no//mdor na gsang ba gas ba yi//dngos grub bzhir 'gyur sbyin par byed//ji ltar rdo rje'i gsung ba'i sbyin//dus
377a2(rgyud): rnams kun tu bcings mi bya//de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i mdo bshad par bya'o// gr-i/s+yAd+ha grASh+TahaM/bi d+h+r-i/kr-i b+h+r-i/kA rai /me gas
377a3(rgyud): bi gsang ba'i khu tshur mchog/gnyis su byas nas lus kun byed//de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi lus kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las rin po che phyag rgya
377a4(rgyud): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba mkhyen
377a5(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nus rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso//oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She kra
377a6(rgyud): dz+nyA no ta ta ma hUM/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rlig pa dram pa 'di gsungs so//oM badz+ra dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka sa ma yA hUM/de nas byang chub se daMl
377a7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam po 'di gsungs so//oM ma Ni rat+na a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hUM//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po rdo rje spyan
377b1(rgyud): sa /rog pa dam pa'ang gsungs so//a d+harmA aSh+TASh+Ta t+ka d+hAnA d+hu/do nas byung chub sems dpa snyoms dbyu rgyun R+tha r+d+ha rgyogs sa rang gi rnyog pa rol pa da gus
377b2(rgyud): so//oM sarba a b+hi She kAd+hAn hU~M/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di ga sung //de ni //
377b3(rgyud): rab tu bshad bya ba//ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la//rin chen ye shes zhes bshad de//dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni//dkyil 'khor tha~Md srid
377b4(rgyud): byas //chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni//snying kha'i mtshon+do ma bri bar bya//de nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i ye shes kyi snying po 'di rnams gsungs so//oM dz+nyA na sarba sid+d+ha
377b5(rgyud): hU~M/AM ma Ni dz+nyA na hUM/oM ma Ni dz+nyA na ai ku shaM dzaHoM mA Ni dzA nI rA go/oM mA Ni dz+nyA nA duSh+Te/oM ma Ni dz+nyA nA duSh+TaM maN+Di hUM/au dz+nyA nA a b+hi She k+Sha/oM mA Ni dz+nyA na sUR+YA
377b6(rgyud): oMm+ba NI d+hA nA d+hI dzaM/aT+TA n+yA hU sI/mANI dz+nyA na pAd+mA hUM/oM ma r+t+ti t+yaig/oMm+ba NaM dz+nyA nAM kiSh+TaM/oM dz+nyA na mats+tshits+tshekr-i/au dz+nyA na ma Ni b+hU ShaM/au dz+nyA na ma Ni rat+ne baR+She
377b7(rgyud): oM maNo dz+nyA ni nr-i t+yai pU dzas me yaMts+tsha/ ni k+Sha/oM ma~M Ni dz+nyAn mats+tsha/de nas yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas slob ma'o//
378a1(rgyud): 'di skud bsgo bar bya'o//khyod kyis chos ma mthong ba su la yang ma brjod cig/khyod dngos grub ma thob par myur bar shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo la nor bu'i/
378a2(rgyud): rigs kyi chos kyi ye shes bskyed par bya'o//ting 'dzin gyi sa ras sogs la//rdo rje snying po bris nAs nI//bsgoms nas rin chen don 'byin ces//smra zhing gsol ba gang
378a3(rgyud): par bya//ting 'dzin gyis raso sogs la//rdo rje snying po byis nas ni//bsgoms nas rin chen byin cig ces//tshig tu smra zhing gsol ba gdab//rdo rje snying po ras sogs
378a4(rgyud): la//bris te mnyam par bzhag nas kyang //rnam par bsgrims te ye shes la//dam chos sbyin zhes gsol ba gdab//rdo rje snying po rus sogs lta//mnyam par gzhag
378a5(rgyud): pas bris nas kyang //bsgoms nas dam pa'i las byin zhes//las lagasol ba gdab par bya//de nas de dag gi sgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di rnams//oM dI ti sarba ar+tha
378a6(rgyud): ga d+hI badz+ra gar+b+ha/A~M de hi sar+b+ba rAt+na b+hu gu b+h+rU~M badz+ra gar+b+ha/oM de hi sA d+ha d+harma na b+ha ga bAM badz+rA gar+b+he satwA/oM de hi sA d+h+r-i karma b+hA gaM bAM badz+ra gar+b+ha/na mkha'i phyogs sarma
378a7(rgyud): phyogs gzhan du//na mkha'i snying po legs sems pa//mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas su//phun sum tshogs don gsal bar bya//ni mkha'i snying po logs sems pa
378b1(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms nus kyang //nor zhesags pa ni gsam bar bya//na mkha phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du//na mkha'i skyong po logs sems pa'o//mnyam par gzhag
378b2(rgyud): pas bsgoms nas byung //pranas mtshogs ni gsol ba gdag//nAmakha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du//nAm kha'i snying po legs sems pa//mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms
378b3(rgyud): nus kyang //las sogs pa ni gsol ba grang ba//de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams//oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha de ti sarba Ar+tha na/oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha de hI sarba rat+na/oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha de hi sArba d+hA ma/
378b4(rgyud): oMd+g+han g+hA d+hA de ta sarba kar+m+ma m+b+hi/rdo rje snying po bris nus kyang //snying khar yongs su sgra mi byas la//gdug chen skyed 'dir ba//de tshe grub pa swA nor sbyar ro//rdo rje snying po dpral
378b5(rgyud): bar ni//bris te rnam par bsgoms nas kyang //gang tshe mgo bro 'dur gyur pa//des ni mngon par dbang thob pa//rdo rje snying po khar bcug la//de nyid du ni bsgoms nas kyang //
378b6(rgyud): gang ched ni byed gyur pa//de rgya ngas ni dag 'bru go//rdo rje snying po 'dzig smran //rab tu bzhug ste bsgoms nus kyang //gang che ni 'bar gyur gyi//de tshad ni 'phreng du ltung ba
378b7(rgyud): 'gyur//de la don gi stong pa ni 'di nas oMSh+NI gr-ir+b+he Ad+d+heShi ny+tsam/oM h+la ga ger+dz+dza bad+d+hi/sa~M ra h+ne gar+b+heSh+NI Sha oM
379a1(rgyud): shUg+h+raD+D+h+ya/rdo rje snying po phyag rgyato//rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms na no//bdag la grub stsol zhes gsol la//I li rat+na zhes brjod 'grub//na mkha'
379a2(rgyud): snying po'i dam tshig ni//rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings nas kyang //dbang bskur ba ni gsol btab la//mi lI ra t+na zhes brjod 'thob//rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin du//
379a3(rgyud): rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms nas ni//chos bdag stsol zhes gsol btab la//tse li rat+na zhes brjod 'thob//na mkha'i snying po las kyi mchog/rab mAnya me gzhag
379a4(rgyud): byas bcings nas ni//rin chen thams cad gsol btab la//ki li rat+na zhes brjod 'thob//de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso//uM I li/oM mI li/oM tsi li
379a5(rgyud): oM ki li/de nas nor bu ye shes gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo//na mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du//rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni//dbang po gnyis ni
379a6(rgyud): mnyam spyad na//dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur//gzhi la ri mo bris pa bzhin//rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni//dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la//dbang bsgyur ba
379a7(rgyud): yang thob par 'gyur//rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni//dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la//sdug pa de dang gir brtsas pa//'jig rten kun gyis de dgar byed//na mkha' kun
379b1(rgyud): rlos/ nadunan sun//ba gag rlos nas gyu //nam cad zlapa pa sa pa da// ga kun na du namak+Sha/AsmA sh+thaH/
379b2(rgyud): Sh+T+r-I / nr-i tIts+tshi nA kr-itrU~MHd+g+ha )/d+hA /b+h+yan+da su r+m+mA shrI b+h+ri Sh+T+rIR+R-ihUM/ su
379b3(rgyud): bzhid cing ba //de sa thAb kyang da don sa che sa g+h+nAM dam tshig gi ga d+hA'i ye shes pa smra beg/ rdo rje y-i ga kyil
379b4(rgyud): du zh-i pa // rnaMs k+Sh+ma m+b+hag+h+ra n+d+he nid na sa/b+hU m+b+ha rAt+te/d+hU kun A nas ma na mas kyi phyug rgya ni gnas ci bzhin par nag par
379b5(rgyud): de ba zhi ni gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshi ga rgyas pa rtogs///de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de
379b6(rgyud): bani de ga shegs pa thams cad kyi dang bsgyur ba'i las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes byu ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa blugs nas dang gi rig pa'i
379b7(rgyud): te sa rgya slong byang chu sems pa'i la kyig da sa pa sa na pa sa pa'i ga su /
380a1(rgyud): oM badz+ra hUM kA ra a b+hi Sho ka/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam+b+ha pa 'od gsungs so//oM sarba tA thA ga ta
