380a3(rgyud): byubyang chub sems dpa' sems dngo' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyisku rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so//oM bi sh+yA A b+hi Sheka/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems da'
380a4(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa na mkha' snying pos rang gi rig kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so//de nas rab tu bshad bya ba//las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste//rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la/
380a5(rgyud): rin chen dgos pa zhes bshad do//dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni//dkyil 'khor thams cad srid pus bre//de yi dbus su tshul bzhin du//sangs rgyas sku gzugs
380a6(rgyud): bzhag par bya//sems dpa'i chen po tshul gyis ni//rin chen mchod pa rnams bri'o//de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams//oM ma NI rat+na pu dzA gA/oM sarba ar+g+ha saud+d+hi
380a7(rgyud): badz+ra rat+na a b+hi She kan+d+haM/oM ma Ni rit+na hU~M/oM ma Ni rat+na A kiR+Sha karma sa mi ya hU~M/oM ma Ni rat+ne rA ga ri ti kArma pU dzi pre bat+te/oM ma Ni rat+ne sa d+h+r-i kar pU dza sa ma ma hU~M/
380b1(rgyud): mamamam thams sam mas ma tham/amamanathasanam ThaTha sa na.aHtham thamamams am mtshan/ma Tham man ma.a tham yasaHma tha
380b2(rgyud): a ma hA ma Ni r+yAt+na tiSh+Ta ka ra ShaM/oM ma Ni rat+na mA la pU dzA//oM ma NAM rat+na sUr+ya lo ka pU dzI/oM ma Ni r+yAt+na d+hA dza pad+ma pU dza/oM maN+Di rat+na an+man+tha hU sa pU dzA/oM pad+ma ma Ni s+ya mA d+hi
380b3(rgyud): rArat+na karmi Ni hUM/oM mr-i NaM rat+naM kA ba tsi rak+Sha mAM/oM ma Ni rat+na daMSh+T+wA khA daM khA da hUM/oM ma Ni karma mriSh+Ti hUM/oM ma Ni rat+na lA s+ye pU dzI ye ho//oM ma No Alpe a b+hi
380b4(rgyud): She ki pU dzA ya/oM ma Ni rat+na gI t+ye pU dzA ya/oM ma Ni rat+na nr-i t+ye pU dzA yA/oM ma Ni rat+na d+hU pa pU dzA ya/oM ma Ni rat+na puSh+pe pU dzI ya//i ma Ni rat+na A lo ki pU dzA
380b5(rgyud): ya/oM ma Ni rat+na gan+d+he pU dzA yi/oM mA Ni rat+na aM ku sha A kaR+Sha ya dza/oM ma Ni rat+na pA she hUM/oM ma Ni rat+na s+pho Ti baM/AM ma Ni rat+na A be sha i/de nas las kyi
380b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'diracho ga ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par byas bcug ste 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o//'di khyod kyis su la yang ma smra shig/khyod las kyi sgrib pas non nas shi
380b7(rgyud): bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo la/las kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o//rdo rje snying po phyag rgya che//rab mnyam gzhag pa bsgoms nas kyang //mchod pa kun gyis mchod na ni//sangs
381a1(rgyud): rgyus thams cad dbang du 'gyur//ting 'dzin gyi dam tshig mchog/phyag rgya gang yang rung bcings la//sangs rgyas thams cad mchod na ni//dbang bskur ba/
381a2(rgyud): nI des 'thub bo//rdo rje snying po nyid 'dzin to//rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms nas no//sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod na//'gro ba'i dam pa 'dul bar 'gyur
381a3(rgyud): snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis//lus kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni//sangs rgyas thams cad mchod gyur nA//skad cig tu ni don kun 'thob//de la de dag gi snying po ni 'dadi rnams//
381a4(rgyud): oM rat+na pU dzA ba shi ku ru//oM rat+na pU dza sa ma yA A b+hi Shiny+tsa/oM rat+na pU dzA ya d+harmA nA shA ya bA di/oM rat+na pU dza karma sarba ar+tha maM sA d+ha/de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i
381a5(rgyud): ye shes ni 'di yin te/rdo rje snying po 'i ting 'dzin gyis//dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar nas//sangs rgyas thams cad mchod na ni//'jig rten thaMd des mgur 'gyur//
381a6(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyis dngos grub dam pa 'grub par 'gyur ro//de nas dam cig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o//rdo rje rin chen bcings nas ni
381a7(rgyud): gnas rnams kun tu bzhag par bya//rdo rje dgos pa'i tshul du ni//ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin bya/de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/t+ya dzA ga
381b1(rgyud): dur+d+ha dz+nyA sarba rak+Sha g+narmA kla kr-i te/dzA rje rin chen gnyis byas la//las kyi phyag rgya bo sgrub bo//de bzhin bshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam chog gi brtag pa'i rgyal po
381b2(rgyud): chen po lus las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogasaso////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che'i phyag rgya zhes
381b3(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin+da la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so//oM badz+ra rit+na tAM/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyog na rdo rjes
381b4(rgyud): rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungaso//oM badz+ra mA le/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungaso//oM ma Ni rat+ne/de nas byang
381b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungaso//oM badz+ra d+harma rat+ne/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs
381b6(rgyud): kyi rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungaso//oM bi shrI dr-iSh+Ti/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkho'i snying pos rang gi nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgyu bzhi
381b7(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dri gsungs//de nas rab tu bshad bya ba//phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste//phyag rgya bzhi pa'i tshul du ni//dkyil 'khor yongs su brtag par bya/
382a1(rgyud): de nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug nas bslab par bya ste/khyod kyis su la yang ma sgra shig ces bsgo bar bya'o//de nas ye shes bskyed par bya ste//rdo rje rin chen te
382a2(rgyud): 'dzin gyis//rdo rje rin chen bcings nas ni//dpral bur rab tu bzhag na ni//dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur//de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no//oM badz+ra rAdzI pa
382a3(rgyud): sho ka/sarba sid+d+hiM pra yats+tsha ts+tsha tra/de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya bslab par bya s+t+waM/khyod 'am phyung na sdug pa 'am//bud med dang ni skyes pa'ang rung //dpral ba gnyis ni sbrad
382a4(rgyud): nas kyang //gtugs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur//de la ngo sgrub pa'i snying pa ni 'di yin te/oM badz+ra rat+na sa khi bid+yA d+hA ra dwe pre ya r+b+hu shI g+h+raM a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya hi hA ha ha t+tA
382a5(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du bcing ba dang rnam pa bzhi de bzhin du bslab bo//dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin no//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
382a6(rgyud): chen pa nA mkha'i snying pas don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so//oM badz+ra maNi d+ha ra sarba At+ma sid+d+him+me pre gats+tshe ta//b+ha ga bAn bad+d+ha rat+na hUM/
382a7(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor 'di yin te/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba//dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste//dngos grub kyi ni dkyil 'khor no//ji bzhin par ni bri bar bye/
382b1(rgyud): de nas 'dir ye shes gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o//gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod pa rnams//chags par gyur pa'i bde ba ni//sangs rgyas la yang phul gyur/
382b2(rgyud): ni//las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur//de nas phyag rgya bzhi ye shes bslab par bya'o//ras la sogs pa la yang sems dper rngam phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dris te bskur
382b3(rgyud): par bya'o//de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa 'dis bstod do//legaso
382b4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' khyod//rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so//rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste//rdo rje las ni khyod legs so//rdo rje theg pa bla na meng //de bzhin gshegs pa
382b5(rgyud): kun gyi gsang //theg pa chen po mngon 'dus bya//mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las de bzhin gshegs
382b6(rgyud): po thams cad kyi las mye dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so///bam po brgyud pa//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
382b7(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi de kho na nyid kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so//de la re shog dang por ni phyag rgya
383a1(rgyud): rnon po dam pa dngos sgyub rgyud ba shad de//do gtanags phyug rgyan//gnongs nas mang rnas pam sa da du/
383a2(rgyud): rgyus sgyu ga zugs kyi dus m+b+ha/ smrad hU~M drug nas / na bu da m+mA g+sa // su
383a3(rgyud): de sdinakyi skyes 'du sa bzhin/drug rgya chen po brjings nas kyang /dem+b+hi chen g+hur ra //brjod nas kun
383a4(rgyud): dang ldan pa 'di/rnams da bdag ni sbyin rnamasan/skyed na 'dig nyi //dbyug rten pa 'o//
383a5(rgyud): 'gre//me 'ad dus sgrub gling ma bzhin//de na dumazlog byug rlu ma zlub rgyud ba shad de/de wAr+yA ng+ged+hA 'dzin 'gyu
383a6(rgyud): badz+rade snar bdag ces bsgoms na ni//sangs rgyas dang ni gni rgyun 'thob//mi 'dod dngas grub shing ma bzhin//de nas chos kyi byug rgyu ma
383a7(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis//ngag ces brjod na nges par yang //sangs rgyas dang ni gzo can
383b1(rgyud): 'gyur//mi 'do sa grub gong ma ban//de nas las kyi phyag rgyu dam pa'o das grub kyi rgyud bshad de/thams cad kyi ni kun dag par//las rnams
383b2(rgyud): rnams cad sbyas na ni//stengs rgyas gan rkyen zlaban+de ste/mi 'dzid ngas glu bri gang ma po nA~M//de bezhin gshegs pa'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub rnams so//
383b3(rgyud): d+has b+hAg ni dzA rjes da ga 'dus pa dngas su n+yA m+b+ha rgyu 'di gis saso//das klu glenab+h+rU~Mng+yas su rgyas ky-i/b+hags n+ni sam can
383b4(rgyud): don tu//byug rgya chen por bsgrubs na ni//rgyu 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grug//de nas dam+bu tshig gi phyag rgyu dam pa'i dngos grusgrub kyi rgyud bshad d+he/
383b5(rgyud): phyug rgya chen po'i tshul du ni//ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin grub pa//de bzhin bdan ces bsnams na ni//skyed cog gos ni gzi chen rdzog+sade nas ches kyi
383b6(rgyud): b+h+yo rgyu dam da'i dang ste grub kyi rgyud bshadade//yi ge med pa'i chos rnams la//rab tu spros pa yang min te//chos mchog 'dzin brjod byed cing
383b7(rgyud): baisgoms na gzi can nyid du 'gyu//de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu ba dge pa'am yang na mi dge ba'o//gang
384a1(rgyud): las rnams byus pu nu//rgyu lta ba rnams la phul byas na//skad cig gis ni gzi n+dan 'gyur//do na sa byang chub snyoms dpal
384a2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje pad+mo'i rigs dmo pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so//de la dang por ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/
384a3(rgyud): 'dod chags ngo bo nyid kyis dag/mu stegs can gyi smad gyur la//de la chags pa'i chos 'di ni//theg pa che la 'grub par 'gyur//de nas dam
384a4(rgyud): tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te//ting nge 'dzin brtan pa'i tshul gyis ni//byams pa chen po bsgoms nas kyang //cho ga bzhin ldan
384a5(rgyud): khyab byas nas//skad cig gcig gis gzi can 'thob//de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyad bshad de/'dod chags ngo bo nyid dag
384a6(rgyud): ces//smra bar gyur pa'i tshul 'di ni//'dod chags pha rol phyin rling de//skad cig gis ni gzi tsan 'a thob//de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i
384a7(rgyud): dngos grub kyi brgyud ba shad de/bdag gi lha dang rig pa dang //mnyan pa dang ni dran pa'ang rung //sems can rnams ni thams cad kyi//sdug
384b1(rgyud): bsngal kun b+ha mabar phyin 'gyur//dA nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes nor bu'i rigs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs
384b2(rgyud): so//de la phyag rgya chen po dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di yin /rdo rje snying po ji bzhin du//sangs rgyas kun dbang bdag gyur ces/bsgom par bya
384b3(rgyud): ba rnams bsgoms nas//skad cig gis ni gau zi nAn+ta 'thob//de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyu dam po'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/na mkha'i snying po 'dra
384b4(rgyud): bar ni//sems can kun gyi re ba kun//yongs su rdzogs par byed gyur cig/skad cig gis ni gau zi tsuni 'thob//de nas chos kyi phyag tu dam
384b5(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/bdag nyid las ni phyung nas kyang //nor byin rab tu dga' byed cing //chos byung phyag rgya smra na ni//gze can
384b6(rgyud): tshe 'di nyid la 'thob//de nas lus kyi phyag rgya'i dmi pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/dbul po rnams la phan+da pa'i phyir//nor sgrub pa la
384b7(rgyud): brtson ldan na//gzi can 'gyur ro ci ste yang //mi 'dod dngos gru gang ma bzhin//rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi sangs rgyas
385a1(rgyud): dang /byang chub sems dpa' dam pa rnams kyi dngos grub thob pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen+da da
385a2(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so//de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos
385a3(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud 'di yin te/gang gis 'dod la snyoms zhugs pa//de la 'dod pas sbyong bar byed//sangs rgyas phyag rgya chen po yi//ye shes dam
385a4(rgyud): tshig yin par bshad//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/'dod pa rnams la chags bral min/
385a5(rgyud): dam tshig mdzes pa chen po 'di//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa//rgyal bas kyang ni mda' myi mdzad//de nas rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub
385a6(rgyud): kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/snyems can don du khro min yang //khro bo chen por rab tu ston//rdo rje'i rigs ni chen po yi//dam tshig 'di ni 'da' dka2
385a7(rgyud): de la pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/rang bzhin dag par shes nas kyang //de yi dgos pa de byed de//pad+mo'i rigs ni chen
385b1(rgyud): bo yi//dram chog 'da' bar dka' bya'o//de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no//nyung ngam yang na mang yang rung //ci tsom nus
385b2(rgyud): pa nyid du ni//sbyin pas nyi ma stongs par ni//bya min dam tshig 'di yin no//rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do//de nas byang chub
385b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so//de la
385b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no//sangs rgyas chos zhes grags s+ho zhes//brjid de na chos nyid yi ge ni//sangs rgyas chos
385b5(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya che//ye shes mchog gi tshul yin no//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'o rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no//'dod chags las
385b6(rgyud): ni dag pa'i chos//bde ba thams cad rab sbyin byed//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ni//dngos grub byed pa'i me chog 'di'o//de la rdo rje rigs kyi
385b7(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no//sangs rgyas bka' ni sbyang ba dang //sems can drang bar bya ba'i phyir//de la khro bar ma gyur yang //ma rungs
386a1(rgyud): bdud byas dngos grub 'thob//de la pad+mo rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no//pad+mo chu yis ma chags pa//
386a2(rgyud): bzhin 'dod pas mi chags zhes//smra zhing dgos min byed kyang ni//sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ra//de li nor bu rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub
386a3(rgyud): kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no//sbyin dang mnyam pa'i chos med do//sgrub par byed cing sme ba ni//nor bu'i rigs ni chen po'i chos//mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma
386a4(rgyud): bzhin//rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi tshe ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes
386a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te//
386a6(rgyud): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang //byang chub sems dpa' nyid rnams su//ji bzhin du ni btul nas su//las kyi phyag rgya'i mchog
386a7(rgyud): 'grub sbyin//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no//dus bzhi yi ni tshul dag tu//mchod pa
386b1(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi yis ni//rtag tu ldan pa gang bzhir yang //byas nas las rnams bsgrub par bya//d+mo la rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no//
386b2(rgyud): me rungs sems n+dan gnod bya'i phyir//dgos pa glang dang gang byed de//las kyi rdo rje rigs kyis 'dri//dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin byed//
386b3(rgyud): de la pad+mo rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no//'jigs pas gzir la mi 'jigs sbyin//ji bzhin par ni 'dul de bzhi no//'di//
386b4(rgyud): ni pad+mo rigs kyi las//sangs rgyas dngos grub sbyin pa'o//de la nor bu rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no//sangs rgyas
386b5(rgyud): dbang bskur de bzhin du//lus can+da rnams la sbyin pa dang /rgyar ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i//las kyi don du bsgrubs pa'o//
386b6(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi lus kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag nA rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
386b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi phyag rgya 'i ye shes kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so///de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos
387a1(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no//rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyisasangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes ny-ing dgangs/
387a2(rgyud): ni sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid//gzhan las sangs rgyas 'gyur ba med//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos
387a3(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud yin te//phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nA ni//dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya//'di ni de bzhin gshegs rigs kyi//
387a4(rgyud): dngas klu ma bu 'de la nirdo rje rigs ye shes kyi desu gyu rlung du/b+hi de rgyu chen po ni tshul gyis ni/
387a5(rgyud): dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang //las rnams thams cad bsgrubs na ni//rdo rje dngos grub thob par 'gyuraro//de la 'dra ni pad+ma'i
387a6(rgyud): rigs kyi cho sa nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/chos kyi phyag rgyu'i tshul gyi ni//chos kyi phyag rgya brjod byed cing //rdo rje chos ni
387a7(rgyud): chos rnams kyi//tshes nyid du ni 'dis pa sgrubs pa'o///de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos nyid ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do//
387b1(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyi sana?//lus kyi rdo rje snying khar bzhag/chos nyid 'di dag bsgoms na no//las kyi chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur//rigs
387b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi cho gra rgyas pa'i rgyud do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshezlas pa thams
387b3(rgyud): cad kyi ye shes rigs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin te/
387b4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas//zla ba'i rdo rje tshul gyis ni//ji ltar de gnyis kha dog shes//de ltar 'jig rten kun shes te//dag la dag
387b5(rgyud): dang dkar 'od gsal//chags la dImar dang dmar ser khro//shes nas khe dog ji bzhin pa'i//de yi bdag nyid nyid du 'gyur//de la 'di ni de
387b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas pa'i//phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni//rang gi lus la
387b7(rgyud): ji ltar shes//de ltar 'gro ba'i yid shes so//de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs
388a1(rgyud): gzhan du//khros par gyur nas dkyil 'khor ni//de lta bur yang mthong 'gyur ba//de lta bur ni yid shes so//de la
388a2(rgyud): ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/nam mkha' 'am ste phyogs phra mo 'am//yi ge phreng ba mtho ba 'gyur na//mdor na kha dang
388a3(rgyud): 'dra dor//shes pa de 'drar der sems shes//de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do//'jig rten kun la bltas
388a4(rgyud): nas kyang //ji lta bur nu snang 'gyur cing //mthong bar gyur na de 'dra bar//'gro ba'i sems ni shes par bya//de gnyis snyoms par
388a5(rgyud): zhugs nas ni//'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba dang //byed pa dang ni 'chug pa'ang rung //ji ltar mthong ba de ltar rtogs/snyoms par zhugs nas
388a6(rgyud): bsams na ni//sems can gang dang gang yin pa'i//de dang de ni de bzhin du//sems can thams cad rtogs par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan
388a7(rgyud): 'dab rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so//rigs thams cad kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe'i
388b1(rgyud): na po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rje das grub ny+tsi maug rnasmra pa'i rgyud 'di gsus so//sems dpa' byon gyis brlabs tshul gyis/
388b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag bsgoms na//ye shes kyi ni tshul de yis//sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur//de la 'di ni de bzhin ga shegs
388b3(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shesakye rgyud de/nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du//dkyil 'khor 'di ni se re skya mthong //sems dpa' nyid ni ga
388b4(rgyud): rgyu nyid//mngon sum dun mthong dgu na'i//de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi ngongos sgrub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud do//de sgyu bu mi dbyibs gyur pa'i
388b5(rgyud): dbus nA sngo sangs twA na//rdo rje rigs mchog dngos grub 'breg/de la 'di ni bad+mo rigs kyi suM thu bA laM shrIs yin/de nyi du la du ma
388b6(rgyud): 'dra ba'i//d+d+hi sngon po rigs sgrib pa'o//dngos gru bI de ni lags par 'gyur//de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi ye shes dngos grub kyi rgyud
388b7(rgyud): nam mkhar 'aman gyi shes gzhan du//ra ting mkha' bzhin dri med las/'od zer dkyil 'khor 'gro bar ni//mthong na dngos grub myur du
389a1(rgyud): 'thob//rdo rje sems sogs sems pa'i rnams//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas par//dngos grub dus su rang bzhin du/
389a2(rgyud): bdag nyid kyi mdun mthong na'o//rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyad do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
389a3(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsungs so//de la 'di ni da
389a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de//rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas//lus kun de bzhin
389a5(rgyud): gshegs rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsgoms la//de bzhin lus las byung mthong na'o//de la 'dri ni de bzhin gsheg
389a6(rgyud): pa'i rigs mngon par shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do//rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya che//rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings na ni//
389a7(rgyud): pas cho ga 'di yis ni//mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur//de la 'di ni 'phrul gyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub yin no//phyag
389b1(rgyud): chen por zhubs nas ni//mig gi rnams shes bskyed nas kyang //gang yang rung ba des bsnams na//shin tu rang ba'ang mthor 'gyur zhes//bcom
389b2(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs//phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni//rna ba'i rnam shes bskyed nas kyang //des ni dgos pa gang
389b3(rgyud): brisems kyang //shin tu ring na gnas thos zhes//bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs//phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni//
389b4(rgyud): yid kyi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang //sems can gang la des brtags ni//de yi sems ni nges shes 'gyur//phyag rgya chen por zhugs
389b5(rgyud): nas ni//bdag gam sems can gang yang rung //yid kyis bltas nas gaR+Sha skyes pa//gzugs ni de yis shes par 'gyur zhes bcom
389b6(rgyud): ldan pa sa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so//de nas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho ga shes pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin no//phyag rgya chen po bcings
390a1(rgyud): nas kyang //rdzu 'phrul gang dang gong 'drid rga/de nas gang yang rung bar du/tong rdzun gyis ni 'thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan
390a2(rgyud): 'dus byang chub kyi sems chen pos gsungs so//de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do//khams gsum rnam rgyal
390a3(rgyud): mchog tu ni//rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings nas kyang //cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos//mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo//khros
390a4(rgyud): nas dgos pa thams cad ni//lta 'og rim pa ji bzhin bya//rdzu 'phrul mig la sogs tshul gyis//mngon shes kun bdag nyid du
390a5(rgyud): 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do//'igro
390a6(rgyud): ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya'i mchog/rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings na ni//cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos//mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo//
390a7(rgyud): lha 'og go rims ji bzhin du//cho ga bzhin du 'dod pas chags//'phrul gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis//mngon shes thams cad thob 'gyur
390b1(rgyud): sa//bcom ldan 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs//de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do//don kun grub pa'i byug rgyu ni/
390b2(rgyud): rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings na ni//cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos//mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo//lha 'og rim pa ji bzhin du//'phrul gyi mig la sogs
390b3(rgyud): tshul gyis//sangs rgyas rnams la mchod byas la//mngon shes lnga ni nges 'thob bo//zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so//
390b4(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do//de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
390b5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi bden pa'i de dus grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so//de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bden pa'i
390b6(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no//bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa yis//tshig gis mna' ni 'dor byed ning//bden pa chen po ba srungs na nI//myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob
390b7(rgyud): bo zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
391a1(rgyud): rnyogapa 'byung ba la//da rlo/ldan na 'dul//rdo rje 'ad nga sbyangs na//dngos rgya mchog po pa tu dza rdzu ngon pa sdugs gyu//
391a2(rgyud): dul 'din rdo rigs kyi dang byed des da da/d+hIm+b+ha dngas sna chog 'dod na/ 'dilasu 'di bya ba//rdo rje dzin lce dum da cing //badren pa
391a3(rgyud): bsrung ba bya zhis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs so//de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi d+hA di//tsiste dngos grub mchog 'did/
391a4(rgyud): pad+ma chen po rigs mchog gi/pad+mo'i chos la mna' 'dor zhing //bden pa'i dam tshig bsrung bar bya//zhes bcom ldan 'dre rje chos kyis gsungs//de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs
391a5(rgyud): kyi padra ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do//'di las shin tu 'da' dka' bar//sangs rgyas chos la mno'i mdor zhing //bden pa mchog 'di gsungs na ni//dbang bskud ba ni 'thob
391a6(rgyud): par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mnod pas gsung so//rigs thams cad kyi man dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyud//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
391a7(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'odi gsungs//de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi
391b1(rgyud): dakhon nyid kyi sa glab kyi rkang na 'di ldanan//snu ma pa s+ho//zhes brjo nas/dri yI ga tum bsgrubs pas/rnyogs kuk+tsir+g+ho byugar+dz+dza d+harbAthA//nyid/A barmongs nas ngas par 'gyur
391b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid kyis gsungaso//de la 'di ni dri bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gling kho na nyid kyi da kA kyi rgyud//su r+yAt+na b+h+rUM zhes brjod/
391b3(rgyud): na/de nyid bskul ba'i bdag nyid che//ma bsgrubs par yang phyag rgya kun//nyid kyis bcings na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyis gsung
391b4(rgyud): sno/dade la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud//hU~M zhes bya ba gcig tsam gyis//mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni//bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung //nyid
391b5(rgyud): cings 'ching du bcug kyang rung //de la 'di ni pad+mi rigs kyi dam tshig gi dri kha ni nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyudado//saur+b+ba shud+d+ha zhes brjod na//bdag gam yang na gzhan dag gis/
391b6(rgyud): brang med chags la sogs ldan na//thams cad du ni grol mi 'gyur//de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dang tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyudado//UM zhes bya bas mdor bsku
391b7(rgyud): ni/phyag rgya thams cad 'grub 'gyur te//'jig rten kun gyi mchog nyid kyi//rang 'byung nyid la mchod par 'gyur//rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub/
392a1(rgyud): klu phyag ts+tsha brgyas pa rgyud//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyug na rdo rjes de dunan gshegs pa thams cad kyi blos grub kyi phyagar+b+ha'aM d+hang
392a2(rgyud): 'di gsung so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs de'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/de bzhin ga/shogs pa drin byed cing //sangs rgyas phyag rgya bcings nas ni//
392a3(rgyud): byang chub brtan par yang //bsgrubs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyudado//rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che//bcings
392a4(rgyud): nas de yi mdun du yang //rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms na ni//shin tu myur bar dngos grub 'gyur//de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do//rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin
392a5(rgyud): gyis//dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings na//rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms na ni//nyid rim du ni dngos grub 'gyur//de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud//
392a6(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis//chos kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang //'jig rten mgon po bsgoms ni ni//nyi rIm du ni dngos grub thob//de la 'di ni nor bu rigs
392a7(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud do//rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis//las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni//rdo rje snying po bsgoms na ni//nyi rim du ni dngos grub 'thob//rigs thams
392b1(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi tsho ba rgyas pa'i rgyud//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud 'di//
392b2(rgyud): gsungs//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad grub pa'i rgyud do//phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas na//bdag nyid dang ni mdun
392b3(rgyud): du yang //sangs rgyas rje su dran pa sgom//de nas de ma thag tu 'grub ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs
392b4(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub thams cad srid pa'i rgyud do//rdo rje bzlas pa'i tshul gyis ni//'dod pa bdag ces bsgoms nas kyang //phyag rgya thams cad bsgrubs nas ni//grub pa'i mchog/
392b5(rgyud): ni kun bsgrubs pa'o zhes pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so//de lnga 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad sgrib pa'i rgyud do//bdag nyid nyid kyis rdo rje dbyibs//
392b6(rgyud): rab mnyam gzhag pas sgom byed cing //phyag rgya thams cad bcings na ni//de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur//zhes pa com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thamasde cid kyi
392b7(rgyud): rdo rjes gsung so//de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyudado//ye shes kun 'byung dngos grub kyi//pad+mo chen po'i rigs la gnas//bdag nyid kyis ni
393a1(rgyud): bdag nyid nyid//pad+ma'i dbyibs su bsgom par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsung so//de la 'di ni nar bu rigs kyi dngas grub tha~Md kyi
393a2(rgyud): sgrub pa'i rgyudado//ner bu rin chen 'od zer 'bar//bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni//nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi chod pa//kun las 'byung ba'i dngos grub 'thab ces bcom
393a3(rgyud): ldan 'das na mkha'i snying pos gsungs so//rigs thams cad kyis dngos grub dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyudado//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes
393a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so//de la 'di ni nga bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi dngos grub kyi
393a5(rgyud): rgyudado//rdo rje dbyings dbang phyag rgya no//rab mnyam gzhog pas bcings nas kyang //snying ka mdzod spu ma gin spyi bor//bzhag nas sangs rgyas byin rlob bo zhes sangs
393a6(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyu yin no//rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis//sems//
393a7(rgyud): dpa' rdo rje dam byas la//snying gi mdzod spu mgrin pa dang //skye bor bzhag na byin gyis rlob ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so//de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi
393b1(rgyud): b+h+yod chos brlabs de'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de//rdorje phyug rgyuni/rlab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang //snying//mdzud pu mgun skye byor//bzhag na nyid du byin gyis rlabs ces
393b2(rgyud): com ldan 'das rdo rje gtsobos gsungs//de la 'dren pad+ma rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud//'jig rten dbang po'i ti 'dzin gyis/rdo rje pad+mod ma byas la//
393b3(rgyud): snying ka mdzod bu mgrin spyi bor//byin gyis brlabs phyir bzhig par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan dus gzigs dbang posna gsungs//de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi byin gyis
393b4(rgyud): brlabs kyi rgyud do//rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin gyis//rdo rje nor bu che bcings la//snying ka mdzod bu mgrin spyi bor//byin gyis brlab phyir bzhag par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das
393b5(rgyud): rdo rje snying pos gsungs//rigs thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i chog rgyus pa'i rgyu//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad
393b6(rgyud): dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyudado//rin chen rdo rje bcings nas ni//dpral bA ra
393b7(rgyud): bzhag byos na//rgyal ba rdo rje rini chen gyis//dbang bskur bar ni da 'gyur//zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungaso//de la 'di ni de din gshegs
394a1(rgyud): pa'i rigs rtso bang bskar ba'i da s+ho bla/rgyud//rdo rje snrengs dbyung la sogs pa//sangs kyus byug d+hA mdun nas ni//brnam pa byas nas ngas gnod yang //
394a2(rgyud): byung ba nyid kyis dbang bskur 'gyur//de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi da ba sgyur ba'i blos grub kyi rgyud//rdo rje nga gi phrang du na//ci sa nas dang yo bar bzhag na dang //rlung
394a3(rgyud): de'i dbang ni de yin no//rjes nu du da 'gyur//de la ni d+ma ris kyi da sgyur 'i 'dus kyi kyi rgyud/sa kyi rdzu sa nas myeng //mag par ban+d+ha N+Di
394a4(rgyud): dbyung bsgyur//sangs rgyas kyi sbyini 'jig rten gyi//dbang phyug gi na dbang bsgyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun gyi spyan ras gzugs kyi dadang ngos gsung so//dri la 'di na nor gyi 'dris
394a5(rgyud): kyi dbang bskung ba'i rgyud/na myu gru bcings//dad+mal byer bzhig spyi ngas dang sgyur//snangs rgyas kyis ni mchad pa yi//dbang drug tu ni dadang de m+b+ha shA byung nas
394a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ni mkhri'i skying pos gsungs//rigs thams cad kyi dpung du sgyur pa'i das glu rgyud//de nas byang churgya sems dpa' chen po phyig ni rdo rjes de badzin
394a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung sa//de la 'din dbenan gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do//rgyal ba kun gyi
394b1(rgyud): //phyug rgya maHlta par gzhak+Sha par btsis//zlos shis sngags kyi rig pa na//myur du dngas glub thob par 'gyur shes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs//dri la 'dzin
394b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud//sems dpa'i byin rlabs tshul gyis ni//ting 'dzin rdo rje chos kyis kyang //snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams
394b3(rgyud): zlos pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur//zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin gyis gsung so//de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyis rgyud//'dod cha/
394b4(rgyud): las ni khyod phyung ste//bdag ni khro bo yin bsgoms nas//snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams//myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas
394b5(rgyud): gsungs so//de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do//'jig rten dbang po'i rig zlos pas//byams pas 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis ni/
394b6(rgyud): snying po la sogs bsgrubasnun yad //dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang pos gsungaso//de lnga 'odo ni nor bu'i rigs
394b7(rgyud): kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngas grub kyi rgyud//namakha na ting 'dzin no//rab mnyam gzhan pa ba sgoms na yang //snying pa phyog rgya sngags rigs rnams/
395a1(rgyud): bsgrubs na kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying pos gsungaso//rigs thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyu do//de nas byung/
395a2(rgyud): chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
395a3(rgyud): cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do//rab mnyam gzhag pas dang por ni//bdug pa la sogs mchod byas la//de naste dngos grub 'dod pa yis//bsgrubs na dngos grub
395a4(rgyud): thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyudo//gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam bzhi
395a5(rgyud): yis/gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod byed cing //bdag dbul ba la sogs pa yi//mchod pa byas na 'grung par 'gyur//zhes pa com ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs//
395a6(rgyud): de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mchod pa'i dwangs grub kyi rgyu do//khro bo rdo rje mchod chen po//khro bo gsong ba badz+rad byed cing //khro bo'i khu tshur rab sbyar na//myur du bdag gis rigs
395a7(rgyud): 'gru'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so//de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mcho pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do//mdo sde zab cing rgya che ba'i//tshul rnams legs
395b1(rgyud): bAr d+h+r-id na ste kyang //yod dang ngag gis phul nas ni//dngos grub myur tu 'thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsung so//de la 'drin na
395b2(rgyud): bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyudado//gdug sa dang 'phan dang rgyal mtshan gyis//rgyal po'i mchod pas mchod byed cing //sbyin pa thams cad byin na ni//nor bu'i rigs
395b3(rgyud): ni 'thob par 'gyur//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungaso//nyid la byin gyis brlabs sogs ldan//rdo rje sems dang 'dra bar 'gyur//tshe 'phrul rnam pa bzhi yis
395b4(rgyud): ni//rdo rje sna chags ting 'dzin gyi//dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs//rigs thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa
395b5(rgyud): dang /dbang bskur ba dang //ting 'dzin dang /mchod pa rnams kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyudo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byug na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs
395b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi grub kyi rgyud yin/lus
395b7(rgyud): la sangs rgyas ting 'dzin no//'di ni bde gshegs nyid mngangon shes//de ni rab tu rtogs nas/ni//sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub 'thob//ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan
396a1(rgyud): 'das kyis gsung so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi drangs grubak+Sha d+hAd//'phrul gyi mag sogs mngon shes//
396a2(rgyud): ni/rab mnyam gzhug pas bsgoms nas kyang //mngon shes lnga ni dag gyur na//dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung sa//
396a3(rgyud): de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyudado//khro bo mngon shes bskyed nas ni//rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms na yang //mngon shes lnga ni
396a4(rgyud): bdag gyur nas//dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so//de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos
396a5(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud//'dod chags mngon shes bskyed nas kyang //rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms na ni//mngon shes lnga ni bdag gyur nas//dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/
396a6(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje spyan gyis gsungs//de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do//mchod pa'i mngon shes bskyed nas kyang
396a7(rgyud): rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms na ni//mngon shes lnga yang bdag gyur nas//dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungaso//
396b1(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyu mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyug na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
396b2(rgyud): rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungaso//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyudo//rdo rje sems
396b3(rgyud): dpa'i tIng 'dzin gnas//bdag gis sangs rgyas dran byed cing //sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di//bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan
396b4(rgyud): ngas kyis gsung so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do//rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnasos//phyag rgya
396b5(rgyud): chen por sgoms byed cing //byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di//bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsungaso//
396b6(rgyud): la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud//khro ba'i rgyal po'i ting 'dzin gnas//lag pas dam tshig mchog bcings la//byang chub
396b7(rgyud): chen po'i ye shes 'di//bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungaso//de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes
397a1(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi rgyudado//'jig rten dbang phyug ting 'dzin gnas//de bzhin chos kyi phyag rgyas bzlas//byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di//bsgoms na dngos grub //
397a2(rgyud): thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs//de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud//rdo rje snang
397a3(rgyud): po'i ting 'dzin gnas//las kyi phyag rgya los legs byed//byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di//bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das na mkha'o snying//
397a4(rgyud): pos gsungs so//rigs thams cod kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes
397a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyudado//
397a6(rgyud): nyid kyi sangs rgyas byang chub phyir//sems tson don rnams rab 'byed cing //sangs rgyas rjesu dran gyur nas//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes por byed ces bcom ldan 'das
397a7(rgyud): rdo rje chags pas gsungs so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud//ji ltar yul dang ldan gyur nas//sangs
397b1(rgyud): rgya rnams cad mnyes byed ces//rdo rje snrums dpa' sgom byed cing //de nyid bsgyur na myur bar ni//mnyes par 'gyur ba des 'gyu'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs//
397b2(rgyud): dedol 'don du rje rigs kyi mnyes par byed po'i dngos g+hA ky-i dz+nyAd do//sangs rgyas gau/ ni smad pa dang //sems can dron ni steng ba'i b+hur//rngam pas mngon skyed d+has+thAn no//rdo rje
397b3(rgyud): rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bsde gsungaso//de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do//
397b4(rgyud): tshigs pas kun tu lta ba dang //bya dang snying rjes chos spyad //mo 'jigs kun sbyin byed pa namaste//sangs rgyas kun gyis mnyas por byeng rjes bcom ldan 'das
397b5(rgyud): spyan gyis gsungs//de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyudado//dbang bskur ba ni rab spyan dang //nor bsags rab tu sbyin byed cing //de yang
397b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas don du sbyor//'di ni sangs rgyas mnyes par byed ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa na mkha'i snying pos gsungs so//rigs thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i dngos
397b7(rgyud): grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud//de nas byang chub sems dpo' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so///
398a1(rgyud): de la 'di ni de btsun gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i phyos grung kyi rgyud//daltar rnam dag ba sbyin pa//'dod chags la namanyas ma bya//sam+b+has
398a2(rgyud): can kun gyi don du brtson//'di ni sangs rgyas dang du byed ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs//de la 'dre ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i
398a3(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud do//'dod sbyin byed pa'i bag+h+ra nyid hU~M//su ra tAdz+nyo nas sgra spring //rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrubs na ni//de nyid bskul na dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan
398a4(rgyud): 'das kun tu bzang ngos gsungs so//de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud//sangs rgyas bka' ni sems can rnams//dag bya lus can sgrubs
398a5(rgyud): rkyen dang //sangs rgyas bstan pasrung ba'i phyir//bas na yang ni dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bas gsungaso//de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dbang
398a6(rgyud): du bya ba'i ngos grub kyi rgyudado//pad+mo 'ad ma kha 'byed cing //'dod chags dag la kun rtog le//gdul ba'i phyir na chags byed cing //'dod par byed pa dbang du 'gyur
398a7(rgyud): gis bcom ldan 'das sbyin ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs//de la 'di ni ning bu'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud//sangs rgyas thams cad dpa'i myur/
398b1(rgyud): byu //rdo na can nyid nga //spyi bor banag tong ba su na//sa sargyas thams cad dang du 'gyur sa bcom ldan 'das rnas ts+li blo ngos bsas
398b2(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi bsad pa'i dngos gud kyi rgyud 'di gsungs//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do//
398b3(rgyud): sems can kun don ma mthong zhing //sangs rgyas de nyid ma sbyangs la//yi dri dang ngag dang lus kyis ni//bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
398b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis gsung so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do//dngos grub thams cad ma thob la//rigs rnams kyang ni mi brtson
398b5(rgyud): zheng /rdo rje kun tu brtags nas ni//bsad na dngos grub myur du thob ces bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsung so//de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud//ma
398b6(rgyud): rungs mi brtul khro med cing //de bzhin sems can gyimi 'dul la//bdag nyid sdug bsngal 'thob byed na//hU~M zhes bya bas bsad par bya//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
399a1(rgyud): sa gas ma//dum 'dun R+tha ga slo sma pa sa smra rnan// na rgyas na dug/sa sa sa na da//
399a2(rgyud): basmras na yang //bsang na drongs grub thob par 'gyur//nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu stan ras gzigs kyi dbang ngos gsung so//de la 'di na nor bu rigs kyi bsod
399a3(rgyud): pa'i ngas grub kyi myed//mi gting bdag la na med cing //nar stong ba dang gnod byung la//dbul par gyu la sems can rnams//bsad na ngos gru ba pAr 'byung nas
399a4(rgyud): ldan 'dres ba thams cad yongasu snang bas gsungs so//kha cig gis nasangs rgyas kyi//rnal 'byong mthob gsud bcug na//de dge deng ba bya ba'i phyir/ga
399a5(rgyud): gi dngos grub sbyin par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu bzang pos gsung mo//rigs thams cod kye bsad pa'i dngas grung kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyud//de nas byung chu
399a6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po phyog na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi srung ba'i phyag rgyu'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so//dri la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyang
399a7(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud do//sems can thams cad mi gto shing //rtag tu sangs rgyas mchod dag nyid//rtag pa sangs rgyas yid la byed//'di ni srung ba da kyi mchig
399b1(rgyud): sbyangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsu s+ho//do khA 'do na can gshegs pa'i chags kyi sbyang po'i ngos grub kyi da //rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshon tsamya zhog/ldan gcig tsamA yang /

399b4(rgyud): rdorje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so//de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi spyang po'i dngos grub kyi byud //'dod chags dag cod byams bya che//thams cad lha ni mi 'jigs sbyin//'jig rten
399b5(rgyud): dbang gis mtshan bzlas pa//srung ba 'di ni rmad du che//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsung so//de lnga 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud//spangs
399b6(rgyud): rgyas sems can gaN+DI byed par//ci nus pa ni spyod byed cing //nyi ma stongs pa yi bya bar//srung ba 'di ni rmang kyi mchog bcom ldan 'das rdo rje srung bas gsung //
399b7(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi skyong de'i dngos glus kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag ni rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di sa ces gsol te/
400a1(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ribs kyi rgyud 'dres bzhes par gsol/gang gis sems can thams cad brtag pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu/

400a3(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la legaso zhes bya ba byin te/phyag na rdo rje legs par bshad pas nged kyis blangs shing byin gyis brlabs kyis legaso legs//de nas yang

400b3(rgyud): dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud//sems dpa' rdo rje snyid kar bcings//nga yi chung ma khyod sdug pa//brtan par gyur cig ces smras nas//phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub
400b4(rgyud): bya ste//cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni//rang gi las rnams ma grub kyang //gsang ba'i chung ma zhes smras na/shin tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das sems
400b5(rgyud): dpa'i rdo rjes gsungs//de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyudo//ji lta ba bzhin bsgrubs na yang //dngos grub thob par ma gyur na//hUM gis phyag
400b6(rgyud): rgyas bsad na ni//skrag ste dngos grub sbyin par byed ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis hU~M zhes bya bas gsungaso//de bzhin 'di ni pad+ma rigs kyi
400b7(rgyud): dngos grub dam pa'i gsang ba'i rgyudado//ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas kyang //rdo rje blta bas bltas nas kyang //bdag gis chung ma 'am gzhan chung ma//sdug pa'i
401a1(rgyud): dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'dod pas gsung so//de la 'di ni nor bu rigs dam pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do//dbang po gnyis ni
401a2(rgyud): mnyam sbyar la//bde ba'i mchog ces smra byed cing //sangs rgyas kun la nyid dbang po//phul na myur du dngos grub 'gyur zhes pa tsam ldan 'das nor bu bzhed pas gsungs//

401a5(rgyud): chags byas la//sems can don gyis mi skyo na//nges par sangs rgyas des mnye so zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungaso//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs /
401a6(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang po'i rgyudo//'dod chagaso la ni brnyas mi bya//bud med kun dang rtse byed pa//rdo rje rnams kyi gsang dam tshig/'di ni bsrungs na

401b1(rgyud): gsod//lus dang ngag la dam dgyes pa//'jog rten rnam par sbyangs nas ni//dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin pa'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
401b2(rgyud): bas gsungs so//de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyu do//dag pa'i bdag nyid 'dod chags dag/mu stegs rnal 'byor ma dag lnga//drag
401b3(rgyud): pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig ni//bsrungs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs//de la 'o na nor bu rigs kyi dam
401b4(rgyud): tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud//rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin gyis//rdo rje nor bu sngar bcings lo//ma rungs rnams kyi nor phrogs na//dam tshig dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur

401b7(rgyud): rang bzhin dag par ni//rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang //dogs pa thams cad byas nas kyang //sangs rgyas pa yi dngas grub 'thob ces bcom ldan 'das
402a1(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungasaso//de la 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi du ngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud//sems can kun la chags byud cing //yul lnga//
402a2(rgyud): skyo bar ma gyur la//bud med dga' ba'i dag pa ni//gsang chos dngos grub rab sbyin no//zhes bcom ldani 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsungs//de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi
402a3(rgyud): dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud//rna ba'i rnal 'byor hUM zhes pa//phra ba'i rdo rje ting 'dzin gnas//mi 'grungs rnal 'byor 'di bsad ces//rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rjes dgyel//
402a4(rgyud): dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig dam pas gsungs//de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud//rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis
402a5(rgyud): ni//rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis//bud med kun dang rtse byed cing //chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos

402a7(rgyud): ni stug pa la//dngos grub bla me thob par 'gyur//zhes bcom ldan 'des rdo rjen pa ches gsungan//rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dngas grub gsang ba'i rgyud/
402b1(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
402b2(rgyud): las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud//rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis//sangs rgyas rjesu dran bsgoms la//bud med lus kyi bu gar blugs//bud med rnams ni dbang //
402b3(rgyud): du 'gyur zhes pa com ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyu do//rdo rje sems dpa'i
402b4(rgyud): ting 'dzin gnas//bu ga nas ni de bzhin zhugs//bud med lus su legs khyab byas//sems med pa yang mgu bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dgyes pas

403a3(rgyud): gar bcug na sud med rnams//nyid du phab nas gang spyod 'gyu nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po chos gsung sa//rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i chog

403a7(rgyud): sngo snyam sen//rigs rnams kun gyi phyag rgya ni//tshul rnams la yang de skad brjod//sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyam med pa'i//gsang ba'i dngas gleb thob par
403a8(rgyud): 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i dado/
403b1(rgyud): //rdo rje rmongs dang 'dra bar no//dkyil 'khor legs par bri ba bya//de byA na gshegs pa'i rnyogs rnamasan//rnams nAd kyi ni mchog tshul te//dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs
403b2(rgyud): nas kyang //dengs grub 'dod pas myur byu na//su ra ta so ma ya s+t+waM haM//badz+re sar+b+ba Ar+yA sid+d+hi mAM/ces brjod snying po 'di bzlas te//bsgrubs n+ya thams cad 'grub par
403b3(rgyud): 'gyur//de nyid bskul ba'i tshul gyis ni//mgunas myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so//de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'tsho

403b5(rgyud): pas legs par bri bar bya//der zhugs nas ni myur ba yang //dngos grub 'debs trang gsol byed cing //rA gA tra si si b+ha ta/'dod chags las ni khyod gyur zhes sman
403b6(rgyud): kun tu 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje ts+tsha gris gsungs so//de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/

404a3(rgyud): zhugs nas 'di skad smra bar bya//sarba pri ya sid+d+hi m+me/rA ga shi sid+d+hi mAM/sid+d+hi sid+d+hi ma hA satwa/de skad smras nas dkyil 'khor kun//zhugs nas mchod gsang ba

404a6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag ni rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungaso//de la 'di ni de
404a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud/taM thA ga ta ma hA bi d+ya/pro ya sirba su kha pra ti/bden las byung ba'i tshig bden pas//bsgrubs kyi
404b1(rgyud): drin ma grub nar//de la 'di ni de bathun gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu//lnga 'og gi rims ji bzhin du//phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni//'dra/

404b6(rgyud): mahA satwA/par+ya ta mo a ti pra ye/zhes ni bskul na myur ba yang //rjesu chags nas 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungaso//de la 'di ni nor chu
404b7(rgyud): rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyudade//sarba karma ma da ber+ya wa tA ma me sid+d+hi ts+tsha badz+ri Ni/rdo rje can gyis bskul myur bar//rje su tshigs nas 'grub par 'gyur
405a1(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das nam kha'i snang pa n+d+ha gsungs//rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dngos glu d+hAd//de nas byung chu sems dpa' rgyun po byugan
405a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'ang gsung so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs po thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi
405a3(rgyud): mu stegs can rnams phan gdags phyir//ri mo'i phyag rgya'i tshul du no//sangs rgyas btsun mo rab sba bar//shes na rab tu 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das dang di
405a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis gsungaso//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyu de/sems can kun gyi yid la
405a5(rgyud): khyab//sems can kun la bde sbyin zhing //sems can kun gyi yab nyid ni//dam tshig mchog gi 'dod pa'i mchog ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams//
405a6(rgyud): cod kyis gsungaso//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//gsang ba'i mchog ste smad che ba//dad ldan shes nas dad byas nas//bsgrib dka' ba yang 'grub par 'gyur zhes
405a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs//de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyu de/tshogs pa'i dag pa'i chags bral gyi//sa ni don gyi
405b1(rgyud): yod sbyang nas//mu stegs lta bArASh+Thas pa ste//lbu bdun pa'i pats+tshed da ltung //zag pa cha la dgong pa'i phyir//gsod par tha chags mchog yon to//de m+WAr shos na khru byung
405b2(rgyud): 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs//de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngoso grub kyi rgyud/mu stegs can rnams gzhom pa'i phyir//'byung ba tshe'/
405b3(rgyud): thaM 'byung //mi gcing zhes ni ci phyir brjod//nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis gsungs//de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dam tshig gsang
405b4(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyu de/bud mod chags phyir rin chen rnams//rtag tu legs par bsag par bya//bud med bla med rin chen zhes//bsams nas de ni 'grub par 'gyur//

405b6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'dri gsung so//de la 'di ni dri bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi
405b7(rgyud): mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyudade//bud med chags rnams yangs bskor la//kun nas rtses pa'i bde ba ni//sangs rgyas mchod phyir phul na yang //mchod pa'i
406a1(rgyud): dngas grub thub par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsungaso//du la/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba
406a2(rgyud): rgyud//rab dwags dal te skyo ban//rab dga' las byung bde ba de//phyag bzhis pos ni mchod pa'i phyir//phul na myur du grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
406a3(rgyud): pas gsungs//de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang de'i rgyudahU~M gis dam tshig bcings nas ni//skye bo bud med 'khyud nas ni//'khyud par gyur
406a4(rgyud): pa'i bde ba de//phul na de ni 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungaso//de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang bar rgyud/'jig
406a5(rgyud): rten dbang por bdag bsgoms la//sdug pa'i gdong du bltas nas ni//bltas par gyur pa'i bde ba da//phule na de yi 'grub par 'gyur//zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+ma
406a6(rgyud): spyan gyis gsungaso//de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/las kyi phyag rgya bcings gyur la//rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan nas kyang //
406a7(rgyud): bud med 'khyud pa'i longs spyod ni//mchod phyir phul na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen gyis gsungaso//rigs thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dang
406b1(rgyud): grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glus ts+tsha dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so//de la 'di ni
406b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyudade/rdzogs sangs rgyasu bdag bsgoms lnga//ci nas sus kyang mi tshur bar//gzhan gyi bud med
406b3(rgyud): byed na//mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i
406b4(rgyud): rgyu de/rdo rje 'jom byas nas kyang //rdo rje phreng ba 'ching byed cing //de nus rdo rje glu blangs la//rdo rje glar gyis mchod byas la//'dod pa'i dga' bas dbang bsgyur
406b5(rgyud): mchog/glu dang grwar gyis bde ba las//bde ba gzhon gyis myong min te//de phyir gsang mchog 'di bla med//de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos
406b6(rgyud): grub kyi rgyu de/'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal sgom//cho ga rje bzhin tshul du yod//gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod na ni//mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur
406b7(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsungaso//de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi mchod pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyu de/'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgyar gnas//gis
407a1(rgyud): ba'i tshul ni ci bzhin par//las kyi phyag rgyas rab mchod na//mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang
407a2(rgyud): pos gsung so//de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi gsong ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu de/don kun grub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//gsang ba'i tshul ni ji bzhin par//las kyi
407a3(rgyud): phyag rgyas rab mchod na//mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs//rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i
407a4(rgyud): rgyud//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so//
407a5(rgyud): de la 'di ni dri bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na nyid bskyed pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyudade//mdor na ting 'dzin ye shes la so//sems can rnams la chags tshul gyis//
407a6(rgyud): spangs rgyas nyid du 'grub 'gyur na//myur du blo med thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungaso//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
407a7(rgyud): rigs kyi de kho na nyid chen po bskyed pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud/sems can theg ma tha ma med//namakha' 'byung po'i mtshan nyid//kun tu bzang po kun bdag
407b1(rgyud): nyid/'dod pa 'gro ba kun badrug po//sems can kun gyi sems gang ni//brten phyid sems dpa' zhes bya'o//rdo rje mnyam par man pa gzhag na//nges pa rdo rje nyid gyur pa/
407b2(rgyud): sems dpa'i byin rlabs tshul gyis ni//rdo rje sems dpo' nyid du 'gyur//bcom ldan sems dpa' de nyid//rdo rje bzhedan pa de bzhin gshegs//nyid sems rab tu rtogs la so/
407b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub cho ga bzhin//de nyid bcom ldan de bzhin gyi shugs//thams cad kyi ni rigasu 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpas gsung mo/
407b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs nyid//de nyid rdo rje'i rigs chen po//de nyid pad+mo'i rigs dag pa//de nyid nor bu'i rigs kyi mchog ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
407b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi 'khor los gsungaso//rigs thams cad bskyed pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o rgyu do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo
407b6(rgyud): rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'od gsung so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma mngon par/
407b7(rgyud): brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud/bcom ldan sems dpa' de nyid ni//rdo rje sems dpa' thugaso la gnas//mnyam par gzhag las ting 'dzin te//sangs rgya
408a1(rgyud): /byang chub rab tu sgrub nas spangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyus gsung so//de lta 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i mngon par brjod pa'i dus
408a2(rgyud): grub gsang ba'i rgyud/rAng rtogs phyir rdo rje ste//ge rdung ba'i tshul gyis lcags kyu yin//pha mo rtigs phyir mda' yin la//mgu bar gyur phyir legs zhes
408a3(rgyud): byedaspras pa'i phyir yang rin chen gsungaso//gzi brjid tshul gyis nyi ma ste//rgyal mtshan legs par sbyong ba gsungs//'dzum phyir bzhed par grogs pa la//

408a5(rgyud): tshul du kun rdo rje//mi tshugs tshul gyis go cha yin//'dzegs byed tshul gyis mche ba ste//phyag rgya'i tshul gyis bsdams pa'o//ji ltar bcom ldan sems
408a6(rgyud): rtag pa//rdo rje sems dpa' kun 'gro ba//de bzhin rdo rje mtshan lo sogs//bsgoms nA myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
408a7(rgyud): pa thams nad kyi mtshan mas gsung so//rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa'i dngos gleng gsang ba'i rgyud/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen
408b1(rgyud): po phyug na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya gtsung pa skyo ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungaso//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya btsong ba skye ba//
408b2(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyu de/rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas//rdo rje skyil mo krung bcingasA la//lag gnyis rdo rjer bsdams pa las//myur du sangs
408b3(rgyud): nyid 'grub 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso//de la 'di ni de bzhi ni gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i

408b5(rgyud): tshul du yang //nyid kyi phyag rgya btab pa ni//bdag nyid che ba'i phyag rgya cher//shes nas dngos grubo thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya chen pos gsungaso//
408b6(rgyud): de lnga 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi phyogs rgyobacing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyu de/ji ltar dam tshig dam pa ni//skye bo 'gas ni bcings gyur na//shin tu 'dra'i
408b7(rgyud): bar mi bya ba//de ltar de bzhin gshegs kun gyi//dam tshig phyag rgya bcings pa yi//rdo rje bcing ba'i mchog btsongs na//ma shi bar du mi 'da' bar//shes
409a1(rgyud): nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsung so//de la 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi phyag rgyab cing ba skye bar 'gyur bya' gas grub
409a2(rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyud/mdor na rgyal bas rdo rje'i ngab/'da' bar bya ba mi yin te//'di ni bcings par shes nas kyang //des ni chos kyi pos grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das/
409a3(rgyud): rdorje chos kyi sa gsungs//de la 'di ni rdo rje las kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing bskye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyu de/rdo rje bka' dang las ma rnams//'dang
409a4(rgyud): bar bya ba mA yin zhing //bka' nyan pa yi las de ni//shes na myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs//rigs thams cad kyi
409a5(rgyud): phyag rgyobacing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyus pa gsang ba'i rgyudado//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces
409a6(rgyud): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di yang bdag gis yongs su gzung zhing byin gyis brlab so//de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/
409a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje la legs zhes bya ba byin no//rdo rje theg pa bla na med//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gas nga /
409b1(rgyud): nas byu chu'i sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad kyi chos dam pa'i blo grub kyi rgyud 'dog sa //de la 'di ni de bzhin

410a1(rgyud): rnam rgyal cha lugs//bsgoms nas 'dun drang de bzhin te//phyug na rdo rje'i mthur gyur nas//khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur zhes bcom

410a6(rgyud): kye dam tshig gi blos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig dngos grub kyi rgyudade/sangs rgyas rje su dran byur la/

410b3(rgyud): mdun du de bzhin te//hUM hUM hrI hUM zhes brjod na/dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gos gsungaso//de la 'di ni pad+mo rid kyi chos kyang tshig gi
410b4(rgyud): dngos grub kyi nad/'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzugs kyis ni//rdo rje phra mo sgom byed cing //sid+d+ha sid+h+ya zhes brjod ni//dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan
410b5(rgyud): 'das rdo rje chos kyi gsung so//de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/don kun grub pa'i gzugs kyis ni//rdo rje phra mo bsgoms nas kyang //
410b6(rgyud): sid+d+ha sid+d+hi zhes brjod na//don gyi dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das nor bu chos kyis gsungs//rig sa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos chub kyi

411a1(rgyud): la 'di ni de bzhin gla shegs pa rnams cad kyis dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dos+t+wa~M g+hA kyi rlung /dam pa'i chos ni yig med//ting 'dzin ye shes 'byung

411a4(rgyud): de'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud//de bzhin gshegs kun de nyid kyi//mdo sde 'di ni dad pa yis//dang nas bangs byuklags byu na//
411a5(rgyud): dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso//dri la 'dri ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu/
411a6(rgyud): sdig pa'i sems can pan don du//sdig can sdig snod bzlogs pa dang /sangs rgyas dka' ni skyed du'i phyir//bskrad pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur//zhes
411a7(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs//de la 'di ni pad ma'o rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud//'dod chags rang bzhin dag par shes//
411b1(rgyud): dam de'i don du dgrongs nas kyang //thog ma tha ma dA bya sgoms na//chos kyi dngos gru na par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzugs kyi dbang pos gsu/
