411b3(rgyud): ni nor bu yi//rigs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das chos rin chen gyis gsu so//rigs thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud/
411b4(rgyud): dri nas byabyung chub sem+b+has dpa' chen pa phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
411b5(rgyud): rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud/sangs rgyas kyi ni ting 'dzin las//sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrubaste pA//'di ni sgom par byas nas kyang //dngos
411b6(rgyud): grub dam pa thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsu so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud
411b7(rgyud): sems dpa' ting 'dzin gyis//bla mdi dang ni las mdo rnams//sems dpa' kun 'gyur thams cad dang //shes na yang ni grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das
412a1(rgyud): sems dpas gsungaso//de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi lus kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud/sdig pa dag pa rgyu yi phyir/'tshom sna med byed las mi zlogs na//
412a2(rgyud): bsod pa'i las la dad pa na//des ni 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems drangs gsungaso//de lnga 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi las kyi ngongos grub kyi rgyud
412a3(rgyud): sdig kun rnam par dag pa'i bla dag/kun dag pas na dregs pa kun//des byed las 'di yin par//shes na yang ni grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das badros gsungs//
412a4(rgyud): de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/srid ldan dbul po thams cad kyi//rtag tu bsam pa kun bskang la//don kun grub pas kun bdag ni//
412a5(rgyud): grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//ces bcom ldan 'das rin po ni rgyul mtshan gyis gsungaso//rigs thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu do//de na
412a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungaso//de la 'di ni de driSh+TAn
412a7(rgyud): rmyi tha ma'i yis kyi dngos grub kyi rgyudade/rtag tu rdo rje phra mo'i tshul//'bad pa kun gyi sbyor na ni//rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa yi//mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur zhes songs/
412b1(rgyud): rgyo sa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud/slob dpon mA yon gzhan dang ni//slob ma yin bu min pa yi//
412b2(rgyud): mdun du phyag rgya mi brjod de//de dag gsang bas phyag rgya 'grub ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs//de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi phra mo'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyu /
412b3(rgyud): rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni//sma nAs hUM byung ldan gyur la//rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis//dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungaso//de la 'don
412b4(rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs kyi phra me'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud/pad+mo chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas//rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni//rdo rje lta bas bltas na ni//'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par
412b5(rgyud): 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo bzhed pas gsungs//de la 'di ni rigs kyi dra mo'i rigs ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis//rdo rje phra mo'i
412b6(rgyud): tshul gyis ni//shin tu phra ba'i lha 'bar bas//don ni thams cad 'dren par 'gyur//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje ni bus gsungaso//rigs thams cad kyi phra mo'i dngos
412b7(rgyud): grub kyi rgyudado//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mig gi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so//de la
413a1(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud/gang tshe phyag rgya'am ting 'dzin//sgrub phyir stsol bar gyur pa na//gang tshe mkha' la skar ma//
413a2(rgyud): 'dra//dkar po rgyug par des mthong na//de tshe blo ldan sangs rgyas kyi//spyan ni bdag gis thob 'gyur zhes//phyin cad sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni//rtog pa kun las/
413a3(rgyud): bsgrub par bya zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi skyon gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud/gnas dang 'gro ba
413a4(rgyud): de ngo zhin to//ji snyed dngos po yod par 'gyur//de snyed kyi ni gzugs brnyan rnams//mkha' rgyug 'gro ba'am 'ong yang rung //mthong ni rdo rje spyan dag par//shes
413a5(rgyud): pas mchod na dngos grub ni//bla na med pa thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso//de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud
413a6(rgyud): g.yas pa'am ni g.yon phyogs kyi//mkha' la na mkha'i dbyings nyid ni//sbyin 'drar myur du 'khor ba yang //mig gis mthong bar gyur byas kyang //rdo rje las
413a7(rgyud): byung phyag myed//mthong nas 'jigs par ma gyur la//phyag rgya ni bzung na no//rdo rje sbyin ni 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsung so//de la/
413b1(rgyud): /'drin pad+mo rigs kyi sman+da b+hi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud/gang tshe skya 'am dmar bya dang //dkar bu'am sar ba 'am sna tshogs kyi//dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur pa'i tshe/
413b2(rgyud): dgongs 'gyur 'khor lo'i spyan 'grub 'gyur zhes po com ldan rdo rje pad+mos gsungaso//de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes dngos grub kyi rgyu de/mkha' la rin chen 'dra ba/
413b3(rgyud): dang /gsor la sogs pa 'dra ba ni//gang tshe mkha' mthong mkha'i mig/de ni 'grub par 'gyuraro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs//rigs thams cad kyi spyad///
413b4(rgyud): gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyu de/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
413b5(rgyud): 'di gsungaso//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud/chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni//'dod chags bde ba rnam smin phyir/
413b6(rgyud): gtso bo thams cad mchod byas pa//sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
413b7(rgyud): kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud/'dod chags bdag ces sgom byed cing //gsang ba'i mchod pa rab byas na//rdo rje 'dod pa'i gzi can mnyam//dngos grub dam pa thob pa
414a1(rgyud): 'gyur//gos som ldan 'as rdo rje nod pas gas s+ho//de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyilas dam pa'i das grwa kyi d+hAn/khyab bdag nas ba //
414a2(rgyud): gas pa'i ma pA~Mn+das smras pa//khems gsuM rnam rgyal ba di d+hi//hU~M s+'u glai drim pa dob par 'gyur zhes brnam ldan 'das 'phags pa b+hag nA gsu
414a3(rgyud): de la 'dzin chos kyi rigs kyi la da ma pa'i dus grub kyi rgyud/nang dusang ba'i ni//'dod pa dam pa sgom byud cing //r+dz+dza sna dang ldan pa la gi yen
414a4(rgyud): skyes rgyas mngon par mchod nan//des g+ha'i myur du sgrib par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu sbyin ras gzugs kyi dbang pos gsung so//del
414a5(rgyud): 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud//rdo rje snying por mnyam gzhag le//bsam pa g.yos pas bdud na ni//phyug la rtag tu badz+ran byas la/
414a6(rgyud): dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'dres rdo rje dbang rin po ches gsungas+ho//rigs zlumasna cad kyi las dam pa'i dngos glob+h+yo N+DI chog rgyus pa'i rlud/
414a7(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' chen 'i phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dmachog gi gsong ba'i dngos grub kyi rlud 'od gsus so//dri mdu ni/
414b1(rgyud): dudonan gshogs pa'i rigs kyon pa rtog gsang d+ha 'ad so glub kyi rgyud/'dod la sogs pa khyo bstan//rtag tu dadag gi spyang la gnas//oM mA'i sems can don rnams la/
414b2(rgyud): skye bar gyur pa dang bshad rmad//'di ni las kyi dam tshig ste//de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin du//bsgoms nas sangs rgyas mchod na ni//dngos grub dam pa thob
414b3(rgyud): pod+ma 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas ma ldan das kyi suM gus so//de la 'di ni dbazhin gshegs pa'i gas kyi las kyi dam tshig gsong pa'i das grub kyi rgyud//rdo rje sems
414b4(rgyud): da'i d+d+ho dzin gan//sems can tshul da skye //kun tu ning 'a rje bdag yin te//mchod na dus grub thob par 'gyur//nas bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas
414b5(rgyud): dris+yA s+ho//de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dmi tshig gsung ba'i dus g+ha hrIn+dan+d+he/sems can tshul ba ni byed pa'i//nub na pa bdag yin+datA//rdorjedz+haiM gyis rnam
414b6(rgyud): 'byor gyis//mchod ni dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so//de la 'di ni pad+ma rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gi gseng po'i dngos sgyub
414b7(rgyud): kyi rgyud/bad ba thams cad ba sbyin pa'i//kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin te//bdag nyid 'gro 'dul bskur gnas la//mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur//zhes
415a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das pa d+mo chags pas smras so// la 'di ni nor bya rangs ky-i las dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub k+ta r+m+mad/sems can kun la don chen ston
415a2(rgyud): dun bzang rgyal po bdag yin te//dod kun grub pa'i gzugs kyis ni//mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur//zhes bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pas gsung
415a3(rgyud): saM/rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes da zhin gshegs pa
415a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi las kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rnyed de/rang gi ting
415a5(rgyud): 'dzin pa yis//g.yas pa'i mdzub mos mdud nas ni//go char bcings te spyi bor bzhag/shin tu yang ni bsrungs par 'gyur//zhes sangs rgyas bcom
415a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gsung so//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'iSh+Ti las kyi rigs kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu de/rtsig pa la ni ldan 'dra ba/ri mor byas nas mtshan
415a7(rgyud): bsring ste//mnyes na bud med gang bsams pa//de ni 'di yi dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs//de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi/
415b1(rgyud): chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud/sa la gnod sbyin gdang bris so//de yi mig gi phyogs na//mdzub mo'i sngon mo bcugs na yang //bud med mchog ni 'dren par 'gyur//
415b2(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs//de la 'doni pad+mo rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi ngongos grub kyi rgyu de/lag pa gnyis pad+mo blangs//'dod chags dag pa lta byed cing //
415b3(rgyud): rdo rje lta bas bung med de//dAltas na yang ni dga' bar 'gyur//zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'dzin pas gsung so//de la 'din ner bu rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dang sti grub
415b4(rgyud): kyi rgyud/rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gnas//lag pa gnyis kyi nor bu bzung //hUM zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis ni//bud med kun la 'dud byed//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
415b5(rgyud): gis gsungs//rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi
415b6(rgyud): dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungaso//dri la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud/mchod pa'i las kyi cho gar sbyar//glang
415b7(rgyud): dang gang gi dgas posems pa//de dang de ni gsol btab ste//mkhas pas phyag rgya bsgrub par bya//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs//dri la'i di //
416a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu de/rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis//gu srang ba'i mchod pa cho gar sbyar//dgos
416a2(rgyud): ba gang zhig smras pa de//myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungaso//de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i das grub kyi
416a3(rgyud): rgyud/khro ba'aM ting 'dzin zhugs nas kyang //rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod chen byas//mkhas pas cung zad grang bsams pa//de ni myur du dngos grub 'gyur zhes
416a4(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje khro bos gsung so//de la 'ang ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi lus kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud/'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis//yid kyi mchod pa
416a5(rgyud): byibyas nas kyang //mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsams pa//dA yi dngos grub thams cad thog/ces bcom ldan 'das pod+ma 'dzin pas gsung so//de la 'di ni no
416a6(rgyud): bu rigs kyi las dgos pa'i ngongos grub kyi rgyude/rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis//gdug pa la sogs mchod byas la//mkhas pas dgosde pa gang bsam du/
416a7(rgyud): kun skad cig nyid 'grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so//rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos gru kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud//
416b1(rgyud): dra nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungaso//de la 'ad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs
416b2(rgyud): kyi rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do//sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gyis//rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni//sangs rgyas phyag rgya rab bsgrubs pas//dngos grub dam pa/
416b3(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur//zhes po tsam ldan 'das de bzhin gshogs pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungaso//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi
416b4(rgyud): rje khyor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyu do//kun gyi bdag nyid sems dpa' ni//bdag gi lus la gnas pa ste//sems dpa' bdag ces byin rlabs la//bdag ces bya ba'i nga rgyal
416b5(rgyud): gyis//bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyuraro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//dri la
416b6(rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rdo rje'i byin gyi brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyude/sems dpa' ji bzhin phyag rgya bzhin//phyag rgya ji bzhin bdag de bzhin//cho ga 'dra yis tshul gyis/
416b7(rgyud): ni//phyag rgya thams cad bskyongs par bya//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungaso//de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi chos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rna lhor gyi rgyude/chos kyi
417a1(rgyud): phyug+sa rgyu'i tshul gyis no//rdo rje phra mo bsgoms byas la//dag gi phyag rgyus de dag kun//sems dpa' chen po'i ting 'dzin//ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags/
417a2(rgyud): pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs//de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las kyi byon gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud/sangs rgyas kun la dbang bskur dang //mchod
417a3(rgyud): dang dam tshig dngos grub rnams//bcom ldan 'das zhes bsgoms nas kyang //rdo rje las rnams bsgrub par bya//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las kyis gsungs//rigs thaMng
417a4(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyudado//dri nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad go cig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' song
417a5(rgyud): chen po dri bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba phyag na rdo rje la leg so zhes bya ba byino//rdo rje theg pa bla na med//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //
417a6(rgyud): theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i//mdo 'di legs par bau shud byos na//rdo rje sems dpa'i khyod lagaso//rdo rje rin chen khyod lhag so//rdo rje chos ni khyod leg so//
417a7(rgyud): las ni khyod lag so//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las brtag pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs//

417b2(rgyud): bya dran cing chags bral la//gsang ba 'di ni mi rigs te//sems can kun la phan don du//de bzhin cho ga bshad par bya//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na
417b3(rgyud): rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas

417b6(rgyud): bzhir bdug pa la sogs pas cho ga bzhin du mchod nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon por rtogs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas de bzhin gshe
417b7(rgyud): pa thams cad la bstod/phyag rgya bzhis phyag bya ba'i tshul gyis phyag byas la sngags 'di bzhes bdag gi lus dbul zhing mchod pa bya'o//oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pas+tha nA/

419b1(rgyud): maujug sgro'i nang du rdo rje bdug ste bcings la/de nas rma b+h+yo'i 'jug skrod sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas mnan la de bzhin gshegs pa rnanas cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i d+hu ba r+m+ma

419b6(rgyud): mdzad pa rnams kyang smyon pa nas/bdag nyid las rnam pa'i mchog thams ci de dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kying ston pa'i gling dzu//ci ste dbang du byed par 'dod
419b7(rgyud): dzin ga shegs pa rjes kyi sengs men rgyu'i phyag yi yi phyeg rgyud la gyi mdzu sa pa phyid//nas myen ci byed rmyi sa
420a1(rgyud): kyi nga thunan ga shoms pa thams cad /sgrub byung dbyung du byud na sems dpa gzhan su sa da/su sgyu 'jug rgyun du 'jog nan las 'das pa'i das rgya
420a2(rgyud): sgrub par 'dud na yang des dang po khan de de bzhin du zlos spring na bo gcig tu bad+hid steng ban+d+has ye de nas mdzad byig byu cis tid zhin du mtshan pog zug phyug rgyu 'bar gyi ba ba nas
420a3(rgyud): par byo'o//de byin chad phrag rgya brtsengs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi dngas grub dang rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub gang yang rung ba gcig tu 'gyur//zhes pa ma ldan 'das rdo rje

426b1(rgyud): bdag mnya mo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungaso//de la 'di dag ni pad+mo rigs kyi dngos grub rnams hA/de ni 'di ltar mnyes par bya ba dang /dbang du bya ba dang /srang ba

427a1(rgyud): myur me dbul ba dang /ci nus kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par bya ba dang /rin po che sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag gros de bzhin gshugs pa
427a2(rgyud): thaMthi mchod na ring po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyuraro//zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po ches gsungs so//rigs thams cad kyi thun mong/
427a3(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogaso///de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med//

427a6(rgyud): chags las skyes//da yi thabs ni skom pa ste//dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur//de la 'di ni sngags kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud/badren las 'jig rten 'di/
427a7(rgyud): nyams pas//sngags kyi dngos grub tha~M'i mi 'gyur//spros pa med pa'i thabs kyis ni//dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur//de la 'di ni rig pa thams cad dngos
427b1(rgyud): b+h+ya g+ho dz+yo/mdog mun chags 'da' no//rig pa'i dngos phyu yod na tsit+ta//de khyi tha bas ni rgyu rmu sa//da b+hU g+h+nA gyi mchog thob bo//bsgrub pa tham sa rgyud ky-i d-i d+hAH

428b1(rgyud): // sa sun na du gazlas pa mas du rgyunas rnam mas sngags //sdug parnams ca nam shes nas d+hA k+Sha r+m+mA d+hA na/

429a3(rgyud): las sna tshogs byung nas ni//sna rdzogs pa yi gzugs gyur te//khams gsum kun gyi rdul snyed de//de dag nyid ni rgyul bla yin//rdo rje sgra ni dri rnams las/

429a6(rgyud): sems dpas gsungaso//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag narje
429a7(rgyud): rjes rtog pa thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs//de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi

429b7(rgyud): pa 'byung ba'i rgyud do//de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyu de/yid kyis 'dod pa'i tshig yis//yid kyis 'dod pa grub 'gyur te//ting 'dzin
430a1(rgyud): /sgru pa snod sa gnas//dbyung stong po zhes spyod//de nas rtog pa rnams cad kyi phyug tu 'thung ba'i stsogs rgyud/sbyar rgyal po'i b+hag d+hAn dz+nyA/

430a3(rgyud): 'byung bar bya'o ma yin+ti da //skye ba / lam+b+ha g+nisang banyid//gsung ba grib d+hi brjod pas na// byung na sngags sas brjod//de nas rig pa 'byung ba

430b1(rgyud): pa lta bsdus na ni//gong ma bzhin du kun shes 'gyur//dal 'di sngags kyi yo shes nA myu ba'i rgyud yin te//lhan cig tsam yang sngags brjod na//'das dang 'byung da/byung glang yin//

430b3(rgyud): rig pa lan TIg brjod na ni//byung dang 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rnams//ji ltar rdo rje'i ng+ge'i bzhin du//yid kyi de ni shes par 'gyur//rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes smra ba'i

430b7(rgyud): tshul du gnas byas to//shin tu khros nas sgrub byas na//the tshom med par 'brub par 'gyur//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsung so//de la 'od ni pi
431a1(rgyud): rigs kyi gsad pa'o skur byug rgyu sgrub pa'i rgyud yin te//rdo rje skyil mau klung ban+d+ha sA l+ya//yug gnyis rdo rje brjongs nas kyang //tod 'dzin gyi sur gyur la/

431a3(rgyud): 'dug gam nyam pa 'am//'chag kyang rung ste da ltar ni//rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur na//the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur//zhe sa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos

431a6(rgyud): gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyu /hUM zhes bya ba 'brug sgrar bsgrags//khro bo'i ngag ni zab cing bstan//rdo rje chen po khro ba'i gsal//rdo rje khro bo'i gsung

432b7(rgyud): leg so zhes bya ba 'di byin//rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsal//theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i//mdo 'di legs par bshad pa
433a1(rgyud): na//rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so//rdo rje rin chen khyod leg so//rdo rje chos ni khyod leg so//rdo rje las ni khyod log so//de bzhin gshegs pa thang

433a7(rgyud): kun mkhyen ye shes mkhyen pa po//sems dpa'i kun te thabs chen po//shes reb chen po khyod phyag 'tshal//thugs rje chen po mchog gi mchog/thugs rje thugs rje
433b1(rgyud): bdag nyid nan//thams cad gtod pa d+ya A pA tsho//kun mdzad khyod la phyag 'tsha//shAk+Shas ///shA/shAHthA pa che//'dum pa chen po khyab pa b+h+yo//

434a7(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi mdun du rdul phra mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab par byas nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
434b1(rgyud): pa shAkya thub pas chos kyi 'khor l-i rab tu bskor bar gyur to//de nas byang chu sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rgyog su bcad pa 'di gsungs//rtag par 'jig rten thams cad ngu/

434b3(rgyud): bla mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam su bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyis rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu bskor ba
434b4(rgyud): gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di gsungs//rtag par 'jig rten thams cad//sems
434b5(rgyud): can kun lnga phan pa'i phyir//ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i//khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor//de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra mo
434b6(rgyud): ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam su bcom ldan 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum lngas rnam par rgyal bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro ba'i 'khor la
434b7(rgyud): chu bstir bar gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen pa 'phags pa kun tu spyan ris gzigs kyi dbang pos tshigasu bcad pa 'di gsungs//rtag par 'jig rten rdzodang /
435a1(rgyud): /snyoms can+da kun la phan pa'i phyir//dz+nyA m+WAr 'dul bar sna tshogs pa'o//rlu 'khor lo rab tu bskod//da na sa 'od gsungs m+b+ha thag tu bzhin du sangs rgyas//
435a2(rgyud): kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo'i ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal pos pad+mo'i 'khor la rab tu bskor ba 'gyur
435a3(rgyud): to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa na mkha'i snying pos tshigasu bcad pa 'di gsungaso//rtag par 'jig rten thams cad tu//sems can kun la phan pa'i
435a4(rgyud): phyir//ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i//nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor//de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi khongasu gtogs pa'i sems can phra ba 'am sbom
435a5(rgyud): po yang rung //de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ri rab ri'i rgyal po rtse mo rdo rje dang /nor bu dang /rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa red
435a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdan la bzhugs nas rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu bskor bar phyogs kun nos mthong //de nas byang chub sems
435a7(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di gsungaso//mi yi nang du babs nas kyang //dgos phyir sems can kun gyi don//rdo rje'i 'khor lo mo tshig bskor
435b1(rgyud): zhing //mgon pa rag tu sgrub par mdzod//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bos nas 'di skad ces gsung so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shugs/
435b2(rgyud): pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'du bar mdzad gsol//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
435b3(rgyud): thugasu zhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bdag nyid
435b4(rgyud): gyur par mkhyen nas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungaso//rigs kyi bu khyod kyang nga'i thugs dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /rigs thams cad dang /dkyil
435b5(rgyud): 'khor thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugasu zhugs shig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
435b6(rgyud): gnang nas tshig su bcad pa 'di gsungaso//mdor na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni//zhugs nas sems can thams cad la//phan pa'i phyir ni bsgrub
435b7(rgyud): par bya//de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyem pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed
436a1(rgyud): bzhugs pa rnams las de bzhin gshegs par ras kyang 'jog rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i su 'phra ba mdzad pa rnams kyang bcom
436a2(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod kyi thug su zhugs//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
436a3(rgyud): mdzad kyi sku thams cad dang /gsung thams cad 'jug pa'i gnas dang /sems kyi rgyud 'byung ba thams cad dang /rdo rje'i tshul thams cad dang /yan lag dang /nying
436a4(rgyud): lhag thams cad dang /gnas thams cad dang /mtshan thams cad dang /dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /ba spu'i khung bu thams cad dang /rdul shin tu phra mo snyid
436a5(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /thugs rnams su zhugs nas bzhug so//do nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma ldan pa zhig
436a6(rgyud): na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid gyur par mkhyen nas ri rab ri'i rtse mo nas snying po byang
436a7(rgyud): chub gang na pa der gshegs nas ched du bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi shing drung du 'jig rten pa dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyir rtswa blangs nas ched du brjod pa 'di tshad du brjod/
436b1(rgyud): do/oM ma'o sems can brtan pa yi//sems can don ni bdag don mchog/glang phyeng gdul dbang brtan pa rnams//mu stegs lnga la gnas par mdzod//mdor na mi 'dul
436b2(rgyud): 'jig rten pa//lta ba dran pas mdongs pa rnams//ye shes snang bas dag bya'i phyir//sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur//de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom
436b3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi de kho na nyid mi shes pas 'di skad du kye dge sbyong ji byang chub kyi phyi di lta bu'i sdug bsngal drag cing mi bzod pa la bzod par mdzad dam zhes gsol to//de nas bcom
436b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi d+hA da bting ste steng du bzhugs nas lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' sprul to//grogs pa rnams kho bos byang chub thob par bsgrubs shig/de nas 'dod pa na spyod
436b5(rgyud): pa'i lha rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung smra ba'i don ma rtogs nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gang na ba der dong nas ched du lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la de ltar gyur
436b6(rgyud): pabapa 'di brjod//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi tshogs kyis bskor te gzugs na spyod pa'i lce rnams kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po la de
436b7(rgyud): dag brjod/de nas tshangs pa chen po 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad dang /lhan cig tu 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug
437a1(rgyud): chen po la da ltar gyur pa rnams brjod do//de nas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' drug gi bdag po dbang phyug chen pos lha rnams kyi bdag po mthu bo che la sogs pa la
437a2(rgyud): 'di skad ces smraso//grogs po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dang 'thun par mdzad cing yang bla na med pa yang dag/
437a3(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ston gyis 'di ltar 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin snyam du shes par ma byed cing lha nyid las de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur gyis/
437a4(rgyud): de dag nyid du bsgrub par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du ma yin//de legs kyi der mchod pa la 'dong bar bsgru'o//de nas lha thams cad kyi bdag por dbang phyug
437a5(rgyud): chen po la sogs pa snying po byang chub gang nu ba dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por byang chub par zhugs pa gang na ba der dong nas che du bcom ldan 'das
437a6(rgyud): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dogongs te ran gyi gdan 'di
437a7(rgyud): las bzhengs la/lha rdzas kyi gdan la bzhugs te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mdzad du gsol
437b1(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bdag po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//grogs pa rnams kho bo la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par bsgrubs shig/
437b2(rgyud): de nas 'di dge gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub rtsol bar mi nus ci ste bdag cag gis nus par gyur na bdag cabo nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
437b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas par 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid gsal bar mdzad cing yang tshigasu bcad pa 'di gsungaso//dri ni gzugs min gzugs min min//bden min brdzun//
437b4(rgyud): ma gtsad ba yi//sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di//rtogs na rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur//de nas lha'i dbang po de dag gis cung zad cig cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to//
437b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rtswa'i gdon las bzhengs te lha de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//grogs po rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di lta bu rtogs par bya ba sgrubs shig/
437b6(rgyud): de dag gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rngo mi thog go/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de nyid la bzhugs bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungaso//yid kyis rab
437b7(rgyud): tu rtogs pas na//byang chub sems ni brtan par byos//sems dpa' rdo rje brtan byas la//sangs rgyas su ni bdag sgoms shig/de dag gis 'di skad du de lta bu
438a1(rgyud): legs so//zhes bya ba thams cad kyis smras nas dong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mau de'i bo rangs 'jug rten dang /'thun par bya ba'o//
438a2(rgyud): phyir bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par byas nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par sangs rgyas nas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus po med
438a3(rgyud): pa thams cad la phan par mdzad pa 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs la zhugs pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do//rdo rje sems dpa' sems
438a4(rgyud): dpa' che//theg pa chen po'i bdag nyid che//snang ba chen zhing dag pa tshe//mgon chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje che//rdo rje de bzhin gshe
438a5(rgyud): pa kun//sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus che//thabs chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//rdo rje 'dod pa dag pa che//kun gyi bde ba bde ba che//bde mchog
438a6(rgyud): thog ma tha ma med//bzhed chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//rdo rje legs pa dgyes pa che//legs zhes bya ba rab mnyes pa//mnyes pa che zhing
438a7(rgyud): dgyes pa che//rab dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//rdo rje rin chen rgyal po che//dbang bskur bzang po bdag po che//rin chen thams cad mdzes
438b1(rgyud): /na sa ga/dang gnas na d+hAr+dz+dza rgyunam nan rgyu na/rgyu la 'dod dang dz+ra/sa rgyas 'a khyong drug
438b2(rgyud): 'tshal lo//rdo rje skyil mtshon dpal cheg/rgyal mitshan che bas nor rabu gtong //nam mkha'i rgyal mtshon yu ba nI//gtong ba'i mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal lo
438b3(rgyud): rdo rje dand pa bzhad pa che//dgyes pa che zhing rab gyes pa//dgyes pa'i shugs kyis rol cing dgyes//chos dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//rdo rje chos ni
438b4(rgyud): chos che ba//sems dpa'i chos ni rab sbyor ba//sangs rgyas chos te chos rab mchog/'dod ches khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//rdo rje rnon po ral gri cha/
438b5(rgyud): shes rab ye shes blo grosteH//klog gcod dam gyi chen pa ste//sangs rgyas mtshon khyod phyag 'tshal lo//rdo rje rgyu ste 'khor lo tshe//sangs rgyas
438b6(rgyud): la ga ter chen+da go/N+DI kun sa kyi mag/chos kyi dkyil 'a khyod phyag 'argya rdo rje gsung ba gsung ba che/
438b7(rgyud): spros med pag chen groste//yi ge med pa bzlas partse//sangs rgyas gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo//rdo rje las te las rib mtshig/las chen
439a1(rgyud): las rang byed pa ste//gsang ba'i mchod pa mchod pa che//sangs rgyas mchod khyod phyag 'tshal //rdo rje srung ba go bya che//gau cha'i mchog
439a2(rgyud): ste brtan pa che//srung ba chen de snying po che//sangs rgyas brtson 'grus phyag 'tshal lo//rdo rje gnod sbyin khro bo che/ma rungs thams cad skrag byed pa
439a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen te//srung ba mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo//rdo rje bsdams pa phyag rgya che//dam tshig chen po bgying ba che//khu tshur chen
439a4(rgyud): po phyag rgya che//rdo rje khu tshur khyod phyag 'tshal//de bzhin gshegs pa phyag bye zhing //brjod de mchod de sti stang bya//gang phyir thog ma tha mi med
439a5(rgyud): byang chub sems ni khyod yin te//khyod la brten nas rgyal ba dang //dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa' kun//byung zhing yang dag 'byung 'gyur bas/
439a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi rgyu//rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phag 'tshal//rdo rje rin tshon khyod phyag 'tshal//rdo rje chos khyod phyag 'tshal
439a7(rgyud): lo//rdo rje las ni khyod phyag 'tshal//yang dag par ni phyag 'tshal zhing //mtshan mchog gis ni khyod bstod pa'o//bsod nams
439b1(rgyud): ma/ na gas na smra du chu nga ladan smra na chu la
439b2(rgyud): ga rgyu myed//nan /shegs pa r+m+ma sa/theg rten na /
439b3(rgyud): ma ldan sum pad/de ni don na da sa bzung chu sems du
440a1(rgyud): par dgyes byar gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog so//
440a2(rgyud): zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ci zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// badz+ra ma d+hA laM/
